00001 <?php

00019 
00020 define('AUTOFONT_CJK',1);
00021 define('AUTOFONT_THAIVIET',2);
00022 define('AUTOFONT_RTL',4);
00023 define('AUTOFONT_INDIC',8);
00024 define('AUTOFONT_ALL',15);
00025 
00026 define('_BORDER_ALL',15);
00027 define('_BORDER_TOP',8);
00028 define('_BORDER_RIGHT',4);
00029 define('_BORDER_BOTTOM',2);
00030 define('_BORDER_LEFT',1);
00031 
00032 if (!defined('_MPDF_PATH')) define('_MPDF_PATH', dirname(preg_replace('/\\\\/','/',__FILE__)) . '/'); // mPDF 4.2 \ to /
00033 
00034 require_once(_MPDF_PATH.'includes/functions.php');
00035 require_once(_MPDF_PATH.'config_cp.php');
00036 
00037 if (!defined('_JPGRAPH_PATH')) define("_JPGRAPH_PATH", _MPDF_PATH.'jpgraph/'); 
00038 
00039 if (!defined('_MPDF_TEMP_PATH')) define("_MPDF_TEMP_PATH", _MPDF_PATH.'tmp/');  // mPDF 4.3.007E
00040 
00041 $errorlevel=error_reporting();
00042 $errorlevel=error_reporting($errorlevel & ~E_NOTICE);
00043 
00044 //error_reporting(E_ALL);
00045 
00046 if(function_exists("date_default_timezone_set") and function_exists("date_default_timezone_get"))
00047 @date_default_timezone_set(@date_default_timezone_get());
00048 if (!function_exists("mb_strlen")) { die("Error - mPDF requires mb_string functions. Ensure that PHP is compiled with php_mbstring.dll enabled."); }

00738 var $cMarginR;            //cell margin Right
00739 var $cMarginT;            //cell margin Left
00740 var $cMarginB;            //cell margin Right
00741 var $DeflMargin;            //Default left margin
00742 var $DefrMargin;            //Default right margin
00743 var $x;
00744 var $y;               //current position in user unit for cell positioning
00745 var $lasth;              //height of last cell printed
00746 var $LineWidth;          //line width in user unit
00747 var $CoreFonts;          //array of standard font names
00748 var $fonts;              //array of used fonts
00749 var $FontFiles;          //array of font files
00750 var $diffs;              //array of encoding differences
00751 var $images;             //array of used images
00752 var $PageLinks;          //array of links in pages
00753 var $links;              //array of internal links
00754 var $FontFamily;         //current font family
00755 var $FontStyle;          //current font style
00756 var $underline;          //underlining flag
00757 var $CurrentFont;        //current font info
00758 var $FontSizePt;         //current font size in points
00759 var $FontSize;           //current font size in user unit
00760 var $DrawColor;          //commands for drawing color
00761 var $FillColor;          //commands for filling color
00762 var $TextColor;          //commands for text color
00763 var $ColorFlag;          //indicates whether fill and text colors are different
00764 var $autoPageBreak;      //automatic page breaking
00765 var $PageBreakTrigger;   //threshold used to trigger page breaks
00766 var $InFooter;           //flag set when processing footer
00767 var $InHTMLFooter;
00768 
00769 var $processingFooter;   //flag set when processing footer - added for columns
00770 var $processingHeader;   //flag set when processing header - added for columns
00771 var $ZoomMode;           //zoom display mode
00772 var $LayoutMode;         //layout display mode
00773 var $title;              //title
00774 var $subject;            //subject
00775 var $author;             //author
00776 var $keywords;           //keywords
00777 var $creator;            //creator
00778 
00779 var $aliasNbPg;       //alias for total number of pages
00780 var $aliasNbPgGp;       //alias for total number of pages in page group
00781 
00782 var $ispre;
00783 
00784 var $outerblocktags;
00785 var $innerblocktags;
00786 // NOT Currently used
00787 var $inlinetags;
00788 var $listtags;
00789 var $tabletags;
00790 var $formtags;
00791 
00792 
00793 // **********************************
00794 // **********************************
00795 // **********************************
00796 // **********************************
00797 // **********************************
00798 // **********************************
00799 // **********************************
00800 // **********************************
00801 // **********************************
00802 
00803 function mPDF($codepage='win-1252',$format='A4',$default_font_size=0,$default_font='',$mgl=15,$mgr=15,$mgt=16,$mgb=16,$mgh=9,$mgf=9, $orientation='P') {
00804 
00805   // mPDF 4.0
00806   $this->time0 = microtime(true);
00807   $unit='mm';
00808   if (strlen($codepage)==0) { $codepage='win-1252'; }
00809   //Some checks
00810   $this->_dochecks();
00811 
00812   // Set up Aliases for backwards compatability
00813   $this->UnvalidatedText =& $this->watermarkText;
00814   $this->TopicIsUnvalidated =& $this->showWatermarkText;
00815   $this->AliasNbPg =& $this->aliasNbPg;
00816   $this->AliasNbPgGp =& $this->aliasNbPgGp;
00817   $this->BiDirectional =& $this->biDirectional;
00818   $this->Anchor2Bookmark =& $this->anchor2Bookmark;
00819   $this->KeepColumns =& $this->keepColumns;
00820   $this->use_embeddedfonts_1252 =& $this->useOnlyCoreFonts;
00821   $this->useOddEven =& $this->mirrorMargins;
00822 
00823 
00824   //Initialization of properties
00825   $this->page=0;
00826   $this->n=2;
00827   $this->buffer='';
00828   $this->objectbuffer = array();
00829   $this->pages=array();
00830   $this->OrientationChanges=array();
00831   $this->state=0;
00832   $this->fonts=array();
00833   $this->FontFiles=array();
00834   $this->diffs=array();
00835   $this->images=array();
00836   $this->links=array();
00837   $this->InFooter=false;
00838   $this->processingFooter=false;
00839   $this->processingHeader=false;
00840   $this->lasth=0;
00841   $this->FontFamily='';
00842   $this->FontStyle='';
00843   $this->FontSizePt=9;
00844   $this->underline=false;
00845   $this->DrawColor='0 G';
00846   $this->FillColor='0 g';
00847   $this->TextColor='0 g';
00848   $this->ColorFlag=false;
00849   $this->extgstates = array();
00850 
00851   $this->is_MB=false;   // renamed from isunicode
00852   $this->isCJK = false;
00853   $this->mb_enc='windows-1252';
00854   $this->directionality='ltr';
00855   $this->defaultAlign = 'L';
00856   $this->defaultTableAlign = 'L';
00857 
00858   // mPDF 4.0
00859   $this->fixedPosBlockSave = array();
00860   $this->useSubsets = false;
00861   $this->extraFontSubsets = 0;
00862   $this->loaded = array();
00863 
00864   $this->SHYpatterns = array();
00865   $this->loadedSHYdictionary = false;
00866   $this->SHYdictionary = array();
00867   $this->SHYdictionaryWords = array();
00868   $this->blockContext = 1;
00869   $this->floatDivs = array();
00870   $this->DisplayPreferences=''; 
00871 
00872   $this->tablecascadeCSS = array();
00873   $this->listcascadeCSS = array();
00874 
00875   $this->patterns = array();    // Tiling patterns used for backgrounds
00876   $this->pageBackgrounds = array();
00877   $this->writingHTMLheader = false; // internal flag - used both for writing HTMLHeaders/Footers and FixedPos block
00878   $this->writingHTMLfooter = false; // internal flag - used both for writing HTMLHeaders/Footers and FixedPos block
00879   $this->gradients = array();
00880 
00881   $this->kwt_Reference = array();
00882   $this->kwt_BMoutlines = array();
00883   $this->kwt_toc = array();
00884 
00885   $this->tbrot_Reference = array();
00886   $this->tbrot_BMoutlines = array();
00887   $this->tbrot_toc = array();
00888 
00889   $this->col_Reference = array();
00890   $this->col_BMoutlines = array();
00891   $this->col_toc = array();
00892   $this->graphs = array();
00893 
00894   $this->pgsIns = array();    // mPDF 4.2.020
00895   $this->PDFAwarnings = array();  // mPDF 4.2.018
00896 
00897   // mPDF 4.2
00898   $this->baselineC = 0.35;  // Baseline for text
00899   $this->noImageFile = str_replace("\\","/",dirname(__FILE__)) . '/includes/no_image.jpg';
00900   $this->subPos = 0;
00901   $this->forceExactLineheight = false;
00902   $this->listOcc = 0;
00903   $this->normalLineheight = 1.3;
00904   // These are intended as configuration variables, and should be set in config.php - which will override these values; 
00905   // set here as failsafe as will cause an error if not defined
00906   $this->incrementFPR1 = 10;
00907   $this->incrementFPR2 = 10;
00908   $this->incrementFPR3 = 10;
00909   $this->incrementFPR4 = 10;
00910 
00911   // mPDF 4.1
00912   $this->fullImageHeight = false;
00913   $this->floatbuffer = array();
00914   $this->floatmargins = array();
00915   $this->autoFontGroups = 0;
00916   $this->formobjects=array(); // array of Form Objects for WMF
00917   $this->InlineProperties=array();
00918   $this->InlineAnnots=array();
00919   $this->ktAnnots=array();
00920   $this->tbrot_Annots=array();
00921   $this->kwt_Annots=array();
00922   $this->columnAnnots=array();
00923   $this->pageDim=array(); 
00924   $this->breakpoints = array(); // used in columnbuffer
00925   $this->tableLevel=0;
00926   $this->tbctr=array(); // counter for nested tables at each level
00927   $this->page_box = array();
00928   $this->show_marks = ''; // crop or cross marks
00929   $this->kwt = false;
00930   $this->kwt_height = 0;
00931   $this->kwt_y0 = 0;
00932   $this->kwt_x0 = 0;
00933   $this->kwt_buffer = array();
00934   $this->kwt_Links = array();
00935   $this->kwt_moved = false;
00936   $this->kwt_saved = false;
00937   $this->PageNumSubstitutions = array();
00938   $this->base_table_properties=array();
00939   $this->borderstyles = array('inset','groove','outset','ridge','dotted','dashed','solid','double');
00940   $this->tbrot_align = 'C';
00941   $this->pageheaders=array();
00942   $this->pagefooters=array();
00943 
00944   $this->pageHTMLheaders=array();
00945   $this->pageHTMLfooters=array();
00946   $this->HTMLheaderPageLinks = array();
00947 /*-- CJK --*/
00948   $this->available_CJK_fonts = array(
00949     'gb','big5','sjis','uhc',
00950     'gbB','big5B','sjisB','uhcB',
00951     'gbI','big5I','sjisI','uhcI',
00952     'gbBI','big5BI','sjisBI','uhcBI',
00953     );
00954 /*-- END CJK --*/
00955   $this->cascadeCSS = array();
00956   $this->bufferoutput = false; 
00957   $this->encrypted=false;       //whether document is protected
00958   $this->BMoutlines=array();
00959   $this->_toc=array();
00960   $this->TOCheader=false;
00961   $this->TOCfooter=false;
00962   $this->ColActive=0;           //Flag indicating that columns are on (the index is being processed)
00963   $this->ChangePage=0;          //Flag indicating that a page break has occurred
00964   $this->Reference=array();     //Array containing the references
00965   $this->CurrCol=0;               //Current column number
00966   $this->ColL = array(0);     // Array of Left pos of columns - absolute - needs Margin correction for Odd-Even
00967   $this->ColR = array(0);     // Array of Right pos of columns - absolute pos - needs Margin correction for Odd-Even
00968   $this->ChangeColumn = 0;
00969   $this->columnbuffer = array();
00970   $this->ColDetails = array();    // Keeps track of some column details
00971   $this->columnLinks = array();   // Cross references PageLinks
00972   $this->substitute = array();    // Array of substitution strings e.g. <ttz>112</ttz>
00973   $this->entsearch = array();   // Array of HTML entities (>ASCII 127) to substitute
00974   $this->entsubstitute = array(); // Array of substitution decimal unicode for the Hi entities
00975   $this->lastoptionaltag = '';
00976   $this->charset_in = '';
00977   $this->blk = array();
00978   $this->blklvl = 0;
00979   $this->TOCmark = 0;
00980   $this->tts = false;
00981   $this->ttz = false;
00982   $this->tta = false;
00983   $this->ispre=false;
00984 
00985   $this->headerDetails=array();
00986   $this->footerDetails=array();
00987   $this->div_bottom_border = '';
00988   $this->p_bottom_border = '';
00989   $this->page_break_after_avoid = false;
00990   $this->margin_bottom_collapse = false;
00991   $this->tablethead = 0;
00992   $this->tabletfoot = 0;
00993   $this->table_border_attr_set = 0;
00994   $this->table_border_css_set = 0;
00995 
00996   $this->shrin_k = 1.0;
00997   $this->shrink_this_table_to_fit = 0;
00998   $this->MarginCorrection = 0;
00999 
01000   $this->tabletheadjustfinished = false;
01001   $this->usingCoreFont = false;
01002   $this->charspacing=0;
01003 
01004   $this->outlines=array();
01005   $this->autoPageBreak = true;
01006 
01007 /*-- FORMS --*/
01008   // FORM ELEMENT SPACING
01009   $this->form_element_spacing['select']['outer']['h'] = 0.5;  // Horizontal spacing around SELECT
01010   $this->form_element_spacing['select']['outer']['v'] = 0.5;  // Vertical spacing around SELECT
01011   $this->form_element_spacing['select']['inner']['h'] = 0.7;  // Horizontal padding around SELECT
01012   $this->form_element_spacing['select']['inner']['v'] = 0.7;  // Vertical padding around SELECT
01013   $this->form_element_spacing['input']['outer']['h'] = 0.5;
01014   $this->form_element_spacing['input']['outer']['v'] = 0.5;
01015   $this->form_element_spacing['input']['inner']['h'] = 0.7;
01016   $this->form_element_spacing['input']['inner']['v'] = 0.7;
01017   $this->form_element_spacing['textarea']['outer']['h'] = 0.5;
01018   $this->form_element_spacing['textarea']['outer']['v'] = 0.5;
01019   $this->form_element_spacing['textarea']['inner']['h'] = 1;
01020   $this->form_element_spacing['textarea']['inner']['v'] = 0.5;
01021   $this->form_element_spacing['button']['outer']['h'] = 0.5;
01022   $this->form_element_spacing['button']['outer']['v'] = 0.5;
01023   $this->form_element_spacing['button']['inner']['h'] = 2;
01024   $this->form_element_spacing['button']['inner']['v'] = 1;
01025 /*-- END FORMS --*/
01026 
01027   require(_MPDF_PATH.'config.php'); // config data
01028 
01029   //Scale factor
01030   $this->k=72/25.4; // Will only use mm
01031 
01032   $this->_setPageSize($format, $orientation); // mPDF 4.2.024
01033   $this->DefOrientation=$orientation;
01034 
01035   $this->margin_header=$mgh;
01036   $this->margin_footer=$mgf;
01037 
01038   $bmargin=$mgb;
01039 
01040   $this->DeflMargin = $mgl;
01041   $this->DefrMargin = $mgr;
01042 
01043   // v1.4 Save orginal settings in case of changed orientation
01044   $this->orig_tMargin = $mgt;
01045   $this->orig_bMargin = $bmargin;
01046   $this->orig_lMargin = $this->DeflMargin;
01047   $this->orig_rMargin = $this->DefrMargin;
01048   $this->orig_hMargin = $this->margin_header;
01049   $this->orig_fMargin = $this->margin_footer;
01050 
01051   // mPDF 4.0
01052   if ($this->setAutoTopMargin=='pad') { $mgt += $this->margin_header; }
01053   if ($this->setAutoBottomMargin=='pad') { $mgb += $this->margin_footer; }
01054   $this->SetMargins($this->DeflMargin,$this->DefrMargin,$mgt);  // sets l r t margin
01055   //Automatic page break
01056   $this->SetAutoPageBreak($this->autoPageBreak,$bmargin); // sets $this->bMargin & PageBreakTrigger
01057 
01058   $this->pgwidth = $this->w - $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin;
01059 
01060   //Interior cell margin (1 mm) ? not used
01061   $this->cMarginL = 1;
01062   $this->cMarginR = 1;
01063   //Line width (0.2 mm)
01064   $this->LineWidth=.567/$this->k;
01065 
01066   //To make the function Footer() work - replaces {nb} with page number
01067   $this->AliasNbPages();
01068   $this->AliasNbPageGroups();
01069 
01070 
01071   //Enable all tags as default
01072   $this->DisableTags();
01073   //Full width display mode
01074   $this->SetDisplayMode(100); // fullwidth?   'fullpage'
01075   //Compression
01076   $this->SetCompression(true);
01077   //Set default display preferences
01078   $this->SetDisplayPreferences(''); // mPDF 3.0
01079 
01080   // mPDF 4.0
01081   if (substr($codepage,-2)=='-s') {
01082     $codepage = substr($codepage,0,(strlen($codepage)-2));
01083     $useSubsets = true;
01084   }
01085   require(_MPDF_PATH.'config_fonts.php'); // font data
01086 
01087   //Standard fonts
01088   $this->CoreFonts=array('courier'=>'Courier','courierB'=>'Courier-Bold','courierI'=>'Courier-Oblique','courierBI'=>'Courier-BoldOblique',
01089     'helvetica'=>'Helvetica','helveticaB'=>'Helvetica-Bold','helveticaI'=>'Helvetica-Oblique','helveticaBI'=>'Helvetica-BoldOblique',
01090     'times'=>'Times-Roman','timesB'=>'Times-Bold','timesI'=>'Times-Italic','timesBI'=>'Times-BoldItalic',
01091     'symbol'=>'Symbol','zapfdingbats'=>'ZapfDingbats');
01092   $this->fontlist=array("times","courier","helvetica","symbol","zapfdingbats");
01093 
01094   switch(strtolower($codepage)){
01095   case 'utf-8': $codepage='UTF-8';break;
01096   case 'big5': case 'big-5': $codepage='BIG5';break;
01097   case 'gbk': case 'cp936': $codepage='GBK';break;
01098   case 'uhc': case 'cp949': $codepage='UHC';break;
01099   case 'shift_jis': case 'shift-jis': case 'sjis': $codepage='SHIFT_JIS';break;
01100   case 'win-1251': case 'windows-1251': case 'cp1251': $codepage='win-1251';break;
01101   case 'win-1252': case 'windows-1252': case 'cp1252': $codepage='win-1252';break;
01102   case 'iso-8859-2': $codepage='iso-8859-2';break;
01103   case 'iso-8859-4': $codepage='iso-8859-4';break;
01104   case 'iso-8859-7': $codepage='iso-8859-7';break;
01105   case 'iso-8859-9': $codepage='iso-8859-9';break; 
01106   }
01107 
01108   $this->default_available_fonts = $this->available_unifonts;
01109 
01110   // Autodetect IF codepage is a language_country string (en-GB or en_GB or en)
01111   if ((strlen($codepage) == 5 && $codepage != 'UTF-8') || strlen($codepage) == 2) {
01112     // in HTMLToolkit
01113     list ($codepage,$mpdf_pdf_unifonts,$mpdf_directionality,$mpdf_jSpacing) = GetCodepage($codepage);
01114     $this->jSpacing = $mpdf_jSpacing;
01115     if (($codepage != 'BIG5') && ($codepage != 'GBK') && ($codepage != 'UHC') && ($codepage != 'SHIFT_JIS')) { 
01116       if ($mpdf_pdf_unifonts) { 
01117         $this->RestrictUnicodeFonts($mpdf_pdf_unifonts); 
01118         $this->default_available_fonts = $mpdf_pdf_unifonts;
01119       }
01120     }
01121     $this->SetDirectionality($mpdf_directionality);
01122     $this->currentLang = $codepage;
01123     $this->default_lang = $codepage;
01124     $this->default_jSpacing = $mpdf_jSpacing;
01125     $this->default_dir = $mpdf_directionality;
01126   }
01127 
01128   // mPDF 4.0 TEMPORARY FIX to disable win-1251 dejavu fonts
01129   if ($codepage=='win-1251') {
01130     foreach($this->available_fonts AS $k=>$v) {
01131       if (substr($v,0,6)=='dejavu') { unset($this->available_fonts[$k]); }
01132     }
01133   }
01134 
01135   $this->codepage =  $codepage;
01136 
01137   // mPDF 4.0
01138   if ($useSubsets && $codepage=='UTF-8') {
01139     $this->useSubsets = true;
01140   }
01141 
01142   if ($codepage == 'UTF-8') { $this->is_MB = true; }
01143 /*-- CJK --*/
01144   if ($codepage == 'BIG5' || $codepage == 'GBK' || $codepage == 'UHC' || $codepage == 'SHIFT_JIS') { 
01145     $this->isCJK = true;
01146     require(_MPDF_PATH . 'includes/CJKdata.php');
01147     // FONTS
01148     if ($codepage == 'BIG5') { $this->AddCJKFont('big5'); $default_font = 'big5';}
01149     else if ($codepage == 'GBK') { $this->AddCJKFont('gb'); $default_font = 'gb'; }
01150     else if ($codepage == 'SHIFT_JIS') { $this->AddCJKFont('sjis'); $default_font = 'sjis'; }
01151     else if ($codepage == 'UHC') { $this->AddCJKFont('uhc'); $default_font = 'uhc';}
01152 
01153     $this->is_MB = true; 
01154     $this->use_CJK_only = true;
01155 
01156   }
01157 /*-- END CJK --*/
01158 
01159   // mPDF 4.2.018
01160   if (($codepage=='win-1252' || $codepage=='win-1251' || $codepage=='iso-8859-2' || $codepage=='iso-8859-4' || $codepage=='iso-8859-7' || $codepage=='iso-8859-9' || $codepage == 'BIG5' || $codepage == 'GBK' || $codepage == 'UHC' || $codepage == 'SHIFT_JIS') && !$this->PDFA) {
01161     $this->useSubstitutions = true;
01162     $this->SetSubstitutions();
01163   }
01164   else { $this->useSubstitutions = false; }
01165 
01166   if (!defined('MPDF_FONTPATH')) {
01167     if ($this->is_MB) { define('MPDF_FONTPATH',_MPDF_PATH.'unifont/'); }
01168     else { define('MPDF_FONTPATH',_MPDF_PATH.'font/'); }
01169   }
01170 
01171   if (file_exists(_MPDF_PATH.'mpdf.css')) {
01172     $css = file_get_contents(_MPDF_PATH.'mpdf.css');
01173     $css2 = $this->ReadDefaultCSS($css);
01174     $this->defaultCSS = $this->array_merge_recursive_unique($this->defaultCSS,$css2); 
01175   }
01176 
01177   if ($default_font=='') { 
01178     if ($codepage == 'win-1252') { 
01179     if (in_array(strtolower($this->defaultCSS['BODY']['FONT-FAMILY']),$this->mono_fonts)) { $default_font = 'courier'; }
01180     else if (in_array(strtolower($this->defaultCSS['BODY']['FONT-FAMILY']),$this->sans_fonts)) { $default_font = 'helvetica'; }
01181     else { $default_font = 'times'; }
01182     }
01183     else { $default_font = $this->defaultCSS['BODY']['FONT-FAMILY']; }
01184   }
01185   if (!$default_font_size) { 
01186     $mmsize = $this->ConvertSize($this->defaultCSS['BODY']['FONT-SIZE']);
01187     $default_font_size = $mmsize*($this->k);
01188   }
01189 
01190   if ($default_font) { $this->SetDefaultFont($default_font); }
01191   if ($default_font_size) { $this->SetDefaultFontSize($default_font_size); }
01192 
01193   $this->setMBencoding($this->codepage);  // sets $this->mb_enc
01194   @mb_regex_encoding('UTF-8'); 
01195 
01196   $this->setHiEntitySubstitutions();
01197 
01198   $this->SetLineHeight(); // lineheight is in mm
01199 
01200   $this->SetFillColor(255);
01201   $this->HREF='';
01202   $this->oldy=-1;
01203   $this->B=0;
01204   $this->U=0;
01205   $this->I=0;
01206 
01207   $this->listlvl=0;
01208   $this->listnum=0; 
01209   $this->listtype='';
01210   $this->listoccur=array();
01211   $this->listlist=array();
01212   $this->listitem=array();
01213 
01214   $this->tdbegin=false; 
01215   $this->table=array(); 
01216   $this->cell=array();  
01217   $this->col=-1; 
01218   $this->row=-1; 
01219   $this->cellBorderBuffer = array();
01220 
01221   $this->divbegin=false;
01222   $this->divalign=$this->defaultAlign;
01223   $this->divwidth=0; 
01224   $this->divheight=0; 
01225   $this->spanbgcolor=false;
01226   $this->divrevert=false;
01227 
01228   $this->issetfont=false;
01229   $this->issetcolor=false;
01230 
01231   $this->blockjustfinished=false;
01232   $this->listjustfinished=false;
01233   $this->ignorefollowingspaces = true; //in order to eliminate exceeding left-side spaces
01234   $this->toupper=false;
01235   $this->tolower=false;
01236   $this->dash_on=false;
01237   $this->dotted_on=false;
01238   $this->SUP=false;
01239   $this->SUB=false;
01240   $this->strike=false;
01241 
01242   $this->currentfontfamily='';
01243   $this->currentfontsize='';
01244   $this->currentfontstyle='';
01245   $this->colorarray=array();
01246   $this->spanbgcolorarray=array();
01247   $this->textbuffer=array();
01248   $this->CSS=array();
01249   $this->internallink=array();
01250   $this->basepath = "";
01251 
01252   $this->SetBasePath('');
01253 
01254   $this->outlineparam = array();
01255   $this->outline_on = false;
01256 
01257   $this->specialcontent = '';
01258   $this->selectoption = array();
01259 
01260   $this->usetableheader=false;
01261   $this->usecss=true;
01262   $this->usepre=true;
01263 
01264   for($i=0;$i<256;$i++) {
01265     $this->chrs[$i] = chr($i);
01266     $this->ords[chr($i)] = $i;
01267 
01268   }
01269 
01270 /*-- IMPORTS --*/
01271   // mPDF 4.2.006
01272   $this->tpls = array();
01273   $this->tpl = 0;
01274   $this->tplprefix = "/TPL";
01275   $this->res = array();
01276   if ($this->enableImports) {
01277     $this->SetImportUse();  
01278   }
01279 /*-- END IMPORTS --*/
01280 
01281   if ($this->progressBar) { $this->StartProgressBarOutput($this->progressBar) ; } // *PROGRESS-BAR*
01282 }
01283 
01284 // mPDF 4.2.024
01285 function _setPageSize($format, &$orientation) {
01286   //Page format
01287   if(is_string($format))
01288   {
01289     if ($format=='') { $format = 'A4'; }
01290     $pfo = 'P'; // mPDF 4.2.025
01291     if(preg_match('/([0-9a-zA-Z]*)-L/i',$format,$m)) {  // e.g. A4-L = A$ landscape
01292       $format=$m[1]; 
01293       $pfo='L';   // mPDF 4.2.025
01294     }
01295     $format = $this->_getPageFormat($format);
01296     if (!$format) { $this->Error('Unknown page format: '.$format); }
01297     else { $orientation = $pfo; } // mPDF 4.2.025
01298 
01299     $this->fwPt=$format[0];
01300     $this->fhPt=$format[1];
01301   }
01302   else
01303   {
01304     if (!$format[0] || !$format[1]) { $this->Error('Invalid page format: '.$format[0].' '.$format[1]); }
01305     $this->fwPt=$format[0]*$this->k;
01306     $this->fhPt=$format[1]*$this->k;
01307   }
01308   $this->fw=$this->fwPt/$this->k;
01309   $this->fh=$this->fhPt/$this->k;
01310   //Page orientation
01311   $orientation=strtolower($orientation);
01312   if($orientation=='p' or $orientation=='portrait')
01313   {
01314     $orientation='P';
01315     $this->wPt=$this->fwPt;
01316     $this->hPt=$this->fhPt;
01317   }
01318   elseif($orientation=='l' or $orientation=='landscape')
01319   {
01320     $orientation='L';
01321     $this->wPt=$this->fhPt;
01322     $this->hPt=$this->fwPt;
01323   }
01324   else $this->Error('Incorrect orientation: '.$orientation);
01325   $this->CurOrientation=$orientation;
01326 
01327   $this->w=$this->wPt/$this->k;
01328   $this->h=$this->hPt/$this->k;
01329 }
01330 
01331 // mPDF 4.2.024
01332 function _getPageFormat($format) {
01333     switch (strtoupper($format)) {
01334       case '4A0': {$format = array(4767.87,6740.79); break;}
01335       case '2A0': {$format = array(3370.39,4767.87); break;}
01336       case 'A0': {$format = array(2383.94,3370.39); break;}
01337       case 'A1': {$format = array(1683.78,2383.94); break;}
01338       case 'A2': {$format = array(1190.55,1683.78); break;}
01339       case 'A3': {$format = array(841.89,1190.55); break;}
01340       case 'A4': default: {$format = array(595.28,841.89); break;}
01341       case 'A5': {$format = array(419.53,595.28); break;}
01342       case 'A6': {$format = array(297.64,419.53); break;}
01343       case 'A7': {$format = array(209.76,297.64); break;}
01344       case 'A8': {$format = array(147.40,209.76); break;}
01345       case 'A9': {$format = array(104.88,147.40); break;}
01346       case 'A10': {$format = array(73.70,104.88); break;}
01347       case 'B0': {$format = array(2834.65,4008.19); break;}
01348       case 'B1': {$format = array(2004.09,2834.65); break;}
01349       case 'B2': {$format = array(1417.32,2004.09); break;}
01350       case 'B3': {$format = array(1000.63,1417.32); break;}
01351       case 'B4': {$format = array(708.66,1000.63); break;}
01352       case 'B5': {$format = array(498.90,708.66); break;}
01353       case 'B6': {$format = array(354.33,498.90); break;}
01354       case 'B7': {$format = array(249.45,354.33); break;}
01355       case 'B8': {$format = array(175.75,249.45); break;}
01356       case 'B9': {$format = array(124.72,175.75); break;}
01357       case 'B10': {$format = array(87.87,124.72); break;}
01358       case 'C0': {$format = array(2599.37,3676.54); break;}
01359       case 'C1': {$format = array(1836.85,2599.37); break;}
01360       case 'C2': {$format = array(1298.27,1836.85); break;}
01361       case 'C3': {$format = array(918.43,1298.27); break;}
01362       case 'C4': {$format = array(649.13,918.43); break;}
01363       case 'C5': {$format = array(459.21,649.13); break;}
01364       case 'C6': {$format = array(323.15,459.21); break;}
01365       case 'C7': {$format = array(229.61,323.15); break;}
01366       case 'C8': {$format = array(161.57,229.61); break;}
01367       case 'C9': {$format = array(113.39,161.57); break;}
01368       case 'C10': {$format = array(79.37,113.39); break;}
01369       case 'RA0': {$format = array(2437.80,3458.27); break;}
01370       case 'RA1': {$format = array(1729.13,2437.80); break;}
01371       case 'RA2': {$format = array(1218.90,1729.13); break;}
01372       case 'RA3': {$format = array(864.57,1218.90); break;}
01373       case 'RA4': {$format = array(609.45,864.57); break;}
01374       case 'SRA0': {$format = array(2551.18,3628.35); break;}
01375       case 'SRA1': {$format = array(1814.17,2551.18); break;}
01376       case 'SRA2': {$format = array(1275.59,1814.17); break;}
01377       case 'SRA3': {$format = array(907.09,1275.59); break;}
01378       case 'SRA4': {$format = array(637.80,907.09); break;}
01379       case 'LETTER': {$format = array(612.00,792.00); break;}
01380       case 'LEGAL': {$format = array(612.00,1008.00); break;}
01381       case 'EXECUTIVE': {$format = array(521.86,756.00); break;}
01382       case 'FOLIO': {$format = array(612.00,936.00); break;}
01383       case 'B': {$format=array(362.83,561.26 );  break;}    //  'B' format paperback size 128x198mm
01384       case 'A': {$format=array(314.65,504.57 );  break;}    //  'A' format paperback size 111x178mm
01385       case 'DEMY': {$format=array(382.68,612.28 );  break;}   //  'Demy' format paperback size 135x216mm
01386       case 'ROYAL': {$format=array(433.70,663.30 );  break;}  //  'Royal' format paperback size 153x234mm
01387       default: $format = false;
01388     }
01389   return $format;
01390 }
01391 
01392 /*-- PROGRESS-BAR --*/
01393 function StartProgressBarOutput($mode=1) {
01394   // must be relative path, or URI (not a file system path)
01395   if (!defined('_MPDF_URI')) { 
01396     $this->progressBar = false;
01397     if ($this->debug) { $this->Error("You need to define _MPDF_URI to use the progress bar!"); }
01398     else return false; 
01399   }
01400   $this->progressBar = $mode;
01401   echo '<html>
01402   <head>
01403   <title>mPDF File Progress</title>
01404   <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" />
01405   <style type="text/css">
01406     img { padding: 0px; margin: 0px; border: none;}
01407     body {
01408       margin : 0 auto;
01409       width:100%;
01410       font-family: \'Verdana\';
01411       color: #40454b;
01412       font-size: 12px;
01413       text-align:center;
01414     }
01415     table {
01416       font-family: \'Verdana\';
01417       color: #40454b;
01418       font-size: 12px;
01419     }
01420     body h1 {
01421       font-size:14px;
01422       font-weight:bold;
01423       color:#CC0000;
01424       padding:5px;
01425       margin-left:10px;
01426       border-bottom:solid;
01427       border-bottom-width:1px;
01428       border-bottom-color:#333333;
01429     }
01430     .demo {
01431       margin : 0 auto;
01432       width:100%;
01433       margin:20px;
01434     }
01435     td {
01436       vertical-align: top;
01437       padding: 0 0.5em 0 0;
01438     }
01439     .code {
01440       font-family: "Courier New", Courier, monospace;
01441       font-size: 10px;
01442     }
01443     .code2 {
01444       font-family: "Courier New", Courier, monospace;
01445       font-size: 11px; font-weight: bold; color: red;
01446     }
01447   </style>
01448   </head>
01449   <body>
01450   <div style="width:540px; margin: 0 auto; text-align:left;" >
01451     <h1>mPDF file progress</h1>
01452 
01453     <div class="demo">
01454   ';
01455   if ($this->progressBar==2) { echo '   <table width="100%"><tr><td style="width: 50%;"> 
01456       <span style="color:#006600;font-weight:bold;">Writing HTML code</span> <br/>
01457       <span class="progressBar" id="element1">0%</span> <span class="code2" id="box11"></span><br />
01458       <span class="code" id="box1"></span>
01459   
01460       </td><td style="width: 50%;">
01461       <span style="color:#006600;font-weight:bold;">Autosizing elements</span> <br/>
01462       <span class="progressBar" id="element4">0%</span><br />
01463       <span class="code" id="box4"></span>
01464       <br/><br/>
01465       <span style="color:#006600;font-weight:bold;">Writing Tables</span> <br/>
01466       <span class="progressBar" id="element7">0%</span><br />
01467       <span class="code" id="box7"></span>
01468       </td></tr>
01469       <tr><td><br /><br /></td><td></td></tr>
01470       <tr><td style="width: 50%;"> 
01471   '; }
01472   echo '      <span style="color:#006600;font-weight:bold;">Writing PDF file</span> <br/>
01473       <span class="progressBar" id="element2">0%</span><br />
01474       <span class="code" id="box2"></span>
01475   ';
01476   if ($this->progressBar==2) { echo '   
01477       </td><td style="width: 50%;">
01478       <span style="color:#006600;font-weight:bold;">Memory usage</span> <br/>
01479       <span class="progressBar" id="element5">0%</span> '.ini_get("memory_limit").'<br />
01480       <span class="code" id="box5"></span>
01481       <br/><br/>
01482       <span style="color:#006600;font-weight:bold;">Memory usage (peak)</span> <br/>
01483       <span class="progressBar" id="element6">0%</span> '.ini_get("memory_limit").'<br />
01484       <span class="code" id="box6"></span>
01485       </td></tr>
01486       </table>
01487   '; }
01488   // mPDF 4.2.007
01489   echo '      <br/><br/>
01490     <span style="font-weight: bold; " id="box3"></span>
01491 
01492     </div>
01493   <script type="text/javascript" src="'._MPDF_URI.'progress/prototype.js.php"></script>
01494   <script type="text/javascript">';
01495   include(_MPDF_PATH.'progress/jsProgressBarHandler.js.php');
01496   echo '</script>';
01497   ob_flush();
01498       flush();
01499 }
01500 
01501 function UpdateProgressBar($el,$val,$txt='') {
01502   // $val should be a string - 5 = actual value, +15 = increment
01503 
01504   if ($this->progressBar<2) {
01505     if ($el>3) { return; }
01506     else if ($el ==1) { $el = 2; }
01507   }
01508   echo '<script type="text/javascript">';
01509   if ($val) { echo ' myJsProgressBarHandler.setPercentage(\'element'.$el.'\',\''.$val.'\'); '; }
01510   if ($txt) { echo ' document.getElementById(\'box'.$el.'\').innerHTML=\''.$txt.'\'; '; }
01511   if ($this->progressBar==2) { 
01512     $m = round(memory_get_usage()/1048576);
01513     $mem = $m * 100 / (ini_get("memory_limit")+0);
01514     $m2 = round(memory_get_peak_usage()/1048576);
01515     $mem2 = $m2 * 100 / (ini_get("memory_limit")+0);
01516     echo ' myJsProgressBarHandler.setPercentage(\'element5\',\''.$mem.'\'); '; 
01517     echo ' document.getElementById(\'box5\').innerHTML=\''.$m.' MB\'; '; 
01518     echo ' myJsProgressBarHandler.setPercentage(\'element6\',\''.$mem2.'\'); '; 
01519     echo ' document.getElementById(\'box6\').innerHTML=\''.$m2.' MB\'; '; 
01520   }
01521   echo '</script>'."\n";
01522   ob_flush();
01523   flush();
01524 }
01525 /*-- END PROGRESS-BAR --*/
01526 
01527 
01528 function RestrictUnicodeFonts($res) {
01529   // $res = array of (Unicode) fonts to restrict to: e.g. norasi|norasiB - language specific
01530   if (count($res)) {  // Leave full list of available fonts if passed blank array
01531     $this->available_unifonts = $res;
01532   }
01533   else { $this->available_unifonts = $this->default_available_fonts; }
01534   if (count($this->available_unifonts) == 0) { $this->available_unifonts[] = $this->default_available_fonts[0]; }
01535   $this->available_unifonts = array_values($this->available_unifonts);
01536 }
01537 
01538 
01539 function setMBencoding($enc) {
01540   // only call mb_internal_encoding if need to change
01541   $curr = $this->mb_enc;
01542   // Sets encoding string for use in mb_string functions
01543   if ($enc == 'win-1252') { $this->mb_enc = 'windows-1252'; }
01544   else if ($enc == 'win-1251') { $this->mb_enc = 'windows-1251'; }
01545   else if ($enc == 'UTF-8') { $this->mb_enc = 'UTF-8'; }
01546   else if ($enc == 'BIG5') { $this->mb_enc = 'UTF-8'; }
01547   else if ($enc == 'GBK') { $this->mb_enc = 'UTF-8'; }  // cp936
01548   else if ($enc == 'SHIFT_JIS') { $this->mb_enc = 'UTF-8'; }
01549   else if ($enc == 'UHC') { $this->mb_enc = 'UTF-8'; }  // cp949
01550   else { $this->mb_enc = $enc; }  // works for iso-8859-n
01551   if ($this->mb_enc && $curr != $this->mb_enc) { 
01552     mb_internal_encoding($this->mb_enc); 
01553   }
01554 }
01555 
01556 function getMBencoding() {
01557   return $this->mb_enc;
01558 }
01559 
01560 
01561 
01562 function SetMargins($left,$right,$top) {
01563   //Set left, top and right margins
01564   $this->lMargin=$left;
01565   $this->rMargin=$right;
01566   $this->tMargin=$top;
01567 }
01568 
01569 function ResetMargins() {
01570   //ReSet left, top margins
01571   if (($this->forcePortraitHeaders || $this->forcePortraitMargins) && $this->DefOrientation=='P' && $this->CurOrientation=='L') {
01572       if (($this->mirrorMargins) && (($this->page)%2==0)) { // EVEN
01573     $this->tMargin=$this->orig_rMargin;
01574     $this->bMargin=$this->orig_lMargin;
01575       }
01576       else {  // ODD  // OR NOT MIRRORING MARGINS/FOOTERS
01577     $this->tMargin=$this->orig_lMargin;
01578     $this->bMargin=$this->orig_rMargin;
01579       }
01580      $this->lMargin=$this->DeflMargin;
01581      $this->rMargin=$this->DefrMargin;
01582      $this->MarginCorrection = 0;
01583      $this->PageBreakTrigger=$this->h-$this->bMargin;
01584   }
01585   else  if (($this->mirrorMargins) && (($this->page)%2==0)) { // EVEN
01586     $this->lMargin=$this->DefrMargin;
01587     $this->rMargin=$this->DeflMargin;
01588     $this->MarginCorrection = $this->DefrMargin-$this->DeflMargin;
01589 
01590   }
01591   else {  // ODD  // OR NOT MIRRORING MARGINS/FOOTERS
01592     $this->lMargin=$this->DeflMargin;
01593     $this->rMargin=$this->DefrMargin;
01594     if ($this->mirrorMargins) { $this->MarginCorrection = $this->DeflMargin-$this->DefrMargin; }
01595   }
01596   $this->x=$this->lMargin;
01597 
01598 }
01599 
01600 function SetLeftMargin($margin) {
01601   //Set left margin
01602   $this->lMargin=$margin;
01603   if($this->page>0 and $this->x<$margin) $this->x=$margin;
01604 }
01605 
01606 function SetTopMargin($margin) {
01607   //Set top margin
01608   $this->tMargin=$margin;
01609 }
01610 
01611 function SetRightMargin($margin) {
01612   //Set right margin
01613   $this->rMargin=$margin;
01614 }
01615 
01616 function SetAutoPageBreak($auto,$margin=0) {
01617   //Set auto page break mode and triggering margin
01618   $this->autoPageBreak=$auto;
01619   $this->bMargin=$margin;
01620   $this->PageBreakTrigger=$this->h-$margin;
01621 }
01622 
01623 function SetDisplayMode($zoom,$layout='continuous') {
01624   //Set display mode in viewer
01625   if($zoom=='fullpage' or $zoom=='fullwidth' or $zoom=='real' or $zoom=='default' or !is_string($zoom))
01626     $this->ZoomMode=$zoom;
01627   else
01628     $this->Error('Incorrect zoom display mode: '.$zoom);
01629   if($layout=='single' or $layout=='continuous' or $layout=='two' or $layout=='default')
01630     $this->LayoutMode=$layout;
01631   else
01632     $this->Error('Incorrect layout display mode: '.$layout);
01633 }
01634 
01635 function SetCompression($compress) {
01636   //Set page compression
01637   if(function_exists('gzcompress')) $this->compress=$compress;
01638   else $this->compress=false;
01639 }
01640 
01641 function SetTitle($title) {
01642   //Title of document // Arrives as UTF-8
01643   $this->title = $title;
01644 }
01645 
01646 function SetSubject($subject) {
01647   //Subject of document
01648   $this->subject= $subject;
01649 }
01650 
01651 function SetAuthor($author) {
01652   //Author of document
01653   $this->author= $author;
01654 }
01655 
01656 function SetKeywords($keywords) {
01657   //Keywords of document
01658   $this->keywords= $keywords;
01659 }
01660 
01661 function SetCreator($creator) {
01662   //Creator of document
01663   $this->creator= $creator;
01664 }
01665 
01666 
01667 function SetAnchor2Bookmark($x) {
01668   $this->anchor2Bookmark = $x;
01669 }
01670 
01671 function AliasNbPages($alias='{nb}') {
01672   //Define an alias for total number of pages
01673   $this->aliasNbPg=$alias;
01674 }
01675 
01676 function AliasNbPageGroups($alias='{nbpg}') {
01677   //Define an alias for total number of pages in a group
01678   $this->aliasNbPgGp=$alias;
01679 }
01680 
01681 function SetAlpha($alpha, $bm='Normal', $return=false) {  // mPDF 4.3.017
01682 // alpha: real value from 0 (transparent) to 1 (opaque)
01683 // bm:    blend mode, one of the following:
01684 //          Normal, Multiply, Screen, Overlay, Darken, Lighten, ColorDodge, ColorBurn,
01685 //          HardLight, SoftLight, Difference, Exclusion, Hue, Saturation, Color, Luminosity
01686 // set alpha for stroking (CA) and non-stroking (ca) operations
01687   // mPDF 4.2.018
01688   if ($this->PDFA && $alpha!=1) { 
01689     if (!$this->PDFAauto) { $this->PDFAwarnings[] = "Image opacity must be 100% (Opacity changed to 100%)"; }
01690     $alpha = 1; 
01691   }
01692   $gs = $this->AddExtGState(array('ca'=>$alpha, 'CA'=>$alpha, 'BM'=>'/'.$bm));
01693   if ($return) { return sprintf('/GS%d gs', $gs); } // mPDF 4.3.017
01694   else { $this->_out(sprintf('/GS%d gs', $gs)); }
01695 }
01696 
01697 function AddExtGState($parms) {
01698   $n = count($this->extgstates);
01699   // check if graphics state already exists
01700   for ($i=1; $i<=$n; $i++) {
01701     if ($this->extgstates[$i]['parms']['ca']==$parms['ca'] && $this->extgstates[$i]['parms']['CA']==$parms['CA'] && $this->extgstates[$i]['parms']['BM']==$parms['BM']) {
01702       return $i;
01703     }
01704   }
01705   $n++;
01706   $this->extgstates[$n]['parms'] = $parms;
01707   return $n;
01708 }
01709 
01710 
01711 
01712 function Error($msg) {
01713   //Fatal error
01714   header('Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8');
01715   die('<B>mPDF error: </B>'.$msg);
01716 }
01717 
01718 function Open() {
01719   //Begin document
01720   if($this->state==0) $this->_begindoc();
01721 }
01722 
01723 function Close() {
01724   if ($this->progressBar) { $this->UpdateProgressBar(2,'2','Closing last page'); }  // *PROGRESS-BAR*
01725   //Terminate document
01726   if($this->state==3) return;
01727   if($this->page==0) $this->AddPage($this->CurOrientation);
01728   if (count($this->cellBorderBuffer)) { $this->printcellbuffer(); } // *TABLES*
01729   if (count($this->tablebuffer)) { $this->printtablebuffer(); } // *TABLES*
01730 /*-- COLUMNS --*/
01731   // mPDF 4.0
01732   if ($this->ColActive) {
01733     $this->SetColumns(0);
01734     $this->ColActive = 0; 
01735     if (count($this->columnbuffer)) { $this->printcolumnbuffer(); }
01736   }
01737 /*-- END COLUMNS --*/
01738   if (count($this->divbuffer)) { $this->printdivbuffer(); }
01739 
01740   // BODY Backgrounds
01741   $s = '';
01742   $bby = $this->h;
01743   $bbw = $this->w;
01744   $bbh = $this->h;
01745   if ($this->bodyBackgroundColor) {
01746     $s .= sprintf('%.3f %.3f %.3f rg',$this->bodyBackgroundColor['R']/255,$this->bodyBackgroundColor['G']/255,$this->bodyBackgroundColor['B']/255)."\n";
01747     $s .= sprintf('%.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f re f',0,$bby*$this->k,$bbw*$this->k,-$bbh*$this->k)."\n";
01748   }
01749 /*-- GRADIENTS --*/
01750   if ($this->bodyBackgroundGradient) { 
01751     $g = $this->parseBackgroundGradient($this->bodyBackgroundGradient);
01752     if ($g) {
01753       // mPDF 4.2 direct output, else overwrites background-image
01754       //$this->pageBackgrounds[0][] = array('gradient'=>true, 'x'=>0, 'y'=>0, 'w'=>$this->w, 'h'=>$this->h, 'gradtype'=>$g['type'], 'col'=>$g['col'], 'col2'=>$g['col2'], 'coords'=>$g['coords'], 'extend'=>$g['extend']);
01755       $s .= $this->Gradient(0, 0, $this->w, $this->h, $g['gradtype'], $g['col'], $g['col2'], $g['coords'], $g['extend'], true);
01756     }
01757   }
01758 /*-- END GRADIENTS --*/
01759 /*-- BACKGROUND-IMAGES --*/
01760   if ($this->bodyBackgroundImage) {
01761       if ($this->bodyBackgroundImage['image_id']) { // Background pattern
01762       $n = count($this->patterns)+1;
01763       // mPDF 4.3.015
01764       list($orig_w, $orig_h, $x_repeat, $y_repeat) = $this->_resizeBackgroundImage($this->bodyBackgroundImage['orig_w'], $this->bodyBackgroundImage['orig_h'], $bbw, $bbh, $this->bodyBackgroundImage['resize'], $this->bodyBackgroundImage['x_repeat'], $this->bodyBackgroundImage['y_repeat']);
01765       // mPDF 3.1 $bbx = 0, 'y'=>0
01766       $this->patterns[$n] = array('x'=>0, 'y'=>0, 'w'=>$bbw, 'h'=>$bbh, 'pgh'=>$this->h, 'image_id'=>$this->bodyBackgroundImage['image_id'], 'orig_w'=>$orig_w, 'orig_h'=>$orig_h, 'x_pos'=>$this->bodyBackgroundImage['x_pos'], 'y_pos'=>$this->bodyBackgroundImage['y_pos'], 'x_repeat'=>$x_repeat, 'y_repeat'=>$y_repeat); // mPDF 4.3.015
01767       // mPDF 4.3.017
01768       if ($this->bodyBackgroundImage['opacity']>0 && $this->bodyBackgroundImage['opacity']<1) { $opac = $this->SetAlpha($this->bodyBackgroundImage['opacity'],'Normal',true); }
01769       else { $opac = ''; }
01770       $s .= sprintf('q /Pattern cs /P%d scn %s %.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f re f Q', $n, $opac, 0,$bby*$this->k,$bbw*$this->k,-$bbh*$this->k) ."\n";
01771       }
01772   }
01773 /*-- END BACKGROUND-IMAGES --*/
01774 
01775 
01776 
01777   $s .= $this->PrintPageBackgrounds();
01778   $this->pages[$this->page] = preg_replace('/(___BACKGROUND___PATTERNS'.date('jY').')/', "\n".$s."\n".'\\1', $this->pages[$this->page]);
01779   $this->pageBackgrounds = array();
01780 
01781   if (!$this->TOCmark) { //Page footer
01782     $this->InFooter=true;
01783     $this->Footer();
01784     $this->InFooter=false;
01785   }
01786   if ($this->TOCmark || count($this->m_TOC)) { $this->insertTOC(); }  // *TOC*
01787 
01788   //Close page
01789   $this->_endpage();
01790 
01791   //Close document
01792   $this->_enddoc();
01793 }
01794 
01795 // mPDF 4.3.015
01796 function _resizeBackgroundImage($imw, $imh, $cw, $ch, $resize=0, $repx, $repy) {
01797   $cw = $cw*$this->k;
01798   $ch = $ch*$this->k;
01799   if (!$resize) { return array($imw, $imh, $repx, $repy); }
01800   if ($resize==1 && $imw > $cw) {
01801     $h = $imh * $cw/$imw;
01802     $repx = false;
01803     return array($cw, $h, $repx, $repy); 
01804   }
01805   else if ($resize==2 && $imh > $ch) {
01806     $w = $imw * $ch/$imh;
01807     $repy = false;
01808     return array($w, $ch, $repx, $repy); 
01809   }
01810   else if ($resize==3) {
01811     $w = $imw;
01812     $h = $imh;
01813     $saverepx = $repx;
01814     if ($w > $cw) {
01815       $h = $h * $cw/$w;
01816       $w = $cw;
01817       $repx = false;
01818     }
01819     if ($h > $ch) {
01820       $w = $w * $ch/$h;
01821       $h = $ch;
01822       $repy = false;
01823       $repx = $saverepx;
01824     }
01825     return array($w, $h, $repx, $repy); 
01826   }
01827   else if ($resize==4) {
01828     $h = $imh * $cw/$imw;
01829     $repx = false;
01830     return array($cw, $h, $repx, $repy); 
01831   }
01832   else if ($resize==5) {
01833     $w = $imw * $ch/$imh;
01834     $repy = false;
01835     return array($w, $ch, $repx, $repy); 
01836   }
01837   else if ($resize==6) {
01838     $repx = false;
01839     $repy = false;
01840     return array($cw, $ch, $repx, $repy); 
01841   }
01842   return array($imw, $imh, $repx, $repy);
01843 }
01844 
01845 
01846 function PrintPageBackgrounds($adjustmenty=0) { // mPDF 4.2.014 Adjustment added for HTMLFooters
01847   $s = '';
01848   ksort($this->pageBackgrounds);
01849   foreach($this->pageBackgrounds AS $bl=>$pbs) {
01850     foreach ($pbs AS $pb) {
01851       if (!isset($pb['image_id']) && !isset($pb['gradient'])) { // Background colour
01852       if (isset($pb['clippath']) && $pb['clippath']) { $s .= $pb['clippath']."\n"; }
01853       $s .= sprintf('%.3f %.3f %.3f rg',$pb['col']['R']/255,$pb['col']['G']/255,$pb['col']['B']/255)."\n";
01854       $s .= sprintf('%.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f re f',$pb['x']*$this->k,($this->h-$pb['y'])*$this->k,$pb['w']*$this->k,-$pb['h']*$this->k)."\n";
01855       if (isset($pb['clippath']) && $pb['clippath']) { $s .= 'Q'."\n"; }
01856       }
01857     }
01858 /*-- GRADIENTS --*/
01859     foreach ($pbs AS $pb) {
01860      if (isset($pb['gradient']) && $pb['gradient']) {
01861       if (isset($pb['clippath']) && $pb['clippath']) { $s .= $pb['clippath']."\n"; }
01862       $s .= $this->Gradient($pb['x'], $pb['y'], $pb['w'], $pb['h'], $pb['gradtype'], $pb['col'], $pb['col2'], $pb['coords'], $pb['extend'], true);
01863       if (isset($pb['clippath']) && $pb['clippath']) { $s .= 'Q'."\n"; }
01864       }
01865     }
01866 /*-- END GRADIENTS --*/
01867 /*-- BACKGROUND-IMAGES --*/
01868     foreach ($pbs AS $pb) {
01869       if (isset($pb['image_id']) && $pb['image_id']) {  // Background pattern
01870       $pb['y'] -= $adjustmenty; // mPDF 4.2.014 
01871       $pb['h'] += $adjustmenty; // mPDF 4.2.014 
01872       $n = count($this->patterns)+1;
01873       // mPDF 4.3.015
01874       list($orig_w, $orig_h, $x_repeat, $y_repeat) = $this->_resizeBackgroundImage($pb['orig_w'], $pb['orig_h'], $pb['w'], $pb['h'], $pb['resize'], $pb['x_repeat'], $pb['y_repeat']);
01875       $this->patterns[$n] = array('x'=>$pb['x'], 'y'=>$pb['y'], 'w'=>$pb['w'], 'h'=>$pb['h'], 'pgh'=>$this->h, 'image_id'=>$pb['image_id'], 'orig_w'=>$orig_w, 'orig_h'=>$orig_h, 'x_pos'=>$pb['x_pos'], 'y_pos'=>$pb['y_pos'], 'x_repeat'=>$x_repeat, 'y_repeat'=>$y_repeat);  // mPDF 4.3.015
01876       $x = $pb['x']*$this->k;
01877       $y = ($this->h - $pb['y'])*$this->k;
01878       $w = $pb['w']*$this->k;
01879       $h = -$pb['h']*$this->k;
01880       if (isset($pb['clippath']) && $pb['clippath']) { $s .= $pb['clippath']."\n"; }
01881       // mPDF 4.0
01882       if ($this->writingHTMLfooter || $this->writingHTMLheader) {
01883         $iw = $pb['orig_w']/$this->k;
01884         $ih = $pb['orig_h']/$this->k;
01885         $w = $pb['w'];
01886         $h = $pb['h'];
01887         $x0 = $pb['x'];
01888         $y0 = $pb['y'];
01889 
01890         // Number to repeat
01891         if ($pb['x_repeat']) { $nx = ceil($w/$iw); } 
01892         else { $nx = 1; }
01893         if ($pb['y_repeat']) { $ny = ceil($h/$ih); }
01894         else { $ny = 1; }
01895 
01896         $x_pos = $pb['x_pos'];
01897         if (stristr($x_pos ,'%') ) { 
01898           $x_pos += 0; 
01899           $x_pos /= 100; 
01900           $x_pos = ($w * $x_pos) - ($iw * $x_pos);
01901         }
01902         $y_pos = $pb['y_pos'];
01903         if (stristr($y_pos ,'%') ) { 
01904           $y_pos += 0; 
01905           $y_pos /= 100; 
01906           $y_pos = ($h * $y_pos) - ($ih * $y_pos);
01907         }
01908         if ($nx>1) {
01909           while($x_pos>0) { $x_pos -= $iw; }
01910         }
01911         if ($ny>1) {
01912           while($y_pos>0) { $y_pos -= $ih; }
01913         }
01914         for($xi=0;$xi<$nx;$xi++) {
01915           for($yi=0;$yi<$ny;$yi++) {
01916           $x = $x0 + $x_pos + ($iw*$xi);
01917           $y = $y0 + $y_pos + ($ih*$yi);
01918           // mPDF 4.3.017
01919           if ($pb['opacity']>0 && $pb['opacity']<1) { $opac = $this->SetAlpha($pb['opacity'],'Normal',true); }
01920           else { $opac = ''; }
01921           $s .= sprintf("q %s %.3f 0 0 %.3f %.3f %.3f cm /I%d Do Q", $opac,$iw*$this->k,$ih*$this->k,$x*$this->k,($this->h-($y+$ih))*$this->k,$pb['image_id']) ."\n";
01922           }
01923         }
01924       }
01925       else {
01926         // mPDF 4.3.017
01927         if ($pb['opacity']>0 && $pb['opacity']<1) { $opac = $this->SetAlpha($pb['opacity'],'Normal',true); }
01928         else { $opac = ''; }
01929         $s .= sprintf('q /Pattern cs /P%d scn %s %.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f re f Q', $n, $opac, $x, $y, $w, $h) ."\n";
01930       }
01931       if (isset($pb['clippath']) && $pb['clippath']) { $s .= 'Q'."\n"; }
01932       }
01933     }
01934 /*-- END BACKGROUND-IMAGES --*/
01935   }
01936   return $s;
01937 }
01938 
01939 // Depracated - can use AddPage for all
01940 function AddPages($orientation='',$condition='', $resetpagenum='', $pagenumstyle='', $suppress='',$mgl='',$mgr='',$mgt='',$mgb='',$mgh='',$mgf='',$ohname='',$ehname='',$ofname='',$efname='',$ohvalue=0,$ehvalue=0,$ofvalue=0,$efvalue=0,$pagesel='',$newformat='')
01941 {
01942   $this->AddPage($orientation,$condition,$resetpagenum, $pagenumstyle, $suppress,$mgl,$mgr,$mgt,$mgb,$mgh,$mgf, $ohname, $ehname, $ofname, $efname, $ohvalue, $ehvalue, $ofvalue, $efvalue,$pagesel,$newformat='');
01943 }
01944 
01945 // mPDF 4.2 Added $pagesel, $newformat [4.2.024]
01946 function AddPage($orientation='',$condition='', $resetpagenum='', $pagenumstyle='', $suppress='',$mgl='',$mgr='',$mgt='',$mgb='',$mgh='',$mgf='',$ohname='',$ehname='',$ofname='',$efname='',$ohvalue=0,$ehvalue=0,$ofvalue=0,$efvalue=0,$pagesel='',$newformat='')
01947 {
01948 
01949 /*-- CSS-FLOAT --*/
01950   // Float DIV
01951   // Cannot do with columns on, or if any change in page orientation/margins etc.
01952   // If next page already exists - i.e background /headers and footers already written
01953   if ($this->state > 0 && $this->page < count($this->pages)) {
01954     $bak_cml = $this->cMarginL;
01955     $bak_cmr = $this->cMarginR; 
01956     $bak_dw = $this->divwidth;
01957     // Paint Div Border if necessary
01958       if ($this->blklvl > 0) {
01959       $save_tr = $this->table_rotate; // *TABLES*
01960       $this->table_rotate = 0;  // *TABLES*
01961       if ($this->y == $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['y0']) {  $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['startpage']++; }
01962       if (($this->y > $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['y0']) || $this->flowingBlockAttr['is_table'] ) { $toplvl = $this->blklvl; }
01963       else { $toplvl = $this->blklvl-1; }
01964       $sy = $this->y;
01965       for ($bl=1;$bl<=$toplvl;$bl++) {
01966         $this->PaintDivBB('pagebottom',0,$bl);
01967       }
01968       $this->y = $sy;
01969       $this->table_rotate = $save_tr; // *TABLES*
01970     }
01971     $s = $this->PrintPageBackgrounds();
01972 
01973     // Writes after the marker so not overwritten later by page background etc.
01974     $this->pages[$this->page] = preg_replace('/(___BACKGROUND___PATTERNS'.date('jY').')/', '\\1'."\n".$s."\n", $this->pages[$this->page]);
01975     $this->pageBackgrounds = array();
01976   
01977     $family=$this->FontFamily;
01978     $style=$this->FontStyle.($this->underline ? 'U' : '');
01979     $size=$this->FontSizePt;
01980     $lw=$this->LineWidth;
01981     $dc=$this->DrawColor;
01982     $fc=$this->FillColor;
01983     $tc=$this->TextColor;
01984     $cf=$this->ColorFlag;
01985 
01986     $this->printfloatbuffer();
01987 
01988     //Move to next page
01989     $this->page++;
01990   
01991     $this->ResetMargins();
01992     $this->SetAutoPageBreak($this->autoPageBreak,$this->bMargin);
01993     $this->x=$this->lMargin;
01994     $this->y=$this->tMargin;
01995     $this->FontFamily='';
01996     $this->_out('2 J');
01997     $this->LineWidth=$lw;
01998     $this->_out(sprintf('%.3f w',$lw*$this->k));
01999     if($family) $this->SetFont($family,$style,$size,true,true);
02000     $this->DrawColor=$dc;
02001     if($dc!='0 G') $this->_out($dc);
02002     $this->FillColor=$fc;
02003     if($fc!='0 g') $this->_out($fc);
02004     $this->TextColor=$tc;
02005     $this->ColorFlag=$cf;
02006     for($bl=1;$bl<=$this->blklvl;$bl++) {
02007       $this->blk[$bl]['y0'] = $this->y;
02008       // Don't correct more than once for background DIV containing a Float
02009       if (!isset($this->blk[$bl]['marginCorrected'][$this->page])) { $this->blk[$bl]['x0'] += $this->MarginCorrection; }
02010       $this->blk[$bl]['marginCorrected'][$this->page] = true; 
02011     }
02012     $this->cMarginL = $bak_cml;
02013     $this->cMarginR = $bak_cmr;
02014     $this->divwidth = $bak_dw;
02015     return '';
02016   }
02017 /*-- END CSS-FLOAT --*/
02018 
02019   //Start a new page
02020   if($this->state==0) $this->Open();
02021 
02022   // mPDF 3.0 - Moved here from WriteFlowingBlock, FinishFlowingBlock and printbuffer
02023   $bak_cml = $this->cMarginL;
02024   $bak_cmr = $this->cMarginR; 
02025   $bak_dw = $this->divwidth;
02026 
02027   // mPDF 4.2
02028   $bak_lh = $this->lineheight;
02029 
02030   $orientation = substr(strtoupper($orientation),0,1);
02031   $condition = strtoupper($condition);
02032 
02033   // mPDF 4.2
02034   if ($condition == 'NEXT-EVEN') {  // always adds at least one new page to create an Even page
02035      if (!$this->mirrorMargins) { $condition = ''; }
02036      else { 
02037     if ($pagesel) { $pbch = $pagesel; $pagesel = ''; }  // *CSS-PAGE*
02038     else { $pbch = false; } // *CSS-PAGE*
02039     $this->AddPage($this->CurOrientation,'O'); 
02040     if ($pbch ) { $pagesel = $pbch; } // *CSS-PAGE*
02041     $condition = ''; 
02042      }
02043   }
02044   if ($condition == 'NEXT-ODD') { // always adds at least one new page to create an Odd page
02045      if (!$this->mirrorMargins) { $condition = ''; }
02046      else { 
02047     if ($pagesel) { $pbch = $pagesel; $pagesel = ''; }  // *CSS-PAGE*
02048     else { $pbch = false; } // *CSS-PAGE*
02049     $this->AddPage($this->CurOrientation,'E'); 
02050     if ($pbch ) { $pagesel = $pbch; } // *CSS-PAGE*
02051     $condition = ''; 
02052      }
02053   }
02054 
02055 
02056   if ($condition == 'E') {  // only adds new page if needed to create an Even page
02057      if (!$this->mirrorMargins || ($this->page)%2==0) { return false; }
02058   }
02059   if ($condition == 'O') {  // only adds new page if needed to create an Odd page
02060      if (!$this->mirrorMargins || ($this->page)%2==1) { return false; }
02061   }
02062 
02063   if ($resetpagenum || $pagenumstyle || $suppress) {
02064     $this->PageNumSubstitutions[] = array('from'=>($this->page+1), 'reset'=> $resetpagenum, 'type'=>$pagenumstyle, 'suppress'=>$suppress);
02065   }
02066 
02067   // mPDF 4.0
02068   $save_tr = $this->table_rotate; // *TABLES*
02069   $this->table_rotate = 0;  // *TABLES*
02070   $save_kwt = $this->kwt;
02071   $this->kwt = 0;
02072 
02073 
02074   // Paint Div Border if necessary
02075     //PAINTS BACKGROUND COLOUR OR BORDERS for DIV - DISABLED FOR COLUMNS (cf. AcceptPageBreak) AT PRESENT in ->PaintDivBB
02076     if (!$this->ColActive && $this->blklvl > 0) {
02077     if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['y0']) && $this->y == $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['y0']) {  
02078       if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['startpage'])) { $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['startpage']++; }
02079       else { $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['startpage'] = 1; }
02080     }
02081     if ((isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['y0']) && $this->y > $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['y0']) || $this->flowingBlockAttr['is_table'] ) { $toplvl = $this->blklvl; }
02082     else { $toplvl = $this->blklvl-1; }
02083     $sy = $this->y;
02084     for ($bl=1;$bl<=$toplvl;$bl++) {
02085       $this->PaintDivBB('pagebottom',0,$bl);
02086     }
02087     $this->y = $sy;
02088     // RESET block y0 and x0 - see below
02089   }
02090 
02091   // BODY Backgrounds
02092   if ($this->page > 0) {
02093     $s = '';
02094     $bby = $this->h;
02095     $bbw = $this->w;
02096     $bbh = $this->h;
02097     if ($this->bodyBackgroundColor) {
02098       $s .= sprintf('%.3f %.3f %.3f rg',$this->bodyBackgroundColor['R']/255,$this->bodyBackgroundColor['G']/255,$this->bodyBackgroundColor['B']/255)."\n";
02099       $s .= sprintf('%.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f re f',0,$bby*$this->k,$bbw*$this->k,-$bbh*$this->k)."\n";
02100     }
02101 /*-- GRADIENTS --*/
02102     if ($this->bodyBackgroundGradient) { 
02103       $g = $this->parseBackgroundGradient($this->bodyBackgroundGradient);
02104       if ($g) {
02105         // mPDF 4.2 direct output, else overwrites background-image
02106         // $this->pageBackgrounds[0][] = array('gradient'=>true, 'x'=>0, 'y'=>0, 'w'=>$this->w, 'h'=>$this->h, 'gradtype'=>$g['type'], 'col'=>$g['col'], 'col2'=>$g['col2'], 'coords'=>$g['coords'], 'extend'=>$g['extend']);
02107         $s .= $this->Gradient(0, 0, $this->w, $this->h, $g['gradtype'], $g['col'], $g['col2'], $g['coords'], $g['extend'], true);
02108       }
02109     }
02110 /*-- END GRADIENTS --*/
02111 /*-- BACKGROUND-IMAGES --*/
02112     if ($this->bodyBackgroundImage) {
02113         if ($this->bodyBackgroundImage['image_id']) { // Background pattern
02114         $n = count($this->patterns)+1;
02115 
02116 
02117         // mPDF 4.3.015
02118         list($orig_w, $orig_h, $x_repeat, $y_repeat) = $this->_resizeBackgroundImage($this->bodyBackgroundImage['orig_w'], $this->bodyBackgroundImage['orig_h'], $bbw, $bbh, $this->bodyBackgroundImage['resize'],$this->bodyBackgroundImage['x_repeat'],$this->bodyBackgroundImage['y_repeat']);
02119         // mPDF 3.1 'y'=>0
02120         $this->patterns[$n] = array('x'=>0, 'y'=>0, 'w'=>$bbw, 'h'=>$bbh, 'pgh'=>$this->h, 'image_id'=>$this->bodyBackgroundImage['image_id'], 'orig_w'=>$orig_w, 'orig_h'=>$orig_h, 'x_pos'=>$this->bodyBackgroundImage['x_pos'], 'y_pos'=>$this->bodyBackgroundImage['y_pos'], 'x_repeat'=>$x_repeat, 'y_repeat'=>$y_repeat); // mPDF 4.3.015
02121         // mPDF 4.3.017
02122         if ($this->bodyBackgroundImage['opacity']>0 && $this->bodyBackgroundImage['opacity']<1) { $opac = $this->SetAlpha($this->bodyBackgroundImage['opacity'],'Normal',true); }
02123         else { $opac = ''; }
02124         $s .= sprintf('q /Pattern cs /P%d scn %s %.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f re f Q', $n, $opac, 0,$bby*$this->k,$bbw*$this->k,-$bbh*$this->k) ."\n";
02125         }
02126     }
02127 /*-- END BACKGROUND-IMAGES --*/
02128 
02129     $s .= $this->PrintPageBackgrounds();
02130     $this->pages[$this->page] = preg_replace('/(___BACKGROUND___PATTERNS'.date('jY').')/', "\n".$s."\n".'\\1', $this->pages[$this->page]);
02131     $this->pageBackgrounds = array();
02132   }
02133 
02134   $save_cols = false;
02135 /*-- COLUMNS --*/
02136   if ($this->ColActive) {
02137     $save_cols = true;
02138     $save_nbcol = $this->NbCol; // other values of gap and vAlign will not change by setting Columns off
02139     $this->SetColumns(0);
02140   }
02141 /*-- END COLUMNS --*/
02142 
02143   $family=$this->FontFamily;
02144   $style=$this->FontStyle.($this->underline ? 'U' : '');
02145   $size=$this->FontSizePt;
02146   $this->ColumnAdjust = true; // enables column height adjustment for the page
02147   $lw=$this->LineWidth;
02148   $dc=$this->DrawColor;
02149   $fc=$this->FillColor;
02150   $tc=$this->TextColor;
02151   $cf=$this->ColorFlag;
02152   if($this->page>0)
02153   {
02154     //Page footer
02155     $this->InFooter=true;
02156 
02157     // mPDF 3.0
02158     $this->Reset();
02159     $this->pageoutput[$this->page] = array();
02160 
02161     $this->Footer();
02162     //Close page
02163     $this->_endpage();
02164   }
02165 
02166 
02167 
02168 
02169 
02170   //Start new page
02171   // mPDF 4.2 pagesel,$newformat 4.2.024
02172   $this->_beginpage($orientation,$mgl,$mgr,$mgt,$mgb,$mgh,$mgf,$ohname,$ehname,$ofname,$efname,$ohvalue,$ehvalue,$ofvalue,$efvalue,$pagesel,$newformat);
02173   // mPDF 4.2 Moved here from Header() - so it goes before ___BACKGROUND___PATTERNS marker
02174   if ($this->docTemplate) {
02175     $pagecount = $this->SetSourceFile($this->docTemplate);
02176     if (($this->page - $this->docTemplateStart) > $pagecount) {
02177       if ($this->docTemplateContinue) { 
02178         $tplIdx = $this->ImportPage($pagecount);
02179         $this->UseTemplate($tplIdx);
02180       }
02181     }
02182     else {
02183       $tplIdx = $this->ImportPage(($this->page - $this->docTemplateStart));
02184       $this->UseTemplate($tplIdx);
02185     }
02186   }
02187   if ($this->pageTemplate) {
02188     $this->UseTemplate($this->pageTemplate);
02189   }
02190 
02191   // Tiling Patterns  // Moved here mPDF 4.0
02192   $this->_out('___BACKGROUND___PATTERNS'.date('jY'));
02193   $this->pageBackgrounds = array();
02194 
02195   //Set line cap style to square
02196   $this->_out('2 J');
02197   //Set line width
02198   $this->LineWidth=$lw;
02199   $this->_out(sprintf('%.3f w',$lw*$this->k));
02200   //Set font
02201   if($family) $this->SetFont($family,$style,$size,true,true); // forces write
02202   //Set colors
02203   $this->DrawColor=$dc;
02204   if($dc!='0 G') $this->_out($dc);
02205   $this->FillColor=$fc;
02206   if($fc!='0 g') $this->_out($fc);
02207   $this->TextColor=$tc;
02208   $this->ColorFlag=$cf;
02209 
02210   //Page header
02211   $this->Header();
02212 
02213   //Restore line width
02214   if($this->LineWidth!=$lw)
02215   {
02216     $this->LineWidth=$lw;
02217     $this->_out(sprintf('%.3f w',$lw*$this->k));
02218   }
02219   //Restore font
02220   if($family) $this->SetFont($family,$style,$size,true,true); // forces write
02221   //Restore colors
02222   if($this->DrawColor!=$dc)
02223   {
02224     $this->DrawColor=$dc;
02225     $this->_out($dc);
02226   }
02227   if($this->FillColor!=$fc)
02228   {
02229     $this->FillColor=$fc;
02230     $this->_out($fc);
02231   }
02232   $this->TextColor=$tc;
02233   $this->ColorFlag=$cf;
02234   $this->InFooter=false;
02235 
02236 /*-- COLUMNS --*/
02237   if ($save_cols) {
02238     // Restore columns
02239     $this->SetColumns($save_nbcol,$this->colvAlign,$this->ColGap);
02240   }
02241   if ($this->ColActive) { $this->SetCol(0); }
02242 /*-- END COLUMNS --*/
02243 
02244 
02245     //RESET BLOCK BORDER TOP
02246     if (!$this->ColActive) {
02247     for($bl=1;$bl<=$this->blklvl;$bl++) {
02248       $this->blk[$bl]['y0'] = $this->y;
02249       if (isset($this->blk[$bl]['x0'])) { $this->blk[$bl]['x0'] += $this->MarginCorrection; }
02250       else { $this->blk[$bl]['x0'] = $this->MarginCorrection; }
02251       // Added mPDF 3.0 Float DIV
02252       $this->blk[$bl]['marginCorrected'][$this->page] = true; 
02253     }
02254   }
02255 
02256   // mPDF 4.0
02257   $this->table_rotate = $save_tr; // *TABLES*
02258   $this->kwt = $save_kwt;
02259 
02260   $this->cMarginL = $bak_cml;
02261   $this->cMarginR = $bak_cmr;
02262   $this->divwidth = $bak_dw;
02263   // mPDF 4.2
02264   $this->lineheight = $bak_lh;
02265 }
02266 
02267 
02268 function PageNo() {
02269   //Get current page number
02270   return $this->page;
02271 }
02272 
02273 function SetDrawColor($r,$g=-1,$b=-1,$col4=-1) {
02274   //Set color for all stroking operations
02275   if(($r==0 and $g==0 and $b==0 && $col4 == -1) or $g==-1)  $this->DrawColor=sprintf('%.3f G',$r/255);
02276   else if ($col4 == -1) $this->DrawColor=sprintf('%.3f %.3f %.3f RG',$r/255,$g/255,$b/255);
02277   else {
02278     // CMYK
02279     // mPDF 4.2.018
02280     if ($this->PDFA) { $this->Error("PDFA1-b does not permit CMYK colours (fn. SetDrawColor)."); }
02281     $this->DrawColor = sprintf('%.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f K', $r/100, $g/100, $b/100, $col4/100);
02282   }
02283   if($this->page>0 && ((isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['DrawColor']) && $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['DrawColor'] != $this->DrawColor) || !isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['DrawColor']) || $this->keep_block_together)) { $this->_out($this->DrawColor); }
02284   $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['DrawColor'] = $this->DrawColor;
02285 }
02286 
02287 function SetFillColor($r,$g=-1,$b=-1,$col4=-1) {
02288   //Set color for all filling operations
02289   if(($r==0 and $g==0 and $b==0 && $col4 == -1) or $g==-1)  $this->FillColor=sprintf('%.3f g',$r/255);
02290   else if ($col4 == -1) $this->FillColor=sprintf('%.3f %.3f %.3f rg',$r/255,$g/255,$b/255);
02291   else {
02292     // CMYK
02293     // mPDF 4.2.018
02294     if ($this->PDFA) { $this->Error("PDFA1-b does not permit CMYK colours (fn. SetFillColor)."); }
02295     $this->FillColor = sprintf('%.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f k', $r/100, $g/100, $b/100, $col4/100);
02296   }
02297   $this->ColorFlag = ($this->FillColor != $this->TextColor);
02298   if($this->page>0 && ((isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['FillColor']) && $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['FillColor'] != $this->FillColor) || !isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['FillColor']) || $this->keep_block_together)) { $this->_out($this->FillColor); }
02299   $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['FillColor'] = $this->FillColor;
02300 }
02301 
02302 function SetTextColor($r,$g=-1,$b=-1,$col4=-1) {
02303   //Set color for text
02304   if(($r==0 and $g==0 and $b==0 && $col4 == -1) or $g==-1)  $this->TextColor=sprintf('%.3f g',$r/255);
02305   else if ($col4 == -1) $this->TextColor=sprintf('%.3f %.3f %.3f rg',$r/255,$g/255,$b/255);
02306   else {
02307     // CMYK
02308     // mPDF 4.2.018
02309     if ($this->PDFA) { $this->Error("PDFA1-b does not permit CMYK colours (fn. SetTextColor)."); }
02310     $this->TextColor = sprintf('%.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f k', $r/100, $g/100, $b/100, $col4/100);
02311   }
02312   $this->ColorFlag = ($this->FillColor != $this->TextColor);
02313 }
02314 
02315 
02316 
02317 function GetStringWidth($s) {
02318       //Get width of a string in the current font
02319       $s = (string)$s;
02320       $cw = &$this->CurrentFont['cw'];
02321       $w = 0;
02322 /*-- UNICODE-FONTS --*/
02323       if ($this->is_MB && !$this->usingCoreFont) {
02324         $unicode = $this->UTF8StringToArray($s);
02325         foreach($unicode as $char) {
02326           if ($char == 173) { continue; } // Soft Hyphens
02327           elseif (isset($cw[$char])) { $w+=$cw[$char]; } 
02328         //  elseif(isset($this->ords[$char]) && isset($cw[$this->ords[$char]])) { $w+=$cw[$this->ords[$char]]; } // mPDF 4.2
02329           elseif(isset($this->chrs[$char]) && isset($cw[$this->chrs[$char]])) { $w+=$cw[$this->chrs[$char]]; } 
02330           elseif(isset($this->CurrentFont['desc']['MissingWidth'])) { $w += $this->CurrentFont['desc']['MissingWidth']; }
02331           elseif(isset($this->CurrentFont['MissingWidth'])) { $w += $this->CurrentFont['MissingWidth']; }
02332           else { $w += 500; }
02333         }
02334       } 
02335       else {
02336 /*-- END UNICODE-FONTS --*/
02337         $l = strlen($s);
02338         for($i=0; $i<$l; $i++) {
02339           // Soft Hyphens chr(173)
02340           if (substr($s,$i,1) == chr(173) && ($this->FontFamily!='symbol' && $this->FontFamily!='zapfdingbats')) { 
02341             continue;
02342           }
02343           else if (isset($cw[substr($s,$i,1)])) { $w += $cw[substr($s,$i,1)]; } 
02344           else if (isset($cw[$this->ords[substr($s,$i,1)]])) { $w += $cw[$this->ords[substr($s,$i,1)]]; }
02345         }
02346 /*-- UNICODE-FONTS --*/
02347       }
02348 /*-- END UNICODE-FONTS --*/
02349       unset($cw);
02350       return ($w * $this->FontSize/ 1000);
02351 }
02352 
02353 function SetLineWidth($width) {
02354   //Set line width
02355   $this->LineWidth=$width;
02356   $lwout = (sprintf('%.3f w',$width*$this->k));
02357   if($this->page>0 && ((isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['LineWidth']) && $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['LineWidth'] != $lwout) || !isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['LineWidth']) || $this->keep_block_together)) {
02358      $this->_out($lwout); 
02359   }
02360   $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['LineWidth'] = $lwout;
02361 }
02362 
02363 function Line($x1,$y1,$x2,$y2) {
02364   //Draw a line
02365   $this->_out(sprintf('%.3f %.3f m %.3f %.3f l S',$x1*$this->k,($this->h-$y1)*$this->k,$x2*$this->k,($this->h-$y2)*$this->k));
02366 }
02367 
02368 function Arrow($x1,$y1,$x2,$y2,$headsize=3,$fill='B',$angle=25) {
02369   //F == fill //S == stroke //B == stroke and fill 
02370   // angle = splay of arrowhead - 1 - 89 degrees
02371   if($fill=='F')  $fill='f';
02372   elseif($fill=='FD' or $fill=='DF' or $fill=='B') $fill='B';
02373   else $fill='S';
02374   $a = atan2(($y2-$y1),($x2-$x1));
02375   $b = $a + deg2rad($angle);
02376   $c = $a - deg2rad($angle);
02377   $x3 = $x2 - ($headsize* cos($b));
02378   $y3 = $this->h-($y2 - ($headsize* sin($b)));
02379   $x4 = $x2 - ($headsize* cos($c));
02380   $y4 = $this->h-($y2 - ($headsize* sin($c)));
02381 
02382   $x5 = $x3-($x3-$x4)/2;  // mid point of base of arrowhead - to join arrow line to
02383   $y5 = $y3-($y3-$y4)/2;
02384 
02385   $s = '';
02386   $s.=sprintf('%.3f %.3f m %.3f %.3f l S',$x1*$this->k,($this->h-$y1)*$this->k,$x5*$this->k,$y5*$this->k);
02387   $this->_out($s);
02388 
02389   $s = '';
02390   $s.=sprintf('%.3f %.3f m %.3f %.3f l %.3f %.3f l %.3f %.3f l %.3f %.3f l ',$x5*$this->k,$y5*$this->k,$x3*$this->k,$y3*$this->k,$x2*$this->k,($this->h-$y2)*$this->k,$x4*$this->k,$y4*$this->k,$x5*$this->k,$y5*$this->k);
02391   $s.=$fill;
02392   $this->_out($s);
02393 }
02394 
02395 
02396 function Rect($x,$y,$w,$h,$style='') {
02397   //Draw a rectangle
02398   if($style=='F') $op='f';
02399   elseif($style=='FD' or $style=='DF') $op='B';
02400   else $op='S';
02401   $this->_out(sprintf('%.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f re %s',$x*$this->k,($this->h-$y)*$this->k,$w*$this->k,-$h*$this->k,$op));
02402 }
02403 
02404 function AddFont($family,$style='',$file='') {
02405 
02406   if ($this->isCJK && $this->use_CJK_only) { return; }
02407   if(empty($family)) { return; }
02408   $family = strtolower($family);
02409   $style=strtoupper($style);
02410   $style=str_replace('U','',$style);
02411   if($style=='IB') $style='BI';
02412   $fontkey = $family.$style;
02413   // check if the font has been already added
02414   if(isset($this->fonts[$fontkey])) {
02415     return;
02416   }
02417 
02418 /*-- UNICODE-FONTS --*/
02419   if (($this->is_MB) && (!$this->usingCoreFont)) {
02420       if($file=='') {
02421         $file = str_replace(' ', '', $family).strtolower($style).'.php';
02422       }
02423       if(!file_exists(MPDF_FONTPATH.$file)) {
02424         // try to load the basic file without styles
02425         $file = str_replace(' ', '', $family).'.php';
02426       }
02427       include(MPDF_FONTPATH.$file);
02428       // mPDF 4.1
02429       if ($this->useSubsets && file_exists(MPDF_FONTPATH.substr($file,0,(strpos($file,'.'))).'.dat')) { $type = "Type1subset"; }
02430       if(!isset($name)) {
02431         $this->Error('Could not include font definition file');
02432       }
02433       $i = count($this->fonts)+$this->extraFontSubsets+1;
02434       // mPDF 4.0
02435       $sbarr = range(0,32);  
02436       // Always include space, and 0-9 in first subset for use in page number aliases {nb} {nbpg}
02437       for($ctr=0; $ctr<10; $ctr++) { $sbarr[($ctr+33)] = ($ctr+48); }
02438       $this->fonts[$fontkey] = array('i'=>$i, 'type'=>$type, 'name'=>$name, 'desc'=>$desc, 'up'=>$up, 'ut'=>$ut, 'cw'=>$cw, 'enc'=>$enc, 'file'=>$file, 'ctg'=>$ctg, 'subsets'=>array(0=>$sbarr), 'subsetfontids'=>array($i), 'used'=>false);
02439 
02440       /* mPDF 4.2 Not required in MB document/fonts
02441       if(isset($diff) AND (!empty($diff))) {
02442         //Search existing encodings
02443         $d=0;
02444         $nb=count($this->diffs);
02445         for($i=1;$i<=$nb;$i++) {
02446           if($this->diffs[$i]==$diff) {
02447             $d=$i;
02448             break;
02449           }
02450         }
02451         if($d==0) {
02452           $d=$nb+1;
02453           $this->diffs[$d]=$diff;
02454         }
02455         $this->fonts[$fontkey]['diff']=$d;
02456       }
02457       */
02458       if(!empty($file)) {
02459         // mPDF 4.0
02460         if ($this->useSubsets && $type == "Type1subset") {
02461           $this->FontFiles[$file]=array('type'=>"Type1subset");
02462         }
02463         else if((strcasecmp($type,"TrueType") == 0) OR (strcasecmp($type,"TrueTypeUnicode") == 0)) {
02464           $this->FontFiles[$file]=array('length1'=>$originalsize);
02465         }
02466         else {
02467           $this->FontFiles[$file]=array('length1'=>$size1,'length2'=>$size2);
02468         }
02469       }
02470   }
02471   else {  // if not unicode (or embedded)
02472 /*-- END UNICODE-FONTS --*/
02473 
02474     if($file=='') {
02475       $file=str_replace(' ','',$family).strtolower($style);
02476 
02477       if ($this->is_MB) {
02478         $file=$file.'.php';
02479       }
02480       else if ($this->codepage != 'win-1252') {
02481         $file=$file.'-'.$this->codepage.'.php';
02482       }
02483       else {  // is there any other?
02484         $file=$file.'.php';
02485       }
02486 
02487 
02488     }
02489     if(defined('MPDF_FONTPATH')) { $file=MPDF_FONTPATH.$file; }
02490     include($file);
02491     if(!isset($name)) $this->Error('Could not include font definition file - '.$family.' '.$style);
02492     $i=count($this->fonts)+$this->extraFontSubsets+1;
02493     $this->fonts[$family.$style]=array('i'=>$i,'type'=>$type,'name'=>$name,'desc'=>$desc,'up'=>$up,'ut'=>$ut,'cw'=>$cw,'enc'=>$enc,'file'=>$file, 'used'=>false);
02494     if($diff)
02495     {
02496       //Search existing encodings
02497       $d=0;
02498       $nb=count($this->diffs);
02499       for($i=1;$i<=$nb;$i++)
02500         if($this->diffs[$i]==$diff) {
02501           $d=$i;
02502           break;
02503         }
02504       if($d==0) {
02505         $d=$nb+1;
02506         $this->diffs[$d]=$diff;
02507       }
02508       $this->fonts[$family.$style]['diff']=$d;
02509     }
02510     if($file) {
02511       if($type=='TrueType') $this->FontFiles[$file]=array('length1'=>$originalsize);
02512       else $this->FontFiles[$file]=array('length1'=>$size1,'length2'=>$size2);
02513     }
02514     // ADDED fontlist is defined in html2fpdf
02515     if (isset($this->fontlist)) { $this->fontlist[] = strtolower($family); }
02516     else { $this->fontlist = array(strtolower($family)); }
02517   } // *UNICODE-FONTS*
02518 }
02519 
02520 
02521 
02522 function SetFont($family,$style='',$size=0, $write=true, $forcewrite=false) {
02523   $family=strtolower($family);
02524   // save previous values - ? not required mPDF 4.0
02525   // $this->prevFontFamily = $this->FontFamily;
02526   // $this->prevFontStyle = $this->FontStyle;
02527   // Select a font; size given in points
02528 
02529   if($family=='') { 
02530     if ($this->FontFamily) { $family=$this->FontFamily; }
02531     else if ($this->default_font) { $family=$this->default_font; }
02532     else { $this->Error("No font or default font set!"); }
02533   }
02534 
02535   // mPDF 4.2
02536   $this->ReqFontStyle = $style; // required or requested style - used later for artificial bold/italic
02537 
02538   if (($family == 'symbol') || ($family == 'zapfdingbats')  || ($family == 'times')  || ($family == 'courier') || ($family == 'helvetica')) { 
02539     // mPDF 4.2.018
02540     if ($this->PDFA) {
02541        if ($family == 'symbol' || $family == 'zapfdingbats') { 
02542       $this->Error("Symbol and Zapfdingbats cannot be embedded in mPDF (required for PDFA1-b).");
02543        }
02544        if ($family == 'times'  || $family == 'courier') { 
02545       if (!$this->PDFAauto) { $this->PDFAwarnings[] = "Core Adobe font ".ucfirst($family)." cannot be embedded in mPDF, which is required for PDFA1-b. (Embedded font will be substituted.)"; }
02546       if ($family == 'times') { $family = 'serif'; }
02547       if ($family == 'courier') { $family = 'mono'; }
02548        }
02549        $this->usingCoreFont = false;
02550     }
02551     else { $this->usingCoreFont = true; }
02552   }
02553   else {  $this->usingCoreFont = false; }
02554 
02555   if($family=='symbol' or $family=='zapfdingbats') { $style=''; }
02556   $style=strtoupper($style);
02557   if(is_int(strpos($style,'U'))) {
02558     $this->underline=true;
02559     $style=str_replace('U','',$style);
02560   }
02561   else { $this->underline=false; }
02562   if ($style=='IB') $style='BI';
02563   if ($size==0) $size=$this->FontSizePt;
02564 
02565   $fontkey=$family.$style;
02566 
02567 /*-- UNICODE-FONTS --*/
02568   if ($this->is_MB && !$this->usingCoreFont) {
02569     // CJK fonts
02570 /*-- CJK --*/
02571     if (in_array($fontkey,$this->available_CJK_fonts)) {
02572       if(!isset($this->fonts[$fontkey])) {  // already added
02573         if (empty($this->Big5_widths)) { require(_MPDF_PATH . 'includes/CJKdata.php'); }
02574         $this->AddCJKFont($family); // don't need to add style
02575       }
02576       $this->isCJK = true;
02577       $this->setMBencoding('UTF-8');
02578     }
02579     else if ($this->use_CJK_only) {
02580       $family = $this->default_font;
02581       $this->isCJK = true;
