02582       $this->setMBencoding('UTF-8');
02583     }
02584     // Test to see if requested font/style is available - or substitute
02585     else 
02586 /*-- END CJK --*/
02587     if (!in_array($fontkey,$this->available_unifonts)) {
02588       // If font[nostyle] exists - set it
02589       if (in_array($family,$this->available_unifonts)) {
02590         $style = '';
02591       }
02592 
02593       // Else if only one font available - set it (assumes if only one font available it will not have a style)
02594       else if (count($this->available_unifonts) == 1) {
02595         $family = $this->available_unifonts[0];
02596         $style = '';
02597       }
02598 
02599       else {
02600         $found = 0;
02601         // else substitute font of similar type
02602         if (in_array($family,$this->sans_fonts)) { 
02603           $i = array_intersect($this->sans_fonts,$this->available_unifonts);
02604           if (count($i)) {
02605             $i = array_values($i);
02606             // with requested style if possible
02607             if (!in_array(($i[0].$style),$this->available_unifonts)) {
02608               $style = '';
02609             }
02610             $family = $i[0]; 
02611             $found = 1;
02612           }
02613         }
02614         else if (in_array($family,$this->serif_fonts)) { 
02615           $i = array_intersect($this->serif_fonts,$this->available_unifonts);
02616           if (count($i)) {
02617             $i = array_values($i);
02618             // with requested style if possible
02619             if (!in_array(($i[0].$style),$this->available_unifonts)) {
02620               $style = '';
02621             }
02622             $family = $i[0]; 
02623             $found = 1;
02624           }
02625         }
02626         else if (in_array($family,$this->mono_fonts)) {
02627           $i = array_intersect($this->mono_fonts,$this->available_unifonts);
02628           if (count($i)) {
02629             $i = array_values($i);
02630             // with requested style if possible
02631             if (!in_array(($i[0].$style),$this->available_unifonts)) {
02632               $style = '';
02633             }
02634             $family = $i[0]; 
02635             $found = 1;
02636           }
02637         }
02638 
02639         if (!$found) {
02640           // set first available font
02641           $fs = $this->available_unifonts[0];
02642           // mPDF 4.0 Added 0-9
02643           preg_match('/^([a-z_0-9]+)([BI]{0,2})$/',$fs,$fas);
02644           // with requested style if possible
02645           $ws = $fas[1].$style;
02646           if (in_array($ws,$this->available_unifonts)) {
02647             $family = $fas[1]; // leave $style as is
02648           }
02649           else if (in_array($fas[1],$this->available_unifonts)) {
02650           // or without style
02651             $family = $fas[1];
02652             $style = '';
02653           }
02654           else {
02655           // or with the style specified 
02656             $family = $fas[1];
02657             $style = $fas[2];
02658           }
02659         }
02660       }
02661 
02662       $this->isCJK = false;
02663       $this->setMBencoding('UTF-8');
02664 
02665       $fontkey = $family.$style; 
02666     }
02667     else {
02668       $this->isCJK = false;
02669       $this->setMBencoding('UTF-8');
02670     }
02671 
02672     // try to add font (if not already added)
02673     $this->AddFont($family, $style);
02674 
02675     //Test if font is already selected
02676     if(($this->FontFamily == $family) AND ($this->FontStyle == $style) AND ($this->FontSizePt == $size) && !$forcewrite) {
02677       return $family;
02678     }
02679 
02680     $fontkey = $family.$style; 
02681     //Select it
02682     $this->FontFamily = $family;
02683     $this->FontStyle = $style;
02684     $this->FontSizePt = $size;
02685     $this->FontSize = $size / $this->k;
02686     $this->CurrentFont = &$this->fonts[$fontkey];
02687     if ($write) { 
02688       $fontout = (sprintf('BT /F%d %.3f Tf ET', $this->CurrentFont['i'], $this->FontSizePt));
02689       // Edited mPDF 3.0
02690       if($this->page>0 && ((isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['Font']) && $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['Font'] != $fontout) || !isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['Font']) || $this->keep_block_together)) { $this->_out($fontout); }
02691       $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['Font'] = $fontout;
02692     }
02693 
02694 
02695 
02696     // Added - currentfont (lowercase) used in HTML2PDF
02697     $this->currentfontfamily=$family;
02698     $this->currentfontsize=$size;
02699     $this->currentfontstyle=$style.($this->underline ? 'U' : '');
02700   }
02701 
02702   else {  // if not unicode/CJK - or core embedded font
02703 /*-- END UNICODE-FONTS --*/
02704 
02705     // mPDF 4.2.018
02706     if ($this->PDFA && $this->useOnlyCoreFonts) {
02707       $this->Error('Core Adobe fonts cannot be embedded in mPDF (required for PDFA1-b) - cannot use <i>$mpdf->useOnlyCoreFonts</i>.');
02708     }
02709     $this->isCJK = false;
02710     $this->setMBencoding($this->codepage);
02711 
02712     //Test if font is already selected
02713     if(($this->FontFamily == $family) AND ($this->FontStyle == $style) AND ($this->FontSizePt == $size) && !$forcewrite) {
02714       return $family;
02715     }
02716 
02717     // ALWAYS SUBSTITUTE ARIAL TIMES COURIER IN 1252
02718     if (!isset($this->CoreFonts[$fontkey]) && ($this->useOnlyCoreFonts) && ($this->codepage == 'win-1252')) {
02719       if (in_array($family,$this->serif_fonts)) { $family = 'times'; }
02720       else if (in_array($family,$this->mono_fonts)) { $family = 'courier'; }
02721       else { $family = 'helvetica'; }
02722       $this->usingCoreFont = true;
02723       $fontkey = $family.$style; 
02724     }
02725 
02726     // Test to see if requested font/style is available - or substitute
02727     if (!in_array($fontkey,$this->available_fonts) && (!$this->usingCoreFont) ) {
02728 
02729       // If font[nostyle] exists - set it
02730       if (in_array($family,$this->available_fonts)) {
02731         $style = '';
02732       }
02733       // Else if only one font available - set it (assumes if only one font available it will not have a style)
02734       else if (count($this->available_fonts) == 1) {
02735         $family = $this->available_fonts[0];
02736         $style = '';
02737       }
02738       else {
02739         $found = 0;
02740         // else substitute font of similar type
02741         if (in_array($family,$this->sans_fonts)) { 
02742           $i = array_intersect($this->sans_fonts,$this->available_fonts);
02743           if (count($i)) {
02744             $i = array_values($i);
02745             // with requested style if possible
02746             if (!in_array(($i[0].$style),$this->available_fonts)) {
02747               $style = '';
02748             }
02749             $family = $i[0]; 
02750             $found = 1;
02751           }
02752         }
02753         else if (in_array($family,$this->serif_fonts)) { 
02754           $i = array_intersect($this->serif_fonts,$this->available_fonts);
02755           if (count($i)) {
02756             $i = array_values($i);
02757             // with requested style if possible
02758             if (!in_array(($i[0].$style),$this->available_fonts)) {
02759               $style = '';
02760             }
02761             $family = $i[0]; 
02762             $found = 1;
02763           }
02764         }
02765         else if (in_array($family,$this->mono_fonts)) {
02766           $i = array_intersect($this->mono_fonts,$this->available_fonts);
02767           if (count($i)) {
02768             $i = array_values($i);
02769             // with requested style if possible
02770             if (!in_array(($i[0].$style),$this->available_fonts)) {
02771               $style = '';
02772             }
02773             $family = $i[0]; 
02774             $found = 1;
02775           }
02776         }
02777         if (!$found) {
02778           // set first available font
02779           $fs = $this->available_unifonts[0];
02780           // mPDF 4.0 Added 0-9
02781           preg_match('/^([a-z_0-9]+)([BI]{0,2})$/',$fs,$fas);
02782           // with requested style if possible
02783           $ws = $fas[1].$style;
02784           if (in_array($ws,$this->available_fonts)) {
02785             $family = $fas[1]; // leave $style as is
02786           }
02787           else if (in_array($fas[1],$this->available_fonts)) {
02788           // or without style
02789             $family = $fas[1];
02790             $style = '';
02791           }
02792           else {
02793           // or with the style specified 
02794             $family = $fas[1];
02795             $style = $fas[2];
02796           }
02797         }
02798       }
02799       $fontkey = $family.$style; 
02800     }
02801 
02802     // mPDF 4.0
02803     if(!isset($this->fonts[$fontkey]))  {
02804       // STANDARD CORE FONTS
02805       if (isset($this->CoreFonts[$fontkey])) {
02806         //Load metric file
02807         $file=$family;
02808         if($family=='times' || $family=='helvetica' || $family=='courier') { $file.=strtolower($style); }
02809         $file.='.php';
02810         include(_MPDF_PATH.'font/'.$file);
02811         if(!isset($cw)) { $this->Error('Could not include font metric file'); }
02812         $i=count($this->fonts)+$this->extraFontSubsets+1;
02813         $this->fonts[$fontkey]=array('i'=>$i,'type'=>'core','name'=>$this->CoreFonts[$fontkey],'desc'=>$desc,'up'=>$up,'ut'=>$ut,'cw'=>$cw);
02814       }
02815       else {
02816         // try to add font 
02817         $this->AddFont($family, $style);
02818       }
02819     }
02820     //Test if font is already selected
02821     if(($this->FontFamily == $family) AND ($this->FontStyle == $style) AND ($this->FontSizePt == $size) && !$forcewrite) {
02822       return $family;
02823     }
02824     //Select it
02825     $this->FontFamily=$family;
02826     $this->FontStyle=$style;
02827     $this->FontSizePt=$size;
02828     $this->FontSize=$size/$this->k;
02829     $this->CurrentFont=&$this->fonts[$fontkey];
02830     if ($write) { 
02831       $fontout = (sprintf('BT /F%d %.3f Tf ET', $this->CurrentFont['i'], $this->FontSizePt));
02832       if($this->page>0 && ((isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['Font']) && $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['Font'] != $fontout) || !isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['Font']) || $this->keep_block_together)) { $this->_out($fontout); }
02833       $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['Font'] = $fontout;
02834     }
02835     // Added - currentfont (lowercase) used in HTML2PDF
02836     $this->currentfontfamily=$family;
02837     $this->currentfontsize=$size;
02838     $this->currentfontstyle=$style.($this->underline ? 'U' : '');
02839 
02840   } // *UNICODE-FONTS*
02841   return $family;
02842 }
02843 
02844 function SetFontSize($size,$write=true) {
02845   //Set font size in points
02846   if($this->FontSizePt==$size) return;
02847   $this->FontSizePt=$size;
02848   $this->FontSize=$size/$this->k;
02849   $this->currentfontsize=$size;
02850     if ($write) { 
02851       $fontout = (sprintf('BT /F%d %.3f Tf ET', $this->CurrentFont['i'], $this->FontSizePt));
02852       // Edited mPDF 3.0
02853       if($this->page>0 && ((isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['Font']) && $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['Font'] != $fontout) || !isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['Font']) || $this->keep_block_together)) { $this->_out($fontout); }
02854       $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['Font'] = $fontout;
02855     }
02856 }
02857 
02858 function AddLink() {
02859   //Create a new internal link
02860   $n=count($this->links)+1;
02861   $this->links[$n]=array(0,0);
02862   return $n;
02863 }
02864 
02865 function SetLink($link,$y=0,$page=-1) {
02866   //Set destination of internal link
02867   if($y==-1) $y=$this->y;
02868   if($page==-1) $page=$this->page;
02869   $this->links[$link]=array($page,$y);
02870 }
02871 
02872 function Link($x,$y,$w,$h,$link) {
02873   if ($this->keep_block_together) { // Save to array - don't write yet
02874     $this->ktLinks[$this->page][]=array($x*$this->k,$this->hPt-$y*$this->k,$w*$this->k,$h*$this->k,$link);
02875     return;
02876   }
02877   else if ($this->table_rotate) { // *TABLES*
02878     $this->tbrot_Links[$this->page][]=array($x*$this->k,$this->hPt-$y*$this->k,$w*$this->k,$h*$this->k,$link);  // *TABLES*
02879     return; // *TABLES*
02880   } // *TABLES*
02881   else if ($this->kwt) {
02882     $this->kwt_Links[$this->page][]=array($x*$this->k,$this->hPt-$y*$this->k,$w*$this->k,$h*$this->k,$link);
02883     return;
02884   }
02885   // mPDF 4.0
02886   if ($this->writingHTMLheader || $this->writingHTMLfooter) {
02887     $this->HTMLheaderPageLinks[]=array($x*$this->k,$this->hPt-$y*$this->k,$w*$this->k,$h*$this->k,$link);
02888     return;
02889   }
02890   //Put a link on the page
02891   $this->PageLinks[$this->page][]=array($x*$this->k,$this->hPt-$y*$this->k,$w*$this->k,$h*$this->k,$link);
02892   // Save cross-reference to Column buffer
02893   $ref = count($this->PageLinks[$this->page])-1;  // *COLUMNS*
02894   $this->columnLinks[$this->CurrCol][INTVAL($this->x)][INTVAL($this->y)] = $ref;  // *COLUMNS*
02895 
02896 }
02897 
02898 function Text($x,$y,$txt) {
02899   // Output a string
02900   // Called (only) by Watermark
02901   // Expects input to be mb_encoded if necessary and RTL reversed
02902   // NON_BREAKING SPACE
02903   // mPDF 4.0 
02904   $this->CurrentFont['used']= true;
02905   // mPDF 4.0 Subset fonts are unibyte at output stage
02906 /*-- UNICODE-FONTS --*/
02907   if ($this->is_MB && !$this->usingCoreFont && (!$this->useSubsets || $this->CurrentFont['type']!='Type1subset')) {
02908         $txt2 = str_replace($this->chrs[194].$this->chrs[160],$this->chrs[32],$txt); 
02909     if (!$this->usingCoreFont) {
02910       //Convert string to UTF-16BE without BOM
02911       $txt2= $this->UTF8ToUTF16BE($txt2, false);
02912     }
02913     $s=sprintf('BT %.3f %.3f Td (%s) Tj ET',$x*$this->k,($this->h-$y)*$this->k,$this->_escape($txt2));
02914   }
02915   // mPDF 4.0 Subset fonts
02916   else
02917 /*-- END UNICODE-FONTS --*/
02918   if ($this->useSubsets && $this->CurrentFont['type']=='Type1subset' && !$this->isCJK && !$this->usingCoreFont) {
02919         $txt2 = str_replace($this->chrs[160],$this->chrs[32],$txt);
02920     $txt2 = $this->UTF8toSubset($txt2);
02921     $s=sprintf('BT %.3f %.3f Td %s Tj ET',$x*$this->k,($this->h-$y)*$this->k,$txt2);
02922   }
02923   else {
02924         $txt2 = str_replace($this->chrs[160],$this->chrs[32],$txt);
02925     $s=sprintf('BT %.3f %.3f Td (%s) Tj ET',$x*$this->k,($this->h-$y)*$this->k,$this->_escape($txt2));
02926   }
02927   if($this->underline and $txt!='') {
02928     $s.=' '.$this->_dounderline($x,$y + (0.1* $this->FontSize),$txt);
02929   }
02930   if($this->ColorFlag) $s='q '.$this->TextColor.' '.$s.' Q';
02931   $this->_out($s);
02932 }
02933 
02934 /*-- DIRECTW --*/
02935 function WriteText($x,$y,$txt) {
02936   // Output a string using Text() but does encoding and text reversing of RTL
02937   $txt = $this->purify_utf8_text($txt);
02938   if ($this->text_input_as_HTML) {
02939     $txt = $this->all_entities_to_utf8($txt);
02940   }
02941   if (!$this->is_MB) { $txt = mb_convert_encoding($txt,$this->mb_enc,'UTF-8'); }
02942   // DIRECTIONALITY
02943   $this->magic_reverse_dir($txt); // *RTL*
02944   // mPDF 4.0 Font-specific ligature substitution for Indic fonts
02945   $this->ConvertIndic($txt);  // *INDIC*
02946   $this->Text($x,$y,$txt);
02947 }
02948 
02949 function WriteCell($w,$h=0,$txt='',$border=0,$ln=0,$align='',$fill=0,$link='', $currentx=0) {
02950   //Output a cell using Cell() but does encoding and text reversing of RTL
02951   $txt = $this->purify_utf8_text($txt);
02952   if ($this->text_input_as_HTML) {
02953     $txt = $this->all_entities_to_utf8($txt);
02954   }
02955   if (!$this->is_MB) { $txt = mb_convert_encoding($txt,$this->mb_enc,'UTF-8'); }
02956   // DIRECTIONALITY
02957   $this->magic_reverse_dir($txt); // *RTL*
02958   // mPDF 4.0 Font-specific ligature substitution for Indic fonts
02959   $this->ConvertIndic($txt);  // *INDIC*
02960   $this->Cell($w,$h,$txt,$border,$ln,$align,$fill,$link, $currentx);
02961 }
02962 /*-- END DIRECTW --*/
02963 
02964 // mPDF 4.0
02965 function ResetSpacing() {
02966   if ($this->ws != 0) { $this->_out('BT 0 Tw ET'); }
02967   $this->ws=0;
02968   if ($this->charspacing != 0) { $this->_out('BT 0 Tc ET'); }
02969   $this->charspacing=0;
02970 }
02971 
02972 // mPDF 4.0
02973 function SetSpacing($cs,$ws) {
02974   if ($cs) { $this->_out(sprintf('BT %.3f Tc ET',$cs)); }
02975   else if ($this->charspacing != 0) { $this->_out('BT 0 Tc ET'); }
02976   $this->charspacing=$cs;
02977   if ($ws) { $this->_out(sprintf('BT %.3f Tw ET',$ws)); }
02978   else if ($this->ws != 0) { $this->_out('BT 0 Tw ET'); }
02979   $this->ws=$ws;
02980 }
02981 
02982 // WORD SPACING
02983 function GetJspacing($nc,$ns,$w) {
02984   $ws = 0; 
02985   $charspacing = 0;
02986   $ww = $this->jSWord;
02987   $ncx = $nc-1;
02988   if ($nc == 0 && $ns == 0) { return array(0,0); }
02989   if ($nc==1) { $charspacing = $w; }
02990   else if ($this->jSpacing == 'C') {
02991     if ($nc) { $charspacing = $w / ($ncx ); }
02992   }
02993   else if ($this->jSpacing == 'W') {
02994     if ($ns) { $ws = $w / $ns; }
02995   }
02996   else if (!$ns) {
02997     if ($nc) { $charspacing = $w / ($ncx ); }
02998     if (($this->jSmaxChar > 0) && ($charspacing > $this->jSmaxChar)) { 
02999       $charspacing = $this->jSmaxChar;
03000     }
03001   }
03002   else if ($ns == ($ncx )) {
03003     $charspacing = $w / $ns;
03004   }
03005   else {
03006     if ($nc) { 
03007 /*-- UNICODE-FONTS --*/
03008        if ($this->is_MB && !$this->usingCoreFont) {
03009       $cs = ($w * (1 - $this->jSWord)) / ($ncx -$ns); 
03010       if (($this->jSmaxChar > 0) && ($cs > $this->jSmaxChar)) {
03011         $cs = $this->jSmaxChar;
03012         $ww = 1 - (($cs * ($ncx -$ns))/$w);
03013       }
03014       $charspacing = $cs; 
03015       $ws = (($w * ($ww) ) / $ns) - $charspacing;
03016        }
03017        else {
03018 /*-- END UNICODE-FONTS --*/
03019       $cs = ($w * (1 - $this->jSWord)) / ($ncx );
03020       if (($this->jSmaxChar > 0) && ($cs > $this->jSmaxChar)) {
03021         $cs = $this->jSmaxChar;
03022         $ww = 1 - (($cs * ($ncx ))/$w);
03023       }
03024       $charspacing = $cs; 
03025       $ws = ($w * ($ww) ) / $ns;
03026        }  // *UNICODE-FONTS*
03027     }
03028   }
03029   return array($charspacing,$ws); 
03030 }
03031 
03032 // mPDF 4.2 Last parameters added above and below font
03033 function Cell($w,$h=0,$txt='',$border=0,$ln=0,$align='',$fill=0,$link='', $currentx=0, $lcpaddingL=0, $lcpaddingR=0, $valign='M', $spanfill=0, $abovefont=0, $belowfont=0) {
03034   //Output a cell
03035   // Expects input to be mb_encoded if necessary and RTL reversed
03036   // NON_BREAKING SPACE
03037   if ($this->is_MB) { // *UNICODE-FONTS*
03038         $txt = str_replace($this->chrs[194].$this->chrs[160],$this->chrs[32],$txt);   // *UNICODE-FONTS*
03039   } // *UNICODE-FONTS*
03040   else {  // *UNICODE-FONTS*
03041         $txt = str_replace($this->chrs[160],$this->chrs[32],$txt);
03042   } // *UNICODE-FONTS*
03043 
03044   $k=$this->k;
03045   $oldcolumn = $this->CurrCol;
03046   // Automatic page break
03047   // Allows PAGE-BREAK-AFTER = avoid to work
03048   // mPDF 4.2.008
03049   if (!$this->tableLevel && (($this->y+$this->divheight>$this->PageBreakTrigger) || ($this->y+$h>$this->PageBreakTrigger) || 
03050     ($this->y+($h*2)>$this->PageBreakTrigger && $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['page_break_after_avoid'])) and !$this->InFooter and $this->AcceptPageBreak()) {
03051     $x=$this->x;//Current X position
03052 
03053 
03054     // WORD SPACING
03055     $ws=$this->ws;//Word Spacing
03056     $charspacing=$this->charspacing;//Character Spacing
03057     // mPDF 4.0
03058     $this->ResetSpacing();
03059 
03060     $this->AddPage($this->CurOrientation);
03061     // Added to correct for OddEven Margins
03062     $x += $this->MarginCorrection;
03063     if ($currentx) { 
03064       $currentx += $this->MarginCorrection;
03065     } 
03066     $this->x=$x;
03067     // WORD SPACING
03068     // mPDF 4.0
03069     $this->SetSpacing($charspacing,$ws);
03070   }
03071 
03072   // Test: to put border round each cell: $border=1;
03073   // Test: to put line through centre of cell: $this->Line($this->x,$this->y+($h/2),$this->x+50,$this->y+($h/2));
03074 
03075 /*-- COLUMNS --*/
03076   // COLS
03077   // COLUMN CHANGE
03078   if ($this->CurrCol != $oldcolumn) {
03079     if ($currentx) { 
03080       $currentx += $this->ChangeColumn * ($this->ColWidth+$this->ColGap);
03081     } 
03082     $this->x += $this->ChangeColumn * ($this->ColWidth+$this->ColGap);
03083   }
03084 
03085   // COLUMNS Update/overwrite the lowest bottom of printing y value for a column
03086   if ($this->ColActive) {
03087     if ($h) { $this->ColDetails[$this->CurrCol]['bottom_margin'] = $this->y+$h; }
03088     else { $this->ColDetails[$this->CurrCol]['bottom_margin'] = $this->y+$this->divheight; }
03089   }
03090 /*-- END COLUMNS --*/
03091 
03092   // KEEP BLOCK TOGETHER Update/overwrite the lowest bottom of printing y value on first page
03093   if ($this->keep_block_together) {
03094     if ($h) { $this->ktBlock[$this->page]['bottom_margin'] = $this->y+$h; }
03095 //    else { $this->ktBlock[$this->page]['bottom_margin'] = $this->y+$this->divheight; }
03096   }
03097 
03098   if($w==0) $w = $this->w-$this->rMargin-$this->x;
03099   $s='';
03100   if($fill==1 && $this->FillColor) { 
03101     if((isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['FillColor']) && $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['FillColor'] != $this->FillColor) || !isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['FillColor']) || $this->keep_block_together) { $s .= $this->FillColor.' '; }
03102     $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['FillColor'] = $this->FillColor;
03103   }
03104 
03105   // mPDF 4.0
03106   $boxtop = $this->y;
03107   $boxheight = $h;
03108   $boxbottom = $this->y+$h;
03109 
03110   if($txt!='') {
03111     // FONT SIZE - this determines the baseline caculation
03112     if ($this->linemaxfontsize && !$this->processingHeader) { $bfs = $this->linemaxfontsize; }
03113     else  { $bfs = $this->FontSize; }
03114         //Calculate baseline Superscript and Subscript Y coordinate adjustment
03115     $bfx = $this->baselineC;  // mPDF 4.2
03116         $baseline = $bfx*$bfs;
03117     if($this->SUP) { $baseline += ($bfx-1.05)*$this->FontSize; }
03118     else if($this->SUB) { $baseline += ($bfx + 0.04)*$this->FontSize; }
03119     else if($this->bullet) { $baseline += ($bfx-0.7)*$this->FontSize; }
03120 
03121     // Vertical align (for Images)
03122     // mPDF 4.2
03123     if ($abovefont || $belowfont) { // from flowing block - valign always M
03124       $va = $abovefont + (0.5*$bfs);
03125     }
03126     else if ($this->lineheight_correction) { 
03127       if ($valign == 'T') { $va = (0.5 * $bfs * $this->lineheight_correction); }
03128       else if ($valign == 'B') { $va = $h-(0.5 * $bfs * $this->lineheight_correction); }
03129       else { $va = 0.5*$h; }  // Middle
03130     }
03131     else { 
03132       if ($valign == 'T') { $va = (0.5 * $bfs * $this->default_lineheight_correction); }
03133       else if ($valign == 'B') { $va = $h-(0.5 * $bfs * $this->default_lineheight_correction); }
03134       else { $va = 0.5*$h; }  // Middle
03135     }
03136 
03137     // ONLY SET THESE IF WANT TO CONFINE BORDER +- FILL TO FIT FONTSIZE - NOT FULL CELL
03138     if ($spanfill) {
03139       $boxtop = $this->y+$baseline+$va-($this->FontSize*(0.5+$bfx));
03140       $boxheight = $this->FontSize;
03141       $boxbottom = $boxtop + $boxheight;
03142     }
03143   }
03144 
03145 
03146   if($fill==1 or $border==1) {
03147     if ($fill==1) $op=($border==1) ? 'B' : 'f';
03148     else $op='S';
03149     $s.=sprintf('%.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f re %s ',$this->x*$k,($this->h-$boxtop)*$k,$w*$k,-$boxheight*$k,$op);
03150   }
03151 
03152   if(is_string($border)) {
03153     $x=$this->x;
03154     $y=$this->y;
03155     if(is_int(strpos($border,'L')))
03156       $s.=sprintf('%.3f %.3f m %.3f %.3f l S ',$x*$k,($this->h-$boxtop)*$k,$x*$k,($this->h-($boxbottom))*$k);
03157     if(is_int(strpos($border,'T')))
03158       $s.=sprintf('%.3f %.3f m %.3f %.3f l S ',$x*$k,($this->h-$boxtop)*$k,($x+$w)*$k,($this->h-$boxtop)*$k);
03159     if(is_int(strpos($border,'R')))
03160       $s.=sprintf('%.3f %.3f m %.3f %.3f l S ',($x+$w)*$k,($this->h-$boxtop)*$k,($x+$w)*$k,($this->h-($boxbottom))*$k);
03161     if(is_int(strpos($border,'B')))
03162       $s.=sprintf('%.3f %.3f m %.3f %.3f l S ',$x*$k,($this->h-($boxbottom))*$k,($x+$w)*$k,($this->h-($boxbottom))*$k);
03163   }
03164 
03165   if($txt!='') {
03166     $stringWidth = $this->GetStringWidth($txt) + ( $this->charspacing * mb_strlen( $txt, $this->mb_enc ) / $k )
03167          + ( $this->ws * mb_substr_count( $txt, ' ', $this->mb_enc ) / $k );
03168 
03169     // Set x OFFSET FOR PRINTING
03170     if($align=='R') {
03171       $dx=$w-$this->cMarginR - $stringWidth - $lcpaddingR;
03172     }
03173     elseif($align=='C') {
03174       $dx=(($w - $stringWidth )/2);
03175     }
03176     elseif($align=='L' or $align=='J') $dx=$this->cMarginL + $lcpaddingL;
03177         else $dx = 0;
03178 
03179 
03180     if($this->ColorFlag) $s.='q '.$this->TextColor.' ';
03181 
03182     // OUTLINE
03183     if($this->outline_on) {
03184       $s.=' '.sprintf('%.3f w',$this->LineWidth*$k).' ';
03185       $s.=" $this->DrawColor ";
03186       $s.=" 2 Tr ";
03187         }
03188     // mPDF 4.2 Artificial BOLD
03189     else if ($this->falseBoldWeight && strpos($this->ReqFontStyle,"B") !== false && strpos($this->FontStyle,"B") === false) { // can't use together with OUTLINE
03190       $s  .= ' 2 Tr 1 J 1 j ';
03191       $s .= ' '.sprintf('%.3f w',($this->FontSize/130)*$k*$this->falseBoldWeight).' ';
03192       $tc = strtoupper($this->TextColor); // change 0 0 0 rg to 0 0 0 RG
03193       if($this->FillColor!=$tc) { $s .= ' '.$tc.' '; }    // stroke (outline) = same colour as text(fill)
03194     }
03195     // mPDF 4.2 Artificial ITALIC
03196     if (strpos($this->ReqFontStyle,"I") !== false && strpos($this->FontStyle,"I") === false) {  // Artificial italic
03197       $aix = '1 0 0.261799 1 %.3f %.3f Tm '; 
03198     }
03199     else { $aix = '%.3f %.3f Td '; }
03200 
03201     // THE TEXT
03202     // mPDF 4.0 
03203     $this->CurrentFont['used']= true;
03204     // WORD SPACING
03205     // IF multibyte - Tw has no effect - need to do word spacing by setting character spacing for spaces between words
03206     // mPDF 4.0 Subset fonts are unibyte at output stage
03207 /*-- UNICODE-FONTS --*/
03208 
03209     if ($this->ws && $this->is_MB && (!$this->useSubsets || $this->CurrentFont['type']!='Type1subset')) {
03210       $space = ' ';
03211       if ($this->is_MB && !$this->usingCoreFont) {
03212       //Convert string to UTF-16BE without BOM
03213       $space= $this->UTF8ToUTF16BE($space , false);
03214       }
03215       $space=$this->_escape($space ); 
03216       $s.=sprintf('BT '.$aix,($this->x+$dx)*$k,($this->h-($this->y+$baseline+$va))*$k);
03217       $t = preg_split('/[ ]/u',$txt);
03218       for($i=0;$i<count($t);$i++) {
03219       $tx = $t[$i]; 
03220         if ($this->is_MB && !$this->usingCoreFont) {
03221         //Convert string to UTF-16BE without BOM
03222         $tx = $this->UTF8ToUTF16BE($tx , false);
03223       }
03224 
03225       $tx = $this->_escape($tx); 
03226 
03227       $s.=sprintf(' %.3f Tc (%s) Tj',$this->charspacing,$tx);
03228       if (($i+1)<count($t)) {
03229         $s.=sprintf(' %.3f Tc (%s) Tj',$this->ws+$this->charspacing,$space);
03230       }
03231       }
03232       $s.=' ET';
03233     }
03234     else {
03235 /*-- END UNICODE-FONTS --*/
03236       $txt2= $txt;
03237       // mPDF 4.0 Subset fonts
03238       if ($this->useSubsets && $this->CurrentFont['type']=='Type1subset' && !$this->isCJK && !$this->usingCoreFont) {
03239       $txt2 = $this->UTF8toSubset($txt2);
03240       $s.=sprintf('BT '.$aix.' %s Tj ET',($this->x+$dx)*$k,($this->h-($this->y+$baseline+$va))*$k,$txt2);
03241       }
03242       else {
03243 /*-- UNICODE-FONTS --*/
03244       if ($this->is_MB && !$this->usingCoreFont) {
03245         //Convert string to UTF-16BE without BOM
03246         $txt2= $this->UTF8ToUTF16BE($txt2, false);
03247       }
03248 /*-- END UNICODE-FONTS --*/
03249       $txt2=$this->_escape($txt2); 
03250       $s.=sprintf('BT '.$aix.' (%s) Tj ET',($this->x+$dx)*$k,($this->h-($this->y+$baseline+$va))*$k,$txt2);
03251       }
03252     } // *UNICODE-FONTS*
03253 
03254     // UNDERLINE
03255     // mPDF 4.0
03256     if($this->underline) {
03257       $c = strtoupper($this->TextColor); // change 0 0 0 rg to 0 0 0 RG
03258       if($this->FillColor!=$c) { $s.= ' '.$c.' '; }
03259       if (isset($this->CurrentFont['up'])) { $up=$this->CurrentFont['up']; }
03260       else { $up = -100; }
03261       $adjusty = (-$up/1000* $this->FontSize);  
03262       if (isset($this->CurrentFont['ut'])) { $ut=$this->CurrentFont['ut']/1000* $this->FontSize; }
03263       else { $ut = 60/1000* $this->FontSize; }
03264       $olw = $this->LineWidth;
03265       $s.=' '.(sprintf(' %.3f w',$ut*$this->k));
03266       $s.=' '.$this->_dounderline($this->x+$dx,$this->y+$baseline+$va+$adjusty,$txt);
03267       $s.=' '.(sprintf(' %.3f w',$olw*$this->k));
03268       if($this->FillColor!=$c) { $s.= ' '.$this->FillColor.' '; }
03269     }
03270 
03271       // STRIKETHROUGH
03272     // mPDF 4.0
03273     if($this->strike) {
03274       $c = strtoupper($this->TextColor); // change 0 0 0 rg to 0 0 0 RG
03275       if($this->FillColor!=$c) { $s.= ' '.$c.' '; }
03276           //Superscript and Subscript Y coordinate adjustment (now for striked-through texts)
03277       if (isset($this->CurrentFont['desc']['CapHeight'])) { $ch=$this->CurrentFont['desc']['CapHeight']; }
03278       else { $ch = 700; }
03279       $adjusty = (-$ch/1000* $this->FontSize) * 0.35; 
03280       if (isset($this->CurrentFont['ut'])) { $ut=$this->CurrentFont['ut']/1000* $this->FontSize; }
03281       else { $ut = 60/1000* $this->FontSize; }
03282       $olw = $this->LineWidth;
03283       $s.=' '.(sprintf(' %.3f w',$ut*$this->k));
03284       $s.=' '.$this->_dounderline($this->x+$dx,$this->y+$baseline+$va+$adjusty,$txt);
03285       $s.=' '.(sprintf(' %.3f w',$olw));
03286       if($this->FillColor!=$c) { $s.= ' '.$this->FillColor.' '; }
03287     }
03288 
03289     // COLOR
03290     if($this->ColorFlag) $s.=' Q';
03291 
03292     // LINK
03293     if($link!='') {
03294       $this->Link($this->x+$dx,$this->y+$va-.5*$this->FontSize,$stringWidth,$this->FontSize,$link);
03295     }
03296   }
03297   if($s) $this->_out($s);
03298 
03299   // WORD SPACING
03300   if ($this->ws && $this->is_MB) {  // *UNICODE-FONTS*
03301     $this->_out(sprintf('BT %.3f Tc ET',$this->charspacing)); // *UNICODE-FONTS* 
03302   } // *UNICODE-FONTS*
03303 
03304   $this->lasth=$h;
03305   if( strpos($txt,"\n") !== false) $ln=1; // cell recognizes \n from <BR> tag
03306   if($ln>0)
03307   {
03308     //Go to next line
03309     $this->y += $h;
03310     if($ln==1) {
03311       //Move to next line
03312       if ($currentx != 0) { $this->x=$currentx; } 
03313       else { $this->x=$this->lMargin; }
03314       }
03315   }
03316   else $this->x+=$w;
03317 
03318 
03319 }
03320 
03321 
03322 function MultiCell($w,$h,$txt,$border=0,$align='',$fill=0,$link='',$directionality='ltr',$encoded=false)
03323 {
03324   // Parameter (pre-)encoded - When called internally from ToC or textarea: mb_encoding already done - but not reverse RTL/Indic
03325   if (!$encoded) {
03326     $txt = $this->purify_utf8_text($txt);
03327     if ($this->text_input_as_HTML) {
03328       $txt = $this->all_entities_to_utf8($txt);
03329     }
03330     if (!$this->is_MB) { $txt = mb_convert_encoding($txt,$this->mb_enc,'UTF-8'); }
03331     // mPDF 4.0 Font-specific ligature substitution for Indic fonts
03332     else if ($this->is_MB) {  // *INDIC*
03333       $this->ConvertIndic($tmp);  // *INDIC*
03334     } // *INDIC*
03335   }
03336   if (!$align) { $align = $this->defaultAlign; }
03337   //Output text with automatic or explicit line breaks
03338   $cw=&$this->CurrentFont['cw'];
03339   if($w==0) $w=$this->w-$this->rMargin-$this->x;
03340 
03341 /*-- UNICODE-FONTS --*/
03342   if ($this->is_MB)  {
03343     $wmax = ($w - ($this->cMarginL+$this->cMarginR));
03344     $s=preg_replace("/\r/u",'',$txt);
03345     $nb=mb_strlen($s, $this->mb_enc );
03346     while($nb>0 and mb_substr($s,$nb-1,1,$this->mb_enc )=="\n") $nb--;
03347   }
03348   else {
03349 /*-- END UNICODE-FONTS --*/
03350     $wmax=($w- ($this->cMarginL+$this->cMarginR))*1000/$this->FontSize;
03351     $s=str_replace("\r",'',$txt);
03352     $nb=strlen($s);
03353     while($nb>0 and $s[$nb-1]=="\n")  $nb--;
03354   } // *UNICODE-FONTS*
03355   $b=0;
03356   if($border) {
03357     if($border==1) {
03358       $border='LTRB';
03359       $b='LRT';
03360       $b2='LR';
03361     }
03362     else {
03363       $b2='';
03364       if(is_int(strpos($border,'L'))) $b2.='L';
03365       if(is_int(strpos($border,'R'))) $b2.='R';
03366       $b=is_int(strpos($border,'T')) ? $b2.'T' : $b2;
03367     }
03368   }
03369   $sep=-1;
03370   $i=0;
03371   $j=0;
03372   $l=0;
03373   $ns=0;
03374   $nl=1;
03375 
03376 
03377 /*-- UNICODE-FONTS --*/
03378    if ($this->is_MB)  {
03379   while($i<$nb) {
03380     //Get next character
03381     $c = mb_substr($s,$i,1,$this->mb_enc );
03382     if(preg_match("/[\n]/u", $c)) {
03383       //Explicit line break
03384       // WORD SPACING
03385       // mPDF 4.0
03386       $this->ResetSpacing();
03387       $tmp = $this->mb_rtrim(mb_substr($s,$j,$i-$j,$this->mb_enc),'UTF-8');
03388       // DIRECTIONALITY
03389       $this->magic_reverse_dir($tmp); // *RTL*
03390 
03391       $this->Cell($w,$h,$tmp,$b,2,$align,$fill,$link);
03392       $i++;
03393       $sep=-1;
03394       $j=$i;
03395       $l=0;
03396       $ns=0;
03397       $nl++;
03398       if($border and $nl==2) $b=$b2;
03399       continue;
03400     }
03401     if(preg_match("/[ ]/u", $c)) {
03402       $sep=$i;
03403       $ls=$l;
03404       $ns++;
03405     }
03406 
03407     $l = $this->GetStringWidth(mb_substr($s, $j, $i-$j,$this->mb_enc ));
03408 
03409     if($l>$wmax) {
03410       //Automatic line break
03411       if($sep==-1) {  // Only one word
03412         if($i==$j) $i++;
03413         // WORD SPACING
03414         // mPDF 4.0
03415         $this->ResetSpacing();
03416         $tmp = $this->mb_rtrim(mb_substr($s,$j,$i-$j,$this->mb_enc),'UTF-8');
03417         // DIRECTIONALITY
03418         $this->magic_reverse_dir($tmp); // *RTL*
03419 
03420         $this->Cell($w,$h,$tmp,$b,2,$align,$fill,$link);
03421       }
03422       else {
03423         $tmp = $this->mb_rtrim(mb_substr($s,$j,$sep-$j,$this->mb_enc),'UTF-8');
03424         if($align=='J') {
03425           //$this->ws=($ns>1) ? ((($wmax-$ls)/($ns-1))) : 0;
03426           //$this->_out(sprintf('%.3f Tw',$this->ws*$this->k));
03427 
03429           // JUSTIFY J using Unicode fonts (Word spacing doesn't work)
03430           // WORD SPACING UNICODE
03431           // Change NON_BREAKING SPACE to spaces so they are 'spaced' properly
03432           $tmp = str_replace($this->chrs[194].$this->chrs[160],$this->chrs[32],$tmp ); 
03433           $len_ligne = $this->GetStringWidth($tmp );
03434           $nb_carac = mb_strlen( $tmp , $this->mb_enc ) ;  
03435           $nb_spaces = mb_substr_count( $tmp ,' ', $this->mb_enc ) ;  
03436           list($charspacing,$ws) = $this->GetJspacing($nb_carac,$nb_spaces,((($w-2) - $len_ligne) * $this->k));
03437           // mPDF 4.0
03438           $this->SetSpacing($charspacing,$ws);
03440         }
03441 
03442         // DIRECTIONALITY
03443         $this->magic_reverse_dir($tmp); // *RTL*
03444 
03445         $this->Cell($w,$h,$tmp,$b,2,$align,$fill,$link);
03446         $i=$sep+1;
03447       }
03448       $sep=-1;
03449       $j=$i;
03450       $l=0;
03451       $ns=0;
03452       $nl++;
03453       if($border and $nl==2) $b=$b2;
03454     }
03455     else $i++;
03456   }
03457   //Last chunk
03458   // WORD SPACING
03459   // mPDF 4.0
03460   $this->ResetSpacing();
03461 
03462    }
03463 
03464 
03465    else {
03466 /*-- END UNICODE-FONTS --*/
03467   while($i<$nb) {
03468     //Get next character
03469     $c=substr($s,$i,1);
03470     if(preg_match("/[\n]/u", $c)) {
03471       //Explicit line break
03472       // WORD SPACING
03473       // mPDF 4.0
03474       $this->ResetSpacing();
03475       $this->Cell($w,$h,substr($s,$j,$i-$j),$b,2,$align,$fill,$link);
03476       $i++;
03477       $sep=-1;
03478       $j=$i;
03479       $l=0;
03480       $ns=0;
03481       $nl++;
03482       if($border and $nl==2) $b=$b2;
03483       continue;
03484     }
03485     if(preg_match("/[ ]/u", $c)) {
03486       $sep=$i;
03487       $ls=$l;
03488       $ns++;
03489     }
03490 
03491     $l+=$cw[$c];
03492     if($l>$wmax) {
03493       //Automatic line break
03494       if($sep==-1) {
03495         if($i==$j) $i++;
03496         // WORD SPACING
03497         // mPDF 4.0
03498         $this->ResetSpacing();
03499         $this->Cell($w,$h,substr($s,$j,$i-$j),$b,2,$align,$fill,$link);
03500       }
03501       else {
03502         if($align=='J') {
03503           $tmp = rtrim(substr($s,$j,$sep-$j));
03505           // JUSTIFY J using Unicode fonts (Word spacing doesn't work)
03506           // WORD SPACING NON_UNICDOE/CJK
03507           // Change NON_BREAKING SPACE to spaces so they are 'spaced' properly
03508           $tmp = str_replace($this->chrs[160],$this->chrs[32],$tmp);
03509           $len_ligne = $this->GetStringWidth($tmp );
03510           $nb_carac = strlen( $tmp ) ;  
03511           $nb_spaces = substr_count( $tmp ,' ' ) ;  
03512           list($charspacing,$ws) = $this->GetJspacing($nb_carac,$nb_spaces,((($w-2) - $len_ligne) * $this->k));
03513           // mPDF 4.0
03514           $this->SetSpacing($charspacing,$ws);
03516         }
03517         $this->Cell($w,$h,substr($s,$j,$sep-$j),$b,2,$align,$fill,$link);
03518         $i=$sep+1;
03519       }
03520       $sep=-1;
03521       $j=$i;
03522       $l=0;
03523       $ns=0;
03524       $nl++;
03525       if($border and $nl==2) $b=$b2;
03526     }
03527     else $i++;
03528   }
03529   //Last chunk
03530   // WORD SPACING
03531   // mPDF 4.0
03532   $this->ResetSpacing();
03533 
03534    }  // *UNICODE-FONTS*
03535 
03536   //Last chunk
03537    if($border and is_int(strpos($border,'B')))  $b.='B';
03538    if ($this->is_MB)  {
03539     $tmp = $this->mb_rtrim(mb_substr($s,$j,$i-$j,$this->mb_enc),'UTF-8');
03540     // DIRECTIONALITY
03541     $this->magic_reverse_dir($tmp); // *RTL*
03542       $this->Cell($w,$h,$tmp,$b,2,$align,$fill,$link);
03543    }
03544    else { $this->Cell($w,$h,substr($s,$j,$i-$j),$b,2,$align,$fill,$link); }
03545    $this->x=$this->lMargin;
03546 }
03547 
03548 
03549 /*-- DIRECTW --*/
03550 function Write($h,$txt,$currentx=0,$link='',$directionality='ltr',$align='') {
03551   if (!$align) { $align = $this->defaultAlign; }  // NB Cannot use Align=J or C using Write??
03552   if ($h == 0) { $this->SetLineHeight(); $h = $this->lineheight; }
03553   //Output text in flowing mode
03554   $cw = &$this->CurrentFont['cw'];
03555   $w = $this->w - $this->rMargin - $this->x; 
03556 
03557 /*-- UNICODE-FONTS --*/
03558   if ($this->is_MB)  {
03559     $wmax = ($w - ($this->cMarginL+$this->cMarginR));
03560     $s=preg_replace("/\r/u",'',$txt); //????
03561     $nb=mb_strlen($s, $this->mb_enc );
03562       // handle single space character
03563       if(($nb==1) AND preg_match("/[ ]/u", $s)) {
03564         $this->x += $this->GetStringWidth($s);
03565         return;
03566       }
03567   }
03568   else {
03569 /*-- END UNICODE-FONTS --*/
03570     $wmax=($w- ($this->cMarginL+$this->cMarginR))*1000/$this->FontSize;
03571     $s=str_replace("\r",'',$txt);
03572     $nb=strlen($s);
03573   } // *UNICODE-FONTS*
03574 
03575 
03576       $sep=-1;
03577       $i=0;
03578       $j=0;
03579       $l=0;
03580       $nl=1;
03581 
03582 
03583 /*-- UNICODE-FONTS --*/
03584   if ($this->is_MB) {
03585       while($i<$nb) {
03586         //Get next character
03587         $c = mb_substr($s,$i,1,$this->mb_enc );
03588         if(preg_match("/[\n]/u", $c)) {
03589           // WORD SPACING
03590           // mPDF 4.0
03591           $this->ResetSpacing();
03592           //Explicit line break
03593           $tmp = $this->mb_rtrim(mb_substr($s,$j,$i-$j,$this->mb_enc),'UTF-8');
03594           if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { // *RTL*
03595              if ($align == 'J') { $align = 'R'; } // *RTL*
03596           } // *RTL*
03597           // DIRECTIONALITY
03598           $this->magic_reverse_dir($tmp); // *RTL*
03599 
03600           $this->Cell($w, $h, $tmp, 0, 2, $align, $fill, $link);
03601           $i++;
03602           $sep = -1;
03603           $j = $i;
03604           $l = 0;
03605           if($nl == 1) {
03606             if ($currentx != 0) $this->x=$currentx;
03607             else $this->x=$this->lMargin;
03608             $w = $this->w - $this->rMargin - $this->x;
03609             $wmax = ($w - ($this->cMarginL+$this->cMarginR));
03610           }
03611           $nl++;
03612           continue;
03613         }
03614         if(preg_match("/[ ]/u", $c)) {
03615           $sep= $i;
03616         }
03617 
03618         $l = $this->GetStringWidth(mb_substr($s, $j, $i-$j,$this->mb_enc));
03619 
03620         if($l > $wmax) {
03621           //Automatic line break (word wrapping)
03622           if($sep == -1) {
03623             // WORD SPACING
03624             // mPDF 4.0
03625             $this->ResetSpacing();
03626             if($this->x > $this->lMargin) {
03627               //Move to next line
03628               if ($currentx != 0) $this->x=$currentx;
03629               else $this->x=$this->lMargin;
03630               $this->y+=$h;
03631               $w=$this->w-$this->rMargin-$this->x;
03632               $wmax = ($w - ($this->cMarginL+$this->cMarginR));
03633               $i++;
03634               $nl++;
03635               continue;
03636             }
03637             if($i==$j) {
03638               $i++;
03639             }
03640             $tmp = $this->mb_rtrim(mb_substr($s,$j,$i-$j,$this->mb_enc),'UTF-8');
03641             if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { // *RTL*
03642                if ($align == 'J') { $align = 'R'; } // *RTL*
03643             } // *RTL*
03644             // DIRECTIONALITY
03645             $this->magic_reverse_dir($tmp); // *RTL*
03646 
03647             $this->Cell($w, $h, $tmp, 0, 2, $align, $fill, $link);
03648           }
03649           else {
03650             $tmp = $this->mb_rtrim(mb_substr($s,$j,$sep-$j,$this->mb_enc),'UTF-8');
03651             if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { // *RTL*
03652                if ($align == 'J') { $align = 'R'; } // *RTL*
03653             } // *RTL*
03654             // DIRECTIONALITY
03655             $this->magic_reverse_dir($tmp); // *RTL*
03656 
03657             if($align=='J') {
03659               // JUSTIFY J using Unicode fonts (Word spacing doesn't work)
03660               // WORD SPACING
03661               // Change NON_BREAKING SPACE to spaces so they are 'spaced' properly
03662                   $tmp = str_replace($this->chrs[194].$this->chrs[160],$this->chrs[32],$tmp ); 
03663               $len_ligne = $this->GetStringWidth($tmp );
03664               $nb_carac = mb_strlen( $tmp , $this->mb_enc ) ;  
03665               $nb_spaces = mb_substr_count( $tmp ,' ', $this->mb_enc ) ;  
03666               list($charspacing,$ws) = $this->GetJspacing($nb_carac,$nb_spaces,((($w-2) - $len_ligne) * $this->k));
03667               // mPDF 4.0
03668               $this->SetSpacing($charspacing,$ws);
03670             }
03671 
03672             $this->Cell($w, $h, $tmp, 0, 2, $align, $fill, $link);
03673             $i=$sep+1;
03674           }
03675           $sep = -1;
03676           $j = $i;
03677           $l = 0;
03678           if($nl==1) {
03679             if ($currentx != 0) $this->x=$currentx;
03680             else $this->x=$this->lMargin;
03681             $w=$this->w-$this->rMargin-$this->x;
03682             $wmax = ($w - ($this->cMarginL+$this->cMarginR));
03683           }
03684           $nl++;
03685         }
03686         else {
03687           $i++;
03688         }
03689       }
03690 
03691 
03692     //Last chunk
03693     // WORD SPACING
03694     // mPDF 4.0
03695     $this->ResetSpacing();
03696 
03697   }
03698 
03699 
03700   else {
03701 /*-- END UNICODE-FONTS --*/
03702 
03703       while($i<$nb) {
03704         //Get next character
03705         $c=substr($s,$i,1);
03706         if(preg_match("/[\n]/u", $c)) {
03707           //Explicit line break
03708           // WORD SPACING
03709           // mPDF 4.0
03710           $this->ResetSpacing();
03711           $this->Cell($w, $h, substr($s, $j, $i-$j), 0, 2, $align, $fill, $link);
03712           $i++;
03713           $sep = -1;
03714           $j = $i;
03715           $l = 0;
03716           if($nl == 1) {
03717             if ($currentx != 0) $this->x=$currentx;
03718             else $this->x=$this->lMargin;
03719             $w = $this->w - $this->rMargin - $this->x;
03720             $wmax=($w-($this->cMarginL+$this->cMarginR))*1000/$this->FontSize;
03721           }
03722           $nl++;
03723           continue;
03724         }
03725         if(preg_match("/[ ]/u", $c)) {
03726           $sep= $i;
03727         }
03728 
03729         $l += $cw[$c];
03730 
03731         if($l > $wmax) {
03732           //Automatic line break (word wrapping)
03733           if($sep == -1) {
03734             // WORD SPACING
03735             // mPDF 4.0
03736             $this->ResetSpacing();
03737             if($this->x > $this->lMargin) {
03738               //Move to next line
03739               if ($currentx != 0) $this->x=$currentx;
03740               else $this->x=$this->lMargin;
03741               $this->y+=$h;
03742               $w=$this->w-$this->rMargin-$this->x;
03743               $wmax=($w-($this->cMarginL+$this->cMarginR))*1000/$this->FontSize;
03744               $i++;
03745               $nl++;
03746               continue;
03747             }
03748             if($i==$j) {
03749               $i++;
03750             }
03751             $this->Cell($w, $h, substr($s, $j, $i-$j), 0, 2, $align, $fill, $link);
03752           }
03753           else {
03754             $tmp = substr($s, $j, $sep-$j);
03755             if($align=='J') {
03757               // JUSTIFY J using Unicode fonts (Word spacing doesn't work)
03758               // WORD SPACING
03759               // Change NON_BREAKING SPACE to spaces so they are 'spaced' properly
03760                   $tmp = str_replace($this->chrs[160],$this->chrs[32],$tmp );
03761               $len_ligne = $this->GetStringWidth($tmp );
03762               $nb_carac = strlen( $tmp ) ;  
03763               $nb_spaces = substr_count( $tmp ,' ' ) ;  
03764               list($charspacing,$ws) = $this->GetJspacing($nb_carac,$nb_spaces,((($w-2) - $len_ligne) * $this->k));
03765               // mPDF 4.0
03766               $this->SetSpacing($charspacing,$ws);
03768             }
03769 
03770             $this->Cell($w, $h, $tmp, 0, 2, $align, $fill, $link);
03771             $i=$sep+1;
03772           }
03773           $sep = -1;
03774           $j = $i;
03775           $l = 0;
03776           if($nl==1) {
03777             if ($currentx != 0) $this->x=$currentx;
03778             else $this->x=$this->lMargin;
03779             $w=$this->w-$this->rMargin-$this->x;
03780             $wmax=($w-($this->cMarginL+$this->cMarginR))*1000/$this->FontSize;
03781           }
03782           $nl++;
03783         }
03784         else {
03785           $i++;
03786         }
03787       }
03788 
03789     //Last chunk
03790     // WORD SPACING
03791     // mPDF 4.0
03792     $this->ResetSpacing();
03793   } // *UNICODE-FONTS*
03794 
03795   //Last chunk
03796   if($i!=$j) {
03797     // mPDF 4.0
03798     if ($currentx != 0) $this->mpdf->x=$currentx;
03799     else $this->mpdf->x=$this->mpdf->lMargin + $this->mpdf->cMarginL;
03800 
03801 /*-- UNICODE-FONTS --*/
03802     if (($this->is_MB) && (!$this->usingCoreFont)) {
03803     $tmp = mb_substr($s,$j,$i-$j,$this->mb_enc);
03804     if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { // *RTL*
03805        if ($align == 'J') { $align = 'R'; } // *RTL*
03806     } // *RTL*
03807     // DIRECTIONALITY
03808     $this->magic_reverse_dir($tmp); // *RTL*
03809 
03810     }
03811     else {
03812 /*-- END UNICODE-FONTS --*/
03813     $tmp = substr($s,$j,$i-$j); // Including CJK which has processed each byte (not multibyte)
03814     } // *UNICODE-FONTS*
03815       $this->Cell($this->GetStringWidth($tmp),$h,$tmp,0,0,'C',$fill,$link);
03816   }
03817 }
03818 /*-- END DIRECTW --*/
03819 
03820 
03821 function saveInlineProperties() {
03822    $saved = array();
03823    $saved[ 'family' ] = $this->FontFamily;
03824    $saved[ 'style' ] = $this->FontStyle;
03825    $saved[ 'sizePt' ] = $this->FontSizePt;
03826    $saved[ 'size' ] = $this->FontSize;
03827    $saved[ 'HREF' ] = $this->HREF; 
03828    $saved[ 'underline' ] = $this->underline; 
03829    $saved[ 'strike' ] = $this->strike;
03830    $saved[ 'SUP' ] = $this->SUP; 
03831    $saved[ 'SUB' ] = $this->SUB; 
03832    $saved[ 'linewidth' ] = $this->LineWidth;
03833    $saved[ 'drawcolor' ] = $this->DrawColor;
03834    $saved[ 'is_outline' ] = $this->outline_on;
03835    $saved[ 'outlineparam' ] = $this->outlineparam;
03836    $saved[ 'toupper' ] = $this->toupper;
03837    $saved[ 'tolower' ] = $this->tolower;
03838 
03839    $saved[ 'I' ] = $this->I;
03840    $saved[ 'B' ] = $this->B;
03841    $saved[ 'colorarray' ] = $this->colorarray;
03842    $saved[ 'bgcolorarray' ] = $this->spanbgcolorarray;
03843    $saved[ 'color' ] = $this->TextColor; 
03844    $saved[ 'bgcolor' ] = $this->FillColor;
03845    $saved['lang'] = $this->currentLang;
03846 
03847    return $saved;
03848 }
03849 
03850 function restoreInlineProperties( $saved) {
03851 
03852    // mPDF 4.0 $this->FontFamily Resets below - don't change here - change via SetFont()
03853   // or it will not change $this->CurrentFont
03854    //$this->FontFamily = $saved[ 'family' ];
03855    $FontFamily = $saved[ 'family' ];
03856 
03857    $this->FontStyle = $saved[ 'style' ];
03858    $this->FontSizePt = $saved[ 'sizePt' ];
03859    $this->FontSize = $saved[ 'size' ];
03860 
03861    $this->currentLang =  $saved['lang'];
03862 /*-- UNICODE-FONTS --*/
03863    if ($this->useLang && $this->is_MB && $this->currentLang != $this->default_lang && ((strlen($this->currentLang) == 5 && $this->currentLang != 'UTF-8') || strlen($this->currentLang ) == 2)) { 
03864   list ($codepage,$mpdf_pdf_unifonts,$mpdf_directionality,$mpdf_jSpacing) = GetCodepage($this->currentLang);
03865   if ($codepage == 'SHIFT_JIS') { $FontFamily = 'sjis'; } // mPDF 4.0 see above
03866   else if ($codepage == 'UHC') { $FontFamily = 'uhc'; } // mPDF 4.0 see above
03867   else if ($codepage == 'BIG5') { $FontFamily = 'big5'; } // mPDF 4.0 see above
03868   else if ($codepage == 'GBK') { $FontFamily = 'gb'; }  // mPDF 4.0 see above
03869   else if ($mpdf_pdf_unifonts) { $this->RestrictUnicodeFonts($mpdf_pdf_unifonts); }
03870   else { $this->RestrictUnicodeFonts($this->default_available_fonts ); }
03871    }
03872    else if ($this->useLang && $this->is_MB ) { 
03873   $this->RestrictUnicodeFonts($this->default_available_fonts ); 
03874    }
03875 /*-- END UNICODE-FONTS --*/
03876 
03877    $this->ColorFlag = ($this->FillColor != $this->TextColor); //Restore ColorFlag as well
03878 
03879    $this->HREF = $saved[ 'HREF' ];
03880    $this->underline = $saved[ 'underline' ];
03881    $this->strike = $saved[ 'strike' ];
03882    $this->SUP = $saved[ 'SUP' ];
03883    $this->SUB = $saved[ 'SUB' ];
03884    $this->LineWidth = $saved[ 'linewidth' ];
03885    $this->DrawColor = $saved[ 'drawcolor' ];
03886    $this->outline_on = $saved[ 'is_outline' ];
03887    $this->outlineparam = $saved[ 'outlineparam' ];
03888 
03889    $this->toupper = $saved[ 'toupper' ];
03890    $this->tolower = $saved[ 'tolower' ];
03891 
03892    // mPDF 4.0
03893    $this->SetFont($FontFamily, $saved[ 'style' ].($this->underline ? 'U' : ''),$saved[ 'sizePt' ],false);
03894    //$this->currentfontfamily = $saved[ 'family' ];
03895 
03896    $this->currentfontstyle = $saved[ 'style' ].($this->underline ? 'U' : '');
03897    $this->currentfontsize = $saved[ 'sizePt' ];
03898    $this->SetStyle('U',$this->underline);
03899    $this->SetStyle('B',$saved[ 'B' ]);
03900    $this->SetStyle('I',$saved[ 'I' ]);
03901 
03902    $this->TextColor = $saved[ 'color' ];
03903    $this->FillColor = $saved[ 'bgcolor' ];
03904    $this->colorarray = $saved[ 'colorarray' ];
03905     $cor = $saved[ 'colorarray' ];
03906     if ($cor) $this->SetTextColor($cor['R'],$cor['G'],$cor['B']);
03907    $this->spanbgcolorarray = $saved[ 'bgcolorarray' ];
03908     $cor = $saved[ 'bgcolorarray' ];
03909     if ($cor) $this->SetFillColor($cor['R'],$cor['G'],$cor['B']);
03910 }
03911 
03912 
03913 
03914 // mPDF 3.0
03915 // Used when ColActive for tables - updated to return first block with background fill OR borders
03916 function GetFirstBlockFill() {
03917   // Returns the first blocklevel that uses a bgcolor fill
03918   $startfill = 0;
03919   for ($i=1;$i<=$this->blklvl;$i++) {
03920     if ($this->blk[$i]['bgcolor'] || $this->blk[$i]['border_left']['w'] || $this->blk[$i]['border_right']['w']  || $this->blk[$i]['border_top']['w']  || $this->blk[$i]['border_bottom']['w']  ) {
03921       $startfill = $i;
03922       break;
03923     }
03924   }
03925   return $startfill;
03926 }
03927 
03928 function SetBlockFill($blvl) {
03929   if ($this->blk[$blvl]['bgcolor']) {
03930     $this->SetFillColor($this->blk[$blvl]['bgcolorarray']['R'],$this->blk[$blvl]['bgcolorarray']['G'],$this->blk[$blvl]['bgcolorarray']['B']);
03931     return 1;
03932   }
03933   else {
03934     $this->SetFillColor(255);
03935     return 0;
03936   }
03937 }
03938 
03939 
03940 //-------------------------FLOWING BLOCK------------------------------------//
03941 //The following functions were originally written by Damon Kohler           //
03942 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------//
03943 
03944 function saveFont() {
03945    $saved = array();
03946    $saved[ 'family' ] = $this->FontFamily;
03947    $saved[ 'style' ] = $this->FontStyle;
03948    $saved[ 'sizePt' ] = $this->FontSizePt;
03949    $saved[ 'size' ] = $this->FontSize;
03950    $saved[ 'curr' ] = &$this->CurrentFont;
03951    $saved[ 'color' ] = $this->TextColor; 
03952    $saved[ 'spanbgcolor' ] = $this->spanbgcolor; 
03953    $saved[ 'spanbgcolorarray' ] = $this->spanbgcolorarray; 
03954    $saved[ 'HREF' ] = $this->HREF;
03955    $saved[ 'underline' ] = $this->underline; 
03956    $saved[ 'strike' ] = $this->strike;
03957    $saved[ 'SUP' ] = $this->SUP;
03958    $saved[ 'SUB' ] = $this->SUB;
03959    $saved[ 'linewidth' ] = $this->LineWidth;
03960    $saved[ 'drawcolor' ] = $this->DrawColor;
03961    $saved[ 'is_outline' ] = $this->outline_on;
03962    $saved[ 'outlineparam' ] = $this->outlineparam;
03963    // mPDF 4.2
03964    $saved[ 'ReqFontStyle' ] = $this->ReqFontStyle;
03965    return $saved;
03966 }
03967 
03968 function restoreFont( $saved, $write=true) {
03969    if (!isset($saved) || empty($saved)) return;
03970 
03971    $this->FontFamily = $saved[ 'family' ];
03972    $this->FontStyle = $saved[ 'style' ];
03973    $this->FontSizePt = $saved[ 'sizePt' ];
03974    $this->FontSize = $saved[ 'size' ];
03975    $this->CurrentFont = &$saved[ 'curr' ];
03976    $this->TextColor = $saved[ 'color' ]; 
03977    $this->spanbgcolor = $saved[ 'spanbgcolor' ]; 
03978    $this->spanbgcolorarray = $saved[ 'spanbgcolorarray' ]; 
03979    $this->ColorFlag = ($this->FillColor != $this->TextColor); //Restore ColorFlag as well
03980    $this->HREF = $saved[ 'HREF' ]; 
03981    $this->underline = $saved[ 'underline' ]; 
03982    $this->strike = $saved[ 'strike' ]; 
03983    $this->SUP = $saved[ 'SUP' ]; 
03984    $this->SUB = $saved[ 'SUB' ]; 
03985    $this->LineWidth = $saved[ 'linewidth' ]; 
03986    $this->DrawColor = $saved[ 'drawcolor' ]; 
03987    $this->outline_on = $saved[ 'is_outline' ]; 
03988    $this->outlineparam = $saved[ 'outlineparam' ];
03989    if ($write) { 
03990     $this->SetFont($saved[ 'family' ],$saved[ 'style' ].($this->underline ? 'U' : ''),$saved[ 'sizePt' ],true,true);  // force output
03991   $fontout = (sprintf('BT /F%d %.3f Tf ET', $this->CurrentFont['i'], $this->FontSizePt));
03992   if($this->page>0 && ((isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['Font']) && $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['Font'] != $fontout) || !isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['Font']) || $this->keep_block_together)) { $this->_out($fontout); }
03993   $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['Font'] = $fontout;
03994    }
03995    else 
03996     $this->SetFont($saved[ 'family' ],$saved[ 'style' ].($this->underline ? 'U' : ''),$saved[ 'sizePt' ]);
03997    // mPDF 4.2
03998    $this->ReqFontStyle = $saved[ 'ReqFontStyle' ];
03999 }
04000 
04001 function newFlowingBlock( $w, $h, $a = '', $is_table = false, $is_list = false, $blockstate = 0, $newblock=true )
04002 {
04003    if (!$a) { $a = $this->defaultAlign; }
04004    // cell width in points
04005 
04006    $this->flowingBlockAttr[ 'width' ] = ($w * $this->k);
04007    // line height in user units
04008    $this->flowingBlockAttr[ 'is_table' ] = $is_table;
04009    $this->flowingBlockAttr[ 'is_list' ] = $is_list;
04010    $this->flowingBlockAttr[ 'height' ] = $h;
04011    $this->flowingBlockAttr[ 'lineCount' ] = 0;
04012    $this->flowingBlockAttr[ 'align' ] = $a;
04013    $this->flowingBlockAttr[ 'font' ] = array();
04014    $this->flowingBlockAttr[ 'content' ] = array();
04015    $this->flowingBlockAttr[ 'contentWidth' ] = 0;
04016    $this->flowingBlockAttr[ 'blockstate' ] = $blockstate;
04017 
04018    $this->flowingBlockAttr[ 'newblock' ] = $newblock;
04019    $this->flowingBlockAttr[ 'valign' ] = 'M';
04020 }
04021 
04022 function finishFlowingBlock($endofblock=false, $next='') {  // mPDF 4.3.003
04023    $currentx = $this->x;
04024    //prints out the last chunk
04025    $is_table = $this->flowingBlockAttr[ 'is_table' ];
04026    $is_list = $this->flowingBlockAttr[ 'is_list' ];
04027    $maxWidth =& $this->flowingBlockAttr[ 'width' ];
04028    $lineHeight =& $this->flowingBlockAttr[ 'height' ];
04029    $align =& $this->flowingBlockAttr[ 'align' ];
04030    $content =& $this->flowingBlockAttr[ 'content' ];
04031    $font =& $this->flowingBlockAttr[ 'font' ];
04032    $contentWidth =& $this->flowingBlockAttr[ 'contentWidth' ];
04033    $lineCount =& $this->flowingBlockAttr[ 'lineCount' ];
04034    $valign =& $this->flowingBlockAttr[ 'valign' ];
04035    $blockstate = $this->flowingBlockAttr[ 'blockstate' ];
04036 
04037    $newblock = $this->flowingBlockAttr[ 'newblock' ];
04038 
04039   // *********** BLOCK BACKGROUND COLOR *****************//
04040   if ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['bgcolor'] && !$is_table) {
04041     // mPDF 3.0 - Tiling Patterns
04042     $fill = 0;
04043 //    $fill = 1;
04044 //    $bcor = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['bgcolorarray'];
04045 //    $this->SetFillColor($bcor['R'],$bcor['G'],$bcor['B']);
04046   }
04047   else {
04048     $this->SetFillColor(255);
04049     $fill = 0;
04050   }
04051 
04052   // mPDF 4.0
04053 //  if ($this->ws != 0) { $this->_out('BT 0 Tw ET'); }
04054 //  $this->ws=0;
04055 //  if ($this->charspacing != 0) { $this->_out('BT 0 Tc ET'); }
04056 //  $this->charspacing=0;
04057 
04058   // mPDF 4.3.003
04059   // Right trim content and adjust width if need to justify (later)
04060   if (!$endofblock && $align=='J' && ($next=='image' || $next=='select' || $next=='input' || $next=='textarea' || ($next=='br' && $this->justifyB4br))) {
04061     if (preg_match('/[ ]+$/',$content[count($content)-1], $m)) {
04062       $strip = strlen($m[0]);
04063       $content[count($content)-1] = substr($content[count($content)-1],0,(strlen($content[count($content)-1])-$strip));
04064       $this->restoreFont( $font[ count($content)-1 ],false );
04065       $contentWidth -= $this->GetStringWidth($m[0]) * $this->k;
04066     }
04067   }
04068 
04069   // the amount of space taken up so far in user units
04070   $usedWidth = 0;
04071 
04072   // COLS
04073   $oldcolumn = $this->CurrCol;
04074 
04075   if ($this->ColActive && !$is_table) { $this->breakpoints[$this->CurrCol][] = $this->y; }  // *COLUMNS*
04076 
04077   // Print out each chunk
04078 
04079 /*-- TABLES --*/
04080   if ($is_table) { 
04081     $ipaddingL = 0; 
04082     $ipaddingR = 0; 
04083     $paddingL = 0;
04084     $paddingR = 0;
04085   } 
04086   else { 
04087 /*-- END TABLES --*/
04088     $ipaddingL = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_left']; 
04089     $ipaddingR = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_right']; 
04090     $paddingL = ($ipaddingL * $this->k); 
04091     $paddingR = ($ipaddingR * $this->k);
04092     $this->cMarginL =  $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_left']['w'];
04093     $this->cMarginR =  $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_right']['w'];
04094 
04095     // Added mPDF 3.0 Float DIV
04096     $fpaddingR = 0;
04097     $fpaddingL = 0;
04098 /*-- CSS-FLOAT --*/
04099     if (count($this->floatDivs)) {
04100       list($l_exists, $r_exists, $l_max, $r_max, $l_width, $r_width) = $this->GetFloatDivInfo($this->blklvl);
04101       if ($r_exists) { $fpaddingR = $r_width; }
04102       if ($l_exists) { $fpaddingL = $l_width; }
04103     }
04104 /*-- END CSS-FLOAT --*/
04105 
04106     $usey = $this->y + 0.002;
04107     if (($newblock) && ($blockstate==1 || $blockstate==3) && ($lineCount == 0) ) { 
04108       $usey += $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['margin_top'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_top'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_top']['w'];
04109     }
04110 /*-- CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT --*/
04111     // If float exists at this level
04112     if (isset($this->floatmargins['R']) && $usey <= $this->floatmargins['R']['y1'] && $usey >= $this->floatmargins['R']['y0'] && !$this->floatmargins['R']['skipline']) { $fpaddingR += $this->floatmargins['R']['w']; }
04113     if (isset($this->floatmargins['L']) && $usey <= $this->floatmargins['L']['y1'] && $usey >= $this->floatmargins['L']['y0'] && !$this->floatmargins['L']['skipline']) { $fpaddingL += $this->floatmargins['L']['w']; }
04114 /*-- END CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT --*/
04115   } // *TABLES*
04116 
04117     // Set Current lineheight (correction factor)
04118     $lhfixed = false; 
04119 /*-- LISTS --*/
04120     if ($is_list) {
04121       if (preg_match('/([0-9.,]+)mm/',$this->list_lineheight[$this->listlvl][$this->listOcc],$am)) { 
04122         $lhfixed = true; 
04123         $def_fontsize = $this->InlineProperties['LISTITEM'][$this->listlvl][$this->listOcc][$this->listnum]['size'];
04124         $this->lineheight_correction = $am[1] / $def_fontsize ;
04125       }
04126       else { 
04127         $this->lineheight_correction = $this->list_lineheight[$this->listlvl][$this->listOcc]; 
04128       }
04129     }
04130     else
04131 /*-- END LISTS --*/
04132 /*-- TABLES --*/
04133     if ($is_table) {
04134       if (preg_match('/([0-9.,]+)mm/',$this->table_lineheight,$am)) { 
04135         $lhfixed = true; 
04136         $def_fontsize = $this->FontSize;        // needs to be default font-size for block ****
04137         $this->lineheight_correction = $lineHeight / $def_fontsize ; 
04138       }
04139       else { 
04140         $this->lineheight_correction = $this->table_lineheight; 
04141       }
04142     }
04143     else
04144 /*-- END TABLES --*/
04145     if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['line_height']) && $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['line_height']) {
04146       if (preg_match('/([0-9.,]+)mm/',$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['line_height'],$am)) { 
04147         $lhfixed = true; 
04148         $def_fontsize = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['InlineProperties']['size'];  // needs to be default font-size for block ****
04149         $this->lineheight_correction = $am[1] / $def_fontsize ;
04150       }
04151       else { 
04152         $this->lineheight_correction = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['line_height']; 
04153       }
04154     } 
04155     else {
04156       $this->lineheight_correction = $this->normalLineheight; 
04157     }
04158 
04159     // mPDF 4.2
04160     //  correct lineheight to maximum fontsize
04161     if ($lhfixed) { $maxlineHeight = $this->lineheight; }
04162     else { $maxlineHeight = 0; }
04163     $this->forceExactLineheight = true;
04164     $maxfontsize = 0;
04165     foreach ( $content as $k => $chunk )
04166     {
04167               $this->restoreFont( $font[ $k ],false );
04168       if (!isset($this->objectbuffer[$k])) { 
04169 /*-- UNICODE-FONTS --*/
04170       if ($this->is_MB) {
04171             $content[$k] = $chunk = str_replace("\xc2\xad",'',$chunk ); 
04172       }
04173       // mPDF 3.0 Soft Hyphens chr(173)
04174       else
04175 /*-- END UNICODE-FONTS --*/
04176       if ($this->FontFamily!='symbol' && $this->FontFamily!='zapfdingbats') {
04177             $content[$k] = $chunk = str_replace($this->chrs[173],'',$chunk );
04178       }
04179       // Special case of sub/sup carried over on its own to last line
04180       if (($this->SUB || $this->SUP) && count($content)==1) { $actfs = $this->FontSize*100/55; } // 55% is font change for sub/sup
04181       else { $actfs = $this->FontSize; }
04182       // mPDF 4.2
04183       if (!$lhfixed) { $maxlineHeight = max($maxlineHeight,$actfs * $this->lineheight_correction ); }
04184       if ($lhfixed && ($actfs > $def_fontsize || ($actfs > ($lineHeight * $this->lineheight_correction) && $is_list))) { 
04185         $this->forceExactLineheight = false; 
04186       }
04187       $maxfontsize = max($maxfontsize,$actfs);
04188       }
04189     }
04190 
04191     // mPDF 4.2 $lastitalic to shorten if line ends with artificial ITALIC
04192     $lastfontreqstyle = $font[count($font)-1]['ReqFontStyle'];
04193     $lastfontstyle = $font[count($font)-1]['style'];
04194     if ($this->directionality == 'ltr' && strpos($lastfontreqstyle,"I") !== false && strpos($lastfontstyle,"I") === false) {  // Artificial italic
04195       $lastitalic = $this->FontSize*0.15*$this->k;
04196     }
04197     else { $lastitalic = 0; }
04198 
04199 
04200 /*-- LISTS --*/
04201     // mPDF 4.2 Moved here from later
04202     if ($is_list && is_array($this->bulletarray) && count($this->bulletarray)) {
04203         $actfs = $this->bulletarray['fontsize'];
04204       if (!$lhfixed) { $maxlineHeight = max($maxlineHeight,$actfs * $this->lineheight_correction );  }  // mPDF 4.2
04205       if ($lhfixed && $actfs > $def_fontsize) { $this->forceExactLineheight = false; }
04206       $maxfontsize = max($maxfontsize,$actfs);
04207     }
04208 /*-- END LISTS --*/
04209 
04210     // when every text item checked i.e. $maxfontsize is set properly
04211 
04212     $af = 0;  // Above font
04213     $bf = 0;  // Below font
04214     $mta = 0; // Maximum top-aligned 
04215     $mba = 0; // Maximum bottom-aligned 
04216 
04217     foreach ( $content as $k => $chunk )
04218     {
04219       if (isset($this->objectbuffer[$k])) { 
04220       $oh = $this->objectbuffer[$k]['OUTER-HEIGHT'];
04221       $va = $this->objectbuffer[$k]['vertical-align']; // = $objattr['vertical-align'] = set as M,T,B,S
04222       if ($lhfixed && $oh > $def_fontsize) { $this->forceExactLineheight = false; }
04223 
04224       if ($va == 'BS') {  //  (BASELINE default)
04225         $af = max($af, ($oh - ($maxfontsize * (0.5 + $this->baselineC))));
04226       }
04227       else if ($va == 'M') { 
04228         $af = max($af, ($oh - $maxfontsize)/2);
04229         $bf = max($bf, ($oh - $maxfontsize)/2);
04230       }
04231       else if ($va == 'TT') { 
04232         $bf = max($bf, ($oh - $maxfontsize));
04233       }
04234       else if ($va == 'TB') { 
04235         $af = max($af, ($oh - $maxfontsize));
04236       }
04237       else if ($va == 'T') { 
04238         $mta = max($mta, $oh);
04239       }
04240       else if ($va == 'B') { 
04241         $mba = max($mba, $oh);
04242       }
04243       }
04244     }
04245     if ((!$lhfixed || !$this->forceExactLineheight) && ($af > (($maxlineHeight - $maxfontsize)/2) || $bf > (($maxlineHeight - $maxfontsize)/2))) {
04246       $maxlineHeight = $maxfontsize + $af + $bf;
04247     }
04248     else if (!$lhfixed) { $af = $bf = ($maxlineHeight - $maxfontsize)/2; }
04249     if ($mta > $maxlineHeight) { 
04250       $bf += ($mta - $maxlineHeight);
04251       $maxlineHeight = $mta;
04252     }
04253     if ($mba > $maxlineHeight) { 
04254       $af += ($mba - $maxlineHeight);
04255       $maxlineHeight = $mba;
04256     }
04257 
04258     $lineHeight = $maxlineHeight;
04259     // mPDF 4.2 If NOT images, and maxfontsize NOT > lineHeight - this value determines text baseline positioning
04260     if ($lhfixed && $af==0 && $bf==0 && $maxfontsize<=($def_fontsize * $this->lineheight_correction * 0.8 )) { 
04261       $this->linemaxfontsize = $def_fontsize; 
04262     }
04263     else { $this->linemaxfontsize = $maxfontsize; }
04264 
04265     // Get PAGEBREAK TO TEST for height including the bottom border/padding
04266     $check_h = max($this->divheight,$lineHeight);
04267 
04268     if ($this->blklvl > 0 && !$is_table) { 
04269        if ($endofblock && $blockstate > 1) { 
04270       if ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['page_break_after_avoid']) {  $check_h += $lineHeight; }
04271       $check_h += ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_bottom'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_bottom']['w']);
04272        }
04273        if (($newblock && ($blockstate==1 || $blockstate==3) && $lineCount == 0) || ($endofblock && $blockstate > 1 && $lineCount == 0)) { 
04274       $check_h += ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_top'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['margin_top'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_top']['w']);
04275        }
04276     }
04277 
04278     // mPDF 4.2 Force PAGE break if column height cannot take check-height
04279     if ($this->ColActive && $check_h > ($this->PageBreakTrigger - $this->y0)) { $this->CurrCol = $this->NbCol; } 
04280 
04281     // PAGEBREAK
04282     //'If' below used in order to fix "first-line of other page with justify on" bug
04283     // mPDF 4.2.008 Disable in Tables
04284     if(!$is_table && $this->y+$check_h > $this->PageBreakTrigger and !$this->InFooter and $this->AcceptPageBreak()) {
04285               $bak_x=$this->x;//Current X position
04286       // WORD SPACING
04287       $ws=$this->ws;//Word Spacing
04288       $charspacing=$this->charspacing;//Character Spacing
04289       // mPDF 4.0
04290       $this->ResetSpacing();
04291 
04292           $this->AddPage($this->CurOrientation);
04293 
04294           $this->x=$bak_x;
04295       // Added to correct for OddEven Margins
04296       $currentx += $this->MarginCorrection;
04297       $this->x += $this->MarginCorrection;
04298 
04299       // WORD SPACING
04300       // mPDF 4.0
04301       $this->SetSpacing($charspacing,$ws);
04302     }
04303 
04304 /*-- COLUMNS --*/
04305     // COLS
04306     // COLUMN CHANGE
04307     if ($this->CurrCol != $oldcolumn) {
04308       $currentx += $this->ChangeColumn * ($this->ColWidth+$this->ColGap);
04309       $this->x += $this->ChangeColumn * ($this->ColWidth+$this->ColGap);
04310 
04311       $oldcolumn = $this->CurrCol;
04312     }
04313 
04314     if ($this->ColActive && !$is_table) { $this->breakpoints[$this->CurrCol][] = $this->y; }
04315 /*-- END COLUMNS --*/
04316 
04317     // TOP MARGIN
04318     if ($newblock && ($blockstate==1 || $blockstate==3) && ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['margin_top']) && $lineCount == 0 && !$is_table && !$is_list) { 
04319       $this->DivLn($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['margin_top'],$this->blklvl-1,true,$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['margin_collapse']); 
04320       if ($this->ColActive) { $this->breakpoints[$this->CurrCol][] = $this->y; }  // *COLUMNS*
04321     }
04322 
04323     if ($newblock && ($blockstate==1 || $blockstate==3) && $lineCount == 0 && !$is_table && !$is_list) { 
04324       $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['y0'] = $this->y;
04325       $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['startpage'] = $this->page;
04326       if ($this->ColActive) { $this->breakpoints[$this->CurrCol][] = $this->y; }  // *COLUMNS*
04327     }
04328 
04329   // ADDED for Paragraph_indent
04330   $WidthCorrection = 0;
04331   if (($newblock) && ($blockstate==1 || $blockstate==3) && isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['text_indent']) && ($lineCount == 0) && (!$is_table) && (!$is_list) && ($align != 'C')) { 
04332     // mPDF 4.0
04333     $ti = $this->ConvertSize($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['text_indent'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false); 
04334     $WidthCorrection = ($ti*$this->k); 
04335   } 
04336 
04337 
04338   // PADDING and BORDER spacing/fill
04339   if (($newblock) && ($blockstate==1 || $blockstate==3) && (($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_top']) || ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_top'])) && ($lineCount == 0) && (!$is_table) && (!$is_list)) { 
04340       // mPDF 3.0 Also does border when Columns active
04341       // $state = 0 normal; 1 top; 2 bottom; 3 top and bottom
04342       $this->DivLn($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_top'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_top']['w'],-3,true,false,1); 
04343       if ($this->ColActive) { $this->breakpoints[$this->CurrCol][] = $this->y; }  // *COLUMNS*
04344       $this->x = $currentx;
04345   }
04346 
04347 
04348   // Added mPDF 3.0 Float DIV
04349   $fpaddingR = 0;
04350   $fpaddingL = 0;
04351 /*-- CSS-FLOAT --*/
04352   if (count($this->floatDivs)) {
04353     list($l_exists, $r_exists, $l_max, $r_max, $l_width, $r_width) = $this->GetFloatDivInfo($this->blklvl);
04354     if ($r_exists) { $fpaddingR = $r_width; }
04355     if ($l_exists) { $fpaddingL = $l_width; }
04356   }
04357 /*-- END CSS-FLOAT --*/
04358 
04359   $usey = $this->y + 0.002;
04360   if (($newblock) && ($blockstate==1 || $blockstate==3) && ($lineCount == 0) ) { 
04361     $usey += $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['margin_top'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_top'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_top']['w'];
04362   }
04363 /*-- CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT --*/
04364   // If float exists at this level
04365   if (isset($this->floatmargins['R']) && $usey <= $this->floatmargins['R']['y1'] && $usey >= $this->floatmargins['R']['y0'] && !$this->floatmargins['R']['skipline']) { $fpaddingR += $this->floatmargins['R']['w']; }
04366   if (isset($this->floatmargins['L']) && $usey <= $this->floatmargins['L']['y1'] && $usey >= $this->floatmargins['L']['y0'] && !$this->floatmargins['L']['skipline']) { $fpaddingL += $this->floatmargins['L']['w']; }
04367 /*-- END CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT --*/
04368 
04369   if ($content) {
04370     // mPDF 4.2 $lastitalic to shorten if line ends with artificial ITALIC
04371     $empty = $maxWidth - $lastitalic-$WidthCorrection - $contentWidth - (($this->cMarginL+$this->cMarginR)* $this->k) - ($paddingL+$paddingR +(($fpaddingL + $fpaddingR) * $this->k) );
04372     $empty /= $this->k;
04373 
04374     // In FinishFlowing Block no lines are justified as it is always last line
04375     // but if orphansAllowed have allowed content width to go over max width, use J charspacing to compress line
04376     // JUSTIFICATION J - NOT!
04377     $nb_carac = 0;
04378     $nb_spaces = 0;
04379     foreach ( $content as $k => $chunk ) {
04380       if (!isset($this->objectbuffer[$k]) || (isset($this->objectbuffer[$k]) && !$this->objectbuffer[$k])) {
04381 /*-- UNICODE-FONTS --*/
04382         if ($this->is_MB) {
04383               $chunk = str_replace($this->chrs[194].$this->chrs[160],$this->chrs[32],$chunk ); 
04384         }
04385         else {
04386 /*-- END UNICODE-FONTS --*/
04387               $chunk = str_replace($this->chrs[160],$this->chrs[32],$chunk );
04388         } // *UNICODE-FONTS*
04389         $nb_carac += mb_strlen( $chunk, $this->mb_enc );  
04390         $nb_spaces += mb_substr_count( $chunk,' ', $this->mb_enc );  
04391       }
04392     }
04393     // if it's justified, we need to find the char/word spacing (or if orphans have allowed length of line to go over the maxwidth)
04394     // If "orphans" in fact is just a final space - ignore this
04395     // mPDF 4.2 $lastitalic to shorten if line ends with artificial ITALIC
04396     // mPDF 4.3.003  Justify line if following is object - image etc.
04397     if (((($contentWidth + $lastitalic) > $maxWidth) && ($content[count($content)-1] != ' ') )  ||
04398       (!$endofblock && $align=='J' && ($next=='image' || $next=='select' || $next=='input' || $next=='textarea' || ($next=='br' && $this->justifyB4br)))
04399       ) {
04400       // WORD SPACING
04401       // mPDF 4.2 $lastitalic to shorten if line ends with artificial ITALIC
04402       list($charspacing,$ws) = $this->GetJspacing($nb_carac,$nb_spaces,($maxWidth-$lastitalic-$contentWidth-$WidthCorrection-(($this->cMarginL+$this->cMarginR)*$this->k)-($paddingL+$paddingR +(($fpaddingL + $fpaddingR) * $this->k) )));
04403       // mPDF 4.0
04404       $this->SetSpacing($charspacing,$ws);
04405     }
04406     // mPDF 4.0 Check if will fit at word/char spacing of previous line - if so continue it
04407     // but only allow a maximum of $this->jSmaxWordLast and $this->jSmaxCharLast
04408     // mPDF 4.2 $lastitalic to shorten if line ends with artificial ITALIC
04409     else if ($contentWidth < ($maxWidth - $lastitalic-$WidthCorrection - (($this->cMarginL+$this->cMarginR)* $this->k) - ($paddingL+$paddingR +(($fpaddingL + $fpaddingR) * $this->k)))) {
04410       if ($this->ws > $this->jSmaxWordLast) {
04411         $ws=$this->jSmaxWord;
04412         $this->_out(sprintf('BT %.3f Tw ET',$ws)); 
04413         $this->ws=$ws;
04414       }
04415       if ($this->charspacing > $this->jSmaxCharLast) {
04416         $charspacing=$this->jSmaxCharLast;
04417         $this->_out(sprintf('BT %.3f Tc ET',$charspacing)); 
04418         $this->charspacing=$charspacing;
04419       }
04420       // mPDF 4.2 $lastitalic to shorten if line ends with artificial ITALIC
04421       $check = $maxWidth - $lastitalic-$WidthCorrection - $contentWidth - (($this->cMarginL+$this->cMarginR)* $this->k) - ($paddingL+$paddingR +(($fpaddingL + $fpaddingR) * $this->k) ) - ( $this->charspacing * $nb_carac) - ( $this->ws * $nb_spaces);
04422       if ($check <= 0) {
04423         // mPDF 4.0
04424         $this->ResetSpacing();
04425       }
04426     }
04427     else {
04428       // mPDF 4.0
04429       $this->ResetSpacing();
04430     }
04431 
04432     // mPDF 4.2 $lastitalic to shorten if line ends with artificial ITALIC
04433     $empty = $maxWidth - $lastitalic-$WidthCorrection - $contentWidth - (($this->cMarginL+$this->cMarginR)* $this->k) - ($paddingL+$paddingR +(($fpaddingL + $fpaddingR) * $this->k) ) - ( $this->charspacing * $nb_carac) - ( $this->ws * $nb_spaces);
04434     $empty /= $this->k;
04435 
04436     // mPDF 4.0
04437     if (!$is_table) { 
04438       $this->maxPosR = max($this->maxPosR , ($this->w - $this->rMargin - $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['outer_right_margin'] - $empty));
