04439       $this->maxPosL = min($this->maxPosL , ($this->lMargin + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['outer_left_margin'] + $empty)); 
04440     }
04441 
04442     $arraysize = count($content);
04443 
04444     $margins = ($this->cMarginL+$this->cMarginR) + ($ipaddingL+$ipaddingR + $fpaddingR + $fpaddingR );
04445 
04446     if (!$is_table) { $this->DivLn($lineHeight,$this->blklvl,false); }  // false -> don't advance y
04447 
04448     // DIRECTIONALITY RTL
04449     $all_rtl = false;
04450     $contains_rtl = false;
04451 /*-- RTL --*/
04452       if (($this->directionality == 'rtl') || (($this->directionality == 'ltr') && ($this->biDirectional)))  { 
04453       $all_rtl = true;
04454       foreach ( $content as $k => $chunk ) {
04455         $reversed = $this->magic_reverse_dir($chunk, false);
04456         if ($reversed > 0) { $contains_rtl = true; }
04457         if ($reversed < 2) { $all_rtl = false; }
04458         $content[$k] = $chunk;
04459       }
04460       if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { 
04461         if ($contains_rtl) {
04462           $content = array_reverse($content,false);
04463         }
04464       }
04465       else if (($this->directionality == 'ltr') && ($this->biDirectional)) { 
04466         if ($all_rtl) {
04467           $content = array_reverse($content,false);
04468         }
04469       }
04470     }
04471 /*-- END RTL --*/
04472 
04473 
04474     $this->x = $currentx + $this->cMarginL + $ipaddingL + $fpaddingL;
04475     if ($align == 'R') { $this->x += $empty; }
04476     else if ($align == 'J') {
04477       if ($this->directionality == 'rtl' && $contains_rtl) { $this->x += $empty; }
04478       else if ($this->directionality == 'ltr' && $all_rtl) { $this->x += $empty; }
04479     }
04480     else if ($align == 'C') { $this->x += ($empty / 2); }
04481 
04482     // Paragraph INDENT
04483     $WidthCorrection = 0; 
04484     if (($newblock) && ($blockstate==1 || $blockstate==3) && isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['text_indent']) && ($lineCount == 0) && (!$is_table) && (!$is_list) && ($align !='C')) { 
04485       // mPDF 4.0
04486       $ti = $this->ConvertSize($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['text_indent'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false); 
04487       $this->x += $ti; 
04488     }
04489 
04490 
04491           foreach ( $content as $k => $chunk )
04492           {
04493 
04494       // FOR IMAGES
04495     if (($this->directionality=='rtl' && $contains_rtl) || $all_rtl) { $dirk = $arraysize-1 - $k; } else { $dirk = $k; }
04496 
04497     // mPDF 4.2
04498     $va = 'M';  // default for text
04499     if (isset($this->objectbuffer[$dirk]) && $this->objectbuffer[$dirk]) {
04500       $xadj = $this->x - $this->objectbuffer[$dirk]['OUTER-X']; 
04501       $this->objectbuffer[$dirk]['OUTER-X'] += $xadj;
04502       $this->objectbuffer[$dirk]['BORDER-X'] += $xadj;
04503       $this->objectbuffer[$dirk]['INNER-X'] += $xadj;
04504       // mPDF 4.2
04505       $va = $this->objectbuffer[$dirk]['vertical-align'];
04506       $yadj = $this->y - $this->objectbuffer[$dirk]['OUTER-Y'];
04507       if ($va == 'BS') { 
04508         $yadj += $af + ($this->linemaxfontsize * (0.5 + $this->baselineC)) - $this->objectbuffer[$dirk]['OUTER-HEIGHT'];
04509       }
04510       else if ($va == 'M' || $va == '') { 
04511         $yadj += $af + ($this->linemaxfontsize /2) - ($this->objectbuffer[$dirk]['OUTER-HEIGHT']/2);
04512       }
04513       else if ($va == 'TB') { 
04514         $yadj += $af + $this->linemaxfontsize - $this->objectbuffer[$dirk]['OUTER-HEIGHT'];
04515       }
04516       else if ($va == 'TT') { 
04517         $yadj += $af;
04518       }
04519       else if ($va == 'B') { 
04520         $yadj += $af + $this->linemaxfontsize + $bf - $this->objectbuffer[$dirk]['OUTER-HEIGHT'];
04521       }
04522       else if ($va == 'T') { 
04523         $yadj += 0;
04524       }
04525       $this->objectbuffer[$dirk]['OUTER-Y'] += $yadj;
04526       $this->objectbuffer[$dirk]['BORDER-Y'] += $yadj;
04527       $this->objectbuffer[$dirk]['INNER-Y'] += $yadj;
04528     }
04529 
04530 
04531 
04532       // DIRECTIONALITY RTL
04533       if ((($this->directionality == 'rtl') && ($contains_rtl )) || ($all_rtl )) { $this->restoreFont( $font[ $arraysize-1 - $k ] ); }
04534       else { $this->restoreFont( $font[ $k ] ); }
04535       // *********** SPAN BACKGROUND COLOR ***************** //
04536       if (isset($this->spanbgcolor) && $this->spanbgcolor) { 
04537         $cor = $this->spanbgcolorarray;
04538         $this->SetFillColor($cor['R'],$cor['G'],$cor['B']);
04539         $save_fill = $fill; $spanfill = 1; $fill = 1;
04540       }
04541       // WORD SPACING
04542           $stringWidth = $this->GetStringWidth($chunk ) + ( $this->charspacing * mb_strlen($chunk,$this->mb_enc ) / $this->k )  
04543         + ( $this->ws * mb_substr_count($chunk,' ',$this->mb_enc ) / $this->k );
04544       if (isset($this->objectbuffer[$dirk])) { 
04545         // mPDF 4.2.031
04546         if ($this->objectbuffer[$dirk]['type']=='dottab') { 
04547           $this->objectbuffer[$dirk]['OUTER-WIDTH'] +=$empty; 
04548         }
04549         $stringWidth = $this->objectbuffer[$dirk]['OUTER-WIDTH'];
04550       }
04551 
04552       // mPDF 4.2 af , bf above and below font
04553       if ($k == $arraysize-1) $this->Cell( $stringWidth, $lineHeight, $chunk, '', 1, '', $fill, $this->HREF , $currentx,0,0,'M', $fill, $af, $bf ); //mono-style line or last part (skips line)
04554       else $this->Cell( $stringWidth, $lineHeight, $chunk, '', 0, '', $fill, $this->HREF, 0, 0,0,'M', $fill, $af, $bf );//first or middle part
04555 
04556 
04557       // *********** SPAN BACKGROUND COLOR OFF - RESET BLOCK BGCOLOR ***************** //
04558       if (isset($spanfill) && $spanfill) { 
04559         $fill = $save_fill; $spanfill = 0; 
04560         if ($fill) { $this->SetFillColor($bcor['R'],$bcor['G'],$bcor['B']); }
04561       }
04562           }
04563 
04564   $this->printobjectbuffer($is_table);
04565 
04566 
04567   $this->objectbuffer = array();
04568 
04569   // mPDF 4.0
04570   $this->ResetSpacing();
04571 
04572 /*-- LISTS --*/
04573   // LIST BULLETS/NUMBERS
04574   if ($is_list && is_array($this->bulletarray) && ($lineCount == 0) ) {
04575     // mPDF 4.0
04576     $savedFont = $this->saveFont();
04577 
04578     $bull = $this->bulletarray;
04579     if (isset($bull['level']) && isset($bull['occur']) && isset($this->InlineProperties['LIST'][$bull['level']][$bull['occur']])) { 
04580     $this->restoreInlineProperties($this->InlineProperties['LIST'][$bull['level']][$bull['occur']]); 
04581     }
04582     if (isset($bull['level']) && isset($bull['occur']) && isset($bull['num']) && isset($this->InlineProperties['LISTITEM'][$bull['level']][$bull['occur']][$bull['num']]) && $this->InlineProperties['LISTITEM'][$bull['level']][$bull['occur']][$bull['num']]) { $this->restoreInlineProperties($this->InlineProperties['LISTITEM'][$bull['level']][$bull['occur']][$bull['num']]); }
04583     if (isset($bull['font']) && $bull['font'] == 'zapfdingbats') {
04584     $this->bullet = true;
04585     $this->SetFont('zapfdingbats','',$this->FontSizePt/2.5);
04586     }
04587     else { $this->SetFont($this->FontFamily,$this->FontStyle,$this->FontSizePt,true,true); }  // force output
04588         //Output bullet
04589     $this->x = $currentx;
04590     if (isset($bull['x'])) { $this->x += $bull['x']; }
04591     $this->y -= $lineHeight;
04592     // mPDF 4.0
04593         if (isset($bull['txt'])) { $this->Cell($bull['w'], $lineHeight,$bull['txt'],'','',$bull['align'],0,'',0,-$this->cMarginL, -$this->cMarginR ); }
04594     if (isset($bull['font']) && $bull['font'] == 'zapfdingbats') {
04595     $this->bullet = false;
04596     }
04597     $this->x = $currentx; // Reset
04598     $this->y += $lineHeight;
04599 
04600     if ($this->ColActive && !$is_table) { $this->breakpoints[$this->CurrCol][] = $this->y; }  // *COLUMNS*
04601 
04602     // mPDF 3.0 ? does nothing as $savedFont is not defined
04603     // mPDF 4.0
04604      $this->restoreFont( $savedFont );
04605     // $font = array( $savedFont );
04606 
04607     $this->bulletarray = array(); // prevents repeat of bullet/number if <li>....<br />.....</li>
04608   }
04609 /*-- END LISTS --*/
04610 
04611 
04612   } // END IF CONTENT
04613 
04614 /*-- CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT --*/
04615   // Update values if set to skipline
04616   if ($this->floatmargins) { $this->_advanceFloatMargins(); }
04617 
04618 
04619   if ($endofblock && $blockstate>1) { 
04620     // If float exists at this level
04621     if (isset($this->floatmargins['R']['y1'])) { $fry1 = $this->floatmargins['R']['y1']; }
04622     else { $fry1 = 0; }
04623     if (isset($this->floatmargins['L']['y1'])) { $fly1 = $this->floatmargins['L']['y1']; }
04624     else { $fly1 = 0; }
04625     if ($this->y < $fry1 || $this->y < $fly1) { 
04626       $drop = max($fry1,$fly1) - $this->y;
04627       $this->DivLn($drop); 
04628       $this->x = $currentx;
04629     }
04630   }
04631 /*-- END CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT --*/
04632 
04633 
04634   // PADDING and BORDER spacing/fill
04635   if ($endofblock && ($blockstate > 1) && ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_bottom'] || $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_bottom'] || $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['css_set_height']) && (!$is_table) && (!$is_list)) { 
04636       // mPDF 4.0 If CSS height set, extend bottom - if on same page as block started, and CSS HEIGHT > actual height, 
04637       //  and does not force pagebreak
04638       $extra = 0;
04639       if ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['css_set_height'] && $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['startpage']==$this->page) {
04640         // predicted height
04641         $h1 = ($this->y-$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['y0']) + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_bottom'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_bottom']['w'];
04642         if ($h1 < $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['css_set_height']) { $extra = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['css_set_height'] - $h1; }
04643         if($this->y + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_bottom'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_bottom']['w'] + $extra > $this->PageBreakTrigger) {
04644           $extra = $this->PageBreakTrigger - ($this->y + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_bottom'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_bottom']['w']); 
04645         }
04646       }
04647 
04648       // mPDF 3.0 Also does border when Columns active
04649       // $state = 0 normal; 1 top; 2 bottom; 3 top and bottom
04650       $this->DivLn($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_bottom'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_bottom']['w'] + $extra,-3,true,false,2); 
04651       $this->x = $currentx;
04652 
04653       if ($this->ColActive) { $this->breakpoints[$this->CurrCol][] = $this->y; }  // *COLUMNS*
04654 
04655   }
04656 
04657   // SET Bottom y1 of block (used for painting borders)
04658   if (($endofblock) && ($blockstate > 1) && (!$is_table) && (!$is_list)) { 
04659     $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['y1'] = $this->y;
04660   }
04661 
04662   // BOTTOM MARGIN
04663   if (($endofblock) && ($blockstate > 1) && ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['margin_bottom']) && (!$is_table) && (!$is_list)) { 
04664     if($this->y+$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['margin_bottom'] < $this->PageBreakTrigger and !$this->InFooter) {
04665       $this->DivLn($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['margin_bottom'],$this->blklvl-1,true,$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['margin_collapse']); 
04666       if ($this->ColActive) { $this->breakpoints[$this->CurrCol][] = $this->y; }  // *COLUMNS*
04667     }
04668   }
04669 
04670   // Reset lineheight
04671   $lineHeight = $this->divheight;
04672 }
04673 
04674 
04675 
04676 
04677 
04678 function printobjectbuffer($is_table=false) {
04679     if ($is_table && $this->shrin_k > 1) { $k = $this->shrin_k; } 
04680     else { $k = 1; }
04681     $save_y = $this->y;
04682     $save_x = $this->x;
04683     $save_currentfontfamily = $this->FontFamily;
04684     $save_currentfontsize = $this->FontSizePt;
04685     $save_currentfontstyle = $this->FontStyle.($this->underline ? 'U' : '');
04686     if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { $rtlalign = 'R'; } else { $rtlalign = 'L'; }
04687     foreach ($this->objectbuffer AS $ib => $objattr) { 
04688            // mPDF 3.0
04689        if ($objattr['type'] == 'bookmark' || $objattr['type'] == 'indexentry' || $objattr['type'] == 'toc') {
04690       $x = $objattr['OUTER-X']; 
04691       $y = $objattr['OUTER-Y'];
04692       $this->y = $y - $this->FontSize/2;
04693       $this->x = $x;
04694       if ($objattr['type'] == 'bookmark' ) { $this->Bookmark($objattr['CONTENT'],$objattr['bklevel'] ,$y - $this->FontSize); }  // *BOOKMARKS*
04695       if ($objattr['type'] == 'indexentry') { $this->IndexEntry($objattr['CONTENT']); } // *INDEX*
04696       if ($objattr['type'] == 'toc') { $this->TOC_Entry($objattr['CONTENT'], $objattr['toclevel'], $objattr['toc_id']); } // *TOC*
04697        }
04698 /*-- ANNOTATIONS --*/
04699        else if ($objattr['type'] == 'annot') {
04700       if ($objattr['POS-X']) { $x = $objattr['POS-X']; }
04701       else if ($this->annotMargin<>0) { $x = -$objattr['OUTER-X']; }
04702       else { $x = $objattr['OUTER-X']; }
04703       if ($objattr['POS-Y']) { $y = $objattr['POS-Y']; }
04704       else { $y = $objattr['OUTER-Y'] - $this->FontSize/2; }
04705       // Create a dummy entry in the _out/columnBuffer with position sensitive data,
04706       // linking $y-1 in the Columnbuffer with entry in $this->columnAnnots
04707       // and when columns are split in length will not break annotation from current line
04708       $this->y = $y-1;
04709       $this->x = $x-1;
04710       $this->Line($x-1,$y-1,$x-1,$y-1);
04711       $this->Annotation($objattr['CONTENT'], $x , $y , $objattr['ICON'], $objattr['AUTHOR'], $objattr['SUBJECT'], $objattr['OPACITY'], $objattr['COLOR'], $objattr['POPUP']); // mPDF 4.2.027
04712        }
04713 /*-- END ANNOTATIONS --*/
04714        else { 
04715       $y = $objattr['OUTER-Y'];
04716       $x = $objattr['OUTER-X'];
04717       $w = $objattr['OUTER-WIDTH'];
04718       $h = $objattr['OUTER-HEIGHT'];
04719       if (isset($objattr['text'])) { $texto = $objattr['text']; }
04720       $this->y = $y;
04721       $this->x = $x;
04722       if (isset($objattr['fontfamily'])) { $this->SetFont($objattr['fontfamily'],'',$objattr['fontsize'] ); }
04723        }
04724 
04725     // HR
04726        if ($objattr['type'] == 'hr') {
04727       $this->SetDrawColor($objattr['color']['R'],$objattr['color']['G'],$objattr['color']['B']);
04728       switch($objattr['align']) {
04729               case 'C':
04730                   $empty = $objattr['OUTER-WIDTH'] - $objattr['INNER-WIDTH'];
04731                   $empty /= 2;
04732                   $x += $empty;
04733                     break;
04734               case 'R':
04735                   $empty = $objattr['OUTER-WIDTH'] - $objattr['INNER-WIDTH'];
04736                   $x += $empty;
04737                   break;
04738       }
04739           $oldlinewidth = $this->LineWidth;
04740       $this->SetLineWidth($objattr['linewidth']/$k );
04741       $this->y += ($objattr['linewidth']/2) + $objattr['margin_top']/$k;
04742       $this->Line($x,$this->y,$x+$objattr['INNER-WIDTH'],$this->y);
04743       $this->SetLineWidth($oldlinewidth);
04744       $this->SetDrawColor(0);
04745        }
04746     // IMAGE
04747        if ($objattr['type'] == 'image') {
04748       if (isset($objattr['opacity'])) { $this->SetAlpha($objattr['opacity']); }
04749       // mPDF 4.3.016
04750       $rotate = 0;
04751       $obiw = $objattr['INNER-WIDTH'];
04752       $obih = $objattr['INNER-HEIGHT'];
04753       $sx = $objattr['INNER-WIDTH']*$this->k / $objattr['orig_w'];
04754       $sy = abs($objattr['INNER-HEIGHT'])*$this->k / abs($objattr['orig_h']);
04755       $sx = ($objattr['INNER-WIDTH']*$this->k / $objattr['orig_w']);
04756       $sy = ($objattr['INNER-HEIGHT']*$this->k / $objattr['orig_h']);
04757 
04758       if (isset($objattr['ROTATE'])) { $rotate = $objattr['ROTATE']; }
04759       if ($rotate==90) { 
04760         // Clockwise
04761         $obiw = $objattr['INNER-HEIGHT'];
04762         $obih = $objattr['INNER-WIDTH'];
04763         $tr = $this->transformTranslate(0, -$objattr['INNER-WIDTH'], true) ;
04764         $tr .= ' '. $this->transformRotate(90, $objattr['INNER-X'],($objattr['INNER-Y'] +$objattr['INNER-WIDTH'] ),true) ;
04765         $sx = $obiw*$this->k / $objattr['orig_h'];
04766         $sy = abs($obih)*$this->k / abs($objattr['orig_w']);
04767       }
04768       else if ($rotate==-90) { 
04769         // AntiClockwise
04770         $obiw = $objattr['INNER-HEIGHT'];
04771         $obih = $objattr['INNER-WIDTH'];
04772         $tr = $this->transformTranslate($objattr['INNER-WIDTH'], ($objattr['INNER-HEIGHT']-$objattr['INNER-WIDTH']), true) ;
04773         $tr .= ' '. $this->transformRotate(-90, $objattr['INNER-X'],($objattr['INNER-Y'] +$objattr['INNER-WIDTH'] ),true) ;
04774         $sx = $obiw*$this->k / $objattr['orig_h'];
04775         $sy = abs($obih)*$this->k / abs($objattr['orig_w']);
04776       }
04777       else if ($rotate==180) { 
04778         // Mirror
04779         $tr = $this->transformTranslate($objattr['INNER-WIDTH'], -$objattr['INNER-HEIGHT'], true) ;
04780         $tr .= ' '. $this->transformRotate(180, $objattr['INNER-X'],($objattr['INNER-Y'] +$objattr['INNER-HEIGHT'] ),true) ;
04781       }
04782       else { $tr = ''; }
04783 /*-- IMAGES-WMF --*/
04784       if (isset($objattr['itype']) && $objattr['itype']=='wmf') { 
04785         $outstring = sprintf('q '.$tr.' %.3f 0 0 %.3f %.3f %.3f cm /FO%d Do Q', $sx, -$sy, $objattr['INNER-X']*$this->k-$sx*$objattr['wmf_x'], (($this->h-$objattr['INNER-Y'])*$this->k)+$sy*$objattr['wmf_y'], $objattr['ID']);  // mPDF 4.3.016
04786 
04787       }
04788       else  
04789 /*-- END IMAGES-WMF --*/
04790       // mPDF 4.3.013 SVG files
04791       if (isset($objattr['itype']) && $objattr['itype']=='svg') { 
04792         $outstring = sprintf('q '.$tr.' %.3f 0 0 %.3f %.3f %.3f cm /FO%d Do Q', $sx, -$sy, $objattr['INNER-X']*$this->k-$sx*$objattr['wmf_x'], (($this->h-$objattr['INNER-Y'])*$this->k)+$sy*$objattr['wmf_y'], $objattr['ID']);  // mPDF 4.3.016
04793       }
04794       else { 
04795         $outstring = sprintf("q ".$tr." %.3f 0 0 %.3f %.3f %.3f cm /I%d Do Q",$obiw*$this->k, $obih*$this->k, $objattr['INNER-X'] *$this->k, ($this->h-($objattr['INNER-Y'] +$obih ))*$this->k,$objattr['ID'] );  // mPDF 4.3.016
04796       }
04797       $this->_out($outstring);
04798       // LINK
04799       if (isset($objattr['link'])) $this->Link($objattr['INNER-X'],$objattr['INNER-Y'],$objattr['INNER-WIDTH'],$objattr['INNER-HEIGHT'],$objattr['link']);
04800       if (isset($objattr['BORDER-WIDTH'])) { $this->PaintImgBorder($objattr,$is_table); }
04801       if (isset($objattr['opacity'])) { $this->SetAlpha(1); }
04802        }
04803 
04804 /*-- BARCODES --*/
04805     // mPDF 4.0
04806     // BARCODE
04807        if ($objattr['type'] == 'barcode') {
04808       $bgcol = array('R'=>255, 'G'=>255, 'B'=>255);
04809       if (isset($objattr['bgcolor']) && is_array($objattr['bgcolor'])) {
04810         $bgcol = $objattr['bgcolor'];
04811       }
04812       $col = array('R'=>0, 'G'=>0, 'B'=>0);
04813       if (isset($objattr['color']) && is_array($objattr['color'])) {
04814         $col = $objattr['color'];
04815       }
04816       $this->SetFillColor($bgcol['R'],$bgcol['G'],$bgcol['B']);
04817       $this->Rect($objattr['BORDER-X'], $objattr['BORDER-Y'], $objattr['BORDER-WIDTH'], $objattr['BORDER-HEIGHT'], 'F');
04818       $this->SetFillColor(255);
04819       if (isset($objattr['BORDER-WIDTH'])) { $this->PaintImgBorder($objattr,$is_table); }
04820       if ($objattr['btype'] == 'EAN13' || $objattr['btype'] == 'ISBN' || $objattr['btype'] == 'ISSN' || $objattr['btype'] == 'UPCA' || $objattr['btype'] == 'UPCE' || $objattr['btype'] == 'EAN8') {
04821         $this->WriteBarcode($objattr['code'], $objattr['showtext'], $objattr['INNER-X'], $objattr['INNER-Y'], $objattr['bsize'], 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, $objattr['bheight'], $bgcol, $col, $objattr['btype'], $objattr['bsupp'], $objattr['bsupp_code'], $k);
04822       }
04823       else {
04824         $this->WriteBarcode2($objattr['code'], $objattr['INNER-X'], $objattr['INNER-Y'], $objattr['bsize'], $objattr['bheight'], $bgcol, $col, $objattr['btype'], $objattr['pr_ratio'], $k);
04825       }
04826        }
04827 /*-- END BARCODES --*/
04828 
04829 
04830     // mPDF 3.0 Normal spacing
04831     // mPDF 4.0
04832        $this->ResetSpacing();
04833 
04834     // mPDF 4.2.031
04835        if ($objattr['type'] == 'dottab') {
04836         $sp = $this->GetStringWidth(' ');
04837         $nb=floor(($w-2*$sp)/$this->GetStringWidth('.'));
04838         if ($nb>0) { $dots=' '.str_repeat('.',$nb).' '; }
04839         else { $dots=' '; }
04840         $this->Cell($w,$h,$dots,0,0,'C');
04841        }
04842 
04843 /*-- FORMS --*/
04844     // mPDF - 1.4 Active Forms edited all the form elements below
04845     // TEXT/PASSWORD INPUT
04846        if ($objattr['type'] == 'input' && ($objattr['subtype'] == 'TEXT' || $objattr['subtype'] == 'PASSWORD')) {
04847         $w -= $this->form_element_spacing['input']['outer']['h']*2  /$k;
04848         $h -= $this->form_element_spacing['input']['outer']['v']*2 /$k;
04849         $this->x += $this->form_element_spacing['input']['outer']['h'] /$k;
04850         $this->y += $this->form_element_spacing['input']['outer']['v'] /$k;
04851       // Chop texto to max length $w-inner-padding
04852       while ($this->GetStringWidth($texto) > $w-($this->form_element_spacing['input']['inner']['h']*2)) {
04853         $texto = mb_substr($texto,0,mb_strlen($texto,$this->mb_enc)-1,$this->mb_enc);
04854       }
04855       // DIRECTIONALITY
04856           $this->SetLineWidth(0.2 /$k );
04857         $this->magic_reverse_dir($texto, false);  // *RTL*
04858         if (isset($objattr['disabled']) && $objattr['disabled']) { 
04859           $this->SetFillColor(225);
04860           $this->SetTextColor(127);
04861         }
04862         else if (isset($objattr['readonly']) && $objattr['readonly']) { 
04863           $this->SetFillColor(225);
04864           $this->SetTextColor(0);
04865         }
04866         else {
04867           $this->SetFillColor(250);
04868           $this->SetTextColor(0);
04869         }
04870         $this->Cell($w,$h,$texto,1,0,$rtlalign,1,'',0,$this->form_element_spacing['input']['inner']['h'] /$k ,$this->form_element_spacing['input']['inner']['h'] /$k , 'M');
04871         $this->SetFillColor(255);
04872         $this->SetTextColor(0);
04873 
04874        }
04875     // SELECT
04876        if ($objattr['type'] == 'select') {
04877       // DIRECTIONALITY
04878         $this->magic_reverse_dir($texto, false);  // *RTL*
04879         $this->SetLineWidth(0.2 /$k );
04880         if (isset($objattr['disabled']) && $objattr['disabled']) { 
04881           $this->SetFillColor(225);
04882           $this->SetTextColor(127);
04883         }
04884         else {
04885           $this->SetFillColor(250);
04886           $this->SetTextColor(0);
04887         }
04888         $w -= $this->form_element_spacing['select']['outer']['h']*2 /$k ;
04889         $h -= $this->form_element_spacing['select']['outer']['v']*2 /$k ;
04890         $this->x += $this->form_element_spacing['select']['outer']['h'] /$k ;
04891         $this->y += $this->form_element_spacing['select']['outer']['v'] /$k ;
04892         $this->Cell($w-($this->FontSize*1.4),$h,$texto,1,0,$rtlalign,1,'',0,$this->form_element_spacing['select']['inner']['h'] /$k,$this->form_element_spacing['select']['inner']['h'] /$k , 'M') ;
04893         $this->SetFillColor(190);
04894         $save_font = $this->FontFamily;
04895                 $save_currentfont = $this->currentfontfamily;
04896         // mPDF 4.2.018
04897         if ($this->PDFA) {
04898         if (!$this->PDFAauto) { $this->PDFAwarnings[] = "Core Adobe font Zapfdingbats cannot be embedded in mPDF - used in Form element: Select - which is required for PDFA1-b. (Different character/font will be substituted.)"; }
04899           $this->SetFont('sans');
04900         $this->Cell(($this->FontSize*1.4),$h,'=',1,0,'C',1,'',0,0,0, 'M') ;
04901         }
04902         else {
04903           $this->SetFont('zapfdingbats','',0);
04904           $this->Cell(($this->FontSize*1.4),$h,$this->chrs[116],1,0,'C',1,'',0,0,0, 'M') ;
04905         }
04906         $this->SetFont($save_font,'',0);
04907                 $this->currentfontfamily = $save_currentfont;
04908         $this->SetFillColor(255);
04909         $this->SetTextColor(0);
04910        }
04911 
04912 
04913     // INPUT/BUTTON as IMAGE
04914        if ($objattr['type'] == 'input' && $objattr['subtype'] == 'IMAGE') {
04915       $this->y = $objattr['INNER-Y'];
04916       $this->_out( sprintf("q %.3f 0 0 %.3f %.3f %.3f cm /I%d Do Q",$objattr['INNER-WIDTH'] *$this->k,$objattr['INNER-HEIGHT'] *$this->k,$objattr['INNER-X'] *$this->k,($this->h-($objattr['INNER-Y'] +$objattr['INNER-HEIGHT'] ))*$this->k,$objattr['ID'] ) );
04917       if (isset($objattr['BORDER-WIDTH']) && $objattr['BORDER-WIDTH']) { $this->PaintImgBorder($objattr,$is_table); }
04918        }
04919 
04920 
04921     // BUTTON
04922        if ($objattr['type'] == 'input' && ($objattr['subtype'] == 'SUBMIT' || $objattr['subtype'] == 'RESET' || $objattr['subtype'] == 'BUTTON')) {
04923          $this->SetLineWidth(0.2 /$k );
04924          $this->SetFillColor(190,190,190);
04925         $w -= $this->form_element_spacing['button']['outer']['h']*2 /$k ;
04926         $h -= $this->form_element_spacing['button']['outer']['v']*2 /$k ;
04927         $this->x += $this->form_element_spacing['button']['outer']['h'] /$k ;
04928         $this->y += $this->form_element_spacing['button']['outer']['v'] /$k ;
04929          $this->RoundedRect($this->x, $this->y, $w, $h, 0.5 /$k , 'DF');
04930         $w -= $this->form_element_spacing['button']['inner']['h']*2 /$k ;
04931         $h -= $this->form_element_spacing['button']['inner']['v']*2 /$k ;
04932         $this->x += $this->form_element_spacing['button']['inner']['h'] /$k ;
04933         $this->y += $this->form_element_spacing['button']['inner']['v'] /$k ;
04934          $this->magic_reverse_dir($texto, false); // *RTL*
04935          $this->Cell($w,$h,$texto,'',0,'C',0,'',0,0,0, 'M') ;
04936          $this->SetFillColor(255);
04937        }
04938 
04939     // TEXTAREA
04940        if ($objattr['type'] == 'textarea') {
04941       $w -= $this->form_element_spacing['textarea']['outer']['h']*2 /$k ;
04942       $h -= $this->form_element_spacing['textarea']['outer']['v']*2 /$k ;
04943             $this->x += $this->form_element_spacing['textarea']['outer']['h'] /$k ;
04944             $this->y += $this->form_element_spacing['textarea']['outer']['v'] /$k ;
04945       $this->SetLineWidth(0.2 /$k );
04946       if (isset($objattr['disabled']) && $objattr['disabled']) { 
04947         $this->SetFillColor(225);
04948         $this->SetTextColor(127);
04949       }
04950       else if (isset($objattr['readonly']) && $objattr['readonly']) { 
04951         $this->SetFillColor(225);
04952         $this->SetTextColor(0);
04953       }
04954       else {
04955         $this->SetFillColor(250);
04956         $this->SetTextColor(0);
04957       }
04958       $this->Rect($this->x,$this->y,$w,$h,'DF');
04959       $w -= $this->form_element_spacing['textarea']['inner']['h']*2 /$k ;
04960       $this->x += $this->form_element_spacing['textarea']['inner']['h'] /$k ;
04961       $this->y += $this->form_element_spacing['textarea']['inner']['v'] /$k ;
04962       $linesneeded = $this->WordWrap($texto,$w);
04963       if ($linesneeded > $objattr['rows']) { //Too many words inside textarea
04964         $textoaux = preg_split('/[\n]/u',$texto);
04965                         $texto = '';
04966                         for($i=0;$i<$objattr['rows'];$i++) {
04967                           if ($i == ($objattr['rows']-1)) $texto .= $textoaux[$i];
04968                           else $texto .= $textoaux[$i] . "\n";
04969                         }
04970         $texto = mb_substr($texto,0,mb_strlen($texto,$this->mb_enc)-4,$this->mb_enc) . "...";
04971       }
04972       if ($texto != '') $this->MultiCell($w,$this->FontSize*$this->textarea_lineheight,$texto,0,'',0,'',$this->directionality,true);
04973       $this->SetFillColor(255);
04974       $this->SetTextColor(0);
04975        }
04976 
04977     // CHECKBOX
04978        if ($objattr['type'] == 'input' && ($objattr['subtype'] == 'CHECKBOX')) {
04979       $iw = $w * 0.7;
04980       $ih = $h * 0.7;
04981       $lx = $x + (($w-$iw)/2); 
04982       $ty = $y + (($h-$ih)/2);
04983       $rx = $lx + $iw;
04984       $by = $ty + $ih;
04985       $this->SetLineWidth(0.2 /$k );
04986       if (isset($objattr['disabled']) && $objattr['disabled']) { 
04987         $this->SetFillColor(225);
04988         $this->SetDrawColor(127);
04989       }
04990       else {
04991         $this->SetFillColor(250);
04992         $this->SetDrawColor(0);
04993       }
04994       $this->Rect($lx,$ty,$iw,$ih,'DF');
04995       if (isset($objattr['checked']) && $objattr['checked']) {
04996         //Round join and cap
04997         $this->_out('1 J');
04998         $this->Line($lx,$ty,$rx,$by);
04999         $this->Line($lx,$by,$rx,$ty);
05000         //Set line cap style back to square
05001         $this->_out('2 J');
05002       }
05003       $this->SetFillColor(255);
05004       $this->SetDrawColor(0);
05005        }
05006     // RADIO
05007        if ($objattr['type'] == 'input' && ($objattr['subtype'] == 'RADIO')) {
05008         $this->SetLineWidth(0.2 /$k );
05009         $radius = $this->FontSize *0.35;
05010         $cx = $x + ($w/2); 
05011         $cy = $y + ($h/2);
05012         if (isset($objattr['disabled']) && $objattr['disabled']) { 
05013           $this->SetFillColor(127);
05014           $this->SetDrawColor(127);
05015         }
05016         else {
05017           $this->SetFillColor(0);
05018           $this->SetDrawColor(0);
05019         }
05020         $this->Circle($cx,$cy,$radius,'D');
05021         if (isset($objattr['checked']) && $objattr['checked']) {
05022           $this->Circle($cx,$cy,$radius*0.4,'DF');
05023         }
05024         $this->SetFillColor(255);
05025         $this->SetDrawColor(0);
05026        }
05027 /*-- END FORMS --*/
05028     }
05029     $this->SetFont($save_currentfontfamily,$save_currentfontstyle,$save_currentfontsize);
05030     $this->y = $save_y;
05031     $this->x = $save_x;
05032     unset($content);
05033 }
05034 
05035 
05036 function WriteFlowingBlock( $s)
05037 {
05038     $currentx = $this->x; 
05039     $is_table = $this->flowingBlockAttr[ 'is_table' ];
05040     $is_list = $this->flowingBlockAttr[ 'is_list' ];
05041     // width of all the content so far in points
05042     $contentWidth =& $this->flowingBlockAttr[ 'contentWidth' ];
05043     // cell width in points
05044     $maxWidth =& $this->flowingBlockAttr[ 'width' ];
05045     $lineCount =& $this->flowingBlockAttr[ 'lineCount' ];
05046     // line height in user units
05047     $lineHeight =& $this->flowingBlockAttr[ 'height' ];
05048     $align =& $this->flowingBlockAttr[ 'align' ];
05049     $content =& $this->flowingBlockAttr[ 'content' ];
05050     $font =& $this->flowingBlockAttr[ 'font' ];
05051     $valign =& $this->flowingBlockAttr[ 'valign' ];
05052     $blockstate = $this->flowingBlockAttr[ 'blockstate' ];
05053 
05054     $newblock = $this->flowingBlockAttr[ 'newblock' ];
05055   // *********** BLOCK BACKGROUND COLOR ***************** //
05056   if ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['bgcolor'] && !$is_table) {
05057     // mPDF 3.0 - Tiling Patterns
05058     $fill = 0;
05059 //    $fill = 1;
05060 //    $bcor = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['bgcolorarray'];
05061 //    $this->SetFillColor($bcor['R'],$bcor['G'],$bcor['B']);
05062   }
05063   else {
05064     $this->SetFillColor(255);
05065     $fill = 0;
05066   }
05067     $font[] = $this->saveFont();
05068     $content[] = '';
05069     $currContent =& $content[ count( $content ) - 1 ];
05070     // where the line should be cutoff if it is to be justified
05071     $cutoffWidth = $contentWidth;
05072 
05073   $curlyquote = mb_convert_encoding("\xe2\x80\x9e",$this->mb_enc,'UTF-8');
05074   $curlylowquote = mb_convert_encoding("\xe2\x80\x9d",$this->mb_enc,'UTF-8');
05075 
05076   // COLS
05077   $oldcolumn = $this->CurrCol;
05078 
05079   if ($this->ColActive && !$is_table) { $this->breakpoints[$this->CurrCol][] = $this->y; }  // *COLUMNS*
05080 
05081 /*-- TABLES --*/
05082    if ($is_table) { 
05083   $ipaddingL = 0; 
05084   $ipaddingR = 0; 
05085   $paddingL = 0; 
05086   $paddingR = 0; 
05087   $cpaddingadjustL = 0;
05088   $cpaddingadjustR = 0;
05089   // Added mPDF 3.0
05090   $fpaddingR = 0;
05091   $fpaddingL = 0;
05092   } 
05093    else { 
05094 /*-- END TABLES --*/
05095     $ipaddingL = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_left']; 
05096     $ipaddingR = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_right']; 
05097     $paddingL = ($ipaddingL * $this->k); 
05098     $paddingR = ($ipaddingR * $this->k); 
05099     $this->cMarginL =  $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_left']['w'];
05100     $cpaddingadjustL = -$this->cMarginL;
05101     $this->cMarginR =  $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_right']['w'];
05102     $cpaddingadjustR = -$this->cMarginR;
05103     // Added mPDF 3.0 Float DIV
05104     $fpaddingR = 0;
05105     $fpaddingL = 0;
05106 /*-- CSS-FLOAT --*/
05107     if (count($this->floatDivs)) {
05108       list($l_exists, $r_exists, $l_max, $r_max, $l_width, $r_width) = $this->GetFloatDivInfo($this->blklvl);
05109       if ($r_exists) { $fpaddingR = $r_width; }
05110       if ($l_exists) { $fpaddingL = $l_width; }
05111     }
05112 /*-- END CSS-FLOAT --*/
05113 
05114     $usey = $this->y + 0.002;
05115     if (($newblock) && ($blockstate==1 || $blockstate==3) && ($lineCount == 0) ) { 
05116       $usey += $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['margin_top'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_top'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_top']['w'];
05117     }
05118 /*-- CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT --*/
05119     // If float exists at this level
05120     if (isset($this->floatmargins['R']) && $usey <= $this->floatmargins['R']['y1'] && $usey >= $this->floatmargins['R']['y0'] && !$this->floatmargins['R']['skipline']) { $fpaddingR += $this->floatmargins['R']['w']; }
05121     if (isset($this->floatmargins['L']) && $usey <= $this->floatmargins['L']['y1'] && $usey >= $this->floatmargins['L']['y0'] && !$this->floatmargins['L']['skipline']) { $fpaddingL += $this->floatmargins['L']['w']; }
05122 /*-- END CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT --*/
05123    }  // *TABLES*
05124 
05125      //OBJECTS - IMAGES & FORM Elements (NB has already skipped line/page if required - in printbuffer)
05126       if (substr($s,0,3) == "\xbb\xa4\xac") { //identifier has been identified!
05127     // mPDF 4.0
05128     $objattr = $this->_getObjAttr($s);
05129     $h_corr = 0; 
05130     if ($is_table) {  // *TABLES*
05131       $maximumW = ($maxWidth/$this->k) - ($this->cellPaddingL + $this->cMarginL + $this->cellPaddingR + $this->cMarginR);   // *TABLES*
05132     } // *TABLES*
05133     else {  // *TABLES*
05134       if (($newblock) && ($blockstate==1 || $blockstate==3) && ($lineCount == 0) && (!$is_table)) { $h_corr = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_top'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_top']['w']; }
05135       $maximumW = ($maxWidth/$this->k) - ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_left'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_left']['w'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_right'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_right']['w'] + $fpaddingL + $fpaddingR ); 
05136     } // *TABLES*
05137     $objattr = $this->inlineObject($objattr['type'],$this->lMargin + $fpaddingL + ($contentWidth/$this->k),($this->y + $h_corr), $objattr, $this->lMargin,($contentWidth/$this->k),$maximumW,$lineHeight,true,$is_table);
05138 
05139     // SET LINEHEIGHT for this line ================ RESET AT END
05140     $lineHeight = MAX($lineHeight,$objattr['OUTER-HEIGHT']);
05141     $this->objectbuffer[count($content)-1] = $objattr;
05142     // mPDF 4.2
05143     // if (isset($objattr['vertical-align'])) { $valign = $objattr['vertical-align']; }
05144     // else { $valign = ''; }
05145     $contentWidth += ($objattr['OUTER-WIDTH'] * $this->k);
05146     return;
05147   }
05148 
05149 
05150 /*-- UNICODE-FONTS --*/
05151    if ($this->is_MB && !$this->usingCoreFont) {
05152   $tmp = mb_strlen( $s, $this->mb_enc );
05153    }
05154    else {
05155 /*-- END UNICODE-FONTS --*/
05156   $tmp = strlen( $s );
05157    }  // *UNICODE-FONTS*
05158 
05159    $orphs = 0; 
05160    $check = 0;
05161 
05162 
05163    // for every character in the string
05164    for ( $i = 0; $i < $tmp; $i++ )  {
05165 
05166   // extract the current character
05167   // get the width of the character in points
05168 /*-- UNICODE-FONTS --*/
05169   if ($this->is_MB && !$this->usingCoreFont) {
05170         $c = mb_substr($s,$i,1,$this->mb_enc );
05171     $cw = ($this->GetStringWidth($c) * $this->k);
05172   }
05173   else {
05174 /*-- END UNICODE-FONTS --*/
05175         $c = substr($s,$i,1);
05176     // mPDF 3.0 Soft Hyphens chr(173)
05177     if ($c == chr(173) && ($this->FontFamily!='symbol' && $this->FontFamily!='zapfdingbats')) { $cw = 0;  }
05178     else { $cw = $this->CurrentFont[ 'cw' ][ $c ] * ( $this->FontSizePt / 1000 ); }
05179   } // *UNICODE-FONTS*
05180   if ($c==' ') { $check = 1; }
05181 
05182   // CHECK for ORPHANS
05183   else if ($c=='.' || $c==',' || $c==')' || $c==';' || $c==':' || $c=='!' || $c=='?'|| $c=='"' || $c==$curlyquote || $c==$curlylowquote || $c=="\xef\xbc\x8c" || $c=="\xe3\x80\x82")  {$check++; }
05184   else { $check = 0; }
05185 
05186   // There's an orphan '. ' or ', ' or <sup>32</sup> about to be cut off at the end of line
05187   if($check==1) {
05188     $currContent .= $c;
05189     $cutoffWidth = $contentWidth;
05190     $contentWidth += $cw;
05191     continue;
05192   }
05193   if(($this->SUP || $this->SUB) && ($orphs < $this->orphansAllowed)) {  // ? disable orphans in table if  borders used
05194     $currContent .= $c;
05195     $cutoffWidth = $contentWidth;
05196     $contentWidth += $cw;
05197     $orphs++;
05198     continue;
05199   }
05200   else { $orphs = 0; }
05201 
05202   // ADDED for Paragraph_indent
05203   $WidthCorrection = 0; 
05204   if (($newblock) && ($blockstate==1 || $blockstate==3) && isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['text_indent']) && ($lineCount == 0) && (!$is_table) && (!$is_list) && ($align != 'C')) { 
05205     // mPDF 4.0
05206     $ti = $this->ConvertSize($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['text_indent'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false); 
05207     $WidthCorrection = ($ti*$this->k); 
05208   } 
05209 
05210   // Added mPDF 3.0 Float DIV
05211   $fpaddingR = 0;
05212   $fpaddingL = 0;
05213 /*-- CSS-FLOAT --*/
05214   if (count($this->floatDivs)) {
05215     list($l_exists, $r_exists, $l_max, $r_max, $l_width, $r_width) = $this->GetFloatDivInfo($this->blklvl);
05216     if ($r_exists) { $fpaddingR = $r_width; }
05217     if ($l_exists) { $fpaddingL = $l_width; }
05218   }
05219 /*-- END CSS-FLOAT --*/
05220 
05221   $usey = $this->y + 0.002;
05222   if (($newblock) && ($blockstate==1 || $blockstate==3) && ($lineCount == 0) ) { 
05223     $usey += $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['margin_top'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_top'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_top']['w'];
05224   }
05225 
05226 /*-- CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT --*/
05227   // If float exists at this level
05228   if (isset($this->floatmargins['R']) && $usey <= $this->floatmargins['R']['y1'] && $usey >= $this->floatmargins['R']['y0'] && !$this->floatmargins['R']['skipline']) { $fpaddingR += $this->floatmargins['R']['w']; }
05229   if (isset($this->floatmargins['L']) && $usey <= $this->floatmargins['L']['y1'] && $usey >= $this->floatmargins['L']['y0'] && !$this->floatmargins['L']['skipline']) { $fpaddingL += $this->floatmargins['L']['w']; }
05230 /*-- END CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT --*/
05231 
05232 
05233 
05234        // try adding another char
05235   if (( $contentWidth + $cw > $maxWidth - $WidthCorrection - (($this->cMarginL+$this->cMarginR)*$this->k) - ($paddingL+$paddingR +(($fpaddingL + $fpaddingR) * $this->k) ) +  0.001))  {// 0.001 is to correct for deviations converting mm=>pts
05236     // it won't fit, output what we already have
05237     $lineCount++;
05238  
05239     // contains any content that didn't make it into this print
05240     $savedContent = '';
05241     $savedFont = array();
05242     // mPDF 4.2.031   Dot Tabs
05243     $savedObj = array();
05244 
05245 /*-- CJK --*/
05246 
05247     // Change &#x3000; = CJK space
05248     if ($this->isCJK) {
05249       if ($this->currentfontfamily == 'sjis' && preg_match("/( |\xe3\x80\x80)/",$currContent) ) { $words = preg_split( "/( |\xe3\x80\x80)/", $currContent ); }
05250       // If CJK break at space if in ASCII string else break after current character
05251       else if (isset($this->ords[$c]) && $this->ords[$c]>127) { $words = array(); $words[] = $currContent; }
05252       else { $words = explode( ' ', $currContent ); }
05253     }
05254     // cut off and save any partial words at the end of the string
05255     else { 
05256 /*-- END CJK --*/
05257       $words = explode( ' ', $currContent ); 
05259       // HYPHENATION
05260       $currWord = $words[count($words)-1] ;
05261       $success = false;
05262 /*-- HYPHENATION --*/
05263       // mPDF 3.0 Soft Hyphens chr(173)
05264 /*-- UNICODE-FONTS --*/
05265       if (($this->is_MB && preg_match("/\xc2\xad/",$currWord)) || (!$this->is_MB && preg_match("/".chr(173)."/",$currWord) && ($this->FontFamily!='symbol' && $this->FontFamily!='zapfdingbats')) ) {
05266         $rem = $maxWidth - $WidthCorrection - (($this->cMarginL+$this->cMarginR)*$this->k) - ($paddingL+$paddingR +(($fpaddingL + $fpaddingR) * $this->k) );
05267         list($success,$pre,$post,$prelength) = $this->softHyphenate($currWord, (($rem-$cutoffWidth)/$this->k -$this->GetStringWidth(" ")) );
05268       }
05269 /*-- END UNICODE-FONTS --*/
05270       if (!$success && ($this->hyphenate || ($this->hyphenateTables && $is_table))) { 
05271         // Look ahead to get current word
05272         for($ac = $i; $ac<(mb_strlen($s)-1); $ac++) {
05273           $addc = mb_substr($s,$ac,1,$this->mb_enc );
05274           if ($addc == ' ') { break; }
05275           $currWord .= $addc;
05276         }
05277         $rem = $maxWidth - $WidthCorrection - (($this->cMarginL+$this->cMarginR)*$this->k) - ($paddingL+$paddingR +(($fpaddingL + $fpaddingR) * $this->k) );
05278         list($success,$pre,$post,$prelength) = $this->hyphenateWord($currWord, (($rem-$cutoffWidth)/$this->k -$this->GetStringWidth(" ")) );
05279       }
05280       if ($success) { 
05281         $already = array_pop( $words );
05282         $forward = mb_substr($already,$prelength,mb_strlen($already, $this->mb_enc), $this->mb_enc);
05283         $words[] = $pre.'-';
05284         $words[] = $forward;
05285         $currContent = mb_substr($currContent,0,mb_strlen($currContent, $this->mb_enc)+1-mb_strlen($post, $this->mb_enc), $this->mb_enc) . '-'; // mPDF 4.2.009 +1 as $post returned longer
05286       }
05287 /*-- END HYPHENATION --*/
05288     } // *CJK*
05289 
05290 
05291     // if it looks like we didn't finish any words for this chunk
05292     if ( count( $words ) == 1 ) {
05293       // TO correct for error when word too wide for page - but only when one long word from left to right margin
05294       if (count($content) == 1 && $currContent != ' ') {
05295       $lastContent = $words[0]; 
05296       $savedFont = $this->saveFont();
05297       // replace the current content with the cropped version
05298       $currContent = $this->mb_rtrim( $lastContent, $this->mb_enc );
05299       }
05300       else {
05301       // save and crop off the content currently on the stack
05302       $savedContent = array_pop( $content );
05303       $savedFont = array_pop( $font );
05304       // trim any trailing spaces off the last bit of content
05305       $currContent =& $content[ count( $content ) - 1 ];
05306       $currContent = $this->mb_rtrim( $currContent, $this->mb_enc );
05307       }
05308     }
05309     else {  // otherwise, we need to find which bit to cut off
05310              $lastContent = '';
05311       // mPDF 3.0
05312               for ( $w = 0; $w < count( $words ) - 1; $w++) { $lastContent .= $words[ $w ]." "; }
05313               $savedContent = $words[ count( $words ) - 1 ];
05314               $savedFont = $this->saveFont();
05315               // replace the current content with the cropped version
05316               $currContent = $this->mb_rtrim( $lastContent, $this->mb_enc );
05317     }
05318 
05319     // mPDF 4.2.031   Dot Tabs
05320     if (isset($this->objectbuffer[(count($content)-1)]) && $this->objectbuffer[(count($content)-1)]['type']=='dottab') {
05321       $savedObj = array_pop( $this->objectbuffer );
05322       $contentWidth -= ($this->objectbuffer[(count($content)-1)]['OUTER-WIDTH'] * $this->k);
05323     }
05324 
05325     // Set Current lineheight (correction factor)
05326     $lhfixed = false; 
05327 /*-- LISTS --*/
05328     if ($is_list) {
05329       if (preg_match('/([0-9.,]+)mm/',$this->list_lineheight[$this->listlvl][$this->listOcc],$am)) { 
05330         $lhfixed = true; 
05331         $def_fontsize = $this->InlineProperties['LISTITEM'][$this->listlvl][$this->listOcc][$this->listnum]['size'];
05332         $this->lineheight_correction = $am[1] / $def_fontsize ;
05333       }
05334       else { 
05335         $this->lineheight_correction = $this->list_lineheight[$this->listlvl][$this->listOcc]; 
05336       }
05337     }
05338     else
05339 /*-- END LISTS --*/
05340 /*-- TABLES --*/
05341     if ($is_table) {
05342       if (preg_match('/([0-9.,]+)mm/',$this->table_lineheight,$am)) { 
05343         $lhfixed = true; 
05344         $def_fontsize = $this->FontSize;        // needs to be default font-size for block ****
05345         $this->lineheight_correction = $lineHeight / $def_fontsize ; 
05346       }
05347       else { 
05348         $this->lineheight_correction = $this->table_lineheight; 
05349       }
05350     }
05351     else
05352 /*-- END TABLES --*/
05353     if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['line_height']) && $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['line_height']) {
05354       if (preg_match('/([0-9.,]+)mm/',$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['line_height'],$am)) { 
05355         $lhfixed = true; 
05356         $def_fontsize = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['InlineProperties']['size'];  // needs to be default font-size for block ****
05357         $this->lineheight_correction = $am[1] / $def_fontsize ;
05358       }
05359       else { 
05360         $this->lineheight_correction = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['line_height']; 
05361       }
05362     } 
05363     else {
05364       $this->lineheight_correction = $this->normalLineheight; 
05365     }
05366 
05367     // update $contentWidth and $cutoffWidth since they changed with cropping
05368     // Also correct lineheight to maximum fontsize (not for tables)
05369     $contentWidth = 0;
05370     // mPDF 4.2
05371     //  correct lineheight to maximum fontsize
05372     if ($lhfixed) { $maxlineHeight = $this->lineheight; }
05373     else { $maxlineHeight = 0; }
05374     $this->forceExactLineheight = true;
05375     $maxfontsize = 0;
05376     foreach ( $content as $k => $chunk )
05377     {
05378               $this->restoreFont( $font[ $k ]);
05379       if (!isset($this->objectbuffer[$k])) { 
05380 /*-- UNICODE-FONTS --*/
05381       if ($this->is_MB) {
05382             $content[$k] = $chunk = str_replace("\xc2\xad",'',$chunk ); 
05383       }
05384       // mPDF 3.0 Soft Hyphens chr(173)
05385       else
05386 /*-- END UNICODE-FONTS --*/
05387       if ($this->FontFamily!='symbol' && $this->FontFamily!='zapfdingbats') {
05388             $content[$k] = $chunk = str_replace($this->chrs[173],'',$chunk );
05389       }
05390       $contentWidth += $this->GetStringWidth( $chunk ) * $this->k; 
05391       // mPDF 4.2
05392       if (!$lhfixed) { $maxlineHeight = max($maxlineHeight,$this->FontSize * $this->lineheight_correction ); }
05393       if ($lhfixed && ($this->FontSize > $def_fontsize || ($this->FontSize > ($lineHeight * $this->lineheight_correction) && $is_list))) { 
05394         $this->forceExactLineheight = false; 
05395       }
05396       $maxfontsize = max($maxfontsize,$this->FontSize); 
05397       }
05398     }
05399 
05400     // mPDF 4.2 $lastitalic to shorten if line ends with artificial ITALIC
05401     $lastfontreqstyle = $font[count($font)-1]['ReqFontStyle'];
05402     $lastfontstyle = $font[count($font)-1]['style'];
05403     if ($this->directionality == 'ltr' && strpos($lastfontreqstyle,"I") !== false && strpos($lastfontstyle,"I") === false) {  // Artificial italic
05404       $lastitalic = $this->FontSize*0.15*$this->k;
05405     }
05406     else { $lastitalic = 0; }
05407 
05408 
05409 /*-- LISTS --*/
05410     // mPDF 4.2 Moved here from later
05411     if ($is_list && is_array($this->bulletarray) && $this->bulletarray) {
05412         $actfs = $this->bulletarray['fontsize'];
05413       if (!$lhfixed) { $maxlineHeight = max($maxlineHeight,$actfs * $this->lineheight_correction );  }  // mPDF 4.2
05414       if ($lhfixed && $actfs > $def_fontsize) { $this->forceExactLineheight = false; }
05415       $maxfontsize = max($maxfontsize,$actfs);
05416     }
05417 /*-- END LISTS --*/
05418 
05419     // when every text item checked i.e. $maxfontsize is set properly
05420 
05421     $af = 0;  // Above font
05422     $bf = 0;  // Below font
05423     $mta = 0; // Maximum top-aligned 
05424     $mba = 0; // Maximum bottom-aligned 
05425 
05426     foreach ( $content as $k => $chunk ) {
05427       if (isset($this->objectbuffer[$k]) && $this->objectbuffer[$k]) { 
05428       $contentWidth += $this->objectbuffer[$k]['OUTER-WIDTH'] * $this->k; 
05429       $oh = $this->objectbuffer[$k]['OUTER-HEIGHT'];
05430       $va = $this->objectbuffer[$k]['vertical-align']; // = $objattr['vertical-align'] = set as M,T,B,S
05431       if ($lhfixed && $oh > $def_fontsize) { $this->forceExactLineheight = false; }
05432 
05433       if ($va == 'BS') {  //  (BASELINE default)
05434         $af = max($af, ($oh - ($maxfontsize * (0.5 + $this->baselineC))));
05435       }
05436       else if ($va == 'M') { 
05437         $af = max($af, ($oh - $maxfontsize)/2);
05438         $bf = max($bf, ($oh - $maxfontsize)/2);
05439       }
05440       else if ($va == 'TT') { 
05441         $bf = max($bf, ($oh - $maxfontsize));
05442       }
05443       else if ($va == 'TB') { 
05444         $af = max($af, ($oh - $maxfontsize));
05445       }
05446       else if ($va == 'T') { 
05447         $mta = max($mta, $oh);
05448       }
05449       else if ($va == 'B') { 
05450         $mba = max($mba, $oh);
05451       }
05452       }
05453     }
05454     if ((!$lhfixed || !$this->forceExactLineheight) && ($af > (($maxlineHeight - $maxfontsize)/2) || $bf > (($maxlineHeight - $maxfontsize)/2))) {
05455       $maxlineHeight = $maxfontsize + $af + $bf;
05456     }
05457     else if (!$lhfixed) { $af = $bf = ($maxlineHeight - $maxfontsize)/2; }
05458 
05459     if ($mta > $maxlineHeight) { 
05460       $bf += ($mta - $maxlineHeight);
05461       $maxlineHeight = $mta;
05462     }
05463     if ($mba > $maxlineHeight) { 
05464       $af += ($mba - $maxlineHeight);
05465       $maxlineHeight = $mba;
05466     }
05467 
05468 
05469     $lineHeight = $maxlineHeight; 
05470     $cutoffWidth = $contentWidth;
05471     // mPDF 4.2 If NOT images, and maxfontsize NOT > lineHeight - this value determines text baseline positioning
05472     if ($lhfixed && $af==0 && $bf==0 && $maxfontsize<=($def_fontsize * $this->lineheight_correction * 0.8 )) { 
05473       $this->linemaxfontsize = $def_fontsize; 
05474     }
05475     else { $this->linemaxfontsize = $maxfontsize; }
05476 
05477 
05478     // JUSTIFICATION J
05479     $nb_carac = 0;
05480     $nb_spaces = 0;
05481     // if it's justified, we need to find the char/word spacing (or if orphans have allowed length of line to go over the maxwidth)
05482     // mPDF 4.2 $lastitalic to shorten if line ends with artificial ITALIC
05483     if(( $align == 'J' ) || ($cutoffWidth + $lastitalic > $maxWidth - $WidthCorrection - (($this->cMarginL+$this->cMarginR)*$this->k) - ($paddingL+$paddingR +(($fpaddingL + $fpaddingR) * $this->k) ) +  0.001)) {   // 0.001 is to correct for deviations converting mm=>pts
05484       // JUSTIFY J (Use character spacing)
05485       // WORD SPACING
05486       foreach ( $content as $k => $chunk ) {
05487           if (!isset($this->objectbuffer[$k]) || (isset($this->objectbuffer[$k]) && !$this->objectbuffer[$k])) {
05488 /*-- UNICODE-FONTS --*/
05489           if ($this->is_MB) {
05490                 $chunk = str_replace($this->chrs[194].$this->chrs[160],$this->chrs[32],$chunk ); 
05491           }
05492           else {
05493 /*-- END UNICODE-FONTS --*/
05494                 $chunk = str_replace($this->chrs[160],$this->chrs[32],$chunk );
05495           } // *UNICODE-FONTS*
05496           $nb_carac += mb_strlen( $chunk, $this->mb_enc ) ;  
05497           $nb_spaces += mb_substr_count( $chunk,' ', $this->mb_enc ) ;  
05498         }
05499       }
05500       // mPDF 4.2 $lastitalic to shorten if line ends with artificial ITALIC
05501       list($charspacing,$ws) = $this->GetJspacing($nb_carac,$nb_spaces,($maxWidth-$lastitalic-$cutoffWidth-$WidthCorrection-(($this->cMarginL+$this->cMarginR)*$this->k)-($paddingL+$paddingR +(($fpaddingL + $fpaddingR) * $this->k) )));
05502       // mPDF 4.0
05503       $this->SetSpacing($charspacing,$ws);
05504     }
05505 
05506     // otherwise, we want normal spacing
05507     else {
05508       // mPDF 4.0
05509       $this->ResetSpacing();
05510     }
05511 
05512     // WORD SPACING
05513     // mPDF 4.2 $lastitalic to shorten if line ends with artificial ITALIC
05514     $empty = $maxWidth - $lastitalic-$WidthCorrection - $contentWidth - (($this->cMarginL+$this->cMarginR)* $this->k) - ($paddingL+$paddingR +(($fpaddingL + $fpaddingR) * $this->k) ) - ( $this->charspacing * $nb_carac) - ( $this->ws * $nb_spaces);
05515     $empty /= $this->k;
05516     $b = ''; //do not use borders
05517     // Get PAGEBREAK TO TEST for height including the top border/padding
05518     $check_h = max($this->divheight,$lineHeight);
05519     if (($newblock) && ($blockstate==1 || $blockstate==3) && ($this->blklvl > 0) && ($lineCount == 1) && (!$is_table) && (!$is_list)) { 
05520       $check_h += ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_top'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['margin_top'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_top']['w']);
05521     }
05522 
05523     // mPDF 4.2 Force PAGE break if column height cannot take check-height
05524     if ($this->ColActive && $check_h > ($this->PageBreakTrigger - $this->y0)) { $this->CurrCol = $this->NbCol; } 
05525 
05526     // PAGEBREAK
05527     // 'If' below used in order to fix "first-line of other page with justify on" bug 
05528     // mPDF 4.2.008 Disable in Tables
05529     if(!$is_table && ($this->y+$check_h) > $this->PageBreakTrigger and !$this->InFooter and $this->AcceptPageBreak()) {
05530       $bak_x=$this->x;//Current X position
05531 
05532       // WORD SPACING
05533       $ws=$this->ws;//Word Spacing
05534       $charspacing=$this->charspacing;//Character Spacing
05535       // mPDF 4.0
05536       $this->ResetSpacing();
05537 
05538           $this->AddPage($this->CurOrientation);
05539 
05540           $this->x = $bak_x;
05541       // Added to correct for OddEven Margins
05542       $currentx += $this->MarginCorrection;
05543       $this->x += $this->MarginCorrection;
05544 
05545       // WORD SPACING
05546       // mPDF 4.0
05547       $this->SetSpacing($charspacing,$ws);
05548     }
05549 
05550 /*-- COLUMNS --*/
05551     // COLS
05552     // COLUMN CHANGE
05553     if ($this->CurrCol != $oldcolumn) {
05554       $currentx += $this->ChangeColumn * ($this->ColWidth+$this->ColGap);
05555       $this->x += $this->ChangeColumn * ($this->ColWidth+$this->ColGap);
05556       $oldcolumn = $this->CurrCol;
05557     }
05558 
05559     if ($this->ColActive && !$is_table) { $this->breakpoints[$this->CurrCol][] = $this->y; }  // *COLUMNS*
05560 /*-- END COLUMNS --*/
05561 
05562     // TOP MARGIN
05563     if (($newblock) && ($blockstate==1 || $blockstate==3) && ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['margin_top']) && ($lineCount == 1) && (!$is_table) && (!$is_list)) { 
05564       $this->DivLn($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['margin_top'],$this->blklvl-1,true,$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['margin_collapse']); 
05565       if ($this->ColActive) { $this->breakpoints[$this->CurrCol][] = $this->y; }  // *COLUMNS*
05566     }
05567 
05568 
05569     // Update y0 for top of block (used to paint border)
05570     if (($newblock) && ($blockstate==1 || $blockstate==3) && ($lineCount == 1) && (!$is_table) && (!$is_list)) { 
05571       $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['y0'] = $this->y;
05572       $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['startpage'] = $this->page;
05573     }
05574 
05575     // TOP PADDING and BORDER spacing/fill
05576     if (($newblock) && ($blockstate==1 || $blockstate==3) && (($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_top']) || ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_top'])) && ($lineCount == 1) && (!$is_table) && (!$is_list)) { 
05577       // mPDF 3.0 Also does border when Columns active
05578       // $state = 0 normal; 1 top; 2 bottom; 3 top and bottom
05579       $this->DivLn($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_top'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_top']['w'],-3,true,false,1);
05580       if ($this->ColActive) { $this->breakpoints[$this->CurrCol][] = $this->y; }  // *COLUMNS*
05581     }
05582 
05583     $arraysize = count($content);
05584 
05585     $margins = ($this->cMarginL+$this->cMarginR) + ($ipaddingL+$ipaddingR + $fpaddingR + $fpaddingR );
05586  
05587     // PAINT BACKGROUND FOR THIS LINE
05588     if (!$is_table) { $this->DivLn($lineHeight,$this->blklvl,false); }  // false -> don't advance y
05589 
05590   
05591     $this->x = $currentx + $this->cMarginL + $ipaddingL + $fpaddingL ;
05592     if ($align == 'R') { $this->x += $empty; }
05593     else if ($align == 'C') { $this->x += ($empty / 2); }
05594 
05595     // Paragraph INDENT
05596     if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['text_indent']) && ($newblock) && ($blockstate==1 || $blockstate==3) && ($lineCount == 1) && (!$is_table) && ($this->directionality!='rtl') && ($align !='C')) { 
05597       // mPDF 4.0
05598       $ti = $this->ConvertSize($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['text_indent'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false); 
05599       $this->x += $ti; 
05600     }
05601 
05602 
05603     // DIRECTIONALITY RTL
05604     $all_rtl = false;
05605     $contains_rtl = false;
05606 /*-- RTL --*/
05607       if (($this->directionality == 'rtl') || (($this->directionality == 'ltr') && ($this->biDirectional)))  { 
05608       $all_rtl = true;
05609       foreach ( $content as $k => $chunk ) {
05610         $reversed = $this->magic_reverse_dir($chunk, false);
05611         if ($reversed > 0) { $contains_rtl = true; }
05612         if ($reversed < 2) { $all_rtl = false; }
05613         $content[$k] = $chunk;
05614       }
05615       if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { 
05616         if ($contains_rtl) {
05617           $content = array_reverse($content,false);
05618         }
05619       }
05620       else if (($this->directionality == 'ltr') && ($this->biDirectional)) { 
05621         if ($all_rtl) {
05622           $content = array_reverse($content,false);
05623         }
05624       }
05625     }
05626 /*-- END RTL --*/
05627 
05628     foreach ( $content as $k => $chunk ) {
05629 
05630       // FOR IMAGES - UPDATE POSITION
05631       if (($this->directionality=='rtl' && $contains_rtl) || $all_rtl) { $dirk = $arraysize-1 - $k ; } else { $dirk = $k; }
05632 
05633       // mPDF 4.2
05634       $va = 'M';  // default for text
05635       if (isset($this->objectbuffer[$dirk]) && $this->objectbuffer[$dirk]) {
05636         $xadj = $this->x - $this->objectbuffer[$dirk]['OUTER-X'] ; 
05637         $this->objectbuffer[$dirk]['OUTER-X'] += $xadj;
05638         $this->objectbuffer[$dirk]['BORDER-X'] += $xadj;
05639         $this->objectbuffer[$dirk]['INNER-X'] += $xadj;
05640         // mPDF 4.2
05641         $va = $this->objectbuffer[$dirk]['vertical-align'];
05642         $yadj = $this->y - $this->objectbuffer[$dirk]['OUTER-Y'];
05643         if ($va == 'BS') { 
05644         $yadj += $af + ($this->linemaxfontsize * (0.5 + $this->baselineC)) - $this->objectbuffer[$dirk]['OUTER-HEIGHT'];
05645         }
05646         else if ($va == 'M' || $va == '') { 
05647         $yadj += $af + ($this->linemaxfontsize /2) - ($this->objectbuffer[$dirk]['OUTER-HEIGHT']/2);
05648         }
05649         else if ($va == 'TB') { 
05650         $yadj += $af + $this->linemaxfontsize - $this->objectbuffer[$dirk]['OUTER-HEIGHT'];
05651         }
05652         else if ($va == 'TT') { 
05653         $yadj += $af;
05654         }
05655         else if ($va == 'B') { 
05656         $yadj += $af + $this->linemaxfontsize + $bf - $this->objectbuffer[$dirk]['OUTER-HEIGHT'];
05657         }
05658         else if ($va == 'T') { 
05659         $yadj += 0;
05660         }
05661         $this->objectbuffer[$dirk]['OUTER-Y'] += $yadj;
05662         $this->objectbuffer[$dirk]['BORDER-Y'] += $yadj;
05663         $this->objectbuffer[$dirk]['INNER-Y'] += $yadj;
05664       }
05665 
05666       // DIRECTIONALITY RTL
05667       if ((($this->directionality == 'rtl') && ($contains_rtl )) || ($all_rtl )) { $this->restoreFont($font[$arraysize-1 - $k]); }
05668       else { $this->restoreFont( $font[ $k ] ); }
05669 
05670       // *********** SPAN BACKGROUND COLOR ***************** //
05671       if ($this->spanbgcolor) { 
05672         $cor = $this->spanbgcolorarray;
05673         $this->SetFillColor($cor['R'],$cor['G'],$cor['B']);
05674         $save_fill = $fill; $spanfill = 1; $fill = 1;
05675       }
05676 
05677       // WORD SPACING
05678           $stringWidth = $this->GetStringWidth($chunk ) + ( $this->charspacing * mb_strlen($chunk,$this->mb_enc ) / $this->k )  
05679         + ( $this->ws * mb_substr_count($chunk,' ',$this->mb_enc ) / $this->k );
05680       if (isset($this->objectbuffer[$dirk])) { $stringWidth = $this->objectbuffer[$dirk]['OUTER-WIDTH'];  }
05681 
05682       if ($stringWidth > 0) {
05683                      if ($k == $arraysize-1) { 
05684         $stringWidth -= ( $this->charspacing / $this->k ); 
05685         // mPDF 4.2 af , bf above and below font
05686         $this->Cell( $stringWidth, $lineHeight, $chunk, '', 1, '', $fill, $this->HREF , $currentx,0,0,'M', $fill, $af, $bf ); //mono-style line or last part (skips line)
05687          }
05688                      else $this->Cell( $stringWidth, $lineHeight, $chunk, '', 0, '', $fill, $this->HREF, 0, 0,0,'M', $fill, $af, $bf );//first or middle part
05689       }
05690       else {  // If a space started a new chunk at the end of a line
05691         $this->x = $currentx; $this->y += $lineHeight; 
05692       }
05693       // *********** SPAN BACKGROUND COLOR OFF - RESET BLOCK BGCOLOR ***************** //
05694       if (isset($spanfill) && $spanfill) { 
05695         $fill = $save_fill; $spanfill = 0; 
05696         if ($fill) { $this->SetFillColor($bcor['R'],$bcor['G'],$bcor['B']); }
05697       }
05698     }
05699     // mPDF 4.0
05700     if (!$is_table) { 
05701       $this->maxPosR = max($this->maxPosR , ($this->w - $this->rMargin - $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['outer_right_margin'])); 
05702       $this->maxPosL = min($this->maxPosL , ($this->lMargin + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['outer_left_margin'])); 
05703     }
05704 
05705     // move on to the next line, reset variables, tack on saved content and current char
05706 
05707     $this->printobjectbuffer($is_table);
05708     $this->objectbuffer = array();
05709 
05710 /*-- LISTS --*/
05711     // LIST BULLETS/NUMBERS
05712     if ($is_list && is_array($this->bulletarray) && ($lineCount == 1) ) {
05713       // mPDF 4.0
05714       $this->ResetSpacing();
05715 
05716       $bull = $this->bulletarray;
05717         if (isset($bull['level']) && isset($bull['occur']) && isset($this->InlineProperties['LIST'][$bull['level']][$bull['occur']])) { 
05718       $this->restoreInlineProperties($this->InlineProperties['LIST'][$bull['level']][$bull['occur']]); 
05719       }
05720       if (isset($bull['level']) && isset($bull['occur']) && isset($bull['num']) && isset($this->InlineProperties['LISTITEM'][$bull['level']][$bull['occur']][$bull['num']]) && $this->InlineProperties['LISTITEM'][$bull['level']][$bull['occur']][$bull['num']]) { $this->restoreInlineProperties($this->InlineProperties['LISTITEM'][$bull['level']][$bull['occur']][$bull['num']]); }
05721         if (isset($bull['font']) && $bull['font'] == 'zapfdingbats') {
05722       $this->bullet = true;
05723       $this->SetFont('zapfdingbats','',$this->FontSizePt/2.5);
05724       }
05725       else { $this->SetFont($this->FontFamily,$this->FontStyle,$this->FontSizePt,true,true); }  // force output
05726           //Output bullet
05727         $this->x = $currentx;
05728       if (isset($bull['x'])) { $this->x += $bull['x']; }
05729       $this->y -= $lineHeight;
05730       // mPDF 4.0
05731       if (isset($bull['txt'])) { $this->Cell($bull['w'], $lineHeight,$bull['txt'],'','',$bull['align'],0,'',0,-$this->cMarginL, -$this->cMarginR ); }
05732         if (isset($bull['font']) && $bull['font'] == 'zapfdingbats') {
05733       $this->bullet = false;
05734       }
05735       $this->x = $currentx; // Reset
05736       $this->y += $lineHeight;
05737 
05738       if ($this->ColActive && !$is_table) { $this->breakpoints[$this->CurrCol][] = $this->y; }  // *COLUMNS*
05739 
05740       $this->bulletarray = array(); // prevents repeat of bullet/number if <li>....<br />.....</li>
05741     }
05742 /*-- END LISTS --*/
05743 
05744 
05745 /*-- CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT --*/
05746     // Update values if set to skipline
05747     if ($this->floatmargins) { $this->_advanceFloatMargins(); }
05748 /*-- END CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT --*/
05749 
05750     // Reset lineheight
05751     $lineHeight = $this->divheight;
05752     $valign = 'M';
05753 
05754     $this->restoreFont( $savedFont );
05755 
05756     // mPDF 4.2.031   Dot Tabs
05757     $font = array();
05758     $content = array();
05759 
05760     $contentWidth = 0;
05761     if (!empty($savedObj)) {
05762       $this->objectbuffer[] = $savedObj;
05763       $font[] = $savedFont;
05764       $content[] = '';
05765       $contentWidth += $savedObj['OUTER-WIDTH'] * $this->k;
05766     }
05767     $font[] = $savedFont;
05768     $content[] = $savedContent . $c;
05769     $currContent =& $content[ (count($content)-1) ];
05770     $contentWidth += $this->GetStringWidth( $currContent ) * $this->k;
05771     $cutoffWidth = $contentWidth;
05772       }
05773       // another character will fit, so add it on
05774   else {
05775     $contentWidth += $cw;
05776     $currContent .= $c;
05777   }
05778     }
05779     unset($content);
05780 }
05781 //----------------------END OF FLOWING BLOCK------------------------------------//
05782 
05783 
05784 /*-- CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT --*/
05785 // Update values if set to skipline
05786 function _advanceFloatMargins() {
05787   // Update floatmargins - L
05788   if (isset($this->floatmargins['L']) && $this->floatmargins['L']['skipline'] && $this->floatmargins['L']['y0'] != $this->y) {
05789     $yadj = $this->y - $this->floatmargins['L']['y0'];
05790     $this->floatmargins['L']['y0'] = $this->y;
05791     $this->floatmargins['L']['y1'] += $yadj;
05792 
05793     // Update objattr in floatbuffer
05794     if ($this->floatbuffer[$this->floatmargins['L']['id']]['border_left']['w']) {
05795       $this->floatbuffer[$this->floatmargins['L']['id']]['BORDER-Y'] += $yadj;
05796     }
05797     $this->floatbuffer[$this->floatmargins['L']['id']]['INNER-Y'] += $yadj;
05798     $this->floatbuffer[$this->floatmargins['L']['id']]['OUTER-Y'] += $yadj;
05799 
05800     // Unset values
05801     $this->floatbuffer[$this->floatmargins['L']['id']]['skipline'] = false;
05802     $this->floatmargins['L']['skipline'] = false;
05803     $this->floatmargins['L']['id'] = '';
05804   }
05805   // Update floatmargins - R
05806   if (isset($this->floatmargins['R']) && $this->floatmargins['R']['skipline'] && $this->floatmargins['R']['y0'] != $this->y) {
05807     $yadj = $this->y - $this->floatmargins['R']['y0'];
05808     $this->floatmargins['R']['y0'] = $this->y;
05809     $this->floatmargins['R']['y1'] += $yadj;
05810 
05811     // Update objattr in floatbuffer
05812     if ($this->floatbuffer[$this->floatmargins['R']['id']]['border_left']['w']) {
05813       $this->floatbuffer[$this->floatmargins['R']['id']]['BORDER-Y'] += $yadj;
05814     }
05815     $this->floatbuffer[$this->floatmargins['R']['id']]['INNER-Y'] += $yadj;
05816     $this->floatbuffer[$this->floatmargins['R']['id']]['OUTER-Y'] += $yadj;
05817 
05818     // Unset values
05819     $this->floatbuffer[$this->floatmargins['R']['id']]['skipline'] = false;
05820     $this->floatmargins['R']['skipline'] = false;
05821     $this->floatmargins['R']['id'] = '';
05822   }
05823 }
05824 /*-- END CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT --*/
05825 
05826 
05827 
05829 // ADDED forcewrap - to call from inline OBJECT functions to breakwords if necessary in cell
05831 function WordWrap(&$text, $maxwidth, $forcewrap = 0) {
05832     $biggestword=0;
05833     $toonarrow=false;
05834 
05835     $text = ltrim($text);
05836     $text = $this->mb_rtrim($text, $this->mb_enc);
05837 
05838     if ($text==='') return 0;
05839     $space = $this->GetStringWidth(' ');
05840     $lines = explode("\n", $text);
05841     $text = '';
05842     $count = 0;
05843     foreach ($lines as $line) {
05844 /*-- UNICODE-FONTS --*/
05845   if ($this->is_MB && !$this->usingCoreFont) {
05846     $words = mb_split(' ', $line);
05847   }
05848   else {
05849 /*-- END UNICODE-FONTS --*/
05850     $words = explode(' ', $line); // mPDF 4.0
05851   } // *UNICODE-FONTS*
05852   $width = 0;
05853   foreach ($words as $word) {
05854     $word = $this->mb_rtrim($word, $this->mb_enc);
05855     $word = ltrim($word);
05856     $wordwidth = $this->GetStringWidth($word);
05857 
05858     //Warn user that maxwidth is insufficient
05859     if ($wordwidth > $maxwidth + 0.0001) {
05860       if ($wordwidth > $biggestword) { $biggestword = $wordwidth; }
05861       $toonarrow=true;
05862       // ADDED
05863       if ($forcewrap) {
05864         while($wordwidth > $maxwidth) {
05865         $chw = 0; // check width
05866         for ( $i = 0; $i < mb_strlen($word, $this->mb_enc ); $i++ ) {
05867           $chw = $this->GetStringWidth(mb_substr($word,0,$i+1,$this->mb_enc ));
05868           if ($chw > $maxwidth ) {
05869             if ($text) {
05870               $text = $this->mb_rtrim($text, $this->mb_enc)."\n".mb_substr($word,0,$i,$this->mb_enc );
05871               $count++;
05872             }
05873             else {
05874               $text = mb_substr($word,0,$i,$this->mb_enc );
05875             }
05876             $word = mb_substr($word,$i,mb_strlen($word, $this->mb_enc )-$i,$this->mb_enc );
05877             $wordwidth = $this->GetStringWidth($word);
05878             $width = $maxwidth; 
05879             break;
05880           }
05881         }
05882         }
05883       }
05884     }
05885 
05886     if ($width + $wordwidth  < $maxwidth - 0.0001) {
05887       $width += $wordwidth + $space;
05888       $text .= $word.' ';
05889     }
05890     else {
05891       $width = $wordwidth + $space;
05892       $text = $this->mb_rtrim($text, $this->mb_enc)."\n".$word.' ';
05893       $count++;
05894             }
05895   }
05896 
05897   $text = $this->mb_rtrim($text, $this->mb_enc)."\n";
05898   $count++;
05899     }
05900     $text = $this->mb_rtrim($text, $this->mb_enc);
05901 
05902     //Return -(wordsize) if word is bigger than maxwidth 
05903 
05904   // ADDED
05905   if ($forcewrap) { return $count; }
05906       if (($toonarrow) && ($this->table_error_report)) {
05907     $this->Error("Word is too long to fit in table - ".$this->table_error_report_param); 
05908   }
05909     if ($toonarrow) return -$biggestword;
05910     else return $count;
05911 }
05912 
05913 function _SetTextRendering($mode) { 
05914   if (!(($mode == 0) || ($mode == 1) || ($mode == 2))) 
05915   $this->Error("Text rendering mode should be 0, 1 or 2 (value : $mode)"); 
05916   $tr = ($mode.' Tr'); 
05917   if($this->page>0 && ((isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['TextRendering']) && $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['TextRendering'] != $tr) || !isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['TextRendering']) || $this->keep_block_together)) { $this->_out($tr); }
05918   $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['TextRendering'] = $tr;
05919 
05920 } 
05921 
05922 function SetTextOutline($width, $r=0, $g=-1, $b=-1) { 
05923   if ($width == false) //Now resets all values
05924   { 
05925     $this->outline_on = false;
05926     $this->SetLineWidth(0.2); 
05927     $this->SetDrawColor(0); 
05928     $this->_SetTextRendering(0); 
05929     $tr = ('0 Tr'); 
05930   if($this->page>0 && ((isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['TextRendering']) && $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['TextRendering'] != $tr) || !isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['TextRendering']) || $this->keep_block_together)) { $this->_out($tr); }
05931   $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['TextRendering'] = $tr;
05932   }
05933   else
05934   { 
05935     $this->SetLineWidth($width); 
05936     $this->SetDrawColor($r, $g , $b); 
05937     $tr = ('2 Tr'); 
05938   if($this->page>0 && ((isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['TextRendering']) && $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['TextRendering'] != $tr) || !isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['TextRendering']) || $this->keep_block_together)) { $this->_out($tr); }
05939   $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['TextRendering'] = $tr;
05940   } 
05941 }
05942 // mPDF 4.2
05943 function Image($file,$x,$y,$w=0,$h=0,$type='',$link='',$paint=true, $constrain=true, $watermark=false, $shownoimg=true, $allowvector=true) {
05944   $orig_srcpath = $file; // mPDF 4.2.029
05945   $this->GetFullPath($file); // mPDF 4.2.029
05946 
05947   $info=$this->_getImage($file, true, $allowvector, $orig_srcpath ); // mPDF 4.2.029
05948   if(!$info && $paint) {
05949     $info = $this->_getImage($this->noImageFile);
05950     if ($info) { 
05951       $file = $this->noImageFile; 
05952       $w = ($info['w'] * 0.2645);   // 14 x 16px
05953       $h = ($info['h'] * 0.2645);   // 14 x 16px
05954     }
05955   }
05956   if(!$info) return false;    // mPDF 4.2
05957 
05958   //Automatic width and height calculation if needed
05959   if($w==0 and $h==0) {
05960 /*-- IMAGES-WMF --*/
05961            if ($info['type']=='wmf') { 
05962       // WMF units are twips (1/20pt)
05963       // divide by 20 to get points
05964       // divide by k to get user units
05965       $w = abs($info['w'])/(20*$this->k);
05966       $h = abs($info['h']) / (20*$this->k);
05967     }
05968     else 
05969 /*-- END IMAGES-WMF --*/
05970            if ($info['type']=='svg') { 
05971       // SVG units are pts
05972       // divide by k to get user units
05973       $w = abs($info['w'])/$this->k;
05974       $h = abs($info['h']) /$this->k;
05975     }
05976     else {
05977       //Put image at default dpi
05978       $w=($info['w']/$this->k) * (72/$this->img_dpi);
05979       $h=($info['h']/$this->k) * (72/$this->img_dpi);
05980     }
05981   }
05982   if($w==0) $w=abs($h*$info['w']/$info['h']); 
05983   if($h==0) $h=abs($w*$info['h']/$info['w']); 
05984 
05985 /*-- WATERMARK --*/
05986   if ($watermark) {
05987     $maxw = $this->w;
05988     $maxh = $this->h;
05989     // Size = D PF or array
05990     if (is_array($this->watermark_size)) {
05991     $w = $this->watermark_size[0];
05992     $h = $this->watermark_size[1];
05993     }
05994     else if (!is_string($this->watermark_size)) {
05995     $maxw -= $this->watermark_size*2;
05996     $maxh -= $this->watermark_size*2;
05997     $w = $maxw;
05998     $h=abs($w*$info['h']/$info['w']);
05999     if ($h > $maxh )  {
06000       $h = $maxh ; $w=abs($h*$info['w']/$info['h']);
06001     }
06002     }
06003     else if ($this->watermark_size == 'F') {
06004     if ($this->ColActive) { $maxw = $this->w - ($this->DeflMargin + $this->DefrMargin); }
06005     else { $maxw = $this->pgwidth; }
06006     $maxh = $this->h - ($this->tMargin + $this->bMargin);
06007     $w = $maxw;
06008     $h=abs($w*$info['h']/$info['w']);
06009     if ($h > $maxh )  {
06010       $h = $maxh ; $w=abs($h*$info['w']/$info['h']);
06011     }
06012     }
06013     else  if ($this->watermark_size == 'P') { // Default P
06014     $w = $maxw;
06015     $h=abs($w*$info['h']/$info['w']);
06016     if ($h > $maxh )  {
06017       $h = $maxh ; $w=abs($h*$info['w']/$info['h']);
06018     }
06019     }
06020     // Automatically resize to maximum dimensions of page if too large
06021     if ($w > $maxw) {
06022     $w = $maxw;
06023     $h=abs($w*$info['h']/$info['w']);
06024     }
06025     if ($h > $maxh )  {
06026     $h = $maxh ;
06027     $w=abs($h*$info['w']/$info['h']);
06028     }
06029     // Position
06030     if (is_array($this->watermark_pos)) {
06031     $x = $this->watermark_pos[0];
06032     $y = $this->watermark_pos[1];
06033     }
06034     else if ($this->watermark_pos == 'F')  {  // centred on printable area
06035     if ($this->ColActive) { // *COLUMNS*
06036       if (($this->mirrorMargins) && (($this->page)%2==0)) { $xadj = $this->DeflMargin-$this->DefrMargin; }  // *COLUMNS*
06037       else { $xadj = 0; } // *COLUMNS*
06038       $x = ($this->DeflMargin - $xadj + ($this->w - ($this->DeflMargin + $this->DefrMargin))/2) - ($w/2); // *COLUMNS*
06039     } // *COLUMNS*
06040     else {  // *COLUMNS*
06041       $x = ($this->lMargin + ($this->pgwidth)/2) - ($w/2);
06042     } // *COLUMNS*
06043     $y = ($this->tMargin + ($this->h - ($this->tMargin + $this->bMargin))/2) - ($h/2);
06044     }
06045     else {  // default P - centred on whole page
06046     $x = ($this->w/2) - ($w/2);
06047     $y = ($this->h/2) - ($h/2);
06048     }
06049 /*-- IMAGES-WMF --*/
06050     if ($info['type']=='wmf') { 
06051     $sx = $w*$this->k / $info['w'];
06052     $sy = -$h*$this->k / $info['h'];
06053     $outstring = sprintf('q %f 0 0 %f %f %f cm /FO%d Do Q', $sx, $sy, $x*$this->k-$sx*$info['x'], (($this->h-$y)*$this->k)-$sy*$info['y'], $info['i']);
06054     }
06055     else  
06056 /*-- END IMAGES-WMF --*/
06057     // mPDF 4.3.013
06058     if ($info['type']=='svg') { 
06059     $sx = $w*$this->k / $info['w'];
06060     $sy = -$h*$this->k / $info['h'];
06061     $outstring = sprintf('q %f 0 0 %f %f %f cm /FO%d Do Q', $sx, $sy, $x*$this->k-$sx*$info['x'], (($this->h-$y)*$this->k)-$sy*$info['y'], $info['i']);
06062     }
06063     else { 
06064     $outstring = sprintf("q %.3f 0 0 %.3f %.3f %.3f cm /I%d Do Q",$w*$this->k,$h*$this->k,$x*$this->k,($this->h-($y+$h))*$this->k,$info['i']);
06065     }
06066 
06067     // mPDF 4.3.018
06068     if ($this->watermarkImgBehind) { 
06069     $outstring = $this->watermarkImgAlpha . "\n" . $outstring . "\n" . $this->SetAlpha(1, 'Normal', true) . "\n";
06070     $this->pages[$this->page] = preg_replace('/(___BACKGROUND___PATTERNS'.date('jY').')/', "\n".$outstring."\n".'\\1', $this->pages[$this->page]);
06071     }
06072     else { $this->_out($outstring); }
06073 
06074     return 0;
06075   } // end of IF watermark
