06076 /*-- END WATERMARK --*/
06077 
06078   if ($constrain) {
06079     // Automatically resize to maximum dimensions of page if too large
06080     if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width']) && $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width']) { $maxw = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width']; }
06081     else { $maxw = $this->pgwidth; }
06082     if ($w > $maxw) {
06083     $w = $maxw;
06084     $h=abs($w*$info['h']/$info['w']);
06085     }
06086     if ($h > $this->h - ($this->tMargin + $this->bMargin + 10))  {  // see below - +10 to avoid drawing too close to border of page
06087       $h = $this->h - ($this->tMargin + $this->bMargin + 10) ;  // mPDF 4.1
06088     if ($this->fullImageHeight) { $h = $this->fullImageHeight; }  // mPDF 4.1
06089     $w=abs($h*$info['w']/$info['h']);
06090     }
06091 
06092 
06093     //Avoid drawing out of the paper(exceeding width limits).
06094     //if ( ($x + $w) > $this->fw ) {
06095     if ( ($x + $w) > $this->w ) {
06096     $x = $this->lMargin;
06097     $y += 5;
06098     }
06099 
06100     $changedpage = false;
06101     $oldcolumn = $this->CurrCol;
06102     //Avoid drawing out of the page.
06103     if($y+$h>$this->PageBreakTrigger and !$this->InFooter and $this->AcceptPageBreak()) {
06104     $this->AddPage($this->CurOrientation);
06105     // Added to correct for OddEven Margins
06106     $x=$x +$this->MarginCorrection;
06107     $y = $tMargin + $this->margin_header;
06108     $changedpage = true;
06109     }
06110 /*-- COLUMNS --*/
06111     // COLS
06112     // COLUMN CHANGE
06113     if ($this->CurrCol != $oldcolumn) {
06114     $y = $this->y0;
06115     $x += $this->ChangeColumn * ($this->ColWidth+$this->ColGap);
06116     $this->x += $this->ChangeColumn * ($this->ColWidth+$this->ColGap);
06117     }
06118 /*-- END COLUMNS --*/
06119   } // end of IF constrain
06120 
06121 /*-- IMAGES-WMF --*/
06122   if ($info['type']=='wmf') { 
06123     $sx = $w*$this->k / $info['w'];
06124     $sy = -$h*$this->k / $info['h'];
06125     $outstring = sprintf('q %f 0 0 %f %f %f cm /FO%d Do Q', $sx, $sy, $x*$this->k-$sx*$info['x'], (($this->h-$y)*$this->k)-$sy*$info['y'], $info['i']);
06126   }
06127   else  
06128 /*-- END IMAGES-WMF --*/
06129   // mPDF 4.3.013
06130   if ($info['type']=='svg') { 
06131     $sx = $w*$this->k / $info['w'];
06132     $sy = -$h*$this->k / $info['h'];
06133     $outstring = sprintf('q %f 0 0 %f %f %f cm /FO%d Do Q', $sx, $sy, $x*$this->k-$sx*$info['x'], (($this->h-$y)*$this->k)-$sy*$info['y'], $info['i']);
06134   }
06135   else { 
06136     $outstring = sprintf("q %.3f 0 0 %.3f %.3f %.3f cm /I%d Do Q",$w*$this->k,$h*$this->k,$x*$this->k,($this->h-($y+$h))*$this->k,$info['i']);
06137   }
06138 
06139   if($paint) {
06140     $this->_out($outstring);
06141     if($link) $this->Link($x,$y,$w,$h,$link);
06142 
06143     // Avoid writing text on top of the image. // THIS WAS OUTSIDE THE if ($paint) bit!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
06144     $this->y = $y + $h;
06145   }
06146 
06147   //Return width-height array
06148   $sizesarray['WIDTH'] = $w;
06149   $sizesarray['HEIGHT'] = $h;
06150   $sizesarray['X'] = $x; //Position before painting image
06151   $sizesarray['Y'] = $y; //Position before painting image
06152   $sizesarray['OUTPUT'] = $outstring;
06153   // mPDF 3.0 Tiling patterns
06154   $sizesarray['IMAGE_ID'] = $info['i'];
06155   return $sizesarray;
06156 }
06157 
06158 
06159 
06160 //=============================================================
06161 //=============================================================
06162 //=============================================================
06163 //=============================================================
06164 //=============================================================
06165 // mPDF 4.0
06166 function _getObjAttr($t) {
06167   $c = explode("\xbb\xa4\xac",$t,2);
06168   $c = explode(",",$c[1],2);
06169   foreach($c as $v) {
06170     $v = explode("=",$v,2);
06171     $sp[$v[0]] = $v[1];
06172   }
06173   return (unserialize($sp['objattr']));
06174 }
06175 
06176 
06177 function inlineObject($type,$x,$y,$objattr,$Lmargin,$widthUsed,$maxWidth,$lineHeight,$paint=false,$is_table=false)
06178 {
06179    if ($is_table) { $k = $this->shrin_k; } else { $k = 1; }
06180 
06181    // NB $x is only used when paint=true
06182   // Lmargin not used
06183    $w = 0; 
06184    if (isset($objattr['width'])) { $w = $objattr['width']/$k; }
06185    $h = 0;
06186    if (isset($objattr['height'])) { $h = abs($objattr['height']/$k); }  
06187 
06188    $widthLeft = $maxWidth - $widthUsed;
06189    $maxHeight = $this->h - ($this->tMargin + $this->bMargin + 10) ; // mPDF 4.1
06190    if ($this->fullImageHeight) { $maxHeight = $this->fullImageHeight; } // mPDF 4.1
06191   // For Images
06192    if (isset($objattr['border_left'])) {
06193   $extraWidth = ($objattr['border_left']['w'] + $objattr['border_right']['w'] + $objattr['margin_left']+ $objattr['margin_right'])/$k;
06194   $extraHeight = ($objattr['border_top']['w'] + $objattr['border_bottom']['w'] + $objattr['margin_top']+ $objattr['margin_bottom'])/$k;
06195   // mPDF 4.0
06196   if ($type == 'image' || $type == 'barcode') {
06197     $extraWidth += ($objattr['padding_left'] + $objattr['padding_right'])/$k;
06198     $extraHeight += ($objattr['padding_top'] + $objattr['padding_bottom'])/$k;
06199   }
06200    }
06201 
06202    // mPDF 4.2 Failsafe (e.g. for HR)
06203    if (!isset($objattr['vertical-align'])) { $objattr['vertical-align'] = 'M'; }
06204 
06205    if ($type == 'image' || (isset($objattr['subtype']) && $objattr['subtype'] == 'IMAGE')) {
06206     if (isset($objattr['itype']) && ($objattr['itype'] == 'wmf' || $objattr['itype'] == 'svg')) { // mPDF 4.3.013
06207   $file = $objattr['file'];
06208   $info=$this->formobjects[$file];
06209     }
06210     else if (isset($objattr['file'])) {
06211   $file = $objattr['file'];
06212   $info=$this->images[$file];
06213     }
06214    }
06215     // mPDF 3.0
06216     if ($type == 'annot' || $type == 'bookmark' || $type == 'indexentry' || $type == 'toc') {
06217   $w = 0.00001;
06218   $h = 0.00001;
06219    }
06220 
06221    // TEST whether need to skipline
06222    if (!$paint) {
06223   if ($type == 'hr') {  // always force new line
06224     if (($y + $h + $lineHeight > $this->PageBreakTrigger) && !$this->InFooter && !$is_table) { return array(-2, $w ,$h ); } // New page + new line
06225     else { return array(1, $w ,$h ); } // new line
06226   }
06227   else {
06228     if ($widthUsed > 0 && $w > $widthLeft && (!$is_table || $type != 'image')) {  // New line needed
06229       if (($y + $h + $lineHeight > $this->PageBreakTrigger) && !$this->InFooter) { return array(-2,$w ,$h ); } // New page + new line
06230       return array(1,$w ,$h ); // new line
06231     }
06232     // mPDF 4.2.011
06233     else if ($widthUsed > 0 && $w > $widthLeft && $is_table) {  // New line needed in TABLE
06234       return array(1,$w ,$h ); // new line
06235     }
06236     // Will fit on line but NEW PAGE REQUIRED
06237     else if (($y + $h > $this->PageBreakTrigger) && !$this->InFooter && !$is_table) { return array(-1,$w ,$h ); }
06238     else { return array(0,$w ,$h ); }
06239   }
06240    }
06241 
06242     // mPDF 3.0
06243    if ($type == 'annot' || $type == 'bookmark' || $type == 'indexentry' || $type == 'toc') {
06244   $w = 0.00001;
06245   $h = 0.00001;
06246   $objattr['BORDER-WIDTH'] = 0;
06247   $objattr['BORDER-HEIGHT'] = 0;
06248   $objattr['BORDER-X'] = $x;
06249   $objattr['BORDER-Y'] = $y;
06250   $objattr['INNER-WIDTH'] = 0;
06251   $objattr['INNER-HEIGHT'] = 0;
06252   $objattr['INNER-X'] = $x;
06253   $objattr['INNER-Y'] = $y;
06254   }
06255 
06256   if ($type == 'image') {
06257   // Automatically resize to width remaining
06258   if ($w > $widthLeft  && !$is_table) {
06259     $w = $widthLeft ;
06260     $h=abs($w*$info['h']/$info['w']);
06261   }
06262   $img_w = $w - $extraWidth ;
06263   $img_h = $h - $extraHeight ;
06264   // mPDF 4.0
06265   $objattr['BORDER-WIDTH'] = $img_w + $objattr['padding_left']/$k + $objattr['padding_right']/$k + (($objattr['border_left']['w']/$k + $objattr['border_right']['w']/$k)/2) ;
06266   $objattr['BORDER-HEIGHT'] = $img_h + $objattr['padding_top']/$k + $objattr['padding_bottom']/$k + (($objattr['border_top']['w']/$k + $objattr['border_bottom']['w']/$k)/2) ;
06267   $objattr['BORDER-X'] = $x + $objattr['margin_left']/$k + (($objattr['border_left']['w']/$k)/2) ;
06268   $objattr['BORDER-Y'] = $y + $objattr['margin_top']/$k + (($objattr['border_top']['w']/$k)/2) ;
06269   $objattr['INNER-WIDTH'] = $img_w;
06270   $objattr['INNER-HEIGHT'] = $img_h;
06271   $objattr['INNER-X'] = $x + $objattr['padding_left']/$k + $objattr['margin_left']/$k + ($objattr['border_left']['w']/$k);
06272   $objattr['INNER-Y'] = $y + $objattr['padding_top']/$k + $objattr['margin_top']/$k + ($objattr['border_top']['w']/$k) ;
06273   $objattr['ID'] = $info['i'];
06274    }
06275 
06276    if ($type == 'input' && $objattr['subtype'] == 'IMAGE') { 
06277   $img_w = $w - $extraWidth ;
06278   $img_h = $h - $extraHeight ;
06279   $objattr['BORDER-WIDTH'] = $img_w + (($objattr['border_left']['w']/$k + $objattr['border_right']['w']/$k)/2) ;
06280   $objattr['BORDER-HEIGHT'] = $img_h + (($objattr['border_top']['w']/$k + $objattr['border_bottom']['w']/$k)/2) ;
06281   $objattr['BORDER-X'] = $x + $objattr['margin_left']/$k + (($objattr['border_left']['w']/$k)/2) ;
06282   $objattr['BORDER-Y'] = $y + $objattr['margin_top']/$k + (($objattr['border_top']['w']/$k)/2) ;
06283   $objattr['INNER-WIDTH'] = $img_w;
06284   $objattr['INNER-HEIGHT'] = $img_h;
06285   $objattr['INNER-X'] = $x + $objattr['margin_left']/$k + ($objattr['border_left']['w']/$k);
06286   $objattr['INNER-Y'] = $y + $objattr['margin_top']/$k + ($objattr['border_top']['w']/$k) ;
06287   $objattr['ID'] = $info['i'];
06288    }
06289 
06290 /*-- BARCODES --*/
06291   // mPDF 4.0
06292   if ($type == 'barcode') {
06293   $b_w = $w - $extraWidth ;
06294   $b_h = $h - $extraHeight ;
06295   $objattr['BORDER-WIDTH'] = $b_w + $objattr['padding_left']/$k + $objattr['padding_right']/$k + (($objattr['border_left']['w']/$k + $objattr['border_right']['w']/$k)/2) ;
06296   $objattr['BORDER-HEIGHT'] = $b_h + $objattr['padding_top']/$k + $objattr['padding_bottom']/$k + (($objattr['border_top']['w']/$k + $objattr['border_bottom']['w']/$k)/2) ;
06297   $objattr['BORDER-X'] = $x + $objattr['margin_left']/$k + (($objattr['border_left']['w']/$k)/2) ;
06298   $objattr['BORDER-Y'] = $y + $objattr['margin_top']/$k + (($objattr['border_top']['w']/$k)/2) ;
06299   $objattr['INNER-WIDTH'] = $img_w;
06300   $objattr['INNER-HEIGHT'] = $img_h;
06301   $objattr['INNER-X'] = $x + $objattr['padding_left']/$k + $objattr['margin_left']/$k + ($objattr['border_left']['w']/$k);
06302   $objattr['INNER-Y'] = $y + $objattr['padding_top']/$k + $objattr['margin_top']/$k + ($objattr['border_top']['w']/$k) ;
06303    }
06304 /*-- END BARCODES --*/
06305 
06306 
06307    if ($type == 'textarea') {
06308   // Automatically resize to width remaining
06309   if ($w > $widthLeft && !$is_table) {
06310     $w = $widthLeft ;
06311   }
06312   if (($y + $h > $this->PageBreakTrigger) && !$this->InFooter) {
06313     $h=$this->h - $y - $this->bMargin;
06314   }
06315    }
06316 
06317    if ($type == 'hr') {
06318   if ($is_table) { 
06319     $objattr['INNER-WIDTH'] = $maxWidth * $objattr['W-PERCENT']/100; 
06320     $objattr['width'] = $objattr['INNER-WIDTH']; 
06321     // mPDF 3.0
06322     $w = $maxWidth;
06323   }
06324   else { 
06325     if ($w>$maxWidth) { $w = $maxWidth; }
06326     $objattr['INNER-WIDTH'] = $w; 
06327     // mPDF 3.0
06328     $w = $maxWidth;
06329   }
06330   }
06331 
06332 
06333 
06334    if (($type == 'select') || ($type == 'input' && ($objattr['subtype'] == 'TEXT' || $objattr['subtype'] == 'PASSWORD'))) {
06335   // Automatically resize to width remaining
06336   if ($w > $widthLeft && !$is_table) {
06337     $w = $widthLeft;
06338   }
06339    }
06340 
06341    if ($type == 'textarea' || $type == 'select' || $type == 'input') {
06342   if (isset($objattr['fontsize'])) $objattr['fontsize'] /= $k;
06343   if (isset($objattr['linewidth'])) $objattr['linewidth'] /= $k;
06344    }
06345 
06346   // mPDF 3.0
06347    if (!isset($objattr['BORDER-Y'])) { $objattr['BORDER-Y'] = 0; }
06348    if (!isset($objattr['BORDER-X'])) { $objattr['BORDER-X'] = 0; }
06349    if (!isset($objattr['INNER-Y'])) { $objattr['INNER-Y'] = 0; }
06350    if (!isset($objattr['INNER-X'])) { $objattr['INNER-X'] = 0; }
06351 
06352    //Return width-height array
06353    $objattr['OUTER-WIDTH'] = $w;
06354    $objattr['OUTER-HEIGHT'] = $h;
06355    $objattr['OUTER-X'] = $x;
06356    $objattr['OUTER-Y'] = $y;
06357    return $objattr;
06358 }
06359 
06360 
06361 //=============================================================
06362 //=============================================================
06363 //=============================================================
06364 //=============================================================
06365 //=============================================================
06366 
06367 
06368 
06369 
06370 function SetDash($black=false,$white=false)
06371 {
06372         if($black and $white) $s=sprintf('[%.3f %.3f] 0 d',$black*$this->k,$white*$this->k);
06373         else $s='[] 0 d';
06374   if($this->page>0 && ((isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['Dash']) && $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['Dash'] != $s) || !isset($this->pageoutput[$this->page]['Dash']) || $this->keep_block_together)) { $this->_out($s); }
06375   $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['Dash'] = $s;
06376 
06377 }
06378 
06379 function SetDisplayPreferences($preferences) {
06380   // String containing any or none of /HideMenubar/HideToolbar/HideWindowUI/DisplayDocTitle/CenterWindow/FitWindow
06381     $this->DisplayPreferences .= $preferences;
06382 }
06383 
06384 
06385 function Ln($h='',$collapsible=0)
06386 {
06387 // Added collapsible to allow collapsible top-margin on new page
06388   //Line feed; default value is last cell height
06389   $this->x = $this->lMargin + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['outer_left_margin'];
06390   if ($collapsible && ($this->y==$this->tMargin) && (!$this->ColActive)) { $h = 0; }
06391   if(is_string($h)) $this->y+=$this->lasth;
06392   else $this->y+=$h;
06393 }
06394 
06395 
06396 // mPDF 3.0 Also does border when Columns active
06397 // $state = 0 normal; 1 top; 2 bottom; 3 top and bottom
06398 function DivLn($h,$level=-3,$move_y=true,$collapsible=false,$state=0) {
06399   // this->x is returned as it was
06400   // adds lines (y) where DIV bgcolors are filled in
06401   // mPDF 4.2 allows .00001 as nominal height used for bookmarks/annotations etc.
06402   if ($collapsible && (sprintf("%0.4f", $this->y)==sprintf("%0.4f", $this->tMargin)) && (!$this->ColActive)) { return; }
06403   if ($collapsible && (sprintf("%0.4f", $this->y)==sprintf("%0.4f", $this->y0)) && ($this->ColActive) && $this->CurrCol == 0) { return; } // *COLUMNS*
06404 
06405   // mPDF 3.0
06406   // Still use this method if columns or page-break-inside: avoid, as it allows repositioning later
06407   // otherwise, now uses PaintDivBB()
06408   if (!$this->ColActive && !$this->keep_block_together && !$this->kwt) {  // mPDF 4.0 added kwt
06409   if ($move_y && !$this->ColActive) { $this->y += $h; }
06410   return; 
06411   }
06412 
06413   if ($level == -3) { $level = $this->blklvl; }
06414   $firstblockfill = $this->GetFirstBlockFill();
06415   if ($firstblockfill && $this->blklvl > 0 && $this->blklvl >= $firstblockfill) {
06416   $last_x = 0;
06417   $last_w = 0;
06418   $last_fc = $this->FillColor;
06419   $bak_x = $this->x;
06420   $bak_h = $this->divheight;
06421   $this->divheight = 0; // Temporarily turn off divheight - as Cell() uses it to check for PageBreak
06422   for ($blvl=$firstblockfill;$blvl<=$level;$blvl++) {
06423     $this->SetBlockFill($blvl);
06424     $this->x = $this->lMargin + $this->blk[$blvl]['outer_left_margin'];
06425     if ($last_x != $this->lMargin + $this->blk[$blvl]['outer_left_margin'] || $last_w != $this->blk[$blvl]['width'] || $last_fc != $this->FillColor) {
06426       $x = $this->x;  // mPDF 3.0
06427       $this->Cell( ($this->blk[$blvl]['width']), $h, '', '', 0, '', 1);
06428       // mPDF 3.0 Also does border when Columns active
06429       if (!$this->keep_block_together && !$this->writingHTMLheader && !$this->writingHTMLfooter) {
06430         $this->x = $x;
06431         // $state = 0 normal; 1 top; 2 bottom; 3 top and bottom
06432         if ($blvl == $this->blklvl) { $this->PaintDivLnBorder($state,$blvl,$h); }
06433         else { $this->PaintDivLnBorder(0,$blvl,$h); }
06434       }
06435     }
06436     $last_x = $this->lMargin + $this->blk[$blvl]['outer_left_margin'];
06437     $last_w = $this->blk[$blvl]['width'];
06438     $last_fc = $this->FillColor;
06439   }
06440   // Reset current block fill
06441   if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['bgcolorarray'])) { 
06442     $bcor = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['bgcolorarray'];
06443     $this->SetFillColor($bcor['R'],$bcor['G'],$bcor['B']);
06444   }
06445   $this->x = $bak_x;
06446   $this->divheight = $bak_h;
06447   }
06448   if ($move_y) { $this->y += $h; }
06449 }
06450 
06451 function GetX()
06452 {
06453   //Get x position
06454   return $this->x;
06455 }
06456 
06457 function SetX($x)
06458 {
06459   //Set x position
06460   if($x >= 0) $this->x=$x;
06461   else $this->x = $this->w + $x;
06462 }
06463 
06464 function GetY()
06465 {
06466   //Get y position
06467   return $this->y;
06468 }
06469 
06470 function SetY($y)
06471 {
06472   //Set y position and reset x
06473   $this->x=$this->lMargin;
06474   if($y>=0)
06475     $this->y=$y;
06476   else
06477     $this->y=$this->h+$y;
06478 }
06479 
06480 function SetXY($x,$y)
06481 {
06482   //Set x and y positions
06483   $this->SetY($y);
06484   $this->SetX($x);
06485 }
06486 
06487 
06488 
06489 function Output($name='',$dest='')
06490 {
06491 
06492   //Output PDF to some destination
06493   global $_SERVER;
06494   // mPDF 4.0
06495   if ($this->showStats) {
06496     echo '<div>Generated in '.sprintf('%.2f',(microtime(true) - $this->time0)).' seconds</div>';
06497   }
06498   //Finish document if necessary
06499   if ($this->progressBar) { $this->UpdateProgressBar(1,'100','Finished'); } // *PROGRESS-BAR*
06500   if($this->state < 3) $this->Close();
06501   if ($this->progressBar) { $this->UpdateProgressBar(2,'100','Finished'); } // *PROGRESS-BAR*
06502   // fn. error_get_last is only in PHP>=5.2
06503   if ($this->debug && function_exists('error_get_last') && error_get_last()) {
06504      $e = error_get_last(); 
06505      if (($e['type'] < 2048 && $e['type'] != 8) || (intval($e['type']) & intval(ini_get("error_reporting")))) {
06506     echo "<p>Error message detected - PDF file generation aborted.</p>"; 
06507     echo $e['message'].'<br />';
06508     echo 'File: '.$e['file'].'<br />';
06509     echo 'Line: '.$e['line'].'<br />';
06510     exit; 
06511      }
06512   }
06513 
06514   // mPDF 4.2.018
06515   if ($this->PDFA && $this->encrypted) { $this->Error("PDFA1-b does not permit encryption of documents."); }
06516   if (count($this->PDFAwarnings) && $this->PDFA && !$this->PDFAauto) {
06517     echo '<div>WARNING - This file could not be generated as it stands as a PDFA1-b compliant file.</div>';
06518     echo '<div>These issues can be automatically fixed by mPDF using <i>$mpdf-&gt;PDFAauto=true;</i></div>';
06519     echo '<div>Action that mPDF will take to automatically force PDFA1-b compliance are shown in brackets.</div>';
06520     echo '<div>Warning(s) generated:</div><ul>';
06521     foreach($this->PDFAwarnings AS $w) {
06522       echo '<li>'.$w.'</li>';
06523     }
06524     echo '</ul>';
06525     exit;
06526   }
06527 
06528   // mPDF 4.0
06529   if ($this->showStats) {
06530     echo '<div>Compiled in '.sprintf('%.2f',(microtime(true) - $this->time0)).' seconds (total)</div>';
06531     echo '<div>Peak Memory usage '.number_format((memory_get_peak_usage(true)/(1024*1024)),2).' MB</div>';
06532     echo '<div>PDF file size '.number_format((strlen($this->buffer)/1024)).' kB</div>';
06533     echo '<div>Number of fonts '.count($this->fonts).'</div>';
06534     exit;
06535   }
06536 
06537   if(is_bool($dest)) $dest=$dest ? 'D' : 'F';
06538   $dest=strtoupper($dest);
06539   if($dest=='') {
06540     if($name=='') {
06541       $name='mpdf.pdf';
06542       $dest='I';
06543     }
06544     else { $dest='F'; }
06545   }
06546 
06547 /*-- PROGRESS-BAR --*/
06548   // mPDF 4.2 Progress bar
06549   if ($this->progressBar && ($dest=='D' || $dest=='I')) {
06550     if($name=='') { $name='mpdf.pdf'; }
06551     $tempfile = '_tempPDF'.RAND(1,10000);
06552     //Save to local file
06553     $f=fopen(_MPDF_TEMP_PATH.$tempfile.'.pdf','wb');  // mPDF 4.3.007E
06554     if(!$f) $this->Error('Unable to create temporary output file: '.$tempfile.'.pdf');
06555     fwrite($f,$this->buffer,strlen($this->buffer));
06556     fclose($f);
06557     $this->UpdateProgressBar(3,'','Finished');
06558     echo '<script type="text/javascript">
06559     location.href="'._MPDF_URI.'progress/out.php?filename='.$tempfile.'&dest='.$dest.'&opname='.$name.'";
06560         </script>
06561     </div>
06562     </body>
06563     </html>';
06564     exit;
06565   }
06566   else {
06567     if ($this->progressBar) { $this->UpdateProgressBar(3,'','Finished'); }
06568 /*-- END PROGRESS-BAR --*/
06569     switch($dest) {
06570        case 'I':
06571       // mPDF 3.0 // Edited mPDF 3.1
06572       if ($this->debug && !$this->allow_output_buffering && ob_get_contents()) { echo "<p>Output has already been sent from the script - PDF file generation aborted.</p>"; exit; }
06573       //Send to standard output
06574       if(isset($_SERVER['SERVER_NAME']))
06575       {
06576         //We send to a browser
06577         header('Content-Type: application/pdf');
06578         if(headers_sent())
06579           $this->Error('Some data has already been output to browser, can\'t send PDF file');
06580         header('Content-Length: '.strlen($this->buffer));
06581         header('Content-disposition: inline; filename="'.$name.'"');  // mPDF 4.3.007B
06582         // mPDF 4.2
06583         header('Pragma: no-cache');
06584         // mPDF 4.3.012B IE6 : this header avoid IE6 to open directly the pdf file
06585         //header('Cache-Control: no-cache, must-revalidate');
06586         header('Cache-Control: maxage=0');
06587 
06588       }
06589       echo $this->buffer;
06590       break;
06591        case 'D':
06592       //Download file
06593       // mPDF 4.0
06594       if(isset($_SERVER['HTTP_USER_AGENT']) and strpos($_SERVER['HTTP_USER_AGENT'],'MSIE')) {
06595         if(isset($_SERVER['HTTPS']) && $_SERVER['HTTPS']=='on') {
06596           header('HTTP/1.1 200 OK');
06597           header('Status: 200 OK');
06598           header('Pragma: anytextexeptno-cache', true);
06599           header("Cache-Control: public, must-revalidate");
06600         } 
06601         else {
06602           header('Pragma: no-cache');
06603           // mPDF 4.3.012B IE6 : this header avoid IE6 to open directly the pdf file
06604           //header('Cache-Control: no-cache, must-revalidate');
06605           header('Cache-Control: maxage=0');
06606         }
06607         header('Content-Type: application/force-download');
06608       } 
06609       else {
06610         header('Content-Type: application/octet-stream');
06611       }
06612       if(headers_sent())
06613         $this->Error('Some data has already been output to browser, can\'t send PDF file');
06614       header('Content-Length: '.strlen($this->buffer));
06615       header('Content-disposition: attachment; filename="'.$name.'"');  // mPDF 4.3.007B
06616       echo $this->buffer;
06617       break;
06618        case 'F':
06619       //Save to local file
06620       $f=fopen($name,'wb');
06621       if(!$f) $this->Error('Unable to create output file: '.$name);
06622       fwrite($f,$this->buffer,strlen($this->buffer));
06623       fclose($f);
06624       break;
06625        case 'S':
06626       //Return as a string
06627       return $this->buffer;
06628        default:
06629       $this->Error('Incorrect output destination: '.$dest);
06630     }
06631 /*-- PROGRESS-BAR --*/
06632   }
06633 /*-- END PROGRESS-BAR --*/
06634   return '';
06635 }
06636 
06637 
06638 // *****************************************************************************
06639 //                                                                             *
06640 //                             Protected methods                               *
06641 //                                                                             *
06642 // *****************************************************************************
06643 function _dochecks()
06644 {
06645   //Check for locale-related bug
06646   if(1.1==1)
06647     $this->Error('Don\'t alter the locale before including class file');
06648   //Check for decimal separator
06649   if(sprintf('%.1f',1.0)!='1.0')
06650     setlocale(LC_NUMERIC,'C');
06651 }
06652 
06653 function _begindoc()
06654 {
06655   //Start document
06656   $this->state=1;
06657   $this->_out('%PDF-'.$this->pdf_version);
06658   $this->_out('%'.chr(226).chr(227).chr(207).chr(211)); // mPDF 4.2.018  4 chars > 128 to show binary file
06659 }
06660 
06661 
06662 /*-- HTMLHEADERS-FOOTERS --*/
06663 // mPDF 4.0 Write out all HTML Headers and Footers
06664 function _puthtmlheaders() {
06665   $this->state=2;
06666   $nb=$this->page;
06667   for($n=1;$n<=$nb;$n++) {
06668     if ($this->mirrorMargins && $n%2==0) { $OE = 'E'; } // EVEN
06669     else { $OE = 'O'; }
06670     $this->page = $n;
06671     if (isset($this->saveHTMLHeader[$n][$OE])) {
06672     $html = $this->saveHTMLHeader[$n][$OE]['html'];
06673     $this->lMargin = $this->saveHTMLHeader[$n][$OE]['ml'];
06674     $this->rMargin = $this->saveHTMLHeader[$n][$OE]['mr'];
06675     $this->tMargin = $this->saveHTMLHeader[$n][$OE]['mh'];
06676     $this->bMargin = $this->saveHTMLHeader[$n][$OE]['mf'];
06677     $this->margin_header = $this->saveHTMLHeader[$n][$OE]['mh'];
06678     $this->margin_footer = $this->saveHTMLHeader[$n][$OE]['mf'];
06679     $this->w = $this->saveHTMLHeader[$n][$OE]['pw'];
06680     $this->h = $this->saveHTMLHeader[$n][$OE]['ph'];
06681     $rotate = $this->saveHTMLHeader[$n][$OE]['rotate'];
06682     $this->Reset();
06683     $this->pageoutput[$n] = array();
06684     $this->pgwidth = $this->w - $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin;
06685     $this->x = $this->lMargin;
06686     $this->y = $this->margin_header;
06687 
06688     $html = str_replace('{PAGENO}',$this->pagenumPrefix.$this->docPageNum($n).$this->pagenumSuffix,$html);
06689     $html = str_replace($this->aliasNbPgGp,$this->nbpgPrefix.$this->docPageNumTotal($n).$this->nbpgSuffix,$html );  // {nbpg}
06690     $html = str_replace($this->aliasNbPg,$nb,$html ); // {nb}
06691     $html = preg_replace('/\{DATE\s+(.*?)\}/e',"date('\\1')",$html );
06692 
06693     $this->HTMLheaderPageLinks = array();
06694     $this->pageBackgrounds = array();
06695 
06696     $this->writingHTMLheader = true;
06697     $this->WriteHTML($html , 4);  // parameter 4 saves output to $this->headerbuffer
06698     $this->writingHTMLheader = false;
06699     $this->Reset();
06700     $this->pageoutput[$n] = array();
06701 
06702     $s = $this->PrintPageBackgrounds();
06703     $this->headerbuffer = $s . $this->headerbuffer;
06704 
06705     $os = '';
06706     if ($rotate) {
06707       $os .= sprintf('q 0 -1 1 0 0 %.3f cm ',($this->w*$this->k));
06708     }
06709     $os .= $this->headerbuffer ;
06710     if ($rotate) {
06711       $os .= ' Q' . "\n";
06712     }
06713 
06714     // Writes over the page background but behind any other output on page
06715     $os = preg_replace('/\\\\/','\\\\\\\\',$os);  // mPDF 4.3.012C
06716     $this->pages[$n] = preg_replace('/(___BACKGROUND___PATTERNS'.date('jY').')/', "\n".$os."\n".'\\1', $this->pages[$n]);
06717 
06718     // mPDF 4.0
06719     $lks = $this->HTMLheaderPageLinks; 
06720     foreach($lks AS $lk) {
06721       if ($rotate) {
06722         $lw = $lk[2];
06723         $lh = $lk[3];
06724         $lk[2] = $lh;
06725         $lk[3] = $lw; // swap width and height
06726         $ax = $lk[0]/$this->k;
06727         $ay = $lk[1]/$this->k;
06728         $bx = $ay-($lh/$this->k);
06729         $by = $this->w-$ax;
06730         $lk[0] = $bx*$this->k;
06731         $lk[1] = ($this->h-$by)*$this->k - $lw;
06732       }
06733       $this->PageLinks[$n][]=$lk;
06734     }
06735 
06736 
06737     }
06738     if (isset($this->saveHTMLFooter[$n][$OE])) {
06739     $html = $this->saveHTMLFooter[$this->page][$OE]['html'];
06740     $this->lMargin = $this->saveHTMLFooter[$n][$OE]['ml'];
06741     $this->rMargin = $this->saveHTMLFooter[$n][$OE]['mr'];
06742     $this->tMargin = $this->saveHTMLFooter[$n][$OE]['mh'];
06743     $this->bMargin = $this->saveHTMLFooter[$n][$OE]['mf'];
06744     $this->margin_header = $this->saveHTMLFooter[$n][$OE]['mh'];
06745     $this->margin_footer = $this->saveHTMLFooter[$n][$OE]['mf'];
06746     $this->w = $this->saveHTMLFooter[$n][$OE]['pw'];
06747     $this->h = $this->saveHTMLFooter[$n][$OE]['ph'];
06748     $rotate = $this->saveHTMLFooter[$n][$OE]['rotate'];
06749     $this->Reset();
06750     $this->pageoutput[$n] = array();
06751     $this->pgwidth = $this->w - $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin;
06752     $this->x = $this->lMargin;
06753     $top_y = $this->y = $this->h - $this->margin_footer;
06754 
06755     // if bottom-margin==0, corrects to avoid division by zero
06756     if ($this->y == $this->h) { $top_y = $this->y = ($this->h - 0.1); }
06757 
06758     $html = str_replace('{PAGENO}',$this->pagenumPrefix.$this->docPageNum($n).$this->pagenumSuffix,$html);
06759     $html = str_replace($this->aliasNbPgGp,$this->nbpgPrefix.$this->docPageNumTotal($n).$this->nbpgSuffix,$html );  // {nbpg}
06760     $html = str_replace($this->aliasNbPg,$nb,$html ); // {nb}
06761     $html = preg_replace('/\{DATE\s+(.*?)\}/e',"date('\\1')",$html );
06762 
06763 
06764     $this->HTMLheaderPageLinks = array();
06765     $this->pageBackgrounds = array();
06766 
06767     $this->writingHTMLfooter = true;
06768     $this->InFooter = true;
06769     $this->WriteHTML($html , 4);  // parameter 4 saves output to $this->headerbuffer
06770     $this->writingHTMLfooter = false;
06771     $this->InFooter = false;
06772     $this->Reset();
06773     $this->pageoutput[$n] = array();
06774 
06775     $fheight = $this->y - $top_y;
06776     $adj = -$fheight;
06777 
06778     $s = $this->PrintPageBackgrounds(-$adj);  // mPDF 4.2.014
06779     $this->headerbuffer = $s . $this->headerbuffer;
06780 
06781     $os = '';
06782     $os .= $this->StartTransform(true)."\n";
06783     if ($rotate) {
06784       $os .= sprintf('q 0 -1 1 0 0 %.3f cm ',($this->w*$this->k));
06785     }
06786     $os .= $this->transformTranslate(0, $adj, true)."\n";
06787     $os .= $this->headerbuffer ;
06788     if ($rotate) {
06789       $os .= ' Q' . "\n";
06790     }
06791     $os .= $this->StopTransform(true)."\n";
06792     // Writes over the page background but behind any other output on page
06793     $os = preg_replace('/\\\\/','\\\\\\\\',$os);  // mPDF 4.3.012C
06794     $this->pages[$n] = preg_replace('/(___BACKGROUND___PATTERNS'.date('jY').')/', "\n".$os."\n".'\\1', $this->pages[$n]);
06795 
06796     // mPDF 4.0
06797     $lks = $this->HTMLheaderPageLinks; 
06798     foreach($lks AS $lk) {
06799       $lk[1] -= $adj*$this->k;
06800       if ($rotate) {
06801         $lw = $lk[2];
06802         $lh = $lk[3];
06803         $lk[2] = $lh;
06804         $lk[3] = $lw; // swap width and height
06805 
06806         $ax = $lk[0]/$this->k;
06807         $ay = $lk[1]/$this->k;
06808         $bx = $ay-($lh/$this->k);
06809         $by = $this->w-$ax;
06810         $lk[0] = $bx*$this->k;
06811         $lk[1] = ($this->h-$by)*$this->k - $lw;
06812       }
06813       $this->PageLinks[$n][]=$lk;
06814     }
06815     }
06816   }
06817   $this->page=$nb;
06818   $this->state=1;
06819 }
06820 /*-- END HTMLHEADERS-FOOTERS --*/
06821 
06822 
06823 function _putpages()
06824 {
06825   $nb=$this->page;
06826   $filter=($this->compress) ? '/Filter /FlateDecode ' : '';
06827 
06828   // mPDF 4.2.024  Changed to 'def' 
06829   if($this->DefOrientation=='P') {
06830     $defwPt=$this->fwPt;
06831     $defhPt=$this->fhPt;
06832   }
06833   else {
06834     $defwPt=$this->fhPt;
06835     $defhPt=$this->fwPt;
06836   }
06837   $annotid=(3+2*$nb);
06838   for($n=1;$n<=$nb;$n++)
06839   {
06840     // mPDF 4.2.024
06841     if(isset($this->OrientationChanges[$n])) { 
06842       $hPt=$this->pageDim[$n]['w']*$this->k;
06843       $wPt=$this->pageDim[$n]['h']*$this->k;
06844     }
06845     else { 
06846       $wPt=$this->pageDim[$n]['w']*$this->k;
06847       $hPt=$this->pageDim[$n]['h']*$this->k;
06848     }
06849     // mPDF 4.0 Moved
06850     //Replace number of pages
06851     if(!empty($this->aliasNbPg)) {
06852       // mPDF 4.0
06853       if ($this->is_MB && !$this->useSubsets) { $s1 = $this->UTF8ToUTF16BE($this->aliasNbPg, false); }
06854       else { $s1 = $this->aliasNbPg; }
06855       if ($this->useSubsets) { 
06856         $r = '';
06857         $nstr = "$nb";
06858         for($i=0;$i<strlen($nstr);$i++) {
06859           $r .= sprintf("%02s", strtoupper(dechex(intval($nstr{$i})+33))); 
06860         }
06861       }
06862       else if ($this->is_MB) { $r = $this->UTF8ToUTF16BE($nb, false); } // *UNICODE-FONTS*
06863       else { $r = $nb; }
06864       if (preg_match_all('/{mpdfheadernbpg (C|R) ff=(\S*) fs=(\S*) fz=(.*?)}/',$this->pages[$n],$m)) {
06865         for($hi=0;$hi<count($m[0]);$hi++) {
06866           $pos = $m[1][$hi];
06867           $hff = $m[2][$hi];
06868           $hfst = $m[3][$hi];
06869           $hfsz = $m[4][$hi];
06870           $this->SetFont($hff,$hfst,$hfsz, false);
06871           $x1 = $this->GetStringWidth($this->aliasNbPg);
06872           $x2 = $this->GetStringWidth($nb);
06873           $xadj = $x1 - $x2;
06874           if ($pos=='C') { $xadj /= 2; }
06875           $rep = sprintf(' q 1 0 0 1 %.3f 0 cm ', $xadj*$this->k); 
06876           $this->pages[$n] = str_replace($m[0][$hi], $rep, $this->pages[$n]);
06877         }
06878       }
06879       $this->pages[$n]=str_replace($s1,$r,$this->pages[$n]);
06880     }
06881     //Replace number of pages in group
06882     if(!empty($this->aliasNbPgGp)) {
06883       // mPDF 4.0
06884       if ($this->is_MB && !$this->useSubsets) { $s2 = $this->UTF8ToUTF16BE($this->aliasNbPgGp, false); }
06885       else { $s2 = $this->aliasNbPgGp; }
06886       $nbt = $this->docPageNumTotal($n);
06887       if ($this->useSubsets) { 
06888         $r = '';
06889         $nstr = "$nbt";
06890         for($i=0;$i<strlen($nstr);$i++) {
06891           $r .= sprintf("%02s", strtoupper(dechex(intval($nstr{$i})+33))); 
06892         }
06893       }
06894       else if ($this->is_MB) { $r = $this->UTF8ToUTF16BE($nbt, false); }  // *UNICODE-FONTS*
06895       else { $r = $nbt; }
06896       if (preg_match_all('/{mpdfheadernbpggp (C|R) ff=(\S*) fs=(\S*) fz=(.*?)}/',$this->pages[$n],$m)) {
06897         for($hi=0;$hi<count($m[0]);$hi++) {
06898           $pos = $m[1][$hi];
06899           $hff = $m[2][$hi];
06900           $hfst = $m[3][$hi];
06901           $hfsz = $m[4][$hi];
06902           $this->SetFont($hff,$hfst,$hfsz, false);
06903           $x1 = $this->GetStringWidth($this->aliasNbPgGp);
06904           // mPDF 3.0
06905           $x2 = $this->GetStringWidth($nbt);
06906           $xadj = $x1 - $x2;
06907           if ($pos=='C') { $xadj /= 2; }
06908           $rep = sprintf(' q 1 0 0 1 %.3f 0 cm ', $xadj*$this->k); 
06909           $this->pages[$n] = str_replace($m[0][$hi], $rep, $this->pages[$n]);
06910         }
06911       }
06912       $this->pages[$n]=str_replace($s2,$r,$this->pages[$n]);
06913     }
06914 
06915     // mPDF 3.0 Remove Pattern marker
06916     $this->pages[$n] = preg_replace('/(___BACKGROUND___PATTERNS'.date('jY').')/', "\n", $this->pages[$n]);
06917 
06918     //Page
06919     $this->_newobj();
06920     $this->_out('<</Type /Page');
06921     $this->_out('/Parent 1 0 R');
06922     if(isset($this->OrientationChanges[$n])) {
06923       $this->_out(sprintf('/MediaBox [0 0 %.3f %.3f]',$hPt,$wPt));
06924       if (isset($this->OrientationChanges[$n]) && $this->displayDefaultOrientation) {
06925         if ($this->DefOrientation=='P') { $this->_out('/Rotate 270'); }
06926         else { $this->_out('/Rotate 90'); }
06927       }
06928     }
06929     // mPDF 4.2.024
06930     else if($wPt != $defwPt || $hPt != $defhPt) {
06931       $this->_out(sprintf('/MediaBox [0 0 %.3f %.3f]',$wPt,$hPt));
06932     }
06933     $this->_out('/Resources 2 0 R');
06934 
06935     $annotsnum = 0;
06936     if (isset($this->PageLinks[$n])) { $annotsnum += count($this->PageLinks[$n]); }
06937 /*-- ANNOTATIONS --*/
06938     // mPDF 4.2.027
06939     if (isset($this->PageAnnots[$n])) { 
06940       foreach ($this->PageAnnots[$n] as $pl) {
06941         if (!empty($pl['opt']['popup'])) { $annotsnum += 2 ; }
06942         else { $annotsnum++; }
06943       }
06944     }
06945 /*-- END ANNOTATIONS --*/
06946     if ($annotsnum ) {
06947       $s = '/Annots [ ';
06948       for($i=0;$i<$annotsnum;$i++) { 
06949         $s .= ($annotid + $i) . ' 0 R ';
06950       } 
06951       $annotid += $annotsnum;
06952       $s .= '] ';
06953       $this->_out($s);
06954     }
06955 
06956     $this->_out('/Contents '.($this->n+1).' 0 R>>');
06957     $this->_out('endobj');
06958 
06959     //Page content
06960     $this->_newobj();
06961     $p=($this->compress) ? gzcompress($this->pages[$n]) : $this->pages[$n];
06962     $this->_out('<<'.$filter.'/Length '.strlen($p).'>>');
06963     $this->_putstream($p);
06964     $this->_out('endobj');
06965   }
06966   $this->_putannots($n);
06967 
06968 
06969   //Pages root
06970   $this->offsets[1]=strlen($this->buffer);
06971   $this->_out('1 0 obj');
06972   $this->_out('<</Type /Pages');
06973   $kids='/Kids [';
06974   for($i=0;$i<$nb;$i++)
06975     $kids.=(3+2*$i).' 0 R ';
06976   $this->_out($kids.']');
06977   $this->_out('/Count '.$nb);
06978   $this->_out(sprintf('/MediaBox [0 0 %.3f %.3f]',$defwPt,$defhPt));  // mPDF 4.2.024
06979   $this->_out('>>');
06980   $this->_out('endobj');
06981 }
06982 
06983 
06984 function _putannots($n) {
06985   $nb=$this->page;
06986   for($n=1;$n<=$nb;$n++)
06987   {
06988     $annotobjs = array();
06989     if(isset($this->PageLinks[$n]) || isset($this->PageAnnots[$n])) {
06990       $wPt=$this->pageDim[$n]['w']*$this->k;
06991       $hPt=$this->pageDim[$n]['h']*$this->k;
06992 
06993       //Links
06994       if(isset($this->PageLinks[$n])) {
06995          foreach($this->PageLinks[$n] as $key => $pl) {
06996         $this->_newobj();
06997         $annot='';
06998         $rect=sprintf('%.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f',$pl[0],$pl[1],$pl[0]+$pl[2],$pl[1]-$pl[3]);
06999         $annot .= '<</Type /Annot /Subtype /Link /Rect ['.$rect.']';
07000         $annot .= ' /Contents '.$this->_UTF16BEtextstring($pl[4]);
07001         $annot .= ' /NM ('.sprintf('%04u-%04u', $n, $key).')';
07002         $annot .= ' /M '.$this->_textstring('D:'.date('YmdHis'));
07003         $annot .= ' /Border [0 0 0]';
07004         // mPDF 4.2.018
07005         if ($this->PDFA) { $annot .= ' /F 28'; }
07006         if (strpos($pl[4],'@')===0) {
07007           $p=substr($pl[4],1);
07008           //  $h=isset($this->OrientationChanges[$p]) ? $wPt : $hPt;
07009           $htarg=$this->pageDim[$p]['h']*$this->k;
07010           $annot.=sprintf(' /Dest [%d 0 R /XYZ 0 %.3f null]>>',1+2*$p,$htarg);
07011         }
07012         else if(is_string($pl[4])) {
07013           $annot .= ' /A <</S /URI /URI '.$this->_textstring($pl[4]).'>> >>';
07014         }
07015         else {
07016           $l=$this->links[$pl[4]];
07017           // mPDF 3.0
07018           // may not be set if #link points to non-existent target
07019           if (isset($this->pageDim[$l[0]]['h'])) { $htarg=$this->pageDim[$l[0]]['h']*$this->k; }
07020           else { $htarg=$this->h*$this->k; } // doesn't really matter
07021           $annot.=sprintf(' /Dest [%d 0 R /XYZ 0 %.3f null]>>',1+2*$l[0],$htarg-$l[1]*$this->k);
07022         }
07023         $this->_out($annot);
07024         $this->_out('endobj');
07025          }
07026       }
07027 
07028 
07029 /*-- ANNOTATIONS --*/
07030       if(isset($this->PageAnnots[$n])) {
07031          foreach ($this->PageAnnots[$n] as $key => $pl) {
07032         $this->_newobj();
07033         $annot='';
07034         $pl['opt'] = array_change_key_case($pl['opt'], CASE_LOWER);
07035         $x = $pl['x']; 
07036         if ($this->annotMargin <> 0 || $x==0 || $x<0) { // Odd page
07037            $x = ($wPt/$this->k) - $this->annotMargin;
07038         }
07039         $w = $h = ($this->annotSize * $this->k);
07040         $a = $x * $this->k;
07041         // mPDF 3.0
07042         $b = $hPt - ($pl['y']  * $this->k);
07043         $rect = sprintf('%.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f', $a, $b-$h, $a+$w, $b);
07044         $annot .= '<</Type /Annot /Subtype /Text /Rect ['.$rect.']';
07045         $annot .= ' /Contents '.$this->_UTF16BEtextstring($pl['txt']);
07046         $annot .= ' /NM ('.sprintf('%04u-%04u', $n, (2000 + $key)).')';
07047         $annot .= ' /M '.$this->_textstring('D:'.date('YmdHis'));
07048         $annot .= ' /CreationDate '.$this->_textstring('D:'.date('YmdHis'));
07049         $annot .= ' /Border [0 0 0]';
07050         // mPDF 4.2.018
07051         if ($this->PDFA) { 
07052           $annot .= ' /F 28'; 
07053           $annot .= ' /CA 1'; 
07054         }
07055         else if ($pl['opt']['ca']>0) { $annot .= ' /CA '.$pl['opt']['ca']; }
07056 
07057         $annot .= ' /C [';
07058         if (isset($pl['opt']['c']) AND (is_array($pl['opt']['c']))) {
07059           foreach ($pl['opt']['c'] as $col) {
07060             $col = intval($col);
07061             $color = $col <= 0 ? 0 : ($col >= 255 ? 1 : $col / 255);
07062             $annot .= sprintf(" %.4f", $color);
07063           }
07064         }
07065         else { $annot .= '1 1 0'; } // mPDF 4.2.026
07066         $annot .= ']';
07067         // Usually Author
07068         if (isset($pl['opt']['t']) AND is_string($pl['opt']['t'])) {
07069           $annot .= ' /T '.$this->_UTF16BEtextstring($pl['opt']['t']);
07070         }
07071         if (isset($pl['opt']['subj'])) {
07072           $annot .= ' /Subj '.$this->_UTF16BEtextstring($pl['opt']['subj']);
07073         }
07074         $iconsapp = array('Comment', 'Help', 'Insert', 'Key', 'NewParagraph', 'Note', 'Paragraph');
07075         if (isset($pl['opt']['icon']) AND in_array($pl['opt']['icon'], $iconsapp)) {
07076           $annot .= ' /Name /'.$pl['opt']['icon'];
07077         }
07078         else { $annot .= ' /Name /Note'; }
07079         // mPDF 4.2.027
07080         if (!empty($pl['opt']['popup'])) { 
07081           $annot .= ' /Open true'; 
07082           $annot .= ' /Popup '.($this->n+1).' 0 R';       // mPDF 4.2.027
07083         }
07084         else { $annot .= ' /Open false'; }  // mPDF 4.2.027
07085         $annot .= ' /P 3 0 R';              // mPDF 4.2.027
07086         $annot .= '>>';
07087         $this->_out($annot);
07088         $this->_out('endobj');
07089 
07090         // mPDF 4.2.027
07091         if (!empty($pl['opt']['popup'])) { 
07092           $this->_newobj();
07093           $annot='';
07094           if (is_array($pl['opt']['popup']) && isset($pl['opt']['popup'][0])) { $x = $pl['opt']['popup'][0] * $this->k; }
07095           else { $x = $pl['x'] * $this->k; }
07096           if (is_array($pl['opt']['popup']) && isset($pl['opt']['popup'][1])) { $y = $hPt - ($pl['opt']['popup'][1] * $this->k); }
07097           else { $y = $hPt - ($pl['y']  * $this->k); }
07098           if (is_array($pl['opt']['popup']) && isset($pl['opt']['popup'][2])) { $w = $pl['opt']['popup'][2] * $this->k; }
07099           else { $w = 180; }
07100           if (is_array($pl['opt']['popup']) && isset($pl['opt']['popup'][3])) { $h = $pl['opt']['popup'][3] * $this->k; }
07101           else { $h = 120; }
07102           $rect = sprintf('%.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f', $x, $y-$h, $x+$w, $y);
07103           $annot .= '<</Type /Annot /Subtype /Popup /Rect ['.$rect.']';
07104           $annot .= ' /M '.$this->_textstring('D:'.date('YmdHis'));
07105           if ($this->PDFA) { $annot .= ' /F 28'; }
07106           $annot .= ' /P 3 0 R';
07107           $annot .= ' /Parent '.($this->n-1).' 0 R';
07108           $annot .= '>>';
07109           $this->_out($annot);
07110           $this->_out('endobj');
07111         }
07112          }
07113       }
07114 /*-- END ANNOTATIONS --*/
07115     }
07116   }
07117 }
07118 
07119 
07120 
07121 /*-- ANNOTATIONS --*/
07122 function Annotation($text, $x=0, $y=0, $icon='Note', $author='', $subject='', $opacity=0, $colarray=array(255,255,0), $popup='') {  // mPDF 4.2.027
07123   if ($x==0) { $x = $this->x; }
07124   if ($y==0) { $y = $this->y; }
07125   $page = $this->page;
07126   if ($page < 1) {  // Document has not been started - assume it's for first page
07127     $page = 1;
07128     if ($x==0) { $x = $this->lMargin; }
07129     if ($y==0) { $y = $this->tMargin; }
07130   }
07131   // mPDF 4.2.018
07132   if ($this->PDFA) {
07133     if (!$this->PDFAauto) { $this->PDFAwarnings[] = "Annotation markers cannot be semi-transparent in PDFA1-b, so they may make underlying text unreadable. (Annotation markers moved to right margin)"; }
07134     $x = ($this->w) - $this->rMargin*0.66;
07135   }
07136   if (!$this->annotMargin) { $y -= $this->FontSize / 2; }
07137 
07138   if (!$opacity && $this->annotMargin) { $opacity = 1; }
07139   else if (!$opacity) { $opacity = $this->annotOpacity; }
07140 
07141   if ($this->keep_block_together) { // Save to array - don't write yet
07142     $this->ktAnnots[$this->page][]=array('txt' => $text, 'x' => $x, 'y' => $y, 'opt' => array('Icon'=>$icon, 'T'=>$author, 'Subj'=>$subject, 'C'=>$colarray, 'CA'=>$opacity, 'popup'=>$popup)); // mPDF 4.2.027
07143     return;
07144   }
07145   else if ($this->table_rotate) {
07146     $this->tbrot_Annots[$this->page][]=array('txt' => $text, 'x' => $x, 'y' => $y, 'opt' => array('Icon'=>$icon, 'T'=>$author, 'Subj'=>$subject, 'C'=>$colarray, 'CA'=>$opacity, 'popup'=>$popup)); // mPDF 4.2.027
07147     return;
07148   }
07149   else if ($this->kwt) {
07150     $this->kwt_Annots[$this->page][]=array('txt' => $text, 'x' => $x, 'y' => $y, 'opt' => array('Icon'=>$icon, 'T'=>$author, 'Subj'=>$subject, 'C'=>$colarray, 'CA'=>$opacity, 'popup'=>$popup)); // mPDF 4.2.027
07151     return;
07152   }
07153   //Put an Annotation on the page
07154   $this->PageAnnots[$page][] = array('txt' => $text, 'x' => $x, 'y' => $y, 'opt' => array('Icon'=>$icon, 'T'=>$author, 'Subj'=>$subject, 'C'=>$colarray, 'CA'=>$opacity, 'popup'=>$popup)); // mPDF 4.2.027
07155 /*-- COLUMNS --*/
07156   // Save cross-reference to Column buffer
07157   $ref = count($this->PageAnnots[$this->page])-1;
07158   $this->columnAnnots[$this->CurrCol][INTVAL($this->x)][INTVAL($this->y)] = $ref;
07159 /*-- END COLUMNS --*/
07160 }
07161 /*-- END ANNOTATIONS --*/
07162 
07163 
07164 
07165 function _putfonts() {
07166 /*-- UNICODE-FONTS --*/
07167   if ($this->is_MB) {
07168       $nf=$this->n;
07169       /* mPDF 4.2 Not required in MB document/fonts
07170       foreach($this->diffs as $diff) {
07171         //Encodings
07172         $this->_newobj();
07173         $this->_out('<</Type /Encoding /BaseEncoding /WinAnsiEncoding /Differences ['.$diff.']>>');
07174         $this->_out('endobj');
07175       }
07176       */
07177       // mPDF 4.1
07178       $mqr=ini_get("magic_quotes_runtime");
07179       if ($mqr) { set_magic_quotes_runtime(0); }
07180       foreach($this->FontFiles as $file=>$info) {
07181          // mPDF 4.0
07182          if (!isset($info['type']) || $info['type']!='Type1subset') {
07183           // mPDF 4.0
07184           $used = true;
07185           foreach($this->fonts AS $f) {
07186           if ($f['file'] == $file && $f['type']=='TrueTypeUnicode') { $used = $f['used']; }
07187           }
07188           if ($used) {
07189         //Font file embedding
07190         $this->_newobj();
07191         $this->FontFiles[$file]['n']=$this->n;
07192         $font='';
07193         $f=fopen(MPDF_FONTPATH.$file,'rb',1);
07194         if(!$f) {
07195           $this->Error('Font file not found');
07196         }
07197         while(!feof($f)) {
07198           $font .= fread($f, 2048);
07199         }
07200         fclose($f);
07201         $compressed=(substr($file,-2)=='.z');
07202         if(!$compressed && isset($info['length2'])) {
07203           $header=($this->ords[substr($font,0,1)]==128);
07204           if($header) {
07205             //Strip first binary header
07206             $font=substr($font,6);
07207           }
07208           if($header && $this->ords[substr($font,$info['length1'],1)]==128) {
07209             //Strip second binary header
07210             $font=substr($font,0,$info['length1']).substr($font,$info['length1']+6);
07211           }
07212         }
07213         $this->_out('<</Length '.strlen($font));
07214         if($compressed) {
07215           $this->_out('/Filter /FlateDecode');
07216         }
07217         $this->_out('/Length1 '.$info['length1']);
07218         if(isset($info['length2'])) {
07219           $this->_out('/Length2 '.$info['length2'].' /Length3 0');
07220         }
07221         $this->_out('>>');
07222         $this->_putstream($font);
07223         $this->_out('endobj');
07224           }
07225          }
07226       }
07227       // mPDF 4.1
07228       if ($mqr) { set_magic_quotes_runtime($mqr); }
07229       foreach($this->fonts as $k=>$font) {
07230         //Font objects
07231         $type=$font['type'];
07232         $name=$font['name'];
07233         if($type=='Type0') { 
07234           $this->fonts[$k]['n']=$this->n+1;
07235           $this->_newobj();
07236           $this->_out('<</Type /Font');
07237           $this->_putType0($font);
07238         }
07239         else if($type=='core') {
07240           //Standard font
07241           // mPDF 4.2.018
07242           if ($this->PDFA) { $this->Error('Core fonts are not allowed in PDF/A1-b files (Times, Helvetica, Courier etc.)'); }
07243           $this->fonts[$k]['n']=$this->n+1;
07244           $this->_newobj();
07245           $this->_out('<</Type /Font');
07246           $this->_out('/BaseFont /'.$name);
07247           $this->_out('/Subtype /Type1');
07248           if($name!='Symbol' && $name!='ZapfDingbats') {
07249             $this->_out('/Encoding /WinAnsiEncoding');
07250           }
07251           $this->_out('>>');
07252           $this->_out('endobj');
07253         } 
07254         // Only uses Type 1 when utf-8 encoded for embedded SUBSETS
07255         else if ($type=='Type1subset') {
07256            $ssfaid="A";
07257            if (!class_exists('t1asm')) { include(_MPDF_PATH .'classes/t1asm.php'); }
07258            // Create Type1 file using t1asm
07259            $asm = new t1asm();
07260            $asm->LoadFontFile(MPDF_FONTPATH.substr($font['file'],0,(strpos($font['file'],'.'))));
07261            for($sfid=0;$sfid<count($font['subsetfontids']);$sfid++) {
07262           if ($this->progressBar) { $this->UpdateProgressBar(2,'+2','Font subsets'); }    // *PROGRESS-BAR*
07263           $this->fonts[$k]['n'][$sfid]=$this->n+1;    // NB an array for subset
07264           $subsetname = 'MPDFA'.$ssfaid.'+'.$name;
07265           $ssfaid++;
07266           $asm->DefineChars($font['subsets'][$sfid], $this->PDFA);  // mPDF 4.2.018
07267           $fontstream = $asm->OutputPFB('');
07268 
07270           $widthstring = '';
07271           $toUnistring = '';
07272           foreach($font['subsets'][$sfid] AS $cp=>$u) {
07273             if (isset($font['cw'][$u])) {
07274               $widthstring .= $font['cw'][$u].' ';
07275             }
07276             else if ($cp <32) { 
07277               $widthstring .= '0'.' ';
07278             }
07279             else {
07280               $widthstring .= $font['desc']['MissingWidth'].' ';
07281             }
07282             $toUnistring .= sprintf("<%02s> <%04s>\n", strtoupper(dechex($cp)), strtoupper(dechex($u)));
07283           }
07284           //Additional Type1 or TrueType font
07285           $this->_newobj();
07286           $this->_out('<</Type /Font');
07287           $this->_out('/BaseFont /'.$subsetname);
07288           $this->_out('/Subtype /Type1');
07289           $this->_out('/FirstChar 0 /LastChar '.(count($font['subsets'][$sfid])-1));
07290           $this->_out('/Widths '.($this->n+1).' 0 R');
07291           $this->_out('/FontDescriptor '.($this->n+2).' 0 R');
07292 
07293           // mPDF 4.0
07294           $this->_out('/Encoding '.($this->n + 3).' 0 R');
07295           $this->_out('/ToUnicode '.($this->n + 4).' 0 R');
07296           $this->_out('>>');
07297           $this->_out('endobj');
07298 
07299           //Widths
07300           $this->_newobj();
07301           $this->_out('['.$widthstring.']');
07302           $this->_out('endobj');
07303           //Descriptor
07304           $this->_newobj();
07305           $s='<</Type /FontDescriptor /FontName /'.$subsetname;
07306           foreach($font['desc'] as $kd=>$v) {
07307             $s.=' /'.$kd.' '.$v;
07308           }
07309 
07310           // mPDF 4.2.018 CharSet for PDF/A
07311           if ($this->PDFA) {
07312             $s.=' /CharSet ('.$asm->pdfa_charset.')';
07313           }
07314 
07315           $s.=' /FontFile '.($this->n + 3).' 0 R';
07316           $this->_out($s.'>>');
07317           $this->_out('endobj');
07318           //Encodings
07319           $this->_newobj();
07320           $this->_out('<</Type /Encoding /BaseEncoding /WinAnsiEncoding /Differences [ '.$asm->pdf_diffstr .' ]>>');
07321           $this->_out('endobj');
07322           // mPDF 4.0
07323           // ToUnicode
07324           // Uses the .map files to determine mapping of 7F-FF to Unicode characters
07325           // Allows copying and pasting of PDF text to another editor
07326           $toUni = "stream\n";
07327           $toUni .= "/CIDInit /ProcSet findresource begin\n";
07328           $toUni .= "12 dict begin\n";
07329           $toUni .= "begincmap\n";
07330           $toUni .= "/CIDSystemInfo\n";
07331           $toUni .= "<</Registry (Adobe)\n";
07332           $toUni .= "/Ordering (UCS)\n";
07333           $toUni .= "/Supplement 0\n";
07334           $toUni .= ">> def\n";
07335           $toUni .= "/CMapName /Adobe-Identity-UCS def\n";
07336           $toUni .= "/CMapType 2 def\n";
07337           $toUni .= "1 begincodespacerange\n";
07338           $toUni .= "<00> <FF>\n";
07339           $toUni .= "endcodespacerange\n";
07340           $toUni .= count($font['subsets'][$sfid])." beginbfchar\n";
07341           $toUni .= $toUnistring;
07342           $toUni .= "endbfchar\n";
07343           $toUni .= "endcmap\n";
07344           $toUni .= "CMapName currentdict /CMap defineresource pop\n";
07345           $toUni .= "end\n";
07346           $toUni .= "end\n";
07347           $toUni .= "endstream\n";
07348           $toUni .= "endobj";
07349           $this->_newobj();
07350           $this->_out('<</Length '.(strlen($toUni)-24).'>>');
07351           $this->_out($toUni);
07352 
07353           //Font file 
07354           $this->_newobj();
07355           $this->_out('<</Length '.strlen($fontstream));
07356           $this->_out('/Filter /FlateDecode');
07357           $this->_out('/Length1 '.$asm->of_size1);
07358           if(isset($asm->of_size2)) {
07359             $this->_out('/Length2 '.$asm->of_size2.' /Length3 0');
07360           }
07361           $this->_out('>>');
07362           $this->_putstream($fontstream);
07363           $this->_out('endobj');
07364            }  // foreach subset
07365            unset($asm );
07366         } 
07367         else {
07368           // mPDF 4.0
07369           if (!$font['used'] && $type=='TrueTypeUnicode') { continue; }
07370           //Allow for additional types
07371           $mtd='_put'.strtolower($type);
07372           if(!method_exists($this, $mtd)) {
07373             $this->Error('Unsupported font type: '.$type.' ('.$name.')');
07374           }
07375           $this->fonts[$k]['n']=$this->n+1;
07376           $this->$mtd($font);
07377         }
07378       }
07379   }
07380   else {
07381 /*-- END UNICODE-FONTS --*/
07382 
07383     $nf=$this->n;
07384     foreach($this->diffs as $diff)
07385     {
07386       //Encodings
07387       $this->_newobj();
07388       $this->_out('<</Type /Encoding /BaseEncoding /WinAnsiEncoding /Differences ['.$diff.']>>');
07389       $this->_out('endobj');
07390     }
07391     // mPDF 4.1
07392     $mqr=ini_get("magic_quotes_runtime");
07393     if ($mqr) { set_magic_quotes_runtime(0); }
07394     foreach($this->FontFiles as $file=>$info)
07395     {
07396       //Font file embedding
07397       $this->_newobj();
07398       $this->FontFiles[$file]['n']=$this->n;
07399       if(defined('MPDF_FONTPATH'))
07400         $file=MPDF_FONTPATH.$file;
07401       $size=filesize($file);
07402       if(!$size)
07403         $this->Error('Font file not found');
07404       $this->_out('<</Length '.$size);
07405       if(substr($file,-2)=='.z')
07406         $this->_out('/Filter /FlateDecode');
07407       $this->_out('/Length1 '.$info['length1']);
07408       if(isset($info['length2']))
07409         $this->_out('/Length2 '.$info['length2'].' /Length3 0');
07410       $this->_out('>>');
07411       $f=fopen($file,'rb');
07412       $s = '';
07413       while (!feof($f)) {
07414         $s .= fread($f, 2048);
07415       }
07416 
07417       $this->_putstream($s);
07418       fclose($f);
07419       $this->_out('endobj');
07420     }
07421     // mPDF 4.1
07422     if ($mqr) { set_magic_quotes_runtime($mqr); }
07423     foreach($this->fonts as $k=>$font)
07424     {
07425       //Font objects
07426       $this->fonts[$k]['n']=$this->n+1;
07427       $type=$font['type'];
07428       $name=$font['name'];
07429       if($type=='core')
07430       {
07431         //Standard font
07432         // mPDF 4.2.018
07433         if ($this->PDFA) { $this->Error('Core fonts are not allowed in PDF/A1-b files (Times, Helvetica, Courier etc.)'); }
07434         $this->_newobj();
07435         $this->_out('<</Type /Font');
07436         $this->_out('/BaseFont /'.$name);
07437         $this->_out('/Subtype /Type1');
07438         if($name!='Symbol' and $name!='ZapfDingbats')
07439           $this->_out('/Encoding /WinAnsiEncoding');
07440         $this->_out('>>');
07441         $this->_out('endobj');
07442       }
07443       elseif($type=='Type1' or $type=='TrueType')
07444       {
07445         //Additional Type1 or TrueType font
07446         $this->_newobj();
07447         $this->_out('<</Type /Font');
07448         $this->_out('/BaseFont /'.$name);
07449         $this->_out('/Subtype /'.$type);
07450         $this->_out('/FirstChar 32 /LastChar 255');
07451         $this->_out('/Widths '.($this->n+1).' 0 R');
07452         $this->_out('/FontDescriptor '.($this->n+2).' 0 R');
07453 
07454         // mPDF 4.0
07455         $mapdata = false; 
07456         if($font['enc'])  {
07457           if(isset($font['diff'])) {
07458             $this->_out('/Encoding '.($nf+$font['diff']).' 0 R');
07459             $mapdata = @file(_MPDF_PATH .'maps/'.$font['enc'].'.map');
07460             if ($mapdata) {
07461               $this->_out('/ToUnicode '.($this->n + 3).' 0 R');
07462             }
07463           }
07464           else
07465             $this->_out('/Encoding /WinAnsiEncoding');
07466         }
07467         $this->_out('>>');
07468         $this->_out('endobj');
07469         //Widths
07470         $this->_newobj();
07471         $cw=&$font['cw'];
07472         $s='[';
07473         for($i=32;$i<=255;$i++)
07474           $s.=$cw[$this->chrs[$i]].' ';
07475         $this->_out($s.']');
07476         $this->_out('endobj');
07477         //Descriptor
07478         $this->_newobj();
07479         $s='<</Type /FontDescriptor /FontName /'.$name;
07480         foreach($font['desc'] as $k=>$v)
07481           $s.=' /'.$k.' '.$v;
07482         $file=$font['file'];
07483         if($file)
07484           $s.=' /FontFile'.($type=='Type1' ? '' : '2').' '.$this->FontFiles[$file]['n'].' 0 R';
07485         $this->_out($s.'>>');
07486         $this->_out('endobj');
07487 
07488 
07489         // mPDF 4.0
07490         // ToUnicode
07491         // Uses the .map files to determine mapping of 7F-FF to Unicode characters
07492         // Allows copying and pasting of PDF text to another editor
07493         if($mapdata) {
07494           $toUni = "stream\n";
07495           $toUni .= "/CIDInit /ProcSet findresource begin\n";
07496           $toUni .= "12 dict begin\n";
07497           $toUni .= "begincmap\n";
07498           $toUni .= "/CIDSystemInfo\n";
07499           $toUni .= "<</Registry (Adobe)\n";
07500           $toUni .= "/Ordering (UCS)\n";
07501           $toUni .= "/Supplement 0\n";
07502           $toUni .= ">> def\n";
07503           $toUni .= "/CMapName /Adobe-Identity-UCS def\n";
07504           $toUni .= "/CMapType 2 def\n";
07505           $toUni .= "1 begincodespacerange\n";
07506           $toUni .= "<00> <FF>\n";
07507           $toUni .= "endcodespacerange\n";
07508           $toUni .= "1 beginbfrange\n";
07509           $toUni .= "<00> <7F> <0000>\n";
07510           $toUni .= "endbfrange\n";
07511           $unip = array();
07512           foreach($mapdata AS $ms) {
07513             $tp = hexdec(substr($ms, 1, 2));
07514             if ($tp > 127) {
07515               $unip[$tp] = substr($ms, 6, 4);
07516             }
07517           }
07518           $toUni .= count($unip)." beginbfchar\n";
07519           foreach($unip AS $cp=>$u) {
07520             $toUni .= sprintf("<%02s> <%04s>\n", strtoupper(dechex($cp)), $u);
07521           }
07522           $toUni .= "endbfchar\n";
07523           $toUni .= "endcmap\n";
07524           $toUni .= "CMapName currentdict /CMap defineresource pop\n";
07525           $toUni .= "end\n";
07526           $toUni .= "end\n";
07527           $toUni .= "endstream\n";
07528           $toUni .= "endobj";
07529           $this->_newobj();
07530           $this->_out('<</Length '.(strlen($toUni)-24).'>>');
07531           $this->_out($toUni);
07532         }
07533       }
07534       else
07535       {
07536         //Allow for additional types including TrueTypeUnicode
07537         $mtd='_put'.strtolower($type);
07538         if(!method_exists($this,$mtd))
07539           $this->Error('Unsupported font type: '.$type.' ('.$name.')');
07540         $this->$mtd($font);
07541       }
07542     }
07543 
07544 
07545   } // *UNICODE-FONTS*
07546 }
07547 
07548 
07549 
07550 /*-- UNICODE-FONTS --*/
07551 // Unicode fonts
07552 function _puttruetypeunicode($font) {
07553       // Type0 Font
07554       // A composite font - a font composed of other fonts, organized hierarchically
07555       $this->_newobj();
07556       $this->_out('<</Type /Font');
07557       $this->_out('/Subtype /Type0');
07558       $this->_out('/BaseFont /'.$font['name'].'');
07559       $this->_out('/Encoding /Identity-H'); //The horizontal identity mapping for 2-byte CIDs; may be used with CIDFonts using any Registry, Ordering, and Supplement values.
07560       $this->_out('/DescendantFonts ['.($this->n + 1).' 0 R]');
07561       $this->_out('/ToUnicode '.($this->n + 2).' 0 R');
07562       $this->_out('>>');
07563       $this->_out('endobj');
07564       
07565       // CIDFontType2
07566       // A CIDFont whose glyph descriptions are based on TrueType font technology
07567       $this->_newobj();
07568       $this->_out('<</Type /Font');
07569       $this->_out('/Subtype /CIDFontType2');
07570       $this->_out('/BaseFont /'.$font['name'].'');
07571       $this->_out('/CIDSystemInfo '.($this->n + 2).' 0 R'); 
07572       $this->_out('/FontDescriptor '.($this->n + 3).' 0 R');
07573       if (isset($font['desc']['MissingWidth'])){
07574         $this->_out('/DW '.$font['desc']['MissingWidth'].''); // The default width for glyphs in the CIDFont MissingWidth
07575       }
07576       $w = "";
07577       foreach ($font['cw'] as $cid => $width) {
07578         $w .= ''.$cid.' ['.$width.'] '; // define a specific width for each individual CID
07579       }
07580       $this->_out('/W ['.$w.']'); // A description of the widths for the glyphs in the CIDFont
07581 
07582       $this->_out('/CIDToGIDMap '.($this->n + 4).' 0 R');
07583 
07584       $this->_out('>>');
07585       $this->_out('endobj');
07586       
07587       // ToUnicode
07588       // is a stream object that contains the definition of the CMap
07589       // (PDF Reference 1.3 chap. 5.9)
07590       $this->_newobj();
07591       $this->_out('<</Length 345>>');
07592       $this->_out('stream');
07593       $this->_out('/CIDInit /ProcSet findresource begin');
07594       $this->_out('12 dict begin');
07595       $this->_out('begincmap');
07596       $this->_out('/CIDSystemInfo');
07597       $this->_out('<</Registry (Adobe)');
07598       $this->_out('/Ordering (UCS)');
07599       $this->_out('/Supplement 0');
07600       $this->_out('>> def');
07601       $this->_out('/CMapName /Adobe-Identity-UCS def');
07602       $this->_out('/CMapType 2 def');
07603       $this->_out('1 begincodespacerange');
07604       $this->_out('<0000> <FFFF>');
07605       $this->_out('endcodespacerange');
07606       $this->_out('1 beginbfrange');
07607       $this->_out('<0000> <FFFF> <0000>');
07608       $this->_out('endbfrange');
07609       $this->_out('endcmap');
07610       $this->_out('CMapName currentdict /CMap defineresource pop');
07611       $this->_out('end');
07612       $this->_out('end');
07613       $this->_out('endstream');
07614       $this->_out('endobj');
07615 
07616       // CIDSystemInfo dictionary
07617       // A dictionary containing entries that define the character collection of the CIDFont.
07618       $this->_newobj();
07619       $this->_out('<</Registry (Adobe)'); // A string identifying an issuer of character collections
07620       $this->_out('/Ordering (UCS)'); // A string that uniquely names a character collection issued by a specific registry
07621       $this->_out('/Supplement 0'); // The supplement number of the character collection.
07622       $this->_out('>>');
07623       $this->_out('endobj');
07624       
07625       // Font descriptor
07626       // A font descriptor describing the CIDFont's default metrics other than its glyph widths
07627       $this->_newobj();
07628       $this->_out('<</Type /FontDescriptor');
07629       $this->_out('/FontName /'.$font['name']);
07630       foreach ($font['desc'] as $key => $value) {
07631         $this->_out('/'.$key.' '.$value);
07632       }
07633       if ($font['file']) {
07634         // obj ID of a stream containing a TrueType font program
07635         $this->_out('/FontFile2 '.$this->FontFiles[$font['file']]['n'].' 0 R');
07636       }
07637       $this->_out('>>');
07638       $this->_out('endobj');
07639 
07640       // Embed CIDToGIDMap
07641       // A specification of the mapping from CIDs to glyph indices
07642       $this->_newobj();
07643       $ctgfile = MPDF_FONTPATH.$font['ctg'];
07644       if(!file_exists($ctgfile)) {
07645         $this->Error('Font file not found: '.$ctgfile);
07646       }
07647       $size = filesize($ctgfile);
07648       $this->_out('<</Length '.$size.'');
07649       if(substr($ctgfile, -2) == '.z') { // check file extension
07650         // Decompresses data encoded using the public-domain 
07651         // zlib/deflate compression method, reproducing the 
07652         // original text or binary data 
07653         $this->_out('/Filter /FlateDecode');
07654       }
07655       $this->_out('>>');
07656       $this->_putstream(file_get_contents($ctgfile));
07657       $this->_out('endobj');
07658 
07659 }
07660 
07661 
07662 function _putfontwidths($font, $cidoffset=0) {
07663       ksort($font['cw']);
07664       $rangeid = 0;
07665       $range = array();
07666       $prevcid = -2;
07667       $prevwidth = -1;
07668       $interval = false;
07669       // for each character
07670       foreach ($font['cw'] as $cid => $width) {
07671         $cid -= $cidoffset;
07672         if (!isset($font['dw']) || (isset($font['dw']) && $width != $font['dw'])) {
07673           if ($cid == ($prevcid + 1)) {
07674             // consecutive CID
07675             if ($width == $prevwidth) {
07676               if ($width == $range[$rangeid][0]) {
07677                 $range[$rangeid][] = $width;
07678               } else {
07679                 array_pop($range[$rangeid]);
07680                 // new range
07681                 $rangeid = $prevcid;
07682                 $range[$rangeid] = array();
07683                 $range[$rangeid][] = $prevwidth;
07684                 $range[$rangeid][] = $width;
07685               }
07686               $interval = true;
07687               $range[$rangeid]['interval'] = true;
07688             } else {
07689               if ($interval) {
07690                 // new range
07691                 $rangeid = $cid;
07692                 $range[$rangeid] = array();
07693                 $range[$rangeid][] = $width;
07694               } else {
07695                 $range[$rangeid][] = $width;
07696               }
07697               $interval = false;
07698             }
07699           } else {
07700             // new range
07701             $rangeid = $cid;
07702             $range[$rangeid] = array();
07703             $range[$rangeid][] = $width;
07704             $interval = false;
07705           }
07706           $prevcid = $cid;
07707           $prevwidth = $width;
07708         }
07709       }
07710       // optimize ranges
07711       $prevk = -1;
07712       $nextk = -1;
07713       $prevint = false;
07714       foreach ($range as $k => $ws) {
07715         $cws = count($ws);
07716         if (($k == $nextk) AND (!$prevint) AND ((!isset($ws['interval'])) OR ($cws < 4))) {
07717           if (isset($range[$k]['interval'])) {
07718             unset($range[$k]['interval']);
07719           }
07720           $range[$prevk] = array_merge($range[$prevk], $range[$k]);
07721           unset($range[$k]);
07722         } else {
07723           $prevk = $k;
07724         }
07725         $nextk = $k + $cws;
07726         if (isset($ws['interval'])) {
07727           if ($cws > 3) {
07728             $prevint = true;
07729           } else {
07730             $prevint = false;
07731           }
07732           unset($range[$k]['interval']);
07733           --$nextk;
07734         } else {
07735           $prevint = false;
07736         }
07737       }
07738       // output data
07739       $w = '';
07740       foreach ($range as $k => $ws) {
07741         if (count(array_count_values($ws)) == 1) {
07742           // interval mode is more compact
07743           $w .= ' '.$k.' '.($k + count($ws) - 1).' '.$ws[0];
07744         } else {
07745           // range mode
07746           $w .= ' '.$k.' [ '.implode(' ', $ws).' ]';
07747         }
07748       }
07749       $this->_out('/W ['.$w.' ]');
07750 }
07751 /*-- END UNICODE-FONTS --*/
07752 
07753 
07754 
07755 /*-- CJK --*/
07756 // from class PDF_Chinese CJK EXTENSIONS
07757 function _putType0($font)
07758 {
07759   //Type0
07760   $this->_out('/Subtype /Type0');
07761   $this->_out('/BaseFont /'.$font['name'].'-'.$font['CMap']);
07762   $this->_out('/Encoding /'.$font['CMap']);
07763   $this->_out('/DescendantFonts ['.($this->n+1).' 0 R]');
07764   $this->_out('>>');
07765   $this->_out('endobj');
07766   //CIDFont
07767   $this->_newobj();
07768   $this->_out('<</Type /Font');
07769   $this->_out('/Subtype /CIDFontType0');
07770   $this->_out('/BaseFont /'.$font['name']);
07771 
07772   $cidinfo = '/Registry '.$this->_textstring('Adobe');
07773   $cidinfo .= ' /Ordering '.$this->_textstring($font['registry']['ordering']);
07774   $cidinfo .= ' /Supplement '.$font['registry']['supplement'];
07775   $this->_out('/CIDSystemInfo <<'.$cidinfo.'>>');
07776 
07777   $this->_out('/FontDescriptor '.($this->n+1).' 0 R');
07778   if (isset($font['MissingWidth'])){
07779     $this->_out('/DW '.$font['MissingWidth'].''); 
07780   }
07781   $this->_putfontwidths($font, 31);
07782   $this->_out('>>');
07783   $this->_out('endobj');
07784 
07785   //Font descriptor
07786   $this->_newobj();
07787   $s = '<</Type /FontDescriptor /FontName /'.$font['name'];
07788   foreach ($font['desc'] as $k => $v) {
07789     if ($k != 'Style') {
07790       $s .= ' /'.$k.' '.$v.'';
07791     }
07792   }
07793   $this->_out($s.'>>');
07794   $this->_out('endobj');
07795 }
07796 /*-- END CJK --*/
07797 
07798 
07799 function _putimages()
07800 {
07801   $filter=($this->compress) ? '/Filter /FlateDecode ' : '';
07802   reset($this->images);
07803   while(list($file,$info)=each($this->images))
07804   {
07805     $this->_newobj();
07806     $this->images[$file]['n']=$this->n;
07807     $this->_out('<</Type /XObject');
07808     $this->_out('/Subtype /Image');
07809     $this->_out('/Width '.$info['w']);
07810     $this->_out('/Height '.$info['h']);
07811 
07812     // mPDF 4.0
07813     if (isset($info['masked'])) {
07814       $this->_out('/SMask '.($this->n - 1).' 0 R');
07815     }
07816 
07817     if($info['cs']=='Indexed')
07818       $this->_out('/ColorSpace [/Indexed /DeviceRGB '.(strlen($info['pal'])/3-1).' '.($this->n+1).' 0 R]');
07819     else
07820     {
07821       $this->_out('/ColorSpace /'.$info['cs']);
07822       if($info['cs']=='DeviceCMYK') {
07823         // mPDF 4.2.018
07824         if ($this->PDFA) { $this->Error("PDFA1-b does not permit Images using DeviceCMYK colour space (".$file.")."); }
07825         $this->_out('/Decode [1 0 1 0 1 0 1 0]');
07826       }
07827     }
07828     $this->_out('/BitsPerComponent '.$info['bpc']);
07829     // mPDF 4.0
07830     if (isset($info['f']) && $info['f']) { $this->_out('/Filter /'.$info['f']); }
07831     if(isset($info['parms'])) { $this->_out($info['parms']); }
07832     if(isset($info['trns']) and is_array($info['trns']))
07833     {
07834       $trns='';
07835       for($i=0;$i<count($info['trns']);$i++)
07836         $trns.=$info['trns'][$i].' '.$info['trns'][$i].' ';
07837       $this->_out('/Mask ['.$trns.']');
07838     }
07839     $this->_out('/Length '.strlen($info['data']).'>>');
07840     $this->_putstream($info['data']);
07841     unset($this->images[$file]['data']);
07842     $this->_out('endobj');
07843     //Palette
07844     if($info['cs']=='Indexed')
07845     {
07846       $this->_newobj();
07847       $pal=($this->compress) ? gzcompress($info['pal']) : $info['pal'];
07848       $this->_out('<<'.$filter.'/Length '.strlen($pal).'>>');
07849       $this->_putstream($pal);
07850       $this->_out('endobj');
07851     }
07852   }
07853 }
07854 
07855 function _putinfo()
07856 {
07857   $this->_out('/Producer '.$this->_UTF16BEtextstring('mPDF '.mPDF_VERSION));
07858   if(!empty($this->title))
07859     $this->_out('/Title '.$this->_UTF16BEtextstring($this->title));
07860   if(!empty($this->subject))
07861     $this->_out('/Subject '.$this->_UTF16BEtextstring($this->subject));
07862   if(!empty($this->author))
07863     $this->_out('/Author '.$this->_UTF16BEtextstring($this->author));
07864   if(!empty($this->keywords))
07865     $this->_out('/Keywords '.$this->_UTF16BEtextstring($this->keywords));
07866   if(!empty($this->creator))
07867     $this->_out('/Creator '.$this->_UTF16BEtextstring($this->creator));
07868   // mPDF 4.2.018
07869   $z = date('O'); // +0200
07870   $offset = substr($z,0,3)."'".substr($z,3,2)."'";
07871   $this->_out('/CreationDate '.$this->_textstring(date('YmdHis').$offset));
07872   $this->_out('/ModDate '.$this->_textstring(date('YmdHis').$offset));
07873 }
07874 
07875 // mPDF 4.2.018
07876 function _putmetadata() {
07877   $this->_newobj();
07878   $this->MetadataRoot = $this->n;
07879   $Producer = 'mPDF '.mPDF_VERSION;
07880   $z = date('O'); // +0200
07881   $offset = substr($z,0,3).':'.substr($z,3,2);
07882   $CreationDate = date('Y-m-d\TH:i:s').$offset; // 2006-03-10T10:47:26-05:00 2006-06-19T09:05:17Z
07883   $uuid = sprintf('%04x%04x-%04x-%04x-%04x-%04x%04x%04x', mt_rand(0, 0xffff), mt_rand(0, 0xffff),
07884       mt_rand(0, 0xffff), mt_rand(0, 0x0fff) | 0x4000, mt_rand(0, 0x3fff) | 0x8000,
07885       mt_rand(0, 0xffff), mt_rand(0, 0xffff), mt_rand(0, 0xffff)  );
07886 
07887 
07888   $m = '<?xpacket begin="'.chr(239).chr(187).chr(191).'" id="W5M0MpCehiHzreSzNTczkc9d"?>'."\n"; // begin = FEFF BOM
07889   $m .= ' <x:xmpmeta xmlns:x="adobe:ns:meta/" x:xmptk="3.1-701">'."\n";
07890   $m .= '  <rdf:RDF xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#">'."\n";
07891   $m .= '   <rdf:Description rdf:about="" xmlns:pdf="http://ns.adobe.com/pdf/1.3/">'."\n";
07892   $m .= '    <pdf:Producer>'.$Producer.'</pdf:Producer>'."\n";
07893   if(!empty($this->keywords)) {
07894     $m .= '    <pdf:Keywords>'.$this->keywords.'</pdf:Keywords>'."\n";
07895   }
07896   $m .= '   </rdf:Description>'."\n";
07897   $m .= '   <rdf:Description rdf:about="" xmlns:xmp="http://ns.adobe.com/xap/1.0/">'."\n";
07898   $m .= '    <xmp:CreateDate>'.$CreationDate.'</xmp:CreateDate>'."\n";
07899   $m .= '    <xmp:ModifyDate>'.$CreationDate.'</xmp:ModifyDate>'."\n";
07900   $m .= '    <xmp:MetadataDate>'.$CreationDate.'</xmp:MetadataDate>'."\n";
07901 
07902   if(!empty($this->creator)) {
07903     $m .= '    <xmp:CreatorTool>'.$this->creator.'</xmp:CreatorTool>'."\n";
07904   }
07905 
07906 
07907   $m .= '   </rdf:Description>'."\n";
07908   $m .= '   <rdf:Description rdf:about="" xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/">'."\n";
07909   $m .= '    <dc:format>application/pdf</dc:format>'."\n";
07910   if(!empty($this->title)) {
07911     $m .= '    <dc:title>
07912      <rdf:Alt>
07913       <rdf:li xml:lang="x-default">'.$this->title.'</rdf:li>
07914      </rdf:Alt>
07915     </dc:title>'."\n";
07916   }
07917   if(!empty($this->keywords)) {
07918     $m .= '    <dc:subject>
07919      <rdf:Bag>
07920       <rdf:li>'.$this->keywords.'</rdf:li>
07921      </rdf:Bag>
07922     </dc:subject>'."\n";
07923   }
07924   if(!empty($this->subject)) {
07925     $m .= '    <dc:description>
07926      <rdf:Alt>
07927       <rdf:li xml:lang="x-default">'.$this->subject.'</rdf:li>
07928      </rdf:Alt>
07929     </dc:description>'."\n";
07930   }
07931   if(!empty($this->author)) {
07932     $m .= '    <dc:creator>
07933      <rdf:Seq>
07934       <rdf:li>'.$this->author.'</rdf:li>
07935      </rdf:Seq>
07936     </dc:creator>'."\n";
07937   }
07938   $m .= '   </rdf:Description>'."\n";
07939 
07940 // This bit is specific to PDFA-1b
07941   $m .= '   <rdf:Description rdf:about="" xmlns:pdfaid="http://www.aiim.org/pdfa/ns/id/" >'."\n";
07942   $m .= '    <pdfaid:part>1</pdfaid:part>'."\n";
07943   $m .= '    <pdfaid:conformance>B</pdfaid:conformance>'."\n";
07944   $m .= '    <pdfaid:amd>2005</pdfaid:amd>'."\n";
07945   $m .= '   </rdf:Description>'."\n";
07946 
07947   $m .= '   <rdf:Description rdf:about="" xmlns:xmpMM="http://ns.adobe.com/xap/1.0/mm/">'."\n";
07948   $m .= '    <xmpMM:DocumentID>uuid:'.$uuid.'</xmpMM:DocumentID>'."\n";
07949   $m .= '   </rdf:Description>'."\n";
07950   $m .= '  </rdf:RDF>'."\n";
07951   $m .= ' </x:xmpmeta>'."\n";
