07952   $m .= str_repeat(str_repeat(' ',100)."\n",20);  // 2-4kB whitespace padding required
07953   $m .= '<?xpacket end="w"?>';  // "r" read only
07954   $this->_out('<</Type/Metadata/Subtype/XML/Length '.strlen($m).'>>');
07955   $this->_putstream($m);
07956   $this->_out('endobj');
07957 }
07958 
07959 // mPDF 4.2.018
07960 function _putoutputintent() {
07961   $this->_newobj();
07962   $this->OutputIntentRoot = $this->n;
07963   if ($this->compress) { $s = gzcompress($s); }
07964   $this->_out('<</Type /OutputIntent');
07965   if ($this->ICCProfile)
07966     $this->_out('/Info ('.$this->ICCProfile.')');
07967   else 
07968     $this->_out('/Info (sRGB)');
07969   $this->_out('/S /GTS_PDFA1');
07970   $this->_out('/OutputConditionIdentifier (Custom)');
07971   $this->_out('/OutputCondition ()');
07972   $this->_out('/DestOutputProfile '.($this->n+1).' 0 R >>');
07973   $this->_out('endobj');
07974 
07975   $this->_newobj();
07976   if ($this->ICCProfile)
07977     $s = file_get_contents(_MPDF_PATH.'iccprofiles/'.$this->ICCProfile.'.icc');
07978   else 
07979     $s = file_get_contents(_MPDF_PATH.'iccprofiles/sRGB_IEC61966-2-1.icc');
07980   if ($this->compress) { $s = gzcompress($s); }
07981   $this->_out('<</N 3');
07982   if ($this->compress)
07983     $this->_out('/Filter /FlateDecode ');
07984   $this->_out('/Length '.strlen($s).'>>');
07985   $this->_putstream($s);
07986   $this->_out('endobj');
07987 }
07988 
07989 
07990 function _putcatalog() {
07991   $this->_out('/Type /Catalog');
07992   $this->_out('/Pages 1 0 R');
07993   if($this->ZoomMode=='fullpage') $this->_out('/OpenAction [3 0 R /Fit]');
07994   elseif($this->ZoomMode=='fullwidth') $this->_out('/OpenAction [3 0 R /FitH null]');
07995   elseif($this->ZoomMode=='real') $this->_out('/OpenAction [3 0 R /XYZ null null 1]');
07996   elseif(!is_string($this->ZoomMode)) $this->_out('/OpenAction [3 0 R /XYZ null null '.($this->ZoomMode/100).']');
07997   else  $this->_out('/OpenAction [3 0 R /XYZ null null null]'); // mPDF 4.3.007F
07998   if($this->LayoutMode=='single') $this->_out('/PageLayout /SinglePage');
07999   elseif($this->LayoutMode=='continuous') $this->_out('/PageLayout /OneColumn');
08000   elseif($this->LayoutMode=='two') {
08001     if ($this->mirrorMargins) { $this->_out('/PageLayout /TwoColumnRight'); }
08002     else { $this->_out('/PageLayout /TwoColumnLeft'); }
08003   }
08004 /*-- BOOKMARKS --*/
08005   if(count($this->BMoutlines)>0) {
08006         $this->_out('/Outlines '.$this->OutlineRoot.' 0 R');
08007         $this->_out('/PageMode /UseOutlines');
08008   }
08009 /*-- END BOOKMARKS --*/
08010   if(is_int(strpos($this->DisplayPreferences,'FullScreen'))) $this->_out('/PageMode /FullScreen');
08011 
08012   // mPDF 4.2.018 - Metadata
08013   if ($this->PDFA) { 
08014     $this->_out('/Metadata '.$this->MetadataRoot.' 0 R');
08015   }
08016   // mPDF 4.2.018 - OutputIntents
08017   if ($this->PDFA || $this->ICCProfile) { 
08018     $this->_out('/OutputIntents ['.$this->OutputIntentRoot.' 0 R]');
08019   }
08020 
08021   if($this->DisplayPreferences || $this->directionality == 'rtl' || $this->mirrorMargins) {
08022   $this->_out('/ViewerPreferences<<');
08023   if(is_int(strpos($this->DisplayPreferences,'HideMenubar'))) $this->_out('/HideMenubar true');
08024   if(is_int(strpos($this->DisplayPreferences,'HideToolbar'))) $this->_out('/HideToolbar true');
08025   if(is_int(strpos($this->DisplayPreferences,'HideWindowUI'))) $this->_out('/HideWindowUI true');
08026   if(is_int(strpos($this->DisplayPreferences,'DisplayDocTitle'))) $this->_out('/DisplayDocTitle true');
08027   if(is_int(strpos($this->DisplayPreferences,'CenterWindow'))) $this->_out('/CenterWindow true');
08028   if(is_int(strpos($this->DisplayPreferences,'FitWindow'))) $this->_out('/FitWindow true');
08029   if($this->directionality == 'rtl') $this->_out('/Direction /R2L');
08030   // mPDF 4.0
08031   if($this->mirrorMargins) {
08032     // if ($this->DefOrientation=='P') $this->_out('/Duplex /DuplexFlipShortEdge');
08033     $this->_out('/Duplex /DuplexFlipLongEdge'); // PDF v1.7+
08034   }
08035   $this->_out('>>');
08036   }
08037 }
08038 
08039 // Inactive function left for backwards compatability
08040 function SetUserRights($enable=true, $annots="", $form="", $signature="") {
08041   // Does nothing
08042 }
08043 
08044 function _enddoc() {
08045   if ($this->progressBar) { $this->UpdateProgressBar(2,'+10','Writing Headers & Footers'); }  // *PROGRESS-BAR*
08046   $this->_puthtmlheaders(); // *HTMLHEADERS-FOOTERS*
08047   if ($this->progressBar) { $this->UpdateProgressBar(2,'+10','Writing Pages'); }      // *PROGRESS-BAR*
08048   $this->_putpages();
08049   if ($this->progressBar) { $this->UpdateProgressBar(2,'+10','Writing document resources'); } // *PROGRESS-BAR*
08050   $this->_putresources();
08051   //Info
08052   $this->_newobj();
08053   $this->InfoRoot = $this->n;
08054   $this->_out('<<');
08055   if ($this->progressBar) { $this->UpdateProgressBar(2,'+10','Writing document info'); }    // *PROGRESS-BAR*
08056   $this->_putinfo();
08057   $this->_out('>>');
08058   $this->_out('endobj');
08059   // mPDF 4.2.018
08060   // METADATA
08061   if ($this->PDFA) { $this->_putmetadata(); }
08062   // OUTPUTINTENT
08063   if ($this->PDFA || $this->ICCProfile) { $this->_putoutputintent(); }
08064 
08065   //Catalog
08066   $this->_newobj();
08067   $this->_out('<<');
08068   if ($this->progressBar) { $this->UpdateProgressBar(2,'+10','Writing document catalog'); }   // *PROGRESS-BAR*
08069   $this->_putcatalog();
08070   $this->_out('>>');
08071   $this->_out('endobj');
08072   //Cross-ref
08073   $o=strlen($this->buffer);
08074   $this->_out('xref');
08075   $this->_out('0 '.($this->n+1));
08076   $this->_out('0000000000 65535 f ');
08077   for($i=1; $i <= $this->n ; $i++)
08078     $this->_out(sprintf('%010d 00000 n ',$this->offsets[$i]));
08079   //Trailer
08080   $this->_out('trailer');
08081   $this->_out('<<');
08082   $this->_puttrailer();
08083   $this->_out('>>');
08084   $this->_out('startxref');
08085   $this->_out($o);
08086   // mPDF 4.2.010
08087   $this->buffer .= '%%EOF';
08088   $this->state=3;
08089 /*-- IMPORTS --*/
08090   // mPDF 4.2.006
08091   if ($this->enableImports && count($this->parsers) > 0) {
08092       foreach ($this->parsers as $k => $_){
08093       $this->parsers[$k]->closeFile();
08094       $this->parsers[$k] = null;
08095       unset($this->parsers[$k]);
08096     }
08097   }
08098 /*-- END IMPORTS --*/
08099 }
08100 
08101 // mPDF 4.2  pagesel, $newformat [4.2.024]
08102 function _beginpage($orientation,$mgl='',$mgr='',$mgt='',$mgb='',$mgh='',$mgf='',$ohname='',$ehname='',$ofname='',$efname='',$ohvalue=0,$ehvalue=0,$ofvalue=0,$efvalue=0,$pagesel='',$newformat='') {
08103   $this->page++;
08104   $this->pages[$this->page]='';
08105   $this->state=2;
08106   $resetHTMLHeadersrequired = false;
08107 
08108   // mPDF 4.2.024
08109   if ($newformat) { $this->_setPageSize($newformat, $orientation); }
08110 /*-- CSS-PAGE --*/
08111   // Paged media (page-box)
08112   // mPDF 4.2
08113   if ($pagesel || (isset($this->page_box['using']) && $this->page_box['using'])) {
08114     if ($pagesel || $this->page==1) { $first = true; }
08115     else { $first = false; }
08116     if ($this->mirrorMargins && ($this->page % 2==0)) { $oddEven = 'E'; }
08117     else { $oddEven = 'O'; }
08118     if ($pagesel) { $psel = $pagesel; }
08119     else if ($this->page_box['current']) { $psel = $this->page_box['current']; }
08120     else { $psel = ''; }
08121     list($orientation,$mgl,$mgr,$mgt,$mgb,$mgh,$mgf,$hname,$fname,$bg,$resetpagenum,$pagenumstyle,$suppress,$marks,$newformat) = $this->SetPagedMediaCSS($psel, $first, $oddEven);
08122 
08123     if ($this->mirrorMargins && ($this->page % 2==0)) { 
08124       if ($hname) { $ehvalue = 1; $ehname = $hname; } else { $ehvalue = -1; }
08125       if ($fname) { $efvalue = 1; $efname = $fname; } else { $efvalue = -1; }
08126     }
08127     else { 
08128       if ($hname) { $ohvalue = 1; $ohname = $hname; } else { $ohvalue = -1; }
08129       if ($fname) { $ofvalue = 1; $ofname = $fname; } else { $ofvalue = -1; }
08130     }
08131     if ($resetpagenum || $pagenumstyle || $suppress) {
08132       $this->PageNumSubstitutions[] = array('from'=>($this->page), 'reset'=> $resetpagenum, 'type'=>$pagenumstyle, 'suppress'=>$suppress);
08133     }
08134       // PAGED MEDIA - CROP / CROSS MARKS from @PAGE
08135     $this->show_marks = $marks;
08136 
08137     // Background color
08138     if (isset($bg['BACKGROUND-COLOR'])) {
08139       $cor = $this->ConvertColor($bg['BACKGROUND-COLOR']);
08140       if ($cor) { 
08141         $this->bodyBackgroundColor = $cor; 
08142       }
08143     }
08144     else { $this->bodyBackgroundColor = false; } // mPDF 4.2
08145 
08146 /*-- GRADIENTS --*/
08147     if (isset($bg['BACKGROUND-GRADIENT'])) { 
08148       $this->bodyBackgroundGradient = $bg['BACKGROUND-GRADIENT'];
08149     }
08150     else { $this->bodyBackgroundGradient = false; } // mPDF 4.2
08151 /*-- END GRADIENTS --*/
08152 /*-- BACKGROUND-IMAGES --*/
08153     // Tiling Patterns
08154     if (isset($bg['BACKGROUND-IMAGE']) && $bg['BACKGROUND-IMAGE']) {  // mPDF 4.3.011
08155       $file = $bg['BACKGROUND-IMAGE'];
08156       $sizesarray = $this->Image($file,0,0,0,0,'','',false, false, false, false, false);  // mPDF 4.3.032
08157       if (isset($sizesarray['IMAGE_ID'])) {
08158         $image_id = $sizesarray['IMAGE_ID'];
08159         $orig_w = $sizesarray['WIDTH']*$this->k;    // in user units i.e. mm
08160         $orig_h = $sizesarray['HEIGHT']*$this->k;   // (using $this->img_dpi)
08161         $x_repeat = true;
08162         $y_repeat = true;
08163         if ($bg['BACKGROUND-REPEAT']=='no-repeat' || $bg['BACKGROUND-REPEAT']=='repeat-x') { $y_repeat = false; } 
08164         if ($bg['BACKGROUND-REPEAT']=='no-repeat' || $bg['BACKGROUND-REPEAT']=='repeat-y') { $x_repeat = false; }
08165         $x_pos = 0;
08166         $y_pos = 0;
08167         if ($bg['BACKGROUND-POSITION']) { 
08168           $ppos = preg_split('/\s+/',$bg['BACKGROUND-POSITION']);
08169           $x_pos = $ppos[0];
08170           $y_pos = $ppos[1];
08171           if (!stristr($x_pos ,'%') ) { $x_pos = $this->ConvertSize($x_pos ,$this->pgwidth,$this->FontSize); }
08172           if (!stristr($y_pos ,'%') ) { $y_pos = $this->ConvertSize($y_pos ,$this->pgwidth,$this->FontSize); }
08173         }
08174         // mPDF 4.3.015
08175         if (isset($bg['BACKGROUND-IMAGE-RESIZE'])) { $resize = $bg['BACKGROUND-IMAGE-RESIZE']; }
08176         else { $resize = 0; }
08177         // mPDF 4.3.017
08178         if (isset($bg['BACKGROUND-IMAGE-OPACITY'])) { $opacity = $bg['BACKGROUND-IMAGE-OPACITY']; }
08179         else { $opacity = 1; }
08180         $this->bodyBackgroundImage = array('image_id'=>$image_id, 'orig_w'=>$orig_w, 'orig_h'=>$orig_h, 'x_pos'=>$x_pos, 'y_pos'=>$y_pos, 'x_repeat'=>$x_repeat, 'y_repeat'=>$y_repeat, 'resize'=>$resize, 'opacity'=>$opacity);  // mPDF 4.3.015  4.3.017
08181         // $this->bodyBackgroundGradient = false; // mPDF 4.2
08182       }
08183     }
08184     else { $this->bodyBackgroundImage = false; } // mPDF 4.2
08185 /*-- END BACKGROUND-IMAGES --*/
08186 
08187     $this->page_box['current'] = $psel;
08188     $this->page_box['using'] = true;
08189   }
08190 /*-- END CSS-PAGE --*/
08191 
08192   //Page orientation
08193   if(!$orientation)
08194     $orientation=$this->DefOrientation;
08195   else {
08196     $orientation=strtoupper(substr($orientation,0,1));
08197     if($orientation!=$this->DefOrientation)
08198       $this->OrientationChanges[$this->page]=true;
08199   }
08200   if($orientation!=$this->CurOrientation || $newformat) { // mPDF 4.2.024
08201 
08202     //Change orientation
08203     if($orientation=='P') {
08204       $this->wPt=$this->fwPt;
08205       $this->hPt=$this->fhPt;
08206       $this->w=$this->fw;
08207       $this->h=$this->fh;
08208        if (($this->forcePortraitHeaders || $this->forcePortraitMargins) && $this->DefOrientation=='P') {
08209       $this->tMargin = $this->orig_tMargin;
08210       $this->bMargin = $this->orig_bMargin;
08211       $this->DeflMargin = $this->orig_lMargin;
08212       $this->DefrMargin = $this->orig_rMargin;
08213       $this->margin_header = $this->orig_hMargin;
08214       $this->margin_footer = $this->orig_fMargin;
08215        }
08216        else { $resetHTMLHeadersrequired = true; } // *HTMLHEADERS-FOOTERS*
08217     }
08218     else {
08219       $this->wPt=$this->fhPt;
08220       $this->hPt=$this->fwPt;
08221       $this->w=$this->fh;
08222       $this->h=$this->fw;
08223        if (($this->forcePortraitHeaders || $this->forcePortraitMargins) && $this->DefOrientation=='P') {
08224       $this->tMargin = $this->orig_lMargin;
08225       $this->bMargin = $this->orig_rMargin;
08226       $this->DeflMargin = $this->orig_bMargin;
08227       $this->DefrMargin = $this->orig_tMargin;
08228       $this->margin_header = $this->orig_hMargin;
08229       $this->margin_footer = $this->orig_fMargin;
08230        }
08231        else { $resetHTMLHeadersrequired = true; } // *HTMLHEADERS-FOOTERS*
08232 
08233     }
08234     $this->CurOrientation=$orientation;
08235     $this->ResetMargins();
08236     $this->pgwidth = $this->w - $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin;
08237     $this->PageBreakTrigger=$this->h-$this->bMargin;
08238   }
08239 
08240   $this->pageDim[$this->page]['w']=$this->w ;
08241   $this->pageDim[$this->page]['h']=$this->h ;
08242   // If Page Margins are re-defined
08243   // strlen()>0 is used to pick up (integer) 0, (string) '0', or set value
08244   if ((strlen($mgl)>0 && $this->DeflMargin != $mgl) || (strlen($mgr)>0 && $this->DefrMargin != $mgr) || (strlen($mgt)>0 && $this->tMargin != $mgt) || (strlen($mgb)>0 && $this->bMargin != $mgb) || (strlen($mgh)>0 && $this->margin_header!=$mgh) || (strlen($mgf)>0 && $this->margin_footer!=$mgf)) {
08245     if (strlen($mgl)>0)  $this->DeflMargin = $mgl;
08246     if (strlen($mgr)>0)  $this->DefrMargin = $mgr;
08247     if (strlen($mgt)>0)  $this->tMargin = $mgt;
08248     if (strlen($mgb)>0)  $this->bMargin = $mgb;
08249     if (strlen($mgh)>0)  $this->margin_header=$mgh;
08250     if (strlen($mgf)>0)  $this->margin_footer=$mgf;
08251     $this->ResetMargins();
08252     $this->SetAutoPageBreak($this->autoPageBreak,$this->bMargin);
08253     $this->pgwidth = $this->w - $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin;
08254     $resetHTMLHeadersrequired = true;   // *HTMLHEADERS-FOOTERS*
08255   }
08256 
08257   // mPDF 4.2 Moved page-box stuff
08258   // Moved in v1.4 to allow for changes in page orientation (Sets lMargin, rMargin, MarginCorrection)
08259   $this->ResetMargins();
08260   $this->pgwidth = $this->w - $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin;  // mPDF 4.3.007C
08261   $this->SetAutoPageBreak($this->autoPageBreak,$this->bMargin);
08262 
08263   // Reset column top margin
08264   $this->y0 = $this->tMargin;
08265 
08266   $this->x=$this->lMargin;
08267   $this->y=$this->tMargin;
08268   $this->FontFamily='';
08269 
08270 
08271   // HEADERS AND FOOTERS
08272   if ($ohvalue<0 || strtoupper($ohvalue)=='OFF') { 
08273     $this->HTMLHeader = ''; 
08274     $this->headerDetails['odd'] = array(); 
08275     $resetHTMLHeadersrequired = true; // *HTMLHEADERS-FOOTERS*
08276   }
08277   else if ($ohname && $ohvalue>0) {
08278 /*-- HTMLHEADERS-FOOTERS --*/
08279      if (preg_match('/^html_(.*)$/i',$ohname,$n)) {
08280     if (isset($this->pageHTMLheaders[$n[1]])) { $this->HTMLHeader = $this->pageHTMLheaders[$n[1]]; }
08281     else { $this->HTMLHeader = ''; }
08282     $this->headerDetails['odd'] = array(); 
08283     $resetHTMLHeadersrequired = true;
08284      }
08285      else {
08286 /*-- END HTMLHEADERS-FOOTERS --*/
08287     if (isset($this->pageheaders[$ohname])) { $this->headerDetails['odd'] = $this->pageheaders[$ohname]; } 
08288     else { $this->headerDetails['odd'] = array(); }
08289     $this->HTMLHeader = ''; 
08290 /*-- HTMLHEADERS-FOOTERS --*/
08291     $resetHTMLHeadersrequired = false;
08292      }
08293 /*-- END HTMLHEADERS-FOOTERS --*/
08294   }
08295 
08296   if ($ehvalue<0 || strtoupper($ehvalue)=='OFF') { 
08297     $this->HTMLHeaderE = ''; 
08298     $this->headerDetails['even'] = array(); 
08299     $resetHTMLHeadersrequired = true; // *HTMLHEADERS-FOOTERS*
08300   }
08301   else if ($ehname && $ehvalue>0) {
08302 /*-- HTMLHEADERS-FOOTERS --*/
08303      if (preg_match('/^html_(.*)$/i',$ehname,$n)) {
08304     if (isset($this->pageHTMLheaders[$n[1]])) { $this->HTMLHeaderE = $this->pageHTMLheaders[$n[1]]; } 
08305     else { $this->HTMLHeaderE = ''; }
08306     $this->headerDetails['even'] = array(); 
08307     $resetHTMLHeadersrequired = true;
08308      }
08309      else {
08310 /*-- END HTMLHEADERS-FOOTERS --*/
08311     if (isset($this->pageheaders[$ehname])) { $this->headerDetails['even'] = $this->pageheaders[$ehname]; }
08312     else { $this->headerDetails['even'] = array(); }
08313     $this->HTMLHeaderE = ''; 
08314 /*-- HTMLHEADERS-FOOTERS --*/
08315     $resetHTMLHeadersrequired = false;
08316      }
08317 /*-- END HTMLHEADERS-FOOTERS --*/
08318   }
08319 
08320   if ($ofvalue<0 || strtoupper($ofvalue)=='OFF') { 
08321     $this->HTMLFooter = ''; 
08322     $this->footerDetails['odd'] = array(); 
08323     $resetHTMLHeadersrequired = true; // *HTMLHEADERS-FOOTERS*
08324   }
08325   else if ($ofname && $ofvalue>0) {
08326 /*-- HTMLHEADERS-FOOTERS --*/
08327      if (preg_match('/^html_(.*)$/i',$ofname,$n)) {
08328     if (isset($this->pageHTMLfooters[$n[1]])) { $this->HTMLFooter = $this->pageHTMLfooters[$n[1]]; }
08329     else { $this->HTMLFooter = ''; }
08330     $this->footerDetails['odd'] = array(); 
08331     $resetHTMLHeadersrequired = true;
08332      }
08333      else {
08334 /*-- END HTMLHEADERS-FOOTERS --*/
08335     if (isset($this->pagefooters[$ofname])) { $this->footerDetails['odd'] = $this->pagefooters[$ofname]; }
08336     else { $this->footerDetails['odd'] = array(); }
08337     $this->HTMLFooter = ''; 
08338 /*-- HTMLHEADERS-FOOTERS --*/
08339     $resetHTMLHeadersrequired = true;
08340      }
08341 /*-- END HTMLHEADERS-FOOTERS --*/
08342   }
08343 
08344   if ($efvalue<0 || strtoupper($efvalue)=='OFF') { 
08345     $this->HTMLFooterE = ''; 
08346     $this->footerDetails['even'] = array(); 
08347     $resetHTMLHeadersrequired = true; // *HTMLHEADERS-FOOTERS*
08348   }
08349   else if ($efname && $efvalue>0) {
08350 /*-- HTMLHEADERS-FOOTERS --*/
08351      if (preg_match('/^html_(.*)$/i',$efname,$n)) {
08352     if (isset($this->pageHTMLfooters[$n[1]])) { $this->HTMLFooterE = $this->pageHTMLfooters[$n[1]]; } 
08353     else { $this->HTMLFooterE = ''; }
08354     $this->footerDetails['even'] = array(); 
08355     $resetHTMLHeadersrequired = true;
08356      }
08357      else {
08358 /*-- END HTMLHEADERS-FOOTERS --*/
08359     if (isset($this->pagefooters[$efname])) { $this->footerDetails['even'] = $this->pagefooters[$efname]; } 
08360     else { $this->footerDetails['even'] = array(); }
08361     $this->HTMLFooterE = ''; 
08362 /*-- HTMLHEADERS-FOOTERS --*/
08363     $resetHTMLHeadersrequired = true;
08364      }
08365 /*-- END HTMLHEADERS-FOOTERS --*/
08366   }
08367 
08368 /*-- HTMLHEADERS-FOOTERS --*/
08369   if ($resetHTMLHeadersrequired) {
08370     $this->SetHTMLHeader($this->HTMLHeader );
08371     $this->SetHTMLHeader($this->HTMLHeaderE ,'E');
08372     $this->SetHTMLFooter($this->HTMLFooter );
08373     $this->SetHTMLFooter($this->HTMLFooterE ,'E');
08374   }
08375 /*-- END HTMLHEADERS-FOOTERS --*/
08376 
08377   // mPDF 4.0
08378   if (($this->mirrorMargins) && (($this->page)%2==0)) { // EVEN
08379     $this->_setAutoHeaderHeight($this->headerDetails['even'], $this->HTMLHeaderE);
08380     $this->_setAutoFooterHeight($this->footerDetails['even'], $this->HTMLFooterE);
08381   }
08382   else {  // ODD or DEFAULT
08383     $this->_setAutoHeaderHeight($this->headerDetails['odd'], $this->HTMLHeader);
08384     $this->_setAutoFooterHeight($this->footerDetails['odd'], $this->HTMLFooter);
08385   }
08386   // Reset column top margin
08387   $this->y0 = $this->tMargin;
08388 
08389   $this->x=$this->lMargin;
08390   $this->y=$this->tMargin;
08391 }
08392 
08393 
08394 // mPDF 4.0
08395 function _setAutoHeaderHeight(&$det, &$htmlh) {
08396   if ($this->setAutoTopMargin=='pad') {
08397   if ($htmlh['h']) { $h = $htmlh['h']; }
08398   else if ($det) { $h = $this->_getHFHeight($det,'H'); }
08399   else { $h = 0; }
08400   $this->tMargin = $this->margin_header + $h + $this->orig_tMargin;
08401   }
08402   else if ($this->setAutoTopMargin=='stretch') {
08403   if ($htmlh['h']) { $h = $htmlh['h']; }
08404   else if ($det) { $h = $this->_getHFHeight($det,'H'); }
08405   else { $h = 0; }
08406   $this->tMargin = max($this->orig_tMargin, $this->margin_header + $h + $this->autoMarginPadding);
08407   }
08408 }
08409 
08410 // mPDF 4.0
08411 function _setAutoFooterHeight(&$det, &$htmlf) {
08412   if ($this->setAutoBottomMargin=='pad') {
08413   if ($htmlf['h']) { $h = $htmlf['h']; }
08414   else if ($det) { $h = $this->_getHFHeight($det,'F'); }
08415   else { $h = 0; }
08416   $this->bMargin = $this->margin_footer + $h + $this->orig_bMargin;
08417   $this->PageBreakTrigger=$this->h-$this->bMargin ;
08418   }
08419   else if ($this->setAutoBottomMargin=='stretch') {
08420   if ($htmlf['h']) { $h = $htmlf['h']; }
08421   else if ($det) { $h = $this->_getHFHeight($det,'F'); }
08422   else { $h = 0; }
08423   $this->bMargin = max($this->orig_bMargin, $this->margin_footer + $h + $this->autoMarginPadding);
08424   $this->PageBreakTrigger=$this->h-$this->bMargin ;
08425   }
08426 }
08427 // mPDF 4.0
08428 function _getHFHeight(&$det,$end) {
08429   $h = 0;
08430   if(count($det)) {
08431     foreach(array('L','C','R') AS $pos) {
08432       if (isset($det[$pos]['content']) && $det[$pos]['content']) {
08433       if (isset($det[$pos]['font-size']) && $det[$pos]['font-size']) { $hfsz = $det[$pos]['font-size']; }
08434       else { $hfsz = $this->default_font_size; }
08435       $h = max($h,$hfsz/$this->k);
08436       }
08437     }
08438     if ($det['line'] && $end=='H') { $h += $h/$this->k*$this->header_line_spacing; }
08439     else if ($det['line'] && $end=='F') { $h += $h/$this->k*$this->footer_line_spacing; }
08440     }
08441   return $h;
08442 }
08443 
08444 
08445 function _endpage() {
08446 /*-- CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT --*/
08447   $this->printfloatbuffer();
08448 /*-- END CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT --*/
08449 
08450   //End of page contents
08451   $this->state=1;
08452 }
08453 
08454 // mPDF 4.2.006
08455 function _newobj($obj_id=false,$onlynewobj=false) {
08456     if (!$obj_id) {
08457       $obj_id = ++$this->n;
08458     }
08459     //Begin a new object
08460     if (!$onlynewobj) {
08461       $this->offsets[$obj_id] = strlen($this->buffer);
08462       $this->_out($obj_id.' 0 obj');
08463       $this->_current_obj_id = $obj_id; // for later use with encryption
08464     }
08465 }
08466 
08467 function _dounderline($x,$y,$txt) {
08468   // mPDF 4.0 changed to line instead of rectangle
08469   // Now print line exactly where $y secifies - called from Text() and Cell() - adjust  position there
08470   // WORD SPACING
08471       $w =($this->GetStringWidth($txt)*$this->k) + ($this->charspacing * mb_strlen( $txt, $this->mb_enc )) 
08472      + ( $this->ws * mb_substr_count( $txt, ' ', $this->mb_enc ));
08473   //Draw a line
08474   return sprintf('%.3f %.3f m %.3f %.3f l S',$x*$this->k,($this->h-$y)*$this->k,($x*$this->k)+$w,($this->h-$y)*$this->k);
08475 }
08476 
08477 
08478 // mPDF 4.2
08479 function _imageError($file, $firsttime, $msg) {
08480   // Save re-trying image URL's which have already failed
08481   $this->failedimages[$file] = true;
08482   if ($firsttime && ($this->showImageErrors || $this->debug)) {
08483       $this->Error("IMAGE Error (".$file."): ".$msg);
08484   }
08485   return false;
08486 }
08487 
08488 
08489 // mPDF 4.2
08490 function _getImage(&$file, $firsttime=true, $allowvector=true, $orig_srcpath=false) { // mPDF 4.2.029 / 4.3.012
08491   // firsttime i.e. whether to add to this->images - use false when calling iteratively
08492 
08493   // Image Data passed directly as var:varname
08494   if (preg_match('/var:\s*(.*)/',$file, $v)) { 
08495     $data = $this->$v[1];
08496     $file = md5($data);
08497   }
08498   // mPDF 4.2.016
08499   if ($firsttime && preg_match('/(.*\/)([^\/]*)/',$file,$fm)) {
08500     if (strlen($fm[2])) { $file = $fm[1].preg_replace('/ /','%20',$fm[2]); }
08501   }
08502   // mPDF 4.2.029
08503   if ($orig_srcpath && isset($this->images[$orig_srcpath])) { $file=$orig_srcpath; return $this->images[$orig_srcpath]; }
08504   if (isset($this->images[$file])) { return $this->images[$file]; }
08505   else if ($orig_srcpath && isset($this->formobjects[$orig_srcpath])) { $file=$orig_srcpath; return $this->formobjects[$file]; }
08506   else if (isset($this->formobjects[$file])) { return $this->formobjects[$file]; }
08507   // Save re-trying image URL's which have already failed
08508   else if ($firsttime && isset($this->failedimages[$file])) { return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, ''); } 
08509   if (!$data) {
08510     $type = '';
08511     $data = '';
08512     $mqr=ini_get("magic_quotes_runtime");
08513     if ($mqr) { set_magic_quotes_runtime(0); }
08514 
08515     // mPDF 4.2.029
08516     if ($orig_srcpath && $this->basepathIsLocal && $check = @fopen($orig_srcpath,"rb")) {
08517       fclose($check); 
08518       $file=$orig_srcpath;
08519       $data = file_get_contents($file);
08520       $type = $this->_imageTypeFromString($data);
08521     }
08522     if (!$data && $check = @fopen($file,"rb")) {  // mPDF 4.2.029
08523       fclose($check); 
08524       $data = file_get_contents($file);
08525       $type = $this->_imageTypeFromString($data);
08526     }
08527     if ((!$data || !$type) && !ini_get('allow_url_fopen')) {  // only worth trying if remote file and !ini_get('allow_url_fopen')
08528       $this->file_get_contents_by_socket($file, $data); // needs full url?? even on local (never needed for local)
08529       if ($data) { $type = $this->_imageTypeFromString($data); }
08530     }
08531     if ((!$data || !$type) && !ini_get('allow_url_fopen') && function_exists("curl_init")) {
08532       $this->file_get_contents_by_curl($file, $data);   // needs full url?? even on local (never needed for local)
08533       if ($data) { $type = $this->_imageTypeFromString($data); }
08534     }
08535 
08536     if ($mqr) { set_magic_quotes_runtime($mqr); }
08537   }
08538   if (!$data) { return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Could not find image file'); }
08539   if (!$type) { $type = $this->_imageTypeFromString($data); }
08540   // mPDF 4.3.013 SVG files
08541   if (($type == 'wmf' || $type == 'svg') && !$allowvector) { return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'WMF or SVG image file not supported in this context'); }
08542 
08543   // mPDF 4.3.013 SVG files
08544   // SVG
08545   if ($type == 'svg') {
08546     if (!class_exists('SVG')) { include(_MPDF_PATH .'classes/svg.php'); }
08547     $svg = new SVG($this);
08548     $family=$this->FontFamily;
08549     $style=$this->FontStyle;
08550     $size=$this->FontSizePt;
08551     $info = $svg->ImageSVG($data);
08552     //Restore font
08553     if($family) $this->SetFont($family,$style,$size,false);
08554     if (!$info) { return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error parsing SVG file'); }
08555     $info['type']='svg';
08556     $info['i']=count($this->formobjects)+1;
08557     $this->formobjects[$file]=$info;
08558     return $info;
08559   }
08560 
08561   // JPEG
08562   if ($type == 'jpeg' || $type == 'jpg') {
08563     $hdr = $this->_jpgHeaderFromString($data);
08564     if (!$hdr) { return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error parsing JPG header'); }
08565     $a = $this->_jpgDataFromHeader($hdr);
08566     // mPDF 4.2.018
08567     if ($a[2] == 'DeviceCMYK' && $this->PDFA) { 
08568       if (!function_exists("gd_info")) { $this->Error("JPG image may not use CMYK color space (".$file.")."); }
08569       if (!$this->PDFAauto) { $this->PDFAwarnings[] = "JPG image may not use CMYK color space - ".$file." - (Image converted to RGB. NB This will alter the colour profile of the image.)"; }
08570       // convert to RGB image
08571       $im = @imagecreatefromstring($data);
08572       if ($im) {
08573         $tempfile = _MPDF_TEMP_PATH.'_tempImgPNG'.RAND(1,10000).'.png'; // mPDF 4.3.007E
08574         imageinterlace($im, false);
08575         $check = @imagepng($im, $tempfile);
08576         if (!$check) { return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error creating temporary file ('.$tempfile.') whilst using GD library to parse JPG(CMYK) image'); }
08577         $info = $this->_getImage($tempfile, false);
08578         if (!$info) { return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error parsing temporary file ('.$tempfile.') created with GD library to parse JPG(CMYK) image'); }
08579         imagedestroy($im);
08580         unlink($tempfile);
08581         $info['type']='jpg';
08582         if ($firsttime) {
08583           $info['i']=count($this->images)+1;
08584           $this->images[$file]=$info;
08585         }
08586         return $info;
08587       }
08588       else { return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error creating GD image file from JPG(CMYK) image'); }
08589     }
08590     $info = array('w'=>$a[0],'h'=>$a[1],'cs'=>$a[2],'bpc'=>$a[3],'f'=>'DCTDecode','data'=>$data);
08591     $info['type']='jpg';
08592     if ($firsttime) {
08593       $info['i']=count($this->images)+1;
08594       $this->images[$file]=$info;
08595     }
08596     return $info;
08597   }
08598 
08599   // PNG
08600   else if ($type == 'png') {
08601     //Check signature
08602     if(substr($data,0,8)!=$this->chrs[137].'PNG'.$this->chrs[13].$this->chrs[10].$this->chrs[26].$this->chrs[10]) { 
08603       return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error parsing PNG identifier'); 
08604     }
08605     //Read header chunk
08606     if(substr($data,12,4)!='IHDR') { 
08607       return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Incorrect PNG file (no IHDR block found)'); 
08608     }
08609     $w=$this->_fourbytes2int(substr($data,16,4));
08610     $h=$this->_fourbytes2int(substr($data,20,4));
08611     $bpc=$this->ords[substr($data,24,1)];
08612     $errpng = false;
08613     $pngalpha = false; 
08614     if($bpc>8) { $errpng = 'not 8-bit depth'; }
08615     $ct=$this->ords[substr($data,25,1)];
08616     if($ct==0) { $colspace='DeviceGray'; }
08617     elseif($ct==2) { $colspace='DeviceRGB'; }
08618     elseif($ct==3) { $colspace='Indexed'; }
08619     else { $errpng = 'alpha channel'; $pngalpha = true; } 
08620     if($this->ords[substr($data,26,1)]!=0) { $errpng = 'compression method'; }
08621     if($this->ords[substr($data,27,1)]!=0) { $errpng = 'filter method'; }
08622     if($this->ords[substr($data,28,1)]!=0) { $errpng = 'interlaced file'; }
08623 
08624     if ($errpng || $pngalpha) {
08625       if (function_exists('gd_info')) { $gd = gd_info(); }
08626       else {$gd = array(); }
08627       if (!isset($gd['PNG Support'])) { return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'GD library required for PNG image ('.$errpng.')'); }
08628       $im = imagecreatefromstring($data);
08629       if (!$im) { return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error creating GD image from PNG file ('.$errpng.')'); }
08630       $w = imagesx($im);
08631       $h = imagesy($im);
08632       if ($im) {
08633          $tempfile = _MPDF_TEMP_PATH.'_tempImgPNG'.RAND(1,10000).'.png';  // mPDF 4.3.007E
08634          // Alpha channel set
08635          if ($pngalpha) { 
08636         // mPDF 4.2.018
08637         if ($this->PDFA) { $this->Error("PDFA1-b does not permit images with alpha channel transparency (".$file.")."); }
08638         $imgalpha = imagecreate($w, $h);
08639         // generate gray scale pallete
08640         for ($c = 0; $c < 256; ++$c) { ImageColorAllocate($imgalpha, $c, $c, $c); }
08641         // extract alpha channel
08642         for ($xpx = 0; $xpx < $w; ++$xpx) {
08643           for ($ypx = 0; $ypx < $h; ++$ypx) {
08644             $colorindex = imagecolorat($im, $xpx, $ypx);
08645             $col = imagecolorsforindex($im, $colorindex);
08646             $gammacorr = 2.2; // gamma correction
08647             $gamma = (pow((((127 - $col['alpha']) * 255 / 127) / 255), $gammacorr) * 255);
08648             imagesetpixel($imgalpha, $xpx, $ypx, $gamma);
08649           }
08650         }
08651         // create temp alpha file
08652         $tempfile_alpha = _MPDF_TEMP_PATH.'_tempMskPNG'.RAND(1,10000).'.png'; // mPDF 4.3.007E
08653         $check = @imagepng($imgalpha, $tempfile_alpha);
08654         if (!$check) { return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Failed to create temporary image file ('.$tempfile_alpha.') parsing PNG image with alpha channel ('.$errpng.')'); }
08655         imagedestroy($imgalpha);
08656         // extract image without alpha channel
08657         $imgplain = imagecreatetruecolor($w, $h);
08658         imagecopy($imgplain, $im, 0, 0, 0, 0, $w, $h);
08659         // create temp image file
08660         $check = @imagepng($imgplain, $tempfile);
08661         if (!$check) { return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Failed to create temporary image file ('.$tempfile.') parsing PNG image with alpha channel ('.$errpng.')'); }
08662         imagedestroy($imgplain);
08663         // embed mask image
08664         $minfo = $this->_getImage($tempfile_alpha, false);
08665         unlink($tempfile_alpha);
08666         if (!$minfo) { return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error parsing temporary file ('.$tempfile_alpha.') created with GD library to parse PNG image'); }
08667         $imgmask = count($this->images)+1;
08668         $minfo['cs'] = 'DeviceGray';
08669         $minfo['i']=$imgmask ;
08670         $this->images[$tempfile_alpha] = $minfo;
08671         // embed image, masked with previously embedded mask
08672         $info = $this->_getImage($tempfile, false);
08673         unlink($tempfile);
08674         if (!$info) { return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error parsing temporary file ('.$tempfile.') created with GD library to parse PNG image'); }
08675         $info['masked'] = $imgmask;
08676         $info['i']=count($this->images)+1;
08677         $info['type']='png';
08678         $this->images[$file]=$info;
08679         return $info;
08680          }
08681          else {   // No alpha/transparency set
08682         imagealphablending($im, false);
08683         imagesavealpha($im, false); 
08684         imageinterlace($im, false);
08685         $check = @imagepng($im, $tempfile );
08686         if (!$check) { return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Failed to create temporary image file ('.$tempfile.') parsing PNG image ('.$errpng.')'); }
08687         imagedestroy($im);
08688         $info = $this->_getImage($tempfile, false) ;
08689         unlink($tempfile ); 
08690         if (!$info) { return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error parsing temporary file ('.$tempfile.') created with GD library to parse PNG image'); }
08691         $info['i']=count($this->images)+1;
08692         $info['type']='png';
08693         $this->images[$file]=$info;
08694         return $info;
08695          }
08696       }
08697     }
08698 
08699     $parms='/DecodeParms <</Predictor 15 /Colors '.($ct==2 ? 3 : 1).' /BitsPerComponent '.$bpc.' /Columns '.$w.'>>';
08700     //Scan chunks looking for palette, transparency and image data
08701     $pal='';
08702     $trns='';
08703     $pngdata='';
08704     $p = 33;
08705     do {
08706       $n=$this->_fourbytes2int(substr($data,$p,4)); $p += 4;
08707       $type=substr($data,$p,4); $p += 4;
08708       if($type=='PLTE') {
08709         //Read palette
08710         $pal=substr($data,$p,$n); $p += $n;
08711         $p += 4;
08712       }
08713       elseif($type=='tRNS') {
08714         //Read transparency info
08715         $t=substr($data,$p,$n); $p += $n;
08716         if($ct==0) $trns=array($this->ords[substr($t,1,1)]);
08717         elseif($ct==2) $trns=array($this->ords[substr($t,1,1)],$this->ords[substr($t,3,1)],$this->ords[substr($t,5,1)]);
08718         else
08719         {
08720           $pos=strpos($t,$this->chrs[0]);
08721           if(is_int($pos)) $trns=array($pos);
08722         }
08723         $p += 4;
08724       }
08725       elseif($type=='IDAT') {
08726         $pngdata.=substr($data,$p,$n);  $p += $n;
08727         $p += 4;
08728       }
08729       elseif($type=='IEND') { break; }
08730       else if (preg_match('/[a-zA-Z]{4}/',$type)) { $p += $n+4; }
08731       else { return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error parsing PNG image data'); }
08732     }
08733     while($n);
08734     if (!$pngdata) { return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error parsing PNG image data - no IDAT data found'); }
08735     if($colspace=='Indexed' and empty($pal)) { return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error parsing PNG image data - missing colour palette'); }
08736     $info = array('w'=>$w,'h'=>$h,'cs'=>$colspace,'bpc'=>$bpc,'f'=>'FlateDecode','parms'=>$parms,'pal'=>$pal,'trns'=>$trns,'data'=>$pngdata);
08737     $info['type']='png';
08738     if ($firsttime) {
08739       $info['i']=count($this->images)+1;
08740       $this->images[$file]=$info;
08741     }
08742     return $info;
08743   }
08744 
08745   // GIF
08746   else if ($type == 'gif') {
08747     if (function_exists('gd_info')) { $gd = gd_info(); }
08748     else {$gd = array(); }
08749     if (isset($gd['GIF Read Support']) && $gd['GIF Read Support']) {
08750       $im = @imagecreatefromstring($data);
08751       if ($im) {
08752         $tempfile = _MPDF_TEMP_PATH.'_tempImgPNG'.RAND(1,10000).'.png'; // mPDF 4.3.007E
08753         imagealphablending($im, false);
08754         imagesavealpha($im, false); 
08755         imageinterlace($im, false);
08756         $check = @imagepng($im, $tempfile);
08757         if (!$check) { return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error creating temporary file ('.$tempfile.') whilst using GD library to parse GIF image'); }
08758         $info = $this->_getImage($tempfile, false);
08759         if (!$info) { return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error parsing temporary file ('.$tempfile.') created with GD library to parse GIF image'); }
08760         imagedestroy($im);
08761         unlink($tempfile);
08762         $info['type']='gif';
08763         if ($firsttime) {
08764           $info['i']=count($this->images)+1;
08765           $this->images[$file]=$info;
08766         }
08767         return $info;
08768       }
08769       else { return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error creating GD image file from GIF image'); }
08770     }
08771 
08772     if (!class_exists('gif')) { 
08773       include_once(_MPDF_PATH.'classes/gif.php'); 
08774       $gif=new CGIF();
08775     }
08776 
08777     $h=0;
08778     $w=0;
08779     $gif->loadFile($data, 0);
08780 
08781     if(isset($gif->m_img->m_gih->m_bLocalClr) && $gif->m_img->m_gih->m_bLocalClr) {
08782       $nColors = $gif->m_img->m_gih->m_nTableSize;
08783       $pal = $gif->m_img->m_gih->m_colorTable->toString();
08784       if($bgColor != -1) {
08785         $bgColor = $gif->m_img->m_gih->m_colorTable->colorIndex($bgColor);
08786       }
08787       $colspace='Indexed';
08788     } elseif(isset($gif->m_gfh->m_bGlobalClr) && $gif->m_gfh->m_bGlobalClr) {
08789       $nColors = $gif->m_gfh->m_nTableSize;
08790       $pal = $gif->m_gfh->m_colorTable->toString();
08791       if((isset($bgColor)) and $bgColor != -1) {
08792         $bgColor = $gif->m_gfh->m_colorTable->colorIndex($bgColor);
08793       }
08794       $colspace='Indexed';
08795     } else {
08796       $nColors = 0;
08797       $bgColor = -1;
08798       $colspace='DeviceGray';
08799       $pal='';
08800     }
08801 
08802     $trns='';
08803     if(isset($gif->m_img->m_bTrans) && $gif->m_img->m_bTrans && ($nColors > 0)) {
08804       $trns=array($gif->m_img->m_nTrans);
08805     }
08806     $gifdata=$gif->m_img->m_data;
08807     $w=$gif->m_gfh->m_nWidth;
08808     $h=$gif->m_gfh->m_nHeight;
08809     $gif->ClearData();
08810 
08811     if($colspace=='Indexed' and empty($pal)) {
08812       return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error parsing GIF image - missing colour palette'); 
08813     }
08814     if ($this->compress) {
08815       $gifdata=gzcompress($gifdata);
08816       $info = array( 'w'=>$w, 'h'=>$h, 'cs'=>$colspace, 'bpc'=>8, 'f'=>'FlateDecode', 'pal'=>$pal, 'trns'=>$trns, 'data'=>$gifdata);
08817     } 
08818     else {
08819       $info = array( 'w'=>$w, 'h'=>$h, 'cs'=>$colspace, 'bpc'=>8, 'pal'=>$pal, 'trns'=>$trns, 'data'=>$gifdata);
08820     } 
08821     $info['type']='gif';
08822     if ($firsttime) {
08823       $info['i']=count($this->images)+1;
08824       $this->images[$file]=$info;
08825     }
08826     return $info;
08827   }
08828 
08829 /*-- IMAGES-WMF --*/
08830   // WMF
08831   else if ($type == 'wmf') {
08832     $this->gdiObjectArray = array();
08833     $a=unpack('stest',"\1\0");
08834     if ($a['test']!=1)
08835     return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error parsing WMF image - Big-endian architecture not supported'); 
08836     // check for Aldus placeable metafile header
08837     $key = unpack('Lmagic', substr($data, 0, 4));
08838     $p = 18;  // WMF header 
08839     if ($key['magic'] == (int)0x9AC6CDD7) { $p +=22; } // Aldus header
08840     // define some state variables
08841     $wo=null; // window origin
08842     $we=null; // window extent
08843     $polyFillMode = 0;
08844     $nullPen = false;
08845     $nullBrush = false;
08846     $endRecord = false;
08847     $wmfdata = '';
08848     while ($p < strlen($data) && !$endRecord) {
08849       $recordInfo = unpack('Lsize/Sfunc', substr($data, $p, 6));  $p += 6;
08850       // size of record given in WORDs (= 2 bytes)
08851       $size = $recordInfo['size'];
08852       // func is number of GDI function
08853       $func = $recordInfo['func'];
08854       if ($size > 3) {
08855         $parms = substr($data, $p, 2*($size-3));  $p += 2*($size-3);
08856       }
08857       switch ($func) {
08858         case 0x020b:  // SetWindowOrg
08859           // do not allow window origin to be changed
08860           // after drawing has begun
08861           if (!$wmfdata)
08862             $wo = array_reverse(unpack('s2', $parms));
08863           break;
08864         case 0x020c:  // SetWindowExt
08865           // do not allow window extent to be changed
08866           // after drawing has begun
08867           if (!$wmfdata)
08868             $we = array_reverse(unpack('s2', $parms));
08869           break;
08870         case 0x02fc:  // CreateBrushIndirect
08871           $brush = unpack('sstyle/Cr/Cg/Cb/Ca/Shatch', $parms);
08872           $brush['type'] = 'B';
08873           $this->_AddGDIObject($brush);
08874           break;
08875         case 0x02fa:  // CreatePenIndirect
08876           $pen = unpack('Sstyle/swidth/sdummy/Cr/Cg/Cb/Ca', $parms);
08877           // convert width from twips to user unit
08878           $pen['width'] /= (20 * $this->k);
08879           $pen['type'] = 'P';
08880           $this->_AddGDIObject($pen);
08881           break;
08882 
08883         // MUST create other GDI objects even if we don't handle them
08884         case 0x06fe: // CreateBitmap
08885         case 0x02fd: // CreateBitmapIndirect
08886         case 0x00f8: // CreateBrush
08887         case 0x02fb: // CreateFontIndirect
08888         case 0x00f7: // CreatePalette
08889         case 0x01f9: // CreatePatternBrush
08890         case 0x06ff: // CreateRegion
08891         case 0x0142: // DibCreatePatternBrush
08892           $dummyObject = array('type'=>'D');
08893           $this->_AddGDIObject($dummyObject);
08894           break;
08895         case 0x0106:  // SetPolyFillMode
08896           $polyFillMode = unpack('smode', $parms);
08897           $polyFillMode = $polyFillMode['mode'];
08898           break;
08899         case 0x01f0:  // DeleteObject
08900           $idx = unpack('Sidx', $parms);
08901           $idx = $idx['idx'];
08902           $this->_DeleteGDIObject($idx);
08903           break;
08904         case 0x012d:  // SelectObject
08905           $idx = unpack('Sidx', $parms);
08906           $idx = $idx['idx'];
08907           $obj = $this->_GetGDIObject($idx);
08908           switch ($obj['type']) {
08909             case 'B':
08910               $nullBrush = false;
08911               if ($obj['style'] == 1) { $nullBrush = true; }
08912               else {
08913                 $wmfdata .= sprintf("%.3f %.3f %.3f rg\n",$obj['r']/255,$obj['g']/255,$obj['b']/255);
08914               }
08915               break;
08916             case 'P':
08917               $nullPen = false;
08918               $dashArray = array(); 
08919               // dash parameters are custom
08920               switch ($obj['style']) {
08921                 case 0: // PS_SOLID
08922                   break;
08923                 case 1: // PS_DASH
08924                   $dashArray = array(3,1);
08925                   break;
08926                 case 2: // PS_DOT
08927                   $dashArray = array(0.5,0.5);
08928                   break;
08929                 case 3: // PS_DASHDOT
08930                   $dashArray = array(2,1,0.5,1);
08931                   break;
08932                 case 4: // PS_DASHDOTDOT
08933                   $dashArray = array(2,1,0.5,1,0.5,1);
08934                   break;
08935                 case 5: // PS_NULL
08936                   $nullPen = true;
08937                   break;
08938               }
08939               if (!$nullPen) {
08940                 $wmfdata .= sprintf("%.3f %.3f %.3f RG\n",$obj['r']/255,$obj['g']/255,$obj['b']/255);
08941                 $wmfdata .= sprintf("%.3f w\n",$obj['width']*$this->k);
08942               }
08943               if (!empty($dashArray)) {
08944                 $s = '[';
08945                 for ($i=0; $i<count($dashArray);$i++) {
08946                   $s .= $dashArray[$i] * $this->k;
08947                   if ($i != count($dashArray)-1) { $s .= ' '; }
08948                 }
08949                 $s .= '] 0 d';
08950                 $wmfdata .= $s."\n";
08951               }
08952               break;
08953           }
08954           break;
08955         case 0x0325: // Polyline
08956         case 0x0324: // Polygon
08957           $coords = unpack('s'.($size-3), $parms);
08958           $numpoints = $coords[1];
08959           for ($i = $numpoints; $i > 0; $i--) {
08960             $px = $coords[2*$i];
08961             $py = $coords[2*$i+1];
08962 
08963             if ($i < $numpoints) { $wmfdata .= $this->_LineTo($px, $py); }
08964              else { $wmfdata .= $this->_MoveTo($px, $py); }
08965           }
08966           if ($func == 0x0325) { $op = 's'; }
08967           else if ($func == 0x0324) {
08968             if ($nullPen) {
08969               if ($nullBrush) { $op = 'n'; } // no op
08970               else { $op = 'f'; } // fill
08971             }
08972             else {
08973               if ($nullBrush) { $op = 's'; } // stroke
08974               else { $op = 'b'; } // stroke and fill
08975             }
08976             if ($polyFillMode==1 && ($op=='b' || $op=='f')) { $op .= '*'; } // use even-odd fill rule
08977           }
08978           $wmfdata .= $op."\n";
08979           break;
08980         case 0x0538: // PolyPolygon
08981           $coords = unpack('s'.($size-3), $parms);
08982           $numpolygons = $coords[1];
08983           $adjustment = $numpolygons;
08984           for ($j = 1; $j <= $numpolygons; $j++) {
08985             $numpoints = $coords[$j + 1];
08986             for ($i = $numpoints; $i > 0; $i--) {
08987               $px = $coords[2*$i   + $adjustment];
08988               $py = $coords[2*$i+1 + $adjustment];
08989               if ($i == $numpoints) { $wmfdata .= $this->_MoveTo($px, $py); }
08990               else { $wmfdata .= $this->_LineTo($px, $py); }
08991             }
08992             $adjustment += $numpoints * 2;
08993           }
08994 
08995           if ($nullPen) {
08996             if ($nullBrush) { $op = 'n'; } // no op
08997             else { $op = 'f'; } // fill
08998           }
08999           else {
09000             if ($nullBrush) { $op = 's'; } // stroke
09001             else { $op = 'b'; } // stroke and fill
09002           }
09003           if ($polyFillMode==1 && ($op=='b' || $op=='f')) { $op .= '*'; } // use even-odd fill rule
09004           $wmfdata .= $op."\n";
09005           break;
09006         case 0x0000:
09007           $endRecord = true;
09008           break;
09009       }
09010     }
09011     if (!$wmfdata) { return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error parsing WMF image'); }
09012     $info = array('x'=>$wo[0],'y'=>$wo[1],'w'=>$we[0],'h'=>$we[1],'data'=>$wmfdata);
09013     $info['i']=count($this->formobjects)+1;
09014     $info['type']='wmf';
09015     $this->formobjects[$file]=$info;
09016     return $info;
09017   }
09018 /*-- END IMAGES-WMF --*/
09019 
09020   // UNKNOWN TYPE - try GD imagecreatefromstring
09021   else {
09022     if (function_exists('gd_info')) { $gd = gd_info(); }
09023     else {$gd = array(); }
09024     if (isset($gd['PNG Support']) && $gd['PNG Support']) {
09025       $im = @imagecreatefromstring($data);
09026       if (!$im) { return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error parsing image file - image type not recognised, and not supported by GD imagecreate'); }
09027       $tempfile = _MPDF_TEMP_PATH.'_tempImgPNG'.RAND(1,10000).'.png'; // mPDF 4.3.007E
09028       imagealphablending($im, false);
09029       imagesavealpha($im, false); 
09030       imageinterlace($im, false);
09031       $check = @imagepng($im, $tempfile);
09032       if (!$check) { return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error creating temporary file ('.$tempfile.') whilst using GD library to parse unknown image type'); }
09033       $info = $this->_getImage($tempfile, false);
09034       imagedestroy($im);
09035       unlink($tempfile);
09036       if (!$info) { return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error parsing temporary file ('.$tempfile.') created with GD library to parse unknown image type'); }
09037       $info['type']='png';
09038       if ($firsttime) {
09039         $info['i']=count($this->images)+1;
09040         $this->images[$file]=$info;
09041       }
09042       return $info;
09043     }
09044   }
09045 
09046   return $this->_imageError($file, $firsttime, 'Error parsing image file - image type not recognised'); 
09047 }
09048 //==============================================================
09049 // mPDF 4.2
09050 function _fourbytes2int($s) {
09051   //Read a 4-byte integer from string
09052   return (ord(substr($s, 0, 1))<<24) + (ord(substr($s, 1, 1))<<16) + (ord(substr($s, 2, 1))<<8) + ord(substr($s, 3, 1));
09053 }
09054 //==============================================================
09055 // mPDF 4.2
09056 function _twobytes2int($s) {
09057   //Read a 2-byte integer from string
09058   return (ord(substr($s, 0, 1))<<8) + ord(substr($s, 1, 1));
09059 }
09060 
09061 //==============================================================
09062 // mPDF 4.2
09063 function _jpgHeaderFromString(&$data) {
09064   $p = 4;
09065   $p += $this->_twobytes2int(substr($data, $p, 2)); // Length of initial marker block
09066   $marker = substr($data, $p, 2);
09067   while($marker != chr(255).chr(192) && $p<strlen($data)) { // Start of frame marker (FFC0)
09068     $p += ($this->_twobytes2int(substr($data, $p+2, 2))) + 2; // Length of marker block
09069     $marker = substr($data, $p, 2);
09070   }
09071     
09072   if ($marker != chr(255).chr(192)) { return false; }
09073   return substr($data, $p+2, 10);
09074 }
09075 //==============================================================
09076 // mPDF 4.2
09077 function _jpgDataFromHeader($hdr) {
09078   $bpc = ord(substr($hdr, 2, 1));
09079   if (!$bpc) { $bpc = 8; }
09080   $h = $this->_twobytes2int(substr($hdr, 3, 2));
09081   $w = $this->_twobytes2int(substr($hdr, 5, 2));
09082   $channels = ord(substr($hdr, 7, 1));
09083   if ($channels==3) { $colspace='DeviceRGB'; }  
09084   elseif($channels==4) { $colspace='DeviceCMYK'; }
09085   else { $colspace='DeviceGray'; }
09086   return array($w, $h, $colspace, $bpc);
09087 }
09088 //==============================================================
09089 // mPDF 4.2
09090 function file_get_contents_by_curl($url, &$data) {
09091   $timeout = 5;
09092   $ch = curl_init($url);
09093   curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HEADER, 0);
09094   curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_NOBODY, 0);
09095   curl_setopt ( $ch , CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER , 1 );
09096   curl_setopt ( $ch , CURLOPT_CONNECTTIMEOUT , $timeout );
09097   $data = curl_exec($ch);
09098   curl_close($ch);
09099 }
09100 //==============================================================
09101 // mPDF 4.2
09102 function file_get_contents_by_socket($url, &$data) {
09103   $timeout = 1;
09104   $p = parse_url($url);
09105   $file = $p['path'];
09106   if ($p['query']) { $file .= '?'.$p['query']; }
09107   if(!($fh = @fsockopen($p['host'], 80, $errno, $errstr, $timeout))) { return false; }
09108   $getstring =
09109     "GET ".$file." HTTP/1.0 \r\n" .
09110     "Host: ".$p['host']." \r\n" .
09111     "Connection: close\r\n\r\n";
09112   fwrite($fh, $getstring);
09113   // Get rid of HTTP header
09114   $s = fgets($fh, 1024);
09115   if (!$s) { return false; }
09116   $httpheader .= $s;
09117   while (!feof($fh)) {
09118     $s = fgets($fh, 1024);
09119     if ( $s == "\r\n" ) { break; }
09120   }
09121   $data = '';
09122   while (!feof($fh)) {
09123     $data .= fgets($fh, 1024);
09124   }
09125   fclose($fh);
09126 }
09127 
09128 //==============================================================
09129 // mPDF 4.2
09130 function _imageTypeFromString(&$data) {
09131   $type = '';
09132   if (substr($data, 6, 4)== 'JFIF') { 
09133     $type = 'jpeg'; 
09134   }
09135   else if (substr($data, 0, 6)== "GIF87a" || substr($data, 0, 6)== "GIF89a") { 
09136     $type = 'gif';
09137   }
09138   else if (substr($data, 0, 8)== chr(137).'PNG'.chr(13).chr(10).chr(26).chr(10)) { 
09139     $type = 'png';
09140   }
09141 /*-- IMAGES-WMF --*/
09142   else if (substr($data, 0, 4)== chr(215).chr(205).chr(198).chr(154)) { 
09143     $type = 'wmf';
09144   }
09145 /*-- END IMAGES-WMF --*/
09146   // mPDF 4.3.013 SVG files
09147   else if (preg_match('/<svg.*<\/svg>/is',$data)) { 
09148     $type = 'svg';
09149   }
09150   return $type;
09151 }
09152 //==============================================================
09153 
09154 /*-- IMAGES-WMF --*/
09155 // WMF functions
09156 function _MoveTo($x, $y) {
09157   return "$x $y m\n";
09158 }
09159 
09160 // a line must have been started using _MoveTo() first
09161 function _LineTo($x, $y) {
09162   return "$x $y l\n";
09163 }
09164 
09165 function _AddGDIObject($obj) {
09166   // find next available slot
09167   $idx = 0;
09168   if (!empty($this->gdiObjectArray)) {
09169     $empty = false;
09170     $i = 0;
09171     while (!$empty) {
09172       $empty = !isset($this->gdiObjectArray[$i]);
09173       $i++;
09174     }
09175     $idx = $i-1;
09176   }
09177   $this->gdiObjectArray[$idx] = $obj;
09178 }
09179 
09180 function _GetGDIObject($idx) {
09181   return $this->gdiObjectArray[$idx];
09182 }
09183 
09184 function _DeleteGDIObject($idx) {
09185   unset($this->gdiObjectArray[$idx]);
09186 }
09187 // END of WMF functions
09188 /*-- END IMAGES-WMF --*/
09189 
09190 // mPDF 4.3.013 SVG files
09191 // Moved outside WMF as also needed for SVG
09192 function _putformobjects() {
09193   reset($this->formobjects);
09194   while(list($file,$info)=each($this->formobjects)) {
09195     $this->_newobj();
09196     $this->formobjects[$file]['n']=$this->n;
09197     $this->_out('<</Type /XObject');
09198     $this->_out('/Subtype /Form');
09199     $this->_out('/Group '.($this->n+1).' 0 R'); // mPDF 4.3.017
09200     $this->_out('/BBox ['.$info['x'].' '.$info['y'].' '.($info['w']+$info['x']).' '.($info['h']+$info['y']).']');
09201     if ($this->compress)
09202       $this->_out('/Filter /FlateDecode');
09203     $data=($this->compress) ? gzcompress($info['data']) : $info['data'];
09204     $this->_out('/Length '.strlen($data).'>>');
09205     $this->_putstream($data);
09206     unset($this->formobjects[$file]['data']);
09207     $this->_out('endobj');
09208     // mPDF 4.3.017  Required for SVG transparency (opacity) to work
09209     $this->_newobj();
09210     $this->_out('<</Type /Group');
09211     $this->_out('/S /Transparency');
09212     $this->_out('>>');
09213     $this->_out('endobj');
09214   }
09215 }
09216 
09217 function _freadint($f)
09218 {
09219   //Read a 4-byte integer from file
09220   $i=$this->ords[fread($f,1)]<<24;
09221   $i+=$this->ords[fread($f,1)]<<16;
09222   $i+=$this->ords[fread($f,1)]<<8;
09223   $i+=$this->ords[fread($f,1)];
09224   return $i;
09225 }
09226 
09227 function _UTF16BEtextstring($s) {
09228   $s = $this->UTF8ToUTF16BE($s, true);
09229 /*-- ENCRYPTION --*/
09230   if ($this->encrypted) {
09231     $s = $this->_RC4($this->_objectkey($this->_current_obj_id), $s);  // mPDF 4.2.006
09232   }
09233 /*-- END ENCRYPTION --*/
09234   return '('. $this->_escape($s).')';
09235 }
09236 
09237 function _textstring($s) {
09238 /*-- ENCRYPTION --*/
09239   if ($this->encrypted) {
09240     $s = $this->_RC4($this->_objectkey($this->_current_obj_id), $s);  // mPDF 4.2.006
09241   }
09242 /*-- END ENCRYPTION --*/
09243   return '('. $this->_escape($s).')';
09244 }
09245 
09246 
09247 function _escape($s)
09248 {
09249   // the chr(13) substitution fixes the Bugs item #1421290.
09250   return strtr($s, array(')' => '\\)', '(' => '\\(', '\\' => '\\\\', $this->chrs[13] => '\r'));
09251 }
09252 
09253 function _putstream($s) {
09254 /*-- ENCRYPTION --*/
09255   if ($this->encrypted) {
09256     $s = $this->_RC4($this->_objectkey($this->_current_obj_id), $s);  // mPDF 4.2.006
09257   }
09258 /*-- END ENCRYPTION --*/
09259   $this->_out('stream');
09260   $this->_out($s);
09261   $this->_out('endstream');
09262 }
09263 
09264 
09265 function _out($s,$ln=true) {
09266   if($this->state==2) {
09267      if ($this->bufferoutput) {
09268     $this->headerbuffer.= $s."\n";
09269      }
09270 /*-- COLUMNS --*/
09271      else if (($this->ColActive) && (!$this->processingHeader) && (!$this->processingFooter)) {
09272     // Captures everything in buffer for columns; Almost everything is sent from fn. Cell() except:
09273     // Images sent from Image() or
09274     // later sent as _out($textto) in printbuffer
09275     // Line()
09276     if (preg_match('/q \d+\.\d\d+ 0 0 (\d+\.\d\d+) \d+\.\d\d+ \d+\.\d\d+ cm \/I\d+ Do Q/',$s,$m)) { // Image data
09277       $h = ($m[1]/$this->k);
09278       // Update/overwrite the lowest bottom of printing y value for a column
09279       $this->ColDetails[$this->CurrCol]['bottom_margin'] = $this->y+$h;
09280     }
09281 /*-- TABLES --*/
09282     else if (preg_match('/\d+\.\d\d+ \d+\.\d\d+ \d+\.\d\d+ ([\-]{0,1}\d+\.\d\d+) re/',$s,$m) && $this->tableLevel>0) { // Rect in table
09283       $h = ($m[1]/$this->k);
09284       // Update/overwrite the lowest bottom of printing y value for a column
09285       $this->ColDetails[$this->CurrCol]['bottom_margin'] = max($this->ColDetails[$this->CurrCol]['bottom_margin'],($this->y+$h));
09286     }
09287 /*-- END TABLES --*/
09288     else {  // Td Text Set in Cell()
09289       if (isset($this->ColDetails[$this->CurrCol]['bottom_margin'])) { $h = $this->ColDetails[$this->CurrCol]['bottom_margin'] - $this->y; }
09290       else { $h = 0; }
09291     }
09292     if ($h < 0) { $h = -$h; }
09293     $this->columnbuffer[] = array(
09294     's' => $s,              // Text string to output 
09295     'col' => $this->CurrCol,        // Column when printed 
09296     'x' => $this->x,            // x when printed 
09297     'y' => $this->y,            // this->y when printed (after column break) 
09298     'h' => $h             // actual y at bottom when printed = y+h  
09299     );
09300      }
09301 /*-- END COLUMNS --*/
09302 /*-- TABLES --*/
09303      else if ($this->table_rotate && !$this->processingHeader && !$this->processingFooter) {
09304     // Captures eveything in buffer for rotated tables; 
09305     $this->tablebuffer[] = array(
09306     's' => $s,              // Text string to output  
09307     'x' => $this->x,            // x when printed  
09308     'y' => $this->y,            // y when printed (after column break) 
09309     );
09310      }
09311 /*-- END TABLES --*/
09312      else if ($this->kwt && !$this->processingHeader && !$this->processingFooter) {
09313     // Captures eveything in buffer for keep-with-table (h1-6); 
09314     $this->kwt_buffer[] = array(
09315     's' => $s,              // Text string to output 
09316     'x' => $this->x,            // x when printed  
09317     'y' => $this->y,            // y when printed  
09318     );
09319      }
09320      else if (($this->keep_block_together) && (!$this->processingHeader) && (!$this->processingFooter)) {
09321     // Captures eveything in buffer; 
09322     if (preg_match('/q \d+\.\d\d+ 0 0 (\d+\.\d\d+) \d+\.\d\d+ \d+\.\d\d+ cm \/I\d+ Do Q/',$s,$m)) { // Image data
09323       $h = ($m[1]/$this->k);
09324       // Update/overwrite the lowest bottom of printing y value for Keep together block
09325       $this->ktBlock[$this->page]['bottom_margin'] = $this->y+$h;
09326     }
09327     else {  // Td Text Set in Cell()
09328       if (isset($this->ktBlock[$this->page]['bottom_margin'])) { $h = $this->ktBlock[$this->page]['bottom_margin'] - $this->y; }
09329       else { $h = 0; }
09330     }
09331     if ($h < 0) { $h = -$h; }
09332     $this->divbuffer[] = array(
09333     'page' => $this->page,
09334     's' => $s,              // Text string to output 
09335     'x' => $this->x,            // x when printed 
09336     'y' => $this->y,            // y when printed (after column break)
09337     'h' => $h             // actual y at bottom when printed = y+h
09338     );
09339      }
09340      else {
09341     $this->pages[$this->page] .= $s.($ln == true ? "\n" : '');
09342      }
09343 
09344   }
09345   else {
09346     $this->buffer .= $s.($ln == true ? "\n" : '');
09347   }
09348 }
09349 
09350 /*-- WATERMARK --*/
09351 // add a watermark 
09352 function watermark( $texte, $angle=45, $fontsize=96, $alpha=0.2 )
09353 {
09354 
09355   if ($this->PDFA) { $this->Error('PDFA does not permit transparency, so mPDF does not allow Watermarks!'); } // mPDF 4.2.018
09356   if (!$this->watermark_font) { $this->watermark_font = $this->default_font; }
09357       $this->SetFont( $this->watermark_font, "B", $fontsize, false ); // Don't output
09358   $texte= $this->purify_utf8_text($texte);
09359   if ($this->text_input_as_HTML) {
09360     $texte= $this->all_entities_to_utf8($texte);
09361   }
09362   if (!$this->is_MB) { $texte = mb_convert_encoding($texte,$this->mb_enc,'UTF-8'); }
09363   // DIRECTIONALITY
09364   $this->magic_reverse_dir($texte); // *RTL*
09365   // mPDF 4.0 Font-specific ligature substitution for Indic fonts
09366   $this->ConvertIndic($texte);  // *INDIC*
09367 
09368   $this->SetAlpha($alpha);
09369 
09370   $this->SetTextColor(0);
09371   $szfont = $fontsize;
09372   $loop   = 0;
09373   $maxlen = (min($this->w,$this->h) );  // sets max length of text as 7/8 width/height of page
09374   while ( $loop == 0 )
09375   {
09376        $this->SetFont( $this->watermark_font, "B", $szfont, false );  // Don't output
09377    $offset =  ((sin(deg2rad($angle))) * ($szfont/$this->k));
09378 
09379        $strlen = $this->GetStringWidth($texte);
09380        if ( $strlen > $maxlen - $offset  )
09381           $szfont --;
09382        else
09383           $loop ++;
09384   }
09385 
09386   $this->SetFont( $this->watermark_font, "B", $szfont-0.1, true, true); // Output The -0.1 is because SetFont above is not written to PDF
09387                       // Repeating it will not output anything as mPDF thinks it is set
09388   $adj = ((cos(deg2rad($angle))) * ($strlen/2));
09389   $opp = ((sin(deg2rad($angle))) * ($strlen/2));
09390   $wx = ($this->w/2) - $adj + $offset/3;
09391   $wy = ($this->h/2) + $opp;
09392   $this->Rotate($angle,$wx,$wy);
09393   $this->Text($wx,$wy,$texte);
09394   $this->Rotate(0);
09395   $this->SetTextColor(0,0,0);
09396 
09397   $this->SetAlpha(1);
09398 
09399 }
09400 
09401 // add a watermark Image
09402 function watermarkImg( $src, $alpha=0.2 ) {
09403   if ($this->PDFA) { $this->Error('PDFA does not permit transparency, so mPDF does not allow Watermarks!'); } // mPDF 4.2.018
09404   // mPDF 4.3.018
09405   if ($this->watermarkImgBehind) { $this->watermarkImgAlpha = $this->SetAlpha($alpha, 'Normal', true); }
09406   else { $this->SetAlpha($alpha); }
09407   $this->Image($src,0,0,0,0,'','', true, true, true);
09408   // mPDF 4.3.018
09409   if (!$this->watermarkImgBehind) { $this->SetAlpha(1); }
09410 }
09411 /*-- END WATERMARK --*/
09412 
09413 
09414 function Rotate($angle,$x=-1,$y=-1)
09415 {
09416   if($x==-1)
09417     $x=$this->x;
09418   if($y==-1)
09419     $y=$this->y;
09420   if($this->angle!=0)
09421     $this->_out('Q');
09422   $this->angle=$angle;
09423   if($angle!=0)
09424   {
09425     $angle*=M_PI/180;
09426     $c=cos($angle);
09427     $s=sin($angle);
09428     $cx=$x*$this->k;
09429     $cy=($this->h-$y)*$this->k;
09430     $this->_out(sprintf('q %.5f %.5f %.5f %.5f %.3f %.3f cm 1 0 0 1 %.3f %.3f cm',$c,$s,-$s,$c,$cx,$cy,-$cx,-$cy));
09431   }
09432 }
09433 
09434 // From Invoice
09435 function RoundedRect($x, $y, $w, $h, $r, $style = '')
09436 {
09437   $k = $this->k;
09438   $hp = $this->h;
09439   if($style=='F')
09440     $op='f';
09441   elseif($style=='FD' or $style=='DF')
09442     $op='B';
09443   else
09444     $op='S';
09445   $MyArc = 4/3 * (sqrt(2) - 1);
09446   $this->_out(sprintf('%.3f %.3f m',($x+$r)*$k,($hp-$y)*$k ));
09447   $xc = $x+$w-$r ;
09448   $yc = $y+$r;
09449   $this->_out(sprintf('%.3f %.3f l', $xc*$k,($hp-$y)*$k ));
09450 
09451   $this->_Arc($xc + $r*$MyArc, $yc - $r, $xc + $r, $yc - $r*$MyArc, $xc + $r, $yc);
09452   $xc = $x+$w-$r ;
09453   $yc = $y+$h-$r;
09454   $this->_out(sprintf('%.3f %.3f l',($x+$w)*$k,($hp-$yc)*$k));
09455   $this->_Arc($xc + $r, $yc + $r*$MyArc, $xc + $r*$MyArc, $yc + $r, $xc, $yc + $r);
09456   $xc = $x+$r ;
09457   $yc = $y+$h-$r;
09458   $this->_out(sprintf('%.3f %.3f l',$xc*$k,($hp-($y+$h))*$k));
09459   $this->_Arc($xc - $r*$MyArc, $yc + $r, $xc - $r, $yc + $r*$MyArc, $xc - $r, $yc);
09460   $xc = $x+$r ;
09461   $yc = $y+$r;
09462   $this->_out(sprintf('%.3f %.3f l',($x)*$k,($hp-$yc)*$k ));
09463   $this->_Arc($xc - $r, $yc - $r*$MyArc, $xc - $r*$MyArc, $yc - $r, $xc, $yc - $r);
09464   $this->_out($op);
09465 }
09466 
09467 function _Arc($x1, $y1, $x2, $y2, $x3, $y3)
09468 {
09469   $h = $this->h;
09470   $this->_out(sprintf('%.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f c ', $x1*$this->k, ($h-$y1)*$this->k,
09471             $x2*$this->k, ($h-$y2)*$this->k, $x3*$this->k, ($h-$y3)*$this->k));
09472 }
09473 
09474 
09475 /*-- GRADIENTS --*/
09476 // mPDF 3.0 added - GRADIENTS
09477 
09478 // type = linear:2; radial: 3;
09479 // Linear: $coords - array of the form (x1, y1, x2, y2) which defines the gradient vector (see linear_gradient_coords.jpg). 
09480 //    The default value is from left to right (x1=0, y1=0, x2=1, y2=0).
09481 // Radial: $coords - array of the form (fx, fy, cx, cy, r) where (fx, fy) is the starting point of the gradient with color1, 
09482 //    (cx, cy) is the center of the circle with color2, and r is the radius of the circle (see radial_gradient_coords.jpg). 
09483 //    (fx, fy) should be inside the circle, otherwise some areas will not be defined
09484 // $col = array(R,G,B); or array(G)
09485 function Gradient($x, $y, $w, $h, $type, $col1=array(), $col2=array(), $coords='', $extend='', $return=false) {
09486   if (strtoupper(substr($type,0,1)) == 'L') { $type = 2; }
09487   else if (strtoupper(substr($type,0,1)) == 'R') { $type = 3; }
09488   if ($type < 1) { $type = 2; }
09489   if (!isset($col1[1])) { $col1[1]=$col1[2]=$col1[0]; }
09490   if (!isset($col2[1])) { $col2[1] = $col2[2] = $col2[0]; }
09491   if (!is_array($coords) || count($coords) <1) { 
09492     if ($type == 2) { $coords=array(0,0,1,0); } 
09493     else { $coords=array(0.5,0.5,0.5,0.5,1); }
09494   }
09495   if (!is_array($extend) || count($extend) <1) { 
09496     $extend=array('true', 'true');  // These are supposed to be quoted - appear in PDF file as text
09497   }
09498   $s = ' q';
09499   $s .= sprintf(' %.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F re W n', $x*$this->k, ($this->h-$y)*$this->k, $w*$this->k, -$h*$this->k)."\n";
09500   $s .= sprintf(' %.3F 0 0 %.3F %.3F %.3F cm', $w*$this->k, $h*$this->k, $x*$this->k, ($this->h-($y+$h))*$this->k)."\n";
09501   $n = count($this->gradients) + 1;
09502   $this->gradients[$n]['type'] = $type;
09503   $this->gradients[$n]['col1'] = sprintf('%.3F %.3F %.3F', ($col1[0]/255), ($col1[1]/255), ($col1[2]/255));
09504   $this->gradients[$n]['col2'] = sprintf('%.3F %.3F %.3F', ($col2[0]/255), ($col2[1]/255), ($col2[2]/255));
09505   $this->gradients[$n]['coords'] = $coords;
09506   $this->gradients[$n]['extend'] = $extend;
09507   //paint the gradient
09508   $s .= '/Sh'.$n.' sh '."\n";
09509   //restore previous Graphic State
09510   $s .= ' Q '."\n";
09511   if ($return) { return $s; }
09512   else { $this->_out($s); }
09513 }
09514 /*-- END GRADIENTS --*/
09515 
09516 
09517 //====================================================
09518 
09519 
09520 
09521 // Label and number of invoice/estimate
09522 /*-- DIRECTW --*/
09523 function Shaded_box( $text,$font='',$fontstyle='B',$szfont='',$width='70%',$style='DF',$radius=2.5,$fill='#FFFFFF',$color='#000000',$pad=2 )
09524 {
09525 // F (shading - no line),S (line, no shading),DF (both)
09526   if (!$font) { $font= $this->default_font; }
09527   if (!$szfont) { $szfont = ($this->default_font_size * 1.8); }
09528 
09529   $text = $this->purify_utf8_text($text);
09530   if ($this->text_input_as_HTML) {
09531     $text = $this->all_entities_to_utf8($text);
09532   }
09533   if (!$this->is_MB) { $text = mb_convert_encoding($text,$this->mb_enc,'UTF-8'); }
09534   // DIRECTIONALITY
09535   $this->magic_reverse_dir($text);  // *RTL*
09536   // mPDF 4.0 Font-specific ligature substitution for Indic fonts
09537   $this->ConvertIndic($text); // *INDIC*
09538   $text = ' '.$text.' ';
09539   if (!$width) { $width = $this->pgwidth; } else { $width=$this->ConvertSize($width,$this->pgwidth); }
09540   $midpt = $this->lMargin+($this->pgwidth/2);
09541   $r1  = $midpt-($width/2);   //($this->w / 2) - 40;
09542   $r2  = $r1 + $width;    //$r1 + 80;
09543   $y1  = $this->y;
09544 
09545 
09546   $mid = ($r1 + $r2 ) / 2;
09547   $loop   = 0;
09548     
09549   while ( $loop == 0 )
09550   {
09551     $this->SetFont( $font, $fontstyle, $szfont );
09552     $sz = $this->GetStringWidth( $text );
09553     if ( ($r1+$sz) > $r2 )
09554       $szfont --;
09555     else
09556       $loop ++;
09557   }
09558 
09559   $y2  = $this->FontSize+($pad*2);
09560 
09561   $this->SetLineWidth(0.1);
09562   $fc = $this->ConvertColor($fill);
09563   $tc = $this->ConvertColor($color);
09564   $this->SetFillColor($fc['R'],$fc['G'],$fc['B']);
09565   $this->SetTextColor($tc['R'],$tc['G'],$tc['B']);
09566   $this->RoundedRect($r1, $y1, ($r2 - $r1), $y2, $radius, $style);
09567   $this->SetX( $r1);
09568   $this->Cell($r2-$r1, $y2, $text, 0, 1, "C" );
09569   $this->SetY($y1+$y2+2); // +2 = mm margin below shaded box
09570   $this->Reset();
09571 }
09572 /*-- END DIRECTW --*/
09573 
09574 
09575 
09576 
09577 
09578 // Converts UTF-8 strings to codepoints array.<br>
09579 function UTF8StringToArray($str) {
09580       $unicode = array(); // array containing unicode values
09581       $bytes  = array(); // array containing single character byte sequences
09582       $numbytes  = 1; // number of octetc needed to represent the UTF-8 character
09583       
09584       $str .= ""; // force $str to be a string
09585       $length = strlen($str);
09586       
09587       for($i = 0; $i < $length; $i++) {
09588         $char = $this->ords[substr($str,$i,1)]; // get one string character at time
09589         if(count($bytes) == 0) { // get starting octect
09590           if ($char <= 0x7F) {
09591             $unicode[] = $char; // use the character "as is" because is ASCII
09592             $numbytes = 1;
09593           } elseif (($char >> 0x05) == 0x06) { // 2 bytes character (0x06 = 110 BIN)
09594             $bytes[] = ($char - 0xC0) << 0x06; 
09595             $numbytes = 2;
09596           } elseif (($char >> 0x04) == 0x0E) { // 3 bytes character (0x0E = 1110 BIN)
09597             $bytes[] = ($char - 0xE0) << 0x0C; 
09598             $numbytes = 3;
09599           } elseif (($char >> 0x03) == 0x1E) { // 4 bytes character (0x1E = 11110 BIN)
09600             $bytes[] = ($char - 0xF0) << 0x12; 
09601             $numbytes = 4;
09602           } else {
09603             // use replacement character for other invalid sequences
09604             $unicode[] = 0xFFFD;
09605             $bytes = array();
09606             $numbytes = 1;
09607           }
09608         } elseif (($char >> 0x06) == 0x02) { // bytes 2, 3 and 4 must start with 0x02 = 10 BIN
09609           $bytes[] = $char - 0x80;
09610           if (count($bytes) == $numbytes) {
09611             // compose UTF-8 bytes to a single unicode value
09612             $char = $bytes[0];
09613             for($j = 1; $j < $numbytes; $j++) {
09614               $char += ($bytes[$j] << (($numbytes - $j - 1) * 0x06));
09615             }
09616             if ((($char >= 0xD800) AND ($char <= 0xDFFF)) OR ($char >= 0x10FFFF)) {
09617               // The definition of UTF-8 prohibits encoding character numbers between
09618               // U+D800 and U+DFFF, which are reserved for use with the UTF-16
09619               // encoding form (as surrogate pairs) and do not directly represent
09620               // characters.
09621               $unicode[] = 0xFFFD; // use replacement character
09622             }
09623             else {
09624               $unicode[] = $char; // add char to array
09625             }
09626             // reset data for next char
09627             $bytes = array(); 
09628             $numbytes = 1;
09629           }
09630         } else {
09631           // use replacement character for other invalid sequences
09632           $unicode[] = 0xFFFD;
09633           $bytes = array();
09634           $numbytes = 1;
09635         }
09636       }
09637       return $unicode;
09638 }
09639 
09640 
09641 // mPDF 4.0 Convert utf-8 string to <HHHHHH> for Font Subsets
09642 function UTF8toSubset($str) {
09643   $ret = '<';
09644   // mPDF 4.0
09645   $str = preg_replace('/'.preg_quote($this->aliasNbPg,'/').'/', chr(7), $str );
09646   $str = preg_replace('/'.preg_quote($this->aliasNbPgGp,'/').'/', chr(8), $str );
09647   $unicode = $this->UTF8StringToArray($str);
09648   $orig_fid = $this->CurrentFont['subsetfontids'][0];
09649   $last_fid = $this->CurrentFont['subsetfontids'][0];
09650   foreach($unicode as $c) {
09651      // mPDF 4.0
09652      if ($c == 7 || $c == 8) { 
09653       if ($orig_fid != $last_fid) {
09654         $ret .= '> Tj /F'.$orig_fid.' '.$this->FontSizePt.' Tf <';
09655         $last_fid = $orig_fid;
09656       }
09657       if ($c == 7) { $ret .= $this->aliasNbPg; }
09658       else { $ret .= $this->aliasNbPgGp; }
09659       continue;
09660      }
09661      for ($i=0; $i<99; $i++) {
09662     // return c as decimal char
09663     $init = array_search($c, $this->CurrentFont['subsets'][$i]);
09664     if ($init!==false) {
09665       if ($this->CurrentFont['subsetfontids'][$i] != $last_fid) {
09666         $ret .= '> Tj /F'.$this->CurrentFont['subsetfontids'][$i].' '.$this->FontSizePt.' Tf <';
09667         $last_fid = $this->CurrentFont['subsetfontids'][$i];
09668       }
09669       $ret .= sprintf("%02s", strtoupper(dechex($init)));
09670       break;
09671     }
09672     else if (count($this->CurrentFont['subsets'][$i]) < 255) {
09673       $n = count($this->CurrentFont['subsets'][$i]);
09674       $this->CurrentFont['subsets'][$i][$n] = $c;
09675       if ($this->CurrentFont['subsetfontids'][$i] != $last_fid) {
09676         $ret .= '> Tj /F'.$this->CurrentFont['subsetfontids'][$i].' '.$this->FontSizePt.' Tf <';
09677         $last_fid = $this->CurrentFont['subsetfontids'][$i];
09678       }
09679       $ret .= sprintf("%02s", strtoupper(dechex($n)));
09680       break;
09681     }
09682     else if (!isset($this->CurrentFont['subsets'][($i+1)])) {
09683       $this->CurrentFont['subsets'][($i+1)] = range(0,32);
09684       $new_fid = count($this->fonts)+$this->extraFontSubsets+1;
09685       $this->CurrentFont['subsetfontids'][($i+1)] = $new_fid;
09686       $this->extraFontSubsets++;
09687     }
09688      }
09689   }
09690   $ret .= '>';
09691   if ($last_fid != $orig_fid) {
09692     $ret .= ' Tj /F'.$orig_fid.' '.$this->FontSizePt.' Tf <> ';
09693   }
09694   return $ret;
09695 }
09696 
09697 
09698 // Converts UTF-8 strings to UTF16-BE.
09699 function UTF8ToUTF16BE($str, $setbom=true) {
09700   $outstr = ""; // string to be returned
09701   if ($setbom) {
09702     $outstr .= "\xFE\xFF"; // Byte Order Mark (BOM)
09703   }
09704   $outstr .= mb_convert_encoding($str, 'UTF-16BE', 'UTF-8');
09705   return $outstr;
09706 }
09707 
09708 
09709 
09710 
09711 function _getfontpath() {
09712   // mPDF 4.0  Depracated. Use MPDF_FONTPATH
09713   return defined('MPDF_FONTPATH') ? MPDF_FONTPATH : '';
09714 }
09715 
09716 
09717 
09718 
09719 // ====================================================
09720 // ====================================================
09721 /*-- CJK --*/
09722 // from class PDF_Chinese CJK EXTENSIONS
09723 
09724 
09725 
09726 function AddCIDFont($family,$style,$name,$cw,$CMap,$registry,$desc)
09727 {
09728   $fontkey=strtolower($family).strtoupper($style);
09729   if(isset($this->fonts[$fontkey]))
09730     $this->Error("Font already added: $family $style");
09731   $i=count($this->fonts)+$this->extraFontSubsets+1;
09732   $name=str_replace(' ','',$name);
09733   if ($family == 'sjis') { $up = -120; } else { $up = -130; }
09734   // ? 'up' and 'ut' do not seem to be referenced anywhere
09735   $this->fonts[$fontkey]=array('i'=>$i,'type'=>'Type0','name'=>$name,'up'=>$up,'ut'=>40,'cw'=>$cw,'CMap'=>$CMap,'registry'=>$registry,'MissingWidth'=>1000,'desc'=>$desc);
09736 }
09737 
09738 function AddCJKFont($family) {
09739   // mPDF 4.2.018
09740   if ($this->PDFA) {
09741     $this->Error("Adobe CJK fonts cannot be embedded in mPDF (required for PDFA1-b).");
09742   }
09743   if ($family == 'big5') { $this->AddBig5Font(); }
09744   else if ($family == 'gb') { $this->AddGBFont(); }
09745   else if ($family == 'sjis') { $this->AddSJISFont(); }
09746   else if ($family == 'uhc') { $this->AddUHCFont(); }
09747 }
09748 
09749 function AddBig5Font()
09750 {
09751   //Add Big5 font with proportional Latin
09752   $family='big5';
09753   $name='MSungStd-Light-Acro';
09754   $cw=$this->Big5_widths;
09755   //$CMap='ETenms-B5-H';
09756   $CMap='UniCNS-UTF16-H';
09757   $desc = array(
09758   'Ascent' => 880,
09759   'Descent' => -120,
09760   'CapHeight' => 880,
09761   'Flags' => 6,
09762   'FontBBox' => '[-160 -249 1015 1071]',
09763   'ItalicAngle' => 0,
09764   'StemV' => 93,
09765   );
09766   $registry=array('ordering'=>'CNS1','supplement'=>0);
