09767   $this->AddCIDFont($family,'',$name,$cw,$CMap,$registry,$desc);
09768   $this->AddCIDFont($family,'B',$name.',Bold',$cw,$CMap,$registry,$desc);
09769   $this->AddCIDFont($family,'I',$name.',Italic',$cw,$CMap,$registry,$desc);
09770   $this->AddCIDFont($family,'BI',$name.',BoldItalic',$cw,$CMap,$registry,$desc);
09771 }
09772 
09773 
09774 function AddGBFont()
09775 {
09776   //Add GB font with proportional Latin
09777   $family='gb';
09778   $name='STSongStd-Light-Acro';
09779   $cw=$this->GB_widths;
09780   //$CMap='GBKp-EUC-H';
09781   $CMap='UniGB-UTF16-H';
09782   $registry=array('ordering'=>'GB1','supplement'=>2);
09783   $desc = array(
09784   'Ascent' => 752,
09785   'Descent' => -271,
09786   'CapHeight' => 737,
09787   'Flags' => 6,
09788   'FontBBox' => '[-25 -254 1000 880]',
09789   'ItalicAngle' => 0,
09790   'StemV' => 58,
09791   'Style' => '<< /Panose <000000000400000000000000> >>',
09792   );
09793   $this->AddCIDFont($family,'',$name,$cw,$CMap,$registry,$desc);
09794   $this->AddCIDFont($family,'B',$name.',Bold',$cw,$CMap,$registry,$desc);
09795   $this->AddCIDFont($family,'I',$name.',Italic',$cw,$CMap,$registry,$desc);
09796   $this->AddCIDFont($family,'BI',$name.',BoldItalic',$cw,$CMap,$registry,$desc);
09797 }
09798 
09799 
09800 function AddSJISFont()
09801 {
09802   //Add SJIS font with proportional Latin
09803   $family='sjis';
09804   $name='KozMinPro-Regular-Acro';
09805   $cw=$this->SJIS_widths;
09806   //$CMap='90msp-RKSJ-H';
09807   $CMap='UniJIS-UTF16-H';
09808   $desc = array(
09809   'Ascent' => 880,
09810   'Descent' => -120,
09811   'CapHeight' => 740,
09812   'Flags' => 6,
09813   'FontBBox' => '[-195 -272 1110 1075]',
09814   'ItalicAngle' => 0,
09815   'StemV' => 86,
09816   'XHeight' => 502,
09817   );
09818   $registry=array('ordering'=>'Japan1','supplement'=>2);
09819   $this->AddCIDFont($family,'',$name,$cw,$CMap,$registry,$desc);
09820   $this->AddCIDFont($family,'B',$name.',Bold',$cw,$CMap,$registry,$desc);
09821   $this->AddCIDFont($family,'I',$name.',Italic',$cw,$CMap,$registry,$desc);
09822   $this->AddCIDFont($family,'BI',$name.',BoldItalic',$cw,$CMap,$registry,$desc);
09823 }
09824 
09825 function AddUHCFont()
09826 {
09827   //Add UHC font with proportional Latin
09828   $family='uhc';
09829   $name='HYSMyeongJoStd-Medium-Acro';
09830   $cw=$this->UHC_widths;
09831   //$CMap='KSCms-UHC-H';
09832   $CMap='UniKS-UTF16-H';
09833   $registry=array('ordering'=>'Korea1','supplement'=>1);
09834   $desc = array(
09835   'Ascent' => 880,
09836   'Descent' => -120,
09837   'CapHeight' => 720,
09838   'Flags' => 6,
09839   'FontBBox' => '[-28 -148 1001 880]',
09840   'ItalicAngle' => 0,
09841   'StemV' => 60,
09842   'Style' => '<< /Panose <000000000600000000000000> >>',
09843   );
09844   $this->AddCIDFont($family,'',$name,$cw,$CMap,$registry,$desc);
09845   $this->AddCIDFont($family,'B',$name.',Bold',$cw,$CMap,$registry,$desc);
09846   $this->AddCIDFont($family,'I',$name.',Italic',$cw,$CMap,$registry,$desc);
09847   $this->AddCIDFont($family,'BI',$name.',BoldItalic',$cw,$CMap,$registry,$desc);
09848 }
09849 
09850 /*-- END CJK --*/
09851 
09852 
09853 
09854 
09862 function SetAutoFont($af = AUTOFONT_ALL) {
09863   if (!$this->is_MB) { return false; }
09864   if (!$af && $af !== 0) { $af = AUTOFONT_ALL; }
09865   $this->autoFontGroups = $af;
09866   if ($this->autoFontGroups ) { 
09867     $this->useSubstitutions = false; 
09868     $this->useLang = true;
09869     // mPDF 4.0
09870     if (AUTOFONT_RTL & $this->autoFontGroups) { $this->biDirectional = true; }  // *RTL*
09871   }
09872 }
09873 
09874 
09875 function SetDefaultFont($font) {
09876   // Disallow embedded fonts to be used as defaults except in win-1252
09877   if ($this->codepage != 'win-1252' || $this->PDFA) { // mPDF 4.2.018
09878     if (strtolower($font) == 'times') { $font = 'serif'; }
09879     if (strtolower($font) == 'courier') { $font = 'monospace'; }
09880     if ((strtolower($font) == 'arial') || (strtolower($font) == 'helvetica')) { $font = 'sans-serif'; }
09881   }
09882     $font = $this->SetFont($font);  // returns substituted font if necessary
09883   $this->default_font = $font;
09884   $this->original_default_font = $font;
09885   if (!$this->watermark_font ) { $this->watermark_font = $font; } // *WATERMARK*
09886   $this->defaultCSS['BODY']['FONT-FAMILY'] = $font; // mPDF 4.2
09887   $this->CSS['BODY']['FONT-FAMILY'] = $font;  // mPDF 4.2
09888 }
09889 
09890 function SetDefaultFontSize($fontsize) {
09891   $this->default_font_size = $fontsize;
09892   $this->original_default_font_size = $fontsize;
09893   $this->SetFontSize($fontsize);
09894   $this->defaultCSS['BODY']['FONT-SIZE'] = $fontsize . 'pt';
09895   $this->CSS['BODY']['FONT-SIZE'] = $fontsize . 'pt'; // mPDF 4.2
09896 }
09897 
09898 // mPDF 4.2
09899 function SetDefaultBodyCSS($prop, $val) {
09900    if ($prop) {
09901   $this->defaultCSS['BODY'][strtoupper($prop)] = $val;
09902   $this->CSS['BODY'][strtoupper($prop)] = $val;
09903   }
09904 }
09905 
09906 
09907 function SetDirectionality($dir='ltr') {
09908 /*-- RTL --*/
09909   if (strtolower($dir) == 'rtl') { 
09910     $this->directionality = 'rtl'; 
09911     $this->defaultAlign = 'R';
09912     $this->defaultTableAlign = 'R';
09913     // Swop L/R Margins so page 1 RTL is an 'even' page
09914     $tmp = $this->DeflMargin;
09915     $this->DeflMargin = $this->DefrMargin; 
09916     $this->DefrMargin = $tmp; 
09917     $this->orig_lMargin = $this->DeflMargin;
09918     $this->orig_rMargin = $this->DefrMargin;
09919 
09920     $this->SetMargins($this->DeflMargin,$this->DefrMargin,$this->tMargin);
09921   }
09922   else  { 
09923 /*-- END RTL --*/
09924     $this->directionality = 'ltr'; 
09925     $this->defaultAlign = 'L';
09926     $this->defaultTableAlign = 'L';
09927   } // *RTL*
09928 }
09929 
09930 function reverse_align(&$align) {
09931   if (strtolower($align) == 'right') { $align = 'left'; }
09932   else if (strtolower($align) == 'left') { $align = 'right'; }
09933   if (strtoupper($align) == 'R') { $align = 'L'; }
09934   else if (strtoupper($align) == 'L') { $align = 'R'; }
09935 }
09936 
09937 
09938 // Added to set line-height-correction
09939 function SetLineHeightCorrection($val) {
09940   if ($val > 0) { $this->default_lineheight_correction = $val; }
09941   else { $this->default_lineheight_correction = 1.2; }
09942 }
09943 
09944 // Set a (fixed) lineheight to an actual value - either to named fontsize(pts) or default
09945 // mPDF 4.2
09946 function SetLineHeight($FontPt='',$spacing = '') {
09947    if ($this->shrin_k > 1) { $k = $this->shrin_k; }
09948    else { $k = 1; }
09949    if ($spacing > 0) { 
09950   if (preg_match('/mm/',$spacing)) { 
09951     $this->lineheight = ($spacing + 0.0) / $k; // convert to number
09952   }
09953   else  { 
09954     if ($FontPt) { $this->lineheight = (($FontPt/$this->k) *$spacing); }
09955     else { $this->lineheight = (($this->FontSizePt/$this->k) *$spacing); }
09956   }
09957    }
09958    else {
09959   if ($FontPt) { $this->lineheight = (($FontPt/$this->k) *$this->normalLineheight); }
09960   else { $this->lineheight = (($this->FontSizePt/$this->k) *$this->normalLineheight); }
09961    }
09962 }
09963 
09964 // mPDF 4.2
09965 function _computeLineheight($lh, $fs='') {
09966   if ($this->shrin_k > 1) { $k = $this->shrin_k; }
09967   else { $k = 1; }
09968   if (!$fs) { $fs = $this->FontSize; }
09969   if (preg_match('/mm/',$lh)) { 
09970     return (($lh + 0.0) / $k); // convert to number
09971   }
09972   else if ($lh > 0) { 
09973     return ($fs * $lh);
09974   }
09975   else if (isset($this->normalLineheight)) { return ($fs * $this->normalLineheight); }
09976   else return ($fs * $this->default_lineheight_correction); 
09977 }
09978 
09979 
09980 function SetBasePath($str='') {
09981   // mPDF 4.2.029
09982   if ( isset($_SERVER['HTTP_HOST']) ) { $host = $_SERVER['HTTP_HOST']; }
09983   else if ( isset($_SERVER['SERVER_NAME']) ) { $host = $_SERVER['SERVER_NAME']; }
09984   else { $host = ''; }
09985   if (!$str) { 
09986   if ($_SERVER['SCRIPT_NAME']) { $currentPath = dirname($_SERVER['SCRIPT_NAME']); }
09987   else { $currentPath = dirname($_SERVER['PHP_SELF']); }
09988   $currentPath = str_replace("\\","/",$currentPath);
09989   if ($currentPath == '/') { $currentPath = ''; }
09990   if ($host) { $currpath = 'http://' . $host . $currentPath .'/'; }
09991   else { $currpath = ''; }
09992   $this->basepath = $currpath; 
09993   $this->basepathIsLocal = true; 
09994   return; 
09995   }
09996   $str = preg_replace('/\?.*/','',$str);
09997   if (!preg_match('/(http|https|ftp):\/\/.*\//i',$str)) { $str .= '/'; } 
09998   $str .= 'xxx';  // in case $str ends in / e.g. http://www.bbc.co.uk/
09999   $this->basepath = dirname($str) . "/";  // returns e.g. e.g. http://www.google.com/dir1/dir2/dir3/
10000   $this->basepath = str_replace("\\","/",$this->basepath); //If on Windows
10001   $tr = parse_url($this->basepath);
10002   if (isset($tr['host']) && ($tr['host'] == $host)) { $this->basepathIsLocal = true; }
10003   else { $this->basepathIsLocal = false; }
10004 }
10005 
10006 // mPDF 4.0
10007 function GetFullPath(&$path,$basepath='') {
10008   // When parsing CSS need to pass temporary basepath - so links are relative to current stylesheet
10009   if (!$basepath) { $basepath = $this->basepath; }
10010   //Fix path value
10011   $path = str_replace("\\","/",$path); //If on Windows
10012   //Get link info and obtain its absolute path
10013   $regexp = '|^./|';  // Inadvertently corrects "./path/etc" and "//www.domain.com/etc"
10014   $path = preg_replace($regexp,'',$path);
10015 
10016   if(substr($path,0,1) == '#') { return; }
10017   if (stristr($path,"mailto:") !== false) { return; }
10018   if (strpos($path,"../") !== false ) { //It is a Relative Link
10019     $backtrackamount = substr_count($path,"../");
10020     $maxbacktrack = substr_count($basepath,"/") - 1;
10021     $filepath = str_replace("../",'',$path);
10022     $path = $basepath;
10023     //If it is an invalid relative link, then make it go to directory root
10024     if ($backtrackamount > $maxbacktrack) $backtrackamount = $maxbacktrack;
10025     //Backtrack some directories
10026     for( $i = 0 ; $i < $backtrackamount + 1 ; $i++ ) $path = substr( $path, 0 , strrpos($path,"/") );
10027     $path = $path . "/" . $filepath; //Make it an absolute path
10028   }
10029   else if( strpos($path,":/") === false || strpos($path,":/") > 10) { //It is a Local Link
10030     if (substr($path,0,1) == "/") { 
10031       $tr = parse_url($basepath);
10032       $root = $tr['scheme'].'://'.$tr['host'];
10033       $path = $root . $path; 
10034     }
10035     else { $path = $basepath . $path; }
10036   }
10037   //Do nothing if it is an Absolute Link
10038 }
10039 
10040 
10041 // Used for external CSS files
10042 function _get_file($path) {
10043   // If local file try using local path (? quicker, but also allowed even if allow_url_fopen false)
10044   $contents = '';
10045   $contents = @file_get_contents($path);
10046   if ($contents) { return $contents; }
10047   if ($this->basepathIsLocal) {
10048     $tr = parse_url($path);
10049     $lp=getenv("SCRIPT_NAME");
10050     $ap=realpath($lp);
10051     $ap=str_replace("\\","/",$ap);
10052     $docroot=substr($ap,0,strpos($ap,$lp));
10053     // WriteHTML parses all paths to full URLs; may be local file name from calling ->Image() directly
10054     if ($tr['scheme'] && $tr['host'] && $_SERVER["DOCUMENT_ROOT"] ) { 
10055       $localpath = $_SERVER["DOCUMENT_ROOT"] . $tr['path']; 
10056     }
10057     // DOCUMENT_ROOT is not returned on IIS
10058     else if ($docroot) {
10059       $localpath = $docroot . $tr['path'];
10060     }
10061     else { $localpath = $path; }
10062     $contents = @file_get_contents($localpath);
10063   }
10064   // if not use full URL
10065   else if (!$contents && !ini_get('allow_url_fopen') && function_exists("curl_init"))  {
10066     $ch = curl_init($path);
10067     curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HEADER, 0);
10068     curl_setopt ( $ch , CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER , 1 );
10069     $contents = curl_exec($ch);
10070     curl_close($ch);
10071   }
10072   return $contents;
10073 }
10074 
10075 function UseCSS($opt=true)
10076 {
10077   $this->usecss=$opt;
10078 }
10079 
10080 function UseTableHeader($opt=true)
10081 {
10082   $this->usetableheader=$opt;
10083 }
10084 
10085 function UsePRE($opt=true)
10086 {
10087   $this->usepre=$opt;
10088 }
10089 
10090 // Edited mPDF 3.0 - added offset & extras (prefix/suffix)
10091 function docPageNum($num = 0, $extras = false) {
10092   if ($num < 1) { $num = $this->page; }
10093   $type = '1';  // set default decimal
10094   $ppgno = $num;
10095   $suppress = 0;
10096   $offset = 0;
10097   // mPDF 4.2.020
10098   $lastreset = 0;
10099   foreach($this->PageNumSubstitutions AS $psarr) {
10100     if ($num >= $psarr['from']) {
10101       if ($psarr['reset']) { 
10102         if ($psarr['reset']>1) { $offset = $psarr['reset']-1; }
10103         $ppgno = $num - $psarr['from'] + 1 + $offset; 
10104         // mPDF 4.2.020
10105         $lastreset = $psarr['from'];
10106       }
10107       if ($psarr['type']) { $type = $psarr['type']; }
10108       if (strtoupper($psarr['suppress'])=='ON' || $psarr['suppress']==1) { $suppress = 1; }
10109       else if (strtoupper($psarr['suppress'])=='OFF') { $suppress = 0; }
10110     }
10111   }
10112   if ($suppress) { return ''; }
10113   // mPDF 4.2.020
10114   foreach($this->pgsIns AS $k=>$v) {
10115     if ($k>$lastreset && $k<$num) {
10116       $ppgno -= $v;
10117     }
10118   }
10119   if ($type=='A') { $ppgno = $this->dec2alpha($ppgno,true); }
10120   else if ($type=='a') { $ppgno = $this->dec2alpha($ppgno,false);}
10121   else if ($type=='I') { $ppgno = $this->dec2roman($ppgno,true); }
10122   else if ($type=='i') { $ppgno = $this->dec2roman($ppgno,false); }
10123   if ($extras) { $ppgno = $this->pagenumPrefix . $ppgno . $this->pagenumSuffix; }
10124   return $ppgno;
10125 }
10126 
10127 // mPDF 3.0
10128 function docPageSettings($num = 0) {
10129   // Retruns current type (numberstyle), suppression state for this page number; 
10130   // reset is only returned if set for this page number
10131   if ($num < 1) { $num = $this->page; }
10132   $type = '1';  // set default decimal
10133   $ppgno = $num;
10134   $suppress = 0;
10135   $offset = 0;
10136   $reset = '';
10137   foreach($this->PageNumSubstitutions AS $psarr) {
10138     if ($num >= $psarr['from']) {
10139       if ($psarr['reset']) { 
10140         if ($psarr['reset']>1) { $offset = $psarr['reset']-1; }
10141         $ppgno = $num - $psarr['from'] + 1 + $offset; 
10142       }
10143       if ($psarr['type']) { $type = $psarr['type']; }
10144       if (strtoupper($psarr['suppress'])=='ON' || $psarr['suppress']==1) { $suppress = 1; }
10145       else if (strtoupper($psarr['suppress'])=='OFF') { $suppress = 0; }
10146     }
10147     if ($num == $psarr['from']) { $reset = $psarr['reset']; }
10148   }
10149   if ($suppress) { $suppress = 'on'; }
10150   else { $suppress = 'off'; }
10151   return array($type, $suppress, $reset);
10152 }
10153 
10154 function docPageNumTotal($num = 0, $extras = false) {
10155   if ($num < 1) { $num = $this->page; }
10156   $type = '1';  // set default decimal
10157   $ppgstart = 1;
10158   $ppgend = count($this->pages)+1; 
10159   $suppress = 0;
10160   $offset = 0;
10161   foreach($this->PageNumSubstitutions AS $psarr) {
10162     if ($num >= $psarr['from']) {
10163       if ($psarr['reset']) { 
10164         if ($psarr['reset']>1) { $offset = $psarr['reset']-1; }
10165         $ppgstart = $psarr['from'] + $offset; 
10166         $ppgend = count($this->pages)+1 + $offset; 
10167       }
10168       if ($psarr['type']) { $type = $psarr['type']; }
10169       if (strtoupper($psarr['suppress'])=='ON' || $psarr['suppress']==1) { $suppress = 1; }
10170       else if (strtoupper($psarr['suppress'])=='OFF') { $suppress = 0; }
10171     }
10172     if ($num < $psarr['from']) {
10173       if ($psarr['reset']) { 
10174         $ppgend = $psarr['from'] + $offset; 
10175         break;
10176       }
10177     }
10178   }
10179   if ($suppress) { return ''; }
10180   $ppgno = $ppgend-$ppgstart+$offset; 
10181   if ($extras) { $ppgno = $this->nbpgPrefix . $ppgno . $this->nbpgSuffix; }
10182   return $ppgno;
10183 }
10184 
10185 function RestartDocTemplate() {
10186   $this->docTemplateStart = $this->page;
10187 }
10188 
10189 
10190 
10191 //Page header
10192 function Header($content='') {
10193 
10194   $this->cMarginL = 0;
10195   $this->cMarginR = 0;
10196 
10197   // mPDF 4.2 
10198   // Template moved to AddPage()
10199 
10200 /*-- HTMLHEADERS-FOOTERS --*/
10201   // mPDF 4.0
10202   if (($this->mirrorMargins && ($this->page%2==0) && $this->HTMLHeaderE) || ($this->mirrorMargins && ($this->page%2==1) && $this->HTMLHeader) || (!$this->mirrorMargins && $this->HTMLHeader)) {
10203   $this->writeHTMLHeaders(); 
10204   return;
10205   }
10206 /*-- END HTMLHEADERS-FOOTERS --*/
10207   $this->processingHeader=true;
10208   $h = $this->headerDetails;
10209   if(count($h)) {
10210 
10211   if ($this->forcePortraitHeaders && $this->CurOrientation=='L' && $this->CurOrientation!=$this->DefOrientation) {
10212     $this->_out(sprintf('q 0 -1 1 0 0 %.3f cm ',($this->h*$this->k)));
10213     $yadj = $this->w - $this->h;
10214     $headerpgwidth = $this->h - $this->orig_lMargin - $this->orig_rMargin;
10215     if (($this->mirrorMargins) && (($this->page)%2==0)) { // EVEN
10216       $headerlmargin = $this->orig_rMargin;
10217     }
10218     else {
10219       $headerlmargin = $this->orig_lMargin;
10220     }
10221   }
10222   else { 
10223     $yadj = 0; 
10224     $headerpgwidth = $this->pgwidth;
10225     $headerlmargin = $this->lMargin;
10226   }
10227 
10228   $this->y = $this->margin_header - $yadj ;
10229   $this->SetTextColor(0);
10230       $this->SUP = false;
10231   $this->SUB = false;
10232   $this->bullet = false;
10233 
10234   // only show pagenumber if numbering on
10235   // mPDF 3.0 Add PageNum prefix/suffix
10236   $pgno = $this->docPageNum($this->page, true); 
10237 
10238   if (($this->mirrorMargins) && (($this->page)%2==0)) { // EVEN
10239       $side = 'even';
10240   }
10241   else {  // ODD  // OR NOT MIRRORING MARGINS/FOOTERS = DEFAULT
10242       $side = 'odd';
10243   }
10244   $maxfontheight = 0;
10245   foreach(array('L','C','R') AS $pos) {
10246     if (isset($h[$side][$pos]['content']) && $h[$side][$pos]['content']) {
10247     if (isset($h[$side][$pos]['font-size']) && $h[$side][$pos]['font-size']) { $hfsz = $h[$side][$pos]['font-size']; }
10248     else { $hfsz = $this->default_font_size; }
10249     $maxfontheight = max($maxfontheight,$hfsz);
10250     }
10251   }
10252   // LEFT-CENTER-RIGHT
10253   foreach(array('L','C','R') AS $pos) {
10254     if (isset($h[$side][$pos]['content']) && $h[$side][$pos]['content']) {
10255     $hd = str_replace('{PAGENO}',$pgno,$h[$side][$pos]['content']);
10256     // mPDF 3.0
10257     $hd = str_replace($this->aliasNbPgGp,$this->nbpgPrefix.$this->aliasNbPgGp.$this->nbpgSuffix,$hd); // {nbpg}
10258     $hd = preg_replace('/\{DATE\s+(.*?)\}/e',"date('\\1')",$hd);
10259     if (isset($h[$side][$pos]['font-family']) && $h[$side][$pos]['font-family']) { $hff = $h[$side][$pos]['font-family']; }
10260     // mPDF 3.0 original_ in case pagebreak in middle of table
10261     else { $hff = $this->original_default_font; }
10262     if (isset($h[$side][$pos]['font-size']) && $h[$side][$pos]['font-size']) { $hfsz = $h[$side][$pos]['font-size']; }
10263     // mPDF 3.0 original_ in case pagebreak in middle of table
10264     else { $hfsz = $this->original_default_font_size; } // pts
10265     $maxfontheight = max($maxfontheight,$hfsz);
10266     $hfst = '';
10267     if (isset($h[$side][$pos]['font-style']) && $h[$side][$pos]['font-style']) { 
10268       $hfst = $h[$side][$pos]['font-style'];
10269     }
10270     if (isset($h[$side][$pos]['color']) && $h[$side][$pos]['color']) { 
10271       $hfcol = $h[$side][$pos]['color']; 
10272       $cor = $this->ConvertColor($hfcol);
10273       if ($cor) { $this->SetTextColor($cor['R'],$cor['G'],$cor['B']); }
10274     }
10275     else { $hfcol = ''; }
10276     // mPDF 3.0 Force output
10277     $this->SetFont($hff,$hfst,$hfsz,true,true);
10278     $this->x = $headerlmargin ;
10279     $this->y = $this->margin_header - $yadj ;
10280 
10281     $hd = $this->purify_utf8_text($hd);
10282     if ($this->text_input_as_HTML) {
10283       $hd = $this->all_entities_to_utf8($hd);
10284     }
10285     // CONVERT CODEPAGE
10286     if (!$this->is_MB) { $hd = mb_convert_encoding($hd,$this->mb_enc,'UTF-8'); }
10287     // DIRECTIONALITY RTL
10288     $this->magic_reverse_dir($hd);  // *RTL*
10289     // mPDF 4.0 Font-specific ligature substitution for Indic fonts
10290     $this->ConvertIndic($hd); // *INDIC*
10291     $align = $pos;
10292 /*-- RTL --*/
10293     if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { 
10294       if ($pos == 'L') { $align = 'R'; }
10295       else if ($pos == 'R') { $align = 'L'; }
10296     }
10297 /*-- END RTL --*/
10298     if ($pos!='L' && (stripos($hd,$this->aliasNbPg)!==false || stripos($hd,$this->aliasNbPgGp)!==false)) { 
10299       if (stripos($hd,$this->aliasNbPgGp)!==false) { $type= 'nbpggp'; } else { $type= 'nbpg'; }
10300       $this->_out('{mpdfheader'.$type.' '.$pos.' ff='.$hff.' fs='.$hfst.' fz='.$hfsz.'}'); 
10301       $this->Cell($headerpgwidth ,$maxfontheight/$this->k ,$hd,0,0,$align,0,'',0,0,0,'M');
10302       $this->_out('Q');
10303     }
10304     else { 
10305       $this->Cell($headerpgwidth ,$maxfontheight/$this->k ,$hd,0,0,$align,0,'',0,0,0,'M');
10306     }
10307     if ($hfcol) { $this->SetTextColor(0); }
10308     }
10309   }
10310   //Return Font to normal
10311   $this->SetFont($this->default_font,'',$this->original_default_font_size);
10312   // LINE
10313   if (isset($h[$side]['line']) && $h[$side]['line']) { 
10314     $this->SetLineWidth(0.1);
10315     $this->SetDrawColor(0);
10316     $this->Line($headerlmargin , $this->margin_header + ($maxfontheight*(1+$this->header_line_spacing)/$this->k) - $yadj , $headerlmargin + $headerpgwidth, $this->margin_header + ($maxfontheight*(1+$this->header_line_spacing)/$this->k) - $yadj  );
10317   }
10318   if ($this->forcePortraitHeaders && $this->CurOrientation=='L' && $this->CurOrientation!=$this->DefOrientation) {
10319     $this->_out('Q');
10320   }
10321   }
10322   $this->SetY($this->tMargin);
10323   if ($this->ColActive) { $this->pgwidth = $this->ColWidth; } // *COLUMNS*
10324 
10325   $this->processingHeader=false;
10326 }
10327 
10328 
10329 
10330 /*-- TABLES --*/
10331 // mPDF 4.0
10332 function TableHeaderFooter($content='',$tablestartpage='',$tablestartcolumn ='',$horf = 'H') {
10333   if((($this->usetableheader && $horf=='H') || $horf=='F') && !empty($content)) { // mPDF 3.0
10334 
10335   $table = &$this->table[1][1];
10336   // Advance down page by half width of top border
10337   // mPDF 4.0
10338   if ($horf=='H') { // Only if header
10339     if ($table['borders_separate']) { $adv = $table['border_spacing_V']/2 + $table['border_details']['T']['w'] + $table['padding']['T'];  }
10340     else { $adv = $table['max_cell_border_width']['T'] /2 ; }
10341     if ($adv) { 
10342        if ($this->table_rotate) {
10343       $this->y += ($adv);
10344        }
10345        else {
10346       $this->DivLn($adv,$this->blklvl,true); 
10347        }
10348     }
10349   }
10350 
10351    // mPDF 4.0
10352    if ($horf=='F') { // Table Footer
10353   $firstrow = count($table['cells']) - $this->tablefooternrows;
10354   $lastrow = count($table['cells']) - 1;
10355    }
10356    else {   // Table Header
10357   $firstrow = 0;
10358   $lastrow = $this->tableheadernrows - 1;
10359    }
10360 
10361    $topy = $content[$firstrow][0]['y']-$this->y;
10362 
10363    // mPDF 4.0
10364    for ($i=$firstrow ; $i<=$lastrow; $i++) {
10365 
10366     $y = $this->y;
10367 
10368 /*-- COLUMNS --*/
10369   // mPDF 3.0 - If outside columns, this is done in PaintDivBB
10370   if ($this->ColActive) {
10371   //OUTER FILL BGCOLOR of DIVS
10372    if ($this->blklvl > 0) {
10373     $firstblockfill = $this->GetFirstBlockFill();
10374     if ($firstblockfill && $this->blklvl >= $firstblockfill) {
10375     $divh = $content[$i][0]['h'];
10376     $bak_x = $this->x;
10377     $this->DivLn($divh,-3,false);
10378     // Reset current block fill
10379     $bcor = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['bgcolorarray'];
10380     $this->SetFillColor($bcor['R'],$bcor['G'],$bcor['B']);
10381     $this->x = $bak_x;
10382     }
10383    }
10384   }
10385 /*-- END COLUMNS --*/
10386 
10387     $colctr = 0;
10388     foreach($content[$i] as $tablehf)
10389     {
10390   $colctr++;
10391   $y = $tablehf['y'] - $topy;
10392 
10393       $this->y = $y;
10394       //Set some cell values
10395       $x = $tablehf['x'];
10396   if (($this->mirrorMargins) && ($tablestartpage == 'ODD') && (($this->page)%2==0)) { // EVEN
10397     $x = $x +$this->MarginCorrection;
10398   }
10399   else if (($this->mirrorMargins) && ($tablestartpage == 'EVEN') && (($this->page)%2==1)) { // ODD
10400     $x = $x +$this->MarginCorrection;
10401   }
10402 /*-- COLUMNS --*/
10403   // Added to correct for Columns
10404   if ($this->ColActive) {
10405      if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') {  // *RTL*
10406     $x -= ($this->CurrCol - $tablestartcolumn) * ($this->ColWidth+$this->ColGap); // *RTL*
10407      }  // *RTL*
10408      else { // *RTL*
10409     $x += ($this->CurrCol - $tablestartcolumn) * ($this->ColWidth+$this->ColGap);
10410      }  // *RTL*
10411   }
10412 /*-- END COLUMNS --*/
10413       $w = $tablehf['w'];
10414       $h = $tablehf['h'];
10415       $va = $tablehf['va'];
10416       $R = $tablehf['R'];
10417       $mih = $tablehf['mih'];
10418       $fill = $tablehf['bgcolor'];
10419       $border = $tablehf['border'];
10420       $border_details = $tablehf['border_details'];
10421       $padding = $tablehf['padding'];
10422   $this->tabletheadjustfinished = true;
10423 
10424       $textbuffer = $tablehf['textbuffer'];
10425 
10426       $align = $tablehf['a'];
10427       //Align
10428       $this->divalign=$align;
10429   $this->x = $x;
10430 
10431   if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
10432      $tablefill = isset($table['bgcolor'][-1]) ? $table['bgcolor'][-1] : 0;   // mPDF 4.3.005
10433      if ($tablefill) {
10434           $color = $this->ConvertColor($tablefill);
10435           if ($color) $this->SetFillColor($color['R'],$color['G'],$color['B']);
10436         $xadj = ($table['border_spacing_H']/2);
10437         $yadj = ($table['border_spacing_V']/2);
10438         $wadj = $table['border_spacing_H'];
10439         $hadj = $table['border_spacing_V'];
10440         // mPDF 4.0
10441           if ($i == $firstrow && $horf=='H') {    // Top
10442           $yadj += $table['padding']['T'];
10443           $hadj += $table['padding']['T'];
10444           }
10445           if (($i == ($lastrow) || (isset($tablehf['rowspan']) && ($i+$tablehf['rowspan']) == ($lastrow+1))  || (!isset($tablehf['rowspan']) && ($i+1) == ($lastrow+1))) && $horf=='F') { // Bottom
10446           $hadj += $table['padding']['B'];
10447           }
10448           if ($colctr == 1) {   // Left
10449           $xadj += $table['padding']['L'];
10450           $wadj += $table['padding']['L'];
10451           }
10452           if ($colctr == count($content[$i]) ) {  // Right
10453           $wadj += $table['padding']['R'];
10454           }
10455         $this->Rect($x - $xadj, $y - $yadj, $w + $wadj, $h + $hadj, 'F');
10456      }
10457   }
10458 
10459   // TABLE BORDER - if separate
10460   if ($table['borders_separate'] && $table['border']) { 
10461       $halfspaceL = $table['padding']['L'] + ($table['border_spacing_H']/2);
10462       $halfspaceR = $table['padding']['R'] + ($table['border_spacing_H']/2);
10463       $halfspaceT = $table['padding']['T'] + ($table['border_spacing_V']/2);
10464       $halfspaceB = $table['padding']['B'] + ($table['border_spacing_V']/2);
10465       $tbx = $x;
10466       $tby = $y;
10467       $tbw = $w;
10468       $tbh = $h;
10469       $tab_bord = 0;
10470       // mPDF 4.0
10471       $corner = '';
10472       if ($i == $firstrow && $horf=='H') {    // Top
10473         $tby -= $halfspaceT + ($table['border_details']['T']['w']/2);
10474         $tbh += $halfspaceT + ($table['border_details']['T']['w']/2);
10475         $this->setBorder($tab_bord , _BORDER_TOP); 
10476         $corner .= 'T';
10477       }
10478           if (($i == ($lastrow) || (isset($tablehf['rowspan']) && ($i+$tablehf['rowspan']) == ($lastrow+1))  || (!isset($tablehf['rowspan']) && ($i+1) == ($lastrow+1))) && $horf=='F') { // Bottom
10479         $tbh += $halfspaceB + ($table['border_details']['B']['w']/2);
10480         $this->setBorder($tab_bord , _BORDER_BOTTOM); 
10481         $corner .= 'B';
10482       }
10483       if ($colctr == 1) { // Top Left
10484         $tbx -= $halfspaceL + ($table['border_details']['L']['w']/2);
10485         $tbw += $halfspaceL + ($table['border_details']['L']['w']/2);
10486         $this->setBorder($tab_bord , _BORDER_LEFT); 
10487         $corner .= 'L';
10488       }
10489       else if ($colctr == count($content[$i])) {  // Right
10490         $tbw += $halfspaceR + ($table['border_details']['R']['w']/2);
10491         $this->setBorder($tab_bord , _BORDER_RIGHT); 
10492         $corner .= 'R';
10493       }
10494       // mPDF 3.0
10495       $this->_tableRect($tbx, $tby, $tbw, $tbh, $tab_bord , $table['border_details'], false, $table['borders_separate'], 'table', $corner, $table['border_spacing_V'], $table['border_spacing_H'] );
10496   }
10497 
10498   if ($table['empty_cells']!='hide' || !empty($textbuffer) || !$table['borders_separate']) { $paintcell = true; }
10499   else { $paintcell = false; } 
10500 
10501   //Vertical align
10502   if ($R && INTVAL($R) > 0 && isset($va) && $va!='B') { $va='B';}
10503 
10504   if (!isset($va) || empty($va) || $va=='M') $this->y += ($h-$mih)/2;
10505       elseif (isset($va) && $va=='B') $this->y += $h-$mih;
10506   if ($fill && $paintcell)
10507       {
10508     $color = $this->ConvertColor($fill);
10509     if ($color) $this->SetFillColor($color['R'],$color['G'],$color['B']);
10510     if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
10511       $this->Rect($x+ ($table['border_spacing_H']/2), $y+ ($table['border_spacing_V']/2), $w- $table['border_spacing_H'], $h- $table['border_spacing_V'], 'F');
10512     }
10513     else { 
10514       $this->Rect($x, $y, $w, $h, 'F');
10515     }
10516   }
10517 
10518 /*-- GRADIENTS --*/
10519   if (isset($tablehf['gradient']) && $tablehf['gradient'] && $paintcell){ // mPDF 4.3.006
10520     $g = $this->parseBackgroundGradient($tablehf['gradient']);
10521     if ($g) {
10522       if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
10523       $px = $x+ ($table['border_spacing_H']/2);
10524       $py = $y+ ($table['border_spacing_V']/2);
10525       $pw = $w- $table['border_spacing_H'];
10526       $ph = $h- $table['border_spacing_V'];
10527       }
10528       else {
10529       $px = $x;
10530       $py = $y;
10531       $pw = $w;
10532       $ph = $h;
10533       }
10534       $this->Gradient($px, $py, $pw, $ph, $g['type'], $g['col'], $g['col2'], $g['coords'], $g['extend']);
10535     }
10536   }
10537 /*-- END GRADIENTS --*/
10538 
10539 /*-- BACKGROUND-IMAGES --*/
10540   if (isset($tablehf['background-image']) && $paintcell){ // mPDF 4.3.006
10541     if ($tablehf['background-image']['image_id']) { // Background pattern
10542     $n = count($this->patterns)+1;
10543     if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
10544       $px = $x+ ($table['border_spacing_H']/2);
10545       $py = $y+ ($table['border_spacing_V']/2);
10546       $pw = $w- $table['border_spacing_H'];
10547       $ph = $h- $table['border_spacing_V'];
10548     }
10549     else {
10550       $px = $x;
10551       $py = $y;
10552       $pw = $w;
10553       $ph = $h;
10554     }
10555     // mPDF 4.3.015
10556     list($orig_w, $orig_h, $x_repeat, $y_repeat) = $this->_resizeBackgroundImage($tablehf['background-image']['orig_w'], $tablehf['background-image']['orig_h'], $pw, $ph, $tablehf['background-image']['resize'], $tablehf['background-image']['x_repeat'] , $tablehf['background-image']['y_repeat']);
10557     $this->patterns[$n] = array('x'=>$px, 'y'=>$py, 'w'=>$pw, 'h'=>$ph, 'pgh'=>$this->h, 'image_id'=>$tablehf['background-image']['image_id'], 'orig_w'=>$orig_w, 'orig_h'=>$orig_h, 'x_pos'=>$tablehf['background-image']['x_pos'] , 'y_pos'=>$tablehf['background-image']['y_pos'] , 'x_repeat'=>$x_repeat, 'y_repeat'=>$y_repeat); // mPDF 4.3.015
10558     // mPDF 4.3.017
10559     if ($tablehf['background-image']['opacity']>0 && $tablehf['background-image']['opacity']<1) { $opac = $this->SetAlpha($tablehf['background-image']['opacity'],'Normal',true); }
10560     else { $opac = ''; }
10561     $this->_out(sprintf('q /Pattern cs /P%d scn %s %.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f re f Q', $n, $opac, $px*$this->k, ($this->h-$py)*$this->k, $pw*$this->k, -$ph*$this->k));
10562     }
10563   }
10564 /*-- END BACKGROUND-IMAGES --*/
10565 
10566     //Border
10567   if ($table['borders_separate'] && $paintcell && $border) {  // mPDF 4.2.017
10568     $this->_tableRect($x+ ($table['border_spacing_H']/2)+($border_details['L']['w'] /2), $y+ ($table['border_spacing_V']/2)+($border_details['T']['w'] /2), $w-$table['border_spacing_H']-($border_details['L']['w'] /2)-($border_details['R']['w'] /2), $h- $table['border_spacing_V']-($border_details['T']['w'] /2)-($border_details['B']['w']/2), $border, $border_details, false, $table['borders_separate']);
10569   }
10570   else if ($paintcell && $border) {   // mPDF 4.2.017
10571     $this->_tableRect($x, $y, $w, $h, $border, $border_details, true, $table['borders_separate']);    // true causes buffer
10572   }
10573 
10574   //Print cell content
10575      // $this->divheight = $this->table_lineheight*$this->lineheight; // mPDF 4.2
10576       if (!empty($textbuffer)) {
10577 
10578     if ($R) {
10579           $cellPtSize = $textbuffer[0][11] / $this->shrin_k;
10580           $cellFontHeight = ($cellPtSize/$this->k);
10581           $opx = $this->x;
10582           $opy = $this->y;
10583           $angle = INTVAL($R);
10584           // Only allow 45 - 90 degrees (when bottom-aligned) or -90
10585           if ($angle > 90) { $angle = 90; }
10586           else if ($angle > 0 && (isset($va) && $va!='B')) { $angle = 90; }
10587           else if ($angle > 0 && $angle <45) { $angle = 45; }
10588           else if ($angle < 0) { $angle = -90; }
10589           $offset = ((sin(deg2rad($angle))) * 0.37 * $cellFontHeight);
10590           if (isset($align) && $align =='R') { 
10591             $this->x += ($w) + ($offset) - ($cellFontHeight/3) - ($padding['R'] + $border_details['R']['w']); 
10592           }
10593           else if (!isset($align ) || $align =='C') { 
10594             $this->x += ($w/2) + ($offset); 
10595           }
10596           else { 
10597             $this->x += ($offset) + ($cellFontHeight/3)+($padding['L'] + $border_details['L']['w']); 
10598           }
10599           $str = ltrim(implode(' ',$tablehf['text']));
10600           $str = $this->mb_rtrim($str ,$this->mb_enc);
10601 
10602           if (!isset($va) || $va=='M') { 
10603             $this->y -= ($h-$mih)/2; //Undo what was added earlier VERTICAL ALIGN
10604             if ($angle > 0) { $this->y += (($h-$mih)/2)+($padding['T'] + $border_details['T']['w']) + ($mih-($padding['T'] + $border_details['T']['w']+$border_details['B']['w']+$padding['B'])); }
10605             else if ($angle < 0) { $this->y += (($h-$mih)/2)+($padding['T'] + $border_details['T']['w']); }
10606           }
10607           else if (isset($va) && $va=='B') { 
10608             $this->y -= $h-$mih; //Undo what was added earlier VERTICAL ALIGN
10609             if ($angle > 0) { $this->y += $h-($border_details['B']['w']+$padding['B']); }
10610             else if ($angle < 0) { $this->y += $h-$mih+($padding['T'] + $border_details['T']['w']); }
10611           }
10612           else if (isset($va) && $va=='T') { 
10613             if ($angle > 0) { $this->y += $mih-($border_details['B']['w']+$padding['B']); }
10614             else if ($angle < 0) { $this->y += ($padding['T'] + $border_details['T']['w']); }
10615           }
10616 
10617           $this->Rotate($angle,$this->x,$this->y);
10618           $s_fs = $this->FontSizePt;
10619           $s_f = $this->FontFamily; // mPDF 3.0
10620           $s_st = $this->FontStyle; // mPDF 3.0
10621           $this->SetFont($textbuffer[0][4],$textbuffer[0][2],$cellPtSize,true,true);
10622           $this->Text($this->x,$this->y,$str);
10623           $this->Rotate(0);
10624           $this->SetFont($s_f,$s_st,$s_fs,true,true);
10625           $this->x = $opx;
10626           $this->y = $opy;
10627     }
10628     else {
10629       if ($table['borders_separate']) { // NB twice border width
10630         $xadj = $border_details['L']['w'] + $padding['L'] +($table['border_spacing_H']/2);
10631         $wadj = $border_details['L']['w'] + $border_details['R']['w'] + $padding['L'] +$padding['R'] + $table['border_spacing_H'];
10632         $yadj = $border_details['T']['w'] + $padding['T'] + ($table['border_spacing_H']/2);
10633       }
10634       else {
10635         $xadj = $border_details['L']['w']/2 + $padding['L'];
10636         $wadj = ($border_details['L']['w'] + $border_details['R']['w'])/2 + $padding['L'] + $padding['R'];
10637         $yadj = $border_details['T']['w']/2 + $padding['T'];
10638       }
10639 
10640       $this->divwidth=$w-($wadj);
10641       $this->x += $xadj;
10642       $this->y += $yadj;
10643       $this->printbuffer($textbuffer,'',true);
10644     }
10645 
10646   }
10647       $textbuffer = array();
10648      }
10649      $this->y = $y + $h; //Update y coordinate
10650    }
10651 
10652   }//end of 'if usetableheader ...'
10653 }
10654 /*-- END TABLES --*/
10655 
10656 /*-- HTMLHEADERS-FOOTERS --*/
10657 function SetHTMLHeader($header='',$OE='',$write=false) {
10658   // mPDF 4.0
10659   $height = 0;
10660   if (is_array($header) && isset($header['html']) && $header['html']) { 
10661     $Hhtml = $header['html']; 
10662     if ($this->setAutoTopMargin) {
10663       if (isset($header['h'])) { $height = $header['h']; }
10664       else { $height = $this->_gethtmlheight($Hhtml); }
10665     }
10666   }
10667   else if (!is_array($header) && $header) { 
10668     $Hhtml = $header; 
10669     if ($this->setAutoTopMargin) { $height = $this->_gethtmlheight($Hhtml); }
10670   }
10671   else { $Hhtml = ''; }
10672   // mPDF 4.0
10673   if ($OE != 'E') { $OE = 'O'; }
10674   if ($OE == 'E') {
10675      // mPDF 4.0
10676      if ($Hhtml) {
10677     $this->HTMLHeaderE['html'] = $Hhtml;
10678     $this->HTMLHeaderE['h'] = $height;
10679      }
10680      else { $this->HTMLHeaderE = ''; }
10681   }
10682   else {
10683      // mPDF 4.0
10684      if ($Hhtml) {
10685     $this->HTMLHeader['html'] = $Hhtml;
10686     $this->HTMLHeader['h'] = $height;
10687      }
10688      else { $this->HTMLHeader = ''; }
10689   }
10690   if (!$this->mirrorMargins && $OE == 'E') { return; }
10691   if ($Hhtml=='') { return; }
10692   if ($OE == 'E') {
10693     $this->headerDetails['even'] = array(); // override and clear any other non-HTML header/footer
10694   }
10695   else {
10696     $this->headerDetails['odd'] = array();  // override and clear any non-HTML other header/footer
10697   }
10698   // mPDF 4.0
10699   if ($this->setAutoTopMargin=='pad') {
10700     $this->tMargin = $this->margin_header + $height + $this->orig_tMargin;
10701     if (isset($this->saveHTMLHeader[$this->page][$OE]['mt'])) { $this->saveHTMLHeader[$this->page][$OE]['mt'] = $this->tMargin; }
10702   }
10703   else if ($this->setAutoTopMargin=='stretch') {
10704     $this->tMargin = max($this->orig_tMargin, $this->margin_header + $height + $this->autoMarginPadding);
10705     if (isset($this->saveHTMLHeader[$this->page][$OE]['mt'])) { $this->saveHTMLHeader[$this->page][$OE]['mt'] = $this->tMargin; }
10706   }
10707   if ($write && $this->state!=0 && (($this->mirrorMargins && $OE == 'E' && ($this->page)%2==0) || ($this->mirrorMargins && $OE != 'E' && ($this->page)%2==1) || !$this->mirrorMargins)) { $this->writeHTMLHeaders(); }
10708 }
10709 
10710 function SetHTMLFooter($footer='',$OE='') {
10711   // mPDF 4.0
10712   $height = 0;
10713   if (is_array($footer) && isset($footer['html']) && $footer['html']) { 
10714     $Fhtml = $footer['html']; 
10715     if ($this->setAutoBottomMargin) {
10716       if (isset($footer['h'])) { $height = $footer['h']; }
10717       else { $height = $this->_gethtmlheight($Fhtml); }
10718     }
10719   }
10720   else if (!is_array($footer) && $footer) { 
10721     $Fhtml = $footer; 
10722     if ($this->setAutoBottomMargin) { $height = $this->_gethtmlheight($Fhtml); }
10723   }
10724   else { $Fhtml = ''; }
10725   // mPDF 4.0
10726   if ($OE != 'E') { $OE = 'O'; }
10727   if ($OE == 'E') {
10728      // mPDF 4.0
10729      if ($Fhtml) {
10730     $this->HTMLFooterE['html'] = $Fhtml;
10731     $this->HTMLFooterE['h'] = $height;
10732      }
10733      else { $this->HTMLFooterE = ''; }
10734   }
10735   else {
10736      // mPDF 4.0
10737      if ($Fhtml) {
10738     $this->HTMLFooter['html'] = $Fhtml;
10739     $this->HTMLFooter['h'] = $height;
10740      }
10741      else { $this->HTMLFooter = ''; }
10742   }
10743   if (!$this->mirrorMargins && $OE == 'E') { return; }
10744   if ($Fhtml=='') { return false; }
10745   if ($OE == 'E') {
10746     $this->footerDetails['even'] = array(); // override and clear any other header/footer
10747   }
10748   else {
10749     $this->footerDetails['odd'] = array();  // override and clear any other header/footer
10750   }
10751   // mPDF 4.0
10752   if ($this->setAutoBottomMargin=='pad') {
10753     $this->bMargin = $this->margin_footer + $height + $this->orig_bMargin;
10754     $this->PageBreakTrigger=$this->h-$this->bMargin ;
10755     if (isset($this->saveHTMLHeader[$this->page][$OE]['mb'])) { $this->saveHTMLHeader[$this->page][$OE]['mb'] = $this->bMargin; }
10756   }
10757   else if ($this->setAutoBottomMargin=='stretch') {
10758     $this->bMargin = max($this->orig_bMargin, $this->margin_footer + $height + $this->autoMarginPadding);
10759     $this->PageBreakTrigger=$this->h-$this->bMargin ;
10760     if (isset($this->saveHTMLHeader[$this->page][$OE]['mb'])) { $this->saveHTMLHeader[$this->page][$OE]['mb'] = $this->bMargin; }
10761   }
10762 }
10763 
10764 // mPDF 4.0
10765 function _getHtmlHeight($html) {
10766     $save_state = $this->state;
10767     $this->state = 2;
10768     $this->Reset();
10769     $this->pageoutput[$this->page] = array();
10770     $save_x = $this->x;
10771     $save_y = $this->y;
10772     $this->x = $this->lMargin;
10773     $this->y = $this->margin_header;
10774     $html = str_replace('{PAGENO}',$this->pagenumPrefix.$this->docPageNum($this->page).$this->pagenumSuffix,$html);
10775     $html = str_replace($this->aliasNbPgGp,$this->nbpgPrefix.$this->docPageNumTotal($this->page).$this->nbpgSuffix,$html );
10776     $html = str_replace($this->aliasNbPg,$this->page,$html );
10777     $html = preg_replace('/\{DATE\s+(.*?)\}/e',"date('\\1')",$html );
10778     $this->HTMLheaderPageLinks = array();
10779     $savepb = $this->pageBackgrounds;
10780     $this->writingHTMLheader = true;
10781     $this->WriteHTML($html , 4);  // parameter 4 saves output to $this->headerbuffer
10782     $this->writingHTMLheader = false;
10783     $h = ($this->y - $this->margin_header);
10784     $this->Reset();
10785     $this->pageoutput[$this->page] = array();
10786     $this->headerbuffer = '';
10787     $this->pageBackgrounds = $savepb;
10788     $this->x = $save_x;
10789     $this->y = $save_y;
10790     $this->state = $save_state;
10791     return $h;
10792 }
10793 
10794 
10795 // Called internally from Header
10796 function writeHTMLHeaders() {
10797   // mPDF 4.0
10798   if ($this->mirrorMargins && ($this->page)%2==0) { $OE = 'E'; }  // EVEN
10799   else { $OE = 'O'; }
10800   if ($OE == 'E') {
10801     $this->saveHTMLHeader[$this->page][$OE]['html'] = $this->HTMLHeaderE['html'] ;
10802   }
10803   else {
10804     $this->saveHTMLHeader[$this->page][$OE]['html'] = $this->HTMLHeader['html'] ;
10805   }
10806   if ($this->forcePortraitHeaders && $this->CurOrientation=='L' && $this->CurOrientation!=$this->DefOrientation) {
10807     $this->saveHTMLHeader[$this->page][$OE]['rotate'] = true;
10808     $this->saveHTMLHeader[$this->page][$OE]['ml'] = $this->tMargin;
10809     $this->saveHTMLHeader[$this->page][$OE]['mr'] = $this->bMargin;
10810     $this->saveHTMLHeader[$this->page][$OE]['mh'] = $this->margin_header;
10811     $this->saveHTMLHeader[$this->page][$OE]['mf'] = $this->margin_footer;
10812     $this->saveHTMLHeader[$this->page][$OE]['pw'] = $this->h;
10813     $this->saveHTMLHeader[$this->page][$OE]['ph'] = $this->w;
10814   }
10815   else {
10816     $this->saveHTMLHeader[$this->page][$OE]['ml'] = $this->lMargin;
10817     $this->saveHTMLHeader[$this->page][$OE]['mr'] = $this->rMargin;
10818     $this->saveHTMLHeader[$this->page][$OE]['mh'] = $this->margin_header;
10819     $this->saveHTMLHeader[$this->page][$OE]['mf'] = $this->margin_footer;
10820     $this->saveHTMLHeader[$this->page][$OE]['pw'] = $this->w;
10821     $this->saveHTMLHeader[$this->page][$OE]['ph'] = $this->h;
10822   }
10823 }
10824 
10825 function writeHTMLFooters() {
10826   // mPDF 4.0
10827   if ($this->mirrorMargins && ($this->page)%2==0) { $OE = 'E'; }  // EVEN
10828   else { $OE = 'O'; }
10829   if ($OE == 'E') {
10830     $this->saveHTMLFooter[$this->page][$OE]['html'] = $this->HTMLFooterE['html'] ;
10831   }
10832   else {
10833     $this->saveHTMLFooter[$this->page][$OE]['html'] = $this->HTMLFooter['html'] ;
10834   }
10835   if ($this->forcePortraitHeaders && $this->CurOrientation=='L' && $this->CurOrientation!=$this->DefOrientation) {
10836     $this->saveHTMLFooter[$this->page][$OE]['rotate'] = true;
10837     $this->saveHTMLFooter[$this->page][$OE]['ml'] = $this->tMargin;
10838     $this->saveHTMLFooter[$this->page][$OE]['mr'] = $this->bMargin;
10839     $this->saveHTMLFooter[$this->page][$OE]['mt'] = $this->rMargin;
10840     $this->saveHTMLFooter[$this->page][$OE]['mb'] = $this->lMargin;
10841     $this->saveHTMLFooter[$this->page][$OE]['mh'] = $this->margin_header;
10842     $this->saveHTMLFooter[$this->page][$OE]['mf'] = $this->margin_footer;
10843     $this->saveHTMLFooter[$this->page][$OE]['pw'] = $this->h;
10844     $this->saveHTMLFooter[$this->page][$OE]['ph'] = $this->w;
10845   }
10846   else {
10847     $this->saveHTMLFooter[$this->page][$OE]['ml'] = $this->lMargin;
10848     $this->saveHTMLFooter[$this->page][$OE]['mr'] = $this->rMargin;
10849     $this->saveHTMLFooter[$this->page][$OE]['mt'] = $this->tMargin;
10850     $this->saveHTMLFooter[$this->page][$OE]['mb'] = $this->bMargin;
10851     $this->saveHTMLFooter[$this->page][$OE]['mh'] = $this->margin_header;
10852     $this->saveHTMLFooter[$this->page][$OE]['mf'] = $this->margin_footer;
10853     $this->saveHTMLFooter[$this->page][$OE]['pw'] = $this->w;
10854     $this->saveHTMLFooter[$this->page][$OE]['ph'] = $this->h;
10855   }
10856 }
10857 /*-- END HTMLHEADERS-FOOTERS --*/
10858 
10859 function DefHeaderByName($name,$arr) {
10860   if (!$name) { $name = '_default'; }
10861   $this->pageheaders[$name] = $arr;
10862 }
10863 
10864 function DefFooterByName($name,$arr) {
10865   if (!$name) { $name = '_default'; }
10866   $this->pagefooters[$name] = $arr;
10867 }
10868 
10869 function SetHeaderByName($name,$side='O',$write=false) {
10870   if (!$name) { $name = '_default'; }
10871   if ($side=='E') { $this->headerDetails['even'] = $this->pageheaders[$name]; }
10872   else { $this->headerDetails['odd'] = $this->pageheaders[$name]; }
10873   if ($write) { $this->Header(); }
10874 }
10875 
10876 function SetFooterByName($name,$side='O') {
10877   if (!$name) { $name = '_default'; }
10878   if ($side=='E') { $this->footerDetails['even'] = $this->pagefooters[$name]; }
10879   else { $this->footerDetails['odd'] = $this->pagefooters[$name]; }
10880 }
10881 
10882 /*-- HTMLHEADERS-FOOTERS --*/
10883 function DefHTMLHeaderByName($name,$html) {
10884   if (!$name) { $name = '_default'; }
10885   // mPDF 4.0
10886   $this->pageHTMLheaders[$name]['html'] = $html;
10887   $this->pageHTMLheaders[$name]['h'] = $this->_gethtmlheight($html);
10888 }
10889 
10890 function DefHTMLFooterByName($name,$html) {
10891   if (!$name) { $name = '_default'; }
10892   // mPDF 4.0
10893   $this->pageHTMLfooters[$name]['html'] = $html;
10894   $this->pageHTMLfooters[$name]['h'] = $this->_gethtmlheight($html);
10895 }
10896 
10897 function SetHTMLHeaderByName($name,$side='O',$write=false) {
10898   if (!$name) { $name = '_default'; }
10899   $this->SetHTMLHeader($this->pageHTMLheaders[$name],$side,$write);
10900 }
10901 
10902 function SetHTMLFooterByName($name,$side='O') {
10903   if (!$name) { $name = '_default'; }
10904   $this->SetHTMLFooter($this->pageHTMLfooters[$name],$side,$write);
10905 }
10906 /*-- END HTMLHEADERS-FOOTERS --*/
10907 
10908 
10909 function SetHeader($Harray=array(),$side='',$write=false) {
10910   if (is_string($Harray)) {
10911     if (strlen($Harray)==0) {
10912   if ($side=='O') { $this->headerDetails['odd'] = array(); }
10913   else if ($side=='E') { $this->headerDetails['even'] = array(); }
10914   else { $this->headerDetails = array(); }
10915    }
10916    else if (strpos($Harray,'|') || strpos($Harray,'|')===0) {
10917   $hdet = explode('|',$Harray);
10918   $this->headerDetails = array (
10919       'odd' => array (
10920   'L' => array ('content' => $hdet[0], 'font-size' => $this->defaultheaderfontsize, 'font-style' => $this->defaultheaderfontstyle),
10921   'C' => array ('content' => $hdet[1], 'font-size' => $this->defaultheaderfontsize, 'font-style' => $this->defaultheaderfontstyle),
10922   'R' => array ('content' => $hdet[2], 'font-size' => $this->defaultheaderfontsize, 'font-style' => $this->defaultheaderfontstyle),
10923   'line' => $this->defaultheaderline,
10924       ),
10925       'even' => array (
10926   'R' => array ('content' => $hdet[0], 'font-size' => $this->defaultheaderfontsize, 'font-style' => $this->defaultheaderfontstyle),
10927   'C' => array ('content' => $hdet[1], 'font-size' => $this->defaultheaderfontsize, 'font-style' => $this->defaultheaderfontstyle),
10928   'L' => array ('content' => $hdet[2], 'font-size' => $this->defaultheaderfontsize, 'font-style' => $this->defaultheaderfontstyle),
10929   'line' => $this->defaultheaderline,
10930     )
10931   );
10932     }
10933     else {
10934   $this->headerDetails = array (
10935       'odd' => array (
10936   'R' => array ('content' => $Harray, 'font-size' => $this->defaultheaderfontsize, 'font-style' => $this->defaultheaderfontstyle),
10937   'line' => $this->defaultheaderline,
10938       ),
10939       'even' => array (
10940   'L' => array ('content' => $Harray, 'font-size' => $this->defaultheaderfontsize, 'font-style' => $this->defaultheaderfontstyle),
10941   'line' => $this->defaultheaderline,
10942     )
10943   );
10944     }
10945   }
10946   else if (is_array($Harray)) {
10947   if ($side=='O') { $this->headerDetails['odd'] = $Harray; }
10948   else if ($side=='E') { $this->headerDetails['even'] = $Harray; }
10949   else { $this->headerDetails = $Harray; }
10950   }
10951 /*-- HTMLHEADERS-FOOTERS --*/
10952   // Overwrite any HTML Header previously set
10953   if ($side=='E') { $this->SetHTMLHeader('','E'); }
10954   else if ($side=='O') {  $this->SetHTMLHeader(''); }
10955   else {
10956   $this->SetHTMLHeader('');
10957   $this->SetHTMLHeader('','E');
10958   }
10959 /*-- END HTMLHEADERS-FOOTERS --*/
10960 
10961   if ($write) { 
10962   $save_y = $this->y;
10963   $this->Header();
10964   $this->SetY($save_y) ; 
10965   }
10966 }
10967 
10968 function SetFooter($Farray=array(),$side='') {
10969   if (is_string($Farray)) {
10970     if (strlen($Farray)==0) {
10971   if ($side=='O') { $this->footerDetails['odd'] = array(); }
10972   else if ($side=='E') { $this->footerDetails['even'] = array(); }
10973   else { $this->footerDetails = array(); }
10974     }
10975     else if (strpos($Farray,'|') || strpos($Farray,'|')===0) {
10976   $fdet = explode('|',$Farray);
10977   $this->footerDetails = array (
10978     'odd' => array (
10979   'L' => array ('content' => $fdet[0], 'font-size' => $this->defaultfooterfontsize, 'font-style' => $this->defaultfooterfontstyle),
10980   'C' => array ('content' => $fdet[1], 'font-size' => $this->defaultfooterfontsize, 'font-style' => $this->defaultfooterfontstyle),
10981   'R' => array ('content' => $fdet[2], 'font-size' => $this->defaultfooterfontsize, 'font-style' => $this->defaultfooterfontstyle),
10982   'line' => $this->defaultfooterline,
10983     ),
10984     'even' => array (
10985   'R' => array ('content' => $fdet[0], 'font-size' => $this->defaultfooterfontsize, 'font-style' => $this->defaultfooterfontstyle),
10986   'C' => array ('content' => $fdet[1], 'font-size' => $this->defaultfooterfontsize, 'font-style' => $this->defaultfooterfontstyle),
10987   'L' => array ('content' => $fdet[2], 'font-size' => $this->defaultfooterfontsize, 'font-style' => $this->defaultfooterfontstyle),
10988   'line' => $this->defaultfooterline,
10989     )
10990   );
10991     }
10992     else {
10993   $this->footerDetails = array (
10994     'odd' => array (
10995   'R' => array ('content' => $Farray, 'font-size' => $this->defaultfooterfontsize, 'font-style' => $this->defaultfooterfontstyle),
10996   'line' => $this->defaultfooterline,
10997     ),
10998     'even' => array (
10999   'L' => array ('content' => $Farray, 'font-size' => $this->defaultfooterfontsize, 'font-style' => $this->defaultfooterfontstyle),
11000   'line' => $this->defaultfooterline,
11001     )
11002   );
11003     }
11004   }
11005   else if (is_array($Farray)) {
11006   if ($side=='O') { $this->footerDetails['odd'] = $Farray; }
11007   else if ($side=='E') { $this->footerDetails['even'] = $Farray; }
11008   else { $this->footerDetails = $Farray; }
11009   }
11010 /*-- HTMLHEADERS-FOOTERS --*/
11011   // Overwrite any HTML Footer previously set
11012   if ($side=='E') { $this->SetHTMLFooter('','E'); }
11013   else if ($side=='O') {  $this->SetHTMLFooter(''); }
11014   else {
11015   $this->SetHTMLFooter('');
11016   $this->SetHTMLFooter('','E');
11017   }
11018 /*-- END HTMLHEADERS-FOOTERS --*/
11019 }
11020 
11021 /*-- WATERMARK --*/
11022 function setUnvalidatedText($txt='', $alpha=-1) {
11023   if ($alpha>=0) $this->watermarkTextAlpha = $alpha;
11024   $this->watermarkText = $txt;
11025 }
11026 function SetWatermarkText($txt='', $alpha=-1) {
11027   if ($alpha>=0) $this->watermarkTextAlpha = $alpha;
11028   $this->watermarkText = $txt;
11029 }
11030 
11031 function SetWatermarkImage($src, $alpha=-1, $size='D', $pos='F') {
11032   if ($alpha>=0) $this->watermarkImageAlpha = $alpha;
11033   $this->watermarkImage = $src;
11034   $this->watermark_size = $size;
11035   $this->watermark_pos = $pos;
11036 }
11037 /*-- END WATERMARK --*/
11038 
11039 
11040 //Page footer
11041 function Footer() {
11042 /*-- CSS-PAGE --*/
11043   // PAGED MEDIA - CROP / CROSS MARKS from @PAGE
11044   if ($this->show_marks == 'CROP') {
11045   // Show TICK MARKS
11046   $this->SetLineWidth(0.1); // = 0.1 mm
11047   $this->SetDrawColor(0);
11048   $l = 18;  // Default length in mm of crop line
11049   $m = 8; // Distance of crop mark from margin in mm
11050   $b = 8; // Non-printable border at edge of paper sheet in mm
11051   $ax1 = $b;
11052   $bx = $this->page_box['outer_width_LR'] - $m;
11053   $ax = max($ax1, $bx-$l);
11054   $cx1 = $this->w - $b;
11055   $dx = $this->w - $this->page_box['outer_width_LR'] + $m;
11056   $cx = min($cx1, $dx+$l);
11057   $ay1 = $b;
11058   $by = $this->page_box['outer_width_TB'] - $m;
11059   $ay = max($ay1, $by-$l);
11060   $cy1 = $this->h - $b;
11061   $dy = $this->h - $this->page_box['outer_width_TB'] + $m;
11062   $cy = min($cy1, $dy+$l);
11063 
11064   $this->Line($ax, $this->page_box['outer_width_TB'], $bx, $this->page_box['outer_width_TB']);
11065   $this->Line($cx, $this->page_box['outer_width_TB'], $dx, $this->page_box['outer_width_TB']);
11066   $this->Line($ax, $this->h - $this->page_box['outer_width_TB'], $bx, $this->h - $this->page_box['outer_width_TB']);
11067   $this->Line($cx, $this->h - $this->page_box['outer_width_TB'], $dx, $this->h - $this->page_box['outer_width_TB']);
11068   $this->Line($this->page_box['outer_width_LR'], $ay, $this->page_box['outer_width_LR'], $by);
11069   $this->Line($this->page_box['outer_width_LR'], $cy, $this->page_box['outer_width_LR'], $dy);
11070   $this->Line($this->w - $this->page_box['outer_width_LR'], $ay, $this->w - $this->page_box['outer_width_LR'], $by);
11071   $this->Line($this->w - $this->page_box['outer_width_LR'], $cy, $this->w - $this->page_box['outer_width_LR'], $dy);
11072   }
11073   if ($this->show_marks == 'CROSS') {
11074   $this->SetLineWidth(0.1); // = 0.1 mm
11075   $this->SetDrawColor(0);
11076   $l = 14 /2; // longer length of the cross line (half)
11077   $w = 6 /2;  // shorter width of the cross line (half)
11078   $r = 1.2; // radius of circle
11079   $m = 10;  // Distance of cross mark from margin in mm
11080   $x1 = $this->page_box['outer_width_LR'] - $m;
11081   $x2 = $this->w - $this->page_box['outer_width_LR'] + $m;
11082   $y1 = $this->page_box['outer_width_TB'] - $m;
11083   $y2 = $this->h - $this->page_box['outer_width_TB'] + $m;
11084   // Left
11085   $this->Circle($x1, $this->h/2, $r, 'S') ;
11086   $this->Line($x1-$w, $this->h/2, $x1+$w, $this->h/2);
11087   $this->Line($x1, $this->h/2-$l, $x1, $this->h/2+$l);
11088   // Right
11089   $this->Circle($x2, $this->h/2, $r, 'S') ;
11090   $this->Line($x2-$w, $this->h/2, $x2+$w, $this->h/2);
11091   $this->Line($x2, $this->h/2-$l, $x2, $this->h/2+$l);
11092   // Top
11093   $this->Circle($this->w/2, $y1, $r, 'S') ;
11094   $this->Line($this->w/2, $y1-$w, $this->w/2, $y1+$w);
11095   $this->Line($this->w/2-$l, $y1, $this->w/2+$l, $y1);
11096   // Bottom
11097   $this->Circle($this->w/2, $y2, $r, 'S') ;
11098   $this->Line($this->w/2, $y2-$w, $this->w/2, $y2+$w);
11099   $this->Line($this->w/2-$l, $y2, $this->w/2+$l, $y2);
11100   }
11101 
11102 
11103   // If @page set non-HTML headers/footers named, they were not read until later in the HTML code - so now set them
11104   if ($this->page==1) {
11105     if ($this->firstPageBoxHeader) {
11106       $this->headerDetails['odd'] = $this->pageheaders[$this->firstPageBoxHeader]; 
11107         $this->Header();
11108     }
11109     if ($this->firstPageBoxFooter) {
11110       $this->footerDetails['odd'] = $this->pagefooters[$this->firstPageBoxFooter];
11111     }
11112     $this->firstPageBoxHeader='';
11113     $this->firstPageBoxFooter='';
11114   }
11115 /*-- END CSS-PAGE --*/
11116 
11117 
11118 
11119 /*-- HTMLHEADERS-FOOTERS --*/
11120   if (($this->mirrorMargins && ($this->page%2==0) && $this->HTMLFooterE) || ($this->mirrorMargins && ($this->page%2==1) && $this->HTMLFooter) || (!$this->mirrorMargins && $this->HTMLFooter)) {
11121   $this->writeHTMLFooters(); 
11122 /*-- WATERMARK --*/
11123     if (($this->watermarkText) && ($this->showWatermarkText)) {
11124     $this->watermark( $this->watermarkText, 45, 120, $this->watermarkTextAlpha);  // Watermark text
11125     }
11126   if (($this->watermarkImage) && ($this->showWatermarkImage)) {
11127     $this->watermarkImg( $this->watermarkImage, $this->watermarkImageAlpha);  // Watermark image
11128   }
11129 /*-- END WATERMARK --*/
11130   return;
11131   }
11132 /*-- END HTMLHEADERS-FOOTERS --*/
11133 
11134   $this->processingHeader=true;
11135   $this->ResetMargins();  // necessary after columns
11136   $this->pgwidth = $this->w - $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin;
11137 /*-- WATERMARK --*/
11138   if (($this->watermarkText) && ($this->showWatermarkText)) {
11139   $this->watermark( $this->watermarkText, 45, 120, $this->watermarkTextAlpha);  // Watermark text
11140   }
11141   if (($this->watermarkImage) && ($this->showWatermarkImage)) {
11142   $this->watermarkImg( $this->watermarkImage, $this->watermarkImageAlpha);  // Watermark image
11143   }
11144 /*-- END WATERMARK --*/
11145   $h = $this->footerDetails;
11146   if(count($h)) {
11147 
11148   if ($this->forcePortraitHeaders && $this->CurOrientation=='L' && $this->CurOrientation!=$this->DefOrientation) {
11149     $this->_out(sprintf('q 0 -1 1 0 0 %.3f cm ',($this->h*$this->k)));
11150     $headerpgwidth = $this->h - $this->orig_lMargin - $this->orig_rMargin;
11151     if (($this->mirrorMargins) && (($this->page)%2==0)) { // EVEN
11152       $headerlmargin = $this->orig_rMargin;
11153     }
11154     else {
11155       $headerlmargin = $this->orig_lMargin;
11156     }
11157   }
11158   else { 
11159     $yadj = 0; 
11160     $headerpgwidth = $this->pgwidth;
11161     $headerlmargin = $this->lMargin;
11162   }
11163   $this->SetY(-$this->margin_footer);
11164 
11165   $this->SetTextColor(0);
11166       $this->SUP = false;
11167   $this->SUB = false;
11168   $this->bullet = false;
11169 
11170   // only show pagenumber if numbering on
11171   // mPDF 3.0 Add PageNum prefix/suffix
11172   $pgno = $this->docPageNum($this->page, true); 
11173 
11174   if (($this->mirrorMargins) && (($this->page)%2==0)) { // EVEN
11175       $side = 'even';
11176   }
11177   else {  // ODD  // OR NOT MIRRORING MARGINS/FOOTERS = DEFAULT
11178       $side = 'odd';
11179   }
11180   $maxfontheight = 0;
11181   foreach(array('L','C','R') AS $pos) {
11182     if (isset($h[$side][$pos]['content']) && $h[$side][$pos]['content']) {
11183     if (isset($h[$side][$pos]['font-size']) && $h[$side][$pos]['font-size']) { $hfsz = $h[$side][$pos]['font-size']; }
11184     else { $hfsz = $this->default_font_size; }
11185     $maxfontheight = max($maxfontheight,$hfsz);
11186     }
11187   }
11188   // LEFT-CENTER-RIGHT
11189   foreach(array('L','C','R') AS $pos) {
11190     if (isset($h[$side][$pos]['content']) && $h[$side][$pos]['content']) {
11191     $hd = str_replace('{PAGENO}',$pgno,$h[$side][$pos]['content']);
11192     // mPDF 3.0
11193     $hd = str_replace($this->aliasNbPgGp,$this->nbpgPrefix.$this->aliasNbPgGp.$this->nbpgSuffix,$hd); // {nbpg}
11194     $hd = preg_replace('/\{DATE\s+(.*?)\}/e',"date('\\1')",$hd);
11195     if (isset($h[$side][$pos]['font-family']) && $h[$side][$pos]['font-family']) { $hff = $h[$side][$pos]['font-family']; }
11196     // mPDF 3.0 original_ in case pagebreak in middle of table
11197     else { $hff = $this->original_default_font; }
11198     if (isset($h[$side][$pos]['font-size']) && $h[$side][$pos]['font-size']) { $hfsz = $h[$side][$pos]['font-size']; }
11199     // mPDF 3.0 original_ in case pagebreak in middle of table
11200     else { $hfsz = $this->original_default_font_size; }
11201     $maxfontheight = max($maxfontheight,$hfsz);
11202     if (isset($h[$side][$pos]['font-style']) && $h[$side][$pos]['font-style']) { $hfst = $h[$side][$pos]['font-style']; }
11203     else { $hfst = ''; }
11204     if (isset($h[$side][$pos]['color']) && $h[$side][$pos]['color']) { 
11205       $hfcol = $h[$side][$pos]['color']; 
11206       $cor = $this->ConvertColor($hfcol);
11207       if ($cor) { $this->SetTextColor($cor['R'],$cor['G'],$cor['B']); }
11208     }
11209     else { $hfcol = ''; }
11210     // mPDF 3.0 Force output
11211     $this->SetFont($hff,$hfst,$hfsz,true,true);
11212     $this->x = $headerlmargin ;
11213     // mPDF 4.0
11214 //    $this->y = $this->h - $this->margin_footer - ($maxfontheight/$this->k * 0.5) - 0.5;
11215     $this->y = $this->h - $this->margin_footer - ($maxfontheight/$this->k);
11216     $hd = $this->purify_utf8_text($hd);
11217     if ($this->text_input_as_HTML) {
11218       $hd = $this->all_entities_to_utf8($hd);
11219     }
11220     // CONVERT CODEPAGE
11221     if (!$this->is_MB) { $hd = mb_convert_encoding($hd,$this->mb_enc,'UTF-8'); }
11222     // DIRECTIONALITY RTL
11223     $this->magic_reverse_dir($hd);  // *RTL*
11224     // mPDF 4.0 Font-specific ligature substitution for Indic fonts
11225     $this->ConvertIndic($hd); // *INDIC*
11226     $align = $pos;
11227     if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { 
11228       if ($pos == 'L') { $align = 'R'; }
11229       else if ($pos == 'R') { $align = 'L'; }
11230     }
11231 
11232     if ($pos!='L' && (stripos($hd,$this->aliasNbPg)!==false || stripos($hd,$this->aliasNbPgGp)!==false)) { 
11233       if (stripos($hd,$this->aliasNbPgGp)!==false) { $type= 'nbpggp'; } else { $type= 'nbpg'; }
11234       $this->_out('{mpdfheader'.$type.' '.$pos.' ff='.$hff.' fs='.$hfst.' fz='.$hfsz.'}'); 
11235       // mPDF 4.0
11236       $this->Cell($headerpgwidth ,$maxfontheight/$this->k ,$hd,0,0,$align,0,'',0,0,0,'M');
11237       $this->_out('Q');
11238     }
11239     else { 
11240       // mPDF 4.0
11241       $this->Cell($headerpgwidth ,$maxfontheight/$this->k ,$hd,0,0,$align,0,'',0,0,0,'M');
11242     }
11243     if ($hfcol) { $this->SetTextColor(0); }
11244     }
11245   }
11246   // Return Font to normal
11247   $this->SetFont($this->default_font,'',$this->original_default_font_size);
11248 
11249   // LINE
11250   // mPDF 4.0
11251   if (isset($h[$side]['line']) && $h[$side]['line']) { 
11252     $this->SetLineWidth(0.1);
11253     $this->SetDrawColor(0);
11254     // mPDF 4.0
11255     $this->Line($headerlmargin , $this->y-($maxfontheight*($this->footer_line_spacing)/$this->k), $headerlmargin +$headerpgwidth, $this->y-($maxfontheight*($this->footer_line_spacing)/$this->k));
11256   }
11257   if ($this->forcePortraitHeaders && $this->CurOrientation=='L' && $this->CurOrientation!=$this->DefOrientation) {
11258     $this->_out('Q');
11259   }
11260   }
11261   $this->processingHeader=false;
11262 
11263 }
11264 
11265 /*-- HYPHENATION --*/
11268 // HYPHENATION
11270 // Soft hyphs
11271 function softHyphenate($word, $maxWidth) {
11272   // Don't hyphenate web addresses
11273   if (preg_match('/^(http:|www\.)/',$word)) { return array(false,'','',''); }
11274 
11275   // Get dictionary
11276   $poss = array();
11277   $softhyphens = array();
11278   $offset = 0;
11279   $p = true;
11280   if ($this->is_MB) {   // *UNICODE-FONTS*
11281     $wl = mb_strlen($word,'UTF-8'); // *UNICODE-FONTS*
11282   } // *UNICODE-FONTS*
11283   else {  // *UNICODE-FONTS*
11284     $wl = strlen($word);
11285   } // *UNICODE-FONTS*
11286   while($offset < $wl) {
11287 /*-- UNICODE-FONTS --*/
11288     if ($this->is_MB) { 
11289       $p = mb_strpos($word, "\xc2\xad", $offset, 'UTF-8');
11290     }
11291     // mPDF 3.0 Soft Hyphens chr(173)
11292     else
11293 /*-- END UNICODE-FONTS --*/
11294     if ($this->FontFamily!='symbol' && $this->FontFamily!='zapfdingbats') {
11295       $p = strpos($word, chr(173), $offset);
11296     }
11297     if ($p !== false) { $poss[] = $p - count($poss); }
11298     else { break; }
11299     $offset = $p+1;
11300   }
11301   $success = false;
11302   foreach($poss AS $i) {
11303 /*-- UNICODE-FONTS --*/
11304       if ($this->is_MB) { 
11305         $a = mb_substr($word,0,$i,'UTF-8');
11306         if ($this->GetStringWidth($a.'-') > $maxWidth) { break ; }
11307         $pre = $a;
11308         $post = mb_substr($word,$i,mb_strlen($word,'UTF-8'),'UTF-8'); // mPDF 4.2.009
11309         $prelength = mb_strlen($pre, 'UTF-8');
11310       }
11311       else { 
11312 /*-- END UNICODE-FONTS --*/
11313         $a = substr($word,0,$i);
11314         if ($this->GetStringWidth($a.'-') > $maxWidth) { break ; }
11315         $pre = $a;
11316         $post = substr($word,$i,strlen($word)); // mPDF 4.2.009
11317         $prelength = strlen($pre);
11318       } // *UNICODE-FONTS*
11319       $success = true;
11320   }
11321   return array($success,$pre,$post,$prelength);
11322 }
11323 
11325 // Word hyphenation
11326 function hyphenateWord($word, $maxWidth) {
11327   // Do everything inside this function in utf-8
11328   // Don't hyphenate web addresses
11329   if (preg_match('/^(http:|www\.)/',$word)) { return array(false,'','',''); }
11330 
11331 
11332   // Get dictionary
11333   if (!$this->loadedSHYdictionary) {
11334     if (file_exists(_MPDF_PATH.'patterns/dictionary.txt')) {
11335       $this->SHYdictionary = file(_MPDF_PATH.'patterns/dictionary.txt',FILE_SKIP_EMPTY_LINES);
11336       foreach($this->SHYdictionary as $entry) {
11337         $entry = trim($entry);
11338         $poss = array();
11339         $offset = 0;
11340         $p = true;
11341         $wl = mb_strlen($entry ,'UTF-8');
11342         while($offset < $wl) {
11343           $p = mb_strpos($entry, '/', $offset, 'UTF-8');
11344           if ($p !== false) { $poss[] = $p - count($poss); }
11345           else { break; }
11346           $offset = $p+1;
11347         }
11348         if (count($poss)) { $this->SHYdictionaryWords[str_replace('/', '', mb_strtolower($entry))] = $poss; }
11349       }
11350     }
11351     $this->loadedSHYdictionary = true;
11352   }
11353 
11354   if (!in_array($this->SHYlang,$this->SHYlanguages)) { return array(false,'','',''); }
11355   // If no pattern loaded or not the best one
11356   if (count($this->SHYpatterns) < 1  || ($this->loadedSHYpatterns && $this->loadedSHYpatterns != $this->SHYlang)) {
11357     include(_MPDF_PATH."patterns/" . $this->SHYlang . ".php"); 
11358     $patterns = preg_split('/[ ]/u', $patterns);
11359     $new_patterns = array();
11360     for($i = 0; $i < count($patterns); $i++) {
11361       $value = $patterns[$i];
11362       $new_patterns[preg_replace('/[0-9]/u', '', $value)] = $value;
11363     }
11364     $this->SHYpatterns = $new_patterns;
11365     $this->loadedSHYpatterns = $this->SHYlang;
11366   }
11367 
11368   if (!$this->is_MB) { $word = mb_convert_encoding($word,'UTF-8',$this->mb_enc); }
11369 
11370   $prepre = '';
11371   $postpost = '';
11372   $startpunctuation = "\xc2\xab\xc2\xbf\xe2\x80\x98\xe2\x80\x9b\xe2\x80\x9c\xe2\x80\x9f";
11373   $endpunctuation = "\xe2\x80\x9e\xe2\x80\x9d\xe2\x80\x9a\xe2\x80\x99\xc2\xbb";
11374   $pre = '';
11375   $post = '';
11376 
11377 
11378   if (preg_match('/^(["\''.$startpunctuation .'])+(.{'.$this->SHYcharmin.',})$/u',$word,$m)) {
11379     $prepre = $m[1];
11380     $word = $m[2];
11381   }
11382   if (preg_match('/^(.{'.$this->SHYcharmin.',})([\'\.,;:!?"'.$endpunctuation .']+)$/u',$word,$m)) {
11383     $word = $m[1];
11384     $postpost = $m[2];
11385   }
11386   if(mb_strlen($word,'UTF-8') < $this->SHYcharmin) {
11387       return array(false,'','','');
11388   }
11389   $success = false;
11390 
11391   if(isset($this->SHYdictionaryWords[mb_strtolower($word)])) {
11392      foreach($this->SHYdictionaryWords[mb_strtolower($word)] AS $i) {
11393       $a = $prepre . mb_substr($word,0,$i,'UTF-8');
11394       if (!$this->is_MB) { $testa = mb_convert_encoding($a,$this->mb_enc,'UTF-8'); }
11395       else { $testa = $a; }
11396       if ($this->GetStringWidth($testa.'-') > $maxWidth) { break ; }
11397       $pre = $a;
11398       $post = mb_substr($word,$i,mb_strlen($word,'UTF-8'),'UTF-8') . $postpost; // mPDF 4.2.009
11399       $success = true;
11400      }
11401   }
11402 
11403   if (!$success) {
11404      $text_word = '_' . $word . '_';
11405      $word_length = mb_strlen($text_word,'UTF-8');
11406 
11407      $single_character = preg_split('//u', $text_word);
11408 
11409      $text_word = mb_strtolower($text_word,'UTF-8');
11410      $hyphenated_word = array();
11411      $numb3rs = array('0' => true, '1' => true, '2' => true, '3' => true, '4' => true, '5' => true, '6' => true, '7' => true, '8' => true, '9' => true);
11412      for($position = 0; $position <= ($word_length - $this->SHYcharmin); $position++) {
11413     $maxwins = min(($word_length - $position), $this->SHYcharmax);
11414     for($win = $this->SHYcharmin; $win <= $maxwins; $win++) {
11415       if(isset($this->SHYpatterns[mb_substr($text_word, $position, $win,'UTF-8')])) {
11416         $pattern = $this->SHYpatterns[mb_substr($text_word, $position, $win,'UTF-8')];
11417         $digits = 1;
11418         $pattern_length = mb_strlen($pattern,'UTF-8');
11419               
11420         for($i = 0; $i < $pattern_length; $i++) {
11421           $char = $pattern[$i];
11422           if(isset($numb3rs[$char])) {
11423             $zero = ($i == 0) ? $position - 1 : $position + $i - $digits;
11424             if(!isset($hyphenated_word[$zero]) || $hyphenated_word[$zero] != $char) $hyphenated_word[$zero] = $char;
11425             $digits++;        
11426           }
11427         }
11428       }
11429     }
11430      }
11431 
11432      for($i = $this->SHYleftmin; $i <= (mb_strlen($word,'UTF-8') - $this->SHYrightmin); $i++) {
11433     if(isset($hyphenated_word[$i]) && $hyphenated_word[$i] % 2 != 0) {
11434       $a = $prepre . mb_substr($word,0,$i,'UTF-8');
11435       if (!$this->is_MB) { $testa = mb_convert_encoding($a,$this->mb_enc,'UTF-8'); }
11436       else { $testa = $a; }
11437       if ($this->GetStringWidth($testa.'-') > $maxWidth + 0.0001) { break ; }
11438       $pre = $a;
11439       $post = mb_substr($word,$i,mb_strlen($word,'UTF-8'),'UTF-8') . $postpost; // mPDF 4.2.009
11440       $success = true;
11441     }
11442      }
11443   }
11444   if (!$this->is_MB) { 
11445     $pre = mb_convert_encoding($pre,$this->mb_enc,'UTF-8'); 
11446     $post = mb_convert_encoding($post,$this->mb_enc,'UTF-8'); 
11447     $prelength = strlen($pre);
11448   }
11449   else {
11450     $prelength = mb_strlen($pre);
11451   }
11452   return array($success,$pre,$post,$prelength);
11453 
11454 }
11455 /*-- END HYPHENATION --*/
11456 
11457 
11458 
11462 function WriteHTML($html,$sub=0,$init=true,$close=true) {
11463         // $sub ADDED - 0 = default; 1=headerCSS only; 2=HTML body (parts) only; 3 - HTML parses only
11464         // 4 - writes HTML headers
11465         // $close Leaves buffers etc. in current state, so that it can continue a block etc.
11466         // $init - Clears and sets buffers to Top level block etc.
11467 
11468   // mPDF 4.2.018
11469   if ($this->PDFA) {  // default font may be set as core when win-1252 and PDFA not set until runtime
11470     reset($this->fonts);
11471     $df = key($this->fonts);
11472     if ($df=='times' || $df == 'helvetica' || $df == 'courier') { 
11473       unset($this->fonts[$df]); 
11474     }
11475   }
11476 
11477   // mPDF 4.2
11478   if (empty($html)) { $html = ''; }
11479   if ($this->progressBar) { $this->UpdateProgressBar(1,0,'Parsing CSS & Headers'); }  // *PROGRESS-BAR*
11480 
11481   if ($init) {
11482     $this->headerbuffer='';
11483     $this->textbuffer = array();
11484     // mPDF 4.0 Fixed Pos block
11485     $this->fixedPosBlockSave = array();
11486   }
11487 
11488   if ($sub == 1) { $html = '<style> '.$html.' </style>'; }  // stylesheet only
11489 
11490   if ($this->allow_charset_conversion) {
11491     if ($sub < 1) { 
11492       $this->ReadCharset($html); 
11493     }
11494     if ($this->charset_in) { 
11495       $success = iconv($this->charset_in,'UTF-8//TRANSLIT',$html); 
11496       if ($success) { $html = $success; }
11497     }
11498   }
11499 
11500   $html = $this->purify_utf8($html,false);
11501   if ($init) {
11502     $this->blklvl = 0;
11503     $this->lastblocklevelchange = 0;
11504     $this->blk = array();
11505     // mPDF 4.0
11506     $this->initialiseBlock($this->blk[0]);
11507     $this->blk[0]['width'] =& $this->pgwidth;
11508     $this->blk[0]['inner_width'] =& $this->pgwidth;
11509     // mPDF 3.0
11510     $this->blk[0]['blockContext'] = $this->blockContext;
11511   }
11512 
11513   if ($sub < 2) { 
11514     $this->ReadMetaTags($html); 
11515 
11516     // NB default stylesheet now in mPDF.css - read on initialising class
11517     $html = $this->ReadCSS($html); 
11518   }
11519 
11520   // SET Blocklevel[0] CSS if defined in <body> or from default
11521   $properties = $this->MergeCSS('BLOCK','BODY','');
11522 
11523   if ($sub == 1) { $this->setCSS($properties,'','BODY'); return ''; }
11524 
11525   if ($sub < 2) { 
11526 /*-- UNICODE-FONTS --*/
11527     if ($this->useLang && $this->is_MB && preg_match('/<html [^>]*lang=[\'\"](.*?)[\'\"]/ism',$html,$m)) { 
11528       $html_lang = $m[1]; 
11529     }
11530 /*-- END UNICODE-FONTS --*/
11531 
11532     // allow in-line CSS for body tag to be parsed // Get <body> tag inline CSS
11533     if (preg_match('/<body([^>]*)>(.*?)<\/body>/ism',$html,$m) || preg_match('/<body([^>]*)>(.*)$/ism',$html,$m)) { 
11534       $html = $m[2]; 
11535       // mPDF 3.0 - Tiling Patterns
11536       // Changed to allow style="background: url('bg.jpg')"
11537       if (preg_match('/style=[\"](.*?)[\"]/ism',$m[1],$mm) || preg_match('/style=[\'](.*?)[\']/ism',$m[1],$mm)) { 
11538         $zproperties = $this->readInlineCSS($mm[1]); 
11539         $properties = $this->array_merge_recursive_unique($properties,$zproperties); 
11540       }
11541 /*-- UNICODE-FONTS --*/
11542       if (isset($html_lang) && $html_lang) { $properties['LANG'] = $html_lang; }
11543       if ($this->useLang && $this->is_MB && preg_match('/lang=[\'\"](.*?)[\'\"]/ism',$m[1],$mm)) { 
11544         $properties['LANG'] = $mm[1]; 
11545       }
11546 /*-- END UNICODE-FONTS --*/
11547     }
11548   }
11549   $this->setCSS($properties,'','BODY'); 
11550   if (!isset($this->CSS['BODY'])) { $this->CSS['BODY'] = array(); }
11551 
11552   // mPDF 4.0 Not required(?) and messing up text-align for RTL
11553 //  $this->CSS['BODY'] = $this->array_merge_recursive_unique($this->CSS['BODY'], $properties); 
11554 
11555 /*-- GRADIENTS --*/
11556   if (isset($properties['BACKGROUND-GRADIENT'])) { 
11557     $this->bodyBackgroundGradient = $properties['BACKGROUND-GRADIENT'];
11558   }
11559 /*-- END GRADIENTS --*/
11560 /*-- BACKGROUND-IMAGES --*/
11561   if (isset($properties['BACKGROUND-IMAGE']) && $properties['BACKGROUND-IMAGE']) {    // mPDF 4.3.011
11562     $file = $properties['BACKGROUND-IMAGE'];
11563     $sizesarray = $this->Image($file,0,0,0,0,'','',false, false, false, false, false);  // mPDF 4.2.032
11564     if (isset($sizesarray['IMAGE_ID'])) {
11565       $image_id = $sizesarray['IMAGE_ID'];
11566       $orig_w = $sizesarray['WIDTH']*$this->k;    // in user units i.e. mm
11567       $orig_h = $sizesarray['HEIGHT']*$this->k;   // (using $this->img_dpi)
11568       $x_repeat = true;
11569       $y_repeat = true;
11570       if (isset($properties['BACKGROUND-REPEAT'])) {
11571         if ($properties['BACKGROUND-REPEAT']=='no-repeat' || $properties['BACKGROUND-REPEAT']=='repeat-x') { $y_repeat = false; }
11572         if ($properties['BACKGROUND-REPEAT']=='no-repeat' || $properties['BACKGROUND-REPEAT']=='repeat-y') { $x_repeat = false; }
11573       }
11574       $x_pos = 0;
11575       $y_pos = 0;
11576       if (isset($properties['BACKGROUND-POSITION'])) { 
11577         $ppos = preg_split('/\s+/',$properties['BACKGROUND-POSITION']);
11578         $x_pos = $ppos[0];
11579         $y_pos = $ppos[1];
11580         if (!stristr($x_pos ,'%') ) { $x_pos = $this->ConvertSize($x_pos ,$this->pgwidth,$this->FontSize); }
11581         if (!stristr($y_pos ,'%') ) { $y_pos = $this->ConvertSize($y_pos ,$this->pgwidth,$this->FontSize); }
11582       }
11583       // mPDF 4.3.015
11584       if (isset($properties['BACKGROUND-IMAGE-RESIZE'])) { $resize = $properties['BACKGROUND-IMAGE-RESIZE']; }
11585       else { $resize = 0; }
11586       // mPDF 4.3.017
11587       if (isset($properties['BACKGROUND-IMAGE-OPACITY'])) { $opacity = $properties['BACKGROUND-IMAGE-OPACITY']; }
11588       else { $opacity = 1; }
