11589       $this->bodyBackgroundImage = array('image_id'=>$image_id, 'orig_w'=>$orig_w, 'orig_h'=>$orig_h, 'x_pos'=>$x_pos, 'y_pos'=>$y_pos, 'x_repeat'=>$x_repeat, 'y_repeat'=>$y_repeat, 'resize'=>$resize, 'opacity'=>$opacity);  // mPDF 4.3.015  4.3.017
11590     }
11591   }
11592 /*-- END BACKGROUND-IMAGES --*/
11593 /*-- CSS-PAGE --*/
11594   // mPDF 4.2
11595   // If page-box is set
11596   if ($this->state==0 && $this->CSS['@PAGE']) {
11597     $this->page_box['current'] = ''; 
11598     $this->page_box['using'] = true;
11599     // mPDF 4.2
11600     list($pborientation,$pbmgl,$pbmgr,$pbmgt,$pbmgb,$pbmgh,$pbmgf,$hname,$fname,$bg,$resetpagenum,$pagenumstyle,$suppress,$marks,$newformat) = $this->SetPagedMediaCSS('', false, 'O');
11601     $this->DefOrientation = $this->CurOrientation = $pborientation; 
11602     $this->orig_lMargin = $this->DeflMargin = $pbmgl; 
11603     $this->orig_rMargin = $this->DefrMargin = $pbmgr; 
11604     $this->orig_tMargin = $this->tMargin = $pbmgt;
11605     $this->orig_bMargin = $this->bMargin = $pbmgb;
11606     $this->orig_hMargin = $this->margin_header = $pbmgh;
11607     $this->orig_fMargin = $this->margin_footer = $pbmgf;
11608     list($pborientation,$pbmgl,$pbmgr,$pbmgt,$pbmgb,$pbmgh,$pbmgf,$hname,$fname,$bg,$resetpagenum,$pagenumstyle,$suppress,$marks,$newformat) = $this->SetPagedMediaCSS('', true, 'O');  // first page
11609     $this->show_marks = $marks;
11610     if ($hname && !preg_match('/^html_(.*)$/i',$hname)) $this->firstPageBoxHeader = $hname;
11611     if ($fname && !preg_match('/^html_(.*)$/i',$fname)) $this->firstPageBoxFooter = $fname;
11612   }
11613 /*-- END CSS-PAGE --*/
11614 
11615 
11616   if($this->state==0 && $sub!=1 && $sub!=3 && $sub!=4) {
11617     $this->AddPage($this->CurOrientation);
11618   }
11619 
11620   $parseonly = false; 
11621   $this->bufferoutput = false; 
11622   if ($sub == 3) { 
11623     $parseonly = true; 
11624     // Close any open block tags
11625     for ($b= $this->blklvl;$b>0;$b--) { $this->CloseTag($this->blk[$b]['tag']); }
11626     // Output any text left in buffer
11627     if (count($this->textbuffer)) { $this->printbuffer($this->textbuffer); }
11628     $this->textbuffer=array();
11629   } 
11630   else if ($sub == 4) { 
11631     // Close any open block tags
11632     for ($b= $this->blklvl;$b>0;$b--) { $this->CloseTag($this->blk[$b]['tag']); }
11633     // Output any text left in buffer
11634     if (count($this->textbuffer)) { $this->printbuffer($this->textbuffer); }
11635     $this->bufferoutput = true; 
11636     $this->textbuffer=array();
11637     $this->headerbuffer='';
11638     $properties = $this->MergeCSS('BLOCK','BODY','');
11639     $this->setCSS($properties,'','BODY'); 
11640   } 
11641 
11642   mb_internal_encoding('UTF-8'); 
11643 
11644   $html = $this->AdjustHTML($html,$this->directionality,$this->usepre, $this->tabSpaces); //Try to make HTML look more like XHTML
11645 
11646   if ($this->autoFontGroups) { $html = $this->AutoFont($html); }
11647 
11648 /*-- HTMLHEADERS-FOOTERS --*/
11649   preg_match_all('/<htmlpageheader([^>]*)>(.*?)<\/htmlpageheader>/si',$html,$h);
11650   for($i=0;$i<count($h[1]);$i++) {
11651     if (preg_match('/name=[\'|\"](.*?)[\'|\"]/',$h[1][$i],$n)) {
11652       // mPDF 4.0
11653       $this->pageHTMLheaders[$n[1]]['html'] = $h[2][$i]; 
11654       $this->pageHTMLheaders[$n[1]]['h'] = $this->_gethtmlheight($h[2][$i]); 
11655     }
11656   }
11657   preg_match_all('/<htmlpagefooter([^>]*)>(.*?)<\/htmlpagefooter>/si',$html,$f);
11658   for($i=0;$i<count($f[1]);$i++) {
11659     if (preg_match('/name=[\'|\"](.*?)[\'|\"]/',$f[1][$i],$n)) {
11660       // mPDF 4.0
11661       $this->pageHTMLfooters[$n[1]]['html'] = $f[2][$i]; 
11662       $this->pageHTMLfooters[$n[1]]['h'] = $this->_gethtmlheight($f[2][$i]); 
11663     }
11664   }
11665 /*-- END HTMLHEADERS-FOOTERS --*/
11666   $html = preg_replace('/<htmlpageheader.*?<\/htmlpageheader>/si','',$html);
11667   $html = preg_replace('/<htmlpagefooter.*?<\/htmlpagefooter>/si','',$html);
11668 
11669 /*-- HTMLHEADERS-FOOTERS --*/
11670 
11671   // mPDF 4.2
11672   if (isset($hname) && preg_match('/^html_(.*)$/i',$hname,$n)) $this->SetHTMLHeader($this->pageHTMLheaders[$n[1]],'O',true);
11673   if (isset($fname) && preg_match('/^html_(.*)$/i',$fname,$n)) $this->SetHTMLFooter($this->pageHTMLfooters[$n[1]],'O');
11674 
11675 /*-- END HTMLHEADERS-FOOTERS --*/
11676 
11677   $html=str_replace('<?','< ',$html); //Fix '<?XML' bug from HTML code generated by MS Word
11678   $html = $this->SubstituteChars($html);
11679 
11680   // mPDF 4.0
11681   if (preg_match("/([".$this->pregRTLchars."])/u", $html)) { $this->biDirectional = true; } // *RTL*
11682 
11683   // Don't allow non-breaking spaces that are converted to substituted chars or will break anyway and mess up table width calc.
11684   $html = str_replace('<tta>160</tta>',$this->chrs[32],$html); 
11685   $html = str_replace('</tta><tta>','|',$html); 
11686   $html = str_replace('</tts><tts>','|',$html); 
11687   $html = str_replace('</ttz><ttz>','|',$html); 
11688 
11689   //Add new supported tags in the DisableTags function
11690   $html=strip_tags($html,$this->enabledtags); //remove all unsupported tags, but the ones inside the 'enabledtags' string
11691 
11692   //Explode the string in order to parse the HTML code
11693   $a=preg_split('/<(.*?)>/ms',$html,-1,PREG_SPLIT_DELIM_CAPTURE);
11694   // ? more accurate regexp that allows e.g. <a name="Silly <name>">
11695   // if changing - also change in fn.SubstituteChars()
11696   // $a = preg_split ('/<((?:[^<>]+(?:"[^"]*"|\'[^\']*\')?)+)>/ms', $html, -1, PREG_SPLIT_DELIM_CAPTURE);
11697 
11698   if ($this->mb_enc) { 
11699     mb_internal_encoding($this->mb_enc); 
11700   }
11701   $pbc = 0; // *PROGRESS-BAR*
11702   if ($this->progressBar) { $this->UpdateProgressBar(1,0); }  // *PROGRESS-BAR*
11703 
11704   $this->subPos = 0;
11705   $cnt = count($a); // mPDF 4.2
11706   for($i=0;$i<$cnt; $i++) { // mPDF 4.2
11707     $e = $a[$i];
11708     if($i%2==0) {
11709     //TEXT
11710       if ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['hide']) { continue; }
11711 
11712       // mPDF 4.0
11713       if ($this->inFixedPosBlock) { $this->fixedPosBlock .= $e; continue; } // *CSS-POSITION*
11714       if (strlen($e) == 0) { continue; }
11715 
11716       $e = strcode2utf($e); 
11717       $e = $this->lesser_entity_decode($e);
11718 
11719 /*-- UNICODE-FONTS --*/
11720       // mPDF 4.2
11721       // mPDF 4.3.004 Not specialcontent (textarea / select)
11722       if ($this->useSubstitutionsMB && $this->is_MB && !$this->isCJK && !$this->usingCoreFont && $this->subPos<$i && !$this->specialcontent) { 
11723         $cnt += $this->SubstituteCharsMB($a, $i, $e); 
11724       }
11725 /*-- END UNICODE-FONTS --*/
11726 
11727         if (($this->directionality == 'rtl') || (($this->directionality == 'ltr') && ($this->biDirectional)))  {  // *RTL*
11728         // mPDF 4.0 Removed rtlAsArabicFarsi
11729         $e = preg_replace("/([".$this->pregRTLchars."]+)/ue", '$this->ArabJoin(stripslashes(\'\\1\'))', $e);  // *RTL*
11730       } // *RTL*
11731 
11732       // mPDF 4.0 Font-specific ligature substitution for Indic fonts
11733       $this->ConvertIndic($e);  // *INDIC*
11734 
11735       // CONVERT CODEPAGE
11736       if (!$this->is_MB) { $e = mb_convert_encoding($e,$this->mb_enc,'UTF-8'); }
11737 /*-- UNICODE-FONTS --*/
11738       if (($this->is_MB && !$this->isCJK) && (!$this->usingCoreFont)) {
11739         if ($this->toupper) { $e = mb_strtoupper($e,$this->mb_enc); }
11740         if ($this->tolower) { $e = mb_strtolower($e,$this->mb_enc); }
11741       }
11742       else
11743 /*-- END UNICODE-FONTS --*/
11744       if (!$this->isCJK) {
11745         if ($this->toupper) { $e = strtoupper($e); }
11746         if ($this->tolower) { $e = strtolower($e); }
11747       }
11748       if (($this->tts) || ($this->ttz) || ($this->tta)) {
11749         $es = explode('|',$e);
11750         $e = '';
11751         foreach($es AS $val) {
11752           $e .= $this->chrs[$val];
11753         }
11754       }
11755       //Adjust lineheight
11756           //$this->SetLineHeight($this->FontSizePt); //should be inside printbuffer? // does nothing
11757 
11758 /*-- FORMS --*/
11759       //  FORM ELEMENTS
11760         if ($this->specialcontent) {
11761          //SELECT tag (form element)
11762          if ($this->specialcontent == "type=select") { 
11763         $e = ltrim($e); 
11764         $stringwidth = $this->GetStringWidth($e);
11765         if (!isset($this->selectoption['MAXWIDTH']) || $stringwidth > $this->selectoption['MAXWIDTH']) { $this->selectoption['MAXWIDTH'] = $stringwidth; }
11766         if (!isset($this->selectoption['SELECTED']) || $this->selectoption['SELECTED'] == '') { $this->selectoption['SELECTED'] = $e; }
11767         // mPDD 1.4 Active Forms
11768         if (isset($this->selectoption['ACTIVE']) && $this->selectoption['ACTIVE']) {
11769           $this->selectoption['ITEMS'][]=array('exportValue'=>$this->selectoption['currentVAL'], 'content'=>$e, 'selected'=>$this->selectoption['currentSEL']);
11770         }
11771          }
11772          // TEXTAREA
11773          else { 
11774         $objattr = unserialize($this->specialcontent);
11775         $objattr['text'] = $e;
11776         $te = "\xbb\xa4\xactype=textarea,objattr=".serialize($objattr)."\xbb\xa4\xac";
11777         if ($this->tdbegin) {
11778             $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['textbuffer'][] = array($te,$this->HREF,$this->currentfontstyle,$this->colorarray,$this->currentfontfamily,$this->SUP,$this->SUB,'',$this->strike,$this->outlineparam,$this->spanbgcolorarray,$this->currentfontsize,$this->ReqFontStyle);
11779         }
11780         else {
11781           $this->textbuffer[] = array($te,$this->HREF,$this->currentfontstyle,$this->colorarray,$this->currentfontfamily,$this->SUP,$this->SUB,'',$this->strike,$this->outlineparam,$this->spanbgcolorarray,$this->currentfontsize,$this->ReqFontStyle); 
11782         }
11783          }
11784           }
11785 /*-- END FORMS --*/
11786 
11787       // TABLE
11788 /*-- TABLES --*/
11789       else if ($this->tableLevel) {
11790         if ($this->tdbegin) {
11791                if (($this->ignorefollowingspaces) and !$this->ispre) { $e = ltrim($e); }
11792            if ($e || $e==='0') {
11793           // mPDF 3.0
11794               if (($this->blockjustfinished || $this->listjustfinished) && $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s']>0) {
11795               $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['textbuffer'][] = array("\n",$this->HREF,$this->currentfontstyle,$this->colorarray,$this->currentfontfamily,$this->SUP,$this->SUB,'',$this->strike,$this->outlineparam,$this->spanbgcolorarray,$this->currentfontsize,$this->ReqFontStyle);
11796               $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['text'][] = "\n";
11797             if (!isset($this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['maxs'])) {
11798               $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['maxs'] = $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s']; 
11799             }
11800             elseif($this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['maxs'] < $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s']) {
11801               $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['maxs'] = $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s'];  
11802             }
11803             $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s'] = 0;// reset
11804               }
11805           // mPDF 3.0
11806           $this->blockjustfinished=false;
11807           $this->listjustfinished=false;
11808 
11809             $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['textbuffer'][] = array($e,$this->HREF,$this->currentfontstyle,$this->colorarray,$this->currentfontfamily,$this->SUP,$this->SUB,'',$this->strike,$this->outlineparam,$this->spanbgcolorarray,$this->currentfontsize,$this->ReqFontStyle);
11810             $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['text'][] = $e;
11811                   if (!isset($this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['R']) || !$this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['R']) {
11812             if (isset($this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s'])) { 
11813               $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s'] += $this->GetStringWidth($e); 
11814             }
11815             else { $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s'] = $this->GetStringWidth($e); }
11816           }
11817           if ($this->tableLevel==1 && $this->useGraphs) { 
11818             $this->graphs[$this->currentGraphId]['data'][$this->row][$this->col] = $e;
11819           }
11820           $this->nestedtablejustfinished = false;
11821           // mPDF 3.0
11822           $this->linebreakjustfinished=false;
11823            }
11824         }
11825       }
11826 /*-- END TABLES --*/
11827       // ALL ELSE
11828       else {
11829             if ($this->ignorefollowingspaces and !$this->ispre) { $e = ltrim($e); }
11830         if ($e || $e==='0') $this->textbuffer[] = array($e,$this->HREF,$this->currentfontstyle,$this->colorarray,$this->currentfontfamily,$this->SUP,$this->SUB,'',$this->strike,$this->outlineparam,$this->spanbgcolorarray,$this->currentfontsize,$this->ReqFontStyle); 
11831       }
11832     }
11833 
11834 
11835     else { // TAG **
11836        // mPDF 4.0
11837        if(substr($e,0,1)=='/') { // END TAG
11838 /*-- PROGRESS-BAR --*/
11839       // mPDF 4.2 Progress bar
11840       if ($this->progressBar) {   // 10% increments
11841         if (intval($i*10/$cnt) != $pbc) { $pbc = intval($i*10/$cnt); $this->UpdateProgressBar(1,$pbc*10,$tag); }
11842       }
11843 /*-- END PROGRESS-BAR --*/
11844 
11845         // Check for tags where HTML specifies optional end tags,
11846             // and/or does not allow nesting e.g. P inside P, or 
11847         $endtag = strtoupper(substr($e,1));
11848       // mPDF 4.0
11849         if($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['hide']) { 
11850       if (in_array($endtag, $this->outerblocktags) || in_array($endtag, $this->innerblocktags)) { 
11851         unset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]);
11852         $this->blklvl--; 
11853       }
11854       continue; 
11855         }
11856 
11857 /*-- CSS-POSITION --*/
11858         if ($this->inFixedPosBlock) { 
11859       if (in_array($endtag, $this->outerblocktags) || in_array($endtag, $this->innerblocktags)) { $this->fixedPosBlockDepth--; }
11860       if ($this->fixedPosBlockDepth == 0) { 
11861         $this->fixedPosBlockSave[] = array($this->fixedPosBlock, $this->fixedPosBlockBBox, $this->page);
11862         $this->fixedPosBlock = '';
11863         $this->inFixedPosBlock = false;
11864         continue; 
11865       }
11866       $this->fixedPosBlock .= '<'.$e.'>'; 
11867       continue; 
11868         }
11869 /*-- END CSS-POSITION --*/
11870         if ($this->allow_html_optional_endtags && !$parseonly) {
11871       if (($endtag == 'DIV' || $endtag =='FORM' || $endtag =='CENTER') && $this->lastoptionaltag == 'P') { $this->CloseTag($this->lastoptionaltag ); }
11872       if ($this->lastoptionaltag == 'LI' && $endtag == 'OL') { $this->CloseTag($this->lastoptionaltag ); }
11873       if ($this->lastoptionaltag == 'LI' && $endtag == 'UL') { $this->CloseTag($this->lastoptionaltag ); }
11874       if ($this->lastoptionaltag == 'DD' && $endtag == 'DL') { $this->CloseTag($this->lastoptionaltag ); }
11875       if ($this->lastoptionaltag == 'DT' && $endtag == 'DL') { $this->CloseTag($this->lastoptionaltag ); }
11876       if ($this->lastoptionaltag == 'OPTION' && $endtag == 'SELECT') { $this->CloseTag($this->lastoptionaltag ); }
11877 /*-- TABLES --*/
11878       if ($endtag == 'TABLE') {
11879         if ($this->lastoptionaltag == 'THEAD' || $this->lastoptionaltag == 'TBODY' || $this->lastoptionaltag == 'TFOOT') { 
11880           $this->CloseTag($this->lastoptionaltag);
11881         }
11882         if ($this->lastoptionaltag == 'TR') { $this->CloseTag('TR'); }
11883         if ($this->lastoptionaltag == 'TD' || $this->lastoptionaltag == 'TH') { $this->CloseTag($this->lastoptionaltag ); $this->CloseTag('TR'); }
11884       }
11885       if ($endtag == 'THEAD' || $endtag == 'TBODY' || $endtag == 'TFOOT') { 
11886         if ($this->lastoptionaltag == 'TR') { $this->CloseTag('TR'); }
11887         if ($this->lastoptionaltag == 'TD' || $this->lastoptionaltag == 'TH') { $this->CloseTag($this->lastoptionaltag ); $this->CloseTag('TR'); }
11888       }
11889       if ($endtag == 'TR') {
11890         if ($this->lastoptionaltag == 'TD' || $this->lastoptionaltag == 'TH') { $this->CloseTag($this->lastoptionaltag ); }
11891       }
11892 /*-- END TABLES --*/
11893         }
11894         $this->CloseTag($endtag); 
11895        }
11896 
11897        else { // OPENING TAG
11898       if($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['hide']) { 
11899         if (strpos($e,' ')) { $te = strtoupper(substr($e,0,strpos($e,' '))); }
11900         else { $te = strtoupper($e); } 
11901         if (in_array($te, $this->outerblocktags) || in_array($te, $this->innerblocktags)) { 
11902           $this->blklvl++;  
11903           $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['hide']=true;
11904         }
11905         continue; 
11906       }
11907 
11908 /*-- CSS-POSITION --*/
11909       if ($this->inFixedPosBlock) { 
11910         if (strpos($e,' ')) { $te = strtoupper(substr($e,0,strpos($e,' '))); }
11911         else { $te = strtoupper($e); } 
11912         $this->fixedPosBlock .= '<'.$e.'>'; 
11913         if (in_array($te, $this->outerblocktags) || in_array($te, $this->innerblocktags)) { $this->fixedPosBlockDepth++; }
11914         continue; 
11915       }
11916 /*-- END CSS-POSITION --*/
11917       $regexp = '|=\'(.*?)\'|s'; // eliminate single quotes, if any
11918           $e = preg_replace($regexp,"=\"\$1\"",$e);
11919       // changes anykey=anyvalue to anykey="anyvalue" (only do this inside tags)
11920       if (substr($e,0,10)!='pageheader' && substr($e,0,10)!='pagefooter') {
11921         $regexp = '| (\\w+?)=([^\\s>"]+)|si'; 
11922             $e = preg_replace($regexp," \$1=\"\$2\"",$e);
11923       }
11924 
11925           //Fix path values, if needed
11926       $orig_srcpath = ''; // mPDF 4.2.029
11927       if ((stristr($e,"href=") !== false) or (stristr($e,"src=") !== false) ) {
11928         $regexp = '/ (href|src)="(.*?)"/i';
11929         preg_match($regexp,$e,$auxiliararray);
11930         if (isset($auxiliararray[2])) { $path = $auxiliararray[2]; }
11931         else { $path = ''; }
11932         // mPDF 4.2  Special case for img src="var:varname" - leave unchanged
11933         // mPDF 3.0
11934         if (trim($path) != '' && !(stristr($e,"src=") !== false && substr($path,0,4)=='var:')) { 
11935           $orig_srcpath = $path; // mPDF 4.2.029
11936           $this->GetFullPath($path); // mPDF 4.0
11937           $regexp = '/ (href|src)="(.*?)"/i';
11938           $e = preg_replace($regexp,' \\1="'.$path.'"',$e);
11939         }
11940       }//END of Fix path values
11941 
11942 
11943       //Extract attributes
11944       $contents=array();
11945       // mPDF 3.0 - Tiling Patterns
11946       // Changed to allow style="background: url('bg.jpg')"
11947       preg_match_all('/\\S*=["][^"]*["]/',$e,$contents1);
11948       preg_match_all('/\\S*=[\'][^\']*[\']/',$e,$contents2);
11949       $contents = array_merge($contents1, $contents2);
11950       preg_match('/\\S+/',$e,$a2);
11951       $tag=strtoupper($a2[0]);
11952       $attr=array();
11953       if ($orig_srcpath) { $attr['ORIG_SRC'] = $orig_srcpath; } // mPDF 4.2.029
11954       if (!empty($contents)) {
11955         foreach($contents[0] as $v) {
11956           // mPDF 3.0 - Tiling Patterns
11957           // Changed to allow style="background: url('bg.jpg')"
11958           if(preg_match('/^([^=]*)=["]?([^"]*)["]?$/',$v,$a3) || preg_match('/^([^=]*)=[\']?([^\']*)[\']?$/',$v,$a3)) {
11959             if (strtoupper($a3[1])=='ID' || strtoupper($a3[1])=='CLASS') {  // 4.2.013 Omits STYLE
11960                 $attr[strtoupper($a3[1])]=trim(strtoupper($a3[2]));
11961             }
11962             // includes header-style-right etc. used for <pageheader>
11963             else if (preg_match('/^(HEADER|FOOTER)-STYLE/i',$a3[1])) {
11964                 $attr[strtoupper($a3[1])]=trim(strtoupper($a3[2]));
11965             }
11966             else {
11967                   $attr[strtoupper($a3[1])]=trim($a3[2]);
11968             }
11969               }
11970           }
11971       }
11972       $this->OpenTag($tag,$attr);
11973 /*-- CSS-POSITION --*/
11974       // mPDF 4.0 Fixed Pos block
11975       if ($this->inFixedPosBlock) { 
11976         $this->fixedPosBlockBBox = array($tag,$attr, $this->x, $this->y); 
11977         $this->fixedPosBlock = ''; 
11978         $this->fixedPosBlockDepth = 1; 
11979       }
11980 /*-- END CSS-POSITION --*/
11981        }
11982 
11983     } // end TAG
11984   } //end of  foreach($a as $i=>$e)
11985 
11986   if ($close) {
11987 
11988     // Close any open block tags
11989     for ($b= $this->blklvl;$b>0;$b--) { $this->CloseTag($this->blk[$b]['tag']); }
11990 
11991     // Output any text left in buffer
11992     if (count($this->textbuffer) && !$parseonly) { $this->printbuffer($this->textbuffer); }
11993     if (!$parseonly) $this->textbuffer=array();
11994 
11995 /*-- CSS-FLOAT --*/
11996     // If ended with a float, need to move to end page
11997     $currpos = $this->page*1000 + $this->y;
11998     if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['float_endpos']) && $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['float_endpos'] > $currpos) {
11999       $old_page = $this->page;
12000       $new_page = intval($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['float_endpos'] /1000);
12001       if ($old_page != $new_page) {
12002         $s = $this->PrintPageBackgrounds();
12003         // Writes after the marker so not overwritten later by page background etc.
12004         $this->pages[$this->page] = preg_replace('/(___BACKGROUND___PATTERNS'.date('jY').')/', '\\1'."\n".$s."\n", $this->pages[$this->page]);
12005         $this->pageBackgrounds = array();
12006         $this->page = $new_page;
12007         $this->ResetMargins();
12008         $this->Reset();
12009         $this->pageoutput[$this->page] = array();
12010       }
12011       $this->y = (($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['float_endpos'] *1000) % 1000000)/1000;  // mod changes operands to integers before processing
12012     }
12013 /*-- END CSS-FLOAT --*/
12014 
12015 /*-- CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT --*/
12016     $this->printfloatbuffer();
12017 /*-- END CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT --*/
12018 
12019     //Create Internal Links, if needed
12020     if (!empty($this->internallink) ) {
12021       foreach($this->internallink as $k=>$v) {
12022         if (strpos($k,"#") !== false ) { continue; } //ignore
12023         $ypos = $v['Y'];
12024         $pagenum = $v['PAGE'];
12025         $sharp = "#";
12026         while (array_key_exists($sharp.$k,$this->internallink)) {
12027           $internallink = $this->internallink[$sharp.$k];
12028           $this->SetLink($internallink,$ypos,$pagenum);
12029           $sharp .= "#";
12030         }
12031       }
12032     }
12033 
12034     $this->linemaxfontsize = '';
12035     $this->lineheight_correction = $this->default_lineheight_correction;
12036 
12037     $this->bufferoutput = false; 
12038 
12039 /*-- CSS-POSITION --*/
12040     // mPDF 4.0 Fixed Pos block
12041     if (count($this->fixedPosBlockSave) && $sub != 4) {
12042       foreach($this->fixedPosBlockSave AS $fpbs) {
12043       $old_page = $this->page;
12044       $this->page = $fpbs[2];
12045       $this->WriteFixedPosHTML($fpbs[0], 0, 0, 100, 100,'auto', $fpbs[1]);  // 0,0,10,10 are overwritten by bbox
12046       $this->page = $old_page;
12047       }
12048     }
12049 /*-- END CSS-POSITION --*/
12050 
12051   }
12052 }
12053 
12054 /*-- CSS-POSITION --*/
12055 // mPDF 4.0
12056 function WriteFixedPosHTML($html='',$x, $y, $w, $h, $overflow='visible', $bounding=array()) {
12057   // $overflow can be 'hidden', 'visible' or 'auto' - 'auto' causes autofit to size
12058   // Annotations disabled
12059   // Links do work
12060   // Will always go on current page (or start Page 1 if required)
12061   // Probably INCOMPATIBLE WITH keep with table, columns etc.
12062   // Called externally or interally via <div style="position: [fixed|absolute]">
12063   // When used internally, $x $y $w $h and $overflow are all overridden by $bounding
12064 
12065   $overflow = strtolower($overflow);
12066   if($this->state==0) { 
12067     $this->AddPage($this->CurOrientation);
12068   }
12069   $save_y = $this->y;
12070   $save_x = $this->x;
12071   // mPDF 4.1   // Allows Image in fixedposdiv to be full height
12072   $this->fullImageHeight = $this->h;
12073   $save_cols = false;
12074 /*-- COLUMNS --*/
12075   if ($this->ColActive) {
12076     $save_cols = true;
12077     $save_nbcol = $this->NbCol; // other values of gap and vAlign will not change by setting Columns off
12078     $this->SetColumns(0);
12079   }
12080 /*-- END COLUMNS --*/
12081   $save_annots = $this->title2annots; // *ANNOTATIONS*
12082   $this->writingHTMLheader = true;  // a FIX to stop pagebreaks etc.
12083   $this->writingHTMLfooter = true;
12084   $this->InFooter = true; // suppresses autopagebreaks
12085   $save_bgs = $this->pageBackgrounds;
12086   $checkinnerhtml = preg_replace('/\s/','',$html);  // mPDF 4.2
12087 
12088   if ($w > $this->w) { $x = 0; $w = $this->w; }
12089   if ($h > $this->h) { $y = 0; $h = $this->h; }
12090   if ($x > $this->w) { $x = $this->w - $w; }
12091   if ($y > $this->h) { $y = $this->h - $h; }
12092 
12093   if (!empty($bounding)) {  
12094     // $cont_ containing block = full physical page (position: absolute) or page inside margins (position: fixed)
12095     // $bbox_ Bounding box is the <div> which is positioned absolutely/fixed 
12096     // top/left/right/bottom/width/height/background*/border*/padding*/margin* are taken from bounding
12097     // font*[family/size/style/weight]/line-height/text*[align/decoration/transform/indent]/color are transferred to $inner
12098     // as an enclosing <div> (after having checked ID/CLASS)
12099     // $x, $y, $w, $h are inside of $bbox_ = containing box for $inner_
12100     // $inner_ InnerHTML is the contents of that block to be output 
12101     $tag = $bounding[0];
12102     $attr = $bounding[1];
12103 
12104     $orig_x0 = $bounding[2];
12105     $orig_y0 = $bounding[3];
12106 
12107     // As in WriteHTML() initialising
12108     $this->blklvl = 0;
12109     $this->lastblocklevelchange = 0;
12110     $this->blk = array();
12111     $this->initialiseBlock($this->blk[0]);
12112 
12113     $this->blk[0]['width'] =& $this->pgwidth;
12114     $this->blk[0]['inner_width'] =& $this->pgwidth;
12115 
12116     $this->blk[0]['blockContext'] = $this->blockContext;
12117 
12118     $properties = $this->MergeCSS('BLOCK','BODY','');
12119     $this->setCSS($properties,'','BODY'); 
12120     $this->blklvl = 1;
12121     $this->initialiseBlock($this->blk[1]);
12122     $this->blk[1]['tag'] = $tag;
12123     $this->blk[1]['attr'] = $attr;
12124 
12125     $this->Reset();
12126     $p = $this->MergeCSS('BLOCK',$tag,$attr);
12127     if (isset($p['OVERFLOW'])) { $overflow = strtolower($p['OVERFLOW']); }
12128     if (strtolower($p['POSITION']) == 'fixed') {
12129       $cont_w = $this->pgwidth; // $this->blk[0]['inner_width'];
12130       $cont_h = $this->h - $this->tMargin - $this->bMargin;
12131       $cont_x = $this->lMargin;
12132       $cont_y = $this->tMargin;
12133     }
12134     else {
12135       $cont_w = $this->w; // ABSOLUTE;
12136       $cont_h = $this->h;
12137       $cont_x = 0;
12138       $cont_y = 0;
12139     }
12140 
12141     // Pass on in-line properties to the innerhtml
12142     $css = '';
12143     if (isset($p['TEXT-ALIGN'])) { $css .= 'text-align: '.strtolower($p['TEXT-ALIGN']).'; '; }
12144     if (isset($p['TEXT-TRANSFORM'])) { $css .= 'text-transform: '.strtolower($p['TEXT-TRANSFORM']).'; '; }
12145     if (isset($p['TEXT-INDENT'])) { $css .= 'text-indent: '.strtolower($p['TEXT-INDENT']).'; '; }
12146     if (isset($p['TEXT-DECORATION'])) { $css .= 'text-decoration: '.strtolower($p['TEXT-DECORATION']).'; '; }
12147     if (isset($p['FONT-FAMILY'])) { $css .= 'font-family: '.strtolower($p['FONT-FAMILY']).'; '; }
12148     if (isset($p['FONT-STYLE'])) { $css .= 'font-style: '.strtolower($p['FONT-STYLE']).'; '; }
12149     if (isset($p['FONT-WEIGHT'])) { $css .= 'font-weight: '.strtolower($p['FONT-WEIGHT']).'; '; }
12150     if (isset($p['FONT-SIZE'])) { $css .= 'font-size: '.strtolower($p['FONT-SIZE']).'; '; }
12151     if (isset($p['LINE-HEIGHT'])) { $css .= 'line-height: '.strtolower($p['LINE-HEIGHT']).'; '; }
12152     if (isset($p['COLOR'])) { $css .= 'color: '.strtolower($p['COLOR']).'; '; }
12153     if ($css) {
12154       $html = '<div style="'.$css.'">'.$html.'</div>';
12155     }
12156 
12157     // Copy over (only) the properties to set for border and background
12158     $pb = array();
12159     $pb['MARGIN-TOP'] = $p['MARGIN-TOP']; 
12160     $pb['MARGIN-RIGHT'] = $p['MARGIN-RIGHT']; 
12161     $pb['MARGIN-BOTTOM'] = $p['MARGIN-BOTTOM']; 
12162     $pb['MARGIN-LEFT'] = $p['MARGIN-LEFT']; 
12163     $pb['PADDING-TOP'] = $p['PADDING-TOP']; 
12164     $pb['PADDING-RIGHT'] = $p['PADDING-RIGHT']; 
12165     $pb['PADDING-BOTTOM'] = $p['PADDING-BOTTOM']; 
12166     $pb['PADDING-LEFT'] = $p['PADDING-LEFT']; 
12167     $pb['BORDER-TOP'] = $p['BORDER-TOP']; 
12168     $pb['BORDER-RIGHT'] = $p['BORDER-RIGHT']; 
12169     $pb['BORDER-BOTTOM'] = $p['BORDER-BOTTOM']; 
12170     $pb['BORDER-LEFT'] = $p['BORDER-LEFT']; 
12171     if (isset($p['BACKGROUND-COLOR'])) { $pb['BACKGROUND-COLOR'] = $p['BACKGROUND-COLOR']; }
12172     if (isset($p['BACKGROUND-IMAGE'])) { $pb['BACKGROUND-IMAGE'] = $p['BACKGROUND-IMAGE']; }  // *BACKGROUND-IMAGES*
12173     // mPDF 4.3.015
12174     if (isset($p['BACKGROUND-IMAGE-RESIZE'])) { $pb['BACKGROUND-IMAGE-RESIZE'] = $p['BACKGROUND-IMAGE-RESIZE']; } // *BACKGROUND-IMAGES*
12175     // mPDF 4.3.017
12176     if (isset($p['BACKGROUND-IMAGE-OPACITY'])) { $pb['BACKGROUND-IMAGE-OPACITY'] = $p['BACKGROUND-IMAGE-OPACITY']; }  // *BACKGROUND-IMAGES*
12177     if (isset($p['BACKGROUND-REPEAT'])) { $pb['BACKGROUND-REPEAT'] = $p['BACKGROUND-REPEAT']; } // *BACKGROUND-IMAGES*
12178     if (isset($p['BACKGROUND-POSITION'])) { $pb['BACKGROUND-POSITION'] = $p['BACKGROUND-POSITION']; } // *BACKGROUND-IMAGES*
12179     if (isset($p['BACKGROUND-GRADIENT'])) { $pb['BACKGROUND-GRADIENT'] = $p['BACKGROUND-GRADIENT']; } // *GRADIENTS*
12180 
12181     $this->setCSS($pb,'BLOCK',$tag);
12182     //================================================================
12183     $bbox_dir = $p['DIR']; 
12184     $bbox_br = $this->blk[1]['border_right']['w'];
12185     $bbox_bl = $this->blk[1]['border_left']['w'];
12186     $bbox_bt = $this->blk[1]['border_top']['w'];
12187     $bbox_bb = $this->blk[1]['border_bottom']['w'];
12188     $bbox_pr = $this->blk[1]['padding_right'];
12189     $bbox_pl = $this->blk[1]['padding_left'];
12190     $bbox_pt = $this->blk[1]['padding_top'];
12191     $bbox_pb = $this->blk[1]['padding_bottom'];
12192     $bbox_mr = $this->blk[1]['margin_right'];
12193     if (strtolower($p['MARGIN-RIGHT'])=='auto') { $bbox_mr = 'auto'; }
12194     $bbox_ml = $this->blk[1]['margin_left'];
12195     if (strtolower($p['MARGIN-LEFT'])=='auto') { $bbox_ml = 'auto'; }
12196     $bbox_mt = $this->blk[1]['margin_top'];
12197     if (strtolower($p['MARGIN-TOP'])=='auto') { $bbox_mt = 'auto'; }
12198     $bbox_mb = $this->blk[1]['margin_bottom'];
12199     if (strtolower($p['MARGIN-BOTTOM'])=='auto') { $bbox_mb = 'auto'; }
12200     if (isset($p['LEFT']) && strtolower($p['LEFT'])!='auto') { $bbox_left = $this->ConvertSize($p['LEFT'], $cont_w, $this->FontSize,false); }
12201     else { $bbox_left = 'auto'; }
12202     if (isset($p['TOP']) && strtolower($p['TOP'])!='auto') { $bbox_top = $this->ConvertSize($p['TOP'], $cont_h, $this->FontSize,false); }
12203     else { $bbox_top = 'auto'; }
12204     if (isset($p['RIGHT']) && strtolower($p['RIGHT'])!='auto') { $bbox_right = $this->ConvertSize($p['RIGHT'], $cont_w, $this->FontSize,false); }
12205     else { $bbox_right = 'auto'; }
12206     if (isset($p['BOTTOM']) && strtolower($p['BOTTOM'])!='auto') { $bbox_bottom = $this->ConvertSize($p['BOTTOM'], $cont_h, $this->FontSize,false); }
12207     else { $bbox_bottom = 'auto'; }
12208     if (isset($p['WIDTH']) && strtolower($p['WIDTH'])!='auto') { $inner_w = $this->ConvertSize($p['WIDTH'], $cont_w, $this->FontSize,false); }
12209     else { $inner_w = 'auto'; }
12210     if (isset($p['HEIGHT']) && strtolower($p['HEIGHT'])!='auto') { $inner_h = $this->ConvertSize($p['HEIGHT'], $cont_h, $this->FontSize,false); }
12211     else { $inner_h = 'auto'; }
12212     //================================================================
12213     // mPDF 4.2
12214     if ($checkinnerhtml=='' && $inner_h==='auto') { $inner_h = 0.0001; }
12215     if ($checkinnerhtml=='' && $inner_w==='auto') { $inner_w = $this->GetStringWidth('WW'); }
12216     //================================================================
12217     // Algorithm from CSS2.1  See http://www.w3.org/TR/CSS21/visudet.html#abs-non-replaced-height
12218     if ($bbox_top==='auto' && $inner_h==='auto' && $bbox_bottom==='auto') {
12219       if ($bbox_mt==='auto') { $bbox_mt = 0; }
12220       if ($bbox_mb==='auto') { $bbox_mb = 0; }
12221       $bbox_top = $orig_y0 - $bbox_mt - $cont_y;
12222       // solve for $bbox_bottom when content_h known - $inner_h=='auto' && $bbox_bottom=='auto'
12223     }
12224     else if ($bbox_top!=='auto' && $inner_h!=='auto' && $bbox_bottom!=='auto') {
12225       if ($bbox_mt==='auto' && $bbox_mb==='auto') {
12226         $x = $cont_h - $bbox_top - $bbox_bt - $bbox_pt - $inner_h - $bbox_pb - $bbox_bb - $bbox_bottom;
12227         $bbox_mt = $bbox_mb = ($x/2);
12228       }
12229       else if ($bbox_mt==='auto') {
12230         $bbox_mt = $cont_h - $bbox_top - $bbox_bt - $bbox_pt - $inner_h - $bbox_pb - $bbox_bb - $bbox_mb - $bbox_bottom;
12231       }
12232       else if ($bbox_mb==='auto') {
12233         $bbox_mb = $cont_h - $bbox_top - $bbox_mt - $bbox_bt - $bbox_pt - $inner_h - $bbox_pb - $bbox_bb - $bbox_bottom;
12234       }
12235       else {
12236         $bbox_bottom = $cont_h - $bbox_top - $bbox_mt - $bbox_bt - $bbox_pt - $inner_h - $bbox_pb - $bbox_bb - $bbox_mt;
12237       }
12238     }
12239     else {
12240       if ($bbox_mt==='auto') { $bbox_mt = 0; }
12241       if ($bbox_mb==='auto') { $bbox_mb = 0; }
12242       if ($bbox_top==='auto' && $inner_h==='auto' && $bbox_bottom!=='auto') {
12243       // solve for $bbox_top when content_h known - $inner_h=='auto' && $bbox_top =='auto'
12244       }
12245       else if ($bbox_top==='auto' && $bbox_bottom==='auto' && $inner_h!=='auto') {
12246       $bbox_top = $orig_y0 - $bbox_mt - $cont_y;
12247       $bbox_bottom = $cont_h - $bbox_top - $bbox_mt - $bbox_bt - $bbox_pt - $inner_h - $bbox_pb - $bbox_bb - $bbox_mt;
12248       }
12249       else if ($inner_h==='auto' && $bbox_bottom==='auto' && $bbox_top!=='auto') {
12250       // solve for $bbox_bottom when content_h known - $inner_h=='auto' && $bbox_bottom=='auto'
12251       }
12252       else if ($bbox_top==='auto' && $inner_h!=='auto' && $bbox_bottom!=='auto') {
12253       $bbox_top = $cont_h - $bbox_mt - $bbox_bt - $bbox_pt - $inner_h - $bbox_pb - $bbox_bb - $bbox_mt - $bbox_bottom;
12254       }
12255       else if ($inner_h==='auto' && $bbox_top!=='auto' && $bbox_bottom!=='auto') {
12256       $inner_h = $cont_h - $bbox_top - $bbox_mt - $bbox_bt - $bbox_pt - $bbox_pb - $bbox_bb - $bbox_mt - $bbox_bottom;
12257       }
12258       else if ($bbox_bottom==='auto' && $bbox_top!=='auto' && $inner_h!=='auto') {
12259       $bbox_bottom = $cont_h - $bbox_top - $bbox_mt - $bbox_bt - $bbox_pt - $inner_h - $bbox_pb - $bbox_bb - $bbox_mt;
12260       }
12261     }
12262 
12263     // THEN DO SAME FOR WIDTH
12264     // http://www.w3.org/TR/CSS21/visudet.html#abs-non-replaced-width
12265     if ($bbox_left==='auto' && $inner_w==='auto' && $bbox_right==='auto') {
12266       if ($bbox_ml==='auto') { $bbox_ml = 0; }
12267       if ($bbox_mr==='auto') { $bbox_mr = 0; }
12268       // IF containing element RTL, should set $bbox_right
12269       $bbox_left = $orig_x0 - $bbox_ml - $cont_x;
12270       // solve for $bbox_right when content_w known - $inner_w=='auto' && $bbox_right=='auto'
12271     }
12272     else if ($bbox_left!=='auto' && $inner_w!=='auto' && $bbox_right!=='auto') {
12273       if ($bbox_ml==='auto' && $bbox_mr==='auto') {
12274         $x = $cont_w - $bbox_left - $bbox_bl - $bbox_pl - $inner_w - $bbox_pr - $bbox_br - $bbox_right;
12275         $bbox_ml = $bbox_mr = ($x/2);
12276       }
12277       else if ($bbox_ml==='auto') {
12278         $bbox_ml = $cont_w - $bbox_left - $bbox_bl - $bbox_pl - $inner_w - $bbox_pr - $bbox_br - $bbox_mr - $bbox_right;
12279       }
12280       else if ($bbox_mr==='auto') {
12281         $bbox_mr = $cont_w - $bbox_left - $bbox_ml - $bbox_bl - $bbox_pl - $inner_w - $bbox_pr - $bbox_br - $bbox_right;
12282       }
12283       else {
12284         $bbox_right = $cont_w - $bbox_left - $bbox_ml - $bbox_bl - $bbox_pl - $inner_w - $bbox_pr - $bbox_br - $bbox_ml;
12285       }
12286     }
12287     else {
12288       if ($bbox_ml==='auto') { $bbox_ml = 0; }
12289       if ($bbox_mr==='auto') { $bbox_mr = 0; }
12290       if ($bbox_left==='auto' && $inner_w==='auto' && $bbox_right!=='auto') {
12291       // solve for $bbox_left when content_w known - $inner_w=='auto' && $bbox_left =='auto'
12292       }
12293       else if ($bbox_left==='auto' && $bbox_right==='auto' && $inner_w!=='auto') {
12294       // IF containing element RTL, should set $bbox_right
12295       $bbox_left = $orig_x0 - $bbox_ml - $cont_x;
12296       $bbox_right = $cont_w - $bbox_left - $bbox_ml - $bbox_bl - $bbox_pl - $inner_w - $bbox_pr - $bbox_br - $bbox_ml;
12297       }
12298       else if ($inner_w==='auto' && $bbox_right==='auto' && $bbox_left!=='auto') {
12299       // solve for $bbox_right when content_w known - $inner_w=='auto' && $bbox_right=='auto'
12300       }
12301       else if ($bbox_left==='auto' && $inner_w!=='auto' && $bbox_right!=='auto') {
12302       $bbox_left = $cont_w - $bbox_ml - $bbox_bl - $bbox_pl - $inner_w - $bbox_pr - $bbox_br - $bbox_ml - $bbox_right;
12303       }
12304       else if ($inner_w==='auto' && $bbox_left!=='auto' && $bbox_right!=='auto') {
12305       $inner_w = $cont_w - $bbox_left - $bbox_ml - $bbox_bl - $bbox_pl - $bbox_pr - $bbox_br - $bbox_ml - $bbox_right;
12306       }
12307       else if ($bbox_right==='auto' && $bbox_left!=='auto' && $inner_w!=='auto') {
12308       $bbox_right = $cont_w - $bbox_left - $bbox_ml - $bbox_bl - $bbox_pl - $inner_w - $bbox_pr - $bbox_br - $bbox_ml;
12309       }
12310     }
12311 
12312     //================================================================
12313     //================================================================
12314 /*-- BACKGROUND-IMAGES --*/
12315     if (isset($pb['BACKGROUND-IMAGE']) && $pb['BACKGROUND-IMAGE']) {  // mPDF 4.3.011
12316       $file = $pb['BACKGROUND-IMAGE'];
12317       $sizesarray = $this->Image($file,0,0,0,0,'','',false, false, false, false, false);  // mPDF 4.3.012D
12318       if (isset($sizesarray['IMAGE_ID'])) {
12319         $image_id = $sizesarray['IMAGE_ID'];
12320         $orig_w = $sizesarray['WIDTH']*$this->k;    // in user units i.e. mm
12321         $orig_h = $sizesarray['HEIGHT']*$this->k;   // (using $this->img_dpi)
12322         $x_repeat = true;
12323         $y_repeat = true;
12324         if (isset($pb['BACKGROUND-REPEAT'])) {
12325           if ($pb['BACKGROUND-REPEAT']=='no-repeat' || $pb['BACKGROUND-REPEAT']=='repeat-x') { $y_repeat = false; }
12326           if ($pb['BACKGROUND-REPEAT']=='no-repeat' || $pb['BACKGROUND-REPEAT']=='repeat-y') { $x_repeat = false; }
12327         }
12328         $x_pos = 0;
12329         $y_pos = 0;
12330         if (isset($pb['BACKGROUND-POSITION'])) { 
12331           $ppos = preg_split('/\s+/',$pb['BACKGROUND-POSITION']);
12332           $x_pos = $ppos[0];
12333           $y_pos = $ppos[1];
12334           if (!stristr($x_pos ,'%') ) { $x_pos = $this->ConvertSize($x_pos ,$this->blk[1]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize); }
12335           if (!stristr($y_pos ,'%') ) { $y_pos = $this->ConvertSize($y_pos ,$this->blk[1]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize); }
12336         }
12337         // mPDF 4.3.015
12338         if (isset($pb['BACKGROUND-IMAGE-RESIZE'])) { $resize = $pb['BACKGROUND-IMAGE-RESIZE']; }
12339         else { $resize = 0; }
12340         // mPDF 4.3.017
12341         if (isset($pb['BACKGROUND-IMAGE-OPACITY'])) { $opacity = $pb['BACKGROUND-IMAGE-OPACITY']; }
12342         else { $opacity = 1; }
12343         $this->blk[1]['background-image'] = array('image_id'=>$image_id, 'orig_w'=>$orig_w, 'orig_h'=>$orig_h, 'x_pos'=>$x_pos, 'y_pos'=>$y_pos, 'x_repeat'=>$x_repeat, 'y_repeat'=>$y_repeat, 'resize'=>$resize, 'opacity'=>$opacity); // mPDF 4.3.015  4.3.017
12344       }
12345     }
12346 /*-- END BACKGROUND-IMAGES --*/
12347 
12348     //================================================================
12349     $y = $cont_y + $bbox_top + $bbox_mt + $bbox_bt + $bbox_pt;
12350     $h = $cont_h - $bbox_top - $bbox_mt - $bbox_bt - $bbox_pt - $bbox_pb - $bbox_bb - $bbox_mb - $bbox_bottom;
12351     $x = $cont_x + $bbox_left + $bbox_ml + $bbox_bl + $bbox_pl;
12352     $w = $cont_w - $bbox_left - $bbox_ml - $bbox_bl - $bbox_pl - $bbox_pr - $bbox_br - $bbox_mr - $bbox_right;
12353     // Set (temporary) values for x y w h to do first paint, if values are auto
12354     if ($inner_h==='auto' && $bbox_top==='auto') {
12355       $y = $cont_y + $bbox_mt + $bbox_bt + $bbox_pt;
12356       $h = $cont_h - ($bbox_bottom + $bbox_mt + $bbox_mb + $bbox_bt + $bbox_bb + $bbox_pt + $bbox_pb);
12357     }
12358     else if ($inner_h==='auto' && $bbox_bottom==='auto') {
12359       $y = $cont_y + $bbox_top + $bbox_mt + $bbox_bt + $bbox_pt;
12360       $h = $cont_h - ($bbox_top + $bbox_mt + $bbox_mb + $bbox_bt + $bbox_bb + $bbox_pt + $bbox_pb);
12361     }
12362     if ($inner_w==='auto' && $bbox_left==='auto') {
12363       $x = $cont_x + $bbox_ml + $bbox_bl + $bbox_pl;
12364       $w = $cont_w - ($bbox_right + $bbox_ml + $bbox_mr + $bbox_bl + $bbox_br + $bbox_pl + $bbox_pr);
12365     }
12366     else if ($inner_w==='auto' && $bbox_right==='auto') {
12367       $x = $cont_x + $bbox_left + $bbox_ml + $bbox_bl + $bbox_pl;
12368       $w = $cont_w - ($bbox_left + $bbox_ml + $bbox_mr + $bbox_bl + $bbox_br + $bbox_pl + $bbox_pr);
12369     }
12370     $bbox_y = $cont_y + $bbox_top + $bbox_mt;
12371     $bbox_x = $cont_x + $bbox_left + $bbox_ml;
12372     $saved_block1 = $this->blk[1];
12373     unset($p);
12374     unset($pb);
12375     //================================================================
12376     if ($inner_w==='auto') { // do a first write
12377       $this->lMargin=$x;
12378       $this->rMargin=$this->w - $w - $x;
12379       // SET POSITION & FONT VALUES
12380       $this->pgwidth = $this->w - $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin;
12381       $this->pageoutput[$this->page]=array();
12382       $this->x = $x;
12383       $this->y = $y;
12384       $this->HTMLheaderPageLinks = array();
12385       $this->pageBackgrounds = array();
12386       $this->maxPosR = 0;
12387       $this->maxPosL = $this->w;  // For RTL
12388       $this->WriteHTML($html , 4);
12389       $inner_w = $this->maxPosR - $this->lMargin;
12390       if ($bbox_right==='auto') {
12391         $bbox_right = $cont_w - $bbox_left - $bbox_ml - $bbox_bl - $bbox_pl - $inner_w - $bbox_pr - $bbox_br - $bbox_ml;
12392       }
12393       else if ($bbox_left==='auto') {
12394         $bbox_left = $cont_w - $bbox_ml - $bbox_bl - $bbox_pl - $inner_w - $bbox_pr - $bbox_br - $bbox_ml - $bbox_right;
12395         $bbox_x = $cont_x + $bbox_left + $bbox_ml ;
12396         $inner_x = $bbox_x + $bbox_bl + $bbox_pl;
12397         $x = $inner_x;
12398       }
12399       $w = $inner_w;
12400       $bbox_y = $cont_y + $bbox_top + $bbox_mt;
12401       $bbox_x = $cont_x + $bbox_left + $bbox_ml;
12402     }
12403 
12404     if ($inner_h==='auto') { // do a first write
12405       $this->lMargin=$x;
12406       $this->rMargin=$this->w - $w - $x;
12407       // SET POSITION & FONT VALUES
12408       $this->pgwidth = $this->w - $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin;
12409       $this->pageoutput[$this->page]=array();
12410       $this->x = $x;
12411       $this->y = $y;
12412       $this->HTMLheaderPageLinks = array();
12413       $this->pageBackgrounds = array();
12414       $this->WriteHTML($html , 4);
12415       $inner_h = $this->y - $y;
12416       if ($overflow!='hidden' && $overflow!='visible') {  // constrained
12417         if (($this->y + $bbox_pb + $bbox_bb) > ($cont_y + $cont_h)) {
12418           $adj = ($this->y + $bbox_pb + $bbox_bb) - ($cont_y + $cont_h);
12419           $inner_h -= $adj;
12420         }
12421       }
12422       if ($bbox_bottom==='auto') {
12423         $bbox_bottom = $cont_h - $bbox_top - $bbox_mt - $bbox_bt - $bbox_pt - $inner_h - $bbox_pb - $bbox_bb - $bbox_mb;
12424       }
12425       else if ($bbox_top==='auto') {
12426         $bbox_top = $cont_h - $bbox_mt - $bbox_bt - $bbox_pt - $inner_h - $bbox_pb - $bbox_bb - $bbox_mb - $bbox_bottom;
12427         if ($overflow!='hidden' && $overflow!='visible') {  // constrained
12428           if ($bbox_top < 0) {
12429             $bbox_top = 0;
12430             $inner_h = $cont_h - $bbox_top - $bbox_mt - $bbox_bt - $bbox_pt - $bbox_pb - $bbox_bb - $bbox_mb - $bbox_bottom;
12431           }
12432         }
12433         $bbox_y = $cont_y + $bbox_top + $bbox_mt;
12434         $inner_y = $bbox_y + $bbox_bt + $bbox_pt;
12435         $y = $inner_y;
12436       }
12437       $h = $inner_h;
12438       $bbox_y = $cont_y + $bbox_top + $bbox_mt;
12439       $bbox_x = $cont_x + $bbox_left + $bbox_ml;
12440     }
12441     $inner_w = $w;
12442     $inner_h = $h;
12443 
12444   }
12445 
12446 
12447   $this->lMargin=$x;
12448   $this->rMargin=$this->w - $w - $x;
12449   // SET POSITION & FONT VALUES
12450   $this->pgwidth = $this->w - $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin;
12451   $this->pageoutput[$this->page]=array();
12452   $this->x = $x;
12453   $this->y = $y;
12454   $this->HTMLheaderPageLinks = array();
12455   $this->pageBackgrounds = array();
12456   $this->WriteHTML($html , 4);  // parameter 4 saves output to $this->headerbuffer
12457   $actual_h = $this->y - $y;
12458   $use_w = $w;
12459   $use_h = $h;
12460   $ratio = $actual_h / $use_w;
12461   if ($overflow!='hidden' && $overflow!='visible') {
12462     $target = $h/$w;
12463     if (($ratio / $target ) > 1) {
12464       $nl = CEIL($actual_h / $this->lineheight);
12465       $l = $use_w * $nl;
12466       $est_w = sqrt(($l * $this->lineheight) / $target) * 0.8;
12467       $use_w += ($est_w - $use_w) - ($w/100);
12468     }
12469     $bpcstart = ($ratio / $target); // *PROGRESS-BAR*
12470     $bpcctr = 1;  // *PROGRESS-BAR*
12471     while(($ratio / $target ) > 1) {
12472 /*-- PROGRESS-BAR --*/
12473       if ($this->progressBar) { $this->UpdateProgressBar(4,intval(100/($ratio/$target)),('Auto-sizing fixed-position block: '.$bpcctr++)); }
12474 /*-- END PROGRESS-BAR --*/
12475       $this->x = $x;
12476       $this->y = $y;
12477 
12478       // mPDF 4.2
12479       if (($ratio / $target) > 1.5 || ($ratio / $target) < 0.6) {
12480         $use_w += ($w/$this->incrementFPR1);
12481       }
12482       else if (($ratio / $target) > 1.2 || ($ratio / $target) < 0.85) {
12483         $use_w += ($w/$this->incrementFPR2);
12484       }
12485       else if (($ratio / $target) > 1.1 || ($ratio / $target) < 0.91) {
12486         $use_w += ($w/$this->incrementFPR3);
12487       }
12488       else {
12489         $use_w += ($w/$this->incrementFPR4);
12490       }
12491 
12492       $use_h = $use_w * $target ;
12493       $this->rMargin=$this->w - $use_w - $x;
12494       $this->pgwidth = $this->w - $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin;
12495       $this->HTMLheaderPageLinks = array();
12496       $this->pageBackgrounds = array();
12497       $this->WriteHTML($html , 4);  // parameter 4 saves output to $this->headerbuffer
12498       $actual_h = $this->y - $y;
12499       $ratio = $actual_h / $use_w;
12500     }
12501     if ($this->progressBar) { $this->UpdateProgressBar(4,'100',' '); }  // *PROGRESS-BAR*
12502   }
12503   $shrink_f = $w/$use_w;
12504 
12505   //================================================================
12506 
12507   $this->pages[$this->page] .= '___BEFORE_BORDERS___';
12508   $block_s = $this->PrintPageBackgrounds(); // Save to print later inside clipping path
12509   $this->pageBackgrounds = array();
12510 
12511   //================================================================
12512   if (!empty($bounding)) {  
12513     // WHEN HEIGHT // BOTTOM EDGE IS KNOWN and $this->y is set to the bottom
12514     // Re-instate saved $this->blk[1]
12515     $this->blk[1] = $saved_block1;
12516 
12517     // These are only needed when painting border/background
12518     $this->blk[1]['width'] = $bbox_w = $cont_w - $bbox_left - $bbox_ml - $bbox_mr - $bbox_right;
12519     $this->blk[1]['x0'] = $bbox_x;
12520     $this->blk[1]['y0'] = $bbox_y;
12521     $this->blk[1]['startpage'] = $this->page;
12522     $this->blk[1]['y1'] = $bbox_y + $bbox_bt + $bbox_pt + $inner_h + $bbox_pb + $bbox_bb ;
12523     $this->PaintDivBB('',0,1);  // Prints borders and sets backgrounds in $this->pageBackgrounds 
12524   }
12525 
12526   $s = $this->PrintPageBackgrounds();
12527   $this->pages[$this->page] = preg_replace('/___BEFORE_BORDERS___/', "\n".$s."\n", $this->pages[$this->page]);
12528   $this->pageBackgrounds = array();
12529 
12530   // Clipping Output
12531   if ($overflow=='hidden') {
12532     //Bounding rectangle to clip
12533     $clip_y1 = $this->y;
12534     if (!empty($bounding) && ($this->y + $bbox_pb + $bbox_bb) > ($bbox_y + $bbox_bt + $bbox_pt + $inner_h + $bbox_pb + $bbox_bb )) {
12535       $clip_y1 = ($bbox_y + $bbox_bt + $bbox_pt + $inner_h + $bbox_pb + $bbox_bb ) - ($bbox_pb + $bbox_bb);
12536     }
12537     //$op = 'W* n'; // Clipping
12538     $op = 'W n';  // Clipping alternative mode
12539     $this->_out("q");
12540     $ch = $clip_y1 - $y;
12541     $this->_out(sprintf('%.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f re %s',$x*$this->k,($this->h-$y)*$this->k,$w*$this->k,-$ch*$this->k,$op));
12542     if (!empty($block_s)) {
12543       $tmp = "q\n".sprintf('%.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f re %s',$x*$this->k,($this->h-$y)*$this->k,$w*$this->k,-$ch*$this->k,$op);
12544       $tmp .= "\n".$block_s."\nQ";
12545       $block_s = $tmp ;
12546     }
12547   }
12548 
12549 
12550   if (!empty($block_s)) {
12551     if ($shrink_f != 1) { // i.e. autofit has resized the box
12552       $tmp = "q\n".$this->transformScale(($shrink_f*100),($shrink_f*100), $x, $y, true);
12553       $tmp .= "\n".$block_s."\nQ";
12554       $block_s = $tmp ;
12555     }
12556 
12557     $this->_out($block_s);
12558   }
12559 
12560 
12561 
12562   if ($shrink_f != 1) { // i.e. autofit has resized the box
12563     $this->StartTransform();
12564     $this->transformScale(($shrink_f*100),($shrink_f*100), $x, $y);
12565   }
12566 
12567   $this->_out($this->headerbuffer);
12568 
12569   if ($shrink_f != 1) { // i.e. autofit has resized the box
12570     $this->StopTransform();
12571   }
12572 
12573   if ($overflow=='hidden') {
12574     //End clipping
12575     $this->_out("Q");
12576   }
12577 
12578 
12579   // Page Links
12580   foreach($this->HTMLheaderPageLinks AS $lk) {
12581     if ($shrink_f != 1) {   // i.e. autofit has resized the box
12582       $lx1 = (($lk[0]/$this->k)-$x);
12583       $lx2 = $x + ($lx1 * $shrink_f);
12584       $lk[0] = $lx2*$this->k;
12585       $ly1 = (($this->h-($lk[1]/$this->k))-$y);
12586       $ly2 = $y + ($ly1 * $shrink_f);
12587       $lk[1] = ($this->h-$ly2)*$this->k;
12588       $lk[2] *= $shrink_f;  // width
12589       $lk[3] *= $shrink_f;  // height
12590     }
12591     $this->PageLinks[$this->page][]=$lk;
12592   }
12593   // Restore
12594   $this->headerbuffer = '';
12595   $this->HTMLheaderPageLinks = array();
12596   $this->pageBackgrounds = $save_bgs;
12597   $this->writingHTMLheader = false;
12598   // mPDF 4.0
12599   $this->writingHTMLfooter = false;
12600   // mPDF 4.1
12601   $this->fullImageHeight = false;
12602   $this->ResetMargins();
12603   $this->pgwidth = $this->w - $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin;
12604   $this->SetXY($save_x,$save_y) ; 
12605   $this->title2annots = $save_annots; // *ANNOTATIONS*
12606   $this->InFooter = false;  // turns back on autopagebreaks
12607   $this->pageoutput[$this->page]=array();
12608   $this->pageoutput[$this->page]['Font']='';
12609 /*-- COLUMNS --*/
12610   if ($save_cols) {
12611     $this->SetColumns($save_nbcol,$this->colvAlign,$this->ColGap);
12612   }
12613 /*-- END COLUMNS --*/
12614 }
12615 /*-- END CSS-POSITION --*/
12616 
12617 
12618 // mPDF 4.0
12619 function initialiseBlock(&$blk) {
12620   $blk['margin_top'] = 0;
12621   $blk['margin_left'] = 0;
12622   $blk['margin_bottom'] = 0;
12623   $blk['margin_right'] = 0;
12624   $blk['padding_top'] = 0;
12625   $blk['padding_left'] = 0;
12626   $blk['padding_bottom'] = 0;
12627   $blk['padding_right'] = 0;
12628   $blk['border_top']['w'] = 0;
12629   $blk['border_left']['w'] = 0;
12630   $blk['border_bottom']['w'] = 0;
12631   $blk['border_right']['w'] = 0;
12632   $blk['hide'] = false; 
12633   $blk['outer_left_margin'] = 0; 
12634   $blk['outer_right_margin'] = 0; 
12635   $blk['cascadeCSS'] = array(); 
12636   $blk['block-align'] = false; 
12637   $blk['bgcolor'] = false; 
12638   $blk['page_break_after_avoid'] = false; 
12639   $blk['keep_block_together'] = false; 
12640   $blk['float'] = false; 
12641   $blk['line_height'] = ''; 
12642   $blk['margin_collapse'] = false; 
12643 }
12644 
12645 // mPDF 4.0
12646 function border_details($bd) {
12647   $prop = preg_split('/\s+/',trim($bd));
12648   // mPDF 4.0
12649   if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'])) { $refw = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width']; }
12650   else if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['inner_width'])) { $refw = $this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['inner_width']; }
12651   else { $refw = $this->w; }
12652   if ( count($prop) == 1 ) { 
12653     $bsize = $this->ConvertSize($prop[0],$refw,$this->FontSize,false);
12654     if ($bsize > 0) {
12655       return array('s' => 1, 'w' => $bsize, 'c' => array('R'=>0,'G'=>0,'B'=>0), 'style'=>'solid');
12656     }
12657     else { return array('w' => 0, 's' => 0); }  // mPDF 3.0
12658   }
12659   // mPDF 4.0
12660   else if (count($prop) == 2 ) { 
12661     // 1px solid 
12662     if (in_array($prop[1],$this->borderstyles) || $prop[1] == 'none' || $prop[1] == 'hidden' ) { $prop[2] = ''; }
12663     // solid #000000 
12664     else if (in_array($prop[0],$this->borderstyles) || $prop[0] == 'none' || $prop[0] == 'hidden' ) { $prop[0] = ''; $prop[1] = $prop[0]; $prop[2] = $prop[1]; }
12665     // 1px #000000 
12666     else { $prop[1] = ''; $prop[2] = $prop[1]; }
12667   }
12668   else if ( count($prop) == 3 ) {
12669     // Change #000000 1px solid to 1px solid #000000 (proper)
12670     if (substr($prop[0],0,1) == '#') { $tmp = $prop[0]; $prop[0] = $prop[1]; $prop[1] = $prop[2]; $prop[2] = $tmp; }
12671     // Change solid #000000 1px to 1px solid #000000 (proper)
12672     else if (substr($prop[0],1,1) == '#') { $tmp = $prop[1]; $prop[0] = $prop[2]; $prop[1] = $prop[0]; $prop[2] = $tmp; }
12673     // Change solid 1px #000000 to 1px solid #000000 (proper)
12674     else if (in_array($prop[0],$this->borderstyles) || $prop[0] == 'none' || $prop[0] == 'hidden' ) { 
12675       $tmp = $prop[0]; $prop[0] = $prop[1]; $prop[1] = $tmp; 
12676     }
12677   }
12678   else { return array(); } 
12679   // Size
12680   $bsize = $this->ConvertSize($prop[0],$refw,$this->FontSize,false);
12681   //color
12682   $coul = $this->ConvertColor($prop[2]);  // returns array
12683   // Style
12684   $prop[1] = strtolower($prop[1]);
12685   if (in_array($prop[1],$this->borderstyles) && $bsize > 0) { $on = 1; } 
12686   else if ($prop[1] == 'hidden') { $on = 1; $bsize = 0; $coul = ''; } 
12687   else if ($prop[1] == 'none') { $on = 0; $bsize = 0; $coul = ''; } 
12688   else { $on = 0; $bsize = 0; $coul = ''; $prop[1] = ''; }
12689   return array('s' => $on, 'w' => $bsize, 'c' => $coul, 'style'=> $prop[1] );
12690 }
12691 
12692 // mPDF 4.0
12693 function _fix_borderStr($bd) {
12694   $prop = preg_split('/\s+/',trim($bd));
12695   $w = 'medium';  // mPDF 4.3.010
12696   $c = '#000000';
12697   $s = 'none';
12698 
12699   if ( count($prop) == 1 ) { 
12700     // solid
12701     if (in_array($prop[0],$this->borderstyles) || $prop[0] == 'none' || $prop[0] == 'hidden' ) { $s = $prop[0]; }
12702     // #000000
12703     else if (is_array($this->ConvertColor($prop[0]))) { $c = $prop[0]; }
12704     // 1px 
12705     else { $w = $prop[0]; }
12706   }
12707   else if (count($prop) == 2 ) { 
12708     // 1px solid 
12709     if (in_array($prop[1],$this->borderstyles) || $prop[1] == 'none' || $prop[1] == 'hidden' ) { $w = $prop[0]; $s = $prop[1]; }
12710     // solid #000000 
12711     else if (in_array($prop[0],$this->borderstyles) || $prop[0] == 'none' || $prop[0] == 'hidden' ) { $s = $prop[0]; $c = $prop[1]; }
12712     // 1px #000000 
12713     else { $w = $prop[0]; $c = $prop[1]; }
12714   }
12715   else if ( count($prop) == 3 ) {
12716     // Change #000000 1px solid to 1px solid #000000 (proper)
12717     if (substr($prop[0],0,1) == '#') { $c = $prop[0]; $w = $prop[1]; $s = $prop[2]; }
12718     // Change solid #000000 1px to 1px solid #000000 (proper)
12719     else if (substr($prop[0],1,1) == '#') { $s = $prop[0]; $c = $prop[1]; $w = $prop[2]; }
12720     // Change solid 1px #000000 to 1px solid #000000 (proper)
12721     else if (in_array($prop[0],$this->borderstyles) || $prop[0] == 'none' || $prop[0] == 'hidden' ) { 
12722       $s = $prop[0]; $w = $prop[1]; $c = $prop[2]; 
12723     }
12724     else { $w = $prop[0]; $s = $prop[1]; $c = $prop[2]; }
12725   }
12726   else { return ''; } 
12727   $s = strtolower($s);
12728   return $w.' '.$s.' '.$c;
12729 }
12730 
12731 
12732 
12733 // NEW FUNCTION FOR CSS MARGIN or PADDING called from SetCSS
12734 function fixCSS($prop) {
12735   if (!is_array($prop) || (count($prop)==0)) return array(); 
12736   $newprop = array(); 
12737   foreach($prop AS $k => $v) {
12738     // mPDF 4.2.013 Change all CSS properties to lowercase, except those that are case sensitive
12739     if ($k != 'BACKGROUND-IMAGE' && $k != 'BACKGROUND' && $k != 'ODD-HEADER-NAME' && $k != 'EVEN-HEADER-NAME' && $k != 'ODD-FOOTER-NAME' && $k != 'EVEN-FOOTER-NAME' && $k != 'HEADER' && $k != 'FOOTER') {
12740       $v = strtolower($v);
12741     }
12742 
12743     // mPDF 4.0 - FONT shorthand
12744     if ($k == 'FONT') {
12745       $s = trim($v);
12746       preg_match_all('/\"(.*?)\"/',$s,$ff);
12747       if (count($ff[1])) {
12748         foreach($ff[1] AS $ffp) { 
12749           $w = preg_split('/\s+/',$ffp);
12750           $s = preg_replace('/\"'.$ffp.'\"/',$w[0],$s); 
12751         }
12752       }
12753       preg_match_all('/\'(.*?)\'/',$s,$ff);
12754       if (count($ff[1])) {
12755         foreach($ff[1] AS $ffp) { 
12756           $w = preg_split('/\s+/',$ffp);
12757           $s = preg_replace('/\''.$ffp.'\'/',$w[0],$s); 
12758         }
12759       }
12760       $s = preg_replace('/\s*,\s*/',',',$s); 
12761       $bits = preg_split('/\s+/',$s);
12762       if (count($bits)>1) {
12763         $k = 'FONT-FAMILY'; $v = $bits[(count($bits)-1)];
12764         $fs = $bits[(count($bits)-2)];
12765         if (preg_match('/(.*?)\/(.*)/',$fs, $fsp)) { 
12766           $newprop['FONT-SIZE'] = $fsp[1];
12767           $newprop['LINE-HEIGHT'] = $fsp[2];
12768         }
12769         else { $newprop['FONT-SIZE'] = $fs; } 
12770         if (preg_match('/(italic|oblique)/i',$s)) { $newprop['FONT-STYLE'] = 'italic'; }
12771         else { $newprop['FONT-STYLE'] = 'normal'; }
12772         if (preg_match('/bold/i',$s)) { $newprop['FONT-WEIGHT'] = 'bold'; }
12773         else { $newprop['FONT-WEIGHT'] = 'normal'; }
12774         if (preg_match('/small-caps/i',$s)) { $newprop['TEXT-TRANSFORM'] = 'uppercase'; }
12775       }
12776     }
12777     if ($k == 'FONT-FAMILY') {
12778       $aux_fontlist = explode(",",$v);
12779       $fonttype = trim($aux_fontlist[0]);
12780       // mPDF 4.0
12781       $fonttype = preg_replace('/["\']*(.*?)["\']*/','\\1',$fonttype);
12782       $aux_fontlist = explode(" ",$fonttype);
12783       $fonttype = $aux_fontlist[0];
12784       $v = strtolower(trim($fonttype));
12785       if (($this->is_MB && in_array($v,$this->available_unifonts)) || 
12786         (!$this->is_MB && in_array($v,$this->available_fonts)) || in_array($v, array('sjis','uhc','big5','gb')) || 
12787         in_array($v,$this->sans_fonts) || in_array($v,$this->serif_fonts) || in_array($v,$this->mono_fonts) ) { 
12788         $newprop[$k] = $v; 
12789       }
12790     }
12791     else if ($k == 'MARGIN') {
12792       $tmp =  $this->expand24($v);
12793       $newprop['MARGIN-TOP'] = $tmp['T'];
12794       $newprop['MARGIN-RIGHT'] = $tmp['R'];
12795       $newprop['MARGIN-BOTTOM'] = $tmp['B'];
12796       $newprop['MARGIN-LEFT'] = $tmp['L'];
12797     }
12798 /*-- BORDER-RADIUS --*/
12799     else if ($k == 'BORDER-RADIUS' || $k == 'BORDER-TOP-LEFT-RADIUS' || $k == 'BORDER-TOP-RIGHT-RADIUS' || $k == 'BORDER-BOTTOM-LEFT-RADIUS' || $k == 'BORDER-BOTTOM-RIGHT-RADIUS') {
12800       $tmp =  $this->border_radius_expand($v,$k);
12801       if (isset($tmp['TL-H'])) $newprop['BORDER-TOP-LEFT-RADIUS-H'] = $tmp['TL-H'];
12802       if (isset($tmp['TL-V'])) $newprop['BORDER-TOP-LEFT-RADIUS-V'] = $tmp['TL-V'];
12803       if (isset($tmp['TR-H'])) $newprop['BORDER-TOP-RIGHT-RADIUS-H'] = $tmp['TR-H'];
12804       if (isset($tmp['TR-V'])) $newprop['BORDER-TOP-RIGHT-RADIUS-V'] = $tmp['TR-V'];
12805       if (isset($tmp['BL-H'])) $newprop['BORDER-BOTTOM-LEFT-RADIUS-H'] = $tmp['BL-H'];
12806       if (isset($tmp['BL-V'])) $newprop['BORDER-BOTTOM-LEFT-RADIUS-V'] = $tmp['BL-V'];
12807       if (isset($tmp['BR-H'])) $newprop['BORDER-BOTTOM-RIGHT-RADIUS-H'] = $tmp['BR-H'];
12808       if (isset($tmp['BR-V'])) $newprop['BORDER-BOTTOM-RIGHT-RADIUS-V'] = $tmp['BR-V'];
12809     }
12810 /*-- END BORDER-RADIUS --*/
12811     else if ($k == 'PADDING') {
12812       $tmp =  $this->expand24($v);
12813       $newprop['PADDING-TOP'] = $tmp['T'];
12814       $newprop['PADDING-RIGHT'] = $tmp['R'];
12815       $newprop['PADDING-BOTTOM'] = $tmp['B'];
12816       $newprop['PADDING-LEFT'] = $tmp['L'];
12817     }
12818     // mPDF 4.0
12819     else if ($k == 'BORDER') {
12820       if ($v == '1') { $v = '1px solid #000000'; }
12821       else { $v = $this->_fix_borderStr($v); }
12822       $newprop['BORDER-TOP'] = $v;
12823       $newprop['BORDER-RIGHT'] = $v;
12824       $newprop['BORDER-BOTTOM'] = $v;
12825       $newprop['BORDER-LEFT'] = $v;
12826     }
12827     else if ($k == 'BORDER-TOP') {
12828       $newprop['BORDER-TOP'] = $this->_fix_borderStr($v);
12829     }
12830     else if ($k == 'BORDER-RIGHT') {
12831       $newprop['BORDER-RIGHT'] = $this->_fix_borderStr($v);
12832     }
12833     else if ($k == 'BORDER-BOTTOM') {
12834       $newprop['BORDER-BOTTOM'] = $this->_fix_borderStr($v);
12835     }
12836     else if ($k == 'BORDER-LEFT') {
12837       $newprop['BORDER-LEFT'] = $this->_fix_borderStr($v);
12838     }
12839     // mPDF 4.0
12840     else if ($k == 'BORDER-STYLE') {
12841       $e = $this->expand24($v);
12842       $newprop['BORDER-TOP-STYLE'] = $e['T'];
12843       $newprop['BORDER-RIGHT-STYLE'] = $e['R'];
12844       $newprop['BORDER-BOTTOM-STYLE'] = $e['B'];
12845       $newprop['BORDER-LEFT-STYLE'] = $e['L'];
12846     }
12847     else if ($k == 'BORDER-WIDTH') {
12848       $e = $this->expand24($v);
12849       $newprop['BORDER-TOP-WIDTH'] = $e['T'];
12850       $newprop['BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH'] = $e['R'];
12851       $newprop['BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH'] = $e['B'];
12852       $newprop['BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH'] = $e['L'];
12853     }
12854     else if ($k == 'BORDER-COLOR') {
12855       $e = $this->expand24($v);
12856       $newprop['BORDER-TOP-COLOR'] = $e['T'];
12857       $newprop['BORDER-RIGHT-COLOR'] = $e['R'];
12858       $newprop['BORDER-BOTTOM-COLOR'] = $e['B'];
12859       $newprop['BORDER-LEFT-COLOR'] = $e['L'];
12860     }
12861 
12862     else if ($k == 'BORDER-SPACING') {
12863       $prop = preg_split('/\s+/',trim($v));
12864       if (count($prop) == 1 ) { 
12865         $newprop['BORDER-SPACING-H'] = $prop[0];
12866         $newprop['BORDER-SPACING-V'] = $prop[0];
12867       }
12868       else if (count($prop) == 2 ) { 
12869         $newprop['BORDER-SPACING-H'] = $prop[0];
12870         $newprop['BORDER-SPACING-V'] = $prop[1];
12871       }
12872     }
12873     else if ($k == 'SIZE') {
12874       $prop = preg_split('/\s+/',trim($v));
12875       if (preg_match('/(auto|portrait|landscape)/',$prop[0])) {
12876         $newprop['SIZE'] = strtoupper($prop[0]);
12877       }
12878       else if (count($prop) == 1 ) {
12879         $newprop['SIZE']['W'] = $this->ConvertSize($prop[0]);
12880         $newprop['SIZE']['H'] = $this->ConvertSize($prop[0]);
12881       }
12882       else if (count($prop) == 2 ) {
12883         $newprop['SIZE']['W'] = $this->ConvertSize($prop[0]);
12884         $newprop['SIZE']['H'] = $this->ConvertSize($prop[1]);
12885       }
12886     }
12887     // mPDF 4.2.024
12888     else if ($k == 'SHEET-SIZE') {
12889       $prop = preg_split('/\s+/',trim($v));
12890       if (count($prop) == 2 ) {
12891         $newprop['SHEET-SIZE'] = array($this->ConvertSize($prop[0]), $this->ConvertSize($prop[1]));
12892       }
12893       else {
12894         if(preg_match('/([0-9a-zA-Z]*)-L/i',$v,$m)) { // e.g. A4-L = A$ landscape
12895           $ft = $this->_getPageFormat($m[1]);
12896           $format = array($ft[1],$ft[0]);
12897         }
12898         else { $format = $this->_getPageFormat($v); }
12899         if ($format) { $newprop['SHEET-SIZE'] = array($format[0]/$this->k, $format[1]/$this->k); }
12900       }
12901     }
12902     // mPDF 3.0 - Tiling Patterns
12903     else if ($k == 'BACKGROUND') {
12904       $bg = $this->parseCSSbackground($v);
12905       if ($bg['c']) { $newprop['BACKGROUND-COLOR'] = $bg['c']; }
12906       // mPDF 4.3.002
12907       else { $newprop['BACKGROUND-COLOR'] = 'transparent'; }  // mPDF 4.3.002
12908 /*-- BACKGROUND-IMAGES --*/
12909       if ($bg['i']) { 
12910         $newprop['BACKGROUND-IMAGE'] = $bg['i']; 
12911         if ($bg['r']) { $newprop['BACKGROUND-REPEAT'] = $bg['r']; }
12912         if ($bg['p']) { $newprop['BACKGROUND-POSITION'] = $bg['p']; }
12913       }
12914       else { $newprop['BACKGROUND-IMAGE'] = ''; } // mPDF 4.3.002 / 4.3.011
12915 
12916 /*-- END BACKGROUND-IMAGES --*/
12917     }
12918 /*-- BACKGROUND-IMAGES --*/
12919     else if ($k == 'BACKGROUND-IMAGE') {
12920       if (preg_match('/url\([\'\"]{0,1}(.*?)[\'\"]{0,1}\)/i',$v,$m)) {  // 4.2.013
12921         $newprop['BACKGROUND-IMAGE'] = $m[1];
12922       }
12923       // mPDF 4.3.011
12924       else if (strtolower($v)=='none') { $newprop['BACKGROUND-IMAGE'] = ''; }
12925     }
12926     // mPDF 3.0 - Tiling Patterns
12927     else if ($k == 'BACKGROUND-REPEAT') {
12928       if (preg_match('/(repeat-x|repeat-y|no-repeat|repeat)/i',$v,$m)) { 
12929         $newprop['BACKGROUND-REPEAT'] = strtolower($m[1]);
12930       }
12931     }
12932     // mPDF 3.0 - Tiling Patterns
12933     else if ($k == 'BACKGROUND-POSITION') {
12934       $s = $v;
12935       $bits = preg_split('/\s+/',trim($s));
12936       // These should be Position x1 or x2
12937       if (count($bits)==1) {
12938         if (preg_match('/bottom/',$bits[0])) { $bg['p'] = '50% 100%'; }
12939         else if (preg_match('/top/',$bits[0])) { $bg['p'] = '50% 0%'; }
12940         else { $bg['p'] = $bits[0] . ' 50%'; }
12941       }
12942       else if (count($bits)==2) {
12943         // Can be either right center or center right
12944         if (preg_match('/(top|bottom)/',$bits[0]) || preg_match('/(left|right)/',$bits[1])) { 
12945           $bg['p'] = $bits[1] . ' '.$bits[0]; 
12946         }
12947         else { 
12948           $bg['p'] = $bits[0] . ' '.$bits[1]; 
12949         }
12950       }
12951       if ($bg['p']) {
12952         $bg['p'] = preg_replace('/(left|top)/','0%',$bg['p']);
12953         $bg['p'] = preg_replace('/(right|bottom)/','100%',$bg['p']);
12954         $bg['p'] = preg_replace('/(center)/','50%',$bg['p']);
12955         if (!preg_match('/[\-]{0,1}\d+(in|cm|mm|pt|pc|em|ex|px|%)* [\-]{0,1}\d+(in|cm|mm|pt|pc|em|ex|px|%)*/',$bg['p'])) {
12956           $bg['p'] = false;
12957         }
12958       }
12959       if ($bg['p']) { $newprop['BACKGROUND-POSITION'] = $bg['p']; }
12960     }
12961 /*-- END BACKGROUND-IMAGES --*/
12962     else { 
12963       $newprop[$k] = $v; 
12964     }
12965   }
12966   // mPDF 4.0
12967 //  $this->_mergeBorders($newprop,$newprop);
12968   return $newprop;
12969 }
12970 
12971 
12972 // mPDF 3.0 - Tiling Patterns
12973 function parseCSSbackground($s) {
12974   // $s = strtolower($s);   // mPDF 4.2.013
12975   $bg = array('c'=>false, 'i'=>false, 'r'=>false, 'p'=>false, );
12976   if (preg_match('/url\(/i',$s)) {  // mPDF 4.2.013
12977     // If color, set and strip it off
12978     if (preg_match('/^\s*(#[0-9a-fA-F]{3,6}|rgb\(.*?\)|[a-zA-Z]{3,})\s+(url\(.*)/i',$s,$m)) {   // mPDF 4.2.013
12979       $bg['c'] = strtolower($m[1]);   // mPDF 4.2.013
12980       $s = $m[2];
12981     }
12982 /*-- BACKGROUND-IMAGES --*/
12983     if (preg_match('/url\([\'\"]{0,1}(.*?)[\'\"]{0,1}\)\s*(.*)/i',$s,$m)) {   // mPDF 4.2.013
12984       $bg['i'] = $m[1];
12985       $s = strtolower($m[2]); // mPDF 4.2.013
12986       if (preg_match('/(repeat-x|repeat-y|no-repeat|repeat)/',$s,$m)) { 
12987         $bg['r'] = $m[1];
12988       }
12989       // Remove repeat, attachment (discarded) and also any inherit
12990       $s = preg_replace('/(repeat-x|repeat-y|no-repeat|repeat|scroll|fixed|inherit)/','',$s);
12991       $bits = preg_split('/\s+/',trim($s));
12992       // These should be Position x1 or x2
12993       if (count($bits)==1) {
12994         if (preg_match('/bottom/',$bits[0])) { $bg['p'] = '50% 100%'; }
12995         else if (preg_match('/top/',$bits[0])) { $bg['p'] = '50% 0%'; }
12996         else { $bg['p'] = $bits[0] . ' 50%'; }
12997       }
12998       else if (count($bits)==2) {
12999         // Can be either right center or center right
13000         if (preg_match('/(top|bottom)/',$bits[0]) || preg_match('/(left|right)/',$bits[1])) { 
13001           $bg['p'] = $bits[1] . ' '.$bits[0]; 
13002         }
13003         else { 
13004           $bg['p'] = $bits[0] . ' '.$bits[1]; 
13005         }
13006       }
13007       if ($bg['p']) {
13008         $bg['p'] = preg_replace('/(left|top)/','0%',$bg['p']);
13009         $bg['p'] = preg_replace('/(right|bottom)/','100%',$bg['p']);
13010         $bg['p'] = preg_replace('/(center)/','50%',$bg['p']);
13011         if (!preg_match('/[\-]{0,1}\d+(in|cm|mm|pt|pc|em|ex|px|%)* [\-]{0,1}\d+(in|cm|mm|pt|pc|em|ex|px|%)*/',$bg['p'])) {
13012           $bg['p'] = false;
13013         }
13014       }
13015     }
13016 /*-- END BACKGROUND-IMAGES --*/
13017   }
13018   else if (preg_match('/^\s*(#[0-9a-fA-F]{3,6}|rgb\(.*?\)|[a-zA-Z]{3,})/i',$s,$m)) { $bg['c'] = strtolower($m[1]); }  // mPDF 4.2.013
13019   return ($bg);
13020 }
13021 
13022 /*-- GRADIENTS --*/
13023 // mPDF 3.0 Gradients
13024 function parseBackgroundGradient($bg) {
13025   // background-gradient: linear #00FFFF #FFFF00 0 0.5 1 0.5;  or
13026   // background-gradient: radial #00FFFF #FFFF00 0.5 0.5 1 1 1.2;
13027   $v = trim($bg);
13028   $bgr = preg_split('/\s+/',$v);
13029   $g = array();
13030   if (count($bgr)> 6) {  
13031     if (strtoupper(substr($bgr[0],0,1)) == 'L' && count($bgr)==7) {  // linear
13032       $g['type'] = 2;
13033       //$coords = array(0,0,1,1 );  // 0 0 1 0 or 0 1 1 1 is L 2 R; 1,1,0,1 is R2L; 1,1,1,0 is T2B; 1,0,1,1 is B2T
13034       // Linear: $coords - array of the form (x1, y1, x2, y2) which defines the gradient vector (see linear_gradient_coords.jpg). 
13035       //    The default value is from left to right (x1=0, y1=0, x2=1, y2=0).
13036       $g['coords'] = array($bgr[3], $bgr[4], $bgr[5], $bgr[6]);
13037     }
13038     else if (count($bgr)==8) {  // radial
13039       $g['type'] = 3;
13040       // Radial: $coords - array of the form (fx, fy, cx, cy, r) where (fx, fy) is the starting point of the gradient with color1, 
13041       //    (cx, cy) is the center of the circle with color2, and r is the radius of the circle (see radial_gradient_coords.jpg). 
13042       //    (fx, fy) should be inside the circle, otherwise some areas will not be defined
13043       $g['coords'] = array($bgr[3], $bgr[4], $bgr[5], $bgr[6], $bgr[7]);
13044     }
13045     $cor = $this->ConvertColor($bgr[1]);
13046     if ($cor) { $g['col'] = array($cor['R'],$cor['G'],$cor['B']); }
13047     else { $g['col'] = array(255); }
13048     $cor = $this->ConvertColor($bgr[2]);
13049     if ($cor) { $g['col2'] = array($cor['R'],$cor['G'],$cor['B']); }
13050     else { $g['col2'] = array(255); }
13051     $g['extend'] = array('true','true');
13052     return $g;
13053   }
13054   return false;
13055 }
13056 /*-- END GRADIENTS --*/
13057 
13058 function expand24($mp) {
13059   $prop = preg_split('/\s+/',trim($mp));
13060   if (count($prop) == 1 ) { 
13061     return array('T' => $prop[0], 'R' => $prop[0], 'B' => $prop[0], 'L'=> $prop[0]);
13062   }
13063   if (count($prop) == 2 ) { 
13064     return array('T' => $prop[0], 'R' => $prop[1], 'B' => $prop[0], 'L'=> $prop[1]);
13065   }
13066   // mPDF 4.0
13067   if (count($prop) == 3 ) { 
13068     return array('T' => $prop[0], 'R' => $prop[1], 'B' => $prop[2], 'L'=> $prop[1]);
13069   }
13070   if (count($prop) == 4 ) { 
13071     return array('T' => $prop[0], 'R' => $prop[1], 'B' => $prop[2], 'L'=> $prop[3]);
13072   }
13073   return array(); 
13074 }
13075 
13076 /*-- BORDER-RADIUS --*/
13077 function border_radius_expand($val,$k) {
13078   $b = array();
13079   if ($k == 'BORDER-RADIUS') {
13080     $hv = explode('/',trim($val));
13081     $prop = preg_split('/\s+/',trim($hv[0]));
13082     if (count($prop)==1) {
13083       $b['TL-H'] = $b['TR-H'] = $b['BR-H'] = $b['BL-H'] = $prop[0];
13084     }
13085     else if (count($prop)==2) {
13086       $b['TL-H'] = $b['BR-H'] = $prop[0];
13087       $b['TR-H'] = $b['BL-H'] = $prop[1];
13088     }
13089     else if (count($prop)==3) {
13090       $b['TL-H'] = $prop[0];
13091       $b['TR-H'] = $b['BL-H'] = $prop[1];
13092       $b['BR-H'] = $prop[2];
13093     }
13094     else if (count($prop)==4) {
13095       $b['TL-H'] = $prop[0];
13096       $b['TR-H'] = $prop[1];
13097       $b['BR-H'] = $prop[2];
13098       $b['BL-H'] = $prop[3];
13099     }
13100     if (count($hv)==2) {
13101       $prop = preg_split('/\s+/',trim($hv[1]));
13102       if (count($prop)==1) {
13103         $b['TL-V'] = $b['TR-V'] = $b['BR-V'] = $b['BL-V'] = $prop[0];
13104       }
13105       else if (count($prop)==2) {
13106         $b['TL-V'] = $b['BR-V'] = $prop[0];
13107         $b['TR-V'] = $b['BL-V'] = $prop[1];
13108       }
13109       else if (count($prop)==3) {
13110         $b['TL-V'] = $prop[0];
13111         $b['TR-V'] = $b['BL-V'] = $prop[1];
13112         $b['BR-V'] = $prop[2];
13113       }
13114       else if (count($prop)==4) {
13115         $b['TL-V'] = $prop[0];
13116         $b['TR-V'] = $prop[1];
13117         $b['BR-V'] = $prop[2];
13118         $b['BL-V'] = $prop[3];
13119       }
13120     }
13121     else {
13122       $b['TL-V'] = $b['TL-H'];
13123       $b['TR-V'] = $b['TR-H'];
13124       $b['BL-V'] = $b['BL-H'];
13125       $b['BR-V'] = $b['BR-H'];
13126     }
13127     return $b;
13128   }
13129 
13130   // Parse 2
13131   $h = 0;
13132   $v = 0;
13133   $prop = preg_split('/\s+/',trim($val));
13134   if (count($prop)==1) { $h = $v = $val; }
13135   else { $h = $prop[0]; $v = $prop[1]; }
13136   if ($h==0 || $v==0) { $h = $v = 0; }
13137   if ($k == 'BORDER-TOP-LEFT-RADIUS') {
13138     $b['TL-H'] = $h;
13139     $b['TL-V'] = $v;
13140   }
13141   else if ($k == 'BORDER-TOP-RIGHT-RADIUS') {
13142     $b['TR-H'] = $h;
13143     $b['TR-V'] = $v;
13144   }
13145   else if ($k == 'BORDER-BOTTOM-LEFT-RADIUS') {
13146     $b['BL-H'] = $h;
13147     $b['BL-V'] = $v;
13148   }
13149   else if ($k == 'BORDER-BOTTOM-RIGHT-RADIUS') {
13150     $b['BR-H'] = $h;
13151     $b['BR-V'] = $v;
13152   }
13153   return $b;
13154 
13155 }
13156 /*-- END BORDER-RADIUS --*/
13157 
13158 // mPDF 4.2
13159 // Return either a number (factor) - based on current set fontsize (if % or em) - or exact lineheight (with 'mm' after it)
13160 function fixLineheight($v) {
13161   $lh = false;
13162   if (preg_match('/^[0-9\.,]*$/',$v) && $v >= 0) { return ($v + 0); }
13163   else if (strtoupper($v) == 'NORMAL') { 
13164     return $this->normalLineheight; 
13165   }
13166   else { 
13167     $tlh = $this->ConvertSize($v,$this->FontSize,$this->FontSize,true); 
13168     if ($tlh) { return ($tlh.'mm'); }
13169   }
13170   return $this->normalLineheight;
13171 }
13172 
13173 /*-- BORDER-RADIUS --*/
13174 // mPDF 3.0
13175 function _borderPadding($a, $b, &$px, &$py) {
13176   // $px and py are padding long axis (x) and short axis (y)
13177   $added = 0; // extra padding
13178 
13179   $x = $a-$px;
13180   $y = $b-$py;
13181   // Check if Falls within ellipse of border radius
13182   if ( ( (($x+$added)*($x+$added))/($a*$a) + (($y+$added)*($y+$added))/($b*$b) ) <=1 ) { return false; }
13183 
13184   $t = atan2($y,$x);
13185 
13186   $newx = $b / sqrt((($b*$b)/($a*$a)) + ( tan($t) * tan($t) )  );
13187   $newy = $a / sqrt((($a*$a)/($b*$b)) + ( (1/tan($t)) * (1/tan($t)) )  );
13188   $px = max($px, $a - $newx + $added);
13189   $py = max($py, $b - $newy + $added);
13190 }
13191 /*-- END BORDER-RADIUS --*/
13192 
13193 
13194 /*-- TABLES --*/
13195 function setBorderDominance($prop, $val) {
13196   if (isset($prop['BORDER-LEFT']) && $prop['BORDER-LEFT']) { $this->cell_border_dominance_L = $val; }
13197   if (isset($prop['BORDER-RIGHT']) && $prop['BORDER-RIGHT']) { $this->cell_border_dominance_R = $val; }
13198   if (isset($prop['BORDER-TOP']) && $prop['BORDER-TOP']) { $this->cell_border_dominance_T = $val; }
13199   if (isset($prop['BORDER-BOTTOM']) && $prop['BORDER-BOTTOM']) { $this->cell_border_dominance_B = $val; }
13200 }
13201 /*-- END TABLES --*/
13202 
13203 // mPDF 4.0
13204 function _mergeCSS(&$p, &$t) {
13205   // Save Cascading CSS e.g. "div.topic p" at this block level
13206   if (isset($p) && $p) {
13207     $carry = $p;
13208     if ($t) { 
13209       $t = $this->array_merge_recursive_unique($t, $carry); 
13210     }
13211       else { $t = $carry; }
13212   }
13213 }
13214 
13215 // for CSS handling
13216 function array_merge_recursive_unique($array1, $array2) {
13217     $arrays = func_get_args();
13218     $narrays = count($arrays);
13219     $ret = $arrays[0];
13220     for ($i = 1; $i < $narrays; $i ++) {
13221         foreach ($arrays[$i] as $key => $value) {
13222             if (((string) $key) === ((string) intval($key))) { // integer or string as integer key - append
13223                 $ret[] = $value;
13224             }
13225             else { // string key - merge
13226                 if (is_array($value) && isset($ret[$key])) {
13227                     $ret[$key] = $this->array_merge_recursive_unique($ret[$key], $value);
13228                 }
13229                 else {
