13230                     $ret[$key] = $value;
13231                 }
13232             }
13233         }   
13234     }
13235     return $ret;
13236 }
13237 
13238 
13239 // mPDF 4.0
13240 function _mergeFullCSS(&$p, &$t, $tag, $classes, $id) {
13241     $this->_mergeCSS($p[$tag], $t);
13242     // STYLESHEET CLASS e.g. .smallone{}  .redletter{}
13243     foreach($classes AS $class) {
13244       $this->_mergeCSS($p['CLASS>>'.$class], $t);
13245     }
13246     // STYLESHEET CLASS e.g. #smallone{}  #redletter{}
13247     if (isset($id)) {
13248       $this->_mergeCSS($p['ID>>'.$id], $t);
13249     }
13250     // STYLESHEET CLASS e.g. .smallone{}  .redletter{}
13251     foreach($classes AS $class) {
13252       $this->_mergeCSS($p[$tag.'>>CLASS>>'.$class], $t);
13253     }
13254     // STYLESHEET CLASS e.g. #smallone{}  #redletter{}
13255     if (isset($id)) {
13256       $this->_mergeCSS($p[$tag.'>>ID>>'.$id], $t);
13257     }
13258 }
13259 
13260 // mPDF 4.0
13261 function _set_mergedCSS(&$m, &$p, $d=true, $bd=false) {
13262   if (isset($m)) {
13263     if ((isset($m['depth']) && $m['depth']>1) || $d==false) {   // include check for 'depth'
13264       if ($bd) { $this->setBorderDominance($m, $bd); }  // *TABLES*
13265       if (is_array($m)) { 
13266         $p = array_merge($p,$m); 
13267         $this->_mergeBorders($p,$m);  // mPDF 4.0
13268       }
13269     }
13270   }
13271 }
13272 
13273 // mPDF 4.0
13274 function _mergeBorders(&$b, &$a) {  // Merges $a['BORDER-TOP-STYLE'] to $b['BORDER-TOP'] etc.
13275   foreach(array('TOP','RIGHT','BOTTOM','LEFT') AS $side) {
13276     foreach(array('STYLE','WIDTH','COLOR') AS $el) {
13277   if (isset($a['BORDER-'.$side.'-'.$el])) { // e.g. $b['BORDER-TOP-STYLE']
13278     $s = trim($a['BORDER-'.$side.'-'.$el]);
13279     if (isset($b['BORDER-'.$side])) { // e.g. $b['BORDER-TOP']
13280       $p = trim($b['BORDER-'.$side]);
13281     }
13282     else { $p = ''; }
13283     if ($el=='STYLE') {
13284       if ($p) { $b['BORDER-'.$side] = preg_replace('/(\S+)\s+(\S+)\s+(\S+)/', '\\1 '.$s.' \\3', $p); }
13285       else { $b['BORDER-'.$side] = '0px '.$s.' #000000'; }
13286     }
13287     else if ($el=='WIDTH') {
13288       if ($p) { $b['BORDER-'.$side] = preg_replace('/(\S+)\s+(\S+)\s+(\S+)/', $s.' \\2 \\3', $p); }
13289       else { $b['BORDER-'.$side] = $s.' none #000000'; }
13290     }
13291     else if ($el=='COLOR') {
13292       if ($p) { $b['BORDER-'.$side] = preg_replace('/(\S+)\s+(\S+)\s+(\S+)/', '\\1 \\2 '.$s, $p); }
13293       else { $b['BORDER-'.$side] = '0px none '.$s; }
13294     }
13295     unset($a['BORDER-'.$side.'-'.$el]);
13296   }
13297     }
13298   }
13299 }
13300 
13301 
13302 function MergeCSS($inherit,$tag,$attr) {
13303   $p = array();
13304   $zp = array(); 
13305 
13306   $classes = array();
13307   if (isset($attr['CLASS'])) {
13308     $classes = preg_split('/\s+/',$attr['CLASS']);
13309   }
13310   //===============================================
13311 /*-- TABLES --*/
13312   // Set Inherited properties
13313   if ($inherit == 'TOPTABLE') { // $tag = TABLE
13314     //===============================================
13315     // Save Cascading CSS e.g. "div.topic p" at this block level
13316 
13317     if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['cascadeCSS'])) {
13318       $this->tablecascadeCSS[0] = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['cascadeCSS'];
13319     }
13320     else {
13321       $this->tablecascadeCSS[0] = $this->cascadeCSS;
13322     }
13323   }
13324   //===============================================
13325   // Set Inherited properties
13326   if ($inherit == 'TOPTABLE' || $inherit == 'TABLE') {
13327     //Cascade everything from last level that is not an actual property, or defined by current tag/attributes
13328     if (isset($this->tablecascadeCSS[$this->tbCSSlvl-1]) && is_array($this->tablecascadeCSS[$this->tbCSSlvl-1])) {
13329        foreach($this->tablecascadeCSS[$this->tbCSSlvl-1] AS $k=>$v) {
13330 //      if ($k != $tag && !preg_match('/^CLASS>>('.implode('|',$classes).')$/i',$k) && !preg_match('/^'.$tag.'>>CLASS>>('.implode('|',$classes).')$/i',$k) && $k != 'ID>>'.$attr['ID'] && $k != $tag.'>>ID>>'.$attr['ID'] && (preg_match('/(ID|CLASS)>>/',$k) || preg_match('/^('.$this->allowedCSStags.')(>>.*){0,1}$/',$k))) {
13331         $this->tablecascadeCSS[$this->tbCSSlvl][$k] = $v;
13332 //      }
13333        }
13334     }
13335     // mPDF 4.0
13336     $this->_mergeFullCSS($this->cascadeCSS, $this->tablecascadeCSS[$this->tbCSSlvl], $tag, $classes, $attr['ID']);
13337     //===============================================
13338     // Cascading forward CSS e.g. "table.topic td" for this table in $this->tablecascadeCSS 
13339     //===============================================
13340     // STYLESHEET TAG e.g. table
13341     // mPDF 4.0
13342     $this->_mergeFullCSS($this->tablecascadeCSS[$this->tbCSSlvl-1], $this->tablecascadeCSS[$this->tbCSSlvl], $tag, $classes, $attr['ID']);
13343     //===============================================
13344   }
13345 /*-- END TABLES --*/
13346   //===============================================
13347 /*-- LISTS --*/
13348   // Set Inherited properties
13349   if ($inherit == 'TOPLIST') {  // $tag = UL,OL
13350     //===============================================
13351     // Save Cascading CSS e.g. "div.topic p" at this block level
13352     if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['cascadeCSS'])) {
13353       $this->listcascadeCSS[0] = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['cascadeCSS'];
13354     }
13355     else {
13356       $this->listcascadeCSS[0] = $this->cascadeCSS;
13357     }
13358   }
13359   //===============================================
13360   // Set Inherited properties
13361   if ($inherit == 'TOPLIST' || $inherit == 'LIST') {
13362     //Cascade everything from last level that is not an actual property, or defined by current tag/attributes
13363     if (isset($this->listcascadeCSS[$this->listCSSlvl-1]) && is_array($this->listcascadeCSS[$this->listCSSlvl-1])) {
13364        foreach($this->listcascadeCSS[$this->listCSSlvl-1] AS $k=>$v) {
13365         $this->listcascadeCSS[$this->listCSSlvl][$k] = $v;
13366        }
13367     }
13368     // mPDF 4.0
13369     $this->_mergeFullCSS($this->cascadeCSS, $this->listcascadeCSS[$this->listCSSlvl], $tag, $classes, $attr['ID']);
13370     //===============================================
13371     // Cascading forward CSS e.g. "table.topic td" for this list in $this->listcascadeCSS 
13372     //===============================================
13373     // STYLESHEET TAG e.g. table
13374     // mPDF 4.0
13375     $this->_mergeFullCSS($this->listcascadeCSS[$this->listCSSlvl-1], $this->listcascadeCSS[$this->listCSSlvl], $tag, $classes, $attr['ID']);
13376     //===============================================
13377   }
13378 /*-- END LISTS --*/
13379   //===============================================
13380   // Set Inherited properties
13381   if ($inherit == 'BLOCK') {
13382     if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['cascadeCSS']) && is_array($this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['cascadeCSS'])) {
13383        foreach($this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['cascadeCSS'] AS $k=>$v) {
13384 //      if ($k != $tag && !preg_match('/^CLASS>>('.implode('|',$classes).')$/i',$k) && !preg_match('/^'.$tag.'>>CLASS>>('.implode('|',$classes).')$/i',$k) && $k != 'ID>>'.$attr['ID'] && $k != $tag.'>>ID>>'.$attr['ID'] && (preg_match('/(ID|CLASS)>>/',$k) || preg_match('/^('.$this->allowedCSStags.')(>>.*){0,1}$/',$k))) {
13385         $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['cascadeCSS'][$k] = $v;
13386 //      }
13387 
13388        }
13389     }
13390 
13391     //===============================================
13392     // Save Cascading CSS e.g. "div.topic p" at this block level
13393     // mPDF 4.0
13394     $this->_mergeFullCSS($this->cascadeCSS, $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['cascadeCSS'], $tag, $classes, $attr['ID']);
13395     //===============================================
13396     // Cascading forward CSS
13397     //===============================================
13398     // mPDF 4.0
13399     $this->_mergeFullCSS($this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['cascadeCSS'], $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['cascadeCSS'], $tag, $classes, $attr['ID']);
13400     //===============================================
13401       // Block properties
13402       if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['margin_collapse']) && $this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['margin_collapse']) { $p['MARGIN-COLLAPSE'] = 'COLLAPSE'; }  // custom tag, but follows CSS principle that border-collapse is inherited
13403       if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['line_height']) && $this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['line_height']) { $p['LINE-HEIGHT'] = $this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['line_height']; }  
13404       if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['align']) && $this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['align']) { 
13405       if ($this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['align'] == 'L') { $p['TEXT-ALIGN'] = 'left'; } 
13406       else if ($this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['align'] == 'J') { $p['TEXT-ALIGN'] = 'justify'; } 
13407       else if ($this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['align'] == 'R') { $p['TEXT-ALIGN'] = 'right'; } 
13408       else if ($this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['align'] == 'C') { $p['TEXT-ALIGN'] = 'center'; } 
13409       }
13410       // mPDF 3.0
13411       if ($this->ColActive || $this->keep_block_together) { 
13412         if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['bgcolor']) && $this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['bgcolor']) { // Doesn't officially inherit, but default value is transparent (?=inherited)
13413         $cor = $this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['bgcolorarray' ];
13414         $p['BACKGROUND-COLOR'] = 'RGB('.$cor['R'].','.$cor['G'].','.$cor['B'].')';
13415       }
13416       }
13417 
13418     // mPDF 4.0
13419     if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['text_indent']) && ($this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['text_indent'] || $this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['text_indent']===0)) { $p['TEXT-INDENT'] = $this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['text_indent']; }
13420 
13421     // mPDF 4.0
13422     $biilp = $this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['InlineProperties'];
13423     if (isset($biilp[ 'family' ]) && $biilp[ 'family' ]) { $p['FONT-FAMILY'] = $biilp[ 'family' ]; }
13424     if (isset($biilp[ 'I' ]) && $biilp[ 'I' ]) { $p['FONT-STYLE'] = 'italic'; }
13425     if (isset($biilp[ 'sizePt' ]) && $biilp[ 'sizePt' ]) { $p['FONT-SIZE'] = $biilp[ 'sizePt' ] . 'pt'; }
13426     if (isset($biilp[ 'B' ]) && $biilp[ 'B' ]) { $p['FONT-WEIGHT'] = 'bold'; }
13427     if (isset($biilp[ 'colorarray' ]) && $biilp[ 'colorarray' ]) { 
13428       $cor = $biilp[ 'colorarray' ];
13429       $p['COLOR'] = 'RGB('.$cor['R'].','.$cor['G'].','.$cor['B'].')';
13430     }
13431     if (isset($biilp[ 'toupper' ]) && $biilp[ 'toupper' ]) { $p['TEXT-TRANSFORM'] = 'uppercase'; }
13432     else if (isset($biilp[ 'tolower' ]) && $biilp[ 'tolower' ]) { $p['TEXT-TRANSFORM'] = 'lowercase'; }
13433       // CSS says text-decoration is not inherited, but IE7 does?? 
13434     if (isset($biilp[ 'underline' ]) && $biilp[ 'underline' ]) { $p['TEXT-DECORATION'] = 'underline'; }
13435 
13436   }
13437   //===============================================
13438   //===============================================
13439 /*-- LISTS --*/
13440   // Set Inherited properties
13441   // mPDF 4.2
13442   if ($inherit == 'TOPLIST') {
13443     if ($this->listCSSlvl == 1) {
13444         $bilp = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['InlineProperties'];
13445         if (isset($bilp[ 'family' ]) && $bilp[ 'family' ]) { $p['FONT-FAMILY'] = $bilp[ 'family' ]; }
13446           if (isset($bilp[ 'I' ]) && $bilp[ 'I' ]) { $p['FONT-STYLE'] = 'italic'; }
13447           if (isset($bilp[ 'sizePt' ]) && $bilp[ 'sizePt' ]) { $p['FONT-SIZE'] = $bilp[ 'sizePt' ] . 'pt'; }
13448           if (isset($bilp[ 'B' ]) && $bilp[ 'B' ]) { $p['FONT-WEIGHT'] = 'bold'; }
13449           if (isset($bilp[ 'colorarray' ]) && $bilp[ 'colorarray' ]) { 
13450       $cor = $bilp[ 'colorarray' ];
13451       $p['COLOR'] = 'RGB('.$cor['R'].','.$cor['G'].','.$cor['B'].')';
13452         }
13453         if (isset($bilp[ 'toupper' ]) && $bilp[ 'toupper' ]) { $p['TEXT-TRANSFORM'] = 'uppercase'; }
13454         else if (isset($bilp[ 'tolower' ]) && $bilp[ 'tolower' ]) { $p['TEXT-TRANSFORM'] = 'lowercase'; }
13455       // CSS says text-decoration is not inherited, but IE7 does??
13456         if (isset($bilp[ 'underline' ]) && $bilp[ 'underline' ]) { $p['TEXT-DECORATION'] = 'underline'; }
13457         if ($tag=='LI') { 
13458       $lilp = $this->InlineProperties['LIST'][$this->listlvl][$this->listoccur[$this->listlvl]];
13459       if (isset($lilp[ 'family' ]) && $lilp[ 'family' ]) { $p['FONT-FAMILY'] = $lilp[ 'family' ]; }
13460         if (isset($lilp[ 'I' ]) && $lilp[ 'I' ]) { $p['FONT-STYLE'] = 'italic'; }
13461         if (isset($lilp[ 'sizePt' ]) && $lilp[ 'sizePt' ]) { $p['FONT-SIZE'] = $lilp[ 'sizePt' ] . 'pt'; }
13462         if (isset($lilp[ 'B' ]) && $lilp[ 'B' ]) { $p['FONT-WEIGHT'] = 'bold'; }
13463         if (isset($lilp[ 'colorarray' ]) && $lilp[ 'colorarray' ]) { 
13464         $cor = $lilp[ 'colorarray' ];
13465         $p['COLOR'] = 'RGB('.$cor['R'].','.$cor['G'].','.$cor['B'].')';
13466       }
13467       if (isset($lilp[ 'toupper' ]) && $lilp[ 'toupper' ]) { $p['TEXT-TRANSFORM'] = 'uppercase'; }
13468       else if (isset($lilp[ 'tolower' ]) && $lilp[ 'tolower' ]) { $p['TEXT-TRANSFORM'] = 'lowercase'; }
13469       // CSS says text-decoration is not inherited, but IE7 does?? 
13470       if (isset($lilp[ 'underline' ]) && $lilp[ 'underline' ]) { $p['TEXT-DECORATION'] = 'underline'; }
13471         }
13472     }
13473   }
13474 /*-- END LISTS --*/
13475   //===============================================
13476   //===============================================
13477   // DEFAULT for this TAG set in DefaultCSS
13478   if (isset($this->defaultCSS[$tag])) { 
13479       $zp = $this->fixCSS($this->defaultCSS[$tag]);
13480 /*-- RTL --*/
13481       // mPDF 4.0  $rtlCSS can be any value
13482       if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { 
13483         if (isset($zp['TEXT-ALIGN'])) { $this->reverse_align($zp['TEXT-ALIGN']); }  // mPDF 4.0  
13484         $pl =  $zp['PADDING-LEFT'];
13485         $pr =  $zp['PADDING-RIGHT'];
13486         if ($pl || $pr) { $zp['PADDING-RIGHT'] = $pl; $zp['PADDING-LEFT'] = $pr; }
13487         $ml =  $zp['MARGIN-LEFT'];
13488         $mr =  $zp['MARGIN-RIGHT'];
13489         if ($ml || $mr) { $zp['MARGIN-RIGHT'] = $ml; $zp['MARGIN-LEFT'] = $mr; }
13490         $bl =  $zp['BORDER-LEFT'];
13491         $br =  $zp['BORDER-RIGHT'];
13492         if ($bl || $br) { $zp['BORDER-RIGHT'] = $bl; $zp['BORDER-LEFT'] = $br; }
13493       }
13494 /*-- END RTL --*/
13495       if (is_array($zp)) {  // Default overwrites Inherited
13496         $p = array_merge($p,$zp);   // !! Note other way round !!
13497         $this->_mergeBorders($p,$zp); // mPDF 4.0
13498       }
13499   }
13500   //===============================================
13501 /*-- TABLES --*/
13502   // mPDF 4.0 cellPadding overwrites TD/TH default but not specific CSS set on cell
13503   if (($tag=='TD' || $tag=='TH') && $this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['cell_padding']) { 
13504     $p['PADDING-LEFT'] = $this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['cell_padding'];
13505     $p['PADDING-RIGHT'] = $this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['cell_padding'];
13506     $p['PADDING-TOP'] = $this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['cell_padding'];
13507     $p['PADDING-BOTTOM'] = $this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['cell_padding'];
13508   }
13509 /*-- END TABLES --*/
13510   //===============================================
13511   // STYLESHEET TAG e.g. h1  p  div  table
13512   if (isset($this->CSS[$tag]) && $this->CSS[$tag]) { 
13513       $zp = $this->CSS[$tag];
13514       if ($tag=='TD' || $tag=='TH')  { $this->setBorderDominance($zp, 9); } // *TABLES* // *TABLES-ADVANCED-BORDERS*
13515       if (is_array($zp)) { 
13516         // mPDF 4.0
13517         if (($this->directionality == 'rtl') && ($this->rtlCSS > 0) && isset($zp['TEXT-ALIGN'])) { $this->reverse_align($zp['TEXT-ALIGN']); } // *RTL*
13518         $p = array_merge($p,$zp); 
13519         $this->_mergeBorders($p,$zp); // mPDF 4.0
13520       }
13521   }
13522   //===============================================
13523   // STYLESHEET CLASS e.g. .smallone{}  .redletter{}
13524   foreach($classes AS $class) {
13525       $zp = array();
13526       if (isset($this->CSS['CLASS>>'.$class]) && $this->CSS['CLASS>>'.$class]) { $zp = $this->CSS['CLASS>>'.$class]; }
13527       if ($tag=='TD' || $tag=='TH')  { $this->setBorderDominance($zp, 9); } // *TABLES* // *TABLES-ADVANCED-BORDERS*
13528       if (is_array($zp)) { 
13529         // mPDF 4.0
13530         if (($this->directionality == 'rtl') && ($this->rtlCSS > 0) && isset($zp['TEXT-ALIGN'])) { $this->reverse_align($zp['TEXT-ALIGN']); } // *RTL*
13531         $p = array_merge($p,$zp); 
13532         $this->_mergeBorders($p,$zp); // mPDF 4.0
13533       }
13534   }
13535   //===============================================
13536   // STYLESHEET ID e.g. #smallone{}  #redletter{}
13537   if (isset($attr['ID']) && isset($this->CSS['ID>>'.$attr['ID']]) && $this->CSS['ID>>'.$attr['ID']]) {
13538       $zp = $this->CSS['ID>>'.$attr['ID']];
13539       if ($tag=='TD' || $tag=='TH')  { $this->setBorderDominance($zp, 9); } // *TABLES* // *TABLES-ADVANCED-BORDERS*
13540       if (is_array($zp)) { 
13541         // mPDF 4.0
13542         if (($this->directionality == 'rtl') && ($this->rtlCSS > 0) && isset($zp['TEXT-ALIGN'])) { $this->reverse_align($zp['TEXT-ALIGN']); } // *RTL*
13543         $p = array_merge($p,$zp); 
13544         $this->_mergeBorders($p,$zp); // mPDF 4.0
13545       }
13546   }
13547   //===============================================
13548   // STYLESHEET CLASS e.g. p.smallone{}  div.redletter{}
13549   foreach($classes AS $class) {
13550       $zp = array();
13551       if (isset($this->CSS[$tag.'>>CLASS>>'.$class]) && $this->CSS[$tag.'>>CLASS>>'.$class]) { $zp = $this->CSS[$tag.'>>CLASS>>'.$class]; }
13552       if ($tag=='TD' || $tag=='TH')  { $this->setBorderDominance($zp, 9); } // *TABLES* // *TABLES-ADVANCED-BORDERS*
13553       if (is_array($zp)) { 
13554         // mPDF 4.0
13555         if (($this->directionality == 'rtl') && ($this->rtlCSS > 0) && isset($zp['TEXT-ALIGN'])) { $this->reverse_align($zp['TEXT-ALIGN']); } // *RTL*
13556         $p = array_merge($p,$zp); 
13557         $this->_mergeBorders($p,$zp); // mPDF 4.0
13558       }
13559   }
13560   //===============================================
13561   // STYLESHEET CLASS e.g. p#smallone{}  div#redletter{}
13562   if (isset($attr['ID']) && isset($this->CSS[$tag.'>>ID>>'.$attr['ID']]) && $this->CSS[$tag.'>>ID>>'.$attr['ID']]) {
13563       $zp = $this->CSS[$tag.'>>ID>>'.$attr['ID']];
13564       if ($tag=='TD' || $tag=='TH')  { $this->setBorderDominance($zp, 9); } // *TABLES* // *TABLES-ADVANCED-BORDERS*
13565       if (is_array($zp)) { 
13566         // mPDF 4.0
13567         if (($this->directionality == 'rtl') && ($this->rtlCSS > 0) && isset($zp['TEXT-ALIGN'])) { $this->reverse_align($zp['TEXT-ALIGN']); } // *RTL*
13568         $p = array_merge($p,$zp); 
13569         $this->_mergeBorders($p,$zp); // mPDF 4.0
13570       }
13571   }
13572   //===============================================
13573   // Cascaded e.g. div.class p only works for block level
13574   if ($inherit == 'BLOCK') {
13575     // mPDF 4.0
13576     $this->_set_mergedCSS($this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['cascadeCSS'][$tag], $p);
13577     foreach($classes AS $class) {
13578       $this->_set_mergedCSS($this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['cascadeCSS']['CLASS>>'.$class], $p);
13579     }
13580     $this->_set_mergedCSS($this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['cascadeCSS']['ID>>'.$attr['ID']], $p);
13581     foreach($classes AS $class) {
13582       $this->_set_mergedCSS($this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['cascadeCSS'][$tag.'>>CLASS>>'.$class], $p);
13583     }
13584     $this->_set_mergedCSS($this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['cascadeCSS'][$tag.'>>ID>>'.$attr['ID']], $p);
13585   }
13586   // mPDF 4.0
13587   else if ($inherit == 'INLINE') {
13588     // mPDF 4.0
13589     $this->_set_mergedCSS($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['cascadeCSS'][$tag], $p);
13590     foreach($classes AS $class) {
13591       $this->_set_mergedCSS($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['cascadeCSS']['CLASS>>'.$class], $p);
13592     }
13593     $this->_set_mergedCSS($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['cascadeCSS']['ID>>'.$attr['ID']], $p);
13594     foreach($classes AS $class) {
13595       $this->_set_mergedCSS($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['cascadeCSS'][$tag.'>>CLASS>>'.$class], $p);
13596     }
13597     $this->_set_mergedCSS($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['cascadeCSS'][$tag.'>>ID>>'.$attr['ID']], $p);
13598   }
13599 /*-- TABLES --*/
13600   else if ($inherit == 'TOPTABLE' || $inherit == 'TABLE') { // NB looks at $this->tablecascadeCSS-1 for cascading CSS
13601     // false, 9 = don't check for 'depth' and do set border dominance
13602     // mPDF 4.0
13603     $this->_set_mergedCSS($this->tablecascadeCSS[$this->tbCSSlvl-1][$tag], $p, false, 9);
13604     foreach($classes AS $class) {
13605       $this->_set_mergedCSS($this->tablecascadeCSS[$this->tbCSSlvl-1]['CLASS>>'.$class], $p, false, 9);
13606     }
13607     $this->_set_mergedCSS($this->tablecascadeCSS[$this->tbCSSlvl-1]['ID>>'.$attr['ID']], $p, false, 9);
13608     foreach($classes AS $class) {
13609       $this->_set_mergedCSS($this->tablecascadeCSS[$this->tbCSSlvl-1][$tag.'>>CLASS>>'.$class], $p, false, 9);
13610     }
13611     $this->_set_mergedCSS($this->tablecascadeCSS[$this->tbCSSlvl-1][$tag.'>>ID>>'.$attr['ID']], $p, false, 9);
13612   }
13613 /*-- END TABLES --*/
13614   //===============================================
13615 /*-- LISTS --*/
13616   else if ($inherit == 'TOPLIST' || $inherit == 'LIST') { // NB looks at $this->listcascadeCSS-1 for cascading CSS
13617     // false = don't check for 'depth' 
13618     // mPDF 4.0
13619     $this->_set_mergedCSS($this->listcascadeCSS[$this->listCSSlvl-1][$tag], $p, false);
13620     foreach($classes AS $class) {
13621       $this->_set_mergedCSS($this->listcascadeCSS[$this->listCSSlvl-1]['CLASS>>'.$class], $p, false);
13622     }
13623     $this->_set_mergedCSS($this->listcascadeCSS[$this->listCSSlvl-1]['ID>>'.$attr['ID']], $p, false);
13624     foreach($classes AS $class) {
13625       $this->_set_mergedCSS($this->listcascadeCSS[$this->listCSSlvl-1][$tag.'>>CLASS>>'.$class], $p, false);
13626     }
13627     $this->_set_mergedCSS($this->listcascadeCSS[$this->listCSSlvl-1][$tag.'>>ID>>'.$attr['ID']], $p, false);
13628   }
13629 /*-- END LISTS --*/
13630   //===============================================
13631   //===============================================
13632   // INLINE STYLE e.g. style="CSS:property"
13633   if (isset($attr['STYLE'])) {
13634       $zp = $this->readInlineCSS($attr['STYLE']);
13635       if ($tag=='TD' || $tag=='TH')  { $this->setBorderDominance($zp, 9); } // *TABLES* // *TABLES-ADVANCED-BORDERS*
13636       if (is_array($zp)) { 
13637         // mPDF 4.0
13638         if (($this->directionality == 'rtl') && ($this->rtlCSS > 1) && isset($zp['TEXT-ALIGN'])) {  // *RTL*
13639           $this->reverse_align($zp['TEXT-ALIGN']);  // *RTL*
13640         } // *RTL*
13641         $p = array_merge($p,$zp); 
13642         $this->_mergeBorders($p,$zp); // mPDF 4.0
13643       }
13644   }
13645   //===============================================
13646   //===============================================
13647   // INLINE ATTRIBUTES e.g. .. ALIGN="CENTER">
13648   if (isset($attr['LANG']) and $attr['LANG']!='') {
13649       $p['LANG'] = $attr['LANG'];
13650   }
13651   if (isset($attr['COLOR']) and $attr['COLOR']!='') {
13652       $p['COLOR'] = $attr['COLOR'];
13653   }
13654   if ($tag != 'INPUT') {
13655     if (isset($attr['WIDTH']) and $attr['WIDTH']!='') {
13656       $p['WIDTH'] = $attr['WIDTH'];
13657     }
13658     if (isset($attr['HEIGHT']) and $attr['HEIGHT']!='') {
13659       $p['HEIGHT'] = $attr['HEIGHT'];
13660     }
13661   }
13662   if ($tag == 'FONT') {
13663     if (isset($attr['FACE'])) {
13664       $p['FONT-FAMILY'] = $attr['FACE'];
13665     }
13666     if (isset($attr['SIZE']) and $attr['SIZE']!='') {
13667       $s = '';
13668       if ($attr['SIZE'] === '+1') { $s = '120%'; }
13669       else if ($attr['SIZE'] === '-1') { $s = '86%'; }
13670       else if ($attr['SIZE'] === '1') { $s = 'XX-SMALL'; }
13671       else if ($attr['SIZE'] == '2') { $s = 'X-SMALL'; }
13672       else if ($attr['SIZE'] == '3') { $s = 'SMALL'; }
13673       else if ($attr['SIZE'] == '4') { $s = 'MEDIUM'; }
13674       else if ($attr['SIZE'] == '5') { $s = 'LARGE'; }
13675       else if ($attr['SIZE'] == '6') { $s = 'X-LARGE'; }
13676       else if ($attr['SIZE'] == '7') { $s = 'XX-LARGE'; }
13677       if ($s) $p['FONT-SIZE'] = $s;
13678     }
13679   }
13680   if (isset($attr['VALIGN']) and $attr['VALIGN']!='') {
13681     $p['VERTICAL-ALIGN'] = $attr['VALIGN'];
13682   }
13683   if (isset($attr['VSPACE']) and $attr['VSPACE']!='') {
13684     $p['MARGIN-TOP'] = $attr['VSPACE'];
13685     $p['MARGIN-BOTTOM'] = $attr['VSPACE'];
13686   }
13687   if (isset($attr['HSPACE']) and $attr['HSPACE']!='') {
13688     $p['MARGIN-LEFT'] = $attr['HSPACE'];
13689     $p['MARGIN-RIGHT'] = $attr['HSPACE'];
13690   }
13691   //===============================================
13692   return $p;
13693 }
13694 
13695 
13696 /*-- CSS-PAGE --*/
13697 // mPDF 4.2
13698 function SetPagedMediaCSS($name='', $first, $oddEven) {
13699   if ($oddEven == 'E') { 
13700     if ($this->directionality=='rtl') { $side = 'R'; }
13701     else { $side = 'L'; }
13702   }
13703   else  { 
13704     if ($this->directionality=='rtl') { $side = 'L'; }
13705     else { $side = 'R'; }
13706   }
13707   $name = strtoupper($name);
13708   $p = array();
13709   $p['SIZE'] = 'AUTO';
13710 
13711   // Uses mPDF original margins as default
13712   $p['MARGIN-RIGHT'] = strval($this->orig_rMargin).'mm';
13713   $p['MARGIN-LEFT'] = strval($this->orig_lMargin).'mm';
13714   $p['MARGIN-TOP'] = strval($this->orig_tMargin).'mm';
13715   $p['MARGIN-BOTTOM'] = strval($this->orig_bMargin).'mm';
13716   $p['MARGIN-HEADER'] = strval($this->orig_hMargin).'mm';
13717   $p['MARGIN-FOOTER'] = strval($this->orig_fMargin).'mm';
13718 
13719   // Basic page + selector
13720   if (isset($this->CSS['@PAGE'])) { $zp = $this->CSS['@PAGE']; }
13721   else { $zp = array(); }
13722   if (is_array($zp) && !empty($zp)) { $p = array_merge($p,$zp); }
13723 
13724   if (isset($p['EVEN-HEADER-NAME']) && $oddEven=='E') { 
13725     $p['HEADER'] = $p['EVEN-HEADER-NAME']; unset($p['EVEN-HEADER-NAME']);
13726   }
13727   if (isset($p['ODD-HEADER-NAME']) && $oddEven!='E') { 
13728     $p['HEADER'] = $p['ODD-HEADER-NAME']; unset($p['ODD-HEADER-NAME']);
13729   }
13730   if (isset($p['EVEN-FOOTER-NAME']) && $oddEven=='E') { 
13731     $p['FOOTER'] = $p['EVEN-FOOTER-NAME']; unset($p['EVEN-FOOTER-NAME']);
13732   }
13733   if (isset($p['ODD-FOOTER-NAME']) && $oddEven!='E') { 
13734     $p['FOOTER'] = $p['ODD-FOOTER-NAME']; unset($p['ODD-FOOTER-NAME']);
13735   }
13736 
13737   // If right/Odd page
13738   if (isset($this->CSS['@PAGE>>PSEUDO>>RIGHT']) && $side=='R') { 
13739     $zp = $this->CSS['@PAGE>>PSEUDO>>RIGHT']; 
13740   }
13741   else { $zp = array(); }
13742   // mPDF 4.2.022 Disallow size or sheet-size on :LEFT or :RIGHT or :FIRST
13743   if (isset($zp['SIZE'])) { unset($zp['SIZE']); } 
13744   if (isset($zp['SHEET-SIZE'])) { unset($zp['SHEET-SIZE']); }  // mPDF 4.2.024 
13745   // Disallow margin-left or -right on :LEFT or :RIGHT
13746   if (isset($zp['MARGIN-LEFT'])) { unset($zp['MARGIN-LEFT']); } 
13747   if (isset($zp['MARGIN-RIGHT'])) { unset($zp['MARGIN-RIGHT']); } 
13748   if (is_array($zp) && !empty($zp)) { $p = array_merge($p,$zp); }
13749 
13750   // If left/Even page
13751   if (isset($this->CSS['@PAGE>>PSEUDO>>LEFT']) && $side=='L') {   // mPDF 4.2 This had RIGHT in error
13752     $zp = $this->CSS['@PAGE>>PSEUDO>>LEFT']; 
13753   }
13754   else { $zp = array(); }
13755   // mPDF 4.2.022 Disallow size or sheet-size on :LEFT or :RIGHT or :FIRST
13756   if (isset($zp['SIZE'])) { unset($zp['SIZE']); } 
13757   if (isset($zp['SHEET-SIZE'])) { unset($zp['SHEET-SIZE']); }  // mPDF 4.2.024 
13758   // Disallow margin-left or -right on :LEFT or :RIGHT
13759   if (isset($zp['MARGIN-LEFT'])) { unset($zp['MARGIN-LEFT']); } 
13760   if (isset($zp['MARGIN-RIGHT'])) { unset($zp['MARGIN-RIGHT']); } 
13761   if (is_array($zp) && !empty($zp)) { $p = array_merge($p,$zp);  }
13762 
13763   // If first page
13764   if (isset($this->CSS['@PAGE>>PSEUDO>>FIRST']) && $first) { $zp = $this->CSS['@PAGE>>PSEUDO>>FIRST']; }
13765   else { $zp = array(); }
13766   // mPDF 4.2.022 Disallow size or sheet-size on :LEFT or :RIGHT or :FIRST
13767   if (isset($zp['SIZE'])) { unset($zp['SIZE']); } 
13768   if (isset($zp['SHEET-SIZE'])) { unset($zp['SHEET-SIZE']); }  // mPDF 4.2.024 
13769   if (is_array($zp) && !empty($zp)) { $p = array_merge($p,$zp); }
13770 
13771   // If named page
13772   if ($name) {
13773     if (isset($this->CSS['@PAGE>>NAMED>>'.$name])) { $zp = $this->CSS['@PAGE>>NAMED>>'.$name]; }
13774     else { $zp = array(); }
13775     if (is_array($zp) && !empty($zp)) { $p = array_merge($p,$zp); }
13776 
13777     if (isset($p['EVEN-HEADER-NAME']) && $oddEven=='E') { 
13778       $p['HEADER'] = $p['EVEN-HEADER-NAME']; unset($p['EVEN-HEADER-NAME']);
13779     }
13780     if (isset($p['ODD-HEADER-NAME']) && $oddEven!='E') { 
13781       $p['HEADER'] = $p['ODD-HEADER-NAME']; unset($p['ODD-HEADER-NAME']);
13782     }
13783     if (isset($p['EVEN-FOOTER-NAME']) && $oddEven=='E') { 
13784       $p['FOOTER'] = $p['EVEN-FOOTER-NAME']; unset($p['EVEN-FOOTER-NAME']);
13785     }
13786     if (isset($p['ODD-FOOTER-NAME']) && $oddEven!='E') { 
13787       $p['FOOTER'] = $p['ODD-FOOTER-NAME']; unset($p['ODD-FOOTER-NAME']);
13788     }
13789 
13790     // If named right/Odd page
13791     if (isset($this->CSS['@PAGE>>NAMED>>'.$name.'>>PSEUDO>>RIGHT']) && $side=='R') { $zp = $this->CSS['@PAGE>>NAMED>>'.$name.'>>PSEUDO>>RIGHT']; }
13792     else { $zp = array(); }
13793     // mPDF 4.2.022 Disallow size or sheet-size on :LEFT or :RIGHT or :FIRST
13794     if (isset($zp['SIZE'])) { unset($zp['SIZE']); } 
13795     if (isset($zp['SHEET-SIZE'])) { unset($zp['SHEET-SIZE']); }  // mPDF 4.2.024 
13796     // Disallow margin-left or -right on :LEFT or :RIGHT
13797     if (isset($zp['MARGIN-LEFT'])) { unset($zp['MARGIN-LEFT']); } 
13798     if (isset($zp['MARGIN-RIGHT'])) { unset($zp['MARGIN-RIGHT']); } 
13799     if (is_array($zp) && !empty($zp)) { $p = array_merge($p,$zp); }
13800 
13801     // If named left/Even page
13802     if (isset($this->CSS['@PAGE>>NAMED>>'.$name.'>>PSEUDO>>LEFT']) && $side=='L') { $zp = $this->CSS['@PAGE>>NAMED>>'.$name.'>>PSEUDO>>LEFT']; }
13803     else { $zp = array(); }
13804     // mPDF 4.2.022 Disallow size or sheet-size on :LEFT or :RIGHT or :FIRST
13805     if (isset($zp['SIZE'])) { unset($zp['SIZE']); } 
13806     if (isset($zp['SHEET-SIZE'])) { unset($zp['SHEET-SIZE']); }  // mPDF 4.2.024 
13807     // Disallow margin-left or -right on :LEFT or :RIGHT
13808     if (isset($zp['MARGIN-LEFT'])) { unset($zp['MARGIN-LEFT']); } 
13809     if (isset($zp['MARGIN-RIGHT'])) { unset($zp['MARGIN-RIGHT']); } 
13810     if (is_array($zp) && !empty($zp)) { $p = array_merge($p,$zp); }
13811 
13812     // If named first page
13813     if (isset($this->CSS['@PAGE>>NAMED>>'.$name.'>>PSEUDO>>FIRST']) && $first) { $zp = $this->CSS['@PAGE>>NAMED>>'.$name.'>>PSEUDO>>FIRST']; }
13814     else { $zp = array(); }
13815     // mPDF 4.2.022 Disallow size or sheet-size on :LEFT or :RIGHT or :FIRST
13816     if (isset($zp['SIZE'])) { unset($zp['SIZE']); } 
13817     if (isset($zp['SHEET-SIZE'])) { unset($zp['SHEET-SIZE']); }  // mPDF 4.2.024 
13818     if (is_array($zp) && !empty($zp)) { $p = array_merge($p,$zp); }
13819   }
13820 
13821   // mPDF 4.2
13822   $orientation = $mgl = $mgr = $mgt = $mgb = $mgh = $mgf = '';
13823   $header = $footer = '';
13824   $resetpagenum = $pagenumstyle = $suppress = '';
13825   $marks = ''; 
13826   $bg = array();
13827   // mPDF 4.2.024 
13828   $newformat = '';
13829 
13830   // mPDF 4.2.024 
13831   if (isset($p['SHEET-SIZE']) && is_array($p['SHEET-SIZE'])) {
13832     $newformat = $p['SHEET-SIZE'];
13833     if ($newformat[0] > $newformat[1]) { // landscape
13834       $newformat = array_reverse($newformat);
13835       $p['ORIENTATION'] = 'L';
13836     }
13837     else { $p['ORIENTATION'] = 'P'; }
13838     $this->_setPageSize($newformat, $p['ORIENTATION']);
13839   }
13840 
13841   if (isset($p['SIZE']) && is_array($p['SIZE']) && !$newformat) { // mPDF 4.2.024
13842     if ($p['SIZE']['W'] > $p['SIZE']['H']) { $p['ORIENTATION'] = 'L'; }
13843     else { $p['ORIENTATION'] = 'P'; }
13844   }
13845   if (is_array($p['SIZE'])) {
13846     if ($p['SIZE']['W'] > $this->fw) { $p['SIZE']['W'] = $this->fw; } // mPD 4.2 use fw not fPt
13847     if ($p['SIZE']['H'] > $this->fh) { $p['SIZE']['H'] = $this->fh; }
13848     if (($p['ORIENTATION']==$this->DefOrientation && !$newformat) || ($newformat && $p['ORIENTATION']=='P')) {  // mPDF 4.2.024 
13849       $outer_width_LR = ($this->fw - $p['SIZE']['W'])/2;
13850       $outer_width_TB = ($this->fh - $p['SIZE']['H'])/2;
13851     }
13852     else {
13853       $outer_width_LR = ($this->fh - $p['SIZE']['W'])/2;
13854       $outer_width_TB = ($this->fw - $p['SIZE']['H'])/2;
13855     }
13856     $pgw = $p['SIZE']['W'];
13857     $pgh = $p['SIZE']['H'];
13858   }
13859   else {  // AUTO LANDSCAPE PORTRAIT
13860     $outer_width_LR = 0;
13861     $outer_width_TB = 0;
13862     // mPDF 4.2.024  If new sheet size not specified, set orientation based on page-box
13863     if (!$newformat) {
13864       if (strtoupper($p['SIZE']) == 'AUTO') { $p['ORIENTATION']=$this->DefOrientation; }
13865       else if (strtoupper($p['SIZE']) == 'LANDSCAPE') { $p['ORIENTATION']='L'; }
13866       else { $p['ORIENTATION']='P'; }
13867     }
13868     if (($p['ORIENTATION']==$this->DefOrientation && !$newformat) || ($newformat && $p['ORIENTATION']=='P')) {  // mPDF 4.2.024 
13869       $pgw = $this->fw;
13870       $pgh = $this->fh;
13871     }
13872     else {
13873       $pgw = $this->fh;
13874       $pgh = $this->fw;
13875     }
13876   }
13877 
13878   if (isset($p['HEADER']) && $p['HEADER']) { $header = $p['HEADER']; }
13879   if (isset($p['FOOTER']) && $p['FOOTER']) { $footer = $p['FOOTER']; }
13880   if (isset($p['RESETPAGENUM']) && $p['RESETPAGENUM']) { $resetpagenum = $p['RESETPAGENUM']; }
13881   if (isset($p['PAGENUMSTYLE']) && $p['PAGENUMSTYLE']) { $pagenumstyle = $p['PAGENUMSTYLE']; }
13882   if (isset($p['SUPPRESS']) && $p['SUPPRESS']) { $suppress = $p['SUPPRESS']; }
13883 
13884     if (strtoupper($p['MARKS']) == 'CROP') { $marks = 'CROP'; }
13885     else if (strtoupper($p['MARKS']) == 'CROSS') { $marks = 'CROSS'; }
13886 
13887   // mPDF 3.0
13888   if (isset($p['BACKGROUND-COLOR']) && $p['BACKGROUND-COLOR']) { $bg['BACKGROUND-COLOR'] = $p['BACKGROUND-COLOR']; }
13889   if (isset($p['BACKGROUND-GRADIENT']) && $p['BACKGROUND-GRADIENT']) { $bg['BACKGROUND-GRADIENT'] = $p['BACKGROUND-GRADIENT']; }  // *GRADIENTS*
13890   if (isset($p['BACKGROUND-IMAGE']) && $p['BACKGROUND-IMAGE']) { $bg['BACKGROUND-IMAGE'] = $p['BACKGROUND-IMAGE']; }  // *BACKGROUND-IMAGES*
13891   if (isset($p['BACKGROUND-REPEAT']) && $p['BACKGROUND-REPEAT']) { $bg['BACKGROUND-REPEAT'] = $p['BACKGROUND-REPEAT']; }  // *BACKGROUND-IMAGES*
13892   if (isset($p['BACKGROUND-POSITION']) && $p['BACKGROUND-POSITION']) { $bg['BACKGROUND-POSITION'] = $p['BACKGROUND-POSITION']; }  // *BACKGROUND-IMAGES*
13893 
13894   if (isset($p['MARGIN-LEFT'])) { $mgl = $this->ConvertSize($p['MARGIN-LEFT'],$pgw) + $outer_width_LR; }
13895   if (isset($p['MARGIN-RIGHT'])) { $mgr = $this->ConvertSize($p['MARGIN-RIGHT'],$pgw) + $outer_width_LR; }
13896   if (isset($p['MARGIN-BOTTOM'])) { $mgb = $this->ConvertSize($p['MARGIN-BOTTOM'],$pgh) + $outer_width_TB; }
13897   if (isset($p['MARGIN-TOP'])) { $mgt = $this->ConvertSize($p['MARGIN-TOP'],$pgh) + $outer_width_TB; }
13898   if (isset($p['MARGIN-HEADER'])) { $mgh = $this->ConvertSize($p['MARGIN-HEADER'],$pgh) + $outer_width_TB; }
13899   if (isset($p['MARGIN-FOOTER'])) { $mgf = $this->ConvertSize($p['MARGIN-FOOTER'],$pgh) + $outer_width_TB; }
13900 
13901   if (isset($p['ORIENTATION']) && $p['ORIENTATION']) { $orientation = $p['ORIENTATION']; }
13902   $this->page_box['outer_width_LR'] = $outer_width_LR;  // Used in MARKS:crop etc.
13903   $this->page_box['outer_width_TB'] = $outer_width_TB;
13904   // mPDF 4.2
13905   // mPDF 4.2.024 
13906   return array($orientation,$mgl,$mgr,$mgt,$mgb,$mgh,$mgf,$header,$footer,$bg,$resetpagenum,$pagenumstyle,$suppress,$marks,$newformat);
13907 }
13908 /*-- END CSS-PAGE --*/
13909 
13910 function PreviewBlockCSS($tag,$attr) {
13911   // Looks ahead from current block level to a new level
13912   $p = array();
13913   $zp = array(); 
13914   $oldcascadeCSS = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['cascadeCSS'];
13915   $classes = array();
13916   if (isset($attr['CLASS'])) { $classes = preg_split('/\s+/',$attr['CLASS']); }
13917   //===============================================
13918   // DEFAULT for this TAG set in DefaultCSS
13919   if (isset($this->defaultCSS[$tag])) { 
13920     $zp = $this->fixCSS($this->defaultCSS[$tag]);
13921     if (is_array($zp)) { $p = array_merge($zp,$p); }  // Inherited overwrites default
13922   }
13923   // STYLESHEET TAG e.g. h1  p  div  table
13924   if (isset($this->CSS[$tag])) { 
13925     $zp = $this->CSS[$tag];
13926     if (is_array($zp)) { $p = array_merge($p,$zp); }
13927   }
13928   // STYLESHEET CLASS e.g. .smallone{}  .redletter{}
13929   foreach($classes AS $class) {
13930     $zp = array(); 
13931     if (isset($this->CSS['CLASS>>'.$class])) { $zp = $this->CSS['CLASS>>'.$class]; }
13932     if (is_array($zp)) { $p = array_merge($p,$zp); }
13933   }
13934   // STYLESHEET ID e.g. #smallone{}  #redletter{}
13935   if (isset($attr['ID']) && isset($this->CSS['ID>>'.$attr['ID']])) {
13936     $zp = $this->CSS['ID>>'.$attr['ID']];
13937     if (is_array($zp)) { $p = array_merge($p,$zp); }
13938   }
13939   // STYLESHEET CLASS e.g. p.smallone{}  div.redletter{}
13940   foreach($classes AS $class) {
13941     $zp = array(); 
13942     if (isset($this->CSS[$tag.'>>CLASS>>'.$class])) { $zp = $this->CSS[$tag.'>>CLASS>>'.$class]; }
13943     if (is_array($zp)) { $p = array_merge($p,$zp); }
13944   }
13945   // STYLESHEET CLASS e.g. p#smallone{}  div#redletter{}
13946   if (isset($attr['ID']) && isset($this->CSS[$tag.'>>ID>>'.$attr['ID']])) {
13947     $zp = $this->CSS[$tag.'>>ID>>'.$attr['ID']];
13948     if (is_array($zp)) { $p = array_merge($p,$zp); }
13949   }
13950   //===============================================
13951   // STYLESHEET TAG e.g. div h1    div p
13952   // mPDF 4.0
13953   $this->_set_mergedCSS($oldcascadeCSS[$tag], $p);
13954   // STYLESHEET CLASS e.g. .smallone{}  .redletter{}
13955   foreach($classes AS $class) {
13956     // mPDF 4.0
13957     $this->_set_mergedCSS($oldcascadeCSS['CLASS>>'.$class], $p);
13958   }
13959   // STYLESHEET CLASS e.g. #smallone{}  #redletter{}
13960   if (isset($attr['ID'])) {
13961     // mPDF 4.0
13962     $this->_set_mergedCSS($oldcascadeCSS['ID>>'.$attr['ID']], $p);
13963   }
13964   // STYLESHEET CLASS e.g. div.smallone{}  p.redletter{}
13965   foreach($classes AS $class) {
13966     // mPDF 4.0
13967     $this->_set_mergedCSS($oldcascadeCSS[$tag.'>>CLASS>>'.$class], $p);
13968   }
13969   // STYLESHEET CLASS e.g. div#smallone{}  p#redletter{}
13970   if (isset($attr['ID'])) {
13971     // mPDF 4.0
13972     $this->_set_mergedCSS($oldcascadeCSS[$tag.'>>ID>>'.$attr['ID']], $p);
13973   }
13974   //===============================================
13975   // INLINE STYLE e.g. style="CSS:property"
13976   if (isset($attr['STYLE'])) {
13977     $zp = $this->readInlineCSS($attr['STYLE']);
13978     if (is_array($zp)) { $p = array_merge($p,$zp); }
13979   }
13980   //===============================================
13981   return $p;
13982 }
13983 
13984 
13985 
13986 /*-- CSS-FLOAT --*/
13987 // Added mPDF 3.0 Float DIV - CLEAR
13988 function ClearFloats($clear, $blklvl=0) {
13989   list($l_exists, $r_exists, $l_max, $r_max, $l_width, $r_width) = $this->GetFloatDivInfo($blklvl,true);
13990   $end = $currpos = ($this->page*1000 + $this->y);
13991   if ($clear == 'BOTH' && ($l_exists || $r_exists)) {
13992 // mPDF 4.0   $this->Reset();
13993     $this->pageoutput[$this->page] = array();
13994     $end = max($l_max, $r_max, $currpos);
13995   }
13996   else if ($clear == 'RIGHT' && $r_exists) {
13997 // mPDF 4.0   $this->Reset();
13998     $this->pageoutput[$this->page] = array();
13999     $end = max($r_max, $currpos);
14000   }
14001   else if ($clear == 'LEFT' && $l_exists ) {
14002 // mPDF 4.0   $this->Reset();
14003     $this->pageoutput[$this->page] = array();
14004     $end = max($l_max, $currpos);
14005   }
14006   else { return; }
14007   $old_page = $this->page;
14008   $new_page = intval($end/1000);
14009   if ($old_page != $new_page) {
14010     $s = $this->PrintPageBackgrounds();
14011     // Writes after the marker so not overwritten later by page background etc.
14012     $this->pages[$this->page] = preg_replace('/(___BACKGROUND___PATTERNS'.date('jY').')/', '\\1'."\n".$s."\n", $this->pages[$this->page]);
14013     $this->pageBackgrounds = array();
14014     $this->page = $new_page;
14015   }
14016   $this->ResetMargins();
14017 // mPDF 4.0 $this->Reset();
14018   $this->pageoutput[$this->page] = array();
14019   $this->y = (($end*1000) % 1000000)/1000;  // mod changes operands to integers before processing
14020 }
14021 
14022 
14023 // Added mPDF 3.0 Float DIV
14024 function GetFloatDivInfo($blklvl=0,$clear=false) {
14025   // If blklvl specified, only returns floats at that level - for ClearFloats
14026   $l_exists = false;
14027   $r_exists = false;
14028   $l_max = 0;
14029   $r_max = 0;
14030   $l_width = 0;
14031   $r_width = 0;
14032   if (count($this->floatDivs)) {
14033     $currpos = ($this->page*1000 + $this->y);
14034     foreach($this->floatDivs AS $f) {
14035       if (($clear && $f['blockContext'] == $this->blk[$blklvl]['blockContext']) || (!$clear && $currpos >= $f['startpos'] && $currpos < ($f['endpos']-0.001) && $f['blklvl'] > $blklvl && $f['blockContext'] == $this->blk[$blklvl]['blockContext'])) {
14036     if ($f['side']=='L') {
14037       $l_exists= true;
14038       $l_max = max($l_max, $f['endpos']);
14039       $l_width = max($l_width , $f['w']);
14040     }
14041     if ($f['side']=='R') {
14042       $r_exists= true;
14043       $r_max = max($r_max, $f['endpos']);
14044       $r_width = max($r_width , $f['w']);
14045     }
14046       }
14047     }
14048   }
14049   return array($l_exists, $r_exists, $l_max, $r_max, $l_width, $r_width);
14050 }
14051 /*-- END CSS-FLOAT --*/
14052 
14053 
14054 
14055 
14056 function OpenTag($tag,$attr)
14057 {
14058 
14059   // What this gets: < $tag $attr['WIDTH']="90px" > does not get content here </closeTag here>
14060   // Correct tags where HTML specifies optional end tags,
14061   // and/or does not allow nesting e.g. P inside P, or 
14062   if ($this->allow_html_optional_endtags) {
14063     if (($tag == 'P' || $tag == 'DIV' || $tag == 'H1' || $tag == 'H2' || $tag == 'H3' || $tag == 'H4' || $tag == 'H5' || $tag == 'H6' || $tag == 'UL' || $tag == 'OL' || $tag == 'TABLE' || $tag=='PRE' || $tag=='FORM' || $tag=='ADDRESS' || $tag=='BLOCKQUOTE' || $tag=='CENTER' || $tag=='DL' || $tag == 'HR' ) && $this->lastoptionaltag == 'P') { $this->CloseTag($this->lastoptionaltag ); }
14064     if ($tag == 'DD' && $this->lastoptionaltag == 'DD') { $this->CloseTag($this->lastoptionaltag ); }
14065     if ($tag == 'DD' && $this->lastoptionaltag == 'DT') { $this->CloseTag($this->lastoptionaltag ); }
14066     if ($tag == 'DT' && $this->lastoptionaltag == 'DD') { $this->CloseTag($this->lastoptionaltag ); }
14067     if ($tag == 'DT' && $this->lastoptionaltag == 'DT') { $this->CloseTag($this->lastoptionaltag ); }
14068     if ($tag == 'LI' && $this->lastoptionaltag == 'LI') { $this->CloseTag($this->lastoptionaltag ); }
14069     if (($tag == 'TD' || $tag == 'TH') && $this->lastoptionaltag == 'TD') { $this->CloseTag($this->lastoptionaltag ); } // *TABLES*
14070     if (($tag == 'TD' || $tag == 'TH') && $this->lastoptionaltag == 'TH') { $this->CloseTag($this->lastoptionaltag ); } // *TABLES*
14071     if ($tag == 'TR' && $this->lastoptionaltag == 'TR') { $this->CloseTag($this->lastoptionaltag ); } // *TABLES*
14072     if ($tag == 'TR' && $this->lastoptionaltag == 'TD') { $this->CloseTag($this->lastoptionaltag );  $this->CloseTag('TR'); $this->CloseTag('THEAD'); } // *TABLES*
14073     if ($tag == 'TR' && $this->lastoptionaltag == 'TH') { $this->CloseTag($this->lastoptionaltag );  $this->CloseTag('TR'); $this->CloseTag('THEAD'); } // *TABLES*
14074     if ($tag == 'OPTION' && $this->lastoptionaltag == 'OPTION') { $this->CloseTag($this->lastoptionaltag ); }
14075   }
14076 
14077   // mPDF 4.2 Baseline = S
14078   $align = array('left'=>'L','center'=>'C','right'=>'R','top'=>'T','text-top'=>'TT','middle'=>'M','baseline'=>'BS','bottom'=>'B','text-bottom'=>'TB','justify'=>'J');
14079 
14080   $this->ignorefollowingspaces=false;
14081 
14082   //Opening tag
14083   switch($tag){
14084 
14085      // mPDF 4.2.031
14086      case 'DOTTAB': 
14087   $objattr = array();
14088   $objattr['type'] = 'dottab';
14089   $dots=str_repeat('.', 3)."  ";  // minimum number of dots
14090   $objattr['width'] = $this->GetStringWidth($dots);
14091   $objattr['margin_top'] = 0;
14092   $objattr['margin_bottom'] = 0;
14093   $objattr['margin_left'] = 0;
14094   $objattr['margin_right'] = 0;
14095   $objattr['height'] = 0;
14096   $objattr['border_top']['w'] = 0;
14097   $objattr['border_bottom']['w'] = 0;
14098   $objattr['border_left']['w'] = 0;
14099   $objattr['border_right']['w'] = 0;
14100   $e = "\xbb\xa4\xactype=dottab,objattr=".serialize($objattr)."\xbb\xa4\xac";
14101 /*-- TABLES --*/
14102   // Output it to buffers
14103   if ($this->tableLevel) {
14104     if (!isset($this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['maxs'])) {
14105       $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['maxs'] = $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s'];
14106     }
14107     elseif($this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['maxs'] < $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s']) {
14108       $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['maxs'] = $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s']; 
14109     }
14110     $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s'] = 0 ;// reset
14111     $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['textbuffer'][] = array($e,$this->HREF,$this->currentfontstyle,$this->colorarray,$this->currentfontfamily,$this->SUP,$this->SUB,'',$this->strike,$this->outlineparam,$this->spanbgcolorarray,$this->currentfontsize,$this->ReqFontStyle);
14112   }
14113   else {
14114 /*-- END TABLES --*/
14115     $this->textbuffer[] = array($e,$this->HREF,$this->currentfontstyle,$this->colorarray,$this->currentfontfamily,$this->SUP,$this->SUB,'',$this->strike,$this->outlineparam,$this->spanbgcolorarray,$this->currentfontsize,$this->ReqFontStyle);
14116   } // *TABLES*
14117   break;
14118 
14119      case 'PAGEHEADER': 
14120      case 'PAGEFOOTER':
14121   $this->ignorefollowingspaces = true; 
14122   if ($attr['NAME']) { $pname = $attr['NAME']; }
14123   else { $pname = '_default'; }
14124 
14125     if ($tag=='PAGEHEADER') { $p = &$this->pageheaders[$pname]; }
14126     else { $p = &$this->pagefooters[$pname]; }
14127 
14128     $p['L']=array();
14129     $p['C']=array();
14130     $p['R']=array();
14131     $p['L']['font-style'] = ''; 
14132     $p['C']['font-style'] = ''; 
14133     $p['R']['font-style'] = ''; 
14134 
14135     if (isset($attr['CONTENT-LEFT'])) {
14136       $p['L']['content'] = $attr['CONTENT-LEFT'];
14137     }
14138     if (isset($attr['CONTENT-CENTER'])) {
14139       $p['C']['content'] = $attr['CONTENT-CENTER'];
14140     }
14141     if (isset($attr['CONTENT-RIGHT'])) {
14142       $p['R']['content'] = $attr['CONTENT-RIGHT'];
14143     }
14144 
14145     if (isset($attr['HEADER-STYLE']) || isset($attr['FOOTER-STYLE'])) { // font-family,size,weight,style,color
14146       if ($tag=='PAGEHEADER') { $properties = $this->readInlineCSS($attr['HEADER-STYLE']); }
14147       else { $properties = $this->readInlineCSS($attr['FOOTER-STYLE']); }
14148       if (isset($properties['FONT-FAMILY'])) { 
14149         $p['L']['font-family'] = $properties['FONT-FAMILY']; 
14150         $p['C']['font-family'] = $properties['FONT-FAMILY']; 
14151         $p['R']['font-family'] = $properties['FONT-FAMILY']; 
14152       }
14153       if (isset($properties['FONT-SIZE'])) { 
14154         $p['L']['font-size'] = $this->ConvertSize($properties['FONT-SIZE']) * $this->k; 
14155         $p['C']['font-size'] = $this->ConvertSize($properties['FONT-SIZE']) * $this->k; 
14156         $p['R']['font-size'] = $this->ConvertSize($properties['FONT-SIZE']) * $this->k; 
14157       }
14158       if (isset($properties['FONT-WEIGHT']) && $properties['FONT-WEIGHT']=='BOLD') { 
14159         $p['L']['font-style'] = 'B'; 
14160         $p['C']['font-style'] = 'B'; 
14161         $p['R']['font-style'] = 'B'; 
14162       }
14163       if (isset($properties['FONT-STYLE']) && $properties['FONT-STYLE']=='ITALIC') { 
14164         $p['L']['font-style'] .= 'I'; 
14165         $p['C']['font-style'] .= 'I'; 
14166         $p['R']['font-style'] .= 'I'; 
14167       }
14168       if (isset($properties['COLOR'])) { 
14169         $p['L']['color'] = $properties['COLOR']; 
14170         $p['C']['color'] = $properties['COLOR']; 
14171         $p['R']['color'] = $properties['COLOR']; 
14172       }
14173     }
14174     if (isset($attr['HEADER-STYLE-LEFT']) || isset($attr['FOOTER-STYLE-LEFT'])) {
14175       if ($tag=='PAGEHEADER') { $properties = $this->readInlineCSS($attr['HEADER-STYLE-LEFT']); }
14176       else { $properties = $this->readInlineCSS($attr['FOOTER-STYLE-LEFT']); }
14177       if (isset($properties['FONT-FAMILY'])) { $p['L']['font-family'] = $properties['FONT-FAMILY']; }
14178       if (isset($properties['FONT-SIZE'])) { $p['L']['font-size'] = $this->ConvertSize($properties['FONT-SIZE']) * $this->k; }
14179       if (isset($properties['FONT-WEIGHT']) && $properties['FONT-WEIGHT']=='BOLD') { $p['L']['font-style'] ='B'; }
14180       if (isset($properties['FONT-STYLE']) && $properties['FONT-STYLE']=='ITALIC') { $p['L']['font-style'] .='I'; }
14181       if (isset($properties['COLOR'])) { $p['L']['color'] = $properties['COLOR']; }
14182     }
14183     if (isset($attr['HEADER-STYLE-CENTER']) || isset($attr['FOOTER-STYLE-CENTER'])) {
14184       if ($tag=='PAGEHEADER') { $properties = $this->readInlineCSS($attr['HEADER-STYLE-CENTER']); }
14185       else { $properties = $this->readInlineCSS($attr['FOOTER-STYLE-CENTER']); }
14186       if (isset($properties['FONT-FAMILY'])) { $p['C']['font-family'] = $properties['FONT-FAMILY']; }
14187       if (isset($properties['FONT-SIZE'])) { $p['C']['font-size'] = $this->ConvertSize($properties['FONT-SIZE']) * $this->k; }
14188       if (isset($properties['FONT-WEIGHT']) && $properties['FONT-WEIGHT']=='BOLD') { $p['C']['font-style'] = 'B'; }
14189       if (isset($properties['FONT-STYLE']) && $properties['FONT-STYLE']=='ITALIC') { $p['C']['font-style'] .= 'I'; }
14190       if (isset($properties['COLOR'])) { $p['C']['color'] = $properties['COLOR']; }
14191     }
14192     if (isset($attr['HEADER-STYLE-RIGHT']) || isset($attr['FOOTER-STYLE-RIGHT'])) {
14193       if ($tag=='PAGEHEADER') { $properties = $this->readInlineCSS($attr['HEADER-STYLE-RIGHT']); }
14194       else { $properties = $this->readInlineCSS($attr['FOOTER-STYLE-RIGHT']); }
14195       if (isset($properties['FONT-FAMILY'])) { $p['R']['font-family'] = $properties['FONT-FAMILY']; }
14196       if (isset($properties['FONT-SIZE'])) { $p['R']['font-size'] = $this->ConvertSize($properties['FONT-SIZE']) * $this->k; }
14197       if (isset($properties['FONT-WEIGHT']) && $properties['FONT-WEIGHT']=='BOLD') { $p['R']['font-style'] = 'B'; }
14198       if (isset($properties['FONT-STYLE']) && $properties['FONT-STYLE']=='ITALIC') { $p['R']['font-style'] .= 'I'; }
14199       if (isset($properties['COLOR'])) { $p['R']['color'] = $properties['COLOR']; }
14200     }
14201     if (isset($attr['LINE']) && $attr['LINE']) {  // 0|1|on|off
14202       if ($attr['LINE']=='1' || strtoupper($attr['LINE'])=='ON') { $lineset=1; }
14203       else { $lineset=0; }
14204       $p['line'] = $lineset;
14205     }
14206   break;
14207 
14208 
14209 /*-- HTMLHEADERS-FOOTERS --*/
14210      case 'SETHTMLPAGEHEADER': 
14211      case 'SETHTMLPAGEFOOTER':
14212   $this->ignorefollowingspaces = true; 
14213   if (isset($attr['NAME']) && $attr['NAME']) { $pname = $attr['NAME']; }
14214   else { $pname = '_default'; }
14215   if (isset($attr['PAGE']) && $attr['PAGE']) {  // O|odd|even|E|ALL|[blank]
14216     if (strtoupper($attr['PAGE'])=='O' || strtoupper($attr['PAGE'])=='ODD') { $side='odd'; }
14217     else if (strtoupper($attr['PAGE'])=='E' || strtoupper($attr['PAGE'])=='EVEN') { $side='even'; }
14218     else if (strtoupper($attr['PAGE'])=='ALL') { $side='both'; }
14219     else { $side='odd'; }
14220   }
14221   else { $side='odd'; }
14222   if (isset($attr['VALUE']) && $attr['VALUE']) {  // -1|1|on|off
14223     if ($attr['VALUE']=='1' || strtoupper($attr['VALUE'])=='ON') { $set=1; }
14224     else if ($attr['VALUE']=='-1' || strtoupper($attr['VALUE'])=='OFF') { $set=0; }
14225     else { $set=1; }
14226   }
14227   else { $set=1; }
14228   if (isset($attr['SHOW-THIS-PAGE']) && $attr['SHOW-THIS-PAGE'] && $tag=='SETHTMLPAGEHEADER') { $write = 1; }
14229   else { $write = 0; }
14230   if ($side=='odd' || $side=='both') {
14231     if ($set && $tag=='SETHTMLPAGEHEADER') { $this->SetHTMLHeader($this->pageHTMLheaders[$pname],'O',$write); }
14232     else if ($set && $tag=='SETHTMLPAGEFOOTER') { $this->SetHTMLFooter($this->pageHTMLfooters[$pname],'O'); }
14233     else if ($tag=='SETHTMLPAGEHEADER') { $this->SetHTMLHeader('','O'); }
14234     else { $this->SetHTMLFooter('','O'); }
14235   }
14236   if ($side=='even' || $side=='both') {
14237     if ($set && $tag=='SETHTMLPAGEHEADER') { $this->SetHTMLHeader($this->pageHTMLheaders[$pname],'E',$write); }
14238     else if ($set && $tag=='SETHTMLPAGEFOOTER') { $this->SetHTMLFooter($this->pageHTMLfooters[$pname],'E'); }
14239     else if ($tag=='SETHTMLPAGEHEADER') { $this->SetHTMLHeader('','E'); }
14240     else { $this->SetHTMLFooter('','E'); }
14241   }
14242   break;
14243 /*-- END HTMLHEADERS-FOOTERS --*/
14244 
14245      case 'SETPAGEHEADER': 
14246      case 'SETPAGEFOOTER':
14247   $this->ignorefollowingspaces = true; 
14248   if (isset($attr['NAME']) && $attr['NAME']) { $pname = $attr['NAME']; }
14249   else { $pname = '_default'; }
14250   if (isset($attr['PAGE']) && $attr['PAGE']) {  // O|odd|even|E|ALL|[blank]
14251     if (strtoupper($attr['PAGE'])=='O' || strtoupper($attr['PAGE'])=='ODD') { $side='odd'; }
14252     else if (strtoupper($attr['PAGE'])=='E' || strtoupper($attr['PAGE'])=='EVEN') { $side='even'; }
14253     else if (strtoupper($attr['PAGE'])=='ALL') { $side='both'; }
14254     else { $side='odd'; }
14255   }
14256   else { $side='odd'; }
14257   if (isset($attr['VALUE']) && $attr['VALUE']) {  // -1|1|on|off
14258     if ($attr['VALUE']=='1' || strtoupper($attr['VALUE'])=='ON') { $set=1; }
14259     else if ($attr['VALUE']=='-1' || strtoupper($attr['VALUE'])=='OFF') { $set=0; }
14260     else { $set=1; }
14261   }
14262   else { $set=1; }
14263   if ($side=='odd' || $side=='both') {
14264     if ($set && $tag=='SETPAGEHEADER') { $this->headerDetails['odd'] = $this->pageheaders[$pname]; }
14265     else if ($set && $tag=='SETPAGEFOOTER') { $this->footerDetails['odd'] = $this->pagefooters[$pname]; }
14266     else if ($tag=='SETPAGEHEADER') { $this->headerDetails['odd'] = array(); }
14267     else { $this->footerDetails['odd'] = array(); }
14268     // mPDF 4.0
14269     if (!$this->mirrorMargins || ($this->page)%2!=0) {  // ODD
14270       if ($tag=='SETPAGEHEADER') { $this->_setAutoHeaderHeight($this->headerDetails['odd'],$this->HTMLHeader); }
14271       if ($tag=='SETPAGEFOOTER') { $this->_setAutoFooterHeight($this->footerDetails['odd'],$this->HTMLFooter); }
14272     }
14273   }
14274   if ($side=='even' || $side=='both') {
14275     if ($set && $tag=='SETPAGEHEADER') { $this->headerDetails['even'] = $this->pageheaders[$pname]; }
14276     else if ($set && $tag=='SETPAGEFOOTER') { $this->footerDetails['even'] = $this->pagefooters[$pname]; }
14277     else if ($tag=='SETPAGEHEADER') { $this->headerDetails['even'] = array(); }
14278     else { $this->footerDetails['even'] = array(); }
14279     // mPDF 4.0
14280     if ($this->mirrorMargins && ($this->page)%2==0) { // EVEN
14281       if ($tag=='SETPAGEHEADER') { $this->_setAutoHeaderHeight($this->headerDetails['even'],$this->HTMLHeaderE); }
14282       if ($tag=='SETPAGEFOOTER') { $this->_setAutoFooterHeight($this->footerDetails['even'],$this->HTMLFooterE); }
14283     }
14284   }
14285   if (isset($attr['SHOW-THIS-PAGE']) && $attr['SHOW-THIS-PAGE'] && $tag=='SETPAGEHEADER') {
14286     $this->Header();
14287   }
14288   break;
14289 
14290 
14291 /*-- TOC --*/
14292      case 'TOC': //added custom-tag - set Marker for insertion later of ToC
14293   if (isset($attr['FONT-SIZE']) && $attr['FONT-SIZE']) { $tocfontsize = $attr['FONT-SIZE']; } else { $tocfontsize = ''; }
14294   if (isset($attr['FONT']) && $attr['FONT']) { $tocfont = $attr['FONT']; } else { $tocfont = ''; }
14295   if (isset($attr['INDENT']) && $attr['INDENT']) { $tocindent = $attr['INDENT']; } else { $tocindent = ''; }
14296   if (isset($attr['RESETPAGENUM']) && $attr['RESETPAGENUM']) { $resetpagenum = $attr['RESETPAGENUM']; } else { $resetpagenum = ''; }
14297   if (isset($attr['PAGENUMSTYLE']) && $attr['PAGENUMSTYLE']) { $pagenumstyle = $attr['PAGENUMSTYLE']; } else { $pagenumstyle= ''; }
14298   if (isset($attr['SUPPRESS']) && $attr['SUPPRESS']) { $suppress = $attr['SUPPRESS']; } else { $suppress = ''; }
14299   if (isset($attr['TOC-ORIENTATION']) && $attr['TOC-ORIENTATION']) { $toc_orientation = $attr['TOC-ORIENTATION']; } else { $toc_orientation = ''; }
14300   if (isset($attr['PAGING']) && (strtoupper($attr['PAGING'])=='OFF' || $attr['PAGING']==='0')) { $paging = false; }
14301   else { $paging = true; }
14302   if (isset($attr['LINKS']) && (strtoupper($attr['LINKS'])=='ON' || $attr['LINKS']==1)) { $links = true; }
14303   else { $links = false; }
14304   if (isset($attr['NAME']) && $attr['NAME']) { $toc_id = strtolower($attr['NAME']); } else { $toc_id = 0; }
14305   $this->TOC($tocfont,$tocfontsize,$tocindent,$resetpagenum, $pagenumstyle, $suppress, $toc_orientation, $paging, $links, $toc_id);
14306   break;
14307 
14308 
14309 
14310      case 'TOCPAGEBREAK': // custom-tag - set Marker for insertion later of ToC AND adds PAGEBREAK
14311   if (isset($attr['NAME']) && $attr['NAME']) { $toc_id = strtolower($attr['NAME']); } else { $toc_id = 0; }
14312   if ($toc_id) {
14313     if (isset($attr['FONT-SIZE'])) { $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCfontsize'] = $attr['FONT-SIZE']; } else { $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCfontsize'] = $this->default_font_size; }
14314     if (isset($attr['FONT'])) { $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCfont'] = $attr['FONT']; } else { $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCfont'] = $this->default_font; }
14315     if (isset($attr['INDENT']) && $attr['INDENT']) { $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCindent'] = $attr['INDENT']; } else { $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCindent'] = ''; }
14316     if (isset($attr['TOC-ORIENTATION']) && $attr['TOC-ORIENTATION']) { $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCorientation'] = $attr['TOC-ORIENTATION']; } else { $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCorientation'] = ''; }
14317     if (isset($attr['PAGING']) && (strtoupper($attr['PAGING'])=='OFF' || $attr['PAGING']==='0')) { $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCusePaging'] = false; }
14318     else { $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCusePaging'] = true; }
14319     if (isset($attr['LINKS']) && (strtoupper($attr['LINKS'])=='ON' || $attr['LINKS']==1)) { $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCuseLinking'] = true; }
14320     else { $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCuseLinking'] = false; }
14321 
14322     $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_margin_left'] = $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_margin_right'] = $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_margin_top'] = $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_margin_bottom'] = $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_margin_header'] = $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_margin_footer'] = '';
14323     if (isset($attr['TOC-MARGIN-RIGHT'])) { $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_margin_right'] = $this->ConvertSize($attr['TOC-MARGIN-RIGHT'],$this->w,$this->FontSize,false); }
14324     if (isset($attr['TOC-MARGIN-LEFT'])) { $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_margin_left'] = $this->ConvertSize($attr['TOC-MARGIN-LEFT'],$this->w,$this->FontSize,false); }
14325     if (isset($attr['TOC-MARGIN-TOP'])) { $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_margin_top'] = $this->ConvertSize($attr['TOC-MARGIN-TOP'],$this->w,$this->FontSize,false); }
14326     if (isset($attr['TOC-MARGIN-BOTTOM'])) { $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_margin_bottom'] = $this->ConvertSize($attr['TOC-MARGIN-BOTTOM'],$this->w,$this->FontSize,false); }
14327     if (isset($attr['TOC-MARGIN-HEADER'])) { $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_margin_header'] = $this->ConvertSize($attr['TOC-MARGIN-HEADER'],$this->w,$this->FontSize,false); }
14328     if (isset($attr['TOC-MARGIN-FOOTER'])) { $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_margin_footer'] = $this->ConvertSize($attr['TOC-MARGIN-FOOTER'],$this->w,$this->FontSize,false); }
14329     $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_odd_header_name'] = $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_even_header_name'] = $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_odd_footer_name'] = $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_even_footer_name'] = '';
14330     if (isset($attr['TOC-ODD-HEADER-NAME']) && $attr['TOC-ODD-HEADER-NAME']) { $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_odd_header_name'] = $attr['TOC-ODD-HEADER-NAME']; }
14331     if (isset($attr['TOC-EVEN-HEADER-NAME']) && $attr['TOC-EVEN-HEADER-NAME']) { $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_even_header_name'] = $attr['TOC-EVEN-HEADER-NAME']; }
14332     if (isset($attr['TOC-ODD-FOOTER-NAME']) && $attr['TOC-ODD-FOOTER-NAME']) { $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_odd_footer_name'] = $attr['TOC-ODD-FOOTER-NAME']; }
14333     if (isset($attr['TOC-EVEN-FOOTER-NAME']) && $attr['TOC-EVEN-FOOTER-NAME']) { $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_even_footer_name'] = $attr['TOC-EVEN-FOOTER-NAME']; }
14334     $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_odd_header_value'] = $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_even_header_value'] = $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_odd_footer_value'] = $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_even_footer_value'] = 0;
14335     if (isset($attr['TOC-ODD-HEADER-VALUE']) && ($attr['TOC-ODD-HEADER-VALUE']=='1' || strtoupper($attr['TOC-ODD-HEADER-VALUE'])=='ON')) { $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_odd_header_value'] = 1; }
14336     else if (isset($attr['TOC-ODD-HEADER-VALUE']) && ($attr['TOC-ODD-HEADER-VALUE']=='-1' || strtoupper($attr['TOC-ODD-HEADER-VALUE'])=='OFF')) { $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_odd_header_value'] = -1; }
14337     if (isset($attr['TOC-EVEN-HEADER-VALUE']) && ($attr['TOC-EVEN-HEADER-VALUE']=='1' || strtoupper($attr['TOC-EVEN-HEADER-VALUE'])=='ON')) { $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_even_header_value'] = 1; }
14338     else if (isset($attr['TOC-EVEN-HEADER-VALUE']) && ($attr['TOC-EVEN-HEADER-VALUE']=='-1' || strtoupper($attr['TOC-EVEN-HEADER-VALUE'])=='OFF')) { $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_even_header_value'] = -1; }
14339     if (isset($attr['TOC-ODD-FOOTER-VALUE']) && ($attr['TOC-ODD-FOOTER-VALUE']=='1' || strtoupper($attr['TOC-ODD-FOOTER-VALUE'])=='ON')) { $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_odd_footer_value'] = 1; }
14340     else if (isset($attr['TOC-ODD-FOOTER-VALUE']) && ($attr['TOC-ODD-FOOTER-VALUE']=='-1' || strtoupper($attr['TOC-ODD-FOOTER-VALUE'])=='OFF')) { $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_odd_footer_value'] = -1; }
14341     if (isset($attr['TOC-EVEN-FOOTER-VALUE']) && ($attr['TOC-EVEN-FOOTER-VALUE']=='1' || strtoupper($attr['TOC-EVEN-FOOTER-VALUE'])=='ON')) { $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_even_footer_value'] = 1; }
14342     else if (isset($attr['TOC-EVEN-FOOTER-VALUE']) && ($attr['TOC-EVEN-FOOTER-VALUE']=='-1' || strtoupper($attr['TOC-EVEN-FOOTER-VALUE'])=='OFF')) { $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_even_footer_value'] = -1; }
14343     // mPDF 4.2
14344     if (isset($attr['TOC-PAGE-SELECTOR']) && $attr['TOC-PAGE-SELECTOR']) { $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_page_selector'] = $attr['TOC-PAGE-SELECTOR']; }
14345     else { $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_page_selector'] = ''; }
14346     // mPDF 4.2.04
14347     if (isset($attr['TOC-SHEET-SIZE']) && $attr['TOC-SHEET-SIZE']) { $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCsheetsize'] = $attr['TOC-SHEET-SIZE']; } else { $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCsheetsize'] = ''; }
14348 
14349 
14350     if (isset($attr['TOC-PREHTML']) && $attr['TOC-PREHTML']) { $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCpreHTML'] = htmlspecialchars_decode($attr['TOC-PREHTML'],ENT_QUOTES); }
14351     if (isset($attr['TOC-POSTHTML']) && $attr['TOC-POSTHTML']) { $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCpostHTML'] = htmlspecialchars_decode($attr['TOC-POSTHTML'],ENT_QUOTES); }
14352     // mPDF 3.0
14353     if (isset($attr['TOC-BOOKMARKTEXT']) && $attr['TOC-BOOKMARKTEXT']) { $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCbookmarkText'] = htmlspecialchars_decode($attr['TOC-BOOKMARKTEXT'],ENT_QUOTES); }  // *BOOKMARKS*
14354   }
14355   else {
14356     if (isset($attr['FONT-SIZE'])) { $this->TOCfontsize = $attr['FONT-SIZE']; } else { $this->TOCfontsize = $this->default_font_size; }
14357     if (isset($attr['FONT'])) { $this->TOCfont = $attr['FONT']; } else { $this->TOCfont = $this->default_font; }
14358     if (isset($attr['INDENT']) && $attr['INDENT']) { $this->TOCindent = $attr['INDENT']; } else { $this->TOCindent = ''; }
14359     if (isset($attr['TOC-ORIENTATION']) && $attr['TOC-ORIENTATION']) { $this->TOCorientation = $attr['TOC-ORIENTATION']; } else { $this->TOCorientation = ''; }
14360     if (isset($attr['PAGING']) && (strtoupper($attr['PAGING'])=='OFF' || $attr['PAGING']==='0')) { $this->TOCusePaging = false; }
14361     else { $this->TOCusePaging = true; }
14362     if (isset($attr['LINKS']) && (strtoupper($attr['LINKS'])=='ON' || $attr['LINKS']==1)) { $this->TOCuseLinking = true; }
14363     else { $this->TOCuseLinking = false; }
14364 
14365     $this->TOC_margin_left = $this->TOC_margin_right = $this->TOC_margin_top = $this->TOC_margin_bottom = $this->TOC_margin_header = $this->TOC_margin_footer = '';
14366     if (isset($attr['TOC-MARGIN-RIGHT'])) { $this->TOC_margin_right = $this->ConvertSize($attr['TOC-MARGIN-RIGHT'],$this->w,$this->FontSize,false); }
14367     if (isset($attr['TOC-MARGIN-LEFT'])) { $this->TOC_margin_left = $this->ConvertSize($attr['TOC-MARGIN-LEFT'],$this->w,$this->FontSize,false); }
14368     if (isset($attr['TOC-MARGIN-TOP'])) { $this->TOC_margin_top = $this->ConvertSize($attr['TOC-MARGIN-TOP'],$this->w,$this->FontSize,false); }
14369     if (isset($attr['TOC-MARGIN-BOTTOM'])) { $this->TOC_margin_bottom = $this->ConvertSize($attr['TOC-MARGIN-BOTTOM'],$this->w,$this->FontSize,false); }
14370     if (isset($attr['TOC-MARGIN-HEADER'])) { $this->TOC_margin_header = $this->ConvertSize($attr['TOC-MARGIN-HEADER'],$this->w,$this->FontSize,false); }
14371     if (isset($attr['TOC-MARGIN-FOOTER'])) { $this->TOC_margin_footer = $this->ConvertSize($attr['TOC-MARGIN-FOOTER'],$this->w,$this->FontSize,false); }
14372     $this->TOC_odd_header_name = $this->TOC_even_header_name = $this->TOC_odd_footer_name = $this->TOC_even_footer_name = '';
14373     if (isset($attr['TOC-ODD-HEADER-NAME']) && $attr['TOC-ODD-HEADER-NAME']) { $this->TOC_odd_header_name = $attr['TOC-ODD-HEADER-NAME']; }
14374     if (isset($attr['TOC-EVEN-HEADER-NAME']) && $attr['TOC-EVEN-HEADER-NAME']) { $this->TOC_even_header_name = $attr['TOC-EVEN-HEADER-NAME']; }
14375     if (isset($attr['TOC-ODD-FOOTER-NAME']) && $attr['TOC-ODD-FOOTER-NAME']) { $this->TOC_odd_footer_name = $attr['TOC-ODD-FOOTER-NAME']; }
14376     if (isset($attr['TOC-EVEN-FOOTER-NAME']) && $attr['TOC-EVEN-FOOTER-NAME']) { $this->TOC_even_footer_name = $attr['TOC-EVEN-FOOTER-NAME']; }
14377     $this->TOC_odd_header_value = $this->TOC_even_header_value = $this->TOC_odd_footer_value = $this->TOC_even_footer_value = 0;
14378     if (isset($attr['TOC-ODD-HEADER-VALUE']) && ($attr['TOC-ODD-HEADER-VALUE']=='1' || strtoupper($attr['TOC-ODD-HEADER-VALUE'])=='ON')) { $this->TOC_odd_header_value = 1; }
14379     else if (isset($attr['TOC-ODD-HEADER-VALUE']) && ($attr['TOC-ODD-HEADER-VALUE']=='-1' || strtoupper($attr['TOC-ODD-HEADER-VALUE'])=='OFF')) { $this->TOC_odd_header_value = -1; }
14380     if (isset($attr['TOC-EVEN-HEADER-VALUE']) && ($attr['TOC-EVEN-HEADER-VALUE']=='1' || strtoupper($attr['TOC-EVEN-HEADER-VALUE'])=='ON')) { $this->TOC_even_header_value = 1; }
14381     else if (isset($attr['TOC-EVEN-HEADER-VALUE']) && ($attr['TOC-EVEN-HEADER-VALUE']=='-1' || strtoupper($attr['TOC-EVEN-HEADER-VALUE'])=='OFF')) { $this->TOC_even_header_value = -1; }
14382     if (isset($attr['TOC-ODD-FOOTER-VALUE']) && ($attr['TOC-ODD-FOOTER-VALUE']=='1' || strtoupper($attr['TOC-ODD-FOOTER-VALUE'])=='ON')) { $this->TOC_odd_footer_value = 1; }
14383     else if (isset($attr['TOC-ODD-FOOTER-VALUE']) && ($attr['TOC-ODD-FOOTER-VALUE']=='-1' || strtoupper($attr['TOC-ODD-FOOTER-VALUE'])=='OFF')) { $this->TOC_odd_footer_value = -1; }
14384     if (isset($attr['TOC-EVEN-FOOTER-VALUE']) && ($attr['TOC-EVEN-FOOTER-VALUE']=='1' || strtoupper($attr['TOC-EVEN-FOOTER-VALUE'])=='ON')) { $this->TOC_even_footer_value = 1; }
14385     else if (isset($attr['TOC-EVEN-FOOTER-VALUE']) && ($attr['TOC-EVEN-FOOTER-VALUE']=='-1' || strtoupper($attr['TOC-EVEN-FOOTER-VALUE'])=='OFF')) { $this->TOC_even_footer_value = -1; }
14386     // mPDF 4.2
14387     if (isset($attr['TOC-PAGE-SELECTOR']) && $attr['TOC-PAGE-SELECTOR']) { $this->TOC_page_selector = $attr['TOC-PAGE-SELECTOR']; }
14388     else { $this->TOC_page_selector = ''; }
14389     // mPDF 4.2.04
14390     if (isset($attr['TOC-SHEET-SIZE']) && $attr['TOC-SHEET-SIZE']) { $this->TOCsheetsize = $attr['TOC-SHEET-SIZE']; } else { $this->TOCsheetsize = ''; }
14391 
14392 
14393     if (isset($attr['TOC-PREHTML']) && $attr['TOC-PREHTML']) { $this->TOCpreHTML = htmlspecialchars_decode($attr['TOC-PREHTML'],ENT_QUOTES); }
14394     if (isset($attr['TOC-POSTHTML']) && $attr['TOC-POSTHTML']) { $this->TOCpostHTML = htmlspecialchars_decode($attr['TOC-POSTHTML'],ENT_QUOTES); }
14395     if (isset($attr['TOC-BOOKMARKTEXT']) && $attr['TOC-BOOKMARKTEXT']) { $this->TOCbookmarkText = htmlspecialchars_decode($attr['TOC-BOOKMARKTEXT'],ENT_QUOTES); }  // *BOOKMARKS*
14396   }
14397   // mPDF 3.0
14398   if ($this->y == $this->tMargin && (!$this->mirrorMargins ||($this->mirrorMargins && $this->page % 2==1))) { 
14399     if ($toc_id) { $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCmark'] = $this->page; }
14400     else { $this->TOCmark = $this->page; }
14401     // Don't add a page
14402     if ($this->page==1 && count($this->PageNumSubstitutions)==0) { 
14403       $resetpagenum = '';
14404       $pagenumstyle = '';
14405       $suppress = '';
14406       if (isset($attr['RESETPAGENUM'])) { $resetpagenum = $attr['RESETPAGENUM']; }
14407       if (isset($attr['PAGENUMSTYLE'])) { $pagenumstyle = $attr['PAGENUMSTYLE']; }
14408       if (isset($attr['SUPPRESS'])) { $suppress = $attr['SUPPRESS']; }
14409       if (!$suppress) { $suppress = 'off'; }
14410       if (!$resetpagenum) { $resetpagenum= 1; }
14411       $this->PageNumSubstitutions[] = array('from'=>1, 'reset'=> $resetpagenum, 'type'=>$pagenumstyle, 'suppress'=> $suppress);
14412     }
14413     break;
14414   }
14415   // No break - continues as PAGEBREAK...
14416 /*-- END TOC --*/
14417 
14418 
14419     case 'PAGE_BREAK': //custom-tag
14420     case 'PAGEBREAK': //custom-tag
14421     case 'NEWPAGE': //custom-tag
14422     case 'FORMFEED': //custom-tag
14423 
14424   $save_blklvl = $this->blklvl;
14425   $save_blk = $this->blk;
14426   $save_silp = $this->saveInlineProperties();
14427   $save_spanlvl = $this->spanlvl;
14428   $save_ilp = $this->InlineProperties;
14429 
14430   // Close any open block tags
14431   for ($b= $this->blklvl;$b>0;$b--) { $this->CloseTag($this->blk[$b]['tag']); }
14432   if(!empty($this->textbuffer))  {  //Output previously buffered content
14433         $this->printbuffer($this->textbuffer);
14434           $this->textbuffer=array(); 
14435       }
14436   $this->ignorefollowingspaces = true;
14437   $save_cols = false;
14438 /*-- COLUMNS --*/
14439   if ($this->ColActive) {
14440     $save_cols = true;
14441     $save_nbcol = $this->NbCol; // other values of gap and vAlign will not change by setting Columns off
14442     $this->SetColumns(0);
14443   }
14444 /*-- END COLUMNS --*/
14445 
14446   // mPDF 4.2.024
14447   if (isset($attr['SHEET-SIZE']) && $tag != 'FORMFEED' && !$this->restoreBlockPageBreaks) { 
14448     // Convert to same types as accepted in initial mPDF() A4, A4-L, or array(w,h)
14449     $prop = preg_split('/\s+/',trim($attr['SHEET-SIZE']));
14450     if (count($prop) == 2 ) {
14451       $newformat = array($this->ConvertSize($prop[0]), $this->ConvertSize($prop[1]));
14452     }
14453     else { $newformat = $attr['SHEET-SIZE']; }
14454   }
14455   else { $newformat = ''; }
14456 
14457 
14458   $mgr = $mgl = $mgt = $mgb = $mgh = $mgf = '';
14459   if (isset($attr['MARGIN-RIGHT'])) { $mgr = $this->ConvertSize($attr['MARGIN-RIGHT'],$this->w,$this->FontSize,false); }
14460   if (isset($attr['MARGIN-LEFT'])) { $mgl = $this->ConvertSize($attr['MARGIN-LEFT'],$this->w,$this->FontSize,false); }
14461   if (isset($attr['MARGIN-TOP'])) { $mgt = $this->ConvertSize($attr['MARGIN-TOP'],$this->w,$this->FontSize,false); }
14462   if (isset($attr['MARGIN-BOTTOM'])) { $mgb = $this->ConvertSize($attr['MARGIN-BOTTOM'],$this->w,$this->FontSize,false); }
14463   if (isset($attr['MARGIN-HEADER'])) { $mgh = $this->ConvertSize($attr['MARGIN-HEADER'],$this->w,$this->FontSize,false); }
14464   if (isset($attr['MARGIN-FOOTER'])) { $mgf = $this->ConvertSize($attr['MARGIN-FOOTER'],$this->w,$this->FontSize,false); }
14465   $ohname = $ehname = $ofname = $efname = '';
14466   if (isset($attr['ODD-HEADER-NAME'])) { $ohname = $attr['ODD-HEADER-NAME']; }
14467   if (isset($attr['EVEN-HEADER-NAME'])) { $ehname = $attr['EVEN-HEADER-NAME']; }
14468   if (isset($attr['ODD-FOOTER-NAME'])) { $ofname = $attr['ODD-FOOTER-NAME']; }
14469   if (isset($attr['EVEN-FOOTER-NAME'])) { $efname = $attr['EVEN-FOOTER-NAME']; }
14470   $ohvalue = $ehvalue = $ofvalue = $efvalue = 0;
14471   if (isset($attr['ODD-HEADER-VALUE']) && ($attr['ODD-HEADER-VALUE']=='1' || strtoupper($attr['ODD-HEADER-VALUE'])=='ON')) { $ohvalue = 1; }
14472   else if (isset($attr['ODD-HEADER-VALUE']) && ($attr['ODD-HEADER-VALUE']=='-1' || strtoupper($attr['ODD-HEADER-VALUE'])=='OFF')) { $ohvalue = -1; }
14473   if (isset($attr['EVEN-HEADER-VALUE']) && ($attr['EVEN-HEADER-VALUE']=='1' || strtoupper($attr['EVEN-HEADER-VALUE'])=='ON')) { $ehvalue = 1; }
14474   else if (isset($attr['EVEN-HEADER-VALUE']) && ($attr['EVEN-HEADER-VALUE']=='-1' || strtoupper($attr['EVEN-HEADER-VALUE'])=='OFF')) { $ehvalue = -1; }
14475   if (isset($attr['ODD-FOOTER-VALUE']) && ($attr['ODD-FOOTER-VALUE']=='1' || strtoupper($attr['ODD-FOOTER-VALUE'])=='ON')) { $ofvalue = 1; }
14476   else if (isset($attr['ODD-FOOTER-VALUE']) && ($attr['ODD-FOOTER-VALUE']=='-1' || strtoupper($attr['ODD-FOOTER-VALUE'])=='OFF')) { $ofvalue = -1; }
14477   if (isset($attr['EVEN-FOOTER-VALUE']) && ($attr['EVEN-FOOTER-VALUE']=='1' || strtoupper($attr['EVEN-FOOTER-VALUE'])=='ON')) { $efvalue = 1; }
14478   else if (isset($attr['EVEN-FOOTER-VALUE']) && ($attr['EVEN-FOOTER-VALUE']=='-1' || strtoupper($attr['EVEN-FOOTER-VALUE'])=='OFF')) { $efvalue = -1; }
14479 
14480   if (isset($attr['ORIENTATION']) && (strtoupper($attr['ORIENTATION'])=='L' || strtoupper($attr['ORIENTATION'])=='LANDSCAPE')) { $orient = 'L'; }
14481   else if (isset($attr['ORIENTATION']) && (strtoupper($attr['ORIENTATION'])=='P' || strtoupper($attr['ORIENTATION'])=='PORTRAIT')) { $orient = 'P'; }
14482   else { $orient = $this->CurOrientation; }
14483 
14484   // mPDF 4.2
14485   if (isset($attr['PAGE-SELECTOR']) && $attr['PAGE-SELECTOR']) { $pagesel = $attr['PAGE-SELECTOR']; }
14486   else { $pagesel = ''; }
14487 
14488   $resetpagenum = '';
14489   $pagenumstyle = '';
14490   $suppress = '';
14491   if (isset($attr['RESETPAGENUM'])) { $resetpagenum = $attr['RESETPAGENUM']; }
14492   if (isset($attr['PAGENUMSTYLE'])) { $pagenumstyle = $attr['PAGENUMSTYLE']; }
14493   if (isset($attr['SUPPRESS'])) { $suppress = $attr['SUPPRESS']; }
14494 
14495   if ($tag == 'TOCPAGEBREAK') { $type = 'NEXT-ODD'; }
14496   else if(isset($attr['TYPE'])) { $type = strtoupper($attr['TYPE']); }
14497   else { $type = ''; }
14498 
14499   // mPDF 4.2
14500   if ($type == 'E' || $type == 'EVEN') { $this->AddPage($orient,'E', $resetpagenum, $pagenumstyle, $suppress,$mgl,$mgr,$mgt,$mgb,$mgh,$mgf,$ohname,$ehname,$ofname,$efname,$ohvalue,$ehvalue,$ofvalue,$efvalue,$pagesel,$newformat); }
14501   else if ($type == 'O' || $type == 'ODD') { $this->AddPage($orient,'O', $resetpagenum, $pagenumstyle, $suppress,$mgl,$mgr,$mgt,$mgb,$mgh,$mgf,$ohname,$ehname,$ofname,$efname,$ohvalue,$ehvalue,$ofvalue,$efvalue,$pagesel,$newformat); }
14502   else if ($type == 'NEXT-ODD') { $this->AddPage($orient,'NEXT-ODD', $resetpagenum, $pagenumstyle, $suppress,$mgl,$mgr,$mgt,$mgb,$mgh,$mgf,$ohname,$ehname,$ofname,$efname,$ohvalue,$ehvalue,$ofvalue,$efvalue,$pagesel,$newformat); }
14503   else if ($type == 'NEXT-EVEN') { $this->AddPage($orient,'NEXT-EVEN', $resetpagenum, $pagenumstyle, $suppress,$mgl,$mgr,$mgt,$mgb,$mgh,$mgf,$ohname,$ehname,$ofname,$efname,$ohvalue,$ehvalue,$ofvalue,$efvalue,$pagesel,$newformat); }
14504   else { $this->AddPage($orient,'', $resetpagenum, $pagenumstyle, $suppress,$mgl,$mgr,$mgt,$mgb,$mgh,$mgf,$ohname,$ehname,$ofname,$efname,$ohvalue,$ehvalue,$ofvalue,$efvalue,$pagesel,$newformat); }
14505 
14506 /*-- TOC --*/
14507   if ($tag == 'TOCPAGEBREAK') { 
14508     if ($toc_id) { $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCmark'] = $this->page; }
14509     else { $this->TOCmark = $this->page; }
14510   }
14511 /*-- END TOC --*/
14512 
14513 /*-- COLUMNS --*/
14514   if ($save_cols) {
14515     // Restore columns
14516     $this->SetColumns($save_nbcol,$this->colvAlign,$this->ColGap);
14517   }
14518 /*-- END COLUMNS --*/
14519   if (($tag == 'FORMFEED' || $this->restoreBlockPagebreaks) && !$this->tableLevel && !$this->listlvl) {
14520     $this->blk = $save_blk;
14521     // Re-open block tags
14522     $t = $this->blk[0]['tag'];
14523     $a = $this->blk[0]['attr'];
14524     $this->blklvl = 0; 
14525     for ($b=0; $b<=$save_blklvl;$b++) {
14526       $tc = $t;
14527       $ac = $a;
14528       $t = $this->blk[$b+1]['tag'];
14529       $a = $this->blk[$b+1]['attr'];
14530       unset($this->blk[$b+1]);
14531       $this->OpenTag($tc,$ac); 
14532     }
14533     $this->spanlvl = $save_spanlvl;
14534     $this->InlineProperties = $save_ilp;
14535     $this->restoreInlineProperties($save_silp);
14536   }
14537 
14538   break;
14539 
14540 
14541 /*-- TOC --*/
14542      case 'TOCENTRY':
14543   if (isset($attr['CONTENT']) && $attr['CONTENT']) {
14544     $objattr = array();
14545     $objattr['CONTENT'] = htmlspecialchars_decode($attr['CONTENT'],ENT_QUOTES);
14546     $objattr['type'] = 'toc';
14547     if (isset($attr['LEVEL']) && $attr['LEVEL']) { $objattr['toclevel'] = $attr['LEVEL']; } else { $objattr['toclevel'] = 0; }
