14548     if (isset($attr['NAME']) && $attr['NAME']) { $objattr['toc_id'] = $attr['NAME']; } else { $objattr['toc_id'] = 0; }
14549     $e = "\xbb\xa4\xactype=toc,objattr=".serialize($objattr)."\xbb\xa4\xac";
14550     if($this->tableLevel) { $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['textbuffer'][] = array($e); }  // *TABLES*
14551     else  { // *TABLES*
14552       $this->textbuffer[] = array($e);
14553     } // *TABLES*
14554   }
14555   break;
14556 /*-- END TOC --*/
14557 
14558 /*-- INDEX --*/
14559      case 'INDEXENTRY':
14560   if (isset($attr['CONTENT']) && $attr['CONTENT']) {
14561     // mPDF 3.0
14562     if (isset($attr['XREF']) && $attr['XREF']) {
14563       $this->IndexEntry(htmlspecialchars_decode($attr['CONTENT'],ENT_QUOTES),$attr['XREF']);
14564       break;
14565     }
14566     $objattr = array();
14567     $objattr['CONTENT'] = htmlspecialchars_decode($attr['CONTENT'],ENT_QUOTES);
14568     $objattr['type'] = 'indexentry';
14569     $e = "\xbb\xa4\xactype=indexentry,objattr=".serialize($objattr)."\xbb\xa4\xac";
14570     if($this->tableLevel) { $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['textbuffer'][] = array($e); }  // *TABLES*
14571     else  { // *TABLES*
14572       $this->textbuffer[] = array($e);
14573     } // *TABLES*
14574   }
14575   break;
14576 
14577      // mPDF 3.0
14578      case 'INDEXINSERT':
14579   if (isset($attr['FONT-SIZE'])) { $reffontsize = $attr['FONT-SIZE']; } else { $reffontsize = ''; }
14580   if (isset($attr['LINE-SPACING']) && $attr['LINE-SPACING']) { $linespacing = $attr['LINE-SPACING']; } else { $linespacing = ''; }
14581   if (isset($attr['DIV-FONT-SIZE']) && $attr['DIV-FONT-SIZE']) { $divlettfontsize = $attr['DIV-FONT-SIZE']; } else { $divlettfontsize = ''; }
14582   if (isset($attr['FONT']) && $attr['FONT']) { $reffont = $attr['FONT']; } else { $reffont = ''; }
14583   if (isset($attr['DIV-FONT']) && $attr['DIV-FONT']) { $divlettfont = $attr['DIV-FONT']; } else { $divlettfont = ''; }
14584   if (isset($attr['COLS']) && $attr['COLS']) { $cols = $attr['COLS']; } else { $cols = 1; }
14585   if (isset($attr['OFFSET']) && $attr['OFFSET']) { $offset = $attr['OFFSET']; } else { $offset = 3; }
14586   if (isset($attr['GAP']) && $attr['GAP']) { $gap = $attr['GAP']; } else { $gap = 5; }
14587 
14588   if (isset($attr['USEDIVLETTERS']) && (strtoupper($attr['USEDIVLETTERS'])=='OFF' || $attr['USEDIVLETTERS']==-1 || $attr['USEDIVLETTERS']==='0')) { $usedivletters = 0; }
14589   else { $usedivletters = 1; }
14590 
14591   if (isset($attr['LINKS']) && (strtoupper($attr['LINKS'])=='ON' || $attr['LINKS']==1)) { $links = true; }
14592   else { $links = false; }
14593   $this->CreateIndex($cols, $reffontsize, $linespacing, $offset, $usedivletters, $divlettfontsize, $gap, $reffont,$divlettfont, $links);
14594   break;
14595 /*-- END INDEX --*/
14596 
14597 /*-- WATERMARK --*/
14598      // mPDF 3.0
14599      case 'WATERMARKTEXT':
14600   if (isset($attr['CONTENT']) && $attr['CONTENT']) { $txt = htmlspecialchars_decode($attr['CONTENT'],ENT_QUOTES); } else { $txt = ''; }
14601   if (isset($attr['ALPHA']) && $attr['ALPHA']>0) { $alpha = $attr['ALPHA']; } else { $alpha = -1; }
14602   $this->SetWatermarkText($txt, $alpha);
14603   break;
14604 
14605      // mPDF 3.0
14606      case 'WATERMARKIMAGE':
14607   if (isset($attr['SRC'])) { $src = $attr['SRC']; } else { $src = ''; }
14608   if (isset($attr['ALPHA']) && $attr['ALPHA']>0) { $alpha = $attr['ALPHA']; } else { $alpha = -1; }
14609   if (isset($attr['SIZE']) && $attr['SIZE']) { 
14610     $size = $attr['SIZE']; 
14611     if (strpos($size,',')) { $size = explode(',',$size); }
14612   } 
14613   else { $size = 'D'; }
14614   if (isset($attr['POS']) && $attr['POS']) { 
14615     $pos = $attr['POS']; 
14616     if (strpos($pos,',')) { $pos = explode(',',$pos); }
14617   } 
14618   else { $pos = 'P'; }
14619   $this->SetWatermarkImage($src, $alpha, $size, $pos);
14620   break;
14621 /*-- END WATERMARK --*/
14622 
14623 /*-- BOOKMARKS --*/
14624      case 'BOOKMARK':
14625   if (isset($attr['CONTENT'])) {
14626     // mPDF 3.0
14627     $objattr = array();
14628     $objattr['CONTENT'] = htmlspecialchars_decode($attr['CONTENT'],ENT_QUOTES);
14629     $objattr['type'] = 'bookmark';
14630     if (isset($attr['LEVEL']) && $attr['LEVEL']) { $objattr['bklevel'] = $attr['LEVEL']; } else { $objattr['bklevel'] = 0; }
14631     $e = "\xbb\xa4\xactype=bookmark,objattr=".serialize($objattr)."\xbb\xa4\xac";
14632     if($this->tableLevel) { $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['textbuffer'][] = array($e); }  // *TABLES*
14633     else  { // *TABLES*
14634       $this->textbuffer[] = array($e);
14635     } // *TABLES*
14636   }
14637   break;
14638 /*-- END BOOKMARKS --*/
14639 
14640 /*-- ANNOTATIONS --*/
14641      case 'ANNOTATION':
14642   // mPDF 4.0
14643   if (isset($attr['CONTENT']) && !$this->writingHTMLheader && !$this->writingHTMLfooter) {  // Stops annotations in FixedPos
14644     $objattr = array();
14645     // mPDF 3.0
14646     $objattr['margin_top'] = 0;
14647     $objattr['margin_bottom'] = 0;
14648     $objattr['margin_left'] = 0;
14649     $objattr['margin_right'] = 0;
14650     $objattr['width'] = 0;
14651     $objattr['height'] = 0;
14652     $objattr['border_top']['w'] = 0;
14653     $objattr['border_bottom']['w'] = 0;
14654     $objattr['border_left']['w'] = 0;
14655     $objattr['border_right']['w'] = 0;
14656     $objattr['CONTENT'] = htmlspecialchars_decode($attr['CONTENT'],ENT_QUOTES);
14657     $objattr['type'] = 'annot';
14658     $objattr['POPUP'] = ''; // mPDF 4.2.027
14659   }
14660   else { break; }
14661   if (isset($attr['POS-X'])) { $objattr['POS-X'] = $attr['POS-X']; } else { $objattr['POS-X'] = 0; }
14662   if (isset($attr['POS-Y'])) { $objattr['POS-Y'] = $attr['POS-Y']; } else { $objattr['POS-Y'] = 0; }
14663   if (isset($attr['ICON'])) { $objattr['ICON'] = $attr['ICON']; } else { $objattr['ICON'] = 'Note'; }
14664   if (isset($attr['AUTHOR'])) { $objattr['AUTHOR'] = $attr['AUTHOR']; } else  { $objattr['AUTHOR'] = ''; }
14665   if (isset($attr['SUBJECT'])) { $objattr['SUBJECT'] = $attr['SUBJECT']; } else  { $objattr['SUBJECT'] = ''; }
14666   if (isset($attr['OPACITY']) && $attr['OPACITY']>0 && $attr['OPACITY']<=1) { $objattr['OPACITY'] = $attr['OPACITY']; } 
14667   else if ($this->annotMargin) { $objattr['OPACITY'] = 1; }
14668   else { $objattr['OPACITY'] = $this->annotOpacity; }
14669   if (isset($attr['COLOR'])) { 
14670     $cor = $this->ConvertColor($attr['COLOR']);
14671     if ($cor) {  $objattr['COLOR'] = array($cor['R'],$cor['G'],$cor['B']); }
14672     else  { $objattr['COLOR'] = array(255,255,0); }
14673   } 
14674   else  { $objattr['COLOR'] = array(255,255,0); }
14675   // mPDF 4.2.027
14676   if (isset($attr['POPUP']) && !empty($attr['POPUP'])) { 
14677     $pop = preg_split('/\s+/',trim($attr['POPUP']));
14678     if (count($pop)>1) { $objattr['POPUP'] = $pop; }
14679     else { $objattr['POPUP'] = true; }
14680   } 
14681   $e = "\xbb\xa4\xactype=annot,objattr=".serialize($objattr)."\xbb\xa4\xac";
14682   if($this->tableLevel) { $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['textbuffer'][] = array($e); }  // *TABLES*
14683   else  { // *TABLES*
14684     $this->textbuffer[] = array($e);
14685   } // *TABLES*
14686   break;
14687 /*-- END ANNOTATIONS --*/
14688 
14689 
14690 /*-- COLUMNS --*/
14691     case 'COLUMNS': //added custom-tag
14692   if (isset($attr['COLUMN-COUNT']) && ($attr['COLUMN-COUNT'] || $attr['COLUMN-COUNT']==='0')) {
14693     // Close any open block tags
14694     for ($b= $this->blklvl;$b>0;$b--) { $this->CloseTag($this->blk[$b]['tag']); }
14695     if(!empty($this->textbuffer))  {  //Output previously buffered content
14696             $this->printbuffer($this->textbuffer);
14697             $this->textbuffer=array(); 
14698         }
14699 
14700     if (isset($attr['VALIGN']) && $attr['VALIGN']) { 
14701       if ($attr['VALIGN'] == 'J') { $valign = 'J'; }
14702       else { $valign = $align[$attr['VALIGN']]; }
14703     }
14704     else { $valign = ''; }
14705     if (isset($attr['COLUMN-GAP']) && $attr['COLUMN-GAP']) { $this->SetColumns($attr['COLUMN-COUNT'],$valign,$attr['COLUMN-GAP']); }
14706     else { $this->SetColumns($attr['COLUMN-COUNT'],$valign); }
14707   }
14708   $this->ignorefollowingspaces = true;
14709   break;
14710 
14711     case 'COLUMN_BREAK': //custom-tag
14712     case 'COLUMNBREAK': //custom-tag
14713     case 'NEWCOLUMN': //custom-tag
14714   $this->ignorefollowingspaces = true;
14715   $this->NewColumn();
14716   $this->ColumnAdjust = false;  // disables all column height adjustment for the page.
14717   break;
14718 
14719 /*-- END COLUMNS --*/
14720 
14721 
14722     case 'BDO':
14723   $this->biDirectional = true;
14724   break;
14725 
14726 
14727     case 'TTZ':
14728   $this->ttz = true;
14729   $this->InlineProperties[$tag] = $this->saveInlineProperties();
14730   $this->setCSS(array('FONT-FAMILY'=>'zapfdingbats','FONT-WEIGHT'=>'normal','FONT-STYLE'=>'normal'),'INLINE');
14731   break;
14732 
14733     case 'TTS':
14734   $this->tts = true;
14735   $this->InlineProperties[$tag] = $this->saveInlineProperties();
14736   $this->setCSS(array('FONT-FAMILY'=>'symbol','FONT-WEIGHT'=>'normal','FONT-STYLE'=>'normal'),'INLINE');
14737   break;
14738 
14739     case 'TTA':
14740   $this->tta = true;
14741   $this->InlineProperties[$tag] = $this->saveInlineProperties();
14742   // mPDF 4.0
14743   if (in_array($this->FontFamily,$this->mono_fonts)) {
14744     $this->setCSS(array('FONT-FAMILY'=>'courier-embedded'),'INLINE');
14745   }
14746   else if (in_array($this->FontFamily,$this->serif_fonts)) { 
14747     $this->setCSS(array('FONT-FAMILY'=>'times-embedded'),'INLINE');
14748   }
14749   else {
14750     $this->setCSS(array('FONT-FAMILY'=>'helvetica-embedded'),'INLINE');
14751   }
14752   break;
14753 
14754 
14755 
14756     // INLINE PHRASES OR STYLES
14757     case 'SUB':
14758     case 'SUP':
14759     case 'ACRONYM':
14760     case 'BIG':
14761     case 'SMALL':
14762     case 'INS':
14763     case 'S':
14764     case 'STRIKE':
14765     case 'DEL':
14766     case 'STRONG':
14767     case 'CITE':
14768     case 'Q':
14769     case 'EM':
14770     case 'B':
14771     case 'I':
14772     case 'U':
14773     case 'SAMP':
14774     case 'CODE':
14775     case 'KBD':
14776     case 'TT':
14777     case 'VAR':
14778     case 'FONT':
14779     case 'SPAN':
14780 /*-- ANNOTATIONS --*/
14781   if ($this->title2annots && isset($attr['TITLE'])) {
14782     $objattr = array();
14783     // mPDF 3.0
14784     $objattr['margin_top'] = 0;
14785     $objattr['margin_bottom'] = 0;
14786     $objattr['margin_left'] = 0;
14787     $objattr['margin_right'] = 0;
14788     $objattr['width'] = 0;
14789     $objattr['height'] = 0;
14790     $objattr['border_top']['w'] = 0;
14791     $objattr['border_bottom']['w'] = 0;
14792     $objattr['border_left']['w'] = 0;
14793     $objattr['border_right']['w'] = 0;
14794 
14795     $objattr['CONTENT'] = $attr['TITLE'];
14796     $objattr['type'] = 'annot';
14797     $objattr['POS-X'] = 0;
14798     $objattr['POS-Y'] = 0;
14799     $objattr['ICON'] = 'Comment';
14800     $objattr['AUTHOR'] = '';
14801     $objattr['SUBJECT'] = '';
14802     $objattr['OPACITY'] = $this->annotOpacity; 
14803     $objattr['COLOR'] = array(255,255,0); 
14804     $annot = "\xbb\xa4\xactype=annot,objattr=".serialize($objattr)."\xbb\xa4\xac";
14805   }
14806 /*-- END ANNOTATIONS --*/
14807 
14808   if ($tag == 'SPAN') {
14809     $this->spanlvl++;
14810     $this->InlineProperties['SPAN'][$this->spanlvl] = $this->saveInlineProperties();
14811     if (isset($annot)) { $this->InlineAnnots[$tag][$this->spanlvl] = $annot; }  // *ANNOTATIONS*
14812   }
14813   else { 
14814     $this->InlineProperties[$tag] = $this->saveInlineProperties(); 
14815     if (isset($annot)) { $this->InlineAnnots[$tag] = $annot; }  // *ANNOTATIONS*
14816   }
14817   $properties = $this->MergeCSS('INLINE',$tag,$attr); // mPDF 4.0
14818   if (!empty($properties)) $this->setCSS($properties,'INLINE');
14819   break;
14820 
14821 
14822     case 'A':
14823   if (isset($attr['NAME']) and $attr['NAME'] != '') { 
14824     // mPDF 3.0
14825     $e = '';
14826 /*-- BOOKMARKS --*/
14827     if ($this->anchor2Bookmark) { 
14828       $objattr = array();
14829       $objattr['CONTENT'] = htmlspecialchars_decode($attr['NAME'],ENT_QUOTES);
14830       $objattr['type'] = 'bookmark';
14831       if (isset($attr['LEVEL']) && $attr['LEVEL']) { $objattr['bklevel'] = $attr['LEVEL']; } else { $objattr['bklevel'] = 0; }
14832       $e = "\xbb\xa4\xactype=bookmark,objattr=".serialize($objattr)."\xbb\xa4\xac";
14833     }
14834 /*-- END BOOKMARKS --*/
14835     if($this->tableLevel) { // *TABLES*
14836       $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['textbuffer'][] = array($e,'','',array(),'',false,false,$attr['NAME']);   // *TABLES*
14837     } // *TABLES*
14838     else  { // *TABLES*
14839       $this->textbuffer[] = array($e,'','',array(),'',false,false,$attr['NAME']); //an internal link (adds a space for recognition)
14840     } // *TABLES*
14841   }
14842   if (isset($attr['HREF'])) { 
14843     $this->InlineProperties['A'] = $this->saveInlineProperties();
14844     $properties = $this->MergeCSS('',$tag,$attr);
14845     if (!empty($properties)) $this->setCSS($properties,'INLINE');
14846     $this->HREF=$attr['HREF'];
14847   }
14848   break;
14849 
14850 
14851 
14852     case 'BR':
14853   // Added mPDF 3.0 Float DIV - CLEAR
14854   if (isset($attr['STYLE'])) {
14855     $properties = $this->readInlineCSS($attr['STYLE']);
14856     if (isset($properties['CLEAR'])) { $this->ClearFloats(strtoupper($properties['CLEAR']),$this->blklvl); }  // *CSS-FLOAT*
14857   }
14858 
14859 
14860 /*-- TABLES --*/
14861   if($this->tableLevel) {
14862      // mPDF 3.0
14863      if ($this->blockjustfinished || $this->listjustfinished) {
14864     $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['textbuffer'][] = array("\n",$this->HREF,$this->currentfontstyle,$this->colorarray,$this->currentfontfamily,$this->SUP,$this->SUB,'',$this->strike,$this->outlineparam,$this->spanbgcolorarray,$this->currentfontsize,$this->ReqFontStyle);
14865     $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['text'][] = "\n";
14866      }
14867 
14868     $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['textbuffer'][] = array("\n",$this->HREF,$this->currentfontstyle,$this->colorarray,$this->currentfontfamily,$this->SUP,$this->SUB,'',$this->strike,$this->outlineparam,$this->spanbgcolorarray,$this->currentfontsize,$this->ReqFontStyle);
14869     $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['text'][] = "\n";
14870     if (!isset($this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['maxs'])) {
14871       $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['maxs'] = $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s']; 
14872     }
14873     elseif($this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['maxs'] < $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s']) {
14874       $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['maxs'] = $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s'];  
14875     }
14876     $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s'] = 0 ;// reset
14877   }
14878   else  {
14879 /*-- END TABLES --*/
14880     $this->textbuffer[] = array("\n",$this->HREF,$this->currentfontstyle,$this->colorarray,$this->currentfontfamily,$this->SUP,$this->SUB,'',$this->strike,$this->outlineparam,$this->spanbgcolorarray,$this->currentfontsize,$this->ReqFontStyle);
14881   } // *TABLES*
14882   $this->ignorefollowingspaces = true; 
14883   $this->blockjustfinished=false;
14884   $this->listjustfinished=false;
14885   // mPDF 3.0
14886   $this->linebreakjustfinished=true;
14887   break;
14888 
14889 
14890   // *********** BLOCKS  ********************
14891 
14892   //NB $outerblocktags = array('DIV','FORM','CENTER','DL');
14893   //NB $innerblocktags = array('P','BLOCKQUOTE','ADDRESS','PRE',''H1','H2','H3','H4','H5','H6','DT','DD');
14894 
14895     case 'PRE':
14896   $this->ispre=true;  // ADDED - Prevents left trim of textbuffer in printbuffer()
14897 
14898     case 'DIV':
14899     case 'FORM':
14900     case 'CENTER':
14901 
14902     case 'BLOCKQUOTE':
14903     case 'ADDRESS': 
14904 
14905     case 'P':
14906     case 'H1':
14907     case 'H2':
14908     case 'H3':
14909     case 'H4':
14910     case 'H5':
14911     case 'H6':
14912     case 'DL':
14913     case 'DT':
14914     case 'DD':
14915   $p = $this->PreviewBlockCSS($tag,$attr);
14916   if(isset($p['DISPLAY']) && strtolower($p['DISPLAY'])=='none') { 
14917     $this->blklvl++;
14918     $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['hide'] = true; 
14919     return; 
14920   }
14921 /*-- CSS-POSITION --*/
14922   // mPDF 4.0
14923   if ((isset($p['POSITION']) && (strtolower($p['POSITION'])=='fixed' || strtolower($p['POSITION'])=='absolute')) && $this->blklvl==0) { 
14924     if ($this->inFixedPosBlock) {
14925       $this->Error("Cannot nest block with position:fixed or position:absolute"); 
14926     }
14927     $this->inFixedPosBlock = true;
14928     return;
14929   }
14930 /*-- END CSS-POSITION --*/
14931   // Start Block
14932   $this->ignorefollowingspaces = true; 
14933   // mPDF 4.2
14934   if ($this->blockjustfinished && !count($this->textbuffer) && $this->y != $this->tMargin && $this->collapseBlockMargins) { $lastbottommargin = $this->lastblockbottommargin; }
14935   else { $lastbottommargin = 0; }
14936   $this->lastblockbottommargin = 0;
14937   $this->blockjustfinished=false;
14938 
14939 /*-- LISTS --*/
14940   // mPDF 4.0
14941   if ($this->listlvl>0) { return; }
14942 /*-- END LISTS --*/
14943 
14944   $this->InlineProperties = array(); 
14945   $this->spanlvl = 0;
14946   $this->listjustfinished=false;
14947   $this->divbegin=true;
14948   // mPDF 3.0
14949   $this->linebreakjustfinished=false;
14950 
14951 /*-- TABLES --*/
14952   if ($this->tableLevel) {
14953      // mPDF 3.0
14954      // If already something on the line
14955      if ($this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s'] > 0  && !$this->nestedtablejustfinished ) {
14956     $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['textbuffer'][] = array("\n",$this->HREF,$this->currentfontstyle,$this->colorarray,$this->currentfontfamily,$this->SUP,$this->SUB,'',$this->strike,$this->outlineparam,$this->spanbgcolorarray,$this->currentfontsize,$this->ReqFontStyle);
14957     $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['text'][] = "\n";
14958     if (!isset($this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['maxs'])) {
14959       $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['maxs'] = $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s'];
14960     }
14961     elseif($this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['maxs'] < $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s']) {
14962       $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['maxs'] = $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s']; 
14963     }
14964     $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s'] = 0 ;// reset
14965      }
14966      // Cannot set block properties inside table - use Bold to indicate h1-h6
14967      if ($tag == 'CENTER' && $this->tdbegin) { $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['a'] = $align['center']; }
14968 
14969     $this->InlineProperties['BLOCKINTABLE'] = $this->saveInlineProperties();
14970     $properties = $this->MergeCSS('',$tag,$attr);
14971     if (!empty($properties)) $this->setCSS($properties,'INLINE');
14972 
14973 
14974      break;
14975   }
14976 /*-- END TABLES --*/
14977 
14978   if ($tag == 'P' || $tag == 'DT' || $tag == 'DD') { $this->lastoptionaltag = $tag; } // Save current HTML specified optional endtag
14979   else { $this->lastoptionaltag = ''; }
14980 
14981   if ($this->lastblocklevelchange == 1) { $blockstate = 1; }  // Top margins/padding only
14982   else if ($this->lastblocklevelchange < 1) { $blockstate = 0; }  // NO margins/padding
14983   $this->printbuffer($this->textbuffer,$blockstate);
14984   $this->textbuffer=array();
14985 
14986   $this->blklvl++;
14987   // mPDF 4.0
14988   $currblk =& $this->blk[$this->blklvl];
14989   $this->initialiseBlock($currblk);
14990   $prevblk =& $this->blk[$this->blklvl-1];
14991 
14992   $currblk['tag'] = $tag;
14993   $currblk['attr'] = $attr;
14994 
14995   $this->Reset();
14996   $properties = $this->MergeCSS('BLOCK',$tag,$attr);
14997 
14998   $pagesel = ''; 
14999 /*-- CSS-PAGE --*/
15000   // mPDF 4.2
15001   if (isset($properties['PAGE'])) { $pagesel = $properties['PAGE']; } 
15002 /*-- END CSS-PAGE --*/
15003 
15004   // If page-box has changed AND/OR PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE
15005   $save_cols = false;
15006   if (($pagesel && $pagesel != $this->page_box['current']) || (isset($properties['PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE']) && $properties['PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE'])) {
15007     if ($this->blklvl>1) {
15008       // Close any open block tags
15009       for ($b= $this->blklvl;$b>0;$b--) { $this->CloseTag($this->blk[$b]['tag']); }
15010       // Output any text left in buffer
15011       if (count($this->textbuffer)) { $this->printbuffer($this->textbuffer); $this->textbuffer=array(); }
15012     }
15013 /*-- COLUMNS --*/
15014     if ($this->ColActive) {
15015       $save_cols = true;
15016       $save_nbcol = $this->NbCol; // other values of gap and vAlign will not change by setting Columns off
15017       $this->SetColumns(0);
15018     }
15019 /*-- END COLUMNS --*/
15020 
15021 
15022     // Must Add new page if changed page properties
15023     if (isset($properties['PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE'])) {
15024       if (strtoupper($properties['PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE']) == 'RIGHT') { $this->AddPage($this->CurOrientation,'NEXT-ODD','','','','','', '','', '','','','','','',0,0,0,0,$pagesel); }
15025       else if (strtoupper($properties['PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE']) == 'LEFT') { $this->AddPage($this->CurOrientation,'NEXT-EVEN','','','','','', '','', '','','','','','',0,0,0,0,$pagesel); }
15026       else if (strtoupper($properties['PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE']) == 'ALWAYS') { $this->AddPage($this->CurOrientation,'','','','','','', '','', '','','','','','',0,0,0,0,$pagesel); }
15027       else if ($this->page_box['current'] != $pagesel) { $this->AddPage($this->CurOrientation,'','','','','','', '','', '','','','','','',0,0,0,0,$pagesel); }  // *CSS-PAGE*
15028     }
15029 /*-- CSS-PAGE --*/
15030     else if ($pagesel != $this->page_box['current']) { $this->AddPage($this->CurOrientation,'','','','','','', '','', '','','','','','',0,0,0,0,$pagesel); }
15031 /*-- END CSS-PAGE --*/
15032 
15033     // if using htmlheaders, the headers need to be rewritten when new page
15034     // done by calling WriteHTML() within resethtmlheaders
15035     // so block is reset to 0 - now we need to resurrect it
15036     // As in WriteHTML() initialising
15037     $this->blklvl = 0;
15038     $this->lastblocklevelchange = 0;
15039     $this->blk = array();
15040     // mPDF 4.0
15041     $this->initialiseBlock($this->blk[0]);
15042     $this->blk[0]['width'] =& $this->pgwidth;
15043     $this->blk[0]['inner_width'] =& $this->pgwidth;
15044     // mPDF 3.0
15045     $this->blk[0]['blockContext'] = $this->blockContext;
15046     $properties = $this->MergeCSS('BLOCK','BODY','');
15047     $this->setCSS($properties,'','BODY'); 
15048     $this->blklvl++;
15049     // mPDF 4.0
15050     $currblk =& $this->blk[$this->blklvl];
15051     $prevblk =& $this->blk[$this->blklvl-1];
15052 
15053     $this->initialiseBlock($currblk);
15054     $currblk['tag'] = $tag;
15055     $currblk['attr'] = $attr;
15056 
15057     $this->Reset();
15058     $properties = $this->MergeCSS('BLOCK',$tag,$attr);
15059 /*-- COLUMNS --*/
15060     if ($save_cols) {
15061       // Restore columns
15062       $this->SetColumns($save_nbcol,$this->colvAlign,$this->ColGap);
15063     }
15064 /*-- END COLUMNS --*/
15065   }
15066 
15067 
15068   if (isset($properties['PAGE-BREAK-INSIDE']) && strtoupper($properties['PAGE-BREAK-INSIDE']) == 'AVOID' && !$this->ColActive && !$this->keep_block_together) {
15069     $currblk['keep_block_together'] = 1;
15070     $currblk['y00'] = $this->y;
15071     $this->keep_block_together = 1;
15072     $this->divbuffer = array();
15073     $this->ktLinks = array();
15074     $this->ktAnnots = array();
15075     $this->ktBlock = array();
15076     $this->ktReference = array();
15077     $this->ktBMoutlines = array();
15078     $this->_kttoc = array();
15079   }
15080 
15081   // mPDF 4.2 Collaspe vertical block margins
15082   if ($lastbottommargin && $properties['MARGIN-TOP']) { $currblk['lastbottommargin'] = $lastbottommargin; }
15083 
15084   $this->setCSS($properties,'BLOCK',$tag); //name(id/class/style) found in the CSS array!
15085   $currblk['InlineProperties'] = $this->saveInlineProperties();
15086 
15087 
15088   if(isset($attr['ALIGN']) && $attr['ALIGN']) { $currblk['block-align'] = $align[strtolower($attr['ALIGN'])]; }
15089 
15090 
15091   // mPDF 4.0 height
15092   if (isset($properties['HEIGHT'])) { $currblk['css_set_height'] = $this->ConvertSize($properties['HEIGHT'],($this->h - $this->tMargin - $this->bMargin),$this->FontSize,false); }
15093   else { $currblk['css_set_height'] = false; }
15094 
15095 
15096   // Added mPDF 3.0 Float DIV
15097   if (isset($prevblk['blockContext'])) { $currblk['blockContext'] = $prevblk['blockContext'] ; }  // *CSS-FLOAT*
15098 
15099   if (isset($properties['CLEAR'])) { $this->ClearFloats(strtoupper($properties['CLEAR']), $this->blklvl-1); } // *CSS-FLOAT*
15100 
15101   $container_w = $prevblk['inner_width'];
15102   $bdr = $currblk['border_right']['w'];
15103   $bdl = $currblk['border_left']['w'];
15104   $pdr = $currblk['padding_right'];
15105   $pdl = $currblk['padding_left'];
15106 
15107   if (isset($currblk['css_set_width'])) { $setwidth = $currblk['css_set_width']; }
15108   else { $setwidth = 0; }
15109 
15110 /*-- CSS-FLOAT --*/
15111   if (isset($properties['FLOAT']) && strtoupper($properties['FLOAT']) == 'RIGHT' && !$this->ColActive) {
15112     // Cancel Keep-Block-together
15113     $currblk['keep_block_together'] = false;
15114     $currblk['y00'] = '';
15115     $this->keep_block_together = 0;
15116 
15117     $this->blockContext++;
15118     $currblk['blockContext'] = $this->blockContext;
15119 
15120     list($l_exists, $r_exists, $l_max, $r_max, $l_width, $r_width) = $this->GetFloatDivInfo($this->blklvl-1);
15121 
15122     // DIV is too narrow for text to fit!
15123     $maxw = $container_w - $l_width - $r_width;
15124     if (($setwidth + $currblk['margin_right'] + $bdl + $pdl + $bdr + $pdr) > $maxw || ($maxw - ($currblk['margin_right'] + $bdl + $pdl + $bdr + $pdr)) < $this->GetStringWidth('WW')) { 
15125       // Too narrow to fit - try to move down past L or R float
15126       if ($l_max < $r_max && ($setwidth + $currblk['margin_right'] + $bdl + $pdl + $bdr + $pdr) <= ($container_w - $r_width) && (($container_w - $r_width) - ($currblk['margin_right'] + $bdl + $pdl + $bdr + $pdr)) > $this->GetStringWidth('WW')) {
15127         $this->ClearFloats('LEFT', $this->blklvl-1); 
15128       }
15129       else if ($r_max < $l_max && ($setwidth + $currblk['margin_right'] + $bdl + $pdl + $bdr + $pdr)  <= ($container_w - $l_width) && (($container_w - $l_width) - ($currblk['margin_right'] + $bdl + $pdl + $bdr + $pdr)) > $this->GetStringWidth('WW')) {
15130         $this->ClearFloats('RIGHT', $this->blklvl-1); 
15131       }
15132       else { $this->ClearFloats('BOTH', $this->blklvl-1); }
15133       list($l_exists, $r_exists, $l_max, $r_max, $l_width, $r_width) = $this->GetFloatDivInfo($this->blklvl-1);
15134     }
15135 
15136     if ($r_exists) { $currblk['margin_right'] += $r_width; }
15137 
15138     $currblk['float'] = 'R';
15139     $currblk['float_start_y'] = $this->y;
15140     if ($currblk['css_set_width']) {
15141       $currblk['margin_left'] = $container_w - ($setwidth + $bdl + $pdl + $bdr + $pdr + $currblk['margin_right']);
15142       $currblk['float_width'] = ($setwidth + $bdl + $pdl + $bdr + $pdr + $currblk['margin_right']);
15143     }
15144     else {
15145       // *** If no width set - would need to buffer and keep track of max width, then Right-align if not full width
15146       // and do borders and backgrounds - For now - just set to maximum width left
15147 
15148       if ($l_exists) { $currblk['margin_left'] += $l_width; }
15149       $currblk['css_set_width'] = $container_w - ($currblk['margin_left'] + $currblk['margin_right'] + $bdl + $pdl + $bdr + $pdr);
15150 
15151       $currblk['float_width'] = ($currblk['css_set_width'] + $bdl + $pdl + $bdr + $pdr + $currblk['margin_right']);
15152     }
15153   }
15154   else if (isset($properties['FLOAT']) && strtoupper($properties['FLOAT']) == 'LEFT' && !$this->ColActive) {
15155     // Cancel Keep-Block-together
15156     $currblk['keep_block_together'] = false;
15157     $currblk['y00'] = '';
15158     $this->keep_block_together = 0;
15159 
15160     $this->blockContext++;
15161     $currblk['blockContext'] = $this->blockContext;
15162 
15163     list($l_exists, $r_exists, $l_max, $r_max, $l_width, $r_width) = $this->GetFloatDivInfo($this->blklvl-1);
15164 
15165     // DIV is too narrow for text to fit!
15166     $maxw = $container_w - $l_width - $r_width;
15167     if (($setwidth + $currblk['margin_left'] + $bdl + $pdl + $bdr + $pdr) > $maxw || ($maxw - ($currblk['margin_left'] + $bdl + $pdl + $bdr + $pdr)) < $this->GetStringWidth('WW')) { 
15168       // Too narrow to fit - try to move down past L or R float
15169       if ($l_max < $r_max && ($setwidth + $currblk['margin_right'] + $bdl + $pdl + $bdr + $pdr) <= ($container_w - $r_width) && (($container_w - $r_width) - ($currblk['margin_right'] + $bdl + $pdl + $bdr + $pdr)) > $this->GetStringWidth('WW')) {
15170         $this->ClearFloats('LEFT', $this->blklvl-1); 
15171       }
15172       else if ($r_max < $l_max && ($setwidth + $currblk['margin_right'] + $bdl + $pdl + $bdr + $pdr) <= ($container_w - $l_width) && (($container_w - $l_width) - ($currblk['margin_right'] + $bdl + $pdl + $bdr + $pdr)) > $this->GetStringWidth('WW')) {
15173         $this->ClearFloats('RIGHT', $this->blklvl-1); 
15174       }
15175       else { $this->ClearFloats('BOTH', $this->blklvl-1); }
15176       list($l_exists, $r_exists, $l_max, $r_max, $l_width, $r_width) = $this->GetFloatDivInfo($this->blklvl-1);
15177     }
15178 
15179     if ($l_exists) { $currblk['margin_left'] += $l_width; }
15180 
15181     $currblk['float'] = 'L';
15182     $currblk['float_start_y'] = $this->y;
15183     if ($setwidth) {
15184       $currblk['margin_right'] = $container_w - ($setwidth + $bdl + $pdl + $bdr + $pdr + $currblk['margin_left']);
15185       $currblk['float_width'] = ($setwidth + $bdl + $pdl + $bdr + $pdr + $currblk['margin_left']);
15186     }
15187     else {
15188       // *** If no width set - would need to buffer and keep track of max width, then Right-align if not full width
15189       // and do borders and backgrounds - For now - just set to maximum width left
15190 
15191       if ($r_exists) { $currblk['margin_right'] += $r_width; }
15192       $currblk['css_set_width'] = $container_w - ($currblk['margin_left'] + $currblk['margin_right'] + $bdl + $pdl + $bdr + $pdr);
15193 
15194       $currblk['float_width'] = ($currblk['css_set_width'] + $bdl + $pdl + $bdr + $pdr + $currblk['margin_left']);
15195     }
15196   }
15197 
15198   else {
15199     // Don't allow overlap - if floats present - adjust padding to avoid overlap with Floats
15200     list($l_exists, $r_exists, $l_max, $r_max, $l_width, $r_width) = $this->GetFloatDivInfo($this->blklvl-1);
15201     $maxw = $container_w - $l_width - $r_width;
15202     if (($setwidth + $currblk['margin_left'] + $currblk['margin_right'] + $bdl + $pdl + $bdr + $pdr) > $maxw || ($maxw - ($currblk['margin_right'] + $currblk['margin_left'] + $bdl + $pdl + $bdr + $pdr)) < $this->GetStringWidth('WW')) { 
15203       // Too narrow to fit - try to move down past L or R float
15204       if ($l_max < $r_max && ($setwidth + $currblk['margin_left'] + $currblk['margin_right'] + $bdl + $pdl + $bdr + $pdr) <= ($container_w - $r_width) && (($container_w - $r_width) - ($currblk['margin_right'] + $currblk['margin_left'] + $bdl + $pdl + $bdr + $pdr)) > $this->GetStringWidth('WW')) {
15205         $this->ClearFloats('LEFT', $this->blklvl-1); 
15206       }
15207       else if ($r_max < $l_max && ($setwidth + $currblk['margin_left'] + $currblk['margin_right'] + $bdl + $pdl + $bdr + $pdr) <= ($container_w - $l_width) && (($container_w - $l_width) - ($currblk['margin_right'] + $currblk['margin_left'] + $bdl + $pdl + $bdr + $pdr)) > $this->GetStringWidth('WW')) {
15208         $this->ClearFloats('RIGHT', $this->blklvl-1); 
15209       }
15210       else { $this->ClearFloats('BOTH', $this->blklvl-1); }
15211       list($l_exists, $r_exists, $l_max, $r_max, $l_width, $r_width) = $this->GetFloatDivInfo($this->blklvl-1);
15212     }
15213     if ($r_exists) { $currblk['padding_right'] = max(($r_width-$currblk['margin_right']-$bdr), $pdr); }
15214     if ($l_exists) { $currblk['padding_left'] = max(($l_width-$currblk['margin_left']-$bdl), $pdl); }
15215   }
15216 /*-- END CSS-FLOAT --*/
15217 
15218 
15219 /*-- BORDER-RADIUS --*/
15220   // Automatically increase padding if required for border-radius
15221   if ($this->autoPadding && !$this->ColActive && !$this->keep_block_together) {
15222     if ($currblk['border_radius_TL_H']>$currblk['padding_left'] && $currblk['border_radius_TL_V']>$currblk['padding_top']) {
15223     if ($currblk['border_radius_TL_H']>$currblk['border_radius_TL_V']) {
15224       $this->_borderPadding($currblk['border_radius_TL_H'],$currblk['border_radius_TL_V'], $currblk['padding_left'], $currblk['padding_top']);
15225     }
15226     else {
15227       $this->_borderPadding($currblk['border_radius_TL_V'],$currblk['border_radius_TL_H'], $currblk['padding_top'], $currblk['padding_left']);
15228     }
15229     }
15230     if ($currblk['border_radius_TR_H']>$currblk['padding_right'] && $currblk['border_radius_TR_V']>$currblk['padding_top']) {
15231     if ($currblk['border_radius_TR_H']>$currblk['border_radius_TR_V']) {
15232       $this->_borderPadding($currblk['border_radius_TR_H'],$currblk['border_radius_TR_V'], $currblk['padding_right'], $currblk['padding_top']);
15233     }
15234     else {
15235       $this->_borderPadding($currblk['border_radius_TR_V'],$currblk['border_radius_TR_H'], $currblk['padding_top'], $currblk['padding_right']);
15236     }
15237     }
15238     if ($currblk['border_radius_BL_H']>$currblk['padding_left'] && $currblk['border_radius_BL_V']>$currblk['padding_bottom']) {
15239     if ($currblk['border_radius_BL_H']>$currblk['border_radius_BL_V']) {
15240       $this->_borderPadding($currblk['border_radius_BL_H'],$currblk['border_radius_BL_V'], $currblk['padding_left'], $currblk['padding_bottom']);
15241     }
15242     else {
15243       $this->_borderPadding($currblk['border_radius_BL_V'],$currblk['border_radius_BL_H'], $currblk['padding_bottom'], $currblk['padding_left']);
15244     }
15245     }
15246     if ($currblk['border_radius_BR_H']>$currblk['padding_right'] && $currblk['border_radius_BR_V']>$currblk['padding_bottom']) {
15247     if ($currblk['border_radius_BR_H']>$currblk['border_radius_BR_V']) {
15248       $this->_borderPadding($currblk['border_radius_BR_H'],$currblk['border_radius_BR_V'], $currblk['padding_right'], $currblk['padding_bottom']);
15249     }
15250     else {
15251       $this->_borderPadding($currblk['border_radius_BR_V'],$currblk['border_radius_BR_H'], $currblk['padding_bottom'], $currblk['padding_right']);
15252     }
15253     }
15254   }
15255 /*-- END BORDER-RADIUS --*/
15256 
15257 
15258   // Hanging indent - if negative indent: ensure padding is >= indent
15259   // mPDF 4.0
15260   $cbti = $this->ConvertSize($currblk['text_indent'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false); 
15261   if ($cbti < 0) {
15262     $hangind = -($cbti);
15263     if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { // *RTL*
15264     $currblk['padding_right'] = max($currblk['padding_right'],$hangind);  // *RTL*
15265     } // *RTL*
15266     else {  // *RTL*
15267     $currblk['padding_left'] = max($currblk['padding_left'],$hangind);
15268     } // *RTL*
15269   }
15270 
15271   if (isset($currblk['css_set_width'])) {
15272     if (isset($properties['MARGIN-LEFT']) && isset($properties['MARGIN-RIGHT']) && strtolower($properties['MARGIN-LEFT'])=='auto' && strtolower($properties['MARGIN-RIGHT'])=='auto') { 
15273       // Try to reduce margins to accomodate - if still too wide, set margin-right/left=0 (reduces width)
15274       $anyextra = $prevblk['inner_width'] - ($currblk['css_set_width'] + $currblk['border_left']['w'] + $currblk['padding_left'] + $currblk['border_right']['w'] + $currblk['padding_right']);
15275       if ($anyextra>0) {
15276       $currblk['margin_left'] = $currblk['margin_right'] = $anyextra /2;
15277       }
15278       else {
15279       $currblk['margin_left'] = $currblk['margin_right'] = 0;
15280       }
15281     }
15282     else if (isset($properties['MARGIN-LEFT']) && strtolower($properties['MARGIN-LEFT'])=='auto') { 
15283       // Try to reduce margin-left to accomodate - if still too wide, set margin-left=0 (reduces width)
15284       $currblk['margin_left'] = $prevblk['inner_width'] - ($currblk['css_set_width'] + $currblk['border_left']['w'] + $currblk['padding_left'] + $currblk['border_right']['w'] + $currblk['padding_right'] + $currblk['margin_right']);
15285       if ($currblk['margin_left'] < 0) {
15286       $currblk['margin_left'] = 0;
15287       }
15288     }
15289     else if (isset($properties['MARGIN-RIGHT']) && strtolower($properties['MARGIN-RIGHT'])=='auto') { 
15290       // Try to reduce margin-right to accomodate - if still too wide, set margin-right=0 (reduces width)
15291       $currblk['margin_right'] = $prevblk['inner_width'] - ($currblk['css_set_width'] + $currblk['border_left']['w'] + $currblk['padding_left'] + $currblk['border_right']['w'] + $currblk['padding_right'] + $currblk['margin_left']);
15292       if ($currblk['margin_right'] < 0) {
15293       $currblk['margin_right'] = 0;
15294       }
15295     }
15296     else { 
15297       if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { // *RTL*
15298     // Try to reduce margin-left to accomodate - if still too wide, set margin-left=0 (reduces width)
15299     $currblk['margin_left'] = $prevblk['inner_width'] - ($currblk['css_set_width'] + $currblk['border_left']['w'] + $currblk['padding_left'] + $currblk['border_right']['w'] + $currblk['padding_right'] + $currblk['margin_right']); // *RTL*
15300     if ($currblk['margin_left'] < 0) {  // *RTL*
15301       $currblk['margin_left'] = 0;  // *RTL*
15302     } // *RTL*
15303       } // *RTL*
15304       else {  // *RTL*
15305       // Try to reduce margin-right to accomodate - if still too wide, set margin-right=0 (reduces width)
15306       $currblk['margin_right'] = $prevblk['inner_width'] - ($currblk['css_set_width'] + $currblk['border_left']['w'] + $currblk['padding_left'] + $currblk['border_right']['w'] + $currblk['padding_right'] + $currblk['margin_left']);
15307       if ($currblk['margin_right'] < 0) {
15308       $currblk['margin_right'] = 0;
15309       }
15310       } // *RTL*
15311     }
15312   }
15313 
15314   $currblk['outer_left_margin'] = $prevblk['outer_left_margin'] + $currblk['margin_left'] + $prevblk['border_left']['w'] + $prevblk['padding_left'];
15315   $currblk['outer_right_margin'] = $prevblk['outer_right_margin']  + $currblk['margin_right'] + $prevblk['border_right']['w'] + $prevblk['padding_right'];
15316 
15317   $currblk['width'] = $this->pgwidth - ($currblk['outer_right_margin'] + $currblk['outer_left_margin']);
15318   $currblk['inner_width'] = $currblk['width'] - ($currblk['border_left']['w'] + $currblk['padding_left'] + $currblk['border_right']['w'] + $currblk['padding_right']);
15319 
15320   // Check DIV is not now too narrow to fit text
15321   $mw = $this->GetStringWidth('WW');
15322   if ($currblk['inner_width'] < $mw) {
15323     $currblk['padding_left'] = 0;
15324     $currblk['padding_right'] = 0;
15325     $currblk['border_left']['w'] = 0.2;
15326     $currblk['border_right']['w'] = 0.2;
15327     $currblk['margin_left'] = 0;
15328     $currblk['margin_right'] = 0;
15329     $currblk['outer_left_margin'] = $prevblk['outer_left_margin'] + $currblk['margin_left'] + $prevblk['border_left']['w'] + $prevblk['padding_left'];
15330     $currblk['outer_right_margin'] = $prevblk['outer_right_margin']  + $currblk['margin_right'] + $prevblk['border_right']['w'] + $prevblk['padding_right'];
15331     $currblk['width'] = $this->pgwidth - ($currblk['outer_right_margin'] + $currblk['outer_left_margin']);
15332     $currblk['inner_width'] = $this->pgwidth - ($currblk['outer_right_margin'] + $currblk['outer_left_margin'] + $currblk['border_left']['w'] + $currblk['padding_left'] + $currblk['border_right']['w'] + $currblk['padding_right']);
15333 //    if ($currblk['inner_width'] < $mw) { $this->Error("DIV is too narrow for text to fit!"); }
15334   }
15335 
15336   $this->x = $this->lMargin + $currblk['outer_left_margin'];
15337 
15338 /*-- BACKGROUND-IMAGES --*/
15339   // mPDF 4.3.011
15340   if (isset($properties['BACKGROUND-IMAGE']) && $properties['BACKGROUND-IMAGE'] && !$this->kwt && !$this->ColActive && !$this->keep_block_together) {
15341     $file = $properties['BACKGROUND-IMAGE'];
15342     $sizesarray = $this->Image($file,0,0,0,0,'','',false, false, false, false, false);  // mPDF 4.3.012D
15343     if (isset($sizesarray['IMAGE_ID'])) {
15344       $image_id = $sizesarray['IMAGE_ID'];
15345       $orig_w = $sizesarray['WIDTH']*$this->k;    // in user units i.e. mm
15346       $orig_h = $sizesarray['HEIGHT']*$this->k;   // (using $this->img_dpi)
15347       $x_repeat = true;
15348       $y_repeat = true;
15349       if (isset($properties['BACKGROUND-REPEAT'])) {
15350         if ($properties['BACKGROUND-REPEAT']=='no-repeat' || $properties['BACKGROUND-REPEAT']=='repeat-x') { $y_repeat = false; }
15351         if ($properties['BACKGROUND-REPEAT']=='no-repeat' || $properties['BACKGROUND-REPEAT']=='repeat-y') { $x_repeat = false; }
15352       }
15353       $x_pos = 0;
15354       $y_pos = 0;
15355       if (isset($properties['BACKGROUND-POSITION'])) { 
15356         $ppos = preg_split('/\s+/',$properties['BACKGROUND-POSITION']);
15357         $x_pos = $ppos[0];
15358         $y_pos = $ppos[1];
15359         if (!stristr($x_pos ,'%') ) { $x_pos = $this->ConvertSize($x_pos ,$currblk['inner_width'],$this->FontSize); }
15360         if (!stristr($y_pos ,'%') ) { $y_pos = $this->ConvertSize($y_pos ,$currblk['inner_width'],$this->FontSize); }
15361       }
15362       // mPDF 4.3.015
15363       if (isset($properties['BACKGROUND-IMAGE-RESIZE'])) { $resize = $properties['BACKGROUND-IMAGE-RESIZE']; }
15364       else { $resize = 0; }
15365       // mPDF 4.3.017
15366       if (isset($properties['BACKGROUND-IMAGE-OPACITY'])) { $opacity = $properties['BACKGROUND-IMAGE-OPACITY']; }
15367       else { $opacity = 1; }
15368       $currblk['background-image'] = array('image_id'=>$image_id, 'orig_w'=>$orig_w, 'orig_h'=>$orig_h, 'x_pos'=>$x_pos, 'y_pos'=>$y_pos, 'x_repeat'=>$x_repeat, 'y_repeat'=>$y_repeat, 'resize'=>$resize, 'opacity'=>$opacity);  // mPDF 4.3.015  4.3.017
15369     }
15370   }
15371 /*-- END BACKGROUND-IMAGES --*/
15372 
15373 /*-- TABLES --*/
15374   if ($this->use_kwt && isset($attr['KEEP-WITH-TABLE']) && !$this->ColActive && !$this->keep_block_together) {
15375     $this->kwt = true;
15376     $this->kwt_y0 = $this->y;
15377     $this->kwt_x0 = $this->x;
15378     $this->kwt_height = 0;
15379     $this->kwt_buffer = array();
15380     $this->kwt_Links = array();
15381     $this->kwt_Annots = array();
15382     $this->kwt_moved = false;
15383     $this->kwt_saved = false;
15384     // mPDF 3.0
15385     $this->kwt_Reference = array();
15386     $this->kwt_BMoutlines = array();
15387     $this->kwt_toc = array();
15388   }
15389   else { 
15390 /*-- END TABLES --*/
15391     $this->kwt = false; 
15392   } // *TABLES*
15393 
15394   //Save x,y coords in case we need to print borders...
15395   $currblk['y0'] = $this->y;
15396   $currblk['x0'] = $this->x;
15397   $currblk['startpage'] = $this->page;
15398   $this->oldy = $this->y;
15399 
15400   $this->lastblocklevelchange = 1 ;
15401 
15402   break;
15403 
15404     case 'HR':
15405   // Added mPDF 3.0 Float DIV - CLEAR
15406   if (isset($attr['STYLE'])) {
15407     $properties = $this->readInlineCSS($attr['STYLE']);
15408     if (isset($properties['CLEAR'])) { $this->ClearFloats(strtoupper($properties['CLEAR']),$this->blklvl); }  // *CSS-FLOAT*
15409   }
15410 
15411   $this->ignorefollowingspaces = true; 
15412 
15413   $objattr = array();
15414     // mPDF 3.0
15415     $objattr['margin_top'] = 0;
15416     $objattr['margin_bottom'] = 0;
15417     $objattr['margin_left'] = 0;
15418     $objattr['margin_right'] = 0;
15419     $objattr['width'] = 0;
15420     $objattr['height'] = 0;
15421     $objattr['border_top']['w'] = 0;
15422     $objattr['border_bottom']['w'] = 0;
15423     $objattr['border_left']['w'] = 0;
15424     $objattr['border_right']['w'] = 0;
15425   $properties = $this->MergeCSS('',$tag,$attr);
15426   if (isset($properties['MARGIN-TOP'])) { $objattr['margin_top'] = $this->ConvertSize($properties['MARGIN-TOP'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false); }
15427   if (isset($properties['MARGIN-BOTTOM'])) { $objattr['margin_bottom'] = $this->ConvertSize($properties['MARGIN-BOTTOM'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false); }
15428   if (isset($properties['WIDTH'])) { $objattr['width'] = $this->ConvertSize($properties['WIDTH'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width']); }
15429   if (isset($properties['TEXT-ALIGN'])) { $objattr['align'] = $align[strtolower($properties['TEXT-ALIGN'])]; }
15430   // mPDF 3.0
15431   if (isset($properties['MARGIN-LEFT']) && strtolower($properties['MARGIN-LEFT'])=='auto') { 
15432     $objattr['align'] = 'R';
15433   }
15434   if (isset($properties['MARGIN-RIGHT']) && strtolower($properties['MARGIN-RIGHT'])=='auto') { 
15435     $objattr['align'] = 'L';
15436     if (isset($properties['MARGIN-RIGHT']) && strtolower($properties['MARGIN-RIGHT'])=='auto' && isset($properties['MARGIN-LEFT']) && strtolower($properties['MARGIN-LEFT'])=='auto') { 
15437       $objattr['align'] = 'C';
15438     }
15439   }
15440   if (isset($properties['COLOR'])) { $objattr['color'] = $this->ConvertColor($properties['COLOR']); }
15441   if (isset($properties['HEIGHT'])) { $objattr['linewidth'] = $this->ConvertSize($properties['HEIGHT'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false); }
15442 
15443   if(isset($attr['WIDTH']) && $attr['WIDTH'] != '') $objattr['width'] = $this->ConvertSize($attr['WIDTH'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width']);
15444   if(isset($attr['ALIGN']) && $attr['ALIGN'] != '') $objattr['align'] = $align[strtolower($attr['ALIGN'])];
15445   if(isset($attr['COLOR']) && $attr['COLOR'] != '') $objattr['color'] = $this->ConvertColor($attr['COLOR']);
15446 
15447 /*-- TABLES --*/
15448   if ($this->tableLevel) {
15449     $objattr['W-PERCENT'] = 100;
15450     if (isset($properties['WIDTH']) && stristr($properties['WIDTH'],'%')) { 
15451       $properties['WIDTH'] += 0;  //make "90%" become simply "90" 
15452       $objattr['W-PERCENT'] = $properties['WIDTH'];
15453     }
15454     if (isset($attr['WIDTH']) && stristr($attr['WIDTH'],'%')) { 
15455       $attr['WIDTH'] += 0;  //make "90%" become simply "90" 
15456       $objattr['W-PERCENT'] = $attr['WIDTH'];
15457     }
15458   }
15459 /*-- END TABLES --*/
15460 
15461   $objattr['type'] = 'hr';
15462   $objattr['height'] = $objattr['linewidth'] + $objattr['margin_top'] + $objattr['margin_bottom'];
15463   $e = "\xbb\xa4\xactype=image,objattr=".serialize($objattr)."\xbb\xa4\xac";
15464 
15465   // Clear properties - tidy up
15466   $properties = array();
15467 
15468 /*-- TABLES --*/
15469   // Output it to buffers
15470   if ($this->tableLevel) {
15471     if (!isset($this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['maxs'])) {
15472       $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['maxs'] = $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s'];
15473     }
15474     elseif($this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['maxs'] < $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s']) {
15475       $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['maxs'] = $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s']; 
15476     }
15477     $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s'] = 0 ;// reset
15478     $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['textbuffer'][] = array($e,$this->HREF,$this->currentfontstyle,$this->colorarray,$this->currentfontfamily,$this->SUP,$this->SUB,'',$this->strike,$this->outlineparam,$this->spanbgcolorarray,$this->currentfontsize,$this->ReqFontStyle);
15479   }
15480   else {
15481 /*-- END TABLES --*/
15482     $this->textbuffer[] = array($e,$this->HREF,$this->currentfontstyle,$this->colorarray,$this->currentfontfamily,$this->SUP,$this->SUB,'',$this->strike,$this->outlineparam,$this->spanbgcolorarray,$this->currentfontsize,$this->ReqFontStyle);
15483   } // *TABLES*
15484 
15485   break;
15486 
15487 
15488 /*-- BARCODES --*/
15489     // mPDF 4.0
15490     case 'BARCODE':
15491   if(isset($attr['CODE']) && $attr['CODE']) {
15492     $objattr = array();
15493     $objattr['margin_top'] = 0;
15494     $objattr['margin_bottom'] = 0;
15495     $objattr['margin_left'] = 0;
15496     $objattr['margin_right'] = 0;
15497     $objattr['padding_top'] = 0;
15498     $objattr['padding_bottom'] = 0;
15499     $objattr['padding_left'] = 0;
15500     $objattr['padding_right'] = 0;
15501     $objattr['width'] = 0;
15502     $objattr['height'] = 0;
15503     $objattr['border_top']['w'] = 0;
15504     $objattr['border_bottom']['w'] = 0;
15505     $objattr['border_left']['w'] = 0;
15506     $objattr['border_right']['w'] = 0;
15507         $objattr['code'] = $attr['CODE'];
15508 
15509     if(isset($attr['TYPE'])) {
15510       $objattr['btype'] = trim(strtoupper($attr['TYPE']));
15511     }
15512     else { $objattr['btype'] = 'EAN13'; } // default
15513     if (preg_match('/^(EAN13|ISBN|ISSN|EAN8|UPCA|UPCE)P([25])$/',$objattr['btype'],$m)) {
15514       $objattr['btype'] = $m[1];
15515       $objattr['bsupp'] = $m[2];
15516       if (preg_match('/^(\S+)\s+(.*)$/',$objattr['code'],$mm)) {
15517         $objattr['code'] = $mm[1];
15518         $objattr['bsupp_code'] = $mm[2];
15519       }
15520     }
15521     else { $objattr['bsupp'] = 0; }
15522 
15523     if(isset($attr['TEXT']) && $attr['TEXT']==1) { $objattr['showtext'] = 1; }
15524     else { $objattr['showtext'] = 0; }
15525     if(isset($attr['SIZE']) && $attr['SIZE']>0) { $objattr['bsize'] = $attr['SIZE']; }
15526     else { $objattr['bsize'] = 1; }
15527     if(isset($attr['HEIGHT']) && $attr['HEIGHT']>0) { $objattr['bheight'] = $attr['HEIGHT']; }
15528     else { $objattr['bheight'] = 1; }
15529     if(isset($attr['PR']) && $attr['PR']>0) { $objattr['pr_ratio'] = $attr['PR']; }
15530     else { $objattr['pr_ratio'] = ''; }
15531     $properties = $this->MergeCSS('',$tag,$attr);
15532     if(isset($properties ['DISPLAY']) && strtolower($properties ['DISPLAY'])=='none') { 
15533       return; 
15534     }
15535     if (isset($properties['MARGIN-TOP'])) { $objattr['margin_top']=$this->ConvertSize($properties['MARGIN-TOP'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false); }
15536     if (isset($properties['MARGIN-BOTTOM'])) { $objattr['margin_bottom'] = $this->ConvertSize($properties['MARGIN-BOTTOM'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false); }
15537     if (isset($properties['MARGIN-LEFT'])) { $objattr['margin_left'] = $this->ConvertSize($properties['MARGIN-LEFT'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false); }
15538     if (isset($properties['MARGIN-RIGHT'])) { $objattr['margin_right'] = $this->ConvertSize($properties['MARGIN-RIGHT'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false); }
15539 
15540     if (isset($properties['PADDING-TOP'])) { $objattr['padding_top']=$this->ConvertSize($properties['PADDING-TOP'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false); }
15541     if (isset($properties['PADDING-BOTTOM'])) { $objattr['padding_bottom'] = $this->ConvertSize($properties['PADDING-BOTTOM'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false); }
15542     if (isset($properties['PADDING-LEFT'])) { $objattr['padding_left'] = $this->ConvertSize($properties['PADDING-LEFT'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false); }
15543     if (isset($properties['PADDING-RIGHT'])) { $objattr['padding_right'] = $this->ConvertSize($properties['PADDING-RIGHT'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false); }
15544 
15545     if (isset($properties['BORDER-TOP'])) { $objattr['border_top'] = $this->border_details($properties['BORDER-TOP']); }
15546     if (isset($properties['BORDER-BOTTOM'])) { $objattr['border_bottom'] = $this->border_details($properties['BORDER-BOTTOM']); }
15547     if (isset($properties['BORDER-LEFT'])) { $objattr['border_left'] = $this->border_details($properties['BORDER-LEFT']); }
15548     if (isset($properties['BORDER-RIGHT'])) { $objattr['border_right'] = $this->border_details($properties['BORDER-RIGHT']); }
15549 
15550     if (isset($properties['VERTICAL-ALIGN'])) { $objattr['vertical-align'] = $align[strtolower($properties['VERTICAL-ALIGN'])]; }
15551     if (isset($properties['COLOR']) && $properties['COLOR'] != '') { $objattr['color'] = $this->ConvertColor($properties['COLOR']); }
15552     else { $objattr['color'] = false; }
15553     if (isset($properties['BACKGROUND-COLOR']) && $properties['BACKGROUND-COLOR'] != '') { $objattr['bgcolor'] = $this->ConvertColor($properties['BACKGROUND-COLOR']); }
15554     else { $objattr['bgcolor'] = false; }
15555 
15556     if (!class_exists('PDFBarcode')) { 
15557       include(_MPDF_PATH.'classes/barcode.php'); 
15558       $this->barcode = new PDFBarcode();
15559     }
15560 
15561     if ($objattr['btype'] == 'EAN13' || $objattr['btype'] == 'ISBN' || $objattr['btype'] == 'ISSN' || $objattr['btype'] == 'UPCA' || $objattr['btype'] == 'UPCE' || $objattr['btype'] == 'EAN8') {
15562       $code = preg_replace('/\-/','',$objattr['code']);
15563       if ($objattr['btype'] == 'ISSN' || $objattr['btype'] == 'ISBN') {
15564         $arrcode = $this->barcode->getBarcodeArray($code, 'EAN13');
15565       }
15566       else { $arrcode = $this->barcode->getBarcodeArray($code, $objattr['btype'] ); }
15567       if ($arrcode === false) { $this->Error('Error in barcode string.'); }
15568 
15569       if ($objattr['bsupp'] == 2 || $objattr['bsupp'] == 5) { // EAN-2 or -5 Supplement
15570         $supparrcode = $this->barcode->getBarcodeArray($objattr['bsupp_code'], 'EAN'.$objattr['bsupp'] ); 
15571         $w = ($arrcode["maxw"] + $arrcode['lightmL'] + $arrcode['lightmR'] + $supparrcode["maxw"] + $supparrcode['sepM']) * $arrcode['nom-X'] * $objattr['bsize'];
15572       }
15573       else {
15574         $w = ($arrcode["maxw"] + $arrcode['lightmL'] + $arrcode['lightmR']) * $arrcode['nom-X'] * $objattr['bsize'];
15575       }
15576       $h = $arrcode['nom-H'] * $objattr['bsize'] * $objattr['bheight'];
15577       // Add height for ISBN string + margin from top of bars
15578       if (($objattr['showtext'] && $objattr['btype'] == 'EAN13') || $objattr['btype'] == 'ISBN' || $objattr['btype'] == 'ISSN') { 
15579         $tisbnm = 1.5 * $objattr['bsize'];  // Top margin between TOP TEXT (isbn - if shown) & bars
15580         $isbn_fontsize = 2.1 * $objattr['bsize'];
15581         $h += $isbn_fontsize + $tisbnm  ; 
15582       }
15583     }
15584     else if ($objattr['btype'] == 'IMB' || $objattr['btype'] == 'RM4SCC' || $objattr['btype'] == 'KIX' || $objattr['btype'] == 'POSTNET' || $objattr['btype'] == 'PLANET') {
15585       $arrcode = $this->barcode->getBarcodeArray($objattr['code'], $objattr['btype'] ); 
15586       if ($arrcode === false) { $this->Error('Error in barcode string.'); }
15587       $w = ($arrcode["maxw"] * $arrcode['nom-X'] * $objattr['bsize']) + $arrcode['quietL'] + $arrcode['quietR'];
15588       $h = ($arrcode['nom-H'] * $objattr['bsize']) + (2*$arrcode['quietTB']);
15589     }
15590     else if (in_array($objattr['btype'], array('C128A','C128B','C128C','EAN128A','EAN128B','EAN128C','C39','C39+','C39E','C39E+','S25','S25+','I25','I25+','I25B','I25B+','C93','MSI','MSI+','CODABAR','CODE11'))) {
15591       $arrcode = $this->barcode->getBarcodeArray($objattr['code'], $objattr['btype'], $objattr['pr_ratio'] );
15592       if ($arrcode === false) { $this->Error('Error in barcode string.'); }
15593       $w = ($arrcode["maxw"] + $arrcode['lightmL'] + $arrcode['lightmR']) * $arrcode['nom-X'] * $objattr['bsize'];
15594       $h = ((2*$arrcode['lightTB'] * $arrcode['nom-X']) + $arrcode['nom-H']) * $objattr['bsize'] * $objattr['bheight'];
15595     }
15596     else { break; }
15597 
15598     $extraheight = $objattr['padding_top'] + $objattr['padding_bottom'] + $objattr['margin_top'] + $objattr['margin_bottom'] + $objattr['border_top']['w'] + $objattr['border_bottom']['w'];
15599     $extrawidth = $objattr['padding_left'] + $objattr['padding_right'] + $objattr['margin_left'] + $objattr['margin_right'] + $objattr['border_left']['w'] + $objattr['border_right']['w'];
15600 
15601     $objattr['type'] = 'barcode';
15602     $objattr['height'] = $h + $extraheight;
15603     $objattr['width'] = $w + $extrawidth;
15604     $objattr['barcode_height'] = $h;
15605     $objattr['barcode_width'] = $w;
15606 /*-- CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT --*/
15607     if (!$this->ColActive && !$this->tableLevel && !$this->listlvl && !$this->kwt && !$this->keep_block_together) {
15608       if (isset($properties['FLOAT']) && (strtoupper($properties['FLOAT']) == 'RIGHT' || strtoupper($properties['FLOAT']) == 'LEFT')) {
15609       $objattr['float'] = substr(strtoupper($properties['FLOAT']),0,1);
15610       }
15611     }
15612 /*-- END CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT --*/
15613 
15614     $e = "\xbb\xa4\xactype=barcode,objattr=".serialize($objattr)."\xbb\xa4\xac";
15615 
15616     // Clear properties - tidy up
15617     $properties = array();
15618 
15619 /*-- TABLES --*/
15620     // Output it to buffers
15621     if ($this->tableLevel) {
15622       $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['textbuffer'][] = array($e,$this->HREF,$this->currentfontstyle,$this->colorarray,$this->currentfontfamily,$this->SUP,$this->SUB,'',$this->strike,$this->outlineparam,$this->spanbgcolorarray,$this->currentfontsize,$this->ReqFontStyle);
15623       $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s'] += $objattr['width'] ;
15624     }
15625     else {
15626 /*-- END TABLES --*/
15627       $this->textbuffer[] = array($e,$this->HREF,$this->currentfontstyle,$this->colorarray,$this->currentfontfamily,$this->SUP,$this->SUB,'',$this->strike,$this->outlineparam,$this->spanbgcolorarray,$this->currentfontsize,$this->ReqFontStyle);
15628 
15629     } // *TABLES*
15630   }
15631   break;
15632 /*-- END BARCODES --*/
15633 
15634 
15635   // *********** FORM ELEMENTS ********************
15636 
15637 /*-- FORMS --*/
15638     case 'SELECT':
15639   $this->lastoptionaltag = ''; // Save current HTML specified optional endtag
15640   $this->InlineProperties[$tag] = $this->saveInlineProperties();
15641   $properties = $this->MergeCSS('',$tag,$attr);
15642   if (isset($properties['FONT-FAMILY'])) { 
15643      if (!$this->isCJK) { 
15644     $this->SetFont($properties['FONT-FAMILY'],$this->FontStyle,0,false);
15645      }
15646   }
15647   if (isset($properties['FONT-SIZE'])) { 
15648     $mmsize = $this->ConvertSize($properties['FONT-SIZE'],$this->default_font_size/$this->k);
15649       $this->SetFontSize($mmsize*$this->k,false);
15650   }
15651   if (isset($properties['COLOR'])) { $this->selectoption['COLOR'] = $this->ConvertColor($properties['COLOR']); }
15652   $this->specialcontent = "type=select"; 
15653   if(isset($attr['DISABLED'])) { $this->selectoption['DISABLED'] = $attr['DISABLED']; }
15654   if(isset($attr['TITLE'])) { $this->selectoption['TITLE'] = $attr['TITLE']; }
15655   if(isset($attr['MULTIPLE'])) { $this->selectoption['MULTIPLE'] = $attr['MULTIPLE']; }
15656   if(isset($attr['SIZE']) && $attr['SIZE']>1) { $this->selectoption['SIZE'] = $attr['SIZE']; }
15657 
15658   $properties = array();
15659   break;
15660 
15661     case 'OPTION':
15662   $this->lastoptionaltag = 'OPTION'; // Save current HTML specified optional endtag
15663   $this->selectoption['ACTIVE'] = true;
15664   $this->selectoption['currentSEL'] = false;
15665   if (empty($this->selectoption)) {
15666     $this->selectoption['MAXWIDTH'] = '';
15667     $this->selectoption['SELECTED'] = '';
15668   }
15669   if (isset($attr['SELECTED'])) { 
15670     $this->selectoption['SELECTED'] = '';
15671     $this->selectoption['currentSEL'] = true; 
15672   }
15673   // mPDD 1.4 Active Forms
15674   $this->selectoption['currentVAL'] = $attr['VALUE'];
15675   break;
15676 
15677     case 'TEXTAREA':
15678   $objattr = array();
15679     // mPDF 3.0
15680     $objattr['margin_top'] = 0;
15681     $objattr['margin_bottom'] = 0;
15682     $objattr['margin_left'] = 0;
15683     $objattr['margin_right'] = 0;
15684     $objattr['width'] = 0;
15685     $objattr['height'] = 0;
15686     $objattr['border_top']['w'] = 0;
15687     $objattr['border_bottom']['w'] = 0;
15688     $objattr['border_left']['w'] = 0;
15689     $objattr['border_right']['w'] = 0;
15690   if(isset($attr['DISABLED'])) { $objattr['disabled'] = true; }
15691   if(isset($attr['READONLY'])) { $objattr['readonly'] = true; }
15692   if(isset($attr['TITLE'])) { $objattr['title'] = $attr['TITLE']; }
15693   $this->InlineProperties[$tag] = $this->saveInlineProperties();
15694   $properties = $this->MergeCSS('',$tag,$attr);
15695   if (isset($properties['FONT-FAMILY'])) { 
15696      if (!$this->isCJK) { 
15697     $this->SetFont($properties['FONT-FAMILY'],'',0,false);
15698      }
15699   }
15700   if (isset($properties['FONT-SIZE'])) { 
15701     $mmsize = $this->ConvertSize($properties['FONT-SIZE'],$this->default_font_size/$this->k);
15702       $this->SetFontSize($mmsize*$this->k,false);
15703   }
15704   if (isset($properties['COLOR'])) { $objattr['color'] = $this->ConvertColor($properties['COLOR']); }
15705   $objattr['fontfamily'] = $this->FontFamily;
15706   $objattr['fontsize'] = $this->FontSizePt;
15707 
15708   $this->SetLineHeight('',$this->textarea_lineheight); 
15709   $formLineHeight = $this->lineheight;
15710 
15711   $w = 0;
15712   $h = 0;
15713   if(isset($properties['WIDTH'])) $w = $this->ConvertSize($properties['WIDTH'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false);
15714   if(isset($properties['HEIGHT'])) $h = $this->ConvertSize($properties['HEIGHT'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false);
15715   if ($properties['VERTICAL-ALIGN']) { $objattr['vertical-align'] = $align[strtolower($properties['VERTICAL-ALIGN'])]; }
15716 
15717   $colsize = 20; //HTML default value 
15718   $rowsize = 2; //HTML default value
15719   if (isset($attr['COLS'])) $colsize = intval($attr['COLS']);
15720   if (isset($attr['ROWS'])) $rowsize = intval($attr['ROWS']);
15721 
15722   $charsize = $this->GetStringWidth('w');
15723   if ($w) { $colsize = round(($w-($this->form_element_spacing['textarea']['outer']['h']*2)-($this->form_element_spacing['textarea']['inner']['h']*2))/$charsize); }
15724   if ($h) { $rowsize = round(($h-($this->form_element_spacing['textarea']['outer']['v']*2)-($this->form_element_spacing['textarea']['inner']['v']*2))/$formLineHeight); }
15725 
15726   $objattr['type'] = 'textarea';
15727   $objattr['width'] = ($colsize * $charsize) + ($this->form_element_spacing['textarea']['outer']['h']*2)+($this->form_element_spacing['textarea']['inner']['h']*2);
15728   $objattr['height'] = ($rowsize * $formLineHeight) + ($this->form_element_spacing['textarea']['outer']['v']*2)+($this->form_element_spacing['textarea']['inner']['v']*2);
15729   $objattr['rows'] = $rowsize;
15730   $objattr['cols'] = $colsize;
15731 
15732   $this->specialcontent = serialize($objattr); 
15733 
15734   if ($this->tableLevel) {  // *TABLES*
15735     $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s'] += $objattr['width'] ; // *TABLES*
15736   } // *TABLES*
15737 
15738   // Clear properties - tidy up
15739   $properties = array();
15740   break;
15741 
15742 
15743 
15744   // *********** FORM - INPUT ********************
15745 
15746     case 'INPUT':
15747   if (!isset($attr['TYPE'])) $attr['TYPE'] == 'TEXT'; 
15748   $objattr = array();
15749     // mPDF 3.0
15750     $objattr['margin_top'] = 0;
15751     $objattr['margin_bottom'] = 0;
15752     $objattr['margin_left'] = 0;
15753     $objattr['margin_right'] = 0;
15754     $objattr['width'] = 0;
15755     $objattr['height'] = 0;
15756     $objattr['border_top']['w'] = 0;
15757     $objattr['border_bottom']['w'] = 0;
15758     $objattr['border_left']['w'] = 0;
15759     $objattr['border_right']['w'] = 0;
15760   $objattr['type'] = 'input';
15761   if(isset($attr['DISABLED'])) { $objattr['disabled'] = true; }
15762   if(isset($attr['READONLY'])) { $objattr['readonly'] = true; }
15763   if(isset($attr['TITLE'])) { $objattr['title'] = $attr['TITLE']; }
15764   else if(isset($attr['ALT'])) { $objattr['title'] = $attr['ALT']; }
15765 
15766   $this->InlineProperties[$tag] = $this->saveInlineProperties();
15767   $properties = $this->MergeCSS('',$tag,$attr);
15768   $objattr['vertical-align'] = '';
15769 
15770   if (isset($properties['FONT-FAMILY'])) { 
15771      if (!$this->isCJK) { 
15772     $this->SetFont($properties['FONT-FAMILY'],$this->FontStyle,0,false);
15773      }
15774   }
15775   if (isset($properties['FONT-SIZE'])) { 
15776     $mmsize = $this->ConvertSize($properties['FONT-SIZE'],($this->default_font_size/$this->k));
15777       $this->SetFontSize($mmsize*$this->k,false);
15778   }
15779   if (isset($properties['COLOR'])) { $objattr['color'] = $this->ConvertColor($properties['COLOR']); }
15780   $objattr['fontfamily'] = $this->FontFamily;
15781   $objattr['fontsize'] = $this->FontSizePt;
15782 
15783 
15784   $type = '';
15785       $texto='';
15786   $height = $this->FontSize;
15787   $width = 0;
15788   $spacesize = $this->GetStringWidth(' ');
15789 
15790   $w = 0;
15791   if(isset($properties['WIDTH'])) $w = $this->ConvertSize($properties['WIDTH'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width']);
15792 
15793   if ($properties['VERTICAL-ALIGN']) { $objattr['vertical-align'] = $align[strtolower($properties['VERTICAL-ALIGN'])]; }
15794 
15795   switch(strtoupper($attr['TYPE'])){
15796      case 'HIDDEN':
15797           $this->ignorefollowingspaces = true; //Eliminate exceeding left-side spaces
15798       if ($this->InlineProperties[$tag]) { $this->restoreInlineProperties($this->InlineProperties[$tag]); }
15799       unset($this->InlineProperties[$tag]);
15800       break 2;
15801      case 'CHECKBOX': //Draw Checkbox
15802       $type = 'CHECKBOX';
15803       if (isset($attr['VALUE'])) $objattr['value'] = $attr['VALUE'];
15804       if (isset($attr['CHECKED'])) { $objattr['checked'] = true; } 
15805       else { $objattr['checked'] = false; }
15806       $width = $this->FontSize;
15807       $height = $this->FontSize;
15808       break;
15809 
15810      case 'RADIO': //Draw Radio button
15811       $type = 'RADIO';
15812       if (isset($attr['CHECKED'])) $objattr['checked'] = true;
15813       $width = $this->FontSize;
15814       $height = $this->FontSize;
15815       break;
15816 
15817 /*-- IMAGES-CORE --*/
15818      case 'IMAGE': // Draw an Image button
15819   if(isset($attr['SRC'])) {
15820     $type = 'IMAGE';
15821         $srcpath = $attr['SRC'];
15822     $orig_srcpath = $attr['ORIG_SRC']; // mPDF 4.2.029
15823     // VSPACE and HSPACE converted to margins in MergeCSS
15824     if (isset($properties['MARGIN-TOP'])) { $objattr['margin_top']=$this->ConvertSize($properties['MARGIN-TOP'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false); }
15825     if (isset($properties['MARGIN-BOTTOM'])) { $objattr['margin_bottom'] = $this->ConvertSize($properties['MARGIN-BOTTOM'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false); }
15826     if (isset($properties['MARGIN-LEFT'])) { $objattr['margin_left'] = $this->ConvertSize($properties['MARGIN-LEFT'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false); }
15827     if (isset($properties['MARGIN-RIGHT'])) { $objattr['margin_right'] = $this->ConvertSize($properties['MARGIN-RIGHT'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false); }
15828 
15829 
15830     if (isset($properties['BORDER-TOP'])) { $objattr['border_top'] = $this->border_details($properties['BORDER-TOP']); }
15831     if (isset($properties['BORDER-BOTTOM'])) { $objattr['border_bottom'] = $this->border_details($properties['BORDER-BOTTOM']); }
15832     if (isset($properties['BORDER-LEFT'])) { $objattr['border_left'] = $this->border_details($properties['BORDER-LEFT']); }
15833     if (isset($properties['BORDER-RIGHT'])) { $objattr['border_right'] = $this->border_details($properties['BORDER-RIGHT']); }
15834 
15835     if (isset($properties['VERTICAL-ALIGN'])) { $objattr['vertical-align'] = $align[strtolower($properties['VERTICAL-ALIGN'])]; }
15836 
15837     $w = 0;
15838     $h = 0;
15839     if(isset($properties['WIDTH'])) $w = $this->ConvertSize($properties['WIDTH'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width']);
15840     if(isset($properties['HEIGHT'])) $h = $this->ConvertSize($properties['HEIGHT'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width']);
15841 
15842     $extraheight = $objattr['margin_top'] + $objattr['margin_bottom'] + $objattr['border_top']['w'] + $objattr['border_bottom']['w'];
15843     $extrawidth = $objattr['margin_left'] + $objattr['margin_right'] + $objattr['border_left']['w'] + $objattr['border_right']['w'];
15844 
15845     // Image file
15846     // mPDF 4.2
15847     $info=$this->_getImage($srcpath, true, false, $orig_srcpath); // mPDF 4.2.029
15848     if(!$info) {
15849       $info = $this->_getImage($this->noImageFile);
15850       if ($info) { 
15851         $srcpath = $this->noImageFile; 
15852         $w = ($info['w'] * 0.2645);   // 14 x 16px
15853         $h = ($info['h'] * 0.2645);   // 14 x 16px
15854       }
15855     }
15856     if(!$info) break;
15857 
15858     $objattr['file'] = $srcpath;
15859     //Default width and height calculation if needed
15860     if($w==0 and $h==0) {
15861       //Put image at default dpi
15862       $w=($info['w']/$this->k) * (72/$this->img_dpi);
15863       $h=($info['h']/$this->k) * (72/$this->img_dpi);
15864     }
15865     // IF WIDTH OR HEIGHT SPECIFIED
15866     if($w==0) $w=$h*$info['w']/$info['h'];
15867     if($h==0) $h=$w*$info['h']/$info['w'];
15868     // Resize to maximum dimensions of page
15869     $maxWidth = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'];
15870       $maxHeight = $this->h - ($this->tMargin + $this->bMargin + 10) ;  // mPDF 4.1
15871     if ($this->fullImageHeight) { $maxHeight = $this->fullImageHeight; }  // mPDF 4.1
15872     if ($w + $extrawidth > $maxWidth ) {
15873       $w = $maxWidth - $extrawidth;
15874       $h=$w*$info['h']/$info['w'];
15875     }
15876     if ($h + $extraheight > $maxHeight ) {
15877       $h = $maxHeight - $extraheight;
15878       $w=$h*$info['w']/$info['h'];
15879     }
15880     $height = $h + $extraheight;
15881     $width = $w + $extrawidth;
15882     $objattr['image_height'] = $h;
15883     $objattr['image_width'] = $w;
15884     $objattr['ID'] = $info['i'];
15885     $texto = 'X';
15886     break;
15887   }
15888 /*-- END IMAGES-CORE --*/
15889 
15890      case 'BUTTON': // Draw a button
15891      case 'SUBMIT': 
15892      case 'RESET': 
15893       $type = strtoupper($attr['TYPE']);
15894       if ($type=='IMAGE') { $type = 'BUTTON'; } // src path not found
15895       if (isset($attr['VALUE'])) {
15896         $objattr['value'] = $attr['VALUE'];
15897       }
15898       else {
15899         $objattr['value'] = ucfirst(strtolower($type));
15900       }
15901       $texto = " " . $objattr['value'] . " ";
15902       $width = $this->GetStringWidth($texto) + ($this->form_element_spacing['button']['outer']['h']*2)+($this->form_element_spacing['button']['inner']['h']*2);
15903       $height = $this->FontSize + ($this->form_element_spacing['button']['outer']['v']*2)+($this->form_element_spacing['button']['inner']['v']*2);
15904       break;
15905 
15906 
15907      case 'PASSWORD':
15908      case 'TEXT': 
15909      default:
15910                 if ($type == '') { $type = 'TEXT'; }
15911         if(strtoupper($attr['TYPE'])=='PASSWORD') { $type = 'PASSWORD'; }
15912                if (isset($attr['VALUE'])) {
15913       if ($type == 'PASSWORD') {
15914                     $num_stars = strlen($attr['VALUE']);
15915                     $texto = str_repeat('*',$num_stars);
15916       }
15917       else { $texto = $attr['VALUE']; }
15918                 }
15919 
15920         $xw = ($this->form_element_spacing['input']['outer']['h']*2)+($this->form_element_spacing['input']['inner']['h']*2);
15921         $xh = ($this->form_element_spacing['input']['outer']['v']*2)+($this->form_element_spacing['input']['inner']['v']*2);
15922         if ($w) { $width = $w + $xw; } 
15923         else { $width = (20 * $spacesize) + $xw; }  // Default width in chars
15924                 if (isset($attr['SIZE']) and ctype_digit($attr['SIZE']) ) $width = ($attr['SIZE'] * $spacesize) + $xw;
15925         $height = $this->FontSize + $xh;
15926                 break;
15927   }
15928 
15929   $objattr['subtype'] = $type;
15930   $objattr['text'] = $texto;
15931   $objattr['width'] = $width;
15932   $objattr['height'] = $height;
15933   $e = "\xbb\xa4\xactype=input,objattr=".serialize($objattr)."\xbb\xa4\xac";
15934 
15935   // Clear properties - tidy up
15936   $properties = array();
15937 
15938 /*-- TABLES --*/
15939   // Output it to buffers
15940   if ($this->tableLevel) {
15941     $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['textbuffer'][] = array($e,$this->HREF,$this->currentfontstyle,$this->colorarray,$this->currentfontfamily,$this->SUP,$this->SUB,'',$this->strike,$this->outlineparam,$this->spanbgcolorarray,$this->currentfontsize,$this->ReqFontStyle);
15942 
15943     $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s'] += $objattr['width'] ;
15944 
15945   }
15946   else {
15947 /*-- END TABLES --*/
15948     $this->textbuffer[] = array($e,$this->HREF,$this->currentfontstyle,$this->colorarray,$this->currentfontfamily,$this->SUP,$this->SUB,'',$this->strike,$this->outlineparam,$this->spanbgcolorarray,$this->currentfontsize,$this->ReqFontStyle);
15949   } // *TABLES*
15950 
15951   if ($this->InlineProperties[$tag]) { $this->restoreInlineProperties($this->InlineProperties[$tag]); }
15952   unset($this->InlineProperties[$tag]);
15953 
15954   break;  // END of INPUT
15955 /*-- END FORMS --*/
15956 
15957 
15958   // *********** GRAPH  ********************
15959      case 'JPGRAPH':
15960   if (!$this->useGraphs) { break; }
15961   if ($attr['TABLE']) { $gid = strtoupper($attr['TABLE']); }
15962   else { $gid = '0'; }
15963   if (!is_array($this->graphs[$gid]) || count($this->graphs[$gid])==0 ) { break; }
15964   include_once(_MPDF_PATH.'graph.php');
15965   $this->graphs[$gid]['attr'] = $attr;
15966 
15967   // mPDF 4.0
15968   if (isset($this->graphs[$gid]['attr']['WIDTH']) && $this->graphs[$gid]['attr']['WIDTH']) { 
15969     $this->graphs[$gid]['attr']['cWIDTH']=$this->ConvertSize($this->graphs[$gid]['attr']['WIDTH'],$pgwidth); 
15970   } // mm
15971   if (isset($this->graphs[$gid]['attr']['HEIGHT']) && $this->graphs[$gid]['attr']['HEIGHT']) { 
15972     $this->graphs[$gid]['attr']['cHEIGHT']=$this->ConvertSize($this->graphs[$gid]['attr']['HEIGHT'],$pgwidth); 
15973   }
15974 
15975   $graph_img = print_graph($this->graphs[$gid],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width']);
15976   if ($graph_img) { 
15977     // mPDF 4.3.016
15978     if(isset($attr['ROTATE'])) {
15979        if ($attr['ROTATE']==90 || $attr['ROTATE']==-90) {
15980       $tmpw = $graph_img['w'];
15981       $graph_img['w']= $graph_img['h'];
15982       $graph_img['h']= $tmpw;
15983        }
15984     }
15985     $attr['SRC'] = $graph_img['file']; 
15986     $attr['WIDTH'] = $graph_img['w']; 
15987     $attr['HEIGHT'] = $graph_img['h']; 
15988   }
15989   else { break; }
15990 
15991   // *********** IMAGE  ********************
15992 /*-- IMAGES-CORE --*/
15993     case 'IMG':
15994   if ($this->progressBar) { $this->UpdateProgressBar(1,'','IMG'); } // *PROGRESS-BAR*
15995   $objattr = array();
15996     $objattr['margin_top'] = 0;
15997     $objattr['margin_bottom'] = 0;
15998     $objattr['margin_left'] = 0;
15999     $objattr['margin_right'] = 0;
16000     // mPDF 4.0
16001     $objattr['padding_top'] = 0;
16002     $objattr['padding_bottom'] = 0;
16003     $objattr['padding_left'] = 0;
16004     $objattr['padding_right'] = 0;
16005     $objattr['width'] = 0;
16006     $objattr['height'] = 0;
16007     $objattr['border_top']['w'] = 0;
16008     $objattr['border_bottom']['w'] = 0;
16009     $objattr['border_left']['w'] = 0;
16010     $objattr['border_right']['w'] = 0;
16011   if(isset($attr['SRC'])) {
16012         $srcpath = $attr['SRC'];
16013     $orig_srcpath = $attr['ORIG_SRC']; // mPDF 4.2.029
16014     $properties = $this->MergeCSS('',$tag,$attr);
16015     if(isset($properties ['DISPLAY']) && strtolower($properties ['DISPLAY'])=='none') { 
16016       return; 
16017     }
16018     // VSPACE and HSPACE converted to margins in MergeCSS
16019     if (isset($properties['MARGIN-TOP'])) { $objattr['margin_top']=$this->ConvertSize($properties['MARGIN-TOP'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false); }
16020     if (isset($properties['MARGIN-BOTTOM'])) { $objattr['margin_bottom'] = $this->ConvertSize($properties['MARGIN-BOTTOM'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false); }
16021     if (isset($properties['MARGIN-LEFT'])) { $objattr['margin_left'] = $this->ConvertSize($properties['MARGIN-LEFT'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false); }
16022     if (isset($properties['MARGIN-RIGHT'])) { $objattr['margin_right'] = $this->ConvertSize($properties['MARGIN-RIGHT'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false); }
16023 
16024     // mPDF 4.0
16025     if (isset($properties['PADDING-TOP'])) { $objattr['padding_top']=$this->ConvertSize($properties['PADDING-TOP'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false); }
16026     if (isset($properties['PADDING-BOTTOM'])) { $objattr['padding_bottom'] = $this->ConvertSize($properties['PADDING-BOTTOM'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false); }
16027     if (isset($properties['PADDING-LEFT'])) { $objattr['padding_left'] = $this->ConvertSize($properties['PADDING-LEFT'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false); }
16028     if (isset($properties['PADDING-RIGHT'])) { $objattr['padding_right'] = $this->ConvertSize($properties['PADDING-RIGHT'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false); }
16029 
16030     if (isset($properties['BORDER-TOP'])) { $objattr['border_top'] = $this->border_details($properties['BORDER-TOP']); }
16031     if (isset($properties['BORDER-BOTTOM'])) { $objattr['border_bottom'] = $this->border_details($properties['BORDER-BOTTOM']); }
16032     if (isset($properties['BORDER-LEFT'])) { $objattr['border_left'] = $this->border_details($properties['BORDER-LEFT']); }
16033     if (isset($properties['BORDER-RIGHT'])) { $objattr['border_right'] = $this->border_details($properties['BORDER-RIGHT']); }
16034 
16035     if (isset($properties['VERTICAL-ALIGN'])) { $objattr['vertical-align'] = $align[strtolower($properties['VERTICAL-ALIGN'])]; }
16036     $w = 0;
16037     $h = 0;
16038     // mPDF 4.0
16039     if(isset($properties['WIDTH'])) $w = $this->ConvertSize($properties['WIDTH'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false);
