16040     if(isset($properties['HEIGHT'])) $h = $this->ConvertSize($properties['HEIGHT'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false);
16041 
16042     if(isset($attr['WIDTH'])) $w = $this->ConvertSize($attr['WIDTH'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false);
16043     if(isset($attr['HEIGHT'])) $h = $this->ConvertSize($attr['HEIGHT'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false);
16044     if (isset($properties['OPACITY']) && $properties['OPACITY'] > 0 && $properties['OPACITY'] <= 1) { $objattr['opacity'] = $properties['OPACITY']; }
16045     if ($this->HREF) { $objattr['link'] = $this->HREF; }  // ? this isn't used
16046 
16047     // mPDF 4.0
16048     $extraheight = $objattr['padding_top'] + $objattr['padding_bottom'] + $objattr['margin_top'] + $objattr['margin_bottom'] + $objattr['border_top']['w'] + $objattr['border_bottom']['w'];
16049     $extrawidth = $objattr['padding_left'] + $objattr['padding_right'] + $objattr['margin_left'] + $objattr['margin_right'] + $objattr['border_left']['w'] + $objattr['border_right']['w'];
16050     // Image file
16051     $info=$this->_getImage($srcpath, true, true, $orig_srcpath); // mPDF 4.2.029
16052     if(!$info) {
16053       $info = $this->_getImage($this->noImageFile);
16054       if ($info) { 
16055         $srcpath = $this->noImageFile; 
16056         $w = ($info['w'] * 0.2645);   // 14 x 16px
16057         $h = ($info['h'] * 0.2645);   // 14 x 16px
16058       }
16059     }
16060     if(!$info) break;
16061 
16062     // mPDF 4.3.016
16063     if(isset($attr['ROTATE'])) {
16064        if ($attr['ROTATE']==90 || $attr['ROTATE']==-90) {
16065       $tmpw = $info['w'];
16066       $info['w'] = $info['h'];
16067       $info['h'] = $tmpw;
16068        }
16069        $objattr['ROTATE'] = $attr['ROTATE'];
16070     }
16071 
16072     $objattr['file'] = $srcpath;
16073     //Default width and height calculation if needed
16074     if($w==0 and $h==0) {
16075 /*-- IMAGES-WMF --*/
16076               if ($info['type']=='wmf') { 
16077         // WMF units are twips (1/20pt)
16078         // divide by 20 to get points
16079         // divide by k to get user units
16080         $w = abs($info['w'])/(20*$this->k);
16081         $h = abs($info['h']) / (20*$this->k);
16082       }
16083       else 
16084 /*-- END IMAGES-WMF --*/
16085       // mPDF 4.3.013
16086               if ($info['type']=='svg') { 
16087         // SVG units are pixels
16088         $w = abs($info['w'])/$this->k;
16089         $h = abs($info['h'])/$this->k;
16090       }
16091       else {
16092         //Put image at default dpi
16093         $w=($info['w']/$this->k) * (72/$this->img_dpi);
16094         $h=($info['h']/$this->k) * (72/$this->img_dpi);
16095       }
16096     }
16097     // IF WIDTH OR HEIGHT SPECIFIED
16098     if($w==0)  $w=abs($h*$info['w']/$info['h']); 
16099     if($h==0) $h=abs($w*$info['h']/$info['w']);
16100 
16101     // Resize to maximum dimensions of page
16102     $maxWidth = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'];
16103       $maxHeight = $this->h - ($this->tMargin + $this->bMargin + 10) ;  // mPDF 4.1
16104     if ($this->fullImageHeight) { $maxHeight = $this->fullImageHeight; }  // mPDF 4.1
16105     if ($w + $extrawidth > $maxWidth ) {
16106       $w = $maxWidth - $extrawidth;
16107       $h=abs($w*$info['h']/$info['w']);
16108     }
16109 
16110     if ($h + $extraheight > $maxHeight ) {
16111       $h = $maxHeight - $extraheight;
16112       $w=abs($h*$info['w']/$info['h']);
16113     }
16114     $objattr['type'] = 'image';
16115     $objattr['itype'] = $info['type'];
16116     $objattr['orig_h'] = $info['h'];
16117     $objattr['orig_w'] = $info['w'];
16118 /*-- IMAGES-WMF --*/
16119     if ($info['type']=='wmf') {
16120       $objattr['wmf_x'] = $info['x'];
16121       $objattr['wmf_y'] = $info['y'];
16122     }
16123     else 
16124 /*-- END IMAGES-WMF --*/
16125     // mPDF 4.3.013
16126     if ($info['type']=='svg') {
16127       $objattr['wmf_x'] = $info['x'];
16128       $objattr['wmf_y'] = $info['y'];
16129     }
16130     $objattr['height'] = $h + $extraheight;
16131     $objattr['width'] = $w + $extrawidth;
16132     $objattr['image_height'] = $h;
16133     $objattr['image_width'] = $w;
16134 /*-- CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT --*/
16135     if (!$this->ColActive && !$this->tableLevel && !$this->listlvl && !$this->kwt && !$this->keep_block_together) {
16136       if (isset($properties['FLOAT']) && (strtoupper($properties['FLOAT']) == 'RIGHT' || strtoupper($properties['FLOAT']) == 'LEFT')) {
16137       $objattr['float'] = substr(strtoupper($properties['FLOAT']),0,1);
16138       }
16139     }
16140 /*-- END CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT --*/
16141 
16142     $e = "\xbb\xa4\xactype=image,objattr=".serialize($objattr)."\xbb\xa4\xac";
16143 
16144     // Clear properties - tidy up
16145     $properties = array();
16146 
16147 /*-- TABLES --*/
16148     // Output it to buffers
16149     if ($this->tableLevel) {
16150       $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['textbuffer'][] = array($e,$this->HREF,$this->currentfontstyle,$this->colorarray,$this->currentfontfamily,$this->SUP,$this->SUB,'',$this->strike,$this->outlineparam,$this->spanbgcolorarray,$this->currentfontsize,$this->ReqFontStyle);
16151       $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s'] += $objattr['width'] ;
16152     }
16153     else {
16154 /*-- END TABLES --*/
16155       $this->textbuffer[] = array($e,$this->HREF,$this->currentfontstyle,$this->colorarray,$this->currentfontfamily,$this->SUP,$this->SUB,'',$this->strike,$this->outlineparam,$this->spanbgcolorarray,$this->currentfontsize,$this->ReqFontStyle);
16156 
16157     } // *TABLES*
16158 /*-- ANNOTATIONS --*/
16159     if ($this->title2annots && isset($attr['TITLE'])) {
16160       $objattr = array();
16161       // mPDF 3.0
16162       $objattr['margin_top'] = 0;
16163       $objattr['margin_bottom'] = 0;
16164       $objattr['margin_left'] = 0;
16165       $objattr['margin_right'] = 0;
16166       $objattr['width'] = 0;
16167       $objattr['height'] = 0;
16168       $objattr['border_top']['w'] = 0;
16169       $objattr['border_bottom']['w'] = 0;
16170       $objattr['border_left']['w'] = 0;
16171       $objattr['border_right']['w'] = 0;
16172       $objattr['CONTENT'] = $attr['TITLE'];
16173       $objattr['type'] = 'annot';
16174       $objattr['POS-X'] = 0;
16175       $objattr['POS-Y'] = 0;
16176       $objattr['ICON'] = 'Comment';
16177       $objattr['AUTHOR'] = '';
16178       $objattr['SUBJECT'] = '';
16179       $objattr['OPACITY'] = $this->annotOpacity; 
16180       $objattr['COLOR'] = array(255,255,0); 
16181       $e = "\xbb\xa4\xactype=annot,objattr=".serialize($objattr)."\xbb\xa4\xac";
16182       if($this->tableLevel) { // *TABLES*
16183         $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['textbuffer'][] = array($e);  // *TABLES*
16184       } // *TABLES*
16185       else  { // *TABLES*
16186         $this->textbuffer[] = array($e);
16187       } // *TABLES*
16188     }
16189 /*-- END ANNOTATIONS --*/
16190   }
16191   break;
16192 /*-- END IMAGES-CORE --*/
16193 
16194 
16195 /*-- TABLES --*/
16196 
16197     case 'TABLE': // TABLE-BEGIN
16198   $this->tdbegin = false;
16199   $this->lastoptionaltag = '';
16200   // Disable vertical justification in columns
16201   if ($this->ColActive) { $this->colvAlign = ''; }  // *COLUMNS*
16202   if ($this->lastblocklevelchange == 1) { $blockstate = 1; }  // Top margins/padding only
16203   else if ($this->lastblocklevelchange < 1) { $blockstate = 0; }  // NO margins/padding
16204   // called from block after new div e.g. <div> ... <table> ...    Outputs block top margin/border and padding
16205   if (count($this->textbuffer) == 0 && $this->lastblocklevelchange == 1 && !$this->tableLevel && !$this->kwt) {
16206     $this->newFlowingBlock( $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['width'],$this->lineheight,'',false,false,1,true);  // true = newblock
16207     $this->finishFlowingBlock(true);  // true = END of flowing block
16208   }
16209   else if (!$this->tableLevel && count($this->textbuffer)) { $this->printbuffer($this->textbuffer,$blockstate); }
16210   //else if (!$this->tableLevel) { $this->printbuffer($this->textbuffer,$blockstate); }
16211 
16212   $this->textbuffer=array();
16213   $this->lastblocklevelchange = -1;
16214   if ($this->tableLevel) {  // i.e. now a nested table coming...
16215     // Save current level table
16216     $this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['baseProperties']= $this->base_table_properties;
16217   //  $this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['tablecascadeCSS'] = $this->tablecascadeCSS;
16218     $this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['cells'] = $this->cell;
16219     $this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['currrow'] = $this->row;
16220     $this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['currcol'] = $this->col;
16221   }
16222   $this->tableLevel++;
16223   $this->tbCSSlvl++;
16224 
16225   // mPDF 3.0
16226   if (isset($this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel])) { $this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]++; }
16227   else { $this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel] = 1; }
16228 
16229   $this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['level'] = $this->tableLevel;
16230   $this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['levelid'] = $this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel];
16231 
16232   if ($this->tableLevel > $this->innermostTableLevel) { $this->innermostTableLevel = $this->tableLevel; }
16233   if ($this->tableLevel > 1) { 
16234     $this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['nestedpos'] = array($this->row,$this->col,$this->tbctr[($this->tableLevel-1)]); 
16235   }
16236   //++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
16237 
16238   $this->cell = array();
16239   $this->col=-1; //int
16240   $this->row=-1; //int
16241   $table = &$this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]];
16242  
16243   // mPDF 3.0
16244   $table['bgcolor'] = false;
16245   $table['va'] = false;
16246   $table['txta'] = false;
16247   $table['topntail'] = false;
16248   $table['thead-underline'] = false;
16249   $table['border'] = false;
16250   $table['border_details']['R']['w'] = 0;
16251   $table['border_details']['L']['w'] = 0;
16252   $table['border_details']['T']['w'] = 0;
16253   $table['border_details']['B']['w'] = 0;
16254   $table['border_details']['R']['style'] = '';
16255   $table['border_details']['L']['style'] = '';
16256   $table['border_details']['T']['style'] = '';
16257   $table['border_details']['B']['style'] = '';
16258   $table['max_cell_border_width']['R'] = 0;
16259   $table['max_cell_border_width']['L'] = 0;
16260   $table['max_cell_border_width']['T'] = 0;
16261   $table['max_cell_border_width']['B'] = 0;
16262   $table['padding']['L'] = false;
16263   $table['padding']['R'] = false;
16264   $table['padding']['T'] = false;
16265   $table['padding']['B'] = false;
16266   $table['margin']['L'] = false;
16267   $table['margin']['R'] = false;
16268   $table['margin']['T'] = false;
16269   $table['margin']['B'] = false;
16270   $table['a'] = false;
16271   $table['border_spacing_H'] = false;
16272   $table['border_spacing_V'] = false;
16273 
16274   $this->Reset();
16275   $this->InlineProperties = array();
16276   $this->spanlvl = 0;
16277   $table['nc'] = $table['nr'] = 0;
16278   $this->tablethead = 0;
16279   $this->tabletfoot = 0;
16280   $this->tabletheadjustfinished = false;
16281 
16282   // mPDF 4.2
16283   if ($this->blockjustfinished && !count($this->textbuffer) && $this->y != $this->tMargin && $this->collapseBlockMargins && $this->tableLevel==1) { $lastbottommargin = $this->lastblockbottommargin; }
16284   else { $lastbottommargin = 0; }
16285   $this->lastblockbottommargin = 0;
16286   $this->blockjustfinished=false;
16287 
16288   if ($this->tableLevel==1) { $this->table_lineheight = $this->normalLineheight; }  // mPDF 4.2 
16289   // mPDF 3.0
16290   if ($this->tableLevel==1) { $this->tableheadernrows = 0; $this->tablefooternrows = 0; $this->usetableheader = false; }  // mPDF 4.0
16291 
16292   if ($this->tableLevel ==1) $this->base_table_properties = array();
16293 
16294     // ADDED CSS FUNCIONS FOR TABLE 
16295     if ($this->tbCSSlvl==1) {
16296       $properties = $this->MergeCSS('TOPTABLE',$tag,$attr);
16297     }
16298     else {
16299       $properties = $this->MergeCSS('TABLE',$tag,$attr);
16300     }
16301     $w = '';
16302     if (isset($properties['WIDTH'])) { $w = $properties['WIDTH']; }
16303 
16304     if (isset($properties['BACKGROUND-COLOR'])) { $table['bgcolor'][-1] = $properties['BACKGROUND-COLOR'];  }
16305     else if (isset($properties['BACKGROUND'])) { $table['bgcolor'][-1] = $properties['BACKGROUND']; }
16306     if (isset($properties['VERTICAL-ALIGN'])) { $table['va'] = $align[strtolower($properties['VERTICAL-ALIGN'])]; }
16307     if (isset($properties['TEXT-ALIGN'])) { $table['txta'] = $align[strtolower($properties['TEXT-ALIGN'])]; }
16308     if (isset($properties['AUTOSIZE']) && $properties['AUTOSIZE'] && $this->tableLevel ==1) { 
16309       $this->shrink_this_table_to_fit = $properties['AUTOSIZE']; 
16310       if ($this->shrink_this_table_to_fit < 1) { $this->shrink_this_table_to_fit = 0; }
16311     }
16312     if (isset($properties['ROTATE']) && $properties['ROTATE'] && $this->tableLevel ==1) { 
16313       $this->table_rotate = $properties['ROTATE']; 
16314     }
16315     if (isset($properties['TOPNTAIL'])) { $table['topntail'] = $properties['TOPNTAIL']; }
16316     if (isset($properties['THEAD-UNDERLINE'])) { $table['thead-underline'] = $properties['THEAD-UNDERLINE']; }
16317 
16318     if (isset($properties['BORDER'])) { 
16319       $bord = $this->border_details($properties['BORDER']);
16320       if ($bord['s']) {
16321         $table['border'] = _BORDER_ALL;
16322         $table['border_details']['R'] = $bord;
16323         $table['border_details']['L'] = $bord;
16324         $table['border_details']['T'] = $bord;
16325         $table['border_details']['B'] = $bord;
16326       }
16327     }
16328     if (isset($properties['BORDER-RIGHT'])) { 
16329       if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') {   // *RTL*
16330       $table['border_details']['R'] = $this->border_details($properties['BORDER-LEFT']);  // *RTL*
16331       } // *RTL*
16332       else {  // *RTL*
16333       $table['border_details']['R'] = $this->border_details($properties['BORDER-RIGHT']);
16334       } // *RTL*
16335       $this->setBorder($table['border'], _BORDER_RIGHT, $table['border_details']['R']['s']); 
16336     }
16337     if (isset($properties['BORDER-LEFT'])) { 
16338       if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') {   // *RTL*
16339       $table['border_details']['L'] = $this->border_details($properties['BORDER-RIGHT']); // *RTL*
16340       } // *RTL*
16341       else {  // *RTL*
16342       $table['border_details']['L'] = $this->border_details($properties['BORDER-LEFT']);
16343       } // *RTL*
16344       $this->setBorder($table['border'], _BORDER_LEFT, $table['border_details']['L']['s']); 
16345     }
16346     if (isset($properties['BORDER-BOTTOM'])) { 
16347       $table['border_details']['B'] = $this->border_details($properties['BORDER-BOTTOM']);
16348       $this->setBorder($table['border'], _BORDER_BOTTOM, $table['border_details']['B']['s']); 
16349     }
16350     if (isset($properties['BORDER-TOP'])) { 
16351       $table['border_details']['T'] = $this->border_details($properties['BORDER-TOP']);
16352       $this->setBorder($table['border'], _BORDER_TOP, $table['border_details']['T']['s']); 
16353     }
16354     if ($table['border']){  // mPDF 4.3.007
16355         $this->table_border_css_set = 1;
16356     }
16357     else {
16358       $this->table_border_css_set = 0;
16359     }
16360 
16361     if (isset($properties['FONT-FAMILY'])) { 
16362        if (!$this->isCJK) { 
16363       $this->default_font = $properties['FONT-FAMILY'];
16364       $this->SetFont($this->default_font,'',0,false);
16365       $this->base_table_properties['FONT-FAMILY'] = $properties['FONT-FAMILY'];
16366        }
16367     }
16368     if (isset($properties['FONT-SIZE'])) { 
16369        $mmsize = $this->ConvertSize($properties['FONT-SIZE'],$this->default_font_size/$this->k);
16370        if ($mmsize) {
16371       $this->default_font_size = $mmsize*($this->k);
16372         $this->SetFontSize($this->default_font_size,false);
16373       $this->base_table_properties['FONT-SIZE'] = $properties['FONT-SIZE'];
16374        }
16375     }
16376 
16377     if (isset($properties['FONT-WEIGHT'])) {
16378       if (strtoupper($properties['FONT-WEIGHT']) == 'BOLD') { $this->base_table_properties['FONT-WEIGHT'] = 'BOLD'; }
16379     }
16380     if (isset($properties['FONT-STYLE'])) {
16381       if (strtoupper($properties['FONT-STYLE']) == 'ITALIC') { $this->base_table_properties['FONT-STYLE'] = 'ITALIC'; }
16382     }
16383     if (isset($properties['COLOR'])) {
16384       $this->base_table_properties['COLOR'] = $properties['COLOR'];
16385     }
16386 
16387 
16388     if (isset($properties['PADDING-LEFT'])) { 
16389       $table['padding']['L'] = $this->ConvertSize($properties['PADDING-LEFT'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false);
16390     }
16391     if (isset($properties['PADDING-RIGHT'])) { 
16392       $table['padding']['R'] = $this->ConvertSize($properties['PADDING-RIGHT'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false);
16393     }
16394     if (isset($properties['PADDING-TOP'])) { 
16395       $table['padding']['T'] = $this->ConvertSize($properties['PADDING-TOP'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false);
16396     }
16397     if (isset($properties['PADDING-BOTTOM'])) { 
16398       $table['padding']['B'] = $this->ConvertSize($properties['PADDING-BOTTOM'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false);
16399     }
16400 
16401     if (isset($properties['MARGIN-TOP'])) { 
16402       // mPDF 4.2 Collaspe vertical block margins
16403       if ($lastbottommargin) { 
16404         $tmp = $this->ConvertSize($properties['MARGIN-TOP'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false);
16405         if ($tmp > $lastbottommargin) { $properties['MARGIN-TOP'] -= $lastbottommargin; }
16406         else { $properties['MARGIN-TOP'] = 0; }
16407       }
16408       $table['margin']['T'] = $this->ConvertSize($properties['MARGIN-TOP'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false); 
16409     }
16410 
16411     if (isset($properties['MARGIN-BOTTOM'])) { 
16412       $table['margin']['B'] = $this->ConvertSize($properties['MARGIN-BOTTOM'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false); 
16413     }
16414     if (isset($properties['MARGIN-LEFT'])) { // mPDF 4.2 Error corrected
16415       $table['margin']['L'] = $this->ConvertSize($properties['MARGIN-LEFT'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false); 
16416     }
16417 
16418     if (isset($properties['MARGIN-RIGHT'])) { // mPDF 4.2 Error corrected
16419       $table['margin']['R'] = $this->ConvertSize($properties['MARGIN-RIGHT'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false); 
16420     }
16421     if (isset($properties['MARGIN-LEFT']) && isset($properties['MARGIN-RIGHT']) && strtolower($properties['MARGIN-LEFT'])=='auto' && strtolower($properties['MARGIN-RIGHT'])=='auto') { 
16422       $table['a'] = 'C'; 
16423     }
16424     else if (isset($properties['MARGIN-LEFT']) && strtolower($properties['MARGIN-LEFT'])=='auto') { 
16425       $table['a'] = 'R'; 
16426     }
16427     else if (isset($properties['MARGIN-RIGHT']) && strtolower($properties['MARGIN-RIGHT'])=='auto') { 
16428       $table['a'] = 'L'; 
16429     }
16430 
16431     // mPDF 4.2
16432     if (isset($properties['LINE-HEIGHT']) && $this->tableLevel==1) { 
16433       $this->table_lineheight = $this->fixLineheight($properties['LINE-HEIGHT']);
16434       if (!$this->table_lineheight) { $this->table_lineheight = $this->normalLineheight; }
16435     }
16436 
16437     if (isset($properties['BORDER-COLLAPSE']) && strtoupper($properties['BORDER-COLLAPSE'])=='SEPARATE') { 
16438       $table['borders_separate'] = true; 
16439     }
16440     else { 
16441       $table['borders_separate'] = false; 
16442     }
16443 
16444     if (isset($properties['BORDER-SPACING-H'])) { 
16445       $table['border_spacing_H'] = $this->ConvertSize($properties['BORDER-SPACING-H'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false); 
16446     }
16447     if (isset($properties['BORDER-SPACING-V'])) { 
16448       $table['border_spacing_V'] = $this->ConvertSize($properties['BORDER-SPACING-V'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false); 
16449     }
16450 
16451     if (isset($properties['EMPTY-CELLS'])) { 
16452       $table['empty_cells'] = strtolower($properties['EMPTY-CELLS']);   // 'hide'  or 'show'
16453     }
16454     else { $table['empty_cells'] = ''; } 
16455 
16456     if (isset($properties['PAGE-BREAK-INSIDE']) && strtoupper($properties['PAGE-BREAK-INSIDE'])=='AVOID' && $this->tableLevel==1) { 
16457       $this->table_keep_together = true; 
16458     }
16459     else if ($this->tableLevel==1) { 
16460       $this->table_keep_together = false; 
16461     }
16462 
16463   // mPDF 4.2
16464   if (isset($properties['OVERFLOW'])) { 
16465     $table['overflow'] = strtolower($properties['OVERFLOW']);   // 'hidden' 'wrap' or 'visible' or 'auto'
16466   }
16467 
16468   $properties = array();
16469 
16470   if (!$table['borders_separate']) { $table['border_spacing_H'] = $table['border_spacing_V'] = 0; } 
16471   else if (isset($attr['CELLSPACING'])) { 
16472     $table['border_spacing_H'] = $table['border_spacing_V'] = $this->ConvertSize($attr['CELLSPACING'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width']); 
16473   }
16474 
16475 
16476   if (isset($attr['CELLPADDING'])) {
16477     $table['cell_padding'] = $attr['CELLPADDING'];
16478   }
16479   else {
16480     $table['cell_padding'] = false;
16481   }
16482 
16483   if (isset($attr['BORDER'])) {
16484       $this->table_border_attr_set = 1;
16485     if ($attr['BORDER']=='1') {
16486        $bord = $this->border_details('#000000 1px solid');
16487        if ($bord['s']) {
16488       $table['border'] = _BORDER_ALL;
16489       $table['border_details']['R'] = $bord;
16490       $table['border_details']['L'] = $bord;
16491       $table['border_details']['T'] = $bord;
16492       $table['border_details']['B'] = $bord;
16493        }
16494     }
16495   }
16496   else {
16497     $this->table_border_attr_set = 0;
16498   }
16499   if (isset($attr['REPEAT_HEADER']) and $attr['REPEAT_HEADER'] == true) { $this->UseTableHeader(true); } 
16500 
16501 
16502   if (isset($attr['ALIGN'])) { $table['a']  = $align[strtolower($attr['ALIGN'])]; }
16503   if (!$table['a']) { $table['a'] = $this->defaultTableAlign; } // mPDF 4.0
16504   if (isset($attr['BGCOLOR'])) { $table['bgcolor'][-1]  = $attr['BGCOLOR']; }
16505   // mPDF 4.0 This does not work
16506   // if (isset($attr['HEIGHT'])) { $table['h']  = $this->ConvertSize($attr['HEIGHT'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width']); }
16507 
16508   if (isset($attr['WIDTH']) && $attr['WIDTH']) { $w = $attr['WIDTH']; }
16509   if ($w) { // set here or earlier in $properties
16510     $maxwidth = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'];
16511     if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
16512       $tblblw = $table['margin']['L'] + $table['margin']['R'] + $table['border_details']['L']['w']/2 + $table['border_details']['R']['w']/2;
16513     }
16514     else { 
16515       $tblblw = $table['margin']['L'] + $table['margin']['R'] + $table['max_cell_border_width']['L']/2 + $table['max_cell_border_width']['R']/2;
16516     }
16517     if (strpos($w,'%') && $this->tableLevel == 1 && !$this->ignore_table_percents ) { 
16518       // % needs to be of inner box without table margins etc.
16519       $maxwidth -= $tblblw ;
16520       $wmm = $this->ConvertSize($w,$maxwidth,$this->FontSize,false);
16521       $table['w'] = $wmm + $tblblw ;
16522     }
16523     if (strpos($w,'%') && $this->tableLevel > 1 && !$this->ignore_table_percents && $this->keep_table_proportions) { 
16524       $table['wpercent'] = $w + 0;  // makes 80% -> 80
16525     }
16526     if (!strpos($w,'%') && !$this->ignore_table_widths ) {
16527       $wmm = $this->ConvertSize($w,$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false);
16528       $table['w'] = $wmm + $tblblw ;
16529     }
16530     if (!$this->keep_table_proportions) {
16531       if (isset($table['w']) && $table['w'] > $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width']) { $table['w'] = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width']; }
16532     }
16533   }
16534 
16535 
16536   if (isset($attr['AUTOSIZE']) && $this->tableLevel==1) { 
16537     $this->shrink_this_table_to_fit = $attr['AUTOSIZE']; 
16538     if ($this->shrink_this_table_to_fit < 1) { $this->shrink_this_table_to_fit = 1; }
16539   }
16540   if (isset($attr['ROTATE']) && $this->tableLevel==1) { 
16541     $this->table_rotate = $attr['ROTATE']; 
16542   }
16543 
16544   //++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
16545   // keeping block together on one page
16546   // Autosize is now forced therefore keep block together disabled
16547   if ($this->keep_block_together) {
16548     $this->keep_block_together = 0;
16549     $this->printdivbuffer();
16550     $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['keep_block_together'] = 0;
16551   }
16552   if ($this->table_rotate) {
16553     $this->tbrot_Links = array();
16554     $this->tbrot_Annots = array();
16555     // mPDF 3.0
16556     $this->tbrot_Reference = array();
16557     $this->tbrot_BMoutlines = array();
16558     $this->tbrot_toc = array();
16559   }
16560 
16561   if ($this->kwt) {
16562     if ($this->table_rotate) { $this->table_keep_together = true; }
16563     $this->kwt = false;
16564     $this->kwt_saved = true;
16565   }
16566 
16567   if ($this->tableLevel==1 && $this->useGraphs) { 
16568     if (isset($attr['ID']) && $attr['ID']) { $this->currentGraphId = strtoupper($attr['ID']); }
16569     else { $this->currentGraphId = '0'; }
16570     $this->graphs[$this->currentGraphId] = array();
16571   }
16572 
16573   //++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
16574   $this->plainCell_properties = array();
16575 
16576 
16577   break;
16578 
16579 
16580 
16581     case 'THEAD':
16582   $this->lastoptionaltag = $tag; // Save current HTML specified optional endtag
16583   $this->tbCSSlvl++;
16584   $this->tablethead = 1;
16585   $this->UseTableHeader(true);
16586   $properties = $this->MergeCSS('TABLE',$tag,$attr);
16587   if (isset($properties['FONT-WEIGHT'])) {
16588     if (strtoupper($properties['FONT-WEIGHT']) == 'BOLD') { $this->thead_font_weight = 'B'; }
16589     else { $this->thead_font_weight = ''; }
16590   }
16591 
16592   if (isset($properties['FONT-STYLE'])) {
16593     if (strtoupper($properties['FONT-STYLE']) == 'ITALIC') { $this->thead_font_style = 'I'; }
16594     else { $this->thead_font_style = ''; }
16595   }
16596 
16597   if (isset($properties['VERTICAL-ALIGN'])) {
16598     $this->thead_valign_default = $properties['VERTICAL-ALIGN'];
16599   }
16600   if (isset($properties['TEXT-ALIGN'])) {
16601     $this->thead_textalign_default = $properties['TEXT-ALIGN'];
16602   }
16603   $properties = array();
16604   break;
16605 
16606 
16607     case 'TFOOT':
16608   $this->lastoptionaltag = $tag; // Save current HTML specified optional endtag
16609   $this->tbCSSlvl++;
16610   // mPDF 4.0
16611   $this->tabletfoot = 1; 
16612   // mPDF 3.0
16613   $this->tablethead = 0;
16614   $properties = $this->MergeCSS('TABLE',$tag,$attr);
16615   if (isset($properties['FONT-WEIGHT'])) {
16616     if (strtoupper($properties['FONT-WEIGHT']) == 'BOLD') { $this->tfoot_font_weight = 'B'; }
16617     else { $this->tfoot_font_weight = ''; }
16618   }
16619 
16620   if (isset($properties['FONT-STYLE'])) {
16621     if (strtoupper($properties['FONT-STYLE']) == 'ITALIC') { $this->tfoot_font_style = 'I'; }
16622     else { $this->tfoot_font_style = ''; }
16623   }
16624 
16625   if (isset($properties['VERTICAL-ALIGN'])) {
16626     $this->tfoot_valign_default = $properties['VERTICAL-ALIGN'];
16627   }
16628   if (isset($properties['TEXT-ALIGN'])) {
16629     $this->tfoot_textalign_default = $properties['TEXT-ALIGN'];
16630   }
16631   $properties = array();
16632   break;
16633 
16634 
16635     case 'TBODY':
16636   // mPDF 3.0
16637   $this->tablethead = 0;
16638   $this->tabletfoot = 0;  // mPDF 4.0
16639   $this->lastoptionaltag = $tag; // Save current HTML specified optional endtag
16640   $this->tbCSSlvl++;
16641   $this->MergeCSS('TABLE',$tag,$attr);
16642   break;
16643 
16644 
16645     case 'TR':
16646   $this->lastoptionaltag = $tag; // Save current HTML specified optional endtag
16647   $this->tbCSSlvl++;
16648   $this->row++;
16649   $this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['nr']++;
16650   $this->col = -1;
16651   $properties = $this->MergeCSS('TABLE',$tag,$attr);
16652   if (isset($properties['BACKGROUND-COLOR'])) { $this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['bgcolor'][$this->row] = $properties['BACKGROUND-COLOR']; }
16653   else if (isset($properties['BACKGROUND'])) { $this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['bgcolor'][$this->row] = $properties['BACKGROUND']; }
16654   if (isset($properties['TEXT-ROTATE'])) {
16655     $this->trow_text_rotate = $properties['TEXT-ROTATE'];
16656   }
16657   if (isset($attr['TEXT-ROTATE'])) $this->trow_text_rotate = $attr['TEXT-ROTATE'];
16658 
16659   if (isset($attr['BGCOLOR'])) $this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['bgcolor'][$this->row]  = $attr['BGCOLOR'];
16660   if ($this->tablethead) { $this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['is_thead'][$this->row] = true; }
16661   // mPDF 4.0
16662   if ($this->tabletfoot) { $this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['is_tfoot'][$this->row] = true; }
16663   $properties = array();
16664   break;
16665 
16666 
16667 
16668     case 'TH':
16669     case 'TD':
16670   $this->ignorefollowingspaces = true; 
16671   $this->lastoptionaltag = $tag; // Save current HTML specified optional endtag
16672   $this->tbCSSlvl++;
16673   $this->InlineProperties = array();
16674   $this->spanlvl = 0;
16675   $this->tdbegin = true;
16676   $this->col++;
16677   while (isset($this->cell[$this->row][$this->col])) { $this->col++; }
16678   //Update number column
16679   if ($this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['nc'] < $this->col+1) { $this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['nc'] = $this->col+1; }
16680   $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col] = array();
16681   $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['text'] = array();
16682   $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s'] = 0 ;
16683 
16684   $table = &$this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]];
16685   $cell = &$this->cell[$this->row][$this->col];
16686 
16687   $cell['a'] = false;
16688   $cell['R'] = false;
16689   $cell['nowrap'] = false;
16690   $cell['bgcolor'] = false; // mPDF 4.3.006
16691   $cell['padding']['L'] = false;
16692   $cell['padding']['R'] = false;
16693   $cell['padding']['T'] = false;
16694   $cell['padding']['B'] = false;
16695   if ($this->simpleTables && $this->row==0 && $this->col==0){ // mPDF 4.2.017
16696     $table['simple']['border'] = false;
16697     $table['simple']['border_details']['R']['w'] = 0;
16698     $table['simple']['border_details']['L']['w'] = 0;
16699     $table['simple']['border_details']['T']['w'] = 0;
16700     $table['simple']['border_details']['B']['w'] = 0;
16701     $table['simple']['border_details']['R']['style'] = '';
16702     $table['simple']['border_details']['L']['style'] = '';
16703     $table['simple']['border_details']['T']['style'] = '';
16704     $table['simple']['border_details']['B']['style'] = '';
16705   }
16706   else if (!$this->simpleTables) {
16707   $cell['border'] = false;
16708   $cell['border_details']['R']['w'] = 0;
16709   $cell['border_details']['L']['w'] = 0;
16710   $cell['border_details']['T']['w'] = 0;
16711   $cell['border_details']['B']['w'] = 0;
16712   $cell['border_details']['mbw']['BL'] = 0;
16713   $cell['border_details']['mbw']['BR'] = 0;
16714   $cell['border_details']['mbw']['RT'] = 0;
16715   $cell['border_details']['mbw']['RB'] = 0;
16716   $cell['border_details']['mbw']['TL'] = 0;
16717   $cell['border_details']['mbw']['TR'] = 0;
16718   $cell['border_details']['mbw']['LT'] = 0;
16719   $cell['border_details']['mbw']['LB'] = 0;
16720   $cell['border_details']['R']['style'] = '';
16721   $cell['border_details']['L']['style'] = '';
16722   $cell['border_details']['T']['style'] = '';
16723   $cell['border_details']['B']['style'] = '';
16724   $cell['border_details']['R']['s'] = 0;
16725   $cell['border_details']['L']['s'] = 0;
16726   $cell['border_details']['T']['s'] = 0;
16727   $cell['border_details']['B']['s'] = 0;
16728   $cell['border_details']['R']['c'] = array('R'=>0, 'G'=>0, 'B'=>0);
16729   $cell['border_details']['L']['c'] = array('R'=>0, 'G'=>0, 'B'=>0);
16730   $cell['border_details']['T']['c'] = array('R'=>0, 'G'=>0, 'B'=>0);
16731   $cell['border_details']['B']['c'] = array('R'=>0, 'G'=>0, 'B'=>0);
16732   $cell['border_details']['R']['dom'] = 0;
16733   $cell['border_details']['L']['dom'] = 0;
16734   $cell['border_details']['T']['dom'] = 0;
16735   $cell['border_details']['B']['dom'] = 0;
16736   }
16737 
16738 
16739   // INHERITED TABLE PROPERTIES (or ROW for BGCOLOR)
16740   // If cell bgcolor not set specifically, set to TR row bgcolor (if set)
16741   // mPDF 4.3.006
16742   if ((!$cell['bgcolor']) && isset($table['bgcolor'][$this->row])) {
16743       $cell['bgcolor'] = $table['bgcolor'][$this->row];
16744   }
16745   else if (isset($table['bgcolor'][-1])) { 
16746       $cell['bgcolor'] = $table['bgcolor'][-1]; 
16747   }
16748 
16749   if ($table['va']) { $cell['va'] = $table['va']; }
16750   if ($table['txta']) { $cell['a'] = $table['txta']; }
16751   if ($this->table_border_attr_set) {
16752     if ($table['border_details']) {
16753       if (!$this->simpleTables){  // mPDF 4.2.017
16754     $cell['border_details']['R'] = $table['border_details']['R'];
16755     $cell['border_details']['L'] = $table['border_details']['L'];
16756     $cell['border_details']['T'] = $table['border_details']['T'];
16757     $cell['border_details']['B'] = $table['border_details']['B'];
16758     $cell['border'] = $table['border']; 
16759     $cell['border_details']['L']['dom'] = 1; 
16760     $cell['border_details']['R']['dom'] = 1; 
16761     $cell['border_details']['T']['dom'] = 1; 
16762     $cell['border_details']['B']['dom'] = 1; 
16763       }
16764       else if ($this->simpleTables && $this->row==0 && $this->col==0){
16765     $table['simple']['border_details']['R'] = $table['border_details']['R'];
16766     $table['simple']['border_details']['L'] = $table['border_details']['L'];
16767     $table['simple']['border_details']['T'] = $table['border_details']['T'];
16768     $table['simple']['border_details']['B'] = $table['border_details']['B'];
16769     $table['simple']['border'] = $table['border']; 
16770       }
16771     }
16772   } 
16773   // INHERITED THEAD CSS Properties
16774   if ($this->tablethead) { 
16775     if ($this->thead_valign_default) $cell['va'] = $align[strtolower($this->thead_valign_default)]; 
16776     if ($this->thead_textalign_default) $cell['a'] = $align[strtolower($this->thead_textalign_default)]; 
16777     if ($this->thead_font_weight == 'B') { $this->SetStyle('B',true); }
16778     if ($this->thead_font_style == 'I') { $this->SetStyle('I',true); }
16779   }
16780 
16781   // INHERITED TFOOT CSS Properties
16782   if ($this->tabletfoot) { 
16783     if ($this->tfoot_valign_default) $cell['va'] = $align[strtolower($this->tfoot_valign_default)]; 
16784     if ($this->tfoot_textalign_default) $cell['a'] = $align[strtolower($this->tfoot_textalign_default)]; 
16785     if ($this->tfoot_font_weight == 'B') { $this->SetStyle('B',true); }
16786     if ($this->tfoot_font_style == 'I') { $this->SetStyle('I',true); }
16787   }
16788 
16789 
16790   if ($this->trow_text_rotate){ // mPDF 4.3.006
16791     $cell['R'] = $this->trow_text_rotate; 
16792   }
16793 
16794     $this->cell_border_dominance_L = 0; 
16795     $this->cell_border_dominance_R = 0; 
16796     $this->cell_border_dominance_T = 0; 
16797     $this->cell_border_dominance_B = 0; 
16798 
16799     $properties = $this->MergeCSS('TABLE',$tag,$attr);
16800     $properties = $this->array_merge_recursive_unique($this->base_table_properties, $properties);
16801     // mPDF 4.3.006
16802     if (isset($properties['BACKGROUND-COLOR'])) { $cell['bgcolor'] = $properties['BACKGROUND-COLOR']; }
16803     else if (isset($properties['BACKGROUND'])) { $cell['bgcolor'] = $properties['BACKGROUND']; }
16804 
16805 /*-- GRADIENTS --*/
16806     // mPDF 4.3.006
16807     if (isset($properties['BACKGROUND-GRADIENT'])) { $cell['gradient'] = $properties['BACKGROUND-GRADIENT']; }
16808     else { $cell['gradient'] = false; }
16809 /*-- END GRADIENTS --*/
16810 
16811 /*-- BACKGROUND-IMAGES --*/
16812   // mPDF 4.3.006 / 4.3.011
16813   if (isset($properties['BACKGROUND-IMAGE']) && $properties['BACKGROUND-IMAGE'] && !$this->ColActive && !$this->keep_block_together) {
16814     $file = $properties['BACKGROUND-IMAGE'];
16815     $sizesarray = $this->Image($file,0,0,0,0,'','',false, false, false, false, false);  // mPDF 4.3.012D
16816     if (isset($sizesarray['IMAGE_ID'])) {
16817       $image_id = $sizesarray['IMAGE_ID'];
16818       $orig_w = $sizesarray['WIDTH']*$this->k;    // in user units i.e. mm
16819       $orig_h = $sizesarray['HEIGHT']*$this->k;   // (using $this->img_dpi)
16820       $x_repeat = true;
16821       $y_repeat = true;
16822       if (isset($properties['BACKGROUND-REPEAT'])) {
16823         if ($properties['BACKGROUND-REPEAT']=='no-repeat' || $properties['BACKGROUND-REPEAT']=='repeat-x') { $y_repeat = false; }
16824         if ($properties['BACKGROUND-REPEAT']=='no-repeat' || $properties['BACKGROUND-REPEAT']=='repeat-y') { $x_repeat = false; }
16825       }
16826       $x_pos = 0;
16827       $y_pos = 0;
16828       if (isset($properties['BACKGROUND-POSITION'])) { 
16829         $ppos = preg_split('/\s+/',$properties['BACKGROUND-POSITION']);
16830         $x_pos = $ppos[0];
16831         $y_pos = $ppos[1];
16832         if (!stristr($x_pos ,'%') ) { $x_pos = $this->ConvertSize($x_pos ,$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize); }
16833         if (!stristr($y_pos ,'%') ) { $y_pos = $this->ConvertSize($y_pos ,$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize); }
16834       }
16835       // mPDF 4.3.015
16836       if (isset($properties['BACKGROUND-IMAGE-RESIZE'])) { $resize = $properties['BACKGROUND-IMAGE-RESIZE']; }
16837       else { $resize = 0; }
16838       // mPDF 4.3.017
16839       if (isset($properties['BACKGROUND-IMAGE-OPACITY'])) { $opacity = $properties['BACKGROUND-IMAGE-OPACITY']; }
16840       else { $opacity = 0; }
16841       $cell['background-image'] = array('image_id'=>$image_id, 'orig_w'=>$orig_w, 'orig_h'=>$orig_h, 'x_pos'=>$x_pos, 'y_pos'=>$y_pos, 'x_repeat'=>$x_repeat, 'y_repeat'=>$y_repeat, 'resize'=>$resize, 'opacity'=>$opacity); // mPDF 4.3.015  mPDF 4.3.017
16842 
16843     }
16844   }
16845 /*-- END BACKGROUND-IMAGES --*/
16846 
16847     if (isset($properties['VERTICAL-ALIGN'])) { $cell['va']=$align[strtolower($properties['VERTICAL-ALIGN'])]; }
16848     if (isset($properties['TEXT-ALIGN'])) { $cell['a'] = $align[strtolower($properties['TEXT-ALIGN'])]; }
16849 
16850     if (isset($properties['TEXT-ROTATE']) && $properties['TEXT-ROTATE']){ // mPDF 4.3.006
16851       $cell['R'] = $properties['TEXT-ROTATE']; 
16852     }
16853     if (isset($properties['BORDER'])) { 
16854       $bord = $this->border_details($properties['BORDER']);
16855       if ($bord['s']) {
16856          if (!$this->simpleTables){ // mPDF 4.2.017
16857         $cell['border'] = _BORDER_ALL;
16858         $cell['border_details']['R'] = $bord;
16859         $cell['border_details']['L'] = $bord;
16860         $cell['border_details']['T'] = $bord;
16861         $cell['border_details']['B'] = $bord;
16862         $cell['border_details']['L']['dom'] = $this->cell_border_dominance_L; 
16863         $cell['border_details']['R']['dom'] = $this->cell_border_dominance_R; 
16864         $cell['border_details']['T']['dom'] = $this->cell_border_dominance_T; 
16865         $cell['border_details']['B']['dom'] = $this->cell_border_dominance_B; 
16866          }
16867          else if ($this->simpleTables && $this->row==0 && $this->col==0){
16868         $table['simple']['border'] = _BORDER_ALL;
16869         $table['simple']['border_details']['R'] = $bord;
16870         $table['simple']['border_details']['L'] = $bord;
16871         $table['simple']['border_details']['T'] = $bord;
16872         $table['simple']['border_details']['B'] = $bord;
16873          }
16874       }
16875     }
16876 
16877     if (!$this->simpleTables){  // mPDF 4.2.017
16878        if (isset($properties['BORDER-RIGHT']) && $properties['BORDER-RIGHT']) { 
16879       $cell['border_details']['R'] = $this->border_details($properties['BORDER-RIGHT']);
16880       $this->setBorder($cell['border'], _BORDER_RIGHT, $cell['border_details']['R']['s']); 
16881       $cell['border_details']['R']['dom'] = $this->cell_border_dominance_R; 
16882        }
16883        if (isset($properties['BORDER-LEFT']) && $properties['BORDER-LEFT']) { 
16884       $cell['border_details']['L'] = $this->border_details($properties['BORDER-LEFT']);
16885       $this->setBorder($cell['border'], _BORDER_LEFT, $cell['border_details']['L']['s']); 
16886       $cell['border_details']['L']['dom'] = $this->cell_border_dominance_L; 
16887        }
16888        if (isset($properties['BORDER-BOTTOM']) && $properties['BORDER-BOTTOM']) { 
16889       $cell['border_details']['B'] = $this->border_details($properties['BORDER-BOTTOM']);
16890       $this->setBorder($cell['border'], _BORDER_BOTTOM, $cell['border_details']['B']['s']); 
16891       $cell['border_details']['B']['dom'] = $this->cell_border_dominance_B; 
16892        }
16893        if (isset($properties['BORDER-TOP']) && $properties['BORDER-TOP']) { 
16894       $cell['border_details']['T'] = $this->border_details($properties['BORDER-TOP']);
16895       $this->setBorder($cell['border'], _BORDER_TOP, $cell['border_details']['T']['s']); 
16896       $cell['border_details']['T']['dom'] = $this->cell_border_dominance_T; 
16897        }
16898     }
16899     else if ($this->simpleTables && $this->row==0 && $this->col==0){
16900        if (isset($properties['BORDER-LEFT']) && $properties['BORDER-LEFT']) { 
16901       $bord = $this->border_details($properties['BORDER-LEFT']);
16902         if ($bord['s']) { $table['simple']['border'] = _BORDER_ALL; }
16903         else { $table['simple']['border'] = 0; }
16904         $table['simple']['border_details']['R'] = $bord;
16905         $table['simple']['border_details']['L'] = $bord;
16906         $table['simple']['border_details']['T'] = $bord;
16907         $table['simple']['border_details']['B'] = $bord;
16908        }
16909     }
16910 
16911     if ($this->simpleTables && $this->row==0 && $this->col==0 && !$table['borders_separate']){  // mPDF 4.2.017
16912       $table['border_details'] = $table['simple']['border_details'];
16913       $table['border'] = $table['simple']['border']; 
16914     }
16915 
16916     // mPDF 4.3.009 Binary packed data
16917     if ($this->packTableData && !$this->simpleTables) {
16918       $cell['borderbin'] = $this->_packCellBorder($cell);
16919       unset($cell['border']);
16920       unset($cell['border_details']);
16921     }
16922 
16923     // mPDF 4.3.006
16924     if (isset($properties['PADDING-LEFT'])) { 
16925       $cell['padding']['L'] = $this->ConvertSize($properties['PADDING-LEFT'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false);
16926     }
16927     if (isset($properties['PADDING-RIGHT'])) { 
16928       $cell['padding']['R'] = $this->ConvertSize($properties['PADDING-RIGHT'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false);
16929     }
16930     if (isset($properties['PADDING-BOTTOM'])) { 
16931       $cell['padding']['B'] = $this->ConvertSize($properties['PADDING-BOTTOM'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false);
16932     }
16933     if (isset($properties['PADDING-TOP'])) { 
16934       $cell['padding']['T'] = $this->ConvertSize($properties['PADDING-TOP'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false);
16935     }
16936 
16937     $w = '';
16938     if (isset($properties['WIDTH'])) { $w = $properties['WIDTH']; }
16939     if (isset($attr['WIDTH'])) { $w = $attr['WIDTH']; }
16940     if ($w) { 
16941       if (strpos($w,'%') && !$this->ignore_table_percents ) { $cell['wpercent'] = $w + 0; } // makes 80% -> 80
16942       else if (!strpos($w,'%') && !$this->ignore_table_widths ) { $cell['w'] = $this->ConvertSize($w,$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false); }
16943     }
16944 
16945     // mPDF 4.0
16946     if (isset($properties['HEIGHT'])) { $cell['h']  = $this->ConvertSize($properties['HEIGHT'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false); }
16947 
16948     if (isset($properties['COLOR'])) {
16949       $cor = $this->ConvertColor($properties['COLOR']);
16950       if ($cor) { 
16951       $this->colorarray = $cor;
16952       $this->SetTextColor($cor['R'],$cor['G'],$cor['B']);
16953       $this->issetcolor=true;
16954       }
16955     }
16956     if (isset($properties['FONT-FAMILY'])) {
16957        if (!$this->isCJK) { 
16958       $this->SetFont($properties['FONT-FAMILY'],'',0,false);
16959        }
16960     }
16961     if (isset($properties['FONT-SIZE'])) { 
16962        $mmsize = $this->ConvertSize($properties['FONT-SIZE'],$this->default_font_size/$this->k);
16963        if ($mmsize) {
16964         $this->SetFontSize($mmsize*($this->k),false);
16965        }
16966     }
16967     // mPDF 4.2
16968     $cell['dfs'] = $this->FontSize; // Default Font size
16969     if (isset($properties['FONT-WEIGHT'])) {
16970       if (strtoupper($properties['FONT-WEIGHT']) == 'BOLD') { $this->SetStyle('B',true); }
16971     }
16972     if (isset($properties['FONT-STYLE'])) {
16973       if (strtoupper($properties['FONT-STYLE']) == 'ITALIC') { $this->SetStyle('I',true); }
16974     }
16975     if (isset($properties['WHITE-SPACE'])) {
16976       if (strtoupper($properties['WHITE-SPACE']) == 'NOWRAP') { $cell['nowrap']= 1; }
16977     }
16978     $properties = array();
16979 
16980 
16981   if (isset($attr['HEIGHT'])) $cell['h'] = $this->ConvertSize($attr['HEIGHT'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false);
16982 
16983   if (isset($attr['ALIGN'])) $cell['a'] = $align[strtolower($attr['ALIGN'])];
16984   if (isset($attr['VALIGN'])) $cell['va'] = $align[strtolower($attr['VALIGN'])];
16985 
16986   // mPDF 4.3.006
16987   if (isset($attr['BGCOLOR'])) $cell['bgcolor'] = $attr['BGCOLOR'];
16988 
16989   $cs = $rs = 1;
16990   if (isset($attr['COLSPAN']) && $attr['COLSPAN']>1)  $cs = $cell['colspan']  = $attr['COLSPAN'];
16991   if ($this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['nc'] < $this->col+$cs) { 
16992     $this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['nc'] = $this->col+$cs; 
16993     for($l=$this->col; $l < $this->col+$cs ;$l++) {
16994       if ($l-$this->col) $this->cell[$this->row][$l] = 0;
16995     }
16996   }
16997   if (isset($attr['ROWSPAN']) && $attr['ROWSPAN']>1)  $rs = $cell['rowspan']  = $attr['ROWSPAN'];
16998   for ($k=$this->row ; $k < $this->row+$rs ;$k++) {
16999     for($l=$this->col; $l < $this->col+$cs ;$l++) {
17000       if ($k-$this->row || $l-$this->col) $this->cell[$k][$l] = 0;
17001     }
17002   }
17003   if (isset($attr['TEXT-ROTATE'])) {  // mPDF 4.3.006
17004     $cell['R'] = $attr['TEXT-ROTATE']; 
17005   }
17006   if (isset($attr['NOWRAP']) && $attr['NOWRAP']) $cell['nowrap']= 1;
17007   unset($cell );
17008   break;
17009 
17010 /*-- END TABLES --*/
17011 
17012 
17013 /*-- LISTS --*/
17014     // *********** LISTS ********************
17015 
17016     case 'OL':
17017     case 'UL':
17018   $this->listjustfinished = false;
17019   // mPDF 4.2
17020   if ($this->blockjustfinished && !count($this->textbuffer) && $this->y != $this->tMargin && $this->collapseBlockMargins) { $lastbottommargin = $this->lastblockbottommargin; }
17021   else { $lastbottommargin = 0; }
17022   $this->lastblockbottommargin = 0;
17023   $this->blockjustfinished=false;
17024   // mPDF 3.0
17025   $this->linebreakjustfinished=false;
17026   $this->lastoptionaltag = ''; // Save current HTML specified optional endtag
17027   $this->listCSSlvl++;
17028   if((!$this->tableLevel) && ($this->listlvl == 0)) {
17029     // mPDF 4.2
17030     $blockstate = 0; 
17031     //if ($this->lastblocklevelchange == 1) { $blockstate = -1; } // Top margins/padding only
17032     //else if ($this->lastblocklevelchange < 1) { $blockstate = 0; }  // NO margins/padding
17033     // called from block after new div e.g. <div> ... <ol> ...    Outputs block top margin/border and padding
17034     if (count($this->textbuffer) == 0 && $this->lastblocklevelchange == 1 && !$this->tableLevel && !$this->kwt) {
17035       $this->newFlowingBlock( $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['width'],$this->lineheight,'',false,false,1,true);  // true = newblock
17036       $this->finishFlowingBlock(true);  // true = END of flowing block
17037     }
17038     else if (count($this->textbuffer)) { $this->printbuffer($this->textbuffer,$blockstate); }
17039     $this->textbuffer=array();
17040     $this->lastblocklevelchange = -1;
17041   }
17042   // ol and ul types are mixed here
17043   if ($this->listlvl == 0) {
17044     $this->list_indent = array();
17045     $this->list_align = array();
17046     $this->list_lineheight = array();
17047     $this->InlineProperties['LIST'] = array();
17048     $this->InlineProperties['LISTITEM'] = array();
17049   }
17050 
17051 /*-- TABLES --*/
17052   // A simple list for inside a table
17053   if($this->tableLevel) {
17054     $this->list_indent[$this->listlvl] = 0; // mm default indent for each level
17055     if ($tag == 'OL') $this->listtype = '1';
17056     else if ($tag == 'UL') $this->listtype = 'disc';
17057         if ($this->listlvl > 0) {
17058       $this->listlist[$this->listlvl]['MAXNUM'] = $this->listnum; //save previous lvl's maxnum
17059     }
17060     $this->listlvl++;
17061     $this->listnum = 0; // reset
17062     $this->listlist[$this->listlvl] = array('TYPE'=>$this->listtype,'MAXNUM'=>$this->listnum);
17063     break;
17064   }
17065 /*-- END TABLES --*/
17066 
17067   // mPDF 4.2.018
17068   if ($this->PDFA && $tag == 'UL') {
17069     if (!$this->PDFAauto) { $this->PDFAwarnings[] = "List bullets cannot use core font Zapfdingbats in PDFA1-b. (Substitute characters from current font used if available, otherwise substitutes hyphen '-')"; }
17070   }
17071 
17072   if ($this->listCSSlvl==1) {
17073     $properties = $this->MergeCSS('TOPLIST',$tag,$attr);
17074   }
17075   else {
17076     $properties = $this->MergeCSS('LIST',$tag,$attr);
17077   }
17078   if (!empty($properties)) $this->setCSS($properties,'INLINE');
17079   // List-type
17080   // mPDF 4.0
17081   $this->listtype = '';
17082   if (isset($attr['TYPE']) && $attr['TYPE']) { $this->listtype = $attr['TYPE']; }
17083   else if (isset($properties['LIST-STYLE-TYPE'])) { 
17084     // mPDF 4.0
17085     $this->listtype = $this->_getListStyle($properties['LIST-STYLE-TYPE']);
17086   }
17087   else if (isset($properties['LIST-STYLE'])) { 
17088     // mPDF 4.0
17089     $this->listtype = $this->_getListStyle($properties['LIST-STYLE']);
17090   }
17091   if (!$this->listtype) {
17092     if ($tag == 'OL') $this->listtype = '1';
17093     if ($tag == 'UL') {
17094       // mPDF 4.0
17095       if ($this->listlvl % 3 == 0) $this->listtype = 'disc';
17096       elseif ($this->listlvl % 3 == 1) $this->listtype = 'circle';
17097       else $this->listtype = 'square';
17098     }
17099   }
17100 
17101       if ($this->listlvl == 0) {
17102     $this->inherit_lineheight = 0;
17103         $this->listlvl++; // first depth level
17104         $this->listnum = 0; // reset
17105         $occur = $this->listoccur[$this->listlvl] = 1;
17106         $this->listlist[$this->listlvl][1] = array('TYPE'=>$this->listtype,'MAXNUM'=>$this->listnum);
17107       }
17108       else {
17109         if (!empty($this->textbuffer))
17110         {
17111     $this->listitem[] = array($this->listlvl,$this->listnum,$this->textbuffer,$this->listoccur[$this->listlvl],$this->listitemtype);
17112     $this->listnum++;
17113         }
17114     // Save current lineheight to inherit
17115     $this->textbuffer = array();
17116       $occur = $this->listoccur[$this->listlvl];
17117         $this->listlist[$this->listlvl][$occur]['MAXNUM'] = $this->listnum; //save previous lvl's maxnum
17118         $this->listlvl++;
17119         $this->listnum = 0; // reset
17120 
17121   // mPDF 3.0
17122         if (!isset($this->listoccur[$this->listlvl]) || $this->listoccur[$this->listlvl] == 0) $this->listoccur[$this->listlvl] = 1;
17123         else $this->listoccur[$this->listlvl]++;
17124       $occur = $this->listoccur[$this->listlvl];
17125         $this->listlist[$this->listlvl][$occur] = array('TYPE'=>$this->listtype,'MAXNUM'=>$this->listnum);
17126       }
17127 
17128 
17129   // TOP LEVEL ONLY
17130   if ($this->listlvl == 1) {
17131      if (isset($properties['MARGIN-TOP'])) { 
17132     // mPDF 4.2 Collaspe vertical block margins
17133     if ($lastbottommargin) { 
17134       $tmp = $this->ConvertSize($properties['MARGIN-TOP'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false);
17135       if ($tmp > $lastbottommargin) { $properties['MARGIN-TOP'] -= $lastbottommargin; }
17136       else { $properties['MARGIN-TOP'] = 0; }
17137     }
17138     $this->DivLn($this->ConvertSize($properties['MARGIN-TOP'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false),$this->blklvl,true,1);  // collapsible
17139      }
17140      if (isset($properties['MARGIN-BOTTOM'])) { 
17141     $this->list_margin_bottom = $this->ConvertSize($properties['MARGIN-BOTTOM'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false); 
17142      }
17143      // mPDF 4.0
17144      if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['line_height'])) {
17145     $this->list_lineheight[$this->listlvl][$occur] = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['line_height'];
17146      }
17147   }
17148   $this->list_indent[$this->listlvl][$occur] = 5; // mm default indent for each level
17149   if (isset($properties['TEXT-INDENT'])) { $this->list_indent[$this->listlvl][$occur] = $this->ConvertSize($properties['TEXT-INDENT'],$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false); }
17150   if (isset($properties['TEXT-ALIGN'])) { $this->list_align[$this->listlvl][$occur] = $align[strtolower($properties['TEXT-ALIGN'])]; }
17151 
17152   // mPDF 4.0
17153   if (isset($properties['LINE-HEIGHT'])) { 
17154     $this->list_lineheight[$this->listlvl][$occur] = $this->fixLineheight($properties['LINE-HEIGHT']);
17155     
17156   }
17157   // mPDF 4.2 Inherit
17158   else if ($this->listlvl>1 && isset($this->list_lineheight[($this->listlvl - 1)][1])) { 
17159     $this->list_lineheight[$this->listlvl][$occur] = end($this->list_lineheight[($this->listlvl - 1)]);
17160   }
17161   if (!isset($this->list_lineheight[$this->listlvl][$occur]) || !$this->list_lineheight[$this->listlvl][$occur]) { 
17162     $this->list_lineheight[$this->listlvl][$occur] = $this->normalLineheight;   // mPDF 4.2
17163   }
17164 
17165   $this->InlineProperties['LIST'][$this->listlvl][$occur] = $this->saveInlineProperties();
17166   $properties = array();
17167      break;
17168 
17169 
17170 
17171     case 'LI':
17172   // Start Block
17173   $this->lastoptionaltag = $tag; // Save current HTML specified optional endtag
17174       $this->ignorefollowingspaces = true; //Eliminate exceeding left-side spaces
17175 /*-- TABLES --*/
17176   // A simple list for inside a table
17177   if($this->tableLevel) {
17178      $this->blockjustfinished=false;
17179 
17180      // If already something in the Cell
17181      if ((isset($this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['maxs']) && $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['maxs'] > 0 ) || $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s'] > 0 ) {
17182       $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['textbuffer'][] = array("\n",$this->HREF,$this->currentfontstyle,$this->colorarray,$this->currentfontfamily,$this->SUP,$this->SUB,'',$this->strike,$this->outlineparam,$this->spanbgcolorarray,$this->currentfontsize,$this->ReqFontStyle);
17183       $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['text'][] = "\n";
17184       if (!isset($this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['maxs'])) {
17185         $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['maxs'] = $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s'];
17186       }
17187       elseif($this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['maxs'] < $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s']) {
17188         $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['maxs'] = $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s']; 
17189       }
17190       $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s'] = 0 ;
17191     }
17192     if ($this->listlvl == 0) { //in case of malformed HTML code. Example:(...)</p><li>Content</li><p>Paragraph1</p>(...)
17193       $this->listlvl++; // first depth level
17194       $this->listnum = 0; // reset
17195       $this->listlist[$this->listlvl] = array('TYPE'=>'disc','MAXNUM'=>$this->listnum);
17196     }
17197     $this->listnum++;
17198     switch($this->listlist[$this->listlvl]['TYPE']) {
17199     case 'A':
17200       $blt = $this->dec2alpha($this->listnum,true).$this->list_number_suffix;
17201       break;
17202     case 'a':
17203       $blt = $this->dec2alpha($this->listnum,false).$this->list_number_suffix;
17204       break;
17205     case 'I':
17206       $blt = $this->dec2roman($this->listnum,true).$this->list_number_suffix;
17207       break;
17208     case 'i':
17209       $blt = $this->dec2roman($this->listnum,false).$this->list_number_suffix;
17210       break;
17211     case '1':
17212       $blt = $this->listnum.$this->list_number_suffix;
17213               break;
17214     default:
17215       // mPDF 4.2
17216       if ($this->listlvl % 3 == 1 && isset($this->CurrentFont['cw'][8226])) { $blt = "\xe2\x80\xa2"; }  // &#8226; 
17217       else if ($this->listlvl % 3 == 2 && isset($this->CurrentFont['cw'][9900])) { $blt = "\xe2\x9a\xac"; } // &#9900; 
17218       else if ($this->listlvl % 3 == 0 && isset($this->CurrentFont['cw'][9642])) { $blt = "\xe2\x96\xaa"; } // &#9642; 
17219       else { $blt = '-'; }
17220       break;
17221     }
17222 
17223 /*-- UNICODE-FONTS --*/
17224     // mPDF 3.0 - change to &nbsp; spaces
17225     if ($this->is_MB) { 
17226       $ls = str_repeat("\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0",($this->listlvl-1)*2) . $blt . ' '; 
17227     }
17228     else {
17229 /*-- END UNICODE-FONTS --*/
17230       $ls = str_repeat(chr(160).chr(160),($this->listlvl-1)*2) . $blt . ' '; 
17231 /*-- UNICODE-FONTS --*/
17232     }
17233 /*-- END UNICODE-FONTS --*/
17234 
17235     $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['textbuffer'][] = array($ls,$this->HREF,$this->currentfontstyle,$this->colorarray,$this->currentfontfamily,$this->SUP,$this->SUB,'',$this->strike,$this->outlineparam,$this->spanbgcolorarray,$this->currentfontsize,$this->ReqFontStyle);
17236     $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['text'][] = $ls;
17237     $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s'] += $this->GetStringWidth($ls);
17238     break;
17239   }
17240 /*-- END TABLES --*/
17241   //Observation: </LI> is ignored
17242   if ($this->listlvl == 0) { //in case of malformed HTML code. Example:(...)</p><li>Content</li><p>Paragraph1</p>(...)
17243   //First of all, skip a line
17244     $this->listlvl++; // first depth level
17245     $this->listnum = 0; // reset
17246     $this->listoccur[$this->listlvl] = 1;
17247     $this->listlist[$this->listlvl][1] = array('TYPE'=>'disc','MAXNUM'=>$this->listnum);
17248   }
17249   if ($this->listnum == 0) {
17250     $this->listnum++;
17251     $this->textbuffer = array();
17252   }
17253   else {
17254     if (!empty($this->textbuffer)) {
17255       $this->listitem[] = array($this->listlvl,$this->listnum,$this->textbuffer,$this->listoccur[$this->listlvl],$this->listitemtype);
17256       $this->listnum++;
17257     }
17258     $this->textbuffer = array();
17259       }
17260 
17261   $this->listCSSlvl++;
17262   $properties = $this->MergeCSS('LIST',$tag,$attr);
17263   if (!empty($properties)) $this->setCSS($properties,'INLINE');
17264   $this->InlineProperties['LISTITEM'][$this->listlvl][$this->listoccur[$this->listlvl]][$this->listnum] = $this->saveInlineProperties();
17265 
17266   // List-type
17267   if (isset($attr['TYPE']) && $attr['TYPE']) { $this->listitemtype = $attr['TYPE']; }
17268   else if (isset($properties['LIST-STYLE-TYPE'])) { 
17269     // mPDF 4.0
17270     $this->listitemtype = $this->_getListStyle($properties['LIST-STYLE-TYPE']);
17271   }
17272   else if (isset($properties['LIST-STYLE'])) { 
17273     // mPDF 4.0
17274     $this->listitemtype = $this->_getListStyle($properties['LIST-STYLE']);
17275   }
17276   else $this->listitemtype = '';
17277 
17278       break;
17279 /*-- END LISTS --*/
17280 
17281   }//end of switch
17282 }
17283 
17284 /*-- LISTS --*/
17285 // mPDF 4.0
17286 function _getListStyle($ls) {
17287   if (stristr($ls,'disc')) { return 'disc'; }
17288   else if (stristr($ls,'circle')) { return 'circle'; }
17289   else if (stristr($ls,'square')) { return 'square'; }
17290   else if (stristr($ls,'decimal')) { return '1'; }
17291   else if (stristr($ls,'lower-roman')) { return 'i'; }
17292   else if (stristr($ls,'upper-roman')) { return 'I'; }
17293   else if (stristr($ls,'lower-latin')|| stristr($ls,'lower-alpha')) { return 'a'; }
17294   else if (stristr($ls,'upper-latin') || stristr($ls,'upper-alpha')) { return 'A'; }
17295   else if (stristr($ls,'none')) { return 'none'; }
17296   else { return ''; }
17297 }
17298 /*-- END LISTS --*/
17299 
17300 
17301 
17302 function CloseTag($tag)
17303 {
17304   $this->ignorefollowingspaces = false; //Eliminate exceeding left-side spaces
17305     //Closing tag
17306     if($tag=='OPTION') { $this->selectoption['ACTIVE'] = false;   $this->lastoptionaltag = ''; }
17307 
17308     if($tag=='TTS' or $tag=='TTA' or $tag=='TTZ') {
17309   if ($this->InlineProperties[$tag]) { $this->restoreInlineProperties($this->InlineProperties[$tag]); }
17310   unset($this->InlineProperties[$tag]);
17311   $ltag = strtolower($tag);
17312   $this->$ltag = false;
17313     }
17314 
17315 
17316     if($tag=='FONT' || $tag=='SPAN' || $tag=='CODE' || $tag=='KBD' || $tag=='SAMP' || $tag=='TT' || $tag=='VAR' 
17317   || $tag=='INS' || $tag=='STRONG' || $tag=='CITE' || $tag=='SUB' || $tag=='SUP' || $tag=='S' || $tag=='STRIKE' || $tag=='DEL'
17318   || $tag=='Q' || $tag=='EM' || $tag=='B' || $tag=='I' || $tag=='U' | $tag=='SMALL' || $tag=='BIG' || $tag=='ACRONYM') {
17319 
17320   if ($tag == 'SPAN') {
17321     if (isset($this->InlineProperties['SPAN'][$this->spanlvl]) && $this->InlineProperties['SPAN'][$this->spanlvl]) { $this->restoreInlineProperties($this->InlineProperties['SPAN'][$this->spanlvl]); }
17322     unset($this->InlineProperties['SPAN'][$this->spanlvl]);
17323     if (isset($this->InlineAnnots['SPAN'][$this->spanlvl]) && $this->InlineAnnots['SPAN'][$this->spanlvl]) { $annot = $this->InlineAnnots['SPAN'][$this->spanlvl]; }  // *ANNOTATIONS*
17324     unset($this->InlineAnnots['SPAN'][$this->spanlvl]); // *ANNOTATIONS*
17325     $this->spanlvl--;
17326   }
17327   else { 
17328     if (isset($this->InlineProperties[$tag]) && $this->InlineProperties[$tag]) { $this->restoreInlineProperties($this->InlineProperties[$tag]); }
17329     unset($this->InlineProperties[$tag]);
17330     if (isset($this->InlineAnnots[$tag]) && $this->InlineAnnots[$tag]) { $annot = $this->InlineAnnots[$tag]; }  // *ANNOTATIONS*
17331     unset($this->InlineAnnots[$tag]); // *ANNOTATIONS*
17332   }
17333 /*-- ANNOTATIONS --*/
17334   if (isset($annot)) {
17335     if($this->tableLevel) { // *TABLES*
17336       $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['textbuffer'][] = array($annot);  // *TABLES*
17337     } // *TABLES*
17338     else  { // *TABLES*
17339       $this->textbuffer[] = array($annot);
17340     } // *TABLES*
17341   }
17342 /*-- END ANNOTATIONS --*/
17343     }
17344 
17345 
17346     if($tag=='A') {
17347   $this->HREF=''; 
17348   if (isset($this->InlineProperties['A'])) { $this->restoreInlineProperties($this->InlineProperties['A']); }
17349   unset($this->InlineProperties['A']);
17350     }
17351 
17352 
17353 
17354 /*-- FORMS --*/
17355   // *********** FORM ELEMENTS ********************
17356 
17357     if($tag=='TEXTAREA') {
17358   $this->specialcontent = '';
17359   if ($this->InlineProperties[$tag]) { $this->restoreInlineProperties($this->InlineProperties[$tag]); }
17360   unset($this->InlineProperties[$tag]);
17361     }
17362 
17363 
17364     if($tag=='SELECT') {
17365   $this->lastoptionaltag = '';
17366   $texto = '';
17367   if (isset($this->selectoption['SELECTED'])) { $texto = $this->selectoption['SELECTED']; }
17368   $w = $this->GetStringWidth($texto);
17369   if ($w == 0) { $w = 5; }
17370   $objattr['type'] = 'select';  // need to add into objattr
17371   $objattr['text'] = $texto;
17372   // mPDD 1.4 Active Forms
17373   if (isset($this->selectoption['NAME'])) { $objattr['name'] = $this->selectoption['NAME']; }
17374   if (isset($this->selectoption['ITEMS'])) { $objattr['items'] = $this->selectoption['ITEMS']; }
17375   if (isset($this->selectoption['MULTIPLE'])) { $objattr['multiple'] = $this->selectoption['MULTIPLE']; }
17376   if (isset($this->selectoption['DISABLED'])) { $objattr['disabled'] = $this->selectoption['DISABLED']; }
17377   if (isset($this->selectoption['TITLE'])) { $objattr['title'] = $this->selectoption['TITLE']; }
17378   if (isset($this->selectoption['COLOR'])) { $objattr['color'] = $this->selectoption['COLOR']; }
17379   if (isset($this->selectoption['SIZE'])) { $objattr['size'] = $this->selectoption['SIZE']; }
17380   if (isset($objattr['size']) && $objattr['size']>1) { $rows=$objattr['size']; } else { $rows = 1; }
17381 
17382   $objattr['fontfamily'] = $this->FontFamily;
17383   $objattr['fontsize'] = $this->FontSizePt;
17384 
17385   $objattr['width'] = $w + ($this->form_element_spacing['select']['outer']['h']*2)+($this->form_element_spacing['select']['inner']['h']*2) + ($this->FontSize*1.4);
17386   $objattr['height'] = ($this->FontSize*$rows) + ($this->form_element_spacing['select']['outer']['v']*2)+($this->form_element_spacing['select']['inner']['v']*2);
17387   $e = "\xbb\xa4\xactype=select,objattr=".serialize($objattr)."\xbb\xa4\xac";
17388 
17389   // Clear properties - tidy up
17390   $properties = array();
17391 
17392   // Output it to buffers
17393   if ($this->tableLevel) {  // *TABLES*
17394     $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['textbuffer'][] = array($e,$this->HREF,$this->currentfontstyle,$this->colorarray,$this->currentfontfamily,$this->SUP,$this->SUB,'',$this->strike,$this->outlineparam,$this->spanbgcolorarray,$this->currentfontsize,$this->ReqFontStyle); // *TABLES*
17395     $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s'] += $objattr['width'] ; // *TABLES*
17396   } // *TABLES*
17397   else {  // *TABLES*
17398     $this->textbuffer[] = array($e,$this->HREF,$this->currentfontstyle,$this->colorarray,$this->currentfontfamily,$this->SUP,$this->SUB,'',$this->strike,$this->outlineparam,$this->spanbgcolorarray,$this->currentfontsize,$this->ReqFontStyle);
17399   } // *TABLES*
17400 
17401   $this->selectoption = array();
17402   $this->specialcontent = '';
17403 
17404   if ($this->InlineProperties[$tag]) { $this->restoreInlineProperties($this->InlineProperties[$tag]); }
17405   unset($this->InlineProperties[$tag]);
17406 
17407     }
17408 /*-- END FORMS --*/
17409 
17410 
17411   // *********** BLOCKS ********************
17412 
17413     if($tag=='P' || $tag=='DIV' || $tag=='H1' || $tag=='H2' || $tag=='H3' || $tag=='H4' || $tag=='H5' || $tag=='H6' || $tag=='PRE' 
17414    || $tag=='FORM' || $tag=='ADDRESS' || $tag=='BLOCKQUOTE' || $tag=='CENTER' || $tag=='DT'  || $tag=='DD'  || $tag=='DL' ) { 
17415 
17416   $this->ignorefollowingspaces = true; //Eliminate exceeding left-side spaces
17417   $this->blockjustfinished=true;
17418   // mPDF 4.2
17419   $this->lastblockbottommargin = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['margin_bottom'];
17420 
17421 /*-- LISTS --*/
17422   // mPDF 4.0
17423   if ($this->listlvl>0) { return; }
17424 /*-- END LISTS --*/
17425 
17426 /*-- TABLES --*/
17427   if($this->tableLevel) {
17428     // mPDF 3.0
17429     if ($this->linebreakjustfinished) { $this->blockjustfinished=false; }
17430     // mPDF 4.0
17431     if (isset($this->InlineProperties['BLOCKINTABLE'])) { 
17432       if ($this->InlineProperties['BLOCKINTABLE']) { $this->restoreInlineProperties($this->InlineProperties['BLOCKINTABLE']); }
17433       unset($this->InlineProperties['BLOCKINTABLE']);
17434     }
17435     return;
17436   }
17437 /*-- END TABLES --*/
17438   $this->lastoptionaltag = '';
17439   $this->divbegin=false;
17440   // mPDF 3.0
17441   $this->linebreakjustfinished=false;
17442 
17443   $this->x = $this->lMargin + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['outer_left_margin'];
17444 
17445 /*-- CSS-FLOAT --*/
17446   // If float contained in a float, need to extend bottom to allow for it
17447   $currpos = $this->page*1000 + $this->y;
17448   if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['float_endpos']) && $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['float_endpos'] > $currpos) {
17449     $old_page = $this->page;
17450     $new_page = intval($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['float_endpos'] /1000);
17451     if ($old_page != $new_page) {
17452       $s = $this->PrintPageBackgrounds();
17453       // Writes after the marker so not overwritten later by page background etc.
17454       $this->pages[$this->page] = preg_replace('/(___BACKGROUND___PATTERNS'.date('jY').')/', '\\1'."\n".$s."\n", $this->pages[$this->page]);
17455       $this->pageBackgrounds = array();
17456       $this->page = $new_page;
17457       $this->ResetMargins();
17458       $this->Reset();
17459       $this->pageoutput[$this->page] = array();
17460     }
17461     $this->y = (($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['float_endpos'] *1000) % 1000000)/1000;  // mod changes operands to integers before processing
17462   }
17463 /*-- END CSS-FLOAT --*/
17464 
17465   //Print content
17466   if ($this->lastblocklevelchange == 1) { $blockstate = 3; }  // Top & bottom margins/padding
17467   else if ($this->lastblocklevelchange == -1) { $blockstate = 2; }  // Bottom margins/padding only
17468   else { $blockstate = 0; } // mPDF 3.0
17469   // called from after e.g. </table> </div> </div> ...    Outputs block margin/border and padding
17470   if (count($this->textbuffer) && $this->textbuffer[count($this->textbuffer)-1]) {
17471     // mPDF 3.0 ...as long as not special content
17472     if (substr($this->textbuffer[count($this->textbuffer)-1][0],0,3) != "\xbb\xa4\xac") { // not special content
17473      if ($this->is_MB) {  // *UNICODE-FONTS*
17474     $this->textbuffer[count($this->textbuffer)-1][0] = preg_replace('/[ ]+$/u', '', $this->textbuffer[count($this->textbuffer)-1][0]);  // *UNICODE-FONTS*
17475      }  // *UNICODE-FONTS*
17476      else { // *UNICODE-FONTS*
17477     $this->textbuffer[count($this->textbuffer)-1][0] = preg_replace('/[ ]+$/', '', $this->textbuffer[count($this->textbuffer)-1][0]);
17478      }  // *UNICODE-FONTS*
17479     }
17480   }
17481   if (count($this->textbuffer) == 0 && $this->lastblocklevelchange != 0) {
17482     $this->newFlowingBlock( $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['width'],$this->lineheight,'',false,false,2,true);  // true = newblock
17483     $this->finishFlowingBlock(true);  // true = END of flowing block
17484     $this->PaintDivBB('',$blockstate);
17485   }
17486   else {
17487     $this->printbuffer($this->textbuffer,$blockstate); 
17488   }
17489 
17490 
17491   $this->textbuffer=array();
17492 
17493   if ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['keep_block_together']) {
17494     $this->printdivbuffer(); 
17495   }
17496 
17497   if ($this->kwt) {
17498     $this->kwt_height = $this->y - $this->kwt_y0;
17499   }
17500 
17501 /*-- CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT --*/
17502   $this->printfloatbuffer();
17503 /*-- END CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT --*/
17504 
17505   if($tag=='PRE') { $this->ispre=false; }
17506 
17507 /*-- CSS-FLOAT --*/
17508   if ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['float'] == 'R') {
17509     // If width not set, here would need to adjust and output buffer
17510     $s = $this->PrintPageBackgrounds();
17511     // Writes after the marker so not overwritten later by page background etc.
17512     $this->pages[$this->page] = preg_replace('/(___BACKGROUND___PATTERNS'.date('jY').')/', '\\1'."\n".$s."\n", $this->pages[$this->page]);
17513     $this->pageBackgrounds = array();
17514     $this->Reset();
17515     $this->pageoutput[$this->page] = array();
17516 
17517     for($i=($this->blklvl-1); $i >= 0; $i--) {
17518       if (isset($this->blk[$i]['float_endpos'])) { $this->blk[$i]['float_endpos'] = max($this->blk[$i]['float_endpos'], ($this->page*1000 + $this->y)); }
17519       else { $this->blk[$i]['float_endpos'] = $this->page*1000 + $this->y; }
17520     }
17521 
17522     $this->floatDivs[] = array(
17523       'side'=>'R',
17524       'startpage'=>$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['startpage'] ,
17525       'y0'=>$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['float_start_y'] ,
17526       'startpos'=> ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['startpage']*1000 + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['float_start_y']),
17527       'endpage'=>$this->page ,
17528       'y1'=>$this->y ,
17529       'endpos'=> ($this->page*1000 + $this->y),
17530       'w'=> $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['float_width'],
17531       'blklvl'=>$this->blklvl,
17532       'blockContext' => $this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['blockContext']
17533     );
17534 
17535     $this->y = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['float_start_y'] ;
17536     $this->page = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['startpage'] ;
17537     $this->ResetMargins();
17538     $this->pageoutput[$this->page] = array();
17539   }
17540   if ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['float'] == 'L') {
17541     // If width not set, here would need to adjust and output buffer
17542     $s = $this->PrintPageBackgrounds();
17543     // Writes after the marker so not overwritten later by page background etc.
17544     $this->pages[$this->page] = preg_replace('/(___BACKGROUND___PATTERNS'.date('jY').')/', '\\1'."\n".$s."\n", $this->pages[$this->page]);
17545     $this->pageBackgrounds = array();
17546     $this->Reset();
17547     $this->pageoutput[$this->page] = array();
17548 
17549     for($i=($this->blklvl-1); $i >= 0; $i--) {
17550       if (isset($this->blk[$i]['float_endpos'])) { $this->blk[$i]['float_endpos'] = max($this->blk[$i]['float_endpos'], ($this->page*1000 + $this->y)); }
17551       else { $this->blk[$i]['float_endpos'] = $this->page*1000 + $this->y; }
17552     }
17553 
17554     $this->floatDivs[] = array(
17555       'side'=>'L',
17556       'startpage'=>$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['startpage'] ,
17557       'y0'=>$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['float_start_y'] ,
17558       'startpos'=> ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['startpage']*1000 + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['float_start_y']),
17559       'endpage'=>$this->page ,
17560       'y1'=>$this->y ,
17561       'endpos'=> ($this->page*1000 + $this->y),
17562       'w'=> $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['float_width'],
17563       'blklvl'=>$this->blklvl,
17564       'blockContext' => $this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['blockContext']
17565     );
17566 
17567     $this->y = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['float_start_y'] ;
17568     $this->page = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['startpage'] ;
17569     $this->ResetMargins();
17570     $this->pageoutput[$this->page] = array();
17571   }
17572 /*-- END CSS-FLOAT --*/
17573 
17574   //Reset values
17575   $this->Reset();
17576 
17577   if ($this->blklvl > 0) {  // ==0 SHOULDN'T HAPPEN - NOT XHTML 
17578      if ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['tag'] == $tag) {
17579     unset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]);
17580     $this->blklvl--;
17581      }
17582      //else { echo $tag; exit; }  // debug - forces error if incorrectly nested html tags
17583   }
17584 
17585   $this->lastblocklevelchange = -1 ;
17586   // Reset Inline-type properties
17587   if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['InlineProperties'])) { $this->restoreInlineProperties($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['InlineProperties']); }
17588 
17589   $this->x = $this->lMargin + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['outer_left_margin'];
17590 
17591     }
17592 
17593 
17594 /*-- TABLES --*/
17595 
17596     if($tag=='TH') $this->SetStyle('B',false);
17597 
17598     if(($tag=='TH' or $tag=='TD') && $this->tableLevel) {
17599   $this->lastoptionaltag = 'TR';
17600   unset($this->tablecascadeCSS[$this->tbCSSlvl]);
17601   $this->tbCSSlvl--;
17602   $this->tdbegin = false;
17603 
17604   // Added for correct calculation of cell column width - otherwise misses the last line if not end </p> etc.
17605   if (!isset($this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['maxs'])) {
17606     $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['maxs'] = $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s']; 
17607   }
17608   elseif($this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['maxs'] < $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s']) {
17609     $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['maxs'] = $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s']; 
17610   }
17611 
17612   // Remove last <br> if at end of cell
17613   if (isset($this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['textbuffer'])) { $ntb = count($this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['textbuffer']); }
17614   else { $ntb = 0; }
17615   // mPDF 3.0 ... but only the last one
17616   if ($ntb>1 && $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['textbuffer'][$ntb-1][0] == "\n") {
17617     unset($this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['textbuffer'][$ntb-1]);
17618   }
17619 
17620   if ($this->tablethead) { $this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['is_thead'][$this->row] = true; }
17621   // mPDF 3.0
17622   if ($this->usetableheader && ($this->row == 0  || $this->tablethead) && $this->tableLevel==1) {
17623     $this->tableheadernrows = max($this->tableheadernrows, ($this->row+1));
17624   }
17625   // mPDF 4.0
17626   if ($this->tabletfoot) { $this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['is_tfoot'][$this->row] = true; }
17627   if ($this->tabletfoot && $this->tableLevel==1) {
17628     $this->tablefooternrows = max($this->tablefooternrows, ($this->row+1 - $this->tableheadernrows));
17629   }
17630   $this->Reset();
17631     }
17632 
17633     if($tag=='TR' && $this->tableLevel) {
17634   $this->lastoptionaltag = '';
17635   unset($this->tablecascadeCSS[$this->tbCSSlvl]);
17636   $this->tbCSSlvl--;
17637   $this->trow_text_rotate = '';
17638   $this->tabletheadjustfinished = false;
17639    }
17640 
17641     if($tag=='TBODY') {
17642   $this->lastoptionaltag = '';
17643   unset($this->tablecascadeCSS[$this->tbCSSlvl]);
17644   $this->tbCSSlvl--;
17645     }
17646 
17647     if($tag=='THEAD') {
17648   $this->lastoptionaltag = '';
17649   unset($this->tablecascadeCSS[$this->tbCSSlvl]);
17650   $this->tbCSSlvl--;
17651   $this->tablethead = 0;
17652   $this->tabletheadjustfinished = true;
17653   $this->thead_font_weight = '';
17654   $this->SetStyle('B',false);
17655   $this->thead_font_style = '';
17656   $this->SetStyle('I',false);
17657
