17658   $this->thead_valign_default = '';
17659   $this->thead_textalign_default = '';
17660     }
17661 
17662     if($tag=='TFOOT') {
17663   $this->lastoptionaltag = '';
17664   unset($this->tablecascadeCSS[$this->tbCSSlvl]);
17665   $this->tbCSSlvl--;
17666   $this->tabletfoot = 0;  // mPDF 4.0
17667   $this->tfoot_font_weight = '';
17668   $this->SetStyle('B',false);
17669   $this->tfoot_font_style = '';
17670   $this->SetStyle('I',false);
17671 
17672   $this->tfoot_valign_default = '';
17673   $this->tfoot_textalign_default = '';
17674     }
17675 
17676 
17677 
17678     if($tag=='TABLE') { // TABLE-END (
17679   if ($this->progressBar) { $this->UpdateProgressBar(1,'','TABLE'); } // *PROGRESS-BAR*
17680   if ($this->progressBar) { $this->UpdateProgressBar(7,0,''); } // *PROGRESS-BAR*
17681   $this->lastoptionaltag = '';
17682   unset($this->tablecascadeCSS[$this->tbCSSlvl]);
17683   $this->tbCSSlvl--;
17684   $this->ignorefollowingspaces = true; //Eliminate exceeding left-side spaces
17685   $this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['cells'] = $this->cell;
17686   $this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['wc'] = array_pad(array(),$this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['nc'],array('miw'=>0,'maw'=>0));
17687   $this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['hr'] = array_pad(array(),$this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['nr'],0);
17688 
17689   // mPDF 4.0  Move TABLE FOOTER TFOOT to end of table 
17690   if (isset($this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['is_tfoot']) && count($this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['is_tfoot'])) {
17691     $tfrows = array();
17692     foreach($this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['is_tfoot'] AS $r=>$val) {
17693       if ($val) { $tfrows[] = $r; }
17694     }
17695     $temp = array();
17696     $temptf = array();
17697     foreach($this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['cells'] AS $k=>$row) {
17698       if (in_array($k,$tfrows)) {
17699         $temptf[] = $row;
17700       }
17701       else {
17702         $temp[] = $row;
17703       }
17704     }
17705     $this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['is_tfoot'] = array();
17706     for($i=count($temp) ; $i<(count($temp)+count($temptf)); $i++) {
17707       $this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['is_tfoot'][$i] = true;
17708     }
17709     // Update nestedpos row references
17710     if (count($this->table[($this->tableLevel+1)])) {
17711       foreach($this->table[($this->tableLevel+1)] AS $nid=>$nested) {
17712       $this->table[($this->tableLevel+1)][$nid]['nestedpos'][0] -= count($temptf);
17713       }
17714     } 
17715     $this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['cells'] = array_merge($temp, $temptf);
17716   }
17717 
17718   // Fix Borders *********************************************
17719   $this->_fixTableBorders($this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]);
17720 
17721   if ($this->progressBar) { $this->UpdateProgressBar(7,10,' '); } // *PROGRESS-BAR*
17722 
17723   if ($this->ColActive) { $this->table_rotate = 0; }  // *COLUMNS*
17724   if ($this->table_rotate <> 0) {
17725     $this->tablebuffer = array();
17726     // Max width for rotated table
17727     $this->tbrot_maxw = $this->h - ($this->y + $this->bMargin + 5);
17728     $this->tbrot_maxh = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'] ;    // Max width for rotated table
17729     $this->tbrot_align = $this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['a'] ;
17730   }
17731   $this->shrin_k = 1;
17732 
17733   // mPDF 4.2
17734   if ($this->shrink_tables_to_fit < 1) { $this->shrink_tables_to_fit = 1; }
17735   if (!$this->shrink_this_table_to_fit) { $this->shrink_this_table_to_fit = $this->shrink_tables_to_fit; }
17736 
17737   if ($this->tableLevel>1) {
17738     // deal with nested table
17739 
17740     $this->_tableColumnWidth($this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]],true);
17741 
17742     $tmiw = $this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['miw'];
17743     $tmaw = $this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['maw'];
17744     $tl = $this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['tl'];
17745 
17746     // Go down to lower table level
17747     $this->tableLevel--;
17748 
17749     // Reset lower level table
17750     $this->base_table_properties = $this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['baseProperties'];
17751     $this->cell = $this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['cells'];
17752     $this->row = $this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['currrow'];
17753     $this->col = $this->table[$this->tableLevel][$this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel]]['currcol'];
17754 
17755     $objattr['type'] = 'nestedtable';
17756     $objattr['nestedcontent'] = $this->tbctr[($this->tableLevel+1)];
17757     $objattr['table'] = $this->tbctr[$this->tableLevel];
17758     $objattr['row'] = $this->row;
17759     $objattr['col'] = $this->col;
17760     $objattr['level'] = $this->tableLevel;
17761     $e = "\xbb\xa4\xactype=nestedtable,objattr=".serialize($objattr)."\xbb\xa4\xac";
17762     $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['textbuffer'][] = array($e,$this->HREF,$this->currentfontstyle,$this->colorarray,$this->currentfontfamily,$this->SUP,$this->SUB,'',$this->strike,$this->outlineparam,$this->spanbgcolorarray,$this->currentfontsize,$this->ReqFontStyle);
17763     $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s'] += $tl ;
17764     if (!isset($this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['maxs'])) {
17765       $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['maxs'] = $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s']; 
17766     }
17767     elseif($this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['maxs'] < $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s']) {
17768       $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['maxs'] = $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s']; 
17769     }
17770     $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['s'] = 0;// reset
17771     if ((isset($this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['nestedmaw']) && $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['nestedmaw'] < $tmaw) || !isset($this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['nestedmaw'])) { $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['nestedmaw'] = $tmaw ; }
17772     if ((isset($this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['nestedmiw']) && $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['nestedmiw'] < $tmiw) || !isset($this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['nestedmiw'])) { $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['nestedmiw'] = $tmiw ; }
17773     $this->cell[$this->row][$this->col]['nestedcontent'][] = $this->tbctr[($this->tableLevel+1)];
17774     $this->tdbegin = true;
17775     $this->nestedtablejustfinished = true;
17776     $this->ignorefollowingspaces = true;
17777     return;
17778   }
17779   $this->cMarginL = 0;
17780   $this->cMarginR = 0;
17781   $this->cMarginT = 0;
17782   $this->cMarginB = 0;
17783   $this->cellPaddingL = 0;
17784   $this->cellPaddingR = 0;
17785   $this->cellPaddingT = 0;
17786   $this->cellPaddingB = 0;
17787 
17788   if (!$this->kwt_saved) { $this->kwt_height = 0; }
17789 
17790   list($check,$tablemiw) = $this->_tableColumnWidth($this->table[1][1],true);
17791   $save_table = $this->table;
17792   $reset_to_minimum_width = false;
17793   $added_page = false;
17794 
17795   if ($check > 1) { 
17796     if ($check > $this->shrink_this_table_to_fit && $this->table_rotate) { 
17797         $this->AddPage($this->CurOrientation);
17798         $added_page = true;
17799         $this->kwt_moved = true; 
17800         $this->tbrot_maxw = $this->h - ($this->y + $this->bMargin + 5) - $this->kwt_height;
17801         // mPDF 3.0
17802         //$check = $tablemiw/$this->tbrot_maxw;   // undo any shrink
17803         $check = 1;   // undo any shrink
17804     }
17805     $reset_to_minimum_width = true;
17806   }
17807 
17808   if ($reset_to_minimum_width) {
17809 
17810     $this->shrin_k = $check;
17811 
17812     $this->default_font_size /= $this->shrin_k;
17813     $this->SetFontSize($this->default_font_size, false );
17814 
17815     $this->shrinkTable($this->table[1][1],$this->shrin_k);
17816 
17817     $this->_tableColumnWidth($this->table[1][1],false); // repeat
17818 
17819     // Starting at $this->innermostTableLevel
17820     // Shrink table values - and redo columnWidth
17821     for($lvl=2;$lvl<=$this->innermostTableLevel;$lvl++) {
17822       for ($nid=1; $nid<=$this->tbctr[$lvl]; $nid++) {
17823         $this->shrinkTable($this->table[$lvl][$nid],$this->shrin_k);
17824         $this->_tableColumnWidth($this->table[$lvl][$nid],false);
17825       }
17826     }
17827   }
17828 
17829 
17830   // Set table cell widths for top level table
17831   // Use $shrin_k to resize but don't change again
17832   $this->SetLineHeight('',$this->table_lineheight);
17833 
17834   // Top level table
17835   $this->_tableWidth($this->table[1][1]);
17836 
17837   // Now work through any nested tables setting child table[w'] = parent cell['w']
17838   // Now do nested tables _tableWidth
17839   for($lvl=2;$lvl<=$this->innermostTableLevel;$lvl++) {
17840     for ($nid=1; $nid<=$this->tbctr[$lvl]; $nid++) {
17841       // HERE set child table width = cell width
17842 
17843       list($parentrow, $parentcol, $parentnid) = $this->table[$lvl][$nid]['nestedpos'];
17844       if (isset($this->table[($lvl-1)][$parentnid]['cells'][$parentrow][$parentcol]['colspan']) && $this->table[($lvl-1)][$parentnid]['cells'][$parentrow][$parentcol]['colspan']> 1) {
17845          $parentwidth = 0;
17846          for($cs=0;$cs<$this->table[($lvl-1)][$parentnid]['cells'][$parentrow][$parentcol]['colspan'] ; $cs++) {
17847         $parentwidth += $this->table[($lvl-1)][$parentnid]['wc'][$parentcol+$cs]; 
17848          }
17849       }
17850       else { $parentwidth = $this->table[($lvl-1)][$parentnid]['wc'][$parentcol]; }
17851 
17852 
17853       //$parentwidth -= ALLOW FOR PADDING ETC.in parent cell
17854       // mPDF 4.3.006
17855       if (!$this->simpleTables){  // mPDF 4.2.017
17856        // mPDF 4.3.009
17857        if ($this->packTableData) {
17858         list($bt,$br,$bb,$bl) = $this->_getBorderWidths($this->table[($lvl-1)][$parentnid]['cells'][$parentrow][$parentcol]['borderbin']);
17859        }
17860        else { 
17861         $br = $this->table[($lvl-1)][$parentnid]['cells'][$parentrow][$parentcol]['border_details']['R']['w'];
17862         $bl = $this->table[($lvl-1)][$parentnid]['cells'][$parentrow][$parentcol]['border_details']['L']['w'];
17863        }
17864        if ($this->table[$lvl-1][$parentnid]['borders_separate']) {
17865         $parentwidth -= $br + $bl
17866         + $this->table[($lvl-1)][$parentnid]['cells'][$parentrow][$parentcol]['padding']['L']
17867         + $this->table[($lvl-1)][$parentnid]['cells'][$parentrow][$parentcol]['padding']['R']
17868         + $this->table[($lvl-1)][$parentnid]['border_spacing_H'];
17869        }
17870        else {
17871         $parentwidth -= $br/2 + $bl/2
17872         + $this->table[($lvl-1)][$parentnid]['cells'][$parentrow][$parentcol]['padding']['L']
17873         + $this->table[($lvl-1)][$parentnid]['cells'][$parentrow][$parentcol]['padding']['R'];
17874        }
17875       }
17876       else if ($this->simpleTables){
17877        if ($this->table[$lvl-1][$parentnid]['borders_separate']) {
17878         $parentwidth -= $this->table[($lvl-1)][$parentnid]['simple']['border_details']['L']['w']
17879         + $this->table[($lvl-1)][$parentnid]['simple']['border_details']['R']['w']
17880         + $this->table[($lvl-1)][$parentnid]['cells'][$parentrow][$parentcol]['padding']['L']
17881         + $this->table[($lvl-1)][$parentnid]['cells'][$parentrow][$parentcol]['padding']['R']
17882         + $this->table[($lvl-1)][$parentnid]['border_spacing_H'];
17883        }
17884        else {
17885         $parentwidth -= $this->table[($lvl-1)][$parentnid]['simple']['border_details']['L']['w']/2
17886         + $this->table[($lvl-1)][$parentnid]['simple']['border_details']['R']['w']/2
17887         + $this->table[($lvl-1)][$parentnid]['cells'][$parentrow][$parentcol]['padding']['L']
17888         + $this->table[($lvl-1)][$parentnid]['cells'][$parentrow][$parentcol]['padding']['R'];
17889        }
17890       }
17891       if (isset($this->table[$lvl][$nid]['wpercent']) && $this->table[$lvl][$nid]['wpercent'] && $lvl>1) {
17892         $this->table[$lvl][$nid]['w'] = $parentwidth;
17893       }
17894       else if ($parentwidth > $this->table[$lvl][$nid]['maw']) {
17895         $this->table[$lvl][$nid]['w'] = $this->table[$lvl][$nid]['maw'];
17896       }
17897       else {
17898         $this->table[$lvl][$nid]['w'] = $parentwidth;
17899       }
17900 
17901       $this->_tableWidth($this->table[$lvl][$nid]);
17902     }
17903   }
17904 
17905   // Starting at $this->innermostTableLevel
17906   // Cascade back up nested tables: setting heights back up the tree
17907   for($lvl=$this->innermostTableLevel;$lvl>0;$lvl--) {
17908     for ($nid=1; $nid<=$this->tbctr[$lvl]; $nid++) {
17909       list($tableheight,$maxrowheight,$fullpage,$remainingpage) = $this->_tableHeight($this->table[$lvl][$nid]);
17910     }
17911   }
17912   if ($this->progressBar) { $this->UpdateProgressBar(7,20,' '); } // *PROGRESS-BAR*
17913 
17914   $recalculate = 1;
17915   $forcerecalc = false; // mPDF 4.2.005
17916   // RESIZING ALGORITHM
17917   if ($maxrowheight > $fullpage) { 
17918     $recalculate = $this->tbsqrt($maxrowheight / $fullpage, 1); 
17919     $forcerecalc = true; // mPDF 4.2.005
17920   }
17921   else if ($this->table_rotate) { // NB $remainingpage == $fullpage == the width of the page
17922     if ($tableheight > $remainingpage) { 
17923       // If can fit on remainder of page whilst respecting autsize value..
17924       if (($this->shrin_k * $this->tbsqrt($tableheight / $remainingpage, 1)) <= $this->shrink_this_table_to_fit) {
17925         $recalculate = $this->tbsqrt($tableheight / $remainingpage, 1); 
17926       }
17927       else if (!$added_page) {
17928         $this->AddPage($this->CurOrientation);
17929         $added_page = true;
17930         $this->kwt_moved = true; 
17931         $this->tbrot_maxw = $this->h - ($this->y + $this->bMargin + 5) - $this->kwt_height;
17932         // mPDF 3.0 added 0.001 to force it to recalculate
17933         $recalculate = (1 / $this->shrin_k) + 0.001;  // undo any shrink
17934       }
17935     }
17936   }
17937   else if ($this->table_keep_together) {
17938     if ($tableheight > $fullpage) { 
17939       if (($this->shrin_k * $this->tbsqrt($tableheight / $fullpage, 1)) <= $this->shrink_this_table_to_fit) {
17940         $recalculate = $this->tbsqrt($tableheight / $fullpage, 1); 
17941       }
17942       else {
17943         $this->AddPage($this->CurOrientation);
17944         $added_page = true;
17945         $this->kwt_moved = true; 
17946         $this->tbrot_maxw = $this->h - ($this->y + $this->bMargin + 5) - $this->kwt_height;
17947         $recalculate = $this->tbsqrt($tableheight / $fullpage, 1); 
17948       }
17949     }
17950     else if ($tableheight > $remainingpage) { 
17951       // If can fit on remainder of page whilst respecting autsize value..
17952       if (($this->shrin_k * $this->tbsqrt($tableheight / $remainingpage, 1)) <= $this->shrink_this_table_to_fit) {
17953         $recalculate = $this->tbsqrt($tableheight / $remainingpage, 1); 
17954       }
17955       else {
17956         $this->AddPage($this->CurOrientation);
17957         $added_page = true;
17958         $this->kwt_moved = true; 
17959         $this->tbrot_maxw = $this->h - ($this->y + $this->bMargin + 5) - $this->kwt_height;
17960         // mPDF 3.0 added 0.001 to force it to recalculate
17961         $recalculate = (1 / $this->shrin_k) + 0.001;  // undo any shrink
17962       }
17963     }
17964   }
17965   else { $recalculate = 1; }
17966 
17967   if ($recalculate > $this->shrink_this_table_to_fit && !$forcerecalc) { $recalculate = $this->shrink_this_table_to_fit; } // mPDF 4.2.005
17968 
17969   $iteration = 2;
17970 
17971   // RECALCULATE
17972   while($recalculate <> 1) {
17973     $this->shrin_k1 = $recalculate ;
17974     $this->shrin_k *= $recalculate ;
17975     $this->default_font_size /= ($this->shrin_k1) ;
17976     $this->SetFontSize($this->default_font_size, false );
17977     $this->SetLineHeight('',$this->table_lineheight);
17978     $this->table = $save_table;
17979     if ($this->shrin_k <> 1) { $this->shrinkTable($this->table[1][1],$this->shrin_k); }
17980     $this->_tableColumnWidth($this->table[1][1],false); // repeat
17981 
17982     // Starting at $this->innermostTableLevel
17983     // Shrink table values - and redo columnWidth
17984     for($lvl=2;$lvl<=$this->innermostTableLevel;$lvl++) {
17985       for ($nid=1; $nid<=$this->tbctr[$lvl]; $nid++) {
17986         if ($this->shrin_k <> 1) { $this->shrinkTable($this->table[$lvl][$nid],$this->shrin_k); }
17987         $this->_tableColumnWidth($this->table[$lvl][$nid],false);
17988       }
17989     }
17990     // Set table cell widths for top level table
17991 
17992     // Top level table
17993     $this->_tableWidth($this->table[1][1]);
17994 
17995     // Now work through any nested tables setting child table[w'] = parent cell['w']
17996     // Now do nested tables _tableWidth
17997     for($lvl=2;$lvl<=$this->innermostTableLevel;$lvl++) {
17998       for ($nid=1; $nid<=$this->tbctr[$lvl]; $nid++) {
17999         // HERE set child table width = cell width
18000 
18001         list($parentrow, $parentcol, $parentnid) = $this->table[$lvl][$nid]['nestedpos'];
18002         if (isset($this->table[($lvl-1)][$parentnid]['cells'][$parentrow][$parentcol]['colspan']) && $this->table[($lvl-1)][$parentnid]['cells'][$parentrow][$parentcol]['colspan']> 1) {
18003            $parentwidth = 0;
18004            for($cs=0;$cs<$this->table[($lvl-1)][$parentnid]['cells'][$parentrow][$parentcol]['colspan'] ; $cs++) {
18005           $parentwidth += $this->table[($lvl-1)][$parentnid]['wc'][$parentcol+$cs]; 
18006            }
18007         }
18008         else { $parentwidth = $this->table[($lvl-1)][$parentnid]['wc'][$parentcol]; }
18009 
18010         //$parentwidth -= ALLOW FOR PADDING ETC.in parent cell
18011         // mPDF 4.3.006
18012         if (!$this->simpleTables){  // mPDF 4.2.017
18013          // mPDF 4.3.009
18014          if ($this->packTableData) {
18015           list($bt,$br,$bb,$bl) = $this->_getBorderWidths($this->table[($lvl-1)][$parentnid]['cells'][$parentrow][$parentcol]['borderbin']);
18016          }
18017          else { 
18018           $br = $this->table[($lvl-1)][$parentnid]['cells'][$parentrow][$parentcol]['border_details']['R']['w'];
18019           $bl = $this->table[($lvl-1)][$parentnid]['cells'][$parentrow][$parentcol]['border_details']['L']['w'];
18020          }
18021          if ($this->table[$lvl-1][$parentnid]['borders_separate']) {
18022           $parentwidth -= $br + $bl
18023           + $this->table[($lvl-1)][$parentnid]['cells'][$parentrow][$parentcol]['padding']['L']
18024           + $this->table[($lvl-1)][$parentnid]['cells'][$parentrow][$parentcol]['padding']['R']
18025           + $this->table[($lvl-1)][$parentnid]['border_spacing_H'];
18026          }
18027          else {
18028           $parentwidth -= $br/2 + $bl/2
18029           + $this->table[($lvl-1)][$parentnid]['cells'][$parentrow][$parentcol]['padding']['L']
18030           + $this->table[($lvl-1)][$parentnid]['cells'][$parentrow][$parentcol]['padding']['R'];
18031          }
18032         }
18033         else if ($this->simpleTables){
18034          if ($this->table[$lvl-1][$parentnid]['borders_separate']) {
18035           $parentwidth -= $this->table[($lvl-1)][$parentnid]['simple']['border_details']['L']['w']
18036           + $this->table[($lvl-1)][$parentnid]['simple']['border_details']['R']['w']
18037           + $this->table[($lvl-1)][$parentnid]['cells'][$parentrow][$parentcol]['padding']['L']
18038           + $this->table[($lvl-1)][$parentnid]['cells'][$parentrow][$parentcol]['padding']['R']
18039           + $this->table[($lvl-1)][$parentnid]['border_spacing_H'];
18040          }
18041          else {
18042           $parentwidth -= ($this->table[($lvl-1)][$parentnid]['simple']['border_details']['L']['w']
18043           + $this->table[($lvl-1)][$parentnid]['simple']['border_details']['R']['w']) /2
18044           + $this->table[($lvl-1)][$parentnid]['cells'][$parentrow][$parentcol]['padding']['L']
18045           + $this->table[($lvl-1)][$parentnid]['cells'][$parentrow][$parentcol]['padding']['R'];
18046          }
18047         }
18048   
18049         if (isset($this->table[$lvl][$nid]['wpercent']) && $this->table[$lvl][$nid]['wpercent'] && $lvl>1) {
18050           $this->table[$lvl][$nid]['w'] = $parentwidth;
18051         }
18052         else if ($parentwidth > $this->table[$lvl][$nid]['maw']) {
18053           $this->table[$lvl][$nid]['w'] = $this->table[$lvl][$nid]['maw'] ;
18054         }
18055         else {
18056           $this->table[$lvl][$nid]['w'] = $parentwidth;
18057         }
18058         $this->_tableWidth($this->table[$lvl][$nid]);
18059       }
18060     }
18061   
18062 
18063     // Starting at $this->innermostTableLevel
18064     // Cascade back up nested tables: setting heights back up the tree
18065     for($lvl=$this->innermostTableLevel;$lvl>0;$lvl--) {
18066       for ($nid=1; $nid<=$this->tbctr[$lvl]; $nid++) {
18067         list($tableheight,$maxrowheight,$fullpage,$remainingpage) = $this->_tableHeight($this->table[$lvl][$nid]);
18068       }
18069     }
18070 
18071     // RESIZING ALGORITHM
18072 
18073     if ($maxrowheight > $fullpage) { $recalculate = $this->tbsqrt($maxrowheight / $fullpage, $iteration); $iteration++; }
18074     else if ($this->table_rotate && $tableheight > $remainingpage && !$added_page) { 
18075       // If can fit on remainder of page whilst respecting autosize value..
18076       if (($this->shrin_k * $this->tbsqrt($tableheight / $remainingpage, $iteration)) <= $this->shrink_this_table_to_fit) {
18077         $recalculate = $this->tbsqrt($tableheight / $remainingpage, $iteration); $iteration++; 
18078       }
18079       else {
18080         if (!$added_page) { 
18081           $this->AddPage($this->CurOrientation); 
18082           $added_page = true;
18083           $this->kwt_moved = true; 
18084           $this->tbrot_maxw = $this->h - ($this->y + $this->bMargin + 5) - $this->kwt_height;
18085         }
18086         // mPDF 3.0 added 0.001 to force it to recalculate
18087         $recalculate = (1 / $this->shrin_k) + 0.001;  // undo any shrink
18088       }
18089     }
18090     else if ($this->table_keep_together) {
18091       if ($tableheight > $fullpage) { 
18092         if (($this->shrin_k * $this->tbsqrt($tableheight / $fullpage, $iteration)) <= $this->shrink_this_table_to_fit) {
18093           $recalculate = $this->tbsqrt($tableheight / $fullpage, $iteration); $iteration++; 
18094         }
18095         else {
18096            if (!$added_page) { 
18097           $this->AddPage($this->CurOrientation);
18098           $added_page = true;
18099           $this->kwt_moved = true; 
18100           $this->tbrot_maxw = $this->h - ($this->y + $this->bMargin + 5) - $this->kwt_height;
18101            }
18102            $recalculate = $this->tbsqrt($tableheight / $fullpage, $iteration); $iteration++; 
18103         }
18104       }
18105       else if ($tableheight > $remainingpage) { 
18106         // If can fit on remainder of page whilst respecting autosize value..
18107         if (($this->shrin_k * $this->tbsqrt($tableheight / $remainingpage, $iteration)) <= $this->shrink_this_table_to_fit) {
18108           $recalculate = $this->tbsqrt($tableheight / $remainingpage, $iteration);  $iteration++; 
18109         }
18110         else {
18111           if (!$added_page) { 
18112             $this->AddPage($this->CurOrientation); 
18113             $added_page = true;
18114             $this->kwt_moved = true; 
18115             $this->tbrot_maxw = $this->h - ($this->y + $this->bMargin + 5) - $this->kwt_height;
18116           }
18117           // mPDF 4.0 
18118           //$recalculate = $this->tbsqrt($tableheight / $fullpage, $iteration); $iteration++; 
18119           $recalculate = (1 / $this->shrin_k) + 0.001;  // undo any shrink
18120         }
18121       }
18122       else { $recalculate = 1; }
18123     }
18124     else { $recalculate = 1; }
18125   }
18126 
18127   // keep-with-table: if page has advanced, print out buffer now, else done in fn. _Tablewrite()
18128   if ($this->kwt_saved && $this->kwt_moved) {
18129     $this->printkwtbuffer();
18130     $this->kwt_moved = false;
18131     $this->kwt_saved = false;
18132   }
18133 
18134   if ($this->progressBar) { $this->UpdateProgressBar(7,30,' '); } // *PROGRESS-BAR*
18135   // Recursively writes all tables starting at top level
18136   $this->_tableWrite($this->table[1][1]);
18137 
18138   if ($this->table_rotate && count($this->tablebuffer)) {
18139     $this->PageBreakTrigger=$this->h-$this->bMargin;
18140     $save_tr = $this->table_rotate;
18141     $save_y = $this->y;
18142     $this->table_rotate = 0;
18143     $this->y = $this->tbrot_y0;
18144     $h =  $this->tbrot_w;
18145     $this->DivLn($h,$this->blklvl,true);
18146 
18147     $this->table_rotate = $save_tr;
18148     $this->y = $save_y;
18149 
18150     $this->printtablebuffer();
18151   }
18152 
18153   $this->table_rotate = 0;  // flag used for table rotation
18154 
18155   $this->x = $this->lMargin + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['outer_left_margin'];
18156 
18157   // mPDF 4.2
18158   $this->blockjustfinished=true;
18159   $this->lastblockbottommargin = $this->table[1][1]['margin']['B'];
18160   //Reset values
18161 
18162   // Keep-with-table
18163   $this->kwt = false;
18164   $this->kwt_y0 = 0;
18165   $this->kwt_x0 = 0;
18166   $this->kwt_height = 0;
18167   $this->kwt_buffer = array();
18168   $this->kwt_Links = array();
18169   $this->kwt_Annots = array();
18170   $this->kwt_moved = false;
18171   $this->kwt_saved = false;
18172   // mPDF 3.0
18173   $this->kwt_Reference = array();
18174   $this->kwt_BMoutlines = array();
18175   $this->kwt_toc = array();
18176 
18177   $this->shrin_k = 1;
18178   $this->shrink_this_table_to_fit = 0;
18179 
18180   unset($this->table);
18181   $this->table=array(); //array 
18182   $this->tableLevel=0;
18183   $this->tbctr=array();
18184   $this->innermostTableLevel=0;
18185   $this->tbCSSlvl = 0;
18186   $this->tablecascadeCSS = array();
18187 
18188   unset($this->cell);
18189   $this->cell=array(); //array 
18190 
18191   $this->col=-1; //int
18192   $this->row=-1; //int
18193   $this->Reset();
18194 
18195   $this->cellPaddingL = 0;
18196   $this->cellPaddingT = 0;
18197   $this->cellPaddingR = 0;
18198   $this->cellPaddingB = 0;
18199   $this->cMarginL = 0;
18200   $this->cMarginT = 0;
18201   $this->cMarginR = 0;
18202   $this->cMarginB = 0;
18203   $this->default_font_size = $this->original_default_font_size;
18204   $this->default_font = $this->original_default_font;
18205     $this->SetFontSize($this->default_font_size, false);
18206   $this->SetFont($this->default_font,'',0,false);
18207   $this->SetLineHeight();
18208   if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['InlineProperties'])) { $this->restoreInlineProperties($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['InlineProperties']);}
18209   if ($this->progressBar) { $this->UpdateProgressBar(7,100,' '); }  // *PROGRESS-BAR*
18210 
18211     }
18212 /*-- END TABLES --*/
18213 
18214 
18215 /*-- LISTS --*/
18216   // *********** LISTS ********************
18217 
18218     if($tag=='LI') { 
18219   $this->lastoptionaltag = ''; 
18220   unset($this->listcascadeCSS[$this->listCSSlvl]);
18221   $this->listCSSlvl--;
18222   if (isset($this->listoccur[$this->listlvl]) && isset($this->InlineProperties['LIST'][$this->listlvl][$this->listoccur[$this->listlvl]])) { $this->restoreInlineProperties($this->InlineProperties['LIST'][$this->listlvl][$this->listoccur[$this->listlvl]]); } 
18223     }
18224 
18225 
18226     if(($tag=='UL') or ($tag=='OL')) {
18227       $this->ignorefollowingspaces = true; //Eliminate exceeding left-side spaces
18228   unset($this->listcascadeCSS[$this->listCSSlvl]);
18229   $this->listCSSlvl--;
18230 
18231   $this->lastoptionaltag = '';
18232 /*-- TABLES --*/
18233   // A simple list for inside a table
18234   if($this->tableLevel) {
18235     $this->listlist[$this->listlvl]['MAXNUM'] = $this->listnum; //save previous lvl's maxnum
18236     unset($this->listlist[$this->listlvl]);
18237     $this->listlvl--;
18238     if (isset($this->listlist[$this->listlvl]['MAXNUM'])) { $this->listnum = $this->listlist[$this->listlvl]['MAXNUM']; } // restore previous levels
18239     if ($this->listlvl == 0) { $this->listjustfinished = true; }
18240     return;
18241   }
18242 /*-- END TABLES --*/
18243 
18244   if ($this->listlvl > 1) { // returning one level
18245     $this->listjustfinished=true;
18246     if (!empty($this->textbuffer)) { 
18247       $this->listitem[] = array($this->listlvl,$this->listnum,$this->textbuffer,$this->listoccur[$this->listlvl],$this->listitemtype);
18248     }
18249     // mPDF 3.0
18250     else { 
18251       $this->listnum--;
18252     }
18253 
18254     $this->textbuffer = array();
18255     $occur = $this->listoccur[$this->listlvl]; 
18256     $this->listlist[$this->listlvl][$occur]['MAXNUM'] = $this->listnum; //save previous lvl's maxnum
18257     $this->listlvl--;
18258     $occur = $this->listoccur[$this->listlvl];
18259     $this->listnum = $this->listlist[$this->listlvl][$occur]['MAXNUM']; // recover previous level's number
18260     $this->listtype = $this->listlist[$this->listlvl][$occur]['TYPE']; // recover previous level's type
18261     if ($this->InlineProperties['LIST'][$this->listlvl][$occur]) { $this->restoreInlineProperties($this->InlineProperties['LIST'][$this->listlvl][$occur]); }
18262 
18263   }
18264   else { // We are closing the last OL/UL tag
18265     if (!empty($this->textbuffer)) {
18266       $this->listitem[] = array($this->listlvl,$this->listnum,$this->textbuffer,$this->listoccur[$this->listlvl],$this->listitemtype);
18267     }
18268     // mPDF 3.0
18269     else { 
18270       $this->listnum--;
18271     }
18272 
18273     $occur = $this->listoccur[$this->listlvl]; 
18274     $this->listlist[$this->listlvl][$occur]['MAXNUM'] = $this->listnum;
18275     $this->textbuffer = array();
18276     $this->listlvl--;
18277 
18278     $this->printlistbuffer();
18279     unset($this->InlineProperties['LIST']);
18280     // SPACING AFTER LIST (Top level only)
18281     $this->Ln(0);
18282     if ($this->list_margin_bottom) {
18283       $this->DivLn($this->list_margin_bottom,$this->blklvl,true,1);   // collapsible
18284     }
18285     if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['InlineProperties'])) { $this->restoreInlineProperties($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['InlineProperties']);}
18286     $this->listjustfinished = true; 
18287     $this->listCSSlvl = 0;
18288     $this->listcascadeCSS = array();
18289     // mPDF 4.2
18290     $this->blockjustfinished=true;
18291     $this->lastblockbottommargin = $this->list_margin_bottom;
18292   }
18293     }
18294 /*-- END LISTS --*/
18295 
18296 
18297 }
18298 
18299 
18300 /*-- TABLES --*/
18301 // This function determines the shrink factor when resizing tables
18302 // val is the table_height / page_height_available
18303 // returns a scaling factor used as $shrin_k to resize the table
18304 // Overcompensating will be quicker but may unnecessarily shrink table too much
18305 // Undercompensating means it will reiterate more times (taking more processing time)
18306 function tbsqrt($val, $iteration=3) {
18307   $k = 4; // Alters number of iterations until it returns $val itself - Must be > 2
18308   // Probably best guess and most accurate
18309   if ($iteration==1) return sqrt($val);
18310   // Faster than using sqrt (because it won't undercompensate), and gives reasonable results
18311   //return 1+(($val-1)/2);
18312   if (2-(($iteration-2)/($k-2)) == 0) { return $val; }
18313   return 1+(($val-1)/(2-(($iteration-2)/($k-2))));
18314 }
18315 /*-- END TABLES --*/
18316 
18317 
18318 /*-- LISTS --*/
18319 function printlistbuffer() {
18320     //Save x coordinate
18321     $x = $this->lMargin + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['outer_left_margin'];
18322     $this->cMarginL = 0;
18323     $this->cMarginR = 0;
18324     $currIndentLvl = -1;
18325     $lastIndent = array();
18326     $bak_page = $this->page;
18327     $indent = 0;  // mPDF 3.0
18328     foreach($this->listitem as $item)
18329     {
18330   // COLS
18331   $oldcolumn = $this->CurrCol;
18332 
18333     $this->bulletarray = array();
18334         //Get list's buffered data
18335         $this->listlvl = $lvl = $item[0];
18336         $num = $item[1];
18337         $this->textbuffer = $item[2];
18338         $occur = $item[3];
18339     if ($item[4]) { $type = $item[4]; } // listitemtype
18340     else { $type = $this->listlist[$lvl][$occur]['TYPE']; }
18341         $maxnum = $this->listlist[$lvl][$occur]['MAXNUM'];
18342     $this->restoreInlineProperties($this->InlineProperties['LIST'][$lvl][$occur]);
18343     $this->SetFont($this->FontFamily,$this->FontStyle,$this->FontSizePt,true,true); // force to write
18344     $clh = $this->FontSize;
18345 
18346     // mPDF 4.2
18347     $this->SetLineHeight($this->FontSizePt,$this->list_lineheight[$lvl][$occur]);
18348     $this->listOcc = $occur; 
18349     $this->listnum = $num; 
18350 
18351     // Set the bullet fontsize
18352     $bullfs = $this->InlineProperties['LISTITEM'][$lvl][$occur][$num]['size'];
18353 
18354         $space_width = $this->GetStringWidth(' ') * 1.5;
18355 
18356         //Set default width & height values
18357         $this->divwidth = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'];
18358         $this->divheight = $this->lineheight;
18359     $typefont = $this->FontFamily;
18360         switch($type) //Format type
18361         {
18362           case 'none':
18363       $type = '';
18364             $blt_width = 0;
18365              break;
18366           case 'A':
18367               $anum = $this->dec2alpha($num,true);
18368               $maxnum = $this->dec2alpha($maxnum,true);
18369       if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { $type = $this->list_number_suffix . $anum; }
18370       else { $type = $anum . $this->list_number_suffix; }
18371             $blt_width = $this->GetStringWidth(str_repeat('W',strlen($maxnum)).$this->list_number_suffix);
18372              break;
18373           case 'a':
18374               $anum = $this->dec2alpha($num,false);
18375               $maxnum = $this->dec2alpha($maxnum,false);
18376       if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { $type = $this->list_number_suffix . $anum; }
18377       else { $type = $anum . $this->list_number_suffix; }
18378           $blt_width = $this->GetStringWidth(str_repeat('m',strlen($maxnum)).$this->list_number_suffix);
18379              break;
18380           case 'I':
18381               $anum = $this->dec2roman($num,true);
18382       if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { $type = $this->list_number_suffix . $anum; }
18383       else { $type = $anum . $this->list_number_suffix; }
18384       // mPDF 4.0
18385       if ($maxnum>87) { $bbit = 87; }
18386       else if ($maxnum>86) { $bbit = 86; }
18387       else if ($maxnum>37) { $bbit = 38; }
18388       else if ($maxnum>36) { $bbit = 37; }
18389       else if ($maxnum>27) { $bbit = 28; }
18390       else if ($maxnum>26) { $bbit = 27; }
18391       else if ($maxnum>17) { $bbit = 18; }
18392       else if ($maxnum>16) { $bbit = 17; }
18393       else if ($maxnum>7) { $bbit = 8; }
18394       else if ($maxnum>6) { $bbit = 7; }
18395       else if ($maxnum>3) { $bbit = 4; }
18396       else { $bbit = $maxnum; }
18397               $maxlnum = $this->dec2roman($bbit,true);
18398           $blt_width = $this->GetStringWidth($maxlnum.$this->list_number_suffix);
18399               break;
18400           case 'i':
18401               $anum = $this->dec2roman($num,false);
18402       if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { $type = $this->list_number_suffix . $anum; }
18403       else { $type = $anum . $this->list_number_suffix; }
18404       // mPDF 4.0
18405       if ($maxnum>87) { $bbit = 87; }
18406       else if ($maxnum>86) { $bbit = 86; }
18407       else if ($maxnum>37) { $bbit = 38; }
18408       else if ($maxnum>36) { $bbit = 37; }
18409       else if ($maxnum>27) { $bbit = 28; }
18410       else if ($maxnum>26) { $bbit = 27; }
18411       else if ($maxnum>17) { $bbit = 18; }
18412       else if ($maxnum>16) { $bbit = 17; }
18413       else if ($maxnum>7) { $bbit = 8; }
18414       else if ($maxnum>6) { $bbit = 7; }
18415       else if ($maxnum>3) { $bbit = 4; }
18416       else { $bbit = $maxnum; }
18417               $maxlnum = $this->dec2roman($bbit,false);
18418       // mPDF 4.0
18419           $blt_width = $this->GetStringWidth($maxlnum.$this->list_number_suffix);
18420               break;
18421           case 'disc':
18422       // mPDF 4.2.018
18423       if ($this->PDFA) {
18424       if (isset($this->CurrentFont['cw'][8226])) { $type = "\xe2\x80\xa2"; }  // &#8226; 
18425       else { $type = '-'; }
18426         $blt_width = $this->GetStringWidth($type);
18427       break;
18428       }
18429               $type = $this->chrs[108]; // bullet disc in Zapfdingbats  'l'
18430       $typefont = 'zapfdingbats';
18431       $blt_width = (0.791 * $this->FontSize/2.5); 
18432               break;
18433           case 'circle':
18434       // mPDF 4.2.018
18435       if ($this->PDFA) {
18436       if (isset($this->CurrentFont['cw'][9900])) { $type = "\xe2\x9a\xac"; } // &#9900; 
18437       else { $type = '-'; }
18438         $blt_width = $this->GetStringWidth($type);
18439       break;
18440       }
18441               $type = $this->chrs[109]; // circle in Zapfdingbats   'm'
18442       $typefont = 'zapfdingbats';
18443       $blt_width = (0.873 * $this->FontSize/2.5); 
18444               break;
18445           case 'square':
18446       // mPDF 4.2.018
18447       if ($this->PDFA) {
18448       if (isset($this->CurrentFont['cw'][9642])) { $type = "\xe2\x96\xaa"; } // &#9642; 
18449       else { $type = '-'; }
18450         $blt_width = $this->GetStringWidth($type);
18451       break;
18452       }
18453               $type = $this->chrs[110]; //black square in Zapfdingbats font   'n'
18454       $typefont = 'zapfdingbats';
18455       $blt_width = (0.761 * $this->FontSize/2.5); 
18456               break;
18457           case '1':
18458       default:
18459       if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { $type = $this->list_number_suffix . $num; }
18460       else { $type = $num . $this->list_number_suffix; }
18461           $blt_width = $this->GetStringWidth(str_repeat('5',strlen($maxnum)).$this->list_number_suffix);
18462               break;
18463         }
18464   if ($currIndentLvl < $lvl) {
18465     if ($lvl > 1 || $this->list_indent_first_level) { 
18466       $indent += $this->list_indent[$lvl][$occur]; 
18467       $lastIndent[$lvl] = $this->list_indent[$lvl][$occur];
18468     }
18469   }
18470   else if ($currIndentLvl > $lvl) {
18471     while ($currIndentLvl > $lvl) {
18472     $indent -= $lastIndent[$currIndentLvl];
18473     $currIndentLvl--;
18474     }
18475   }
18476   $currIndentLvl = $lvl;
18477 
18478   // mPDF 3.0
18479   if (isset($this->list_align[$this->listlvl][$occur])) { $this->divalign = $this->list_align[$this->listlvl][$occur]; }
18480   else { $this->divalign = ''; }
18481 
18482 /*-- RTL --*/
18483 
18484   if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { 
18485     // mPDF 4.0
18486     if ($this->list_align_style == 'L') { $lalign = 'R'; }
18487     else { $lalign = 'L';  }
18488         $this->divwidth = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['width'] - ($indent + $blt_width + $space_width) ;
18489         $xb = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_left']['w'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_left'] - $indent - $blt_width; //Bullet position (relative)
18490         //Output bullet
18491     $this->bulletarray = array('w'=>$blt_width,'h'=>$clh,'txt'=>$type,'x'=>$xb,'align'=>$lalign,'font'=>$typefont,'level'=>$lvl, 'occur'=>$occur, 'num'=>$num, 'fontsize'=>$bullfs );
18492     $this->x = $x;
18493   }
18494   else {
18495 /*-- END RTL --*/
18496     // mPDF 4.0
18497     if ($this->list_align_style == 'L') { $lalign = 'L'; }
18498     else { $lalign = 'R';  }
18499         $this->divwidth = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['width'] - ($indent + $blt_width + $space_width) ;
18500     $xb =  $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_left'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_left']['w'] - $blt_width - $space_width; 
18501         //Output bullet
18502     $this->bulletarray = array('w'=>$blt_width,'h'=>$clh,'txt'=>$type,'x'=>$xb,'align'=>$lalign,'font'=>$typefont,'level'=>$lvl, 'occur'=>$occur, 'num'=>$num, 'fontsize'=>$bullfs );
18503     $this->x = $x + $indent + $blt_width + $space_width;
18504   } // *RTL*
18505 
18506       //Print content
18507     $this->printbuffer($this->textbuffer,'',false,true);
18508       $this->textbuffer=array();
18509 
18510   // Added to correct for OddEven Margins
18511     if  ($this->page != $bak_page) {
18512     if (($this->page-$bak_page) % 2 == 1) { // mPDF 4.2.022
18513       $x += $this->MarginCorrection;
18514     }
18515     $bak_page = $this->page;
18516   }
18517 /*-- COLUMNS --*/
18518   // OR COLUMN CHANGE
18519   if ($this->CurrCol != $oldcolumn) {
18520     if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { // *RTL*
18521       $x -= ($this->CurrCol - $oldcolumn) * ($this->ColWidth+$this->ColGap);  // *RTL*
18522     } // *RTL*
18523     else {  // *RTL*
18524       $x += ($this->CurrCol - $oldcolumn) * ($this->ColWidth+$this->ColGap);
18525     } // *RTL*
18526     $oldcolumn = $this->CurrCol;
18527   }
18528 /*-- END COLUMNS --*/
18529 
18530     }
18531 
18532     //Reset all used values
18533     $this->listoccur = array();
18534     $this->listitem = array();
18535     $this->listlist = array();
18536     $this->listlvl = 0;
18537     $this->listnum = 0;
18538     $this->listtype = '';
18539     $this->textbuffer = array();
18540     $this->divwidth = 0;
18541     $this->divheight = 0;
18542     $this->x = $this->lMargin + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['outer_left_margin'];
18543 }
18544 /*-- END LISTS --*/
18545 
18546 
18547 function printbuffer($arrayaux,$blockstate=0,$is_table=false,$is_list=false)
18548 {
18549 // $blockstate = 0; // NO margins/padding
18550 // $blockstate = 1; // Top margins/padding only
18551 // $blockstate = 2; // Bottom margins/padding only
18552 // $blockstate = 3; // Top & bottom margins/padding
18553   $this->spanbgcolorarray = array();
18554   $this->spanbgcolor = false;
18555   $paint_ht_corr = 0;
18556 
18557 /*-- CSS-FLOAT --*/
18558   if (count($this->floatDivs)) {
18559     list($l_exists, $r_exists, $l_max, $r_max, $l_width, $r_width) = $this->GetFloatDivInfo($this->blklvl);
18560     if (($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width']-$l_width-$r_width) < $this->GetStringWidth('WW')) {
18561       // Too narrow to fit - try to move down past L or R float
18562       if ($l_max < $r_max && ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width']-$r_width) > $this->GetStringWidth('WW')) {
18563         $this->ClearFloats('LEFT', $this->blklvl); 
18564       }
18565       else if ($r_max < $l_max && ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width']-$l_width) > $this->GetStringWidth('WW')) {
18566         $this->ClearFloats('RIGHT', $this->blklvl); 
18567       }
18568       else { $this->ClearFloats('BOTH', $this->blklvl); }
18569     }
18570   }
18571 /*-- END CSS-FLOAT --*/
18572       $bak_y = $this->y;
18573   $bak_x = $this->x;
18574   $align = '';
18575   if (!$is_table && !$is_list) {
18576     if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['align']) && $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['align']) { $align = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['align']; }
18577     // Block-align is set by e.g. <.. align="center"> Takes priority for this block but not inherited
18578     if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['block-align']) && $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['block-align']) { $align = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['block-align']; }
18579     $this->divwidth = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['width'];
18580   }
18581   else {
18582     $align = $this->divalign;
18583   }
18584   $oldpage = $this->page;
18585 
18586   // ADDED for Out of Block now done as Flowing Block
18587   if ($this->divwidth == 0) { 
18588     $this->divwidth = $this->pgwidth; 
18589   }
18590 
18591   if (!$is_table && !$is_list) { $this->SetLineHeight($this->FontSizePt,$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['line_height']); }
18592   $this->divheight = $this->lineheight;
18593   $old_height = $this->divheight;
18594 
18595     // As a failsafe - if font has been set but not output to page
18596     $this->SetFont($this->default_font,'',$this->default_font_size,true,true);  // force output to page
18597 
18598     $array_size = count($arrayaux);
18599     $this->newFlowingBlock( $this->divwidth,$this->divheight,$align,$is_table,$is_list,$blockstate,true); // true = newblock
18600 
18601   // Added - Otherwise <div><div><p> did not output top margins/padding for 1st/2nd div
18602     if ($array_size == 0) { $this->finishFlowingBlock(true); }  // true = END of flowing block
18603 
18604     for($i=0;$i < $array_size; $i++)
18605     {
18606 
18607   // COLS
18608   $oldcolumn = $this->CurrCol;
18609 
18610       $vetor = $arrayaux[$i];
18611       if ($i == 0 and $vetor[0] != "\n" and !$this->ispre) {
18612     $vetor[0] = ltrim($vetor[0]);
18613   }
18614 
18615   // FIXED TO ALLOW IT TO SHOW '0' 
18616       if (empty($vetor[0]) && !($vetor[0]==='0') && empty($vetor[7])) { //Ignore empty text and not carrying an internal link
18617     //Check if it is the last element. If so then finish printing the block
18618         if ($i == ($array_size-1)) { $this->finishFlowingBlock(true); } // true = END of flowing block
18619     continue;
18620   }
18621 
18622 
18623       //Activating buffer properties
18624       if(isset($vetor[11]) and $vetor[11] != '') {   // Font Size
18625     if ($is_table && $this->shrin_k) {
18626       $this->SetFontSize($vetor[11]/$this->shrin_k,false); 
18627     }
18628     else {
18629       $this->SetFontSize($vetor[11],false); 
18630     }
18631   }
18632       if(isset($vetor[10]) and !empty($vetor[10])) //Background color
18633       {
18634     $this->spanbgcolorarray = $vetor[10];
18635     $this->spanbgcolor = true;
18636       }
18637       if(isset($vetor[9]) and !empty($vetor[9])) // Outline parameters
18638       {
18639           $cor = $vetor[9]['COLOR'];
18640           $outlinewidth = $vetor[9]['WIDTH'];
18641           $this->SetTextOutline($outlinewidth,$cor['R'],$cor['G'],$cor['B']);
18642           $this->outline_on = true;
18643       }
18644       if(isset($vetor[8]) and $vetor[8] === true) // strike-through the text
18645       {
18646           $this->strike = true;
18647       }
18648       if(isset($vetor[7]) and $vetor[7] != '') // internal link: <a name="anyvalue">
18649       {
18650     if ($this->ColActive) { $ily = $this->y0; } else { $ily = $this->y; } // use top of columns
18651         $this->internallink[$vetor[7]] = array("Y"=>$ily,"PAGE"=>$this->page );
18652         if (empty($vetor[0])) { //Ignore empty text
18653     //Check if it is the last element. If so then finish printing the block
18654         if ($i == ($array_size-1)) { $this->finishFlowingBlock(true); } // true = END of flowing block
18655     continue;
18656     }
18657       }
18658       if(isset($vetor[6]) and $vetor[6] === true) // Subscript 
18659       {
18660       $this->SUB = true;
18661       }
18662       if(isset($vetor[5]) and $vetor[5] === true) // Superscript
18663       {
18664     $this->SUP = true;
18665       }
18666       if(isset($vetor[4]) and $vetor[4] != '') {  // Font Family
18667     $font = $this->SetFont($vetor[4],$this->FontStyle,0,false); 
18668   }
18669       if (!empty($vetor[3])) //Font Color
18670       {
18671     $cor = $vetor[3];
18672     $this->SetTextColor($cor['R'],$cor['G'],$cor['B']);
18673       }
18674       if(isset($vetor[2]) and $vetor[2] != '') //Bold,Italic,Underline styles
18675       {
18676           if (strpos($vetor[2],"B") !== false) $this->SetStyle('B',true);
18677           if (strpos($vetor[2],"I") !== false) $this->SetStyle('I',true);
18678           if (strpos($vetor[2],"U") !== false) $this->SetStyle('U',true); 
18679       }
18680   // mPDF 4.2
18681       if(isset($vetor[12]) and $vetor[12] != '') { //Requested Bold,Italic,Underline
18682     $this->ReqFontStyle = $vetor[12];
18683       }
18684       if(isset($vetor[1]) and $vetor[1] != '') //LINK
18685       {
18686     // mPDF 3.0
18687         if (strpos($vetor[1],".") === false && strpos($vetor[1],"@") !== 0) //assuming every external link has a dot indicating extension (e.g: .html .txt .zip www.somewhere.com etc.) 
18688         {
18689           //Repeated reference to same anchor?
18690           while(array_key_exists($vetor[1],$this->internallink)) $vetor[1]="#".$vetor[1];
18691           $this->internallink[$vetor[1]] = $this->AddLink();
18692           $vetor[1] = $this->internallink[$vetor[1]];
18693         }
18694         $this->HREF = $vetor[1];          // HREF link style set here ******
18695       }
18696 
18697   // SPECIAL CONTENT - IMAGES & FORM OBJECTS
18698       //Print-out special content
18699   // mPDF 3.0
18700       if (substr($vetor[0],0,3) == "\xbb\xa4\xac") { //identifier has been identified!
18701     // mPDF 4.0
18702     $objattr = $this->_getObjAttr($vetor[0]);
18703 
18704 /*-- TABLES --*/
18705     if ($objattr['type'] == 'nestedtable') {
18706     $level = $objattr['level'];
18707     $table = &$this->table[$level][$objattr['table']];
18708     $cell = &$table['cells'][$objattr['row']][$objattr['col']];
18709     if ($objattr['nestedcontent']) {
18710               $this->finishFlowingBlock(false,'nestedtable'); // mPDF 4.3.003
18711       $save_dw = $this->divwidth ;
18712       $save_buffer = $this->cellBorderBuffer;
18713       $this->cellBorderBuffer = array();
18714       $ncx = $this->x;
18715 
18716       //$w = $cell['w'];  // parent cell width  // mPDF 3.0 ? not needed
18717 
18718       list($dummyx,$w) = $this->_tableGetWidth($table, $objattr['row'], $objattr['col']);
18719       $ntw = $this->table[($level+1)][$objattr['nestedcontent']]['w'];  // nested table width
18720       if (!$this->simpleTables){  // mPDF 4.2.017
18721         if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
18722           $innerw = $w - $cell['border_details']['L']['w'] - $cell['border_details']['R']['w'] - $cell['padding']['L'] - $cell['padding']['R'] - $table['border_spacing_H'];
18723         }
18724         else {
18725           $innerw = $w - $cell['border_details']['L']['w']/2 - $cell['border_details']['R']['w']/2 - $cell['padding']['L'] - $cell['padding']['R'];
18726         }
18727       }
18728       else if ($this->simpleTables){
18729         // mPDF 4.3.006
18730         if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
18731           $innerw = $w - $table['simple']['border_details']['L']['w'] - $table['simple']['border_details']['R']['w'] - $cell['padding']['L'] - $cell['padding']['R'] - $table['border_spacing_H'];
18732         }
18733         else {
18734           $innerw = $w - $table['simple']['border_details']['L']['w']/2 - $table['simple']['border_details']['R']['w']/2 - $cell['padding']['L'] - $cell['padding']['R'];
18735         }
18736       }
18737       if ($cell['a']=='C' || $this->table[($level+1)][$objattr['nestedcontent']]['a']=='C') { 
18738         $ncx += ($innerw-$ntw)/2; 
18739       }
18740       elseif ($cell['a']=='R' || $this->table[($level+1)][$objattr['nestedcontent']]['a']=='R') {
18741         $ncx += $innerw- $ntw; 
18742       } 
18743       $this->x = $ncx ;
18744 
18745       $this->_tableWrite($this->table[($level+1)][$objattr['nestedcontent']]);
18746       $this->cellBorderBuffer = $save_buffer;
18747       $this->x = $bak_x ;
18748       $this->divwidth  = $save_dw;
18749       $this->newFlowingBlock( $this->divwidth,$this->divheight,$align,$is_table,$is_list,$blockstate,false); 
18750     }
18751     }
18752     else {
18753 /*-- END TABLES --*/
18754     if ($is_table) {  // *TABLES*
18755       $maxWidth = $this->divwidth;  // *TABLES*
18756     } // *TABLES*
18757     else {  // *TABLES*
18758       $maxWidth = $this->divwidth - ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_left'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_left']['w'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_right'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_right']['w']); 
18759     } // *TABLES*
18760 
18761 /*-- CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT --*/
18762     // If float (already) exists at this level
18763     if (isset($this->floatmargins['R']) && $this->y <= $this->floatmargins['R']['y1'] && $this->y >= $this->floatmargins['R']['y0']) { $maxWidth -= $this->floatmargins['R']['w']; }
18764     if (isset($this->floatmargins['L']) && $this->y <= $this->floatmargins['L']['y1'] && $this->y >= $this->floatmargins['L']['y0']) { $maxWidth -= $this->floatmargins['L']['w']; }
18765 /*-- END CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT --*/
18766 
18767     list($skipln) = $this->inlineObject($objattr['type'], '', $this->y, $objattr,$this->lMargin, ($this->flowingBlockAttr['contentWidth']/$this->k), $maxWidth, $this->flowingBlockAttr['height'], false, $is_table);
18768     //  1 -> New line needed because of width
18769     // -1 -> Will fit width on line but NEW PAGE REQUIRED because of height
18770     // -2 -> Will not fit on line therefore needs new line but thus NEW PAGE REQUIRED
18771     $iby = $this->y;
18772     $oldpage = $this->page;
18773     $oldcol = $this->CurrCol; // mPDF 4.2
18774     if (($skipln == 1 || $skipln == -2) && !isset($objattr['float'])) {
18775               $this->finishFlowingBlock(false,$objattr['type']);  // mPDF 4.3.003
18776               $this->newFlowingBlock( $this->divwidth,$this->divheight,$align,$is_table,$is_list,$blockstate,false); //false=newblock
18777     }
18778     $thispage = $this->page;
18779     if ($this->CurrCol!=$oldcol) { $changedcol = true; }  // mPDF 4.2
18780     else { $changedcol=false; }
18781 
18782     // mPDF 4.2 Don't if column already changed (in finishFlowingblock)
18783     // the previous lines can already have triggered page break or column change
18784     if (!$changedcol && $skipln <0 && $this->AcceptPageBreak() && $thispage==$oldpage) {
18785 
18786       $this->AddPage($this->CurOrientation); 
18787 
18788         // Added to correct Images already set on line before page advanced
18789       // i.e. if second inline image on line is higher than first and forces new page
18790       if (count($this->objectbuffer)) {
18791         $yadj = $iby - $this->y;
18792         foreach($this->objectbuffer AS $ib=>$val) {
18793           if ($this->objectbuffer[$ib]['OUTER-Y'] ) $this->objectbuffer[$ib]['OUTER-Y'] -= $yadj;
18794           if ($this->objectbuffer[$ib]['BORDER-Y']) $this->objectbuffer[$ib]['BORDER-Y'] -= $yadj;
18795           if ($this->objectbuffer[$ib]['INNER-Y']) $this->objectbuffer[$ib]['INNER-Y'] -= $yadj;
18796         }
18797       }
18798     }
18799 
18800 
18801       // Added to correct for OddEven Margins
18802         if  ($this->page != $oldpage) {
18803       if (($this->page-$oldpage) % 2 == 1) { // mPDF 4.2.022
18804         $bak_x += $this->MarginCorrection;
18805       }
18806       $oldpage = $this->page;
18807         $y = $this->tMargin - $paint_ht_corr ;
18808         $this->oldy = $this->tMargin - $paint_ht_corr ;
18809         $old_height = 0;
18810     }
18811     $this->x = $bak_x;
18812 /*-- COLUMNS --*/
18813     // COLS
18814     // OR COLUMN CHANGE
18815     if ($this->CurrCol != $oldcolumn) {
18816       if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { // *RTL*
18817         $bak_x -= ($this->CurrCol - $oldcolumn) * ($this->ColWidth+$this->ColGap);  // *RTL*
18818       } // *RTL*
18819       else {  // *RTL*
18820         $bak_x += ($this->CurrCol - $oldcolumn) * ($this->ColWidth+$this->ColGap);
18821       } // *RTL*
18822       $this->x = $bak_x;
18823       $oldcolumn = $this->CurrCol;
18824       $y = $this->y0 - $paint_ht_corr ;
18825       $this->oldy = $this->y0 - $paint_ht_corr ;
18826       $old_height = 0;
18827     }
18828 /*-- END COLUMNS --*/
18829 
18830 /*-- CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT --*/
18831     if ($objattr['type'] == 'image' && isset($objattr['float'])) { 
18832       $fy = $this->y;
18833 
18834       // DIV TOP MARGIN/BORDER/PADDING
18835       if ($this->flowingBlockAttr['newblock'] && ($this->flowingBlockAttr['blockstate']==1 || $this->flowingBlockAttr['blockstate']==3) && $this->flowingBlockAttr['lineCount']== 0) { 
18836       $fy += $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['margin_top'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_top'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_top']['w'];
18837       }
18838 
18839       if ($objattr['float']=='R') {
18840       $fx = $this->w - $this->rMargin - $objattr['width'] - ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['outer_right_margin'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_right']['w'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_right']);
18841 
18842 
18843       }
18844       else if ($objattr['float']=='L') {
18845       $fx = $this->lMargin + ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['outer_left_margin'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_left']['w'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_left']);
18846       }
18847       $w = $objattr['width'];
18848       $h = abs($objattr['height']); 
18849 
18850       $widthLeft = $maxWidth - ($this->flowingBlockAttr['contentWidth']/$this->k);
18851       $maxHeight = $this->h - ($this->tMargin + $this->margin_header + $this->bMargin + 10) ;
18852       // For Images
18853       $extraWidth = ($objattr['border_left']['w'] + $objattr['border_right']['w'] + $objattr['margin_left']+ $objattr['margin_right']);
18854       $extraHeight = ($objattr['border_top']['w'] + $objattr['border_bottom']['w'] + $objattr['margin_top']+ $objattr['margin_bottom']);
18855 
18856     // mPDF 4.3.013 SVG files
18857       if ($objattr['itype'] == 'wmf' || $objattr['itype'] == 'svg') {
18858         $file = $objattr['file'];
18859         $info=$this->formobjects[$file];
18860       }
18861       else {
18862         $file = $objattr['file'];
18863         $info=$this->images[$file];
18864       }
18865       // Automatically resize to width remaining - ********** If > maxWidth *******
18866 //      if ($w > $widthLeft) {
18867 //        $w = $widthLeft ;
18868 //        $h=abs($w*$info['h']/$info['w']);
18869 //      }
18870       $img_w = $w - $extraWidth ;
18871       $img_h = $h - $extraHeight ;
18872       if ($objattr['border_left']['w']) {
18873         $objattr['BORDER-WIDTH'] = $img_w + (($objattr['border_left']['w'] + $objattr['border_right']['w'])/2) ;
18874         $objattr['BORDER-HEIGHT'] = $img_h + (($objattr['border_top']['w'] + $objattr['border_bottom']['w'])/2) ;
18875         $objattr['BORDER-X'] = $fx + $objattr['margin_left'] + (($objattr['border_left']['w'])/2) ;
18876         $objattr['BORDER-Y'] = $fy + $objattr['margin_top'] + (($objattr['border_top']['w'])/2) ;
18877       }
18878       $objattr['INNER-WIDTH'] = $img_w;
18879       $objattr['INNER-HEIGHT'] = $img_h;
18880       $objattr['INNER-X'] = $fx + $objattr['margin_left'] + ($objattr['border_left']['w']);
18881       $objattr['INNER-Y'] = $fy + $objattr['margin_top'] + ($objattr['border_top']['w']) ;
18882       $objattr['ID'] = $info['i'];
18883       $objattr['OUTER-WIDTH'] = $w;
18884       $objattr['OUTER-HEIGHT'] = $h;
18885       $objattr['OUTER-X'] = $fx;
18886       $objattr['OUTER-Y'] = $fy;
18887       if ($objattr['float']=='R') {
18888       // If R float already exists at this level
18889       $this->floatmargins['R']['skipline'] = false;  // mPDF 3.0
18890       if (isset($this->floatmargins['R']['y1']) && $this->floatmargins['R']['y1'] > 0 && $fy < $this->floatmargins['R']['y1']) {
18891         $this->WriteFlowingBlock($vetor[0]); 
18892       }
18893       // If L float already exists at this level
18894       else if (isset($this->floatmargins['L']['y1']) && $this->floatmargins['L']['y1'] > 0 && $fy < $this->floatmargins['L']['y1']) {
18895         // Final check distance between floats is not now too narrow to fit text
18896         $mw = $this->GetStringWidth('WW');
18897         if (($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'] - $w - $this->floatmargins['L']['w']) < $mw) {
18898           $this->WriteFlowingBlock($vetor[0]); 
18899         }
18900         else {
18901             $this->floatmargins['R']['x'] = $fx;
18902             $this->floatmargins['R']['w'] = $w;
18903             $this->floatmargins['R']['y0'] = $fy;
18904             $this->floatmargins['R']['y1'] = $fy + $h;
18905           if ($skipln == 1) {
18906             $this->floatmargins['R']['skipline'] = true;
18907             $this->floatmargins['R']['id'] = count($this->floatbuffer)+0;
18908             $objattr['skipline'] = true;
18909           }
18910           $this->floatbuffer[] = $objattr;
18911         }
18912       }
18913       else {
18914           $this->floatmargins['R']['x'] = $fx;
18915           $this->floatmargins['R']['w'] = $w;
18916           $this->floatmargins['R']['y0'] = $fy;
18917           $this->floatmargins['R']['y1'] = $fy + $h;
18918         if ($skipln == 1) {
18919           $this->floatmargins['R']['skipline'] = true;
18920           $this->floatmargins['R']['id'] = count($this->floatbuffer)+0;
18921           $objattr['skipline'] = true;
18922         }
18923         $this->floatbuffer[] = $objattr;
18924       }
18925       }
18926       else if ($objattr['float']=='L') {
18927       // If L float already exists at this level
18928       $this->floatmargins['L']['skipline'] = false;  // mPDF 3.0
18929       if (isset($this->floatmargins['L']['y1']) && $this->floatmargins['L']['y1'] > 0 && $fy < $this->floatmargins['L']['y1']) {
18930         $this->floatmargins['L']['skipline'] = false;  // mPDF 3.0
18931         $this->WriteFlowingBlock($vetor[0]); 
18932       }
18933       // If R float already exists at this level
18934       else if (isset($this->floatmargins['R']['y1']) && $this->floatmargins['R']['y1'] > 0 && $fy < $this->floatmargins['R']['y1']) {
18935         // Final check distance between floats is not now too narrow to fit text
18936         $mw = $this->GetStringWidth('WW');
18937         if (($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'] - $w - $this->floatmargins['R']['w']) < $mw) {
18938           $this->WriteFlowingBlock($vetor[0]); 
18939         }
18940         else {
18941             $this->floatmargins['L']['x'] = $fx + $w;
18942             $this->floatmargins['L']['w'] = $w;
18943             $this->floatmargins['L']['y0'] = $fy;
18944             $this->floatmargins['L']['y1'] = $fy + $h;
18945           if ($skipln == 1) {
18946             $this->floatmargins['L']['skipline'] = true;
18947             $this->floatmargins['L']['id'] = count($this->floatbuffer)+0;
18948             $objattr['skipline'] = true;
18949           }
18950           $this->floatbuffer[] = $objattr;
18951         }
18952       }
18953       else {
18954           $this->floatmargins['L']['x'] = $fx + $w;
18955           $this->floatmargins['L']['w'] = $w;
18956           $this->floatmargins['L']['y0'] = $fy;
18957           $this->floatmargins['L']['y1'] = $fy + $h;
18958         if ($skipln == 1) {
18959           $this->floatmargins['L']['skipline'] = true;
18960           $this->floatmargins['L']['id'] = count($this->floatbuffer)+0;
18961           $objattr['skipline'] = true;
18962         }
18963         $this->floatbuffer[] = $objattr;
18964       }
18965       }
18966     }
18967     else {
18968 /*-- END CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT --*/
18969       $this->WriteFlowingBlock($vetor[0]); 
18970 /*-- CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT --*/
18971     }
18972 /*-- END CSS-IMAGE-FLOAT --*/
18973     } // *TABLES*
18974 
18975       } // END If special content
18976 
18977       else { //THE text
18978     if ($this->tableLevel) { $paint_ht_corr = 0; }  // To move the y up when new column/page started if div border needed
18979     else { $paint_ht_corr = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_top']['w']; }
18980 
18981         if ($vetor[0] == "\n") { //We are reading a <BR> now turned into newline ("\n")
18982     if ($this->flowingBlockAttr['content']) {
18983       $this->finishFlowingBlock(false,'br');  // mPDF 4.3.003
18984     }
18985     else if ($is_table) {
18986       $this->y+= $this->_computeLineheight($this->table_lineheight);
18987     }
18988     else if (!$is_table) {
18989       $this->DivLn($this->lineheight); 
18990       if ($this->ColActive) { $this->breakpoints[$this->CurrCol][] = $this->y; }  // *COLUMNS*
18991     }
18992       // Added to correct for OddEven Margins
18993         if  ($this->page != $oldpage) {
18994       if (($this->page-$oldpage) % 2 == 1) { // mPDF 4.2.022
18995         $bak_x += $this->MarginCorrection;
18996       }
18997       $oldpage = $this->page;
18998         $y = $this->tMargin - $paint_ht_corr ;
18999         $this->oldy = $this->tMargin - $paint_ht_corr ;
19000         $old_height = 0;
19001     }
19002     $this->x = $bak_x;
19003 /*-- COLUMNS --*/
19004     // COLS
19005     // OR COLUMN CHANGE
19006     if ($this->CurrCol != $oldcolumn) {
19007       if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { // *RTL*
19008         $bak_x -= ($this->CurrCol - $oldcolumn) * ($this->ColWidth+$this->ColGap);  // *RTL*
19009       } // *RTL*
19010       else {  // *RTL*
19011         $bak_x += ($this->CurrCol - $oldcolumn) * ($this->ColWidth+$this->ColGap);
19012       } // *RTL*
19013       $this->x = $bak_x;
19014       $oldcolumn = $this->CurrCol;
19015       $y = $this->y0 - $paint_ht_corr ;
19016       $this->oldy = $this->y0 - $paint_ht_corr ;
19017       $old_height = 0;
19018     }
19019 /*-- END COLUMNS --*/
19020     $this->newFlowingBlock( $this->divwidth,$this->divheight,$align,$is_table,$is_list,$blockstate,false);  // false = newblock
19021          }
19022           else {
19023     $this->WriteFlowingBlock( $vetor[0]);
19024 
19025       // Added to correct for OddEven Margins
19026         if  ($this->page != $oldpage) {
19027       if (($this->page-$oldpage) % 2 == 1) { // mPDF 4.2.022
19028         $bak_x += $this->MarginCorrection;
19029         $this->x = $bak_x;
19030       }
19031       $oldpage = $this->page;
19032         $y = $this->tMargin - $paint_ht_corr ;
19033         $this->oldy = $this->tMargin - $paint_ht_corr ;
19034         $old_height = 0;
19035       }
19036 /*-- COLUMNS --*/
19037     // COLS
19038     // OR COLUMN CHANGE
19039     if ($this->CurrCol != $oldcolumn) {
19040       if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { // *RTL*
19041         $bak_x -= ($this->CurrCol - $oldcolumn) * ($this->ColWidth+$this->ColGap);  // *RTL*
19042       } // *RTL*
19043       else {  // *RTL*
19044         $bak_x += ($this->CurrCol - $oldcolumn) * ($this->ColWidth+$this->ColGap);
19045       } // *RTL*
19046       $this->x = $bak_x;
19047       $oldcolumn = $this->CurrCol;
19048       $y = $this->y0 - $paint_ht_corr ;
19049       $this->oldy = $this->y0 - $paint_ht_corr ;
19050       $old_height = 0;
19051     }
19052 /*-- END COLUMNS --*/
19053       }
19054 
19055 
19056       }
19057 
19058       //Check if it is the last element. If so then finish printing the block
19059       if ($i == ($array_size-1)) {
19060     $this->finishFlowingBlock(true);  // true = END of flowing block
19061       // Added to correct for OddEven Margins
19062         if  ($this->page != $oldpage) {
19063       if (($this->page-$oldpage) % 2 == 1) { // mPDF 4.2.022
19064         $bak_x += $this->MarginCorrection;
19065         $this->x = $bak_x;
19066       }
19067       $oldpage = $this->page;
19068         $y = $this->tMargin - $paint_ht_corr ;
19069         $this->oldy = $this->tMargin - $paint_ht_corr ;
19070         $old_height = 0;
19071       }
19072 
19073 /*-- COLUMNS --*/
19074     // COLS
19075     // OR COLUMN CHANGE
19076     if ($this->CurrCol != $oldcolumn) {
19077       if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { // *RTL*
19078         $bak_x -= ($this->CurrCol - $oldcolumn) * ($this->ColWidth+$this->ColGap);  // *RTL*
19079       } // *RTL*
19080       else {  // *RTL*
19081         $bak_x += ($this->CurrCol - $oldcolumn) * ($this->ColWidth+$this->ColGap);
19082       } // *RTL*
19083       $this->x = $bak_x;
19084       $oldcolumn = $this->CurrCol;
19085       $y = $this->y0 - $paint_ht_corr ;
19086       $this->oldy = $this->y0 - $paint_ht_corr ;
19087       $old_height = 0;
19088     }
19089 /*-- END COLUMNS --*/
19090 
19091   }
19092 
19093 
19094   // RESETTING VALUES
19095   $this->SetTextColor(0);
19096   $this->SetDrawColor(0);
19097   $this->SetFillColor(255);
19098   $this->colorarray = array();
19099   $this->spanbgcolorarray = array();
19100   $this->spanbgcolor = false;
19101   $this->issetcolor = false;
19102   $this->HREF = '';
19103   $this->outlineparam = array();
19104   $this->SetTextOutline(false);
19105       $this->outline_on = false;
19106   $this->SUP = false;
19107   $this->SUB = false;
19108 
19109   $this->strike = false;
19110 
19111   $this->currentfontfamily = '';  
19112   $this->currentfontsize = '';  
19113   $this->currentfontstyle = '';  
19114 /*-- TABLES --*/
19115   if ($this->tableLevel) {
19116     $this->SetLineHeight('',$this->table_lineheight); // *TABLES*
19117   }
19118   else
19119 /*-- END TABLES --*/
19120 /*-- LISTS --*/
19121   if ($is_list && $this->list_lineheight[$this->listlvl][$this->bulletarray['occur']]) {
19122     //$this->SetLineHeight('',$this->list_lineheight[$this->listlvl][$this->bulletarray['occur']]); // sets default line height
19123     // mPDF 4.2
19124     $this->SetLineHeight('',$this->list_lineheight[$this->listlvl][$this->listOcc]);  // sets default line height
19125   }
19126   else
19127 /*-- END LISTS --*/
19128   if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['line_height']) && $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['line_height']) {
19129     $this->SetLineHeight('',$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['line_height']);  // sets default line height
19130   }
19131   $this->SetStyle('B',false);
19132   $this->SetStyle('I',false);
19133   $this->SetStyle('U',false);
19134   $this->toupper = false;
19135   $this->tolower = false;
19136   $this->SetDash(); //restore to no dash
19137   $this->dash_on = false;
19138   $this->dotted_on = false;
19139 
19140     }//end of for(i=0;i<arraysize;i++)
19141 
19142 
19143     // PAINT DIV BORDER // DISABLED IN COLUMNS AS DOESN'T WORK WHEN BROKEN ACROSS COLS??
19144     // mPDF 3.0 Border OR background
19145     if ((isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border']) || isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['bgcolor'])) && $blockstate  && ($this->y != $this->oldy)) {
19146   $bottom_y = $this->y; // Does not include Bottom Margin
19147   // mPDF 4.2 Added blockstate
19148   if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['startpage']) && $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['startpage'] != $this->page && $blockstate != 1) {
19149     $this->PaintDivBB('pagetop',$blockstate);
19150   }
19151   // mPDF 3.0
19152   else if ($blockstate != 1) {
19153     $this->PaintDivBB('',$blockstate);
19154   }
19155   $this->y = $bottom_y; 
19156   $this->x = $bak_x;
19157     }
19158 
19159     // Reset Font
19160     $this->SetFontSize($this->default_font_size,false); 
19161 
19162 
19163 }
19164 
19165 // mPDF 4.0
19166 function _setDashBorder($style, $div, $cp, $side) {
19167   if ($style == 'dashed' && (($side=='L' || $side=='R') || ($side=='T' && $div != 'pagetop' && !$cp) || ($side=='B' && $div!='pagebottom') )) {
19168     $dashsize = 2;  // final dash will be this + 1*linewidth
19169     $dashsizek = 1.5; // ratio of Dash/Blank
19170     $this->SetDash($dashsize,($dashsize/$dashsizek)+($this->LineWidth*2));
19171   }
19172   else if ($style == 'dotted' || ($side=='T' && ($div == 'pagetop' || $cp)) || ($side=='B' && $div == 'pagebottom')) {
19173       //Round join and cap
19174       $this->_out("\n".'1 J'."\n".'1 j'."\n");
19175     $this->SetDash(0.001,($this->LineWidth*3));
19176   }
19177 }
19178 
19179 // mPDF 4.0
19180 function _setBorderLine($b, $k=1) {
19181   $this->SetLineWidth($b['w']/$k);
19182   $this->SetDrawColor($b['c']['R'],$b['c']['G'],$b['c']['B']);
19183 }
19184 
19185 // mPDF 3.0 Borders & Background
19186 function PaintDivBB($divider='',$blockstate=0,$blvl=0) {
19187   // Borders & backgrounds are done elsewhere for columns - messes up the repositioning in printcolumnbuffer
19188   if ($this->ColActive) { return ; }  // *COLUMNS*
19189   $save_y = $this->y;
19190   if (!$blvl) { $blvl = $this->blklvl; }
19191 
19192   $x0 = $x1 = $y0 = $y1 = 0; 
19193 
19194   // Added mPDF 3.0 Float DIV
19195   if (isset($this->blk[$blvl]['bb_painted'][$this->page]) && $this->blk[$blvl]['bb_painted'][$this->page]) { return; }  // *CSS-FLOAT*
19196 
19197   if (isset($this->blk[$blvl]['x0'])) { $x0 = $this->blk[$blvl]['x0']; }  // left
19198   if (isset($this->blk[$blvl]['y1'])) { $y1 = $this->blk[$blvl]['y1']; }  // bottom
19199 
19200   // Added mPDF 3.0 Float DIV - ensures backgrounds/borders are drawn to bottom of page
19201   if ($y1==0) { 
19202     if ($divider=='pagebottom') { $y1 = $this->h-$this->bMargin; }
19203     else { $y1 = $this->y; }
19204   }
19205 
19206   // mPDF 3.0
19207   if (isset($this->blk[$blvl]['startpage']) && $this->blk[$blvl]['startpage'] != $this->page) { $continuingpage = true; } else { $continuingpage = false; } 
19208 
19209   if (isset($this->blk[$blvl]['y0'])) { $y0 = $this->blk[$blvl]['y0']; }
19210   $h = $y1 - $y0;
19211   $w = $this->blk[$blvl]['width'];
19212   $x1 = $x0 + $w;
19213 
19214   // Set border-widths as used here
19215   $border_top = $this->blk[$blvl]['border_top']['w'];
19216   $border_bottom = $this->blk[$blvl]['border_bottom']['w'];
19217   $border_left = $this->blk[$blvl]['border_left']['w'];
19218   $border_right = $this->blk[$blvl]['border_right']['w'];
19219   if (!$this->blk[$blvl]['border_top'] || $divider == 'pagetop' || $continuingpage) {
19220     $border_top = 0;
19221   }
19222   if (!$this->blk[$blvl]['border_bottom'] || $blockstate == 1 || $divider == 'pagebottom') { 
19223     $border_bottom = 0;
19224   }
19225 
19226     $brTL_H = 0;
19227     $brTL_V = 0;
19228     $brTR_H = 0;
19229     $brTR_V = 0;
19230     $brBL_H = 0;
19231     $brBL_V = 0;
19232     $brBR_H = 0;
19233     $brBR_V = 0;
19234   // mPDF 4.2
19235   $brset = false; 
19236 /*-- BORDER-RADIUS --*/
19237   if (isset($this->blk[$blvl]['border_radius_TL_H'])) { $brTL_H = $this->blk[$blvl]['border_radius_TL_H']; $brset = true; }
19238   if (isset($this->blk[$blvl]['border_radius_TL_V'])) { $brTL_V = $this->blk[$blvl]['border_radius_TL_V']; $brset = true; }
19239   if (isset($this->blk[$blvl]['border_radius_TR_H'])) { $brTR_H = $this->blk[$blvl]['border_radius_TR_H']; $brset = true; }
19240   if (isset($this->blk[$blvl]['border_radius_TR_V'])) { $brTR_V = $this->blk[$blvl]['border_radius_TR_V']; $brset = true; }
19241   if (isset($this->blk[$blvl]['border_radius_BR_H'])) { $brBR_H = $this->blk[$blvl]['border_radius_BR_H']; $brset = true; }
19242   if (isset($this->blk[$blvl]['border_radius_BR_V'])) { $brBR_V = $this->blk[$blvl]['border_radius_BR_V']; $brset = true; }
19243   if (isset($this->blk[$blvl]['border_radius_BL_H'])) { $brBL_H = $this->blk[$blvl]['border_radius_BL_H']; $brset = true; }
19244   if (isset($this->blk[$blvl]['border_radius_BL_V'])) { $brBL_V = $this->blk[$blvl]['border_radius_BL_V']; $brset = true; }
19245 
19246   if (!$this->blk[$blvl]['border_top'] || $divider == 'pagetop' || $continuingpage || $this->keep_block_together) {
19247     $brTL_H = 0;
19248     $brTL_V = 0;
19249     $brTR_H = 0;
19250     $brTR_V = 0;
19251   }
19252   if (!$this->blk[$blvl]['border_bottom'] || $blockstate == 1 || $divider == 'pagebottom' || $this->keep_block_together) { 
19253     $brBL_H = 0;
19254     $brBL_V = 0;
19255     $brBR_H = 0;
19256     $brBR_V = 0;
19257   }
19258 
19259   // Disallow border-radius if it is smaller than the border width.
19260   if ($brTL_H < min($border_left, $border_top)) { $brTL_H = $brTL_V = 0; }
19261   if ($brTL_V < min($border_left, $border_top)) { $brTL_V = $brTL_H = 0; }
19262   if ($brTR_H < min($border_right, $border_top)) { $brTR_H = $brTR_V = 0; }
19263   if ($brTR_V < min($border_right, $border_top)) { $brTR_V = $brTR_H = 0; }
19264   if ($brBL_H < min($border_left, $border_bottom)) { $brBL_H = $brBL_V = 0; }
19265   if ($brBL_V < min($border_left, $border_bottom)) { $brBL_V = $brBL_H = 0; }
19266   if ($brBR_H < min($border_right, $border_bottom)) { $brBR_H = $brBR_V = 0; }
19267   if ($brBR_V < min($border_right, $border_bottom)) { $brBR_V = $brBR_H = 0; }
19268 
19269   // CHECK FOR radii that sum to > width or height of div ********
19270   $f = min($h/($brTL_V + $brBL_V + 0.001), $h/($brTR_V + $brBR_V + 0.001), $w/($brTL_H + $brTR_H + 0.001),  $w/($brBL_H + $brBR_H + 0.001));
19271   if ($f < 1) {
19272     $brTL_H *= $f;
19273     $brTL_V *= $f;
19274     $brTR_H *= $f;
19275     $brTR_V *= $f;
19276     $brBL_H *= $f;
19277     $brBL_V *= $f;
19278     $brBR_H *= $f;
19279     $brBR_V *= $f;
19280   }
19281 /*-- END BORDER-RADIUS --*/
19282 
19283     // BORDERS
19284     if (isset($this->blk[$blvl]['y0']) && $this->blk[$blvl]['y0']) { $y0 = $this->blk[$blvl]['y0']; }
19285     $h = $y1 - $y0;
19286     $w = $this->blk[$blvl]['width'];
19287 
19288     //if ($this->blk[$blvl]['border_top']) {
19289     // Reinstate line above for dotted line divider when block border crosses a page
19290     if ($this->blk[$blvl]['border_top'] && $divider != 'pagetop' && !$continuingpage) {
19291       $tbd = $this->blk[$blvl]['border_top'];
19292       if (isset($tbd['s']) && $tbd['s']) {
19293         // mPDF 4.0
19294         $this->_setBorderLine($tbd);
19295         if ($tbd['style']=='dotted' || $tbd['style']=='dashed') { $this->_setDashBorder($tbd['style'],$divider,$continuingpage,'T'); }
19296         else if (($brTL_V && $brTL_H) || ($brTR_V && $brTR_H)) { $this->_out("\n".'0 J'."\n".'0 j'."\n"); } // *BORDER-RADIUS*
19297 /*-- BORDER-RADIUS --*/
19298         if ($brTR_H && $brTR_V) {
19299           $this->_out($this->_EllipseArc($x0 + $w - $brTR_H, $y0 + $brTR_V, $brTR_H - $border_top/2 , $brTR_V - $border_top/2 , 1, 2, true));
19300         }
19301         else {
19302 /*-- END BORDER-RADIUS --*/
19303           $this->_out(sprintf('%.3f %.3f m ',($x0 + $w - ($border_top/2))*$this->k, ($this->h-($y0 + ($border_top/2)))*$this->k));
19304 /*-- BORDER-RADIUS --*/
19305         }
19306         if ($brTL_H && $brTL_V ) {
19307           $this->_out(sprintf('%.3f %.3f l ',($x0 + ($border_top/2) + $brTL_H )*$this->k, ($this->h-($y0 + ($border_top/2)))*$this->k));
19308           $this->_out($this->_EllipseArc($x0 + $brTL_H, $y0 + $brTL_V, $brTL_H - $border_top/2 , $brTL_V - $border_top/2 , 2, 1));
19309         }
19310         else {
19311 /*-- END BORDER-RADIUS --*/
19312           $this->_out(sprintf('%.3f %.3f l ',($x0 + ($border_top/2))*$this->k, ($this->h-($y0 + ($border_top/2)))*$this->k));
19313 /*-- BORDER-RADIUS --*/
19314         }
19315 /*-- END BORDER-RADIUS --*/
19316         $this->_out('S');
19317 
19318         // Reset Corners and Dash off
19319           $this->_out("\n".'2 J'."\n".'2 j'."\n");
19320         $this->SetDash(); 
19321       }
19322     }
19323     //if ($this->blk[$blvl]['border_bottom'] && $blockstate != 1) {
