19324     // Reinstate line above for dotted line divider when block border crosses a page
19325     if ($this->blk[$blvl]['border_bottom'] && $blockstate != 1 && $divider != 'pagebottom') { 
19326       $tbd = $this->blk[$blvl]['border_bottom'];
19327       if (isset($tbd['s']) && $tbd['s']) {
19328         // mPDF 4.0
19329         $this->_setBorderLine($tbd);
19330         if ($tbd['style']=='dotted' || $tbd['style']=='dashed') { $this->_setDashBorder($tbd['style'],$divider,$continuingpage,'B'); }
19331         else if (($brBL_V && $brBL_H) || ($brBR_V && $brBR_H)) { $this->_out("\n".'0 J'."\n".'0 j'."\n"); } // *BORDER-RADIUS*
19332 /*-- BORDER-RADIUS --*/
19333         if ($brBL_H && $brBL_V) {
19334           $this->_out($this->_EllipseArc($x0 + $brBL_H, $y0 + $h - $brBL_V, $brBL_H - $border_bottom/2 , $brBL_V - $border_bottom/2 , 3, 2, true));
19335         }
19336         else {
19337 /*-- END BORDER-RADIUS --*/
19338           $this->_out(sprintf('%.3f %.3f m ',($x0 + ($border_bottom/2))*$this->k, ($this->h-($y0 + $h - ($border_bottom/2)))*$this->k));
19339 /*-- BORDER-RADIUS --*/
19340         }
19341         if ($brBR_H && $brBR_V ) {
19342           $this->_out(sprintf('%.3f %.3f l ',($x0 + $w - ($border_bottom/2) - $brBR_H )*$this->k, ($this->h-($y0 + $h - ($border_bottom/2)))*$this->k));
19343           $this->_out($this->_EllipseArc($x0 + $w - $brBR_H, $y0 + $h - $brBR_V, $brBR_H - $border_bottom/2 , $brBR_V - $border_bottom/2 , 4, 1));
19344         }
19345         else {
19346 /*-- END BORDER-RADIUS --*/
19347           $this->_out(sprintf('%.3f %.3f l ',($x0 + $w - ($border_bottom/2) )*$this->k, ($this->h-($y0 + $h - ($border_bottom/2)))*$this->k));
19348 /*-- BORDER-RADIUS --*/
19349         }
19350 /*-- END BORDER-RADIUS --*/
19351         $this->_out('S');
19352 
19353         // Reset Corners and Dash off
19354           $this->_out("\n".'2 J'."\n".'2 j'."\n");
19355         $this->SetDash(); 
19356       }
19357     }
19358     if ($this->blk[$blvl]['border_left']) { 
19359       $tbd = $this->blk[$blvl]['border_left'];
19360       if (isset($tbd['s']) && $tbd['s']) {
19361         // mPDF 4.0
19362         $this->_setBorderLine($tbd);
19363         if ($tbd['style']=='dotted' || $tbd['style']=='dashed') { $this->_setDashBorder($tbd['style'],$divider,$continuingpage,'L'); }
19364         else if (($brTL_V && $brTL_H) || ($brBL_V && $brBL_H)) { $this->_out("\n".'0 J'."\n".'0 j'."\n"); } // *BORDER-RADIUS*
19365 /*-- BORDER-RADIUS --*/
19366         if ($brTL_V && $brTL_H) {
19367           $this->_out($this->_EllipseArc($x0 + $brTL_H, $y0 + $brTL_V, $brTL_H - $border_left/2 , $brTL_V - $border_left/2, 2, 2, true));
19368         }
19369         else {
19370 /*-- END BORDER-RADIUS --*/
19371           $this->_out(sprintf('%.3f %.3f m ',($x0 + ($border_left/2))*$this->k, ($this->h-($y0 + ($border_left/2)))*$this->k));
19372 /*-- BORDER-RADIUS --*/
19373         }
19374         if ($brBL_V && $brBL_H ) {
19375           $this->_out(sprintf('%.3f %.3f l ',($x0 + ($border_left/2))*$this->k, ($this->h-($y0 + $h - ($border_left/2)- $brBL_V) )*$this->k));
19376           $this->_out($this->_EllipseArc($x0 + $brBL_H, $y0 + $h - $brBL_V, $brBL_H - $border_left/2 , $brBL_V - $border_left/2, 3, 1));
19377         }
19378         else {
19379 /*-- END BORDER-RADIUS --*/
19380           $this->_out(sprintf('%.3f %.3f l ',($x0 + ($border_left/2))*$this->k, ($this->h-($y0 + $h - ($border_left/2)) )*$this->k));
19381 /*-- BORDER-RADIUS --*/
19382         }
19383 /*-- END BORDER-RADIUS --*/
19384         $this->_out('S');
19385 
19386         // Reset Corners and Dash off
19387           $this->_out("\n".'2 J'."\n".'2 j'."\n");
19388         $this->SetDash(); 
19389       }
19390     }
19391     if ($this->blk[$blvl]['border_right']) { 
19392       $tbd = $this->blk[$blvl]['border_right'];
19393       if (isset($tbd['s']) && $tbd['s']) {
19394         // mPDF 4.0
19395         $this->_setBorderLine($tbd);
19396         if ($tbd['style']=='dotted' || $tbd['style']=='dashed') { $this->_setDashBorder($tbd['style'],$divider,$continuingpage,'R'); }
19397         else if (($brTR_V && $brTR_H) || ($brBR_V && $brBR_H)) { $this->_out("\n".'0 J'."\n".'0 j'."\n"); } // *BORDER-RADIUS*
19398 /*-- BORDER-RADIUS --*/
19399         if ($brBR_V && $brBR_H) {
19400           $this->_out($this->_EllipseArc($x0 + $w - $brBR_H, $y0 + $h - $brBR_V, $brBR_H - $border_right/2 , $brBR_V - $border_right/2, 4, 2, true));
19401         }
19402         else {
19403 /*-- END BORDER-RADIUS --*/
19404           $this->_out(sprintf('%.3f %.3f m ',($x0 + $w - ($border_right/2))*$this->k, ($this->h-($y0 + $h - ($border_right/2)))*$this->k));
19405 /*-- BORDER-RADIUS --*/
19406         }
19407         if ($brTR_V && $brTR_H ) {
19408           $this->_out(sprintf('%.3f %.3f l ',($x0 + $w - ($border_right/2))*$this->k, ($this->h-($y0 + ($border_right/2) + $brTR_V) )*$this->k));
19409           $this->_out($this->_EllipseArc($x0 + $w - $brTR_H, $y0 + $brTR_V, $brTR_H - $border_right/2 , $brTR_V - $border_right/2, 1, 1));
19410         }
19411         else {
19412 /*-- END BORDER-RADIUS --*/
19413           $this->_out(sprintf('%.3f %.3f l ',($x0 + $w - ($border_right/2))*$this->k, ($this->h-($y0 + ($border_right/2)) )*$this->k));
19414 /*-- BORDER-RADIUS --*/
19415         }
19416 /*-- END BORDER-RADIUS --*/
19417         $this->_out('S');
19418 
19419         // Reset Corners and Dash off
19420           $this->_out("\n".'2 J'."\n".'2 j'."\n");
19421         $this->SetDash(); 
19422       }
19423     }
19424 
19425     // mPDF 4.2 DOUBLE Border
19426     if (!$brset) {  // not if border-radius used
19427       $tbcol = array(255,255,255);
19428       for($l=0; $l <= $blvl; $l++) {
19429         if ($this->blk[$l]['bgcolor']) {
19430           $tbcol = array($this->blk[$l]['bgcolorarray']['R'],$this->blk[$l]['bgcolorarray']['G'],$this->blk[$l]['bgcolorarray']['B']);
19431         }
19432       }
19433     }
19434     if ($this->blk[$blvl]['border_top'] && $divider != 'pagetop' && !$continuingpage) {
19435       $tbd = $this->blk[$blvl]['border_top'];
19436       if (isset($tbd['s']) && $tbd['s']) {
19437         if (!$brset && $tbd['style']=='double') {
19438           $this->SetLineWidth($tbd['w']/3);
19439           $this->SetDrawColor($tbcol[0],$tbcol[1],$tbcol[2]);
19440           $this->_out(sprintf('%.3f %.3f m %.3f %.3f l S', ($x0 + $w - ($border_top/2))*$this->k, ($this->h-($y0 + ($border_top/2)))*$this->k, ($x0 + ($border_top/2))*$this->k, ($this->h-($y0 + ($border_top/2)))*$this->k ));
19441         }
19442       }
19443     }
19444     if ($this->blk[$blvl]['border_bottom'] && $blockstate != 1 && $divider != 'pagebottom') { 
19445       $tbd = $this->blk[$blvl]['border_bottom'];
19446       if (isset($tbd['s']) && $tbd['s']) {
19447         if (!$brset && $tbd['style']=='double') {
19448           $this->SetLineWidth($tbd['w']/3);
19449           $this->SetDrawColor($tbcol[0],$tbcol[1],$tbcol[2]);
19450           $this->_out(sprintf('%.3f %.3f m %.3f %.3f l S', ($x0 + ($border_bottom/2))*$this->k, ($this->h-($y0 + $h - ($border_bottom/2)))*$this->k, ($x0 + $w - ($border_bottom/2) )*$this->k, ($this->h-($y0 + $h - ($border_bottom/2)))*$this->k ));
19451         }
19452       }
19453     }
19454     if ($this->blk[$blvl]['border_left']) { 
19455       $tbd = $this->blk[$blvl]['border_left'];
19456       if (isset($tbd['s']) && $tbd['s']) {
19457         if (!$brset && $tbd['style']=='double') {
19458           $this->SetLineWidth($tbd['w']/3);
19459           $this->SetDrawColor($tbcol[0],$tbcol[1],$tbcol[2]);
19460           $this->_out(sprintf('%.3f %.3f m %.3f %.3f l S', ($x0 + ($border_left/2))*$this->k, ($this->h-($y0 + ($border_left/2)))*$this->k, ($x0 + ($border_left/2))*$this->k, ($this->h-($y0 + $h - ($border_left/2)) )*$this->k));
19461         }
19462       }
19463     }
19464     if ($this->blk[$blvl]['border_right']) { 
19465       $tbd = $this->blk[$blvl]['border_right'];
19466       if (isset($tbd['s']) && $tbd['s']) {
19467         if (!$brset && $tbd['style']=='double') {
19468           $this->SetLineWidth($tbd['w']/3);
19469           $this->SetDrawColor($tbcol[0],$tbcol[1],$tbcol[2]);
19470           $this->_out(sprintf('%.3f %.3f m %.3f %.3f l S', ($x0 + $w - ($border_right/2))*$this->k, ($this->h-($y0 + $h - ($border_right/2)))*$this->k, ($x0 + $w - ($border_right/2))*$this->k, ($this->h-($y0 + ($border_right/2)) )*$this->k));
19471         }
19472       }
19473     }
19474 
19475 
19476     $this->SetDash(); 
19477   $this->y = $save_y; 
19478 
19479 
19480   // BACKGROUNDS are disabled in columns/kbt/headers - messes up the repositioning in printcolumnbuffer
19481   // mPDF 4.0 Added kwt
19482   if ($this->ColActive || $this->kwt || $this->keep_block_together) { return ; }
19483 
19484   $bgx0 = $x0;
19485   $bgx1 = $x1;
19486   $bgy0 = $y0;
19487   $bgy1 = $y1;
19488 
19489 /*-- BORDER-RADIUS --*/
19490   // Defined br values represent the radius of the outer curve - need to take border-width/2 from each radius for drawing the borders
19491   if (isset($this->blk[$blvl]['background_clip']) && $this->blk[$blvl]['background_clip'] == 'padding-box') {
19492     $brbgTL_H = max(0, $brTL_H - $this->blk[$blvl]['border_left']['w']);
19493     $brbgTL_V = max(0, $brTL_V - $this->blk[$blvl]['border_top']['w']);
19494     $brbgTR_H = max(0, $brTR_H - $this->blk[$blvl]['border_right']['w']);
19495     $brbgTR_V = max(0, $brTR_V - $this->blk[$blvl]['border_top']['w']);
19496     $brbgBL_H = max(0, $brBL_H - $this->blk[$blvl]['border_left']['w']);
19497     $brbgBL_V = max(0, $brBL_V - $this->blk[$blvl]['border_bottom']['w']);
19498     $brbgBR_H = max(0, $brBR_H - $this->blk[$blvl]['border_right']['w']);
19499     $brbgBR_V = max(0, $brBR_V - $this->blk[$blvl]['border_bottom']['w']);
19500     $bgx0 += $this->blk[$blvl]['border_left']['w'];
19501     $bgx1 -= $this->blk[$blvl]['border_right']['w'];
19502     if ($this->blk[$blvl]['border_top'] && $divider != 'pagetop' && !$continuingpage) {
19503       $bgy0 += $this->blk[$blvl]['border_top']['w'];
19504     }
19505     if ($this->blk[$blvl]['border_bottom'] && $blockstate != 1 && $divider != 'pagebottom') { 
19506       $bgy1 -= $this->blk[$blvl]['border_bottom']['w'];
19507     }
19508   }
19509   else {
19510 /*-- END BORDER-RADIUS --*/
19511     $brbgTL_H = $brTL_H;
19512     $brbgTL_V = $brTL_V;
19513     $brbgTR_H = $brTR_H;
19514     $brbgTR_V = $brTR_V;
19515     $brbgBL_H = $brBL_H;
19516     $brbgBL_V = $brBL_V;
19517     $brbgBR_H = $brBR_H;
19518     $brbgBR_V = $brBR_V;
19519 /*-- BORDER-RADIUS --*/
19520   }
19521 /*-- END BORDER-RADIUS --*/
19522 
19523   // Set clipping path
19524   $s = ' q 0 w '; // Line width=0
19525   $s .= sprintf('%.3f %.3f m ', ($bgx0+$brbgTL_H )*$this->k, ($this->h-$bgy0)*$this->k);  // start point TL before the arc
19526 /*-- BORDER-RADIUS --*/
19527   if ($brbgTL_H || $brbgTL_V) {
19528     $s .= $this->_EllipseArc($bgx0+$brbgTL_H, $bgy0+$brbgTL_V, $brbgTL_H , $brbgTL_V , 2);  // segment 2 TL
19529   }
19530 /*-- END BORDER-RADIUS --*/
19531   $s .= sprintf('%.3f %.3f l ', ($bgx0)*$this->k, ($this->h-($bgy1-$brbgBL_V ))*$this->k);  // line to BL
19532 /*-- BORDER-RADIUS --*/
19533   if ($brbgBL_H || $brbgBL_V) {
19534     $s .= $this->_EllipseArc($bgx0+$brbgBL_H, $bgy1-$brbgBL_V, $brbgBL_H , $brbgBL_V , 3);  // segment 3 BL
19535   }
19536 /*-- END BORDER-RADIUS --*/
19537   $s .= sprintf('%.3f %.3f l ', ($bgx1-$brbgBR_H )*$this->k, ($this->h-($bgy1))*$this->k);  // line to BR
19538 /*-- BORDER-RADIUS --*/
19539   if ($brbgBR_H || $brbgBR_V) {
19540     $s .= $this->_EllipseArc($bgx1-$brbgBR_H, $bgy1-$brbgBR_V, $brbgBR_H , $brbgBR_V , 4);  // segment 4 BR
19541   }
19542 /*-- END BORDER-RADIUS --*/
19543   $s .= sprintf('%.3f %.3f l ', ($bgx1)*$this->k, ($this->h-($bgy0+$brbgTR_V))*$this->k); // line to TR
19544 /*-- BORDER-RADIUS --*/
19545   if ($brbgTR_H || $brbgTR_V) {
19546     $s .= $this->_EllipseArc($bgx1-$brbgTR_H, $bgy0+$brbgTR_V, $brbgTR_H , $brbgTR_V , 1);  // segment 1 TR
19547   }
19548 /*-- END BORDER-RADIUS --*/
19549   $s .= sprintf('%.3f %.3f l ', ($bgx0+$brbgTL_H )*$this->k, ($this->h-$bgy0)*$this->k);  // line to TL
19550   $s .= ' W n ';  // Ends path no-op & Sets the clipping path
19551 
19552   if ($this->blk[$blvl]['bgcolor']) { 
19553     $this->pageBackgrounds[$blvl][] = array('x'=>$x0, 'y'=>$y0, 'w'=>$w, 'h'=>$h, 'col'=>$this->blk[$blvl]['bgcolorarray'], 'clippath'=>$s);
19554   }
19555 /*-- GRADIENTS --*/
19556   if (isset($this->blk[$blvl]['gradient'])) { 
19557     $g = $this->parseBackgroundGradient($this->blk[$blvl]['gradient']);
19558     if ($g) {
19559       $gx = $x0;
19560       $gy = $y0;
19561       $this->pageBackgrounds[$blvl][] = array('gradient'=>true, 'x'=>$gx, 'y'=>$gy, 'w'=>$w, 'h'=>$h, 'gradtype'=>$g['type'], 'col'=>$g['col'], 'col2'=>$g['col2'], 'coords'=>$g['coords'], 'extend'=>$g['extend'], 'clippath'=>$s);
19562     }
19563   }
19564 /*-- END GRADIENTS --*/
19565 
19566 /*-- BACKGROUND-IMAGES --*/
19567   if (isset($this->blk[$blvl]['background-image'])) { 
19568     $image_id = $this->blk[$blvl]['background-image']['image_id'];
19569     $orig_w = $this->blk[$blvl]['background-image']['orig_w'];
19570     $orig_h = $this->blk[$blvl]['background-image']['orig_h'];
19571     $x_pos = $this->blk[$blvl]['background-image']['x_pos'];
19572     $y_pos = $this->blk[$blvl]['background-image']['y_pos'];
19573     $x_repeat = $this->blk[$blvl]['background-image']['x_repeat'];
19574     $y_repeat = $this->blk[$blvl]['background-image']['y_repeat'];
19575     $resize = $this->blk[$blvl]['background-image']['resize'];  // mPDF 4.3.015
19576     $opacity = $this->blk[$blvl]['background-image']['opacity'];  // mPDF 4.3.017
19577     $this->pageBackgrounds[$blvl][] = array('x'=>$x0, 'y'=>$y0, 'w'=>$w, 'h'=>$h, 'image_id'=>$image_id, 'orig_w'=>$orig_w, 'orig_h'=>$orig_h, 'x_pos'=>$x_pos, 'y_pos'=>$y_pos, 'x_repeat'=>$x_repeat, 'y_repeat'=>$y_repeat, 'clippath'=>$s, 'resize'=>$resize, 'opacity'=>$opacity); // mPDF 4.3.015  4.3.017
19578   }
19579 /*-- END BACKGROUND-IMAGES --*/
19580 
19581   // Added mPDF 3.0 Float DIV
19582   $this->blk[$blvl]['bb_painted'][$this->page] = true;
19583 
19584 }
19585 
19586 /*-- BORDER-RADIUS --*/
19587 // mPDF 3.0
19588 function _EllipseArc($x0, $y0, $rx, $ry, $seg = 1, $part=false, $start=false) { // Anticlockwise segment 1-4 TR-TL-BL-BR (part=1 or 2)
19589   $s = '';
19590     if ($rx<0) { $rx = 0; }
19591   if ($ry<0) { $ry = 0; }
19592   $rx *= $this->k;
19593   $ry *= $this->k;
19594   $astart = 0;
19595   if ($seg == 1) {  // Top Right
19596     $afinish = 90;
19597     $nSeg = 4; 
19598   }
19599   else if ($seg == 2) { // Top Left
19600     $afinish = 180;
19601     $nSeg = 8; 
19602   }
19603   else if ($seg == 3) { // Bottom Left
19604     $afinish = 270;
19605     $nSeg = 12; 
19606   }
19607   else {      // Bottom Right
19608     $afinish = 360;
19609     $nSeg = 16; 
19610   }
19611   $astart = deg2rad((float) $astart);
19612   $afinish = deg2rad((float) $afinish);
19613   $totalAngle = $afinish - $astart;
19614   $dt = $totalAngle / $nSeg;  // segment angle
19615   $dtm = $dt/3;
19616   $x0 *= $this->k;
19617   $y0 = ($this->h - $y0) * $this->k;
19618   $t1 = $astart;
19619   $a0 = $x0 + ($rx * cos($t1));
19620   $b0 = $y0 + ($ry * sin($t1));
19621   $c0 = -$rx * sin($t1);
19622   $d0 = $ry * cos($t1);
19623   $op = false;
19624   for ($i = 1; $i <= $nSeg; $i++) {
19625     // Draw this bit of the total curve
19626     $t1 = ($i * $dt) + $astart;
19627     $a1 = $x0 + ($rx * cos($t1));
19628     $b1 = $y0 + ($ry * sin($t1));
19629     $c1 = -$rx * sin($t1);
19630     $d1 = $ry * cos($t1);
19631     if ($i>($nSeg-4) && (!$part || ($part == 1 && $i<=$nSeg-2) || ($part == 2 && $i>$nSeg-2))) { 
19632       if ($start && !$op) {
19633                 $s .= sprintf('%.3f %.3f m ', $a0, $b0);
19634       }
19635       $s .= sprintf('%.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f c ', ($a0 + ($c0 * $dtm)), ($b0 + ($d0 * $dtm)), ($a1 - ($c1 * $dtm)) , ($b1 - ($d1 * $dtm)), $a1 , $b1 );
19636       $op = true;
19637     }
19638     $a0 = $a1;
19639     $b0 = $b1;
19640     $c0 = $c1;
19641     $d0 = $d1;
19642   }
19643   return $s;
19644 }
19645 /*-- END BORDER-RADIUS --*/
19646 
19647 
19648 
19649 function PaintDivLnBorder($state=0,$blvl=0,$h) {
19650   // $state = 0 normal; 1 top; 2 bottom; 3 top and bottom
19651 
19652   $this->ColDetails[$this->CurrCol]['bottom_margin'] = $this->y + $h; 
19653 
19654   $save_y = $this->y;
19655 
19656   $w = $this->blk[$blvl]['width'];
19657   $x0 = $this->x;       // left
19658   $y0 = $this->y;       // top
19659   $x1 = $this->x + $w;      // bottom
19660   $y1 = $this->y + $h;      // bottom
19661 
19662     if ($this->blk[$blvl]['border_top'] && ($state==1 || $state==3)) {
19663       $tbd = $this->blk[$blvl]['border_top'];
19664       if (isset($tbd['s']) && $tbd['s']) {
19665         // mPDF 4.0
19666         $this->_setBorderLine($tbd);
19667         $this->y = $y0 + ($tbd['w']/2);
19668         // mPDF 4.0
19669         if ($tbd['style']=='dotted' || $tbd['style']=='dashed') { $this->_setDashBorder($tbd['style'],'',$continuingpage,'T'); }
19670         $this->Line($x0 + ($tbd['w']/2) , $this->y , $x0 + $w - ($tbd['w']/2), $this->y);
19671         $this->y += $tbd['w'];
19672         // Reset Corners and Dash off
19673           $this->_out('2 J 2 j');
19674         $this->SetDash(); 
19675 
19676       }
19677     }
19678 
19679     if ($this->blk[$blvl]['border_left']) { 
19680       $tbd = $this->blk[$blvl]['border_left'];
19681       if (isset($tbd['s']) && $tbd['s']) {
19682         // mPDF 4.0
19683         $this->_setBorderLine($tbd);
19684         $this->y = $y0 + ($tbd['w']/2);
19685         // mPDF 4.0
19686         if ($tbd['style']=='dotted' || $tbd['style']=='dashed') { $this->_setDashBorder($tbd['style'],'',$continuingpage,'L'); }
19687         $this->Line($x0 + ($tbd['w']/2), $this->y, $x0 + ($tbd['w']/2), $y0 + $h -($tbd['w']/2));
19688         $this->y += $tbd['w'];
19689         // Reset Corners and Dash off
19690           $this->_out('2 J 2 j');
19691         $this->SetDash(); 
19692 
19693       }
19694     }
19695     if ($this->blk[$blvl]['border_right']) { 
19696       $tbd = $this->blk[$blvl]['border_right'];
19697       if (isset($tbd['s']) && $tbd['s']) {
19698         // mPDF 4.0
19699         $this->_setBorderLine($tbd);
19700         $this->y = $y0 + ($tbd['w']/2);
19701         // mPDF 4.0
19702         if ($tbd['style']=='dotted' || $tbd['style']=='dashed') { $this->_setDashBorder($tbd['style'],'',$continuingpage,'R'); }
19703         $this->Line($x0 + $w - ($tbd['w']/2), $this->y, $x0 + $w - ($tbd['w']/2), $y0 + $h - ($tbd['w']/2));
19704         $this->y += $tbd['w'];
19705         // Reset Corners and Dash off
19706           $this->_out('2 J 2 j');
19707         $this->SetDash(); 
19708 
19709       }
19710     }
19711     if ($this->blk[$blvl]['border_bottom'] && $state > 1) { 
19712       $tbd = $this->blk[$blvl]['border_bottom'];
19713       if (isset($tbd['s']) && $tbd['s']) {
19714         // mPDF 4.0
19715         $this->_setBorderLine($tbd);
19716         $this->y = $y0 + $h - ($tbd['w']/2);
19717         // mPDF 4.0
19718         if ($tbd['style']=='dotted' || $tbd['style']=='dashed') { $this->_setDashBorder($tbd['style'],'',$continuingpage,'B'); }
19719         $this->Line($x0 + ($tbd['w']/2) , $this->y, $x0 + $w - ($tbd['w']/2), $this->y);
19720         $this->y += $tbd['w'];
19721         // Reset Corners and Dash off
19722           $this->_out('2 J 2 j');
19723         $this->SetDash(); 
19724 
19725       }
19726     }
19727     $this->SetDash(); 
19728 
19729 
19730   $this->y = $save_y; 
19731 }
19732 
19733 
19734 function PaintImgBorder($objattr,$is_table) {
19735   // Borders are disabled in columns - messes up the repositioning in printcolumnbuffer
19736   if ($this->ColActive) { return ; }  // *COLUMNS*
19737   if ($is_table) { $k = $this->shrin_k; } else { $k = 1; }
19738     $h = $objattr['BORDER-HEIGHT'];
19739     $w = $objattr['BORDER-WIDTH'];
19740     $x0 = $objattr['BORDER-X'];
19741     $y0 = $objattr['BORDER-Y'];
19742 
19743     // BORDERS
19744     if ($objattr['border_top']) { 
19745       $tbd = $objattr['border_top'];
19746       if ($tbd['s']) {
19747         // mPDF 4.0
19748         $this->_setBorderLine($tbd,$k);
19749         if ($tbd['style']=='dotted' || $tbd['style']=='dashed') { $this->_setDashBorder($tbd['style'],'','','T'); }
19750         $this->Line($x0, $y0, $x0 + $w, $y0);
19751         // Reset Corners and Dash off
19752           $this->_out('2 J 2 j');
19753         $this->SetDash(); 
19754 
19755       }
19756     }
19757     if ($objattr['border_left']) { 
19758       $tbd = $objattr['border_left'];
19759       if ($tbd['s']) {
19760         // mPDF 4.0
19761         $this->_setBorderLine($tbd,$k);
19762         if ($tbd['style']=='dotted' || $tbd['style']=='dashed') { $this->_setDashBorder($tbd['style'],'','','L'); }
19763         $this->Line($x0, $y0, $x0, $y0 + $h);
19764         // Reset Corners and Dash off
19765           $this->_out('2 J 2 j');
19766         $this->SetDash(); 
19767 
19768       }
19769     }
19770     if ($objattr['border_right']) { 
19771       $tbd = $objattr['border_right'];
19772       if ($tbd['s']) {
19773         // mPDF 4.0
19774         $this->_setBorderLine($tbd,$k);
19775         if ($tbd['style']=='dotted' || $tbd['style']=='dashed') { $this->_setDashBorder($tbd['style'],'','','R'); }
19776         $this->Line($x0 + $w, $y0, $x0 + $w, $y0 + $h);
19777         // Reset Corners and Dash off
19778           $this->_out('2 J 2 j');
19779         $this->SetDash(); 
19780 
19781       }
19782     }
19783     if ($objattr['border_bottom']) { 
19784       $tbd = $objattr['border_bottom'];
19785       if ($tbd['s']) {
19786         // mPDF 4.0
19787         $this->_setBorderLine($tbd,$k);
19788         if ($tbd['style']=='dotted' || $tbd['style']=='dashed') { $this->_setDashBorder($tbd['style'],'','','B'); }
19789         $this->Line($x0, $y0 + $h, $x0 + $w, $y0 + $h);
19790         // Reset Corners and Dash off
19791           $this->_out('2 J 2 j');
19792         $this->SetDash(); 
19793 
19794       }
19795     }
19796     $this->SetDash(); 
19797 
19798 }
19799 
19800 
19801 
19802 
19803 
19804 function Reset()
19805 {
19806   $this->SetTextColor(0);
19807   $this->colorarray = array();
19808   $this->issetcolor = false;
19809 
19810   $this->SetDrawColor(0);
19811 
19812   $this->SetFillColor(255);
19813   $this->spanbgcolorarray = array();
19814   $this->spanbgcolor = false;
19815 
19816   $this->SetStyle('B',false);
19817   $this->SetStyle('I',false);
19818   $this->SetStyle('U',false);
19819 
19820   $this->HREF = '';
19821   $this->outlineparam = array();
19822       $this->outline_on = false;
19823   $this->SetTextOutline(false);
19824 
19825   $this->SUP = false;
19826   $this->SUB = false;
19827   $this->strike = false;
19828 
19829   $this->SetFont($this->default_font,'',0,false);
19830   $this->SetFontSize($this->default_font_size,false);
19831 
19832   $this->currentfontfamily = '';  
19833   $this->currentfontsize = '';  
19834 
19835 /*-- TABLES --*/
19836   if ($this->tableLevel) {
19837     $this->SetLineHeight('',$this->table_lineheight); // *TABLES*
19838   }
19839   else
19840 /*-- END TABLES --*/
19841 /*-- LISTS --*/
19842   // mPDF 4.2
19843   if ($this->listlvl && $this->list_lineheight[$this->listlvl][$this->bulletarray['occur']]) {
19844     $this->SetLineHeight('',$this->list_lineheight[$this->listlvl][$this->bulletarray['occur']]); // sets default line height
19845   }
19846   else
19847 /*-- END LISTS --*/
19848   if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['line_height']) && $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['line_height']) {
19849     $this->SetLineHeight('',$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['line_height']);  // sets default line height
19850   }
19851 
19852   $this->toupper = false;
19853   $this->tolower = false;
19854   $this->SetDash(); //restore to no dash
19855   $this->dash_on = false;
19856   $this->dotted_on = false;
19857   $this->divwidth = 0;
19858   $this->divheight = 0;
19859   $this->divalign = $this->defaultAlign;
19860   $this->divrevert = false;
19861   $this->oldy = -1;
19862 
19863   $bodystyle = array();
19864   if (isset($this->CSS['BODY']['FONT-STYLE'])) { $bodystyle['FONT-STYLE'] = $this->CSS['BODY']['FONT-STYLE']; }
19865   if (isset($this->CSS['BODY']['FONT-WEIGHT'])) { $bodystyle['FONT-WEIGHT'] = $this->CSS['BODY']['FONT-WEIGHT']; }
19866   if (isset($this->CSS['BODY']['COLOR'])) { $bodystyle['COLOR'] = $this->CSS['BODY']['COLOR']; }
19867   if (isset($bodystyle)) { $this->setCSS($bodystyle,'BLOCK','BODY'); }
19868 
19869 }
19870 
19871 function ReadMetaTags($html)
19872 {
19873   // changes anykey=anyvalue to anykey="anyvalue" (only do this when this happens inside tags)
19874   $regexp = '/ (\\w+?)=([^\\s>"]+)/si'; 
19875   $html = preg_replace($regexp," \$1=\"\$2\"",$html);
19876 
19877   if (preg_match('/<title>(.*?)<\/title>/si',$html,$m)) {
19878     $this->SetTitle($m[1]); 
19879   }
19880 
19881   preg_match_all('/<meta [^>]*?(name|content)="([^>]*?)" [^>]*?(name|content)="([^>]*?)".*?>/si',$html,$aux);
19882   $firstattr = $aux[1];
19883   $secondattr = $aux[3];
19884   for( $i = 0 ; $i < count($aux[0]) ; $i++)
19885   {
19886 
19887      $name = ( strtoupper($firstattr[$i]) == "NAME" )? strtoupper($aux[2][$i]) : strtoupper($aux[4][$i]);
19888      $content = ( strtoupper($firstattr[$i]) == "CONTENT" )? $aux[2][$i] : $aux[4][$i];
19889      switch($name)
19890      {
19891        case "KEYWORDS": $this->SetKeywords($content); break;
19892        case "AUTHOR": $this->SetAuthor($content); break;
19893        case "DESCRIPTION": $this->SetSubject($content); break;
19894      }
19895   }
19896 }
19897 
19898 
19899 function ReadCharset($html)
19900 {
19901   // Charset conversion
19902   if ($this->allow_charset_conversion) {
19903      if (preg_match('/<head.*charset=([^\'\"\s]*).*<\/head>/si',$html,$m)) {
19904     if (strtoupper($m[1]) != 'UTF-8') {
19905       $this->charset_in = strtoupper($m[1]); 
19906     }
19907      }
19908   }
19909 
19910 }
19911 
19921 
19922 function ReadDefaultCSS($CSSstr) {
19923     $CSS = array();
19924     $CSSstr = preg_replace('|/\*.*?\*/|s',' ',$CSSstr);
19925     $CSSstr = preg_replace('/[\s\n\r\t\f]/s',' ',$CSSstr);
19926 
19927     $CSSstr = preg_replace('/(<\!\-\-|\-\->)/s',' ',$CSSstr);
19928     if ($CSSstr ) {
19929   preg_match_all('/(.*?)\{(.*?)\}/',$CSSstr,$styles);
19930   for($i=0; $i < count($styles[1]) ; $i++)  {
19931     $stylestr= trim($styles[2][$i]);
19932     $stylearr = explode(';',$stylestr);
19933     foreach($stylearr AS $sta) {
19934        if (trim($sta)) {
19935       // mPDF 3.0
19936       // Changed to allow style="background: url('http://www.bpm1.com/bg.jpg')"
19937       list($property,$value) = explode(':',$sta,2);
19938       $property = trim($property);
19939       $value = preg_replace('/\s*!important/i','',$value);
19940       $value = trim($value);
19941       if ($property && ($value || $value==='0')) {
19942           $classproperties[strtoupper($property)] = $value;
19943       }
19944        }
19945     }
19946     $classproperties = $this->fixCSS($classproperties);
19947     $tagstr = strtoupper(trim($styles[1][$i]));
19948     $tagarr = explode(',',$tagstr);
19949     foreach($tagarr AS $tg) {
19950       $tags = preg_split('/\s+/',trim($tg));
19951       $level = count($tags);
19952       if ($level == 1) {    // e.g. p or .class or #id or p.class or p#id
19953          $t = trim($tags[0]);
19954          if ($t) {
19955       $tag = '';
19956       if (preg_match('/^('.$this->allowedCSStags.')$/',$t)) { $tag= $t; }
19957       if ($this->CSS[$tag] && $tag) { $CSS[$tag] = $this->array_merge_recursive_unique($CSS[$tag], $classproperties); }
19958       else if ($tag) { $CSS[$tag] = $classproperties; }
19959          }
19960       }
19961     }
19962       $properties = array();
19963       $values = array();
19964       $classproperties = array();
19965   }
19966 
19967     } // end of if
19968     return $CSS;
19969 }
19970 
19971 
19972 
19973 
19974 function ReadCSS($html) {
19975 //
19976 // This supports:  .class {...} / #id { .... }
19977 // p {...}  h1[-h6] {...}  a {...}  table {...}   thead {...}  th {...}  td {...}  hr {...}
19978 // body {...} sets default font and fontsize
19979 // It supports some cascaded CSS e.g. div.topic table.type1 td
19980 // Does not support non-block level e.g. a#hover { ... }
19981 
19982   // mPDF 4.3.001
19983   preg_match_all('/<style[^>]*media=["\']([^"\'>]*)["\'].*?<\/style>/is',$html,$m);
19984   for($i=0; $i<count($m[0]); $i++) {
19985     if ($this->CSSselectMedia && !preg_match('/('.trim($this->CSSselectMedia).'|all)/i',$m[1][$i])) { 
19986       $html = preg_replace('/'.preg_quote($m[0][$i],'/').'/','',$html);
19987     }
19988   }
19989   preg_match_all('/<link[^>]*media=["\']([^"\'>]*)["\'].*?>/is',$html,$m);
19990   for($i=0; $i<count($m[0]); $i++) {
19991     if ($this->CSSselectMedia && !preg_match('/('.trim($this->CSSselectMedia).'|all)/i',$m[1][$i])) { 
19992       $html = preg_replace('/'.preg_quote($m[0][$i],'/').'/','',$html);
19993     }
19994   }
19995 
19996   // mPDF 4.0
19997   // Remove Comment tags <!--  --> inside CSS as <style> in HTML document
19998   preg_match_all('/<style.*?>(.*?)<\/style>/si',$html,$m);
19999   if (count($m[1])) { 
20000     for($i=0;$i<count($m[1]);$i++) {
20001       // Remove comment tags 
20002       $sub = preg_replace('/(<\!\-\-|\-\->)/s',' ',$m[1][$i]);
20003       $html = preg_replace('/'.preg_quote($m[1][$i], '/').'/si', $sub, $html); 
20004     }
20005   }
20006   // mPDF 4.0
20007   $html = preg_replace('/<!--mpdf/i','',$html); // mPDF 3.0 changed from ereg_
20008   $html = preg_replace('/mpdf-->/i','',$html); // mPDF 3.0 changed from ereg_
20009   $html = preg_replace('/<\!\-\-.*?\-\->/s',' ',$html);
20010 
20011   $match = 0; // no match for instance
20012   $regexp = ''; // This helps debugging: showing what is the REAL string being processed
20013   $CSSext = array(); 
20014 
20015   //CSS inside external files
20016   // mPDF 3.0 Allow single or double quotes
20017   // mPDF 4.0 Allow >1 space or extra text after link
20018   $regexp = '/<link[^>]*rel=["\']stylesheet["\'][^>]*href=["\']([^>"\']*)["\'].*?>/si'; // EDIT mPDF 4.0
20019   $x = preg_match_all($regexp,$html,$cxt);
20020   if ($x) { 
20021     $match += $x; 
20022     $CSSext = $cxt[1];
20023   }
20024 
20025   // mPDF 3.0 Allow single or double quotes
20026   $regexp = '/<link[^>]*href=["\']([^>"\']*)["\'][^>]*?rel=["\']stylesheet["\'].*?>/si';  // EDIT mPDF 4.0
20027   $x = preg_match_all($regexp,$html,$cxt);
20028   if ($x) { 
20029     $match += $x; 
20030     $CSSext = array_merge($CSSext,$cxt[1]);
20031   }
20032 
20033   // look for @import stylesheets
20034   $regexp = '/@import url\([\'\"]{0,1}([^\)]*?\.css)[\'\"]{0,1}\)/si'; // EDIT mPDF 4.0
20035   $x = preg_match_all($regexp,$html,$cxt);
20036   if ($x) { 
20037     $match += $x; 
20038     $CSSext = array_merge($CSSext,$cxt[1]);
20039   }
20040   // mPDF 4.0
20041   // look for @import without the url()
20042   $regexp = '/@import [\'\"]{0,1}([^;]*?\.css)[\'\"]{0,1}/si';
20043   $x = preg_match_all($regexp,$html,$cxt);
20044   if ($x) { 
20045     $match += $x; 
20046     $CSSext = array_merge($CSSext,$cxt[1]);
20047   }
20048 
20049   $ind = 0;
20050   $CSSstr = '';
20051 
20052   // Edited mPDF v1.4
20053   if (!is_array($this->cascadeCSS)) $this->cascadeCSS = array();
20054 
20055     while($match){
20056   $path = $CSSext[$ind];
20057   $this->GetFullPath($path); // mPDF 4.0
20058   $CSSextblock = $this->_get_file($path);
20059   if ($CSSextblock) {
20060     // mPDF 4.0
20061     // look for embedded @import stylesheets in other stylesheets
20062     // and fix url paths (including background-images) relative to stylesheet
20063     $regexpem = '/@import url\([\'\"]{0,1}(.*?\.css)[\'\"]{0,1}\)/si';
20064     $xem = preg_match_all($regexpem,$CSSextblock,$cxtem);
20065     $cssBasePath = preg_replace('/\/[^\/]*$/','',$path) . '/';
20066     if ($xem) { 
20067        foreach($cxtem[1] AS $cxtembedded) {
20068       // path is relative to original stlyesheet!!
20069       $this->GetFullPath($cxtembedded, $cssBasePath );
20070       $match++; 
20071       $CSSext[] = $cxtembedded;
20072        }
20073     }
20074     $regexpem = '/(background[^;]*url\s*\(\s*[\'\"]{0,1})([^\)\'\"]*)([\'\"]{0,1}\s*\))/si';
20075     $xem = preg_match_all($regexpem,$CSSextblock,$cxtem);
20076     if ($xem) { 
20077        for ($i=0;$i<count($cxtem[0]);$i++) {
20078       // path is relative to original stlyesheet!!
20079       $embedded = $cxtem[2][$i];
20080       $this->GetFullPath($embedded, $cssBasePath );
20081       $CSSextblock = preg_replace('/'.preg_quote($cxtem[0][$i],'/').'/', ($cxtem[1][$i].$embedded.$cxtem[3][$i]), $CSSextblock);
20082        }
20083     }
20084     $CSSstr .= ' '.$CSSextblock;
20085   } 
20086 
20087   $match--;
20088   $ind++;
20089     } //end of match
20090     $match = 0; // reset value, if needed
20091   // CSS as <style> in HTML document
20092     $regexp = '/<style.*?>(.*?)<\/style>/si'; 
20093     $match = preg_match_all($regexp,$html,$CSSblock);
20094     if ($match) {
20095     // mPDF 4.0
20096     $tmpCSSstr = implode(' ',$CSSblock[1]);
20097     $regexpem = '/(background[^;]*url\s*\(\s*[\'\"]{0,1})([^\)\'\"]*)([\'\"]{0,1}\s*\))/si';
20098     $xem = preg_match_all($regexpem,$tmpCSSstr ,$cxtem);
20099     if ($xem) { 
20100        for ($i=0;$i<count($cxtem[0]);$i++) {
20101       $embedded = $cxtem[2][$i];
20102       $this->GetFullPath($embedded);
20103       $tmpCSSstr = preg_replace('/'.preg_quote($cxtem[0][$i],'/').'/', ($cxtem[1][$i].$embedded.$cxtem[3][$i]), $tmpCSSstr );
20104        }
20105     }
20106     $CSSstr .= ' '.$tmpCSSstr;
20107     }
20108     // Remove comments
20109     $CSSstr = preg_replace('|/\*.*?\*/|s',' ',$CSSstr);
20110     $CSSstr = preg_replace('/[\s\n\r\t\f]/s',' ',$CSSstr);
20111 
20112     // mPDF 4.3.001
20113     if (preg_match('/@media/',$CSSstr)) { 
20114   preg_match_all('/@media(.*?)\{(([^\{\}]*\{[^\{\}]*\})+)\s*\}/is',$CSSstr,$m);
20115   for($i=0; $i<count($m[0]); $i++) {
20116     if ($this->CSSselectMedia && !preg_match('/('.trim($this->CSSselectMedia).'|all)/i',$m[1][$i])) { 
20117       $CSSstr = preg_replace('/'.preg_quote($m[0][$i],'/').'/','',$CSSstr);
20118     }
20119     else {
20120       $CSSstr = preg_replace('/'.preg_quote($m[0][$i],'/').'/',' '.$m[2][$i].' ',$CSSstr);
20121     }
20122   }
20123     }
20124 
20125     $CSSstr = preg_replace('/(<\!\-\-|\-\->)/s',' ',$CSSstr);
20126     if ($CSSstr ) {
20127   preg_match_all('/(.*?)\{(.*?)\}/',$CSSstr,$styles);
20128   for($i=0; $i < count($styles[1]) ; $i++)  {
20129     // SET array e.g. $classproperties['COLOR'] = '#ffffff';
20130     $stylestr= trim($styles[2][$i]);
20131     $stylearr = explode(';',$stylestr);
20132     foreach($stylearr AS $sta) {
20133        if (trim($sta)) { 
20134       // mPDF 3.0
20135       // Changed to allow style="background: url('http://www.bpm1.com/bg.jpg')"
20136       list($property,$value) = explode(':',$sta,2);
20137       $property = trim($property);
20138       $value = preg_replace('/\s*!important/i','',$value);
20139       $value = trim($value);
20140       if ($property && ($value || $value==='0')) {
20141           $classproperties[strtoupper($property)] = $value;
20142       }
20143        }
20144     }
20145     $classproperties = $this->fixCSS($classproperties);
20146     $tagstr = strtoupper(trim($styles[1][$i]));
20147     $tagarr = explode(',',$tagstr);
20148     $pageselectors = false; // used to turn on $this->mirrorMargins
20149     foreach($tagarr AS $tg) {
20150       $tags = preg_split('/\s+/',trim($tg));
20151       $level = count($tags);
20152       $t = '';
20153       $t2 = '';
20154       $t3 = '';
20155       if (trim($tags[0])=='@PAGE') {
20156       if (isset($tags[0])) { $t = trim($tags[0]); }
20157       if (isset($tags[1])) { $t2 = trim($tags[1]); }
20158       if (isset($tags[2])) { $t3 = trim($tags[2]); }
20159       $tag = '';
20160       if ($level==1) { $tag = $t; }
20161       else if ($level==2 && preg_match('/^[:](.*)$/',$t2,$m)) { 
20162         $tag = $t.'>>PSEUDO>>'.$m[1]; 
20163         if ($m[1]=='LEFT' || $m[1]=='RIGHT') { $pageselectors = true; } // used to turn on $this->mirrorMargins 
20164       }
20165       else if ($level==2) { $tag = $t.'>>NAMED>>'.$t2; }
20166       else if ($level==3 && preg_match('/^[:](.*)$/',$t3,$m)) { 
20167         $tag = $t.'>>NAMED>>'.$t2.'>>PSEUDO>>'.$m[1]; 
20168         if ($m[1]=='LEFT' || $m[1]=='RIGHT') { $pageselectors = true; } // used to turn on $this->mirrorMargins
20169       }
20170       if (isset($this->CSS[$tag]) && $tag) { $this->CSS[$tag] = $this->array_merge_recursive_unique($this->CSS[$tag], $classproperties); }
20171       else if ($tag) { $this->CSS[$tag] = $classproperties; }
20172       }
20173 
20174       else if ($level == 1) {   // e.g. p or .class or #id or p.class or p#id
20175          if (isset($tags[0])) { $t = trim($tags[0]); }
20176          if ($t) {
20177       $tag = '';
20178       if (preg_match('/^[.](.*)$/',$t,$m)) { $tag = 'CLASS>>'.$m[1]; }
20179       else if (preg_match('/^[#](.*)$/',$t,$m)) { $tag = 'ID>>'.$m[1]; }
20180       else if (preg_match('/^('.$this->allowedCSStags.')[.](.*)$/',$t,$m)) { $tag = $m[1].'>>CLASS>>'.$m[2]; }
20181       else if (preg_match('/^('.$this->allowedCSStags.')[#](.*)$/',$t,$m)) { $tag = $m[1].'>>ID>>'.$m[2]; }
20182       else if (preg_match('/^('.$this->allowedCSStags.')$/',$t)) { $tag= $t; }
20183 
20184       if (isset($this->CSS[$tag]) && $tag) { $this->CSS[$tag] = $this->array_merge_recursive_unique($this->CSS[$tag], $classproperties); }
20185       else if ($tag) { $this->CSS[$tag] = $classproperties; }
20186          }
20187       }
20188       else {
20189        $tmp = array();
20190        for($n=0;$n<$level;$n++) {
20191          if (isset($tags[$n])) { $t = trim($tags[$n]); }
20192          else { $t = ''; }  // mPDF 4.0
20193          if ($t) {
20194       $tag = '';
20195       if (preg_match('/^[.](.*)$/',$t,$m)) { $tag = 'CLASS>>'.$m[1]; }
20196       else if (preg_match('/^[#](.*)$/',$t,$m)) { $tag = 'ID>>'.$m[1]; }
20197       else if (preg_match('/^('.$this->allowedCSStags.')[.](.*)$/',$t,$m)) { $tag = $m[1].'>>CLASS>>'.$m[2]; }
20198       else if (preg_match('/^('.$this->allowedCSStags.')[#](.*)$/',$t,$m)) { $tag = $m[1].'>>ID>>'.$m[2]; }
20199       else if (preg_match('/^('.$this->allowedCSStags.')$/',$t)) { $tag= $t; }
20200 
20201       if ($tag) $tmp[] = $tag;
20202       // mPDF 4.0
20203       else { break; }
20204         }
20205        }
20206        // mPDF 4.0
20207        if ($tag) {
20208          $x = &$this->cascadeCSS; 
20209          foreach($tmp AS $tp) { $x = &$x[$tp]; }
20210          $x = $this->array_merge_recursive_unique($x, $classproperties); 
20211          $x['depth'] = $level;
20212        }
20213       }
20214     }
20215     if ($pageselectors) { $this->mirrorMargins = true; }
20216       $properties = array();
20217       $values = array();
20218       $classproperties = array();
20219   }
20220 
20221     } // end of if
20222     //Remove CSS (tags and content), if any
20223     $regexp = '/<style.*?>(.*?)<\/style>/si'; // it can be <style> or <style type="txt/css"> 
20224     $html = preg_replace($regexp,'',$html);
20225 //print_r($this->CSS); exit;
20226 //print_r($this->cascadeCSS); exit;
20227     return $html;
20228 }
20229 
20230 function readInlineCSS($html)
20231 {
20232   //Fix incomplete CSS code
20233   $size = strlen($html)-1;
20234   if (substr($html,$size,1) != ';') $html .= ';';
20235   //Make CSS[Name-of-the-class] = array(key => value)
20236   $regexp = '|\\s*?(\\S+?):(.+?);|i';
20237   preg_match_all( $regexp, $html, $styleinfo);
20238   $properties = $styleinfo[1];
20239   $values = $styleinfo[2];
20240   //Array-properties and Array-values must have the SAME SIZE!
20241   $classproperties = array();
20242   for($i = 0; $i < count($properties) ; $i++) $classproperties[strtoupper($properties[$i])] = trim($values[$i]);
20243   return $this->fixCSS($classproperties);
20244 }
20245 
20246 
20247 
20248 function setCSS($arrayaux,$type='',$tag='') // type= INLINE | BLOCK // tag= BODY
20249 {
20250   if (!is_array($arrayaux)) return; //Removes PHP Warning
20251   // Set font size first so that e.g. MARGIN 0.83em works on font size for this element
20252   if (isset($arrayaux['FONT-SIZE'])) {
20253     $v = $arrayaux['FONT-SIZE'];
20254     if(is_numeric(substr($v,0,1))) {
20255       $mmsize = $this->ConvertSize($v,$this->FontSize);
20256       $this->SetFontSize( $mmsize*($this->k),false ); //Get size in points (pt)
20257     }
20258     else{
20259         $v = strtoupper($v);
20260       // mPDF 4.0
20261       if (isset($this->fontsizes[$v])) { 
20262         $this->SetFontSize( $this->fontsizes[$v]* $this->default_font_size,false);
20263       }
20264     }
20265     if ($tag == 'BODY') { $this->SetDefaultFontSize($this->FontSizePt); }
20266   }
20267 
20268 /*-- UNICODE-FONTS --*/
20269   if (isset($arrayaux['LANG']) && $this->useLang && $arrayaux['LANG'] && $this->is_MB && $arrayaux['LANG'] != $this->default_lang && ((strlen($arrayaux['LANG']) == 5 && $arrayaux['LANG'] != 'UTF-8') || strlen($arrayaux['LANG']) == 2)) {
20270     list ($codepage,$mpdf_pdf_unifonts,$mpdf_directionality,$mpdf_jSpacing) = GetCodepage($arrayaux['LANG']);
20271 /*-- CJK --*/
20272     if ($codepage == 'SHIFT_JIS') { $this->SetFont('sjis',$this->currentfontstyle,0,false); }
20273     else if ($codepage == 'UHC') { $this->SetFont('uhc',$this->currentfontstyle,0,false); }
20274     else if ($codepage == 'BIG5') { $this->SetFont('big5',$this->currentfontstyle,0,false); }
20275     else if ($codepage == 'GBK') { $this->SetFont('gb',$this->currentfontstyle,0,false); }
20276     else
20277 /*-- END CJK --*/
20278     if ($mpdf_pdf_unifonts) { $this->RestrictUnicodeFonts($mpdf_pdf_unifonts); }
20279     else { $this->RestrictUnicodeFonts($this->default_available_fonts ); }
20280     if ($mpdf_directionality == 'rtl') { $this->biDirectional = true; }
20281     if ($tag == 'BODY') {
20282       $this->jSpacing = $mpdf_jSpacing;
20283       $this->SetDirectionality($mpdf_directionality);
20284       $this->currentLang = $codepage;
20285       $this->default_lang = $codepage;
20286       $this->default_jSpacing = $mpdf_jSpacing;
20287       if ($mpdf_pdf_unifonts) { $this->default_available_fonts = $mpdf_pdf_unifonts; }
20288       $this->default_dir = $mpdf_directionality;
20289     }
20290     else if ($type == 'BLOCK') {
20291       $this->jSpacing = $mpdf_jSpacing;
20292     }
20293     else {  // INLINE
20294       if ($this->disableMultilingualJustify && $mpdf_jSpacing != $this->jSpacing && $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['align']=="J") {
20295                 $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['align']="";
20296       }
20297     }
20298   }
20299   else if ($this->useLang && $this->is_MB ) { 
20300     $this->RestrictUnicodeFonts($this->default_available_fonts ); 
20301     $this->jSpacing = $this->default_jSpacing;
20302   }
20303 /*-- END UNICODE-FONTS --*/
20304 
20305 
20306   // FOR INLINE and BLOCK OR 'BODY'
20307   if (isset($arrayaux['FONT-FAMILY'])) {
20308     $v = $arrayaux['FONT-FAMILY'];
20309     //If it is a font list, get all font types
20310     $aux_fontlist = explode(",",$v);
20311     $fonttype = $aux_fontlist[0];
20312     $fonttype = strtolower(trim($fonttype));
20313     if(($fonttype == 'helvetica') || ($fonttype == 'arial')) { $fonttype = 'sans-serif'; }
20314     else if($fonttype == 'helvetica-embedded')  { $fonttype = 'helvetica'; }
20315     // mPDF 4.0
20316     else if($fonttype == 'courier-embedded')  { $fonttype = 'courier'; }
20317     else if($fonttype == 'times-embedded')  { $fonttype = 'times'; }
20318     else if($fonttype == 'times')  { $fonttype = 'serif'; }
20319     else if($fonttype == 'courier')  { $fonttype = 'monospace'; }
20320     if ($tag == 'BODY') { 
20321       $this->SetDefaultFont($fonttype); 
20322     }
20323     $this->SetFont($fonttype,$this->currentfontstyle,0,false);
20324   }
20325   else { 
20326     $this->SetFont($this->currentfontfamily,$this->currentfontstyle,0,false); 
20327   }
20328 
20329    foreach($arrayaux as $k => $v) {
20330   if ($type != 'INLINE' && $tag != 'BODY') {
20331     switch($k){
20332     // BORDERS
20333     case 'BORDER-TOP':
20334       $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_top'] = $this->border_details($v);
20335       if ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_top']['s']) { $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border'] = 1; }
20336       break;
20337     case 'BORDER-BOTTOM':
20338       $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_bottom'] = $this->border_details($v);
20339       if ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_bottom']['s']) { $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border'] = 1; }
20340       break;
20341     case 'BORDER-LEFT':
20342       $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_left'] = $this->border_details($v);
20343       if ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_left']['s']) { $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border'] = 1; }
20344       break;
20345     case 'BORDER-RIGHT':
20346       $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_right'] = $this->border_details($v);
20347       if ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_right']['s']) { $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border'] = 1; }
20348       break;
20349 
20350     // PADDING
20351     case 'PADDING-TOP':
20352       $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_top'] = $this->ConvertSize($v,$this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false);
20353       break;
20354     case 'PADDING-BOTTOM':
20355       $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_bottom'] = $this->ConvertSize($v,$this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false);
20356       break;
20357     case 'PADDING-LEFT':
20358       $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_left'] = $this->ConvertSize($v,$this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false);
20359       break;
20360     case 'PADDING-RIGHT':
20361       $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_right'] = $this->ConvertSize($v,$this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false);
20362       break;
20363 
20364     // MARGINS
20365     case 'MARGIN-TOP':
20366       // mPDF 4.2 Collaspe vertical block margins
20367       $tmp = $this->ConvertSize($v,$this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false);
20368       if (isset($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['lastbottommargin'])) {
20369         if ($tmp > $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['lastbottommargin']) {
20370           $tmp -= $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['lastbottommargin'];
20371         }
20372         else { 
20373           $tmp = 0;
20374         }
20375       }
20376       $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['margin_top'] = $tmp;
20377       break;
20378     case 'MARGIN-BOTTOM':
20379       $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['margin_bottom'] = $this->ConvertSize($v,$this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false);
20380       break;
20381     case 'MARGIN-LEFT':
20382       $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['margin_left'] = $this->ConvertSize($v,$this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false);
20383       break;
20384     case 'MARGIN-RIGHT':
20385       $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['margin_right'] = $this->ConvertSize($v,$this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false);
20386       break;
20387 
20388 /*-- BORDER-RADIUS --*/
20389     case 'BORDER-TOP-LEFT-RADIUS-H':
20390       $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_radius_TL_H'] = $this->ConvertSize($v,$this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false);
20391       break;
20392     case 'BORDER-TOP-LEFT-RADIUS-V':
20393       $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_radius_TL_V'] = $this->ConvertSize($v,$this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false);
20394       break;
20395     case 'BORDER-TOP-RIGHT-RADIUS-H':
20396       $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_radius_TR_H'] = $this->ConvertSize($v,$this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false);
20397       break;
20398     case 'BORDER-TOP-RIGHT-RADIUS-V':
20399       $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_radius_TR_V'] = $this->ConvertSize($v,$this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false);
20400       break;
20401     case 'BORDER-BOTTOM-LEFT-RADIUS-H':
20402       $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_radius_BL_H'] = $this->ConvertSize($v,$this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false);
20403       break;
20404     case 'BORDER-BOTTOM-LEFT-RADIUS-V':
20405       $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_radius_BL_V'] = $this->ConvertSize($v,$this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false);
20406       break;
20407     case 'BORDER-BOTTOM-RIGHT-RADIUS-H':
20408       $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_radius_BR_H'] = $this->ConvertSize($v,$this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false);
20409       break;
20410     case 'BORDER-BOTTOM-RIGHT-RADIUS-V':
20411       $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_radius_BR_V'] = $this->ConvertSize($v,$this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false);
20412       break;
20413 /*-- END BORDER-RADIUS --*/
20414 
20415     case 'BACKGROUND-CLIP':
20416       if (strtoupper($v) == 'PADDING-BOX') { $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['background_clip'] = 'padding-box'; }
20417       break;
20418 
20419     case 'PAGE-BREAK-AFTER':
20420       if (strtoupper($v) == 'AVOID') { $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['page_break_after_avoid'] = true; }
20421       break;
20422 
20423     case 'WIDTH':
20424       // mPDF 4.0 Allow em support and avoid 'auto'
20425       if (strtoupper($v) != 'AUTO') { 
20426         $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['css_set_width'] = $this->ConvertSize($v,$this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize,false); 
20427       }
20428       break;
20429 
20430     case 'TEXT-INDENT':
20431       // mPDF 4.0 Left as raw value (may include 1% or 2em)
20432       $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['text_indent'] = $v;
20433       break;
20434 
20435     }//end of switch($k)
20436   }
20437 
20438 
20439   if ($type != 'INLINE') {  // includes BODY tag
20440     switch($k){
20441 
20442     case 'MARGIN-COLLAPSE': // Custom tag to collapse margins at top and bottom of page
20443       if (strtoupper($v) == 'COLLAPSE') { $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['margin_collapse'] = true; }
20444       break;
20445 
20446     case 'LINE-HEIGHT': 
20447       // mPDF 4.2
20448       $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['line_height'] = $this->fixLineheight($v);
20449       if (!$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['line_height'] ) { $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['line_height'] = $this->normalLineheight; }
20450       break;
20451 
20452     case 'TEXT-ALIGN': //left right center justify
20453       switch (strtoupper($v)) {
20454         case 'LEFT': 
20455                         $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['align']="L";
20456                         break;
20457         case 'CENTER': 
20458                         $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['align']="C";
20459                         break;
20460         case 'RIGHT': 
20461                         $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['align']="R";
20462                         break;
20463         case 'JUSTIFY': 
20464                         $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['align']="J";
20465                         break;
20466       }
20467       break;
20468 
20469     }//end of switch($k)
20470   }
20471 
20472 
20473   // FOR INLINE and BLOCK
20474     switch($k){
20475     case 'TEXT-ALIGN': //left right center justify
20476       if (strtoupper($v) == 'NOJUSTIFY' && $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['align']=="J") {
20477                         $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['align']="";
20478       }
20479       break;
20480     // bgcolor only - to stay consistent with original html2fpdf
20481     case 'BACKGROUND': 
20482     case 'BACKGROUND-COLOR': 
20483       $cor = $this->ConvertColor($v);
20484       if ($cor) { 
20485          // mPDF 3.0
20486          if ($tag  == 'BODY') {
20487         $this->bodyBackgroundColor = $cor;
20488          }
20489          else if ($type == 'INLINE') {
20490         $this->spanbgcolorarray = $cor;
20491         $this->spanbgcolor = true;
20492          }
20493          else {
20494         $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['bgcolorarray'] = $cor;
20495         $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['bgcolor'] = true;
20496          }
20497       }
20498       else if ($type != 'INLINE') {
20499           // mPDF 3.0
20500           if ($this->ColActive || $this->keep_block_together) { 
20501           $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['bgcolorarray'] = $this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['bgcolorarray'] ;
20502           $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['bgcolor'] = $this->blk[$this->blklvl-1]['bgcolor'] ;
20503         }
20504       }
20505       break;
20506 
20507 /*-- GRADIENTS --*/
20508     case 'BACKGROUND-GRADIENT': 
20509       if ($type  == 'BLOCK') {
20510         $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['gradient'] = $v;
20511       }
20512       break;
20513 /*-- END GRADIENTS --*/
20514 
20515 
20516     case 'FONT-STYLE': // italic normal oblique
20517       switch (strtoupper($v)) {
20518         case 'ITALIC': 
20519         case 'OBLIQUE': 
20520                   $this->SetStyle('I',true);
20521           break;
20522         case 'NORMAL': 
20523                   $this->SetStyle('I',false);
20524           break;
20525       }
20526       break;
20527 
20528     case 'FONT-WEIGHT': // normal bold //Does not support: bolder, lighter, 100..900(step value=100)
20529       switch (strtoupper($v)) {
20530         case 'BOLD': 
20531                   $this->SetStyle('B',true);
20532           break;
20533         case 'NORMAL': 
20534                   $this->SetStyle('B',false);
20535           break;
20536       }
20537       break;
20538 
20539     case 'VERTICAL-ALIGN': //super and sub only dealt with here e.g. <SUB> and <SUP>
20540       switch (strtoupper($v)) {
20541         case 'SUPER': 
20542                         $this->SUP=true;
20543                         break;
20544         case 'SUB': 
20545                         $this->SUB=true;
20546                         break;
20547       }
20548       break;
20549 
20550     case 'TEXT-DECORATION': // none underline line-through (strikeout) //Does not support: overline, blink
20551       if (stristr($v,'LINE-THROUGH')) {
20552           $this->strike = true;
20553       }
20554       if (stristr($v,'UNDERLINE')) {
20555                   $this->SetStyle('U',true);
20556       }
20557       break;
20558 
20559     case 'TEXT-TRANSFORM': // none uppercase lowercase //Does not support: capitalize
20560       switch (strtoupper($v)) { //Not working 100%
20561         case 'UPPERCASE':
20562           $this->toupper=true;
20563           break;
20564         case 'LOWERCASE':
20565           $this->tolower=true;
20566           break;
20567         case 'NONE': break;
20568       }
20569       break;
20570 
20571     case 'OUTLINE-WIDTH': 
20572       switch(strtoupper($v)) {
20573         case 'THIN': $v = '0.03em'; break;
20574         case 'MEDIUM': $v = '0.05em'; break;
20575         case 'THICK': $v = '0.07em'; break;
20576       }
20577       $this->outlineparam['WIDTH'] = $this->ConvertSize($v,$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'],$this->FontSize);
20578       break;
20579 
20580     case 'OUTLINE-COLOR': 
20581       if (strtoupper($v) == 'INVERT') {
20582          if ($this->colorarray) {
20583         $cor = $this->colorarray;
20584         $this->outlineparam['COLOR'] = array('R'=> (255-$cor['R']), 'G'=> (255-$cor['G']), 'B'=> (255-$cor['B']));
20585          }
20586          else {
20587         $this->outlineparam['COLOR'] = array('R'=> 255, 'G'=> 255, 'B'=> 255);
20588          }
20589       }
20590       else { 
20591           $cor = $this->ConvertColor($v);
20592         if ($cor) { $this->outlineparam['COLOR'] = $cor ; }   
20593       }
20594       break;
20595 
20596     case 'COLOR': // font color
20597       $cor = $this->ConvertColor($v);
20598       if ($cor) { 
20599         $this->colorarray = $cor;
20600         $this->SetTextColor($cor['R'],$cor['G'],$cor['B']);
20601         $this->issetcolor = true;
20602       }
20603       break;
20604 
20605     case 'DIR': 
20606       $this->biDirectional = true;
20607       break;
20608 
20609     }//end of switch($k)
20610 
20611 
20612    }//end of foreach
20613 }
20614 
20615 function SetStyle($tag,$enable)
20616 {
20617   //Modify style and select corresponding font
20618   $this->$tag+=($enable ? 1 : -1);
20619   $style='';
20620   //Fix some SetStyle misuse
20621   if ($this->$tag < 0) $this->$tag = 0;
20622   if ($this->$tag > 1) $this->$tag = 1;
20623   foreach(array('B','I','U') as $s) {
20624     if($this->$s>0) {
20625       $style.=$s;
20626     }
20627   }
20628   $this->currentfontstyle=$style;
20629   $this->SetFont('',$style,0,false);
20630 }
20631 
20632 function GetStyle()
20633 {
20634   $style='';
20635   foreach(array('B','I','U') as $s) {
20636     if($this->$s>0) {
20637       $style.=$s;
20638     }
20639   }
20640   return($style);
20641 }
20642 
20643 
20644 function DisableTags($str='')
20645 {
20646   if ($str == '') //enable all tags
20647   {
20648     //Insert new supported tags in the long string below.
20650   // Added custom tags <indexentry>
20651     $this->enabledtags = "<span><s><strike><del><bdo><big><small><ins><cite><acronym><font><sup><sub><b><u><i><a><strong><em><code><samp><tt><kbd><var><q><table><thead><tfoot><tbody><tr><th><td><ol><ul><li><dl><dt><dd><form><input><select><textarea><option><div><p><h1><h2><h3><h4><h5><h6><pre><center><blockquote><address><hr><img><br><indexentry><indexinsert><bookmark><watermarktext><watermarkimage><tts><ttz><tta><column_break><columnbreak><newcolumn><newpage><page_break><pagebreak><formfeed><columns><toc><tocentry><tocpagebreak><pageheader><pagefooter><setpageheader><setpagefooter><sethtmlpageheader><sethtmlpagefooter><annotation><template><jpgraph><barcode><dottab>";
20652   }
20653   else
20654   {
20655     $str = explode(",",$str);
20656     foreach($str as $v) $this->enabledtags = str_replace(trim($v),'',$this->enabledtags);
20657   }
20658 }
20659 
20660 
20661 /*-- TABLES --*/
20662 
20663 // mPDF 4.2.015
20664 function finaliseCellLineHeight($lhxt, $maxfontsize, $maxlineHeight, $lhfixed, $forceExactLineheight) {
20665   $af = 0;  // Above font
20666   $bf = 0;  // Below font
20667   $mta = 0; // Maximum top-aligned 
20668   $mba = 0; // Maximum bottom-aligned 
20669   if ($lhxt['BS']) {
20670     $af = max($af, ($lhxt['BS'] - ($maxfontsize * (0.5 + $this->baselineC))));
20671   }
20672   if ($lhxt['M']) { 
20673     $af = max($af, ($lhxt['M'] - $maxfontsize)/2);
20674     $bf = max($bf, ($lhxt['M'] - $maxfontsize)/2);
20675   }
20676   if ($lhxt['TT']) { 
20677     $bf = max($bf, ($lhxt['TT'] - $maxfontsize));
20678   }
20679   if ($lhxt['TB']) { 
20680     $af = max($af, ($lhxt['TB'] - $maxfontsize));
20681   }
20682   if ($lhxt['T']) { 
20683     $mta = max($mta, $lhxt['T']);
20684   }
20685   if ($lhxt['B']) { 
20686     $mba = max($mba, $lhxt['B']);
20687   }
20688   if ((!$lhfixed || !$forceExactLineheight) && ($af > (($maxlineHeight - $maxfontsize)/2) || $bf > (($maxlineHeight - $maxfontsize)/2))) {
20689     $maxlineHeight = $maxfontsize + $af + $bf;
20690   }
20691   else if (!$lhfixed) { $af = $bf = ($maxlineHeight - $maxfontsize)/2; }
20692   if ($mta > $maxlineHeight) { 
20693     $bf += ($mta - $maxlineHeight);
20694     $maxlineHeight = $mta;
20695   }
20696   if ($mba > $maxlineHeight) { 
20697     $af += ($mba - $maxlineHeight);
20698     $maxlineHeight = $mba;
20699   }
20700   return $maxlineHeight; 
20701 }
20702 
20703 // mPDF 4.2.015
20704 function TableWordWrap($maxwidth, $forcewrap = 0, $textbuffer = '', $def_fontsize, $returnarray=false) {  // NB ** returnarray used in flowchart
20705    $biggestword=0;
20706    $toonarrow=false;
20707 
20708    $curlyquote = mb_convert_encoding("\xe2\x80\x9e",$this->mb_enc,'UTF-8');
20709    $curlylowquote = mb_convert_encoding("\xe2\x80\x9d",$this->mb_enc,'UTF-8');
20710 
20711    // mPDF 3.0 Don't use ltrim as this gets rid of \n - new line from <br>
20712    //$textbuffer[0][0] = ltrim($textbuffer[0][0]);
20713    $textbuffer[0][0] = preg_replace('/^[ ]*/','',$textbuffer[0][0]);
20714 
20715    if ((count($textbuffer) == 0) or ((count($textbuffer) == 1) && ($textbuffer[0][0] == ''))) { return 0; }
20716 
20717    $text = '';
20718    $lhfixed = false; 
20719    if (preg_match('/([0-9.,]+)mm/',$this->table_lineheight)) { $lhfixed = true; }
20720    if ($lhfixed) { $def_lineheight = $this->_computeLineheight($this->table_lineheight, $def_fontsize);}
20721    else { $def_lineheight = 0; }
20722    // START OF NEW LINE
20723    // Initialise lineheight variables
20724    $maxfontsize = 0;
20725    $forceExactLineheight = true;
20726    $lhxt = array('BS'=>0, 'M'=>0, 'TT'=>0, 'TB'=>0, 'T'=>0, 'B'=>0);
20727    $maxlineHeight = $def_lineheight ;
20728 
20729    $ch = 0;
20730    $width = 0;
20731    $ln = 1; // Counts line number
20732    $mxw = $this->GetStringWidth('W'); // Keep tabs on Maxwidth of actual text
20733    foreach ($textbuffer as $cctr=>$chunk) {
20734   $line = $chunk[0];
20735 
20736   //IMAGE
20737       if (substr($line,0,3) == "\xbb\xa4\xac") { //identifier has been identified!
20738     // mPDF 4.0
20739     $objattr = $this->_getObjAttr($line);
20740     if ($objattr['type'] == 'nestedtable') {
20741       // END OF LINE
20742       // Finalise & add lineheight
20743       $ch += $this->finaliseCellLineHeight($lhxt, $maxfontsize, $maxlineHeight, $lhfixed, $forceExactLineheight);
20744       $level = $objattr['level'];
20745       $ih = $this->table[($level+1)][$objattr['nestedcontent']]['h']; // nested table width
20746       $ch += $ih;
20747       // START OF NEW LINE
20748       // Initialise lineheight variables
20749       $ln++;
20750       $maxfontsize = 0;
20751       $forceExactLineheight = true;
20752       $lhxt = array('BS'=>0, 'M'=>0, 'TT'=>0, 'TB'=>0, 'T'=>0, 'B'=>0);
20753       $maxlineHeight = $def_lineheight ;
20754       $width = 0;
20755       $text = "";
20756       continue;
20757     }
20758 
20759     list($skipln,$iw,$ih) = $this->inlineObject($specialcontent['type'],0,0, $objattr, $this->lMargin,$width,$maxwidth,$maxlineHeight,false,true);
20760     if ($objattr['type'] == 'hr') {
20761       // END OF LINE
20762       // Finalise & add lineheight 
20763       $ch += $this->finaliseCellLineHeight($lhxt, $maxfontsize, $maxlineHeight, $lhfixed, $forceExactLineheight);
20764       // Add HR height
20765       $ch += $ih;
20766       // START OF NEW LINE
20767       // Initialise lineheight variables
20768       $ln++;
20769       $maxfontsize = 0;
20770       $forceExactLineheight = true;
20771       $lhxt = array('BS'=>0, 'M'=>0, 'TT'=>0, 'TB'=>0, 'T'=>0, 'B'=>0);
20772       $maxlineHeight = $def_lineheight ;
20773       $width = 0;
20774       $text = "";
20775       continue;
20776     }
20777 
20778     if ($skipln==1 || $skipln==-2) {
20779       // Finish last line
20780       // END OF LINE
20781       // Finalise & add lineheight 
20782       $ch += $this->finaliseCellLineHeight($lhxt, $maxfontsize, $maxlineHeight, $lhfixed, $forceExactLineheight);
20783       // START OF NEW LINE
20784       // Initialise lineheight variables
20785       $maxfontsize = 0;
20786       $forceExactLineheight = true;
20787       $lhxt = array('BS'=>0, 'M'=>0, 'TT'=>0, 'TB'=>0, 'T'=>0, 'B'=>0);
20788       $maxlineHeight = $def_lineheight ;
20789       $ln++;
20790       $width = 0;
20791       $text = "";
20792     }
20793     $va = $objattr['vertical-align']; 
20794     if ($va) {
20795       $lhxt[$va] = max($lhxt[$va], $ih);
20796     }
20797     if ($lhfixed && $ih > $def_fontsize) { $forceExactLineheight = false; }
20798     $maxlineHeight = max($maxlineHeight ,$ih);
20799     $width += $iw;
20800     continue;
20801   }
20802 
20803   // SET FONT SIZE/STYLE from $chunk[n]
20804   // FONTSIZE
20805   if(isset($chunk[11]) and $chunk[11] != '') { 
20806      if ($this->shrin_k) {
20807     $this->SetFontSize($chunk[11]/$this->shrin_k,false); 
20808      }
20809      else {
20810     $this->SetFontSize($chunk[11],false); 
20811      }
20812   }
20813 
20814   // mPDF 3.0 Moved to after set FontSize
20815   if ($line == "\n") {
20816     // END OF LINE
20817     $maxfontsize = max($maxfontsize,$this->FontSize); 
20818     $fh = $this->_computeLineheight($this->table_lineheight);
20819     if ($lhfixed && $this->FontSize > $def_fontsize) {
20820       $fh = $this->FontSize;
20821       $forceExactLineheight = false; 
20822     }
20823     $maxlineHeight = max($maxlineHeight,$fh); 
20824 
20825     // Finalise & add lineheight 
20826     $ch += $this->finaliseCellLineHeight($lhxt, $maxfontsize, $maxlineHeight, $lhfixed, $forceExactLineheight);
20827     // START OF NEW LINE
20828     // Initialise lineheight variables
20829     $maxfontsize = 0;
20830     $forceExactLineheight = true;
20831     $lhxt = array('BS'=>0, 'M'=>0, 'TT'=>0, 'TB'=>0, 'T'=>0, 'B'=>0);
20832     $maxlineHeight = $this->_computeLineheight($this->table_lineheight);
20833     $ln++;
20834     $text = "";
20835     $width = 0;
20836     // mPDF 3.0 Reset FontSize
20837     if(isset($chunk[11]) and $chunk[11] != '') { 
20838       $this->SetFontSize($this->default_font_size,false);
20839     }
20840     continue;
20841   }
20842 
20843   // FONTFAMILY
20844   if(isset($chunk[4]) and $chunk[4] != '') { $font = $this->SetFont($chunk[4],$this->FontStyle,0,false); }
20845 
20846   // FONT STYLE B I U
20847   if(isset($chunk[2]) and $chunk[2] != '') {
20848     if (strpos($chunk[2],"B") !== false) $this->SetStyle('B',true); 
20849         if (strpos($chunk[2],"I") !== false) $this->SetStyle('I',true); 
20850   }
20851 
20852   $space = $this->GetStringWidth(' ');
20853 
20854   if (mb_substr($line,0,1,$this->mb_enc ) == ' ') {   // line (chunk) starts with a space
20855     $width += $space;
20856     $text .= ' ';
20857   }
20858 
20859   if (mb_substr($line,(mb_strlen($line,$this->mb_enc )-1),1,$this->mb_enc ) == ' ') { $lsend = true; }  // line (chunk) ends with a space
20860   else { $lsend = false; }
20861   $line= ltrim($line);
20862   $line= $this->mb_rtrim($line, $this->mb_enc);
20863   if ($line == '') { continue; }
20864 
20865 /*-- UNICODE-FONTS --*/
20866   if ($this->is_MB && !$this->usingCoreFont) {
20867     $words = mb_split(' ', $line);
20868   }
20869   else {
20870 /*-- END UNICODE-FONTS --*/
20871     $words = explode(' ', $line);
20872   } // *UNICODE-FONTS*
20873 
20874   foreach ($words as $word) {
20875     $word = $this->mb_rtrim($word, $this->mb_enc);
20876     $word = ltrim($word);
20877     $wordwidth = $this->GetStringWidth($word);
20878 
20879 
20880     //maxwidth is insufficient for one word
20881     if ($wordwidth > $maxwidth + 0.0001) {
20882       $firstchunk=true;
20883       while($wordwidth > $maxwidth + 0.0001) {
20884         $chw = 0; // check width
20885         for ( $i = 0; $i < mb_strlen($word, $this->mb_enc ); $i++ ) {
20886           $chw = $this->GetStringWidth(mb_substr($word,0,$i+1,$this->mb_enc ));
20887           if ($chw > $maxwidth) {
20888             if ($text && $firstchunk) {
20889               // END OF LINE
20890               // Finalise & add lineheight 
20891               $maxfontsize = max($maxfontsize,$this->FontSize); 
20892               $fh = $this->_computeLineheight($this->table_lineheight);
20893               if ($lhfixed && $this->FontSize > $def_fontsize) {
20894                 $fh = $this->FontSize;
20895                 $forceExactLineheight = false; 
20896               }
20897               $maxlineHeight = max($maxlineHeight,$fh); 
20898               $ch += $this->finaliseCellLineHeight($lhxt, $maxfontsize, $maxlineHeight, $lhfixed, $forceExactLineheight);
20899               // START OF NEW LINE
20900               // Initialise lineheight variables
20901               $maxfontsize = $this->FontSize;
20902               $forceExactLineheight = true;
20903               $lhxt = array('BS'=>0, 'M'=>0, 'TT'=>0, 'TB'=>0, 'T'=>0, 'B'=>0);
20904               $maxlineHeight = $this->_computeLineheight($this->table_lineheight);
20905               $ln++;
20906             }
20907             // END OF LINE
20908             // Finalise & add lineheight 
20909             $maxfontsize = max($maxfontsize,$this->FontSize); 
20910             $fh = $this->_computeLineheight($this->table_lineheight);
20911             if ($lhfixed && $this->FontSize > $def_fontsize) {
20912               $fh = $this->FontSize;
20913               $forceExactLineheight = false; 
20914             }
20915             $maxlineHeight = max($maxlineHeight,$fh); 
20916             $ch += $this->finaliseCellLineHeight($lhxt, $maxfontsize, $maxlineHeight, $lhfixed, $forceExactLineheight);
20917             // START OF NEW LINE
20918             // Initialise lineheight variables
20919             $maxfontsize = $this->FontSize;
20920             $forceExactLineheight = true;
20921             $lhxt = array('BS'=>0, 'M'=>0, 'TT'=>0, 'TB'=>0, 'T'=>0, 'B'=>0);
20922             $maxlineHeight = $this->_computeLineheight($this->table_lineheight);
20923             $ln++;
20924             $mxw = $maxwidth;
20925             $text = mb_substr($word,0,$i,$this->mb_enc );
20926             $word = mb_substr($word,$i,mb_strlen($word, $this->mb_enc )-$i,$this->mb_enc );
20927             $wordwidth = $this->GetStringWidth($word);
20928             $width = 0; 
20929             $firstchunk=false;
20930             break;
20931           }
20932         }
20933         // mPDF 4.2.015 to catch errors - added $i==0
20934         if (mb_strlen($word, $this->mb_enc )<2 || $i==0) { 
20935           $wordwidth = $maxwidth - 0.0001;
20936           if ($this->debug) { $this->Error("Table cell width calculated less than that needed for single character!"); }
20937         }
20938         $firstchunk=false;
20939       }
20940     }
20941     // Word fits on line...
20942     if ($width + $wordwidth  < $maxwidth + 0.0001) {
20943       $mxw = max($mxw, ($width+$wordwidth));
20944       $width += $wordwidth + $space;
20945       $text .= $word.' ';
20946     }
20947     // Word does not fit on line...
20948     else {
20949       $alloworphans = false;
20950       // In case of orphan punctuation or SUB/SUP
20951       // Strip end punctuation
20952       // mPDF 4.2 Only allow 1 orphan character {1}
20953       $tmp = preg_replace('/[\.),;:!?"'.$curlyquote . $curlylowquote ."\xef\xbc\x8c\xe3\x80\x82".']{1}$/','',$word);
20954       if ($tmp !== $word) {
20955         $tmpwidth = $this->GetStringWidth($tmp);
20956         if ($width + $tmpwidth  < $maxwidth + 0.0001) { $alloworphans = true; }
20957       }
20958       // If line = SUB/SUP to max of orphansallowed ( $this->SUP || $this->SUB ) // mPDF 3.0
20959       if(( (isset($chunk[5]) and $chunk[5]) || (isset($chunk[6]) and $chunk[6])) && strlen($word) <= $this->orphansAllowed) {
20960         $alloworphans = true;
20961       }
20962 
20963 
20964       // if [stripped] word fits
20965       if ($alloworphans) {
20966         $mxw = $maxwidth;
20967         $width += $wordwidth + $space;
20968         $text .= $word.' ';
20969       }
20970       else {
20971 /*-- HYPHENATION --*/
20972         // mPDF 3.0 Soft Hyphens chr(173)
20973         if (($this->is_MB && preg_match("/\xc2\xad/",$word)) || (!$this->is_MB && preg_match("/".chr(173)."/",$word) && ($this->FontFamily!='symbol' && $this->FontFamily!='zapfdingbats')) ) {
20974           list($success,$pre,$post,$prelength) = $this->softHyphenate($word, ($maxwidth - $width));
20975           if ($success) { 
20976             $text .= $pre.'-';
20977             $word = $post;
20978             $wordwidth = $this->GetStringWidth($word);
20979           }
20980         }
20981         else if ($this->hyphenate || ($this->hyphenateTables)) { 
20982           list($success,$pre,$post,$prelength) = $this->hyphenateWord($word, ($maxwidth - $width));
20983           if ($success) { 
20984             $text .= $pre.'-';
20985             $word = $post;
20986             $wordwidth = $this->GetStringWidth($word);
20987           }
20988         }
20989 /*-- END HYPHENATION --*/
20990         // END OF LINE
20991         // Finalise & add lineheight 
20992         $maxfontsize = max($maxfontsize,$this->FontSize); 
20993         $fh = $this->_computeLineheight($this->table_lineheight);
20994         if ($lhfixed && $this->FontSize > $def_fontsize) {
20995           $fh = $this->FontSize;
20996           $forceExactLineheight = false; 
20997         }
20998         $maxlineHeight = max($maxlineHeight,$fh); 
20999         $ch += $this->finaliseCellLineHeight($lhxt, $maxfontsize, $maxlineHeight, $lhfixed, $forceExactLineheight);
21000         $mxw = $maxwidth;
21001         // START OF NEW LINE
21002         // Initialise lineheight variables
21003         $maxfontsize = $this->FontSize;
21004         $forceExactLineheight = true;
21005         $lhxt = array('BS'=>0, 'M'=>0, 'TT'=>0, 'TB'=>0, 'T'=>0, 'B'=>0);
21006         $maxlineHeight = $this->_computeLineheight($this->table_lineheight);
21007         $ln++;
21008         $width = $wordwidth + $space;
21009         $text = $word.' ';
21010       }
21011             }
21012     $maxfontsize = max($maxfontsize,$this->FontSize); 
21013     $fh = $this->_computeLineheight($this->table_lineheight);
21014     if ($lhfixed && $this->FontSize > $def_fontsize) {
21015       $fh = $this->FontSize;
21016       $forceExactLineheight = false; 
21017     }
21018     $maxlineHeight = max($maxlineHeight,$fh); 
21019   }
21020 
21021   // End of textbuffer chunk
21022   if (!$lsend) {
21023     $width -= $space;
21024     $text = $this->mb_rtrim($text , $this->mb_enc);
21025   }
21026 
21027   // RESET FONT SIZE/STYLE
21028   // RESETTING VALUES
21029   //Now we must deactivate what we have used
21030   if(isset($chunk[2]) and $chunk[2] != '') {
21031     $this->SetStyle('B',false);
21032     $this->SetStyle('I',false);
21033   }
21034   if(isset($chunk[4]) and $chunk[4] != '') {
21035     $this->SetFont($this->default_font,$this->FontStyle,0,false);
21036   }
21037   if(isset($chunk[11]) and $chunk[11] != '') { 
21038     $this->SetFontSize($this->default_font_size,false);
21039   }
21040    }
21041    // Finalise lineheight if something output on line and add
21042    if ($width) {
21043   $ch += $this->finaliseCellLineHeight($lhxt, $maxfontsize, $maxlineHeight, $lhfixed, $forceExactLineheight);
21044    }
21045    if ($returnarray) { return array($ch,$ln,$mxw); }
21046    else { return $ch; }
21047 
21048 }
21049 
21050 
21051 function TableCheckMinWidth(&$text, $maxwidth, $forcewrap = 0, $textbuffer = '')
21052 {
21053     $biggestword=0;
21054     $toonarrow=false;
21055   if ((count($textbuffer) == 0) or ((count($textbuffer) == 1) && ($textbuffer[0][0] == ''))) { return 0; }
21056 
21057     foreach ($textbuffer as $chunk) {
21058 
21059     $line = $chunk[0];
21060 
21061     // IMAGES & FORM ELEMENTS
21062         if (substr($line,0,3) == "\xbb\xa4\xac") { //inline object - FORM element or IMAGE!
21063       // mPDF 4.0
21064       $objattr = $this->_getObjAttr($line);
21065       if ($objattr['type']!='hr' && isset($objattr['width']) && ($objattr['width']/$this->shrin_k) > ($maxwidth + 0.0001) ) { 
21066         if (($objattr['width']/$this->shrin_k) > $biggestword) { $biggestword = ($objattr['width']/$this->shrin_k); }
21067         $toonarrow=true;
21068       }
21069       continue;
21070     }
21071 
21072     if ($line == "\n") {
21073       continue;
21074     }
21075         $line = ltrim($line );
21076         $line = $this->mb_rtrim($line , $this->mb_enc);
21077     // SET FONT SIZE/STYLE from $chunk[n]
21078 
21079     // FONTSIZE
21080         if(isset($chunk[11]) and $chunk[11] != '') { 
21081        if ($this->shrin_k) {
21082       $this->SetFontSize($chunk[11]/$this->shrin_k,false); 
21083        }
21084        else {
21085       $this->SetFontSize($chunk[11],false); 
21086        }
21087     }
21088     // FONTFAMILY
21089         if(isset($chunk[4]) and $chunk[4] != '') { $font = $this->SetFont($chunk[4],$this->FontStyle,0,false); }
21090     // B I U
21091         if(isset($chunk[2]) and $chunk[2] != '') {
21092             if (strpos($chunk[2],"B") !== false) $this->SetStyle('B',true);
21093             if (strpos($chunk[2],"I") !== false) $this->SetStyle('I',true);
21094         }
21095 
21096 /*-- UNICODE-FONTS --*/
21097   if ($this->is_MB && !$this->usingCoreFont) {
21098     $words = mb_split(' ', $line);
21099   }
21100   else {
21101 /*-- END UNICODE-FONTS --*/
21102     $words = explode(' ', $line);
21103   } // *UNICODE-FONTS*
21104   foreach ($words as $word) {
21105     $word = $this->mb_rtrim($word, $this->mb_enc);
21106     $word = ltrim($word);
21107     $wordwidth = $this->GetStringWidth($word);
21108 
21109     //EDITEI
21110     //Warn user that maxwidth is insufficient
21111     if ($wordwidth > $maxwidth + 0.0001) {
21112       if ($wordwidth > $biggestword) { $biggestword = $wordwidth; }
21113       $toonarrow=true;
21114     }
21115 
21116   }
21117 
21118   // RESET FONT SIZE/STYLE
21119   // RESETTING VALUES
21120   //Now we must deactivate what we have used
21121   if(isset($chunk[2]) and $chunk[2] != '') {
21122          $this->SetStyle('B',false);
21123          $this->SetStyle('I',false);
21124   }
21125   if(isset($chunk[4]) and $chunk[4] != '') {
21126     $this->SetFont($this->default_font,$this->FontStyle,0,false);
21127   }
21128   if(isset($chunk[11]) and $chunk[11] != '') { 
21129     $this->SetFontSize($this->default_font_size,false);
21130   }
21131     }
21132 
21133     //Return -(wordsize) if word is bigger than maxwidth 
21134   // ADDED
21135       if (($toonarrow) && ($this->table_error_report)) {
21136     $this->Error("Word is too long to fit in table - ".$this->table_error_report_param); 
21137   }
21138     if ($toonarrow) return -$biggestword;
21139     else return 1;
21140 }
21141 
21142 function shrinkTable(&$table,$k) {
21143     $table['border_spacing_H'] /= $k;
21144     $table['border_spacing_V'] /= $k;
21145 
21146     $table['padding']['T'] /= $k;
21147     $table['padding']['R'] /= $k;
21148     $table['padding']['B'] /= $k;
21149     $table['padding']['L'] /= $k;
21150 
21151     $table['margin']['T'] /= $k;
21152     $table['margin']['R'] /= $k;
21153     $table['margin']['B'] /= $k;
21154     $table['margin']['L'] /= $k;
21155 
21156     $table['border_details']['T']['w'] /= $k;
21157     $table['border_details']['R']['w'] /= $k;
21158     $table['border_details']['B']['w'] /= $k;
21159     $table['border_details']['L']['w'] /= $k;
21160 
21161     if (isset($table['max_cell_border_width']['T'])) $table['max_cell_border_width']['T'] /= $k;
21162     if (isset($table['max_cell_border_width']['R'])) $table['max_cell_border_width']['R'] /= $k;
21163     if (isset($table['max_cell_border_width']['B'])) $table['max_cell_border_width']['B'] /= $k;
21164     if (isset($table['max_cell_border_width']['L'])) $table['max_cell_border_width']['L'] /= $k;
21165 
21166     if ($this->simpleTables){ // mPDF 4.2.017
21167       $table['simple']['border_details']['T']['w'] /= $k;
21168       $table['simple']['border_details']['R']['w'] /= $k;
21169       $table['simple']['border_details']['B']['w'] /= $k;
21170       $table['simple']['border_details']['L']['w'] /= $k;
21171       // mPDF 4.3.006 removed padding
21172     }
