21173 
21174     $table['miw'] /= $k;
21175     $table['maw'] /= $k;
21176 
21177   //  unset($table['miw']);
21178   //  unset($table['maw']);
21179   //  $table['wc'] = array_pad(array(),$table['nc'],array('miw'=>0,'maw'=>0));
21180 
21181     for($j = 0 ; $j < $table['nc'] ; $j++ ) { //columns
21182 
21183        $table['wc'][$j]['miw'] /= $k;
21184        $table['wc'][$j]['maw'] /= $k;
21185 
21186        if (isset($table['wc'][$j]['absmiw']) && $table['wc'][$j]['absmiw'] ) $table['wc'][$j]['absmiw'] /= $k;
21187 
21188        for($i = 0 ; $i < $table['nr']; $i++ ) { //rows
21189       $c = &$table['cells'][$i][$j];
21190       if (isset($c) && $c)  {
21191         if (!$this->simpleTables){  // mPDF 4.2.017
21192           if ($this->packTableData) {
21193           // mPDF 4.3.009 Binary packed data
21194           $cell = $this->_unpackCellBorder($c['borderbin'] );
21195           $cell['border_details']['T']['w'] /= $k;
21196           $cell['border_details']['R']['w'] /= $k;
21197           $cell['border_details']['B']['w'] /= $k;
21198           $cell['border_details']['L']['w'] /= $k;
21199           $cell['border_details']['mbw']['TL'] /= $k;
21200           $cell['border_details']['mbw']['TR'] /= $k;
21201           $cell['border_details']['mbw']['BL'] /= $k;
21202           $cell['border_details']['mbw']['BR'] /= $k;
21203           $cell['border_details']['mbw']['LT'] /= $k;
21204           $cell['border_details']['mbw']['LB'] /= $k;
21205           $cell['border_details']['mbw']['RT'] /= $k;
21206           $cell['border_details']['mbw']['RB'] /= $k;
21207           // mPDF 4.3.009 Binary packed data
21208           $c['borderbin'] = $this->_packCellBorder($cell);
21209           }
21210           else {
21211           $c['border_details']['T']['w'] /= $k;
21212           $c['border_details']['R']['w'] /= $k;
21213           $c['border_details']['B']['w'] /= $k;
21214           $c['border_details']['L']['w'] /= $k;
21215           $c['border_details']['mbw']['TL'] /= $k;
21216           $c['border_details']['mbw']['TR'] /= $k;
21217           $c['border_details']['mbw']['BL'] /= $k;
21218           $c['border_details']['mbw']['BR'] /= $k;
21219           $c['border_details']['mbw']['LT'] /= $k;
21220           $c['border_details']['mbw']['LB'] /= $k;
21221           $c['border_details']['mbw']['RT'] /= $k;
21222           $c['border_details']['mbw']['RB'] /= $k;
21223           }
21224         }
21225         $c['padding']['T'] /= $k;
21226         $c['padding']['R'] /= $k;
21227         $c['padding']['B'] /= $k;
21228         $c['padding']['L'] /= $k;
21229         $c['maxs'] /= $k;
21230         if (isset($c['w'])) { $c['w'] /= $k; }
21231         $c['s'] /= $k;
21232         $c['maw'] /= $k;
21233         $c['miw'] /= $k;
21234         if (isset($c['absmiw'])) $c['absmiw'] /= $k;
21235         if (isset($c['nestedmaw'])) $c['nestedmaw'] /= $k;
21236         if (isset($c['nestedmiw'])) $c['nestedmiw'] /= $k;
21237       }
21238        }//rows
21239     }//columns
21240     unset($c);
21241 }
21242 
21243 // mPDF 4.3.009 Binary packed data
21244 function _packCellBorder($cell) {
21245   if (!is_array($cell) || !isset($cell)) { return ''; }
21246 
21247   if (!$this->packTableData) { return $cell; }
21248 
21249   $bindata = pack("nndnnnA10nndnnnA10nndnnnA10nndnnnA10nd9",
21250   $cell['border'],
21251   $cell['border_details']['R']['s'],
21252   $cell['border_details']['R']['w'],
21253   $cell['border_details']['R']['c']['R'],
21254   $cell['border_details']['R']['c']['G'],
21255   $cell['border_details']['R']['c']['B'],
21256   $cell['border_details']['R']['style'],
21257   $cell['border_details']['R']['dom'],
21258 
21259   $cell['border_details']['L']['s'],
21260   $cell['border_details']['L']['w'],
21261   $cell['border_details']['L']['c']['R'],
21262   $cell['border_details']['L']['c']['G'],
21263   $cell['border_details']['L']['c']['B'],
21264   $cell['border_details']['L']['style'],
21265   $cell['border_details']['L']['dom'],
21266 
21267   $cell['border_details']['T']['s'],
21268   $cell['border_details']['T']['w'],
21269   $cell['border_details']['T']['c']['R'],
21270   $cell['border_details']['T']['c']['G'],
21271   $cell['border_details']['T']['c']['B'],
21272   $cell['border_details']['T']['style'],
21273   $cell['border_details']['T']['dom'],
21274 
21275   $cell['border_details']['B']['s'],
21276   $cell['border_details']['B']['w'],
21277   $cell['border_details']['B']['c']['R'],
21278   $cell['border_details']['B']['c']['G'],
21279   $cell['border_details']['B']['c']['B'],
21280   $cell['border_details']['B']['style'],
21281   $cell['border_details']['B']['dom'],
21282 
21283   $cell['border_details']['mbw']['BL'],
21284   $cell['border_details']['mbw']['BR'],
21285   $cell['border_details']['mbw']['RT'],
21286   $cell['border_details']['mbw']['RB'],
21287   $cell['border_details']['mbw']['TL'],
21288   $cell['border_details']['mbw']['TR'],
21289   $cell['border_details']['mbw']['LT'],
21290   $cell['border_details']['mbw']['LB'],
21291 
21292   $cell['border_details']['cellposdom']
21293   );
21294   return $bindata;
21295 }
21296 
21297 
21298 
21299 // mPDF 4.3.009 Binary packed data
21300 function _getBorderWidths($bindata) {
21301   if (!$bindata) { return array(0,0,0,0); }
21302 
21303   if (!$this->packTableData) { return array($bindata['border_details']['T']['w'], $bindata['border_details']['R']['w'], $bindata['border_details']['B']['w'], $bindata['border_details']['L']['w']); }
21304 
21305   $bd = unpack("nbord/nrs/drw/nrcr/nrcg/nrcb/A10rst/nrd/nls/dlw/nlcr/nlcg/nlcb/A10lst/nld/nts/dtw/ntcr/ntcg/ntcb/A10tst/ntd/nbs/dbw/nbcr/nbcg/nbcb/A10bst/nbd/dmbl/dmbr/dmrt/dmrb/dmtl/dmtr/dmlt/dmlb/dcpd", $bindata);
21306   $cell['border_details']['R']['w'] = $bd['rw'];
21307   $cell['border_details']['L']['w'] = $bd['lw'];
21308   $cell['border_details']['T']['w'] = $bd['tw'];
21309   $cell['border_details']['B']['w'] = $bd['bw'];
21310   return array($bd['tw'], $bd['rw'], $bd['bw'], $bd['lw']);
21311 }
21312 
21313 
21314 // mPDF 4.3.009 Binary packed data
21315 function _unpackCellBorder($bindata) {
21316   if (!$bindata) { return array(); }
21317 
21318   if (!$this->packTableData) { return $bindata; }
21319 
21320   $bd = unpack("nbord/nrs/drw/nrcr/nrcg/nrcb/A10rst/nrd/nls/dlw/nlcr/nlcg/nlcb/A10lst/nld/nts/dtw/ntcr/ntcg/ntcb/A10tst/ntd/nbs/dbw/nbcr/nbcg/nbcb/A10bst/nbd/dmbl/dmbr/dmrt/dmrb/dmtl/dmtr/dmlt/dmlb/dcpd/", $bindata);
21321   $cell['border'] = $bd['bord'];
21322   $cell['border_details']['R']['s'] = $bd['rs'];
21323   $cell['border_details']['R']['w'] = $bd['rw'];
21324   $cell['border_details']['R']['c']['R'] = $bd['rcr'];
21325   $cell['border_details']['R']['c']['G'] = $bd['rcg'];
21326   $cell['border_details']['R']['c']['B'] = $bd['rcb'];
21327   $cell['border_details']['R']['style'] = trim($bd['rst']);
21328   $cell['border_details']['R']['dom'] = $bd['rd'];
21329 
21330   $cell['border_details']['L']['s'] = $bd['ls'];
21331   $cell['border_details']['L']['w'] = $bd['lw'];
21332   $cell['border_details']['L']['c']['R'] = $bd['lcr'];
21333   $cell['border_details']['L']['c']['G'] = $bd['lcg'];
21334   $cell['border_details']['L']['c']['B'] = $bd['lcb'];
21335   $cell['border_details']['L']['style'] = trim($bd['lst']);
21336   $cell['border_details']['L']['dom'] = $bd['ld'];
21337 
21338   $cell['border_details']['T']['s'] = $bd['ts'];
21339   $cell['border_details']['T']['w'] = $bd['tw'];
21340   $cell['border_details']['T']['c']['R'] = $bd['tcr'];
21341   $cell['border_details']['T']['c']['G'] = $bd['tcg'];
21342   $cell['border_details']['T']['c']['B'] = $bd['tcb'];
21343   $cell['border_details']['T']['style'] = trim($bd['tst']);
21344   $cell['border_details']['T']['dom'] = $bd['td'];
21345 
21346   $cell['border_details']['B']['s'] = $bd['bs'];
21347   $cell['border_details']['B']['w'] = $bd['bw'];
21348   $cell['border_details']['B']['c']['R'] = $bd['bcr'];
21349   $cell['border_details']['B']['c']['G'] = $bd['bcg'];
21350   $cell['border_details']['B']['c']['B'] = $bd['bcb'];
21351   $cell['border_details']['B']['style'] = trim($bd['bst']);
21352   $cell['border_details']['B']['dom'] = $bd['bd'];
21353 
21354   $cell['border_details']['mbw']['BL'] = $bd['mbl'];
21355   $cell['border_details']['mbw']['BR'] = $bd['mbr'];
21356   $cell['border_details']['mbw']['RT'] = $bd['mrt'];
21357   $cell['border_details']['mbw']['RB'] = $bd['mrb'];
21358   $cell['border_details']['mbw']['TL'] = $bd['mtl'];
21359   $cell['border_details']['mbw']['TR'] = $bd['mtr'];
21360   $cell['border_details']['mbw']['LT'] = $bd['mlt'];
21361   $cell['border_details']['mbw']['LB'] = $bd['mlb'];
21362   $cell['border_details']['cellposdom'] = $bd['cpd'];
21363 
21364   return($cell);
21365 }
21366 
21367 
21371 //table   Array of (w, h, bc, nr, wc, hr, cells)
21372 //w     Width of table
21373 //h     Height of table
21374 //nc      Number column
21375 //nr      Number row
21376 //hr      List of height of each row
21377 //wc      List of width of each column
21378 //cells   List of cells of each rows, cells[i][j] is a cell in the table
21379 function _tableColumnWidth(&$table,$firstpass=false){
21380   $cs = &$table['cells'];
21381 
21382   $nc = $table['nc'];
21383   $nr = $table['nr'];
21384   $listspan = array();
21385 
21386   if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
21387     $tblbw = $table['border_details']['L']['w'] + $table['border_details']['R']['w'] + $table['margin']['L'] + $table['margin']['R'] +  $table['padding']['L'] + $table['padding']['R'] + $table['border_spacing_H'];
21388   }
21389   else { $tblbw = $table['max_cell_border_width']['L']/2 + $table['max_cell_border_width']['R']/2 + $table['margin']['L'] + $table['margin']['R']; }
21390 
21391   // mPDF 4.2
21392   $longCJK = false;
21393 
21394   // ADDED table['l'][colno] 
21395   // = total length of text approx (using $c['s']) in that column - used to approximately distribute col widths in _tableWidth
21396   //
21397   for($j = 0 ; $j < $nc ; $j++ ) { //columns
21398     $wc = &$table['wc'][$j];
21399     for($i = 0 ; $i < $nr ; $i++ ) { //rows
21400       if (isset($cs[$i][$j]) && $cs[$i][$j])  {
21401         $c = &$cs[$i][$j];
21402 
21403         // mPDF 4.3.006
21404         if ($this->simpleTables){
21405              if ($table['borders_separate']) {  // NB twice border width
21406             $extrcw = $table['simple']['border_details']['L']['w'] + $table['simple']['border_details']['R']['w'] + $c['padding']['L'] + $c['padding']['R'] + $table['border_spacing_H'];
21407              }
21408              else {
21409             $extrcw = $table['simple']['border_details']['L']['w']/2 + $table['simple']['border_details']['R']['w']/2 + $c['padding']['L'] + $c['padding']['R'];
21410              }
21411         }
21412         else {
21413            // mPDF 4.3.009
21414            if ($this->packTableData) {
21415             list($bt,$br,$bb,$bl) = $this->_getBorderWidths($c['borderbin']);
21416            }
21417            else { 
21418           $br = $c['border_details']['R']['w'];
21419           $bl = $c['border_details']['L']['w'];
21420            }
21421            if ($table['borders_separate']) {  // NB twice border width
21422           $extrcw = $bl + $br + $c['padding']['L'] + $c['padding']['R'] + $table['border_spacing_H'];
21423            }
21424            else {
21425           $extrcw = $bl/2 + $br/2 + $c['padding']['L'] + $c['padding']['R'];
21426            }
21427         }
21428 
21429         // mPDF 3.0
21430         //$mw = $this->GetStringWidth('W') + $extrcw ;
21431         $mw = 0;
21432 
21433         $c['absmiw'] = $mw;
21434 
21435         if (isset($c['R']) && $c['R']) {
21436           $c['maw'] = $c['miw'] = $this->FontSize + $extrcw ;
21437           if (isset($c['w'])) { // If cell width is specified
21438             if ($c['miw'] <$c['w']) { $c['miw'] = $c['w']; }
21439           }
21440           if (!isset($c['colspan'])) {
21441             if ($wc['miw'] < $c['miw']) { $wc['miw']  = $c['miw']; }
21442             if ($wc['maw'] < $c['maw']) { $wc['maw']  = $c['maw']; }
21443 
21444             if ($firstpass) { 
21445                if (isset($table['l'][$j]) ) { 
21446               $table['l'][$j] += $c['miw'] ;
21447                }
21448                else {
21449               $table['l'][$j] = $c['miw'] ;
21450                }
21451             }
21452           }
21453           if ($c['miw'] > $wc['miw']) { $wc['miw'] = $c['miw']; } 
21454                 if ($wc['miw'] > $wc['maw']) { $wc['maw'] = $wc['miw']; }
21455           continue;
21456         }
21457 
21458         if ($firstpass) {
21459           if (isset($c['s'])) { $c['s'] += $extrcw; }
21460           if (isset($c['maxs'])) { $c['maxs'] += $extrcw; }
21461           if (isset($c['nestedmiw'])) { $c['nestedmiw'] += $extrcw; }
21462           if (isset($c['nestedmaw'])) { $c['nestedmaw'] += $extrcw; }
21463         }
21464 
21465 
21466         // If minimum width has already been set by a nested table or inline object (image/form), use it
21467         if (isset($c['nestedmiw'])) { $miw = $c['nestedmiw']; }
21468         else  { $miw = $mw; }
21469 
21470         if (isset($c['maxs']) && $c['maxs'] != '') { $c['s'] = $c['maxs']; }
21471 
21472         // If maximum width has already been set by a nested table, use it
21473         if (isset($c['nestedmaw'])) { $c['maw'] = $c['nestedmaw']; }
21474         else $c['maw'] = $c['s'];
21475 
21476         if (isset($c['nowrap']) && $c['nowrap']) { $miw = $c['maw']; }
21477 
21478         if (isset($c['wpercent']) && $firstpass) {
21479           if (isset($c['colspan'])) { // Not perfect - but % set on colspan is shared equally on cols.
21480              for($k=0;$k<$c['colspan'];$k++) {
21481             $table['wc'][($j+$k)]['wpercent'] = $c['wpercent'] / $c['colspan'];
21482              }
21483           }
21484           else {
21485             if (isset($table['w']) && $table['w']) { $c['w'] = $c['wpercent']/100 * ($table['w'] - $tblbw ); }
21486             $wc['wpercent'] = $c['wpercent'];
21487           }
21488         }
21489 
21490 
21491         if (isset($c['w'])) { // If cell width is specified
21492           if ($miw<$c['w']) { $c['miw'] = $c['w']; }  // Cell min width = that specified
21493           if ($miw>$c['w']) { $c['miw'] = $c['w'] = $miw; } // If width specified is less than minimum allowed (W) increase it
21494           if (!isset($wc['w'])) { $wc['w'] = 1; }   // If the Col width is not specified = set it to 1
21495 
21496         }
21497         else { $c['miw'] = $miw; }  // If cell width not specified -> set Cell min width it to minimum allowed (W)
21498 
21499         if ($c['maw']  < $c['miw']) { $c['maw'] = $c['miw']; }  // If Cell max width < Minwidth - increase it to =
21500         if (!isset($c['colspan'])) {
21501           if ($wc['miw'] < $c['miw']) { $wc['miw']  = $c['miw']; }  // Update Col Minimum and maximum widths
21502           if ($wc['maw'] < $c['maw']) { $wc['maw']  = $c['maw']; }
21503           if ((isset($wc['absmiw']) && $wc['absmiw'] < $c['absmiw']) || !isset($wc['absmiw'])) { $wc['absmiw'] = $c['absmiw']; }  // Update Col Minimum and maximum widths
21504 
21505           if (isset($table['l'][$j]) ) { 
21506             $table['l'][$j] += $c['s'];
21507   
21508           }
21509           else {
21510             $table['l'][$j] = $c['s'];
21511           }
21512 
21513         }
21514         else { 
21515           $listspan[] = array($i,$j);
21516         }
21517 
21518       //Check if minimum width of the whole column is big enough for largest word to fit
21519               $auxtext = implode("",$c['text']);
21520         if (isset($c['textbuffer'])) {
21521                 $minwidth = $this->TableCheckMinWidth($auxtext,$wc['miw']- $extrcw ,0,$c['textbuffer']); 
21522         }
21523         else { $minwidth = 0; }
21524               if ($minwidth < 0) { 
21525           // mPDF 4.2
21526           if(preg_match("/[".$this->pregCJKchars."]{10,}/u",$auxtext)) { $longCJK = true; }
21527           //increase minimum width
21528           if (!isset($c['colspan'])) {
21529             $wc['miw'] = max($wc['miw'],((-$minwidth) + $extrcw) );  
21530           }
21531         }
21532         if (!isset($c['colspan'])) {
21533                 if ($wc['miw'] > $wc['maw']) { $wc['maw'] = $wc['miw']; } //update maximum width, if needed
21534         }
21535       }
21536       unset($c);
21537     }//rows
21538   }//columns
21539 
21540 
21541   // COLUMN SPANS
21542   $wc = &$table['wc'];
21543   foreach ($listspan as $span) {
21544     list($i,$j) = $span;
21545     $c = &$cs[$i][$j];
21546     $lc = $j + $c['colspan'];
21547     if ($lc > $nc) { $lc = $nc; }
21548     
21549     $wis = $wisa = 0;
21550     $was = $wasa = 0;
21551     $list = array();
21552     for($k=$j;$k<$lc;$k++) {
21553       if (isset($table['l'][$k]) ) { 
21554         if ($c['R']) { $table['l'][$k] += $c['miw']/$c['colspan'] ; }
21555         else { $table['l'][$k] += $c['s']/$c['colspan']; }
21556       }
21557       else {
21558         if ($c['R']) { $table['l'][$k] = $c['miw']/$c['colspan'] ; }
21559         else { $table['l'][$k] = $c['s']/$c['colspan']; }
21560       }
21561       $wis += $wc[$k]['miw'];
21562       $was += $wc[$k]['maw'];
21563       if (!isset($c['w'])) {
21564         $list[] = $k;
21565         $wisa += $wc[$k]['miw'];
21566         $wasa += $wc[$k]['maw'];
21567       }
21568     }
21569     if ($c['miw'] > $wis) {
21570       if (!$wis) {
21571         for($k=$j;$k<$lc;$k++) { $wc[$k]['miw'] = $c['miw']/$c['colspan']; }
21572       }
21573       else if (!count($list)) {
21574         $wi = $c['miw'] - $wis;
21575         for($k=$j;$k<$lc;$k++) { $wc[$k]['miw'] += ($wc[$k]['miw']/$wis)*$wi; }
21576       }
21577       else {
21578         $wi = $c['miw'] - $wis;
21579         foreach ($list as $k) { $wc[$k]['miw'] += ($wc[$k]['miw']/$wisa)*$wi; }
21580       }
21581     }
21582     if ($c['maw'] > $was) {
21583       if (!$wis) {
21584         for($k=$j;$k<$lc;$k++) { $wc[$k]['maw'] = $c['maw']/$c['colspan']; }
21585       }
21586       else if (!count($list)) {
21587         $wi = $c['maw'] - $was;
21588         for($k=$j;$k<$lc;$k++) { $wc[$k]['maw'] += ($wc[$k]['maw']/$was)*$wi; }
21589       }
21590       else {
21591         $wi = $c['maw'] - $was;
21592         foreach ($list as $k) { $wc[$k]['maw'] += ($wc[$k]['maw']/$wasa)*$wi; }
21593       }
21594     }
21595     unset($c);
21596   }
21597 
21598 
21599   $checkminwidth = 0;
21600   $checkmaxwidth = 0;
21601   $totallength = 0;
21602 
21603   for( $i = 0 ; $i < $nc ; $i++ ) {
21604     $checkminwidth += $table['wc'][$i]['miw'];
21605     $checkmaxwidth += $table['wc'][$i]['maw'];
21606     $totallength += $table['l'][$i];
21607   }
21608 
21609   if (!isset($table['w']) && $firstpass) {
21610      $sumpc = 0;
21611      // mPDF 3.2
21612      $notset = 0;
21613      for( $i = 0 ; $i < $nc ; $i++ ) {
21614       if (isset($table['wc'][$i]['wpercent']) && $table['wc'][$i]['wpercent']) {
21615       $sumpc += $table['wc'][$i]['wpercent'];
21616       }
21617       // mPDF 3.2
21618       else { $notset++; }
21619      }
21620 
21621      // mPDF 3.2   If sum of widths as %  >= 100% and not all columns are set
21622     // Set a nominal width of 1% for unset columns
21623      if ($sumpc >= 100 && $notset) {
21624       for( $i = 0 ; $i < $nc ; $i++ ) {
21625       if ((!isset($table['wc'][$i]['wpercent']) || !$table['wc'][$i]['wpercent']) &&
21626       (!isset($table['wc'][$i]['w']) || !$table['wc'][$i]['w'])) {
21627       $table['wc'][$i]['wpercent'] = 1;
21628       }
21629       }
21630      }
21631 
21632 
21633      if ($sumpc) {  // if any percents are set
21634     // mPDF 4.0
21635     $sumnonpc = (100 - $sumpc);
21636     $sumpc = max($sumpc,100);
21637         $miwleft = 0;
21638     $miwleftcount = 0;
21639     $miwsurplusnonpc = 0;
21640     $maxcalcmiw  = 0;
21641         $mawleft = 0;
21642     $mawleftcount = 0;
21643     $mawsurplusnonpc = 0;
21644     $maxcalcmaw  = 0;
21645     for( $i = 0 ; $i < $nc ; $i++ ) {
21646       if (isset($table['wc'][$i]['wpercent'])) {
21647       $maxcalcmiw = max($maxcalcmiw, ($table['wc'][$i]['miw'] * $sumpc /$table['wc'][$i]['wpercent']) );
21648       $maxcalcmaw = max($maxcalcmaw, ($table['wc'][$i]['maw'] * $sumpc /$table['wc'][$i]['wpercent']) );
21649       }
21650       else {
21651       $miwleft += $table['wc'][$i]['miw'];
21652       $mawleft += $table['wc'][$i]['maw'];
21653         if (!isset($table['wc'][$i]['w'])) { $miwleftcount++; $mawleftcount++; }
21654       }
21655     }
21656     if ($miwleft && $sumnonpc > 0) { $miwnon = $miwleft * 100 / $sumnonpc; }
21657     if ($mawleft && $sumnonpc > 0) { $mawnon = $mawleft * 100 / $sumnonpc; }
21658     if (($miwnon > $checkminwidth || $maxcalcmiw > $checkminwidth) && $this->keep_table_proportions) {
21659       if ($miwnon > $maxcalcmiw) { 
21660         $miwsurplusnonpc = round((($miwnon * $sumnonpc / 100) - $miwleft),3); 
21661         $checkminwidth = $miwnon; 
21662       }
21663       else { $checkminwidth = $maxcalcmiw; }
21664       for( $i = 0 ; $i < $nc ; $i++ ) {
21665         if (isset($table['wc'][$i]['wpercent'])) {
21666         $newmiw = $checkminwidth * $table['wc'][$i]['wpercent']/100;
21667         if ($table['wc'][$i]['miw'] < $newmiw) {
21668           $table['wc'][$i]['miw'] = $newmiw;
21669         }
21670         $table['wc'][$i]['w'] = 1;
21671         }
21672         else if ($miwsurplusnonpc && !$table['wc'][$i]['w']) {
21673         $table['wc'][$i]['miw'] +=  $miwsurplusnonpc / $miwleftcount;
21674         }
21675       }
21676     }
21677     if (($mawnon > $checkmaxwidth || $maxcalcmaw > $checkmaxwidth )) {
21678       if ($mawnon > $maxcalcmaw) { 
21679         $mawsurplusnonpc = round((($mawnon * $sumnonpc / 100) - $mawleft),3); 
21680         $checkmaxwidth = $mawnon; 
21681       }
21682       else { $checkmaxwidth = $maxcalcmaw; }
21683       for( $i = 0 ; $i < $nc ; $i++ ) {
21684         if (isset($table['wc'][$i]['wpercent'])) {
21685         $newmaw = $checkmaxwidth * $table['wc'][$i]['wpercent']/100;
21686         if ($table['wc'][$i]['maw'] < $newmaw) {
21687           $table['wc'][$i]['maw'] = $newmaw;
21688         }
21689         $table['wc'][$i]['w'] = 1;
21690         }
21691         else if ($mawsurplusnonpc && !$table['wc'][$i]['w']) {
21692         $table['wc'][$i]['maw'] +=  $mawsurplusnonpc / $mawleftcount;
21693         }
21694         if ($table['wc'][$i]['maw'] < $table['wc'][$i]['miw']) { $table['wc'][$i]['maw'] = $table['wc'][$i]['miw']; }
21695       }
21696     }
21697     if ($checkminwidth > $checkmaxwidth) { $checkmaxwidth = $checkminwidth; }
21698      }
21699   }
21700 
21701   if (isset($table['wpercent']) && $table['wpercent']) {
21702     $checkminwidth *= (100 / $table['wpercent']);
21703     $checkmaxwidth *= (100 / $table['wpercent']);
21704   }
21705 
21706 
21707   $checkminwidth += $tblbw ;
21708   $checkmaxwidth += $tblbw ;
21709 
21710   // Table['miw'] set by percent in first pass may be larger than sum of column miw
21711   if ((isset($table['miw']) && $checkminwidth > $table['miw']) || !isset($table['miw'])) {  $table['miw'] = $checkminwidth; }
21712   if ((isset($table['maw']) && $checkmaxwidth > $table['maw']) || !isset($table['maw'])) { $table['maw'] = $checkmaxwidth; }
21713   $table['tl'] = $totallength ;
21714 
21715   // mPDF 4.2
21716   if (!$this->isCJK && !$longCJK) {
21717     if ($this->table_rotate) {
21718       $mxw = $this->tbrot_maxw;
21719     }
21720     else {
21721       $mxw = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'];
21722     }
21723 
21724     if (($table['overflow']=='visible' || $table['overflow']=='hidden') && !$this->table_rotate && !$this->ColActive && $checkminwidth > $mxw) { 
21725       $table['w'] = $table['miw']; 
21726       return array(0,0);
21727     }
21728     else if ($table['overflow']=='wrap') { return array(0,0); }
21729 
21730     if (isset($table['w']) && $table['w'] ) {
21731       if ($table['w'] >= $checkminwidth && $table['w'] <= $mxw) { $table['maw'] = $mxw = $table['w']; } // mPDF 4.0
21732       else if ($table['w'] >= $checkminwidth && $table['w'] > $mxw && $this->keep_table_proportions) { $checkminwidth = $table['w']; }
21733       else {  
21734         unset($table['w']); 
21735       }
21736     }
21737     $ratio = $checkminwidth/$mxw;
21738     if ($checkminwidth > $mxw) { return array(($ratio +0.001),$checkminwidth); }  // 0.001 to allow for rounded numbers when resizing
21739   }
21740   return array(0,0);
21741 }
21742 
21743 
21744 
21745 function _tableWidth(&$table){
21746   $widthcols = &$table['wc'];
21747   $numcols = $table['nc'];
21748   $tablewidth = 0;
21749   // Added mPDF1.4 - table border width if separate
21750   if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
21751     $tblbw = $table['border_details']['L']['w'] + $table['border_details']['R']['w'] + $table['margin']['L'] + $table['margin']['R'] +  $table['padding']['L'] + $table['padding']['R'] + $table['border_spacing_H'];
21752   }
21753   else { $tblbw = $table['max_cell_border_width']['L']/2 + $table['max_cell_border_width']['R']/2 + $table['margin']['L'] + $table['margin']['R']; }
21754 
21755 
21756   if ($table['level']>1 && isset($table['w'])) { 
21757     if (isset($table['wpercent']) && $table['wpercent']) { 
21758       $table['w'] = $temppgwidth = (($table['w']-$tblbw) * $table['wpercent'] / 100) + $tblbw ;  
21759     }
21760     else { 
21761       $temppgwidth = $table['w'] ;  
21762     }
21763   }
21764   else if ($this->table_rotate) {
21765     $temppgwidth = $this->tbrot_maxw;
21766     // If it is less than 1/20th of the remaining page height to finish the DIV (i.e. DIV padding + table bottom margin)
21767     // then allow for this
21768     $enddiv = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_bottom'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_bottom']['w'];
21769     if ($enddiv/$temppgwidth <0.05) { $temppgwidth -= $enddiv; }
21770   }
21771   else {
21772     if (isset($table['w']) && $table['w']< $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width']) { 
21773       $notfullwidth = 1;
21774       $temppgwidth = $table['w'] ;  
21775     }
21776     else if (($table['overflow']=='visible' || $table['overflow']=='hidden') && !$this->ColActive && isset($table['w']) && $table['w'] > $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'] && $table['w']==$table['miw']) { 
21777       $temppgwidth = $table['w'] ;  
21778     }
21779     else { $temppgwidth = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width']; }
21780   }
21781 
21782 
21783   $totaltextlength = 0; // Added - to sum $table['l'][colno]
21784   $totalatextlength = 0;  // Added - to sum $table['l'][colno] for those columns where width not set
21785   $percentages_set = 0; 
21786   for ( $i = 0 ; $i < $numcols ; $i++ ) {
21787     if (isset($widthcols[$i]['wpercent']))  { $tablewidth += $widthcols[$i]['maw']; $percentages_set = 1; }
21788     else if (isset($widthcols[$i]['w']))  { $tablewidth += $widthcols[$i]['miw']; }
21789     else { $tablewidth += $widthcols[$i]['maw']; }
21790     $totaltextlength += $table['l'][$i];
21791   }
21792   if (!$totaltextlength) { $totaltextlength =1; }
21793   $tablewidth += $tblbw;  // Outer half of table borders
21794 
21795   if ($tablewidth > $temppgwidth) { 
21796     $table['w'] = $temppgwidth; 
21797   }
21798   // if any widths set as percentages and max width fits < page width
21799   else if ($tablewidth < $temppgwidth && !isset($table['w']) && $percentages_set) {
21800     $table['w'] = $table['maw'];
21801   }
21802   // if table width is set and is > allowed width
21803   if (isset($table['w']) && $table['w'] > $temppgwidth) { $table['w'] = $temppgwidth; }
21804   // IF the table width is now set - Need to distribute columns widths
21805   if (isset($table['w'])) {
21806     $wis = $wisa = 0;
21807     $list = array();
21808     $notsetlist = array();
21809     for( $i = 0 ; $i < $numcols ; $i++ ) {
21810       $wis += $widthcols[$i]['miw'];
21811       if (!isset($widthcols[$i]['w']) || ($widthcols[$i]['w'] && $table['w'] > $temppgwidth && !$this->keep_table_proportions && !$notfullwidth )){ 
21812         $list[] = $i;  
21813         $wisa += $widthcols[$i]['miw'];
21814         $totalatextlength += $table['l'][$i];
21815       }
21816     }
21817     if (!$totalatextlength) { $totalatextlength =1; }
21818 
21819     // Allocate spare (more than col's minimum width) across the cols according to their approx total text length
21820     // Do it by setting minimum width here
21821     if ($table['w'] > $wis + $tblbw) {
21822       // First set any cell widths set as percentages
21823       if ($table['w'] < $temppgwidth || $this->keep_table_proportions) {
21824         for($k=0;$k<$numcols;$k++) {
21825           if (isset($widthcols[$k]['wpercent'])) {
21826             $curr = $widthcols[$k]['miw'];
21827             $widthcols[$k]['miw'] = ($table['w']-$tblbw) * $widthcols[$k]['wpercent']/100;
21828             $wis += $widthcols[$k]['miw'] - $curr;
21829             $wisa += $widthcols[$k]['miw'] - $curr;
21830           }
21831         }
21832       }
21833       // Now allocate surplus up to maximum width of each column
21834       $surplus = 0;  $ttl = 0;  // number of surplus columns
21835       if (!count($list)) {
21836         $wi = ($table['w']-($wis + $tblbw));  //  i.e. extra space to distribute
21837         for($k=0;$k<$numcols;$k++) {
21838           $spareratio = ($table['l'][$k] / $totaltextlength); //  gives ratio to divide up free space
21839           // Don't allocate more than Maximum required width - save rest in surplus
21840           if ($widthcols[$k]['miw'] + ($wi * $spareratio) > $widthcols[$k]['maw']) {
21841             $surplus += ($wi * $spareratio) - ($widthcols[$k]['maw']-$widthcols[$k]['miw']);
21842             $widthcols[$k]['miw'] = $widthcols[$k]['maw'];
21843           }
21844           else { 
21845             $notsetlist[] = $k;  
21846             $ttl += $table['l'][$k];
21847             $widthcols[$k]['miw'] += ($wi * $spareratio); 
21848           }
21849 
21850         }
21851       }
21852       else {
21853         $wi = ($table['w'] - ($wis + $tblbw));  //  i.e. extra space to distribute
21854         foreach ($list as $k) {
21855           $spareratio = ($table['l'][$k] / $totalatextlength); //  gives ratio to divide up free space
21856           // Don't allocate more than Maximum required width - save rest in surplus
21857           if ($widthcols[$k]['miw'] + ($wi * $spareratio) > $widthcols[$k]['maw']) {
21858             $surplus += ($wi * $spareratio) - ($widthcols[$k]['maw']-$widthcols[$k]['miw']);
21859             $widthcols[$k]['miw'] = $widthcols[$k]['maw'];
21860           }
21861           else { 
21862             $notsetlist[] = $k;  
21863             $ttl += $table['l'][$k];
21864             $widthcols[$k]['miw'] += ($wi * $spareratio); 
21865           }
21866         }
21867       }
21868       // If surplus still left over apportion it across columns
21869       if ($surplus) { 
21870          // if some are set only add to remaining - otherwise add to all of them
21871          if (count($notsetlist) && count($notsetlist) < $numcols) {
21872         foreach ($notsetlist AS $i) {
21873           if ($ttl) $widthcols[$i]['miw'] += $surplus * $table['l'][$i] / $ttl ;
21874         }
21875          }
21876          // If some widths are defined, and others have been added up to their maxmum
21877          else if (count($list) && count($list) < $numcols) {
21878         foreach ($list AS $i) {
21879           $widthcols[$i]['miw'] += $surplus / count($list) ;
21880         }
21881          }
21882          else if ($numcols) { // If all columns
21883         $ttl = array_sum($table['l']);
21884         for ($i=0;$i<$numcols;$i++) {
21885           $widthcols[$i]['miw'] += $surplus * $table['l'][$i] / $ttl;
21886         }
21887          }
21888       }
21889 
21890     }
21891 
21892     // This sets the columns all to minimum width (which has been increased above if appropriate)
21893     for ($i=0;$i<$numcols;$i++) {
21894       $widthcols[$i] = $widthcols[$i]['miw'];
21895     }
21896 
21897     // TABLE NOT WIDE ENOUGH EVEN FOR MINIMUM CONTENT WIDTH
21898     // If sum of column widths set are too wide for table
21899     $checktablewidth = 0;
21900     for ( $i = 0 ; $i < $numcols ; $i++ ) {
21901       $checktablewidth += $widthcols[$i];
21902     }
21903     if ($checktablewidth > ($temppgwidth + 0.001 - $tblbw)) { 
21904        $usedup = 0; $numleft = 0;
21905        for ($i=0;$i<$numcols;$i++) {
21906       if ((isset($widthcols[$i]) && $widthcols[$i] > (($temppgwidth - $tblbw) / $numcols)) && (!isset($widthcols[$i]['w']))) { 
21907         $numleft++; 
21908         unset($widthcols[$i]); 
21909       }
21910       else { $usedup += $widthcols[$i]; }
21911        }
21912        for ($i=0;$i<$numcols;$i++) {
21913       if (!isset($widthcols[$i]) || !$widthcols[$i]) { 
21914         $widthcols[$i] = ((($temppgwidth - $tblbw) - $usedup)/ ($numleft)); 
21915       }
21916        }
21917     }
21918 
21919   }
21920   else { //table has no width defined
21921     $table['w'] = $tablewidth;  
21922     for ( $i = 0 ; $i < $numcols ; $i++) {
21923       if (isset($widthcols[$i]['wpercent']) && $this->keep_table_proportions)  { $colwidth = $widthcols[$i]['maw']; }
21924       else if (isset($widthcols[$i]['w']))  { $colwidth = $widthcols[$i]['miw']; }
21925       else { $colwidth = $widthcols[$i]['maw']; }
21926       unset($widthcols[$i]);
21927       $widthcols[$i] = $colwidth;
21928     }
21929   }
21930 }
21931   
21932 function _tableHeight(&$table){
21933   $level = $table['level'];
21934   $levelid = $table['levelid'];
21935   $cells = &$table['cells'];
21936   $numcols = $table['nc'];
21937   $numrows = $table['nr'];
21938   $listspan = array();
21939   $checkmaxheight = 0;
21940   $headerrowheight = 0;
21941   $checkmaxheightplus = 0;
21942   $headerrowheightplus = 0;
21943   // mPDF 4.0
21944   $footerrowheight = 0;
21945   $footerrowheightplus = 0;
21946   if ($this->table_rotate) {
21947     $temppgheight = $this->tbrot_maxh;
21948     $remainingpage = $this->tbrot_maxh;
21949   }
21950   else {
21951     $temppgheight = ($this->h - $this->bMargin - $this->tMargin) - $this->kwt_height;
21952     $remainingpage = ($this->h - $this->bMargin - $this->y) - $this->kwt_height;
21953 
21954     // If it is less than 1/20th of the remaining page height to finish the DIV (i.e. DIV padding + table bottom margin)
21955     // then allow for this
21956     $enddiv = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_bottom'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_bottom']['w'] + $table['margin']['B'];
21957     // mPDF 4.0 bug fix: if remaining page == 0 get error
21958     if ($remainingpage > $enddiv && $enddiv/$remainingpage <0.05) { $remainingpage -= $enddiv; }
21959     else if ($remainingpage == 0) { $remainingpage = 0.001; }
21960     if ($temppgheight > $enddiv && $enddiv/$temppgheight <0.05) { $temppgheight -= $enddiv; }
21961     else if ($temppgheight == 0) { $temppgheight = 0.001; }
21962   }
21963 
21964 
21965   for( $i = 0 ; $i < $numrows ; $i++ ) { //rows
21966     $heightrow = &$table['hr'][$i];
21967     for( $j = 0 ; $j < $numcols ; $j++ ) { //columns
21968       if (isset($cells[$i][$j]) && $cells[$i][$j]) {
21969         $c = &$cells[$i][$j];
21970 
21971         // mPDF 4.3.006
21972         if ($this->simpleTables){ // mPDF 4.2.017
21973            if ($table['borders_separate']) {  // NB twice border width
21974           $extraWLR = ($table['simple']['border_details']['L']['w']+$table['simple']['border_details']['R']['w']) + ($c['padding']['L']+$c['padding']['R'])+$table['border_spacing_H'];
21975           $extrh = ($table['simple']['border_details']['T']['w']+$table['simple']['border_details']['B']['w']) + ($c['padding']['T']+$c['padding']['B'])+$table['border_spacing_V'];
21976            }
21977            else {
21978           $extraWLR = ($table['simple']['border_details']['L']['w']+$table['simple']['border_details']['R']['w'])/2 + ($c['padding']['L']+$c['padding']['R']);
21979           $extrh = ($table['simple']['border_details']['T']['w']+$table['simple']['border_details']['B']['w'])/2 + ($c['padding']['T']+$c['padding']['B']);
21980            }
21981         }
21982         else  {
21983            // mPDF 4.3.009
21984            if ($this->packTableData) {
21985             list($bt,$br,$bb,$bl) = $this->_getBorderWidths($c['borderbin']);
21986            }
21987            else { 
21988           // mPDF 4.3.012E
21989           $bt = $c['border_details']['T']['w'];
21990           $bb = $c['border_details']['B']['w'];
21991           $br = $c['border_details']['R']['w'];
21992           $bl = $c['border_details']['L']['w'];
21993            }
21994            if ($table['borders_separate']) {  // NB twice border width
21995           $extraWLR = $bl + $br + $c['padding']['L'] + $c['padding']['R'] + $table['border_spacing_H'];
21996           $extrh = $bt + $bb + $c['padding']['T'] + $c['padding']['B'] + $table['border_spacing_V'];
21997            }
21998            else {
21999           $extraWLR = $bl/2 + $br/2 + $c['padding']['L'] + $c['padding']['R'];
22000           $extrh = $bt/2 + $bb/2 + $c['padding']['T']+$c['padding']['B'];
22001            }
22002         }
22003 
22004         list($x,$cw) = $this->_tableGetWidth($table, $i,$j);
22005         //Check whether width is enough for this cells' text
22006         $auxtext = implode("",$c['text']);
22007         $auxtext2 = $auxtext; //in case we have text with styles
22008 
22009         $aux3 = $auxtext; //in case we have text with styles
22010 
22011         // Get CELL HEIGHT 
22012         // ++ extra parameter forces wrap to break word
22013         if ($c['R']) {
22014           $aux4 = implode(" ",$c['text']);
22015           $s_fs = $this->FontSizePt;
22016           $s_f = $this->FontFamily; // mPDF 3.0
22017           $s_st = $this->FontStyle; // mPDF 3.0
22018           $this->SetFont($c['textbuffer'][0][4],$c['textbuffer'][0][2],$c['textbuffer'][0][11] / $this->shrin_k,true,true);
22019           $aux4 = ltrim($aux4);
22020           $aux4= $this->mb_rtrim($aux4,$this->mb_enc);
22021               $tempch = $this->GetStringWidth($aux4);
22022           if ($c['R'] >= 45 && $c['R'] < 90) {
22023             $tempch = ((sin(deg2rad($c['R']))) * $tempch ) + ((sin(deg2rad($c['R']))) * (($c['textbuffer'][0][11]/$this->k) / $this->shrin_k));
22024           } 
22025           $this->SetFont($s_f,$s_st,$s_fs,true,true);
22026           $ch = ($tempch ) + $extrh ;  
22027         }
22028         else {
22029            if (isset($c['textbuffer'])) {
22030           $tempch = $this->TableWordWrap(($cw-$extraWLR),1,$c['textbuffer'], $c['dfs']);  // mPDF 4.2
22031            }
22032            else { $tempch = 0; }
22033 
22034           // Added cellpadding top and bottom. (Lineheight already adjusted to table_lineheight)
22035           $ch = $tempch + $extrh ;
22036         }
22037 
22038         //If height is defined and it is bigger than calculated $ch then update values
22039         if (isset($c['h']) && $c['h'] > $ch) {
22040           $c['mih'] = $ch; //in order to keep valign working
22041           $ch = $c['h'];
22042         }
22043         else $c['mih'] = $ch;
22044         if (isset($c['rowspan'])) $listspan[] = array($i,$j);
22045         elseif ($heightrow < $ch) $heightrow = $ch;
22046   
22047         // this is the extra used in _tableWrite to determine whether to trigger a page change
22048         if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
22049           // mPDF 3.0 - bug fix
22050           //if ($i == ($numrows-1) || ($i+$cell['rowspan']) == ($numrows) ) {
22051           if ($i == ($numrows-1) || (isset($c['rowspan']) && ($i+$c['rowspan']) == ($numrows)) ) {
22052           $extra = $table['margin']['B'] + $table['padding']['B'] + $table['border_details']['B']['w'] + $table['border_spacing_V']/2; 
22053           }
22054           else {
22055           $extra = $table['border_spacing_V']/2; 
22056           }
22057         }
22058           else { 
22059           if (!$this->simpleTables){  // mPDF 4.2.017
22060               // mPDF 4.3.009
22061             $extra = $bb/2; 
22062           }
22063           else if ($this->simpleTables){
22064             $extra = $table['simple']['border_details']['B']['w'] /2; 
22065           }
22066         }
22067 
22068         // mPDF 3.0
22069         if ($i <$this->tableheadernrows && $this->usetableheader) {
22070           $headerrowheight = max($headerrowheight,$ch);
22071           $headerrowheightplus = max($headerrowheightplus,$ch+$extra);
22072         }
22073         // mPDF 4.0
22074         else if ($table['is_tfoot'][$i]) {
22075           $footerrowheight = max($footerrowheight,$ch);
22076           $footerrowheightplus = max($footerrowheightplus,$ch+$extra);
22077         }
22078         else {
22079           $checkmaxheight = max($checkmaxheight,$ch);
22080           $checkmaxheightplus = max($checkmaxheightplus,$ch+$extra);
22081         }
22082 
22083 
22084         unset($c);
22085       }
22086     }//end of columns
22087   }//end of rows
22088   $heightrow = &$table['hr'];
22089   foreach ($listspan as $span) {
22090     list($i,$j) = $span;
22091     $c = &$cells[$i][$j];
22092     $lr = $i + $c['rowspan'];
22093     if ($lr > $numrows) $lr = $numrows;
22094     $hs = $hsa = 0;
22095     $list = array();
22096     for($k=$i;$k<$lr;$k++) {
22097       $hs += $heightrow[$k];
22098       if (!isset($c['h'])) {
22099         $list[] = $k;
22100         $hsa += $heightrow[$k];
22101       }
22102     }
22103     // mPDF 3.0 
22104     if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
22105       if ($i == ($numrows-1) || ($i+$c['rowspan']) == ($numrows) ) {
22106       $extra = $table['margin']['B'] + $table['padding']['B'] + $table['border_details']['B']['w'] + $table['border_spacing_V']/2; 
22107       }
22108       else {
22109       $extra = $table['border_spacing_V']/2; 
22110       }
22111     }
22112       else { 
22113       if (!$this->simpleTables){  // mPDF 4.2.017
22114         // mPDF 4.3.009
22115         if ($this->packTableData) {
22116           list($bt,$br,$bb,$bl) = $this->_getBorderWidths($c['borderbin']);
22117         }
22118         else { 
22119           // mPDF 4.3.012E
22120           $bb = $c['border_details']['B']['w'];
22121         }
22122         $extra = $bb/2; 
22123       }
22124       else if ($this->simpleTables){
22125         $extra = $table['simple']['border_details']['B']['w'] /2; 
22126       }
22127     }
22128     if ($i <$this->tableheadernrows && $this->usetableheader) {
22129       $headerrowheight = max($headerrowheight,$hs);
22130       $headerrowheightplus = max($headerrowheightplus,$hs+$extra);
22131     }
22132     // mPDF 4.0
22133     else if ($table['is_tfoot'][$i]) {
22134       $footerrowheight = max($footerrowheight,$hs);
22135       $footerrowheightplus = max($footerrowheightplus,$hs+$extra);
22136     }
22137     else {
22138       $checkmaxheight = max($checkmaxheight,$hs);
22139       $checkmaxheightplus = max($checkmaxheightplus,$hs+$extra);
22140     }
22141 
22142     if ($c['mih'] > $hs) {
22143       if (!$hs) {
22144         for($k=$i;$k<$lr;$k++) $heightrow[$k] = $c['mih']/$c['rowspan'];
22145       }
22146       elseif (!count($list)) {
22147         $hi = $c['mih'] - $hs;
22148         for($k=$i;$k<$lr;$k++) $heightrow[$k] += ($heightrow[$k]/$hs)*$hi;
22149       }
22150       else {
22151         $hi = $c['mih'] - $hsa;
22152         foreach ($list as $k) $heightrow[$k] += ($heightrow[$k]/$hsa)*$hi;
22153       }
22154     }
22155     unset($c);
22156   }
22157 
22158   $table['h'] = array_sum($table['hr']);
22159 
22160   if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
22161     $table['h'] += $table['margin']['T'] + $table['margin']['B'] + $table['border_details']['T']['w'] + $table['border_details']['B']['w'] + $table['border_spacing_V'] + $table['padding']['T'] +  $table['padding']['B'];
22162   }
22163   else { 
22164     $table['h'] += $table['margin']['T'] + $table['margin']['B'] + $table['max_cell_border_width']['T']/2 + $table['max_cell_border_width']['B']/2;
22165   }
22166 
22167   // mPDF 4.0
22168   $maxrowheight = $checkmaxheightplus + $headerrowheightplus + $footerrowheightplus;
22169   return array($table['h'],$maxrowheight,$temppgheight,$remainingpage);
22170 }
22171 
22172 function _tableGetWidth(&$table, $i,$j){
22173   $cell = &$table['cells'][$i][$j];
22174   if ($cell) {
22175     if (isset($cell['x0'])) return array($cell['x0'], $cell['w0']);
22176     $x = 0;
22177     $widthcols = &$table['wc'];
22178     for( $k = 0 ; $k < $j ; $k++ ) $x += $widthcols[$k];
22179     $w = $widthcols[$j];
22180     if (isset($cell['colspan'])) {
22181        for ( $k = $j+$cell['colspan']-1 ; $k > $j ; $k-- )  $w += $widthcols[$k];
22182     }
22183     $cell['x0'] = $x;
22184     $cell['w0'] = $w;
22185     return array($x, $w);
22186   }
22187   return array(0,0);
22188 }
22189 
22190 function _tableGetHeight(&$table, $i,$j){
22191   $cell = &$table['cells'][$i][$j];
22192   if ($cell){
22193     if (isset($cell['y0'])) return array($cell['y0'], $cell['h0']);
22194     $y = 0;
22195     $heightrow = &$table['hr'];
22196     for ($k=0;$k<$i;$k++) $y += $heightrow[$k];
22197     $h = $heightrow[$i];
22198     if (isset($cell['rowspan'])){
22199       for ($k=$i+$cell['rowspan']-1;$k>$i;$k--)
22200         $h += $heightrow[$k];
22201     }
22202     $cell['y0'] = $y;
22203     $cell['h0'] = $h;
22204     return array($y, $h);
22205   }
22206   return array(0,0);
22207 }
22208 
22209 
22210 // CHANGED TO ALLOW TABLE BORDER TO BE SPECIFIED CORRECTLY - added border_details
22211 // mPDF 3.0 Table borders need additional parameters - either corner (TLBR) and/or border-spacing-H or -V ($bsh/$bsv)
22212 function _tableRect($x, $y, $w, $h, $bord=-1, $details=array(), $buffer=false, $bSeparate=false, $cort='cell', $tablecorner='', $bsv=0, $bsh=0) {
22213   // mPDF 3.0 Disabled again - buffer is printed at end of each table row - in fn. _tablewrite()
22214 //  if ($this->ColActive) { $buffer = false; }
22215 
22216   // mPDF 3.0
22217   $cellBorderOverlay = array();
22218 
22219   if ($bord==-1) { $this->Rect($x, $y, $w, $h); }
22220   else if ($this->simpleTables && ($cort=='cell')) {  // mPDF 4.2.017
22221     $this->SetLineWidth($details['L']['w']);
22222     if ($details['L']['c']) { 
22223       $this->SetDrawColor($details['L']['c']['R'],$details['L']['c']['G'],$details['L']['c']['B']);
22224     }
22225     else { $this->SetDrawColor(0); }
22226       $this->_out('0 j');
22227     $this->Rect($x, $y, $w, $h); 
22228   }
22229   else if ($bord){
22230      if (!$bSeparate && $buffer) {
22231     $priority = 'LRTB';
22232     for($p=0;$p<strlen($priority);$p++) {
22233       $side = substr($priority,$p,1);
22234       $details['p'] = $side ;
22235 
22236       $dom = 0;
22237       if (isset($details[$side]['w'])) { $dom += ($details[$side]['w'] * 100000); }
22238       if (isset($details[$side]['style'])) { $dom += (array_search($details[$side]['style'],$this->borderstyles)*100) ; }
22239       if (isset($details[$side]['dom'])) { $dom += ($details[$side]['dom']*10); }
22240 
22241       // mPDF 3.0 Precedence to darker colours at joins
22242       $coldom = 0;
22243       if (isset($details[$side]['c']) && is_array($details[$side]['c'])) { 
22244         $coldom = 10-((($details[$side]['c']['R']*1.00)+($details[$side]['c']['G']*1.00)+($details[$side]['c']['B']*1.00))/76.5); 
22245       } // 10 black - 0 white
22246       if ($coldom) { $dom += $coldom; }
22247       
22248       // mPDF 3.0 Lastly precedence to RIGHT and BOTTOM cells at joins
22249       if (isset($details['cellposdom'])) { $dom += $details['cellposdom']; } 
22250 
22251       $save = false;
22252       // mPDF 3.0
22253       if ($side == 'T' && $this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_TOP)) { $cbord = _BORDER_TOP; $save = true; }
22254       else if ($side == 'L' && $this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_LEFT)) { $cbord = _BORDER_LEFT; $save = true; }
22255       else if ($side == 'R' && $this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_RIGHT)) { $cbord = _BORDER_RIGHT; $save = true; }
22256       else if ($side == 'B' && $this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_BOTTOM)) { $cbord = _BORDER_BOTTOM; $save = true; }
22257 
22258       if ($save) {
22259         // mPDF 4.3.008 4.3.014
22260         $this->cellBorderBuffer[] = pack("A16nCndnnnA10d14",
22261           str_pad(sprintf("%08.7f", $dom),16,"0",STR_PAD_LEFT),
22262           $cbord,
22263           ord($side),
22264           $details[$side]['s'],
22265           $details[$side]['w'],
22266           $details[$side]['c']['R'],
22267           $details[$side]['c']['G'],
22268           $details[$side]['c']['B'],
22269           $details[$side]['style'], 
22270           $x, $y, $w, $h,
22271           $details['mbw']['BL'],
22272           $details['mbw']['BR'],
22273           $details['mbw']['RT'],
22274           $details['mbw']['RB'],
22275           $details['mbw']['TL'],
22276           $details['mbw']['TR'],
22277           $details['mbw']['LT'],
22278           $details['mbw']['LB'],
22279           $details['cellposdom'],
22280           0
22281         );
22282          if ($details[$side]['style'] == 'ridge' || $details[$side]['style'] == 'groove' || $details[$side]['style'] == 'inset' || $details[$side]['style'] == 'outset' || $details[$side]['style'] == 'double' ) {
22283         $details[$side]['overlay'] = true;
22284         // mPDF 4.3.008 4.3.014
22285         $this->cellBorderBuffer[] = pack("A16nCndnnnA10d14",
22286           str_pad(sprintf("%08.7f", ($dom+4)),16,"0",STR_PAD_LEFT), /* mPDF 4.3.019 */
22287           $cbord,
22288           ord($side),
22289           $details[$side]['s'],
22290           $details[$side]['w'],
22291           $details[$side]['c']['R'],
22292           $details[$side]['c']['G'],
22293           $details[$side]['c']['B'],
22294           $details[$side]['style'], 
22295           $x, $y, $w, $h,
22296           $details['mbw']['BL'],
22297           $details['mbw']['BR'],
22298           $details['mbw']['RT'],
22299           $details['mbw']['RB'],
22300           $details['mbw']['TL'],
22301           $details['mbw']['TR'],
22302           $details['mbw']['LT'],
22303           $details['mbw']['LB'],
22304           $details['cellposdom'],
22305           1
22306         );
22307          }
22308       }
22309     }
22310     return;
22311      }
22312 
22313      if (isset($details['p']) && strlen($details['p'])>1) { $priority = $details['p']; }
22314      else { $priority='LTRB'; }
22315      $Tw = 0; 
22316      $Rw = 0; 
22317      $Bw = 0; 
22318      $Lw = 0; 
22319     if (isset($details['T']['w'])) { $Tw = $details['T']['w']; }
22320     if (isset($details['R']['w'])) { $Rw = $details['R']['w']; }
22321     if (isset($details['B']['w'])) { $Bw = $details['B']['w']; }
22322     if (isset($details['L']['w'])) { $Lw = $details['L']['w']; }
22323 
22324      $x2 = $x + $w; $y2 = $y + $h;
22325      $oldlinewidth = $this->LineWidth;
22326 
22327      for($p=0;$p<strlen($priority);$p++) {
22328     $side = substr($priority,$p,1);
22329     $xadj = 0;
22330     $xadj2 = 0;
22331     $yadj = 0;
22332     $yadj2 = 0;
22333     $print = false;
22334     if ($Tw && $side=='T' && $this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_TOP)) {  // TOP
22335       $ly1 = $y;
22336       $ly2 = $y;
22337       $lx1 = $x;
22338       $lx2 = $x2;
22339       $this->SetLineWidth($Tw);
22340       // mPDF 3.0
22341       if ($cort == 'cell' || strpos($tablecorner,'L')!==false) {
22342         if ($Tw > $Lw) $xadj = ($Tw - $Lw)/2;
22343         if ($Tw < $Lw) $xadj = ($Tw + $Lw)/2;
22344       }
22345       else { $xadj = $Tw/2 - $bsh/2; }
22346       // mPDF 3.0
22347       if ($cort == 'cell' || strpos($tablecorner,'R')!==false) {
22348         if ($Tw > $Rw) $xadj2 = ($Tw - $Rw)/2;
22349         if ($Tw < $Rw) $xadj2 = ($Tw + $Rw)/2;
22350       }
22351       else { $xadj2 = $Tw/2 - $bsh/2; }
22352       if (!$bSeparate && $details['mbw']['TL']) {
22353         $xadj = ($Tw - $details['mbw']['TL'])/2 ;
22354       }
22355       if (!$bSeparate && $details['mbw']['TR']) {
22356         $xadj2 = ($Tw - $details['mbw']['TR'])/2;
22357       }
22358       $print = true;
22359     }
22360     if ($Lw && $side=='L' && $this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_LEFT)) { // LEFT
22361       $ly1 = $y;
22362       $ly2 = $y2;
22363       $lx1 = $x;
22364       $lx2 = $x;
22365       $this->SetLineWidth($Lw);
22366       // mPDF 3.0
22367       if ($cort == 'cell' || strpos($tablecorner,'T')!==false) {
22368         if ($Lw > $Tw) $yadj = ($Lw - $Tw)/2;
22369         if ($Lw < $Tw) $yadj = ($Lw + $Tw)/2;
22370       }
22371       else { $yadj = $Lw/2 - $bsv/2; }
22372       // mPDF 3.0
22373       if ($cort == 'cell' || strpos($tablecorner,'B')!==false) {
22374         if ($Lw > $Bw) $yadj2 = ($Lw - $Bw)/2;
22375         if ($Lw < $Bw) $yadj2 = ($Lw + $Bw)/2;
22376       }
22377       else { $yadj2 = $Lw/2 - $bsv/2; }
22378       if (!$bSeparate && $details['mbw']['LT']) {
22379         $yadj = ($Lw - $details['mbw']['LT'])/2;
22380       }
22381       if (!$bSeparate && $details['mbw']['LB']) {
22382         $yadj2 = ($Lw - $details['mbw']['LB'])/2;
22383       }
22384       $print = true;
22385     }
22386     if ($Rw && $side=='R' && $this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_RIGHT)) {  // RIGHT
22387       $ly1 = $y;
22388       $ly2 = $y2;
22389       $lx1 = $x2;
22390       $lx2 = $x2;
22391       $this->SetLineWidth($Rw);
22392       // mPDF 3.0
22393       if ($cort == 'cell' || strpos($tablecorner,'T')!==false) {
22394         if ($Rw < $Tw) $yadj = ($Rw + $Tw)/2;
22395         if ($Rw > $Tw) $yadj = ($Rw - $Tw)/2;
22396       }
22397       else { $yadj = $Rw/2 - $bsv/2; }
22398 
22399       // mPDF 3.0
22400       if ($cort == 'cell' || strpos($tablecorner,'B')!==false) {
22401         if ($Rw > $Bw) $yadj2 = ($Rw - $Bw)/2;
22402         if ($Rw < $Bw) $yadj2 = ($Rw + $Bw)/2;
22403       }
22404       else { $yadj2 = $Rw/2 - $bsv/2; }
22405 
22406       if (!$bSeparate && $details['mbw']['RT']) {
22407         $yadj = ($Rw - $details['mbw']['RT'])/2;
22408       }
22409       if (!$bSeparate && $details['mbw']['RB']) {
22410         $yadj2 = ($Rw - $details['mbw']['RB'])/2;
22411       }
22412       $print = true;
22413     }
22414     if ($Bw && $side=='B' && $this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_BOTTOM)) { // BOTTOM
22415       $ly1 = $y2;
22416       $ly2 = $y2;
22417       $lx1 = $x;
22418       $lx2 = $x2;
22419       $this->SetLineWidth($Bw);
22420       // mPDF 3.0
22421       if ($cort == 'cell' || strpos($tablecorner,'L')!==false) {
22422         if ($Bw > $Lw) $xadj = ($Bw - $Lw)/2;
22423         if ($Bw < $Lw) $xadj = ($Bw + $Lw)/2;
22424       }
22425       else { $xadj = $Bw/2 - $bsh/2; }
22426       // mPDF 3.0
22427       if ($cort == 'cell' || strpos($tablecorner,'R')!==false) {
22428         if ($Bw > $Rw) $xadj2 = ($Bw - $Rw)/2;
22429         if ($Bw < $Rw) $xadj2 = ($Bw + $Rw)/2;
22430       }
22431       else { $xadj2 = $Bw/2 - $bsh/2; }
22432       if (!$bSeparate && $details['mbw']['BL']) {
22433         $xadj = ($Bw - $details['mbw']['BL'])/2;
22434       }
22435       if (!$bSeparate && $details['mbw']['BR']) {
22436         $xadj2 = ($Bw - $details['mbw']['BR'])/2;
22437       }
22438       $print = true;
22439     }
22440 
22441     // Now draw line
22442     if ($print) {
22443 /*-- TABLES-ADVANCED-BORDERS --*/
22444      if ($details[$side]['style'] == 'double') {
22445        if (!isset($details[$side]['overlay']) || !$details[$side]['overlay'] || $bSeparate) {
22446       if ($details[$side]['c']) { 
22447         $this->SetDrawColor($details[$side]['c']['R'],$details[$side]['c']['G'],$details[$side]['c']['B']);
22448       }
22449       else { $this->SetDrawColor(0); }
22450       $this->Line($lx1 + $xadj, $ly1 + $yadj, $lx2 - $xadj2, $ly2 - $yadj2);
22451        }
22452        if ((isset($details[$side]['overlay']) && $details[$side]['overlay']) || $bSeparate) {
22453       if ($bSeparate && $cort=='table') {
22454         if ($side=='T') {
22455            $xadj -= $this->LineWidth/2;
22456            $xadj2 -= $this->LineWidth;
22457            if ($this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_LEFT)) {
22458           $xadj += $this->LineWidth/2; 
22459            }
22460            if ($this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_RIGHT)) {
22461           $xadj2 += $this->LineWidth; 
22462            }
22463         }
22464         if ($side=='L') {
22465            $yadj -= $this->LineWidth/2;
22466            $yadj2 -= $this->LineWidth;
22467            if ($this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_TOP)) {
22468           $yadj += $this->LineWidth/2; 
22469            }
22470            if ($this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_BOTTOM)) {
22471           $yadj2 += $this->LineWidth; 
22472            }
22473         }
22474         if ($side=='B') {
22475            $xadj -= $this->LineWidth/2;
22476            $xadj2 -= $this->LineWidth;
22477            if ($this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_LEFT)) {
22478           $xadj += $this->LineWidth/2;
22479            }
22480            if ($this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_RIGHT)) {
22481           $xadj2 += $this->LineWidth; 
22482            }
22483         }
22484         if ($side=='R') {
22485            $yadj -= $this->LineWidth/2;
22486            $yadj2 -= $this->LineWidth;
22487            if ($this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_TOP)) {
22488           $yadj += $this->LineWidth/2;
22489            }
22490            if ($this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_BOTTOM)) {
22491           $yadj2 += $this->LineWidth; 
22492            }
22493         }
22494       }
22495 
22496       $this->SetLineWidth($this->LineWidth/3);
22497 
22498       // mPDF 4.2
22499       $tbcol = array(255,255,255);
22500       for($l=0; $l <= $this->blklvl; $l++) {
22501         if ($this->blk[$l]['bgcolor']) {
22502           $tbcol = array($this->blk[$l]['bgcolorarray']['R'],$this->blk[$l]['bgcolorarray']['G'],$this->blk[$l]['bgcolorarray']['B']);
22503         }
22504       }
22505 
22506       if ($bSeparate) {
22507          $cellBorderOverlay[] = array(
22508         'x' => $lx1 + $xadj, 
22509         'y' => $ly1 + $yadj, 
22510         'x2' => $lx2 - $xadj2, 
22511         'y2' => $ly2 - $yadj2,
22512         'col' => $tbcol,    /* mPDF 4.2 */
22513         'lw' => $this->LineWidth,
22514          );
22515       }
22516       else { 
22517         $this->SetDrawColor($tbcol[0],$tbcol[1],$tbcol[2]);   // mPDF 4.2
22518         $this->Line($lx1 + $xadj, $ly1 + $yadj, $lx2 - $xadj2, $ly2 - $yadj2);
22519       }
22520        }
22521      }
22522 
22523 
22524      else if (isset($details[$side]['style']) && ($details[$side]['style'] == 'ridge' || $details[$side]['style'] == 'groove' || $details[$side]['style'] == 'inset' || $details[$side]['style'] == 'outset')) {
22525        if (!isset($details[$side]['overlay']) || !$details[$side]['overlay'] || $bSeparate) {
22526       if ($details[$side]['c']) { 
22527         $this->SetDrawColor($details[$side]['c']['R'],$details[$side]['c']['G'],$details[$side]['c']['B']);
22528       }
22529       else { $this->SetDrawColor(0); }
22530       if ($details[$side]['style'] == 'outset' || $details[$side]['style'] == 'groove') {
22531         $nc = $this->_darkenColor($details[$side]['c']);
22532         $this->SetDrawColor($nc[0],$nc[1],$nc[2]); 
22533       }
22534       else if ($details[$side]['style'] == 'ridge' || $details[$side]['style'] == 'inset') {
22535         $nc = $this->_lightenColor($details[$side]['c']);
22536         $this->SetDrawColor($nc[0],$nc[1],$nc[2]); 
22537       }
22538       $this->Line($lx1 + $xadj, $ly1 + $yadj, $lx2 - $xadj2, $ly2 - $yadj2);
22539        }
22540        if ((isset($details[$side]['overlay']) && $details[$side]['overlay']) || $bSeparate) {
22541       if ($details[$side]['c']) { 
22542         $this->SetDrawColor($details[$side]['c']['R'],$details[$side]['c']['G'],$details[$side]['c']['B']);
22543       }
22544       else { $this->SetDrawColor(0); }
22545       $doubleadj = ($this->LineWidth)/3;
22546       $this->SetLineWidth($this->LineWidth/2);
22547       $xadj3 = $yadj3 = $wadj3 = $hadj3 = 0;
22548 
22549       if ($details[$side]['style'] == 'ridge' || $details[$side]['style'] == 'inset') {
22550          $nc = $this->_darkenColor($details[$side]['c']);
22551 
22552          if ($bSeparate && $cort=='table') {
22553         if ($side=='T') {
22554            $yadj3 = $this->LineWidth/2; 
22555            $xadj3 = -$this->LineWidth/2;
22556            $wadj3 = $this->LineWidth;
22557            if ($this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_LEFT)) {
22558           $xadj3 += $this->LineWidth; $wadj3 -= $this->LineWidth; 
22559            }
22560            if ($this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_RIGHT)) {
22561           $wadj3 -= $this->LineWidth*2; 
22562            }
22563         }
22564         if ($side=='L') {
22565            $xadj3 = $this->LineWidth/2; 
22566            $yadj3 = -$this->LineWidth/2;
22567            $hadj3 = $this->LineWidth;
22568            if ($this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_TOP)) {
22569           $yadj3 += $this->LineWidth; $hadj3 -= $this->LineWidth; 
22570            }
22571            if ($this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_BOTTOM)) {
22572           $hadj3 -= $this->LineWidth*2; 
22573            }
22574         }
22575         if ($side=='B') {
22576            $yadj3 = $this->LineWidth/2; 
22577            $xadj3 = -$this->LineWidth/2;
22578            $wadj3 = $this->LineWidth;
22579         }
22580         if ($side=='R') {
22581            $xadj3 = $this->LineWidth/2; 
22582            $yadj3 = -$this->LineWidth/2;
22583            $hadj3 = $this->LineWidth;
22584         }
22585          }
22586 
22587          else if ($side=='T') { $yadj3 = $this->LineWidth/2; $xadj3 = $this->LineWidth/2; $wadj3 = -$this->LineWidth*2; }
22588          else if ($side=='L') { $xadj3 = $this->LineWidth/2; $yadj3 = $this->LineWidth/2; $hadj3 = -$this->LineWidth*2; }
22589 
22590          else if ($side=='B' && $bSeparate) { $yadj3 = $this->LineWidth/2; $wadj3 = $this->LineWidth/2; }
22591          else if ($side=='R' && $bSeparate) { $xadj3 = $this->LineWidth/2; $hadj3 = $this->LineWidth/2; }
22592 
22593          else if ($side=='B') { $yadj3 = $this->LineWidth/2; $xadj3 = $this->LineWidth/2; }
22594          else if ($side=='R') { $xadj3 = $this->LineWidth/2; $yadj3 = $this->LineWidth/2; }
22595       }
22596       else {
22597          $nc = $this->_lightenColor($details[$side]['c']);
22598 
22599          if ($bSeparate && $cort=='table') {
22600         if ($side=='T') {
22601            $yadj3 = $this->LineWidth/2; 
22602            $xadj3 = -$this->LineWidth/2;
22603            $wadj3 = $this->LineWidth;
22604            if ($this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_LEFT)) {
22605           $xadj3 += $this->LineWidth; $wadj3 -= $this->LineWidth; 
22606            }
22607         }
22608         if ($side=='L') {
22609            $xadj3 = $this->LineWidth/2; 
22610            $yadj3 = -$this->LineWidth/2;
22611            $hadj3 = $this->LineWidth;
22612            if ($this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_TOP)) {
22613           $yadj3 += $this->LineWidth; $hadj3 -= $this->LineWidth; 
22614            }
22615         }
22616         if ($side=='B') {
22617            $yadj3 = $this->LineWidth/2; 
22618            $xadj3 = -$this->LineWidth/2;
22619            $wadj3 = $this->LineWidth;
22620            if ($this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_LEFT)) {
22621           $xadj3 += $this->LineWidth; $wadj3 -= $this->LineWidth; 
22622            }
22623         }
22624         if ($side=='R') {
22625            $xadj3 = $this->LineWidth/2; 
22626            $yadj3 = -$this->LineWidth/2;
22627            $hadj3 = $this->LineWidth;
22628            if ($this->issetBorder($bord, _BORDER_TOP)) {
22629           $yadj3 += $this->LineWidth; $hadj3 -= $this->LineWidth; 
22630            }
22631         }
22632          }
22633 
22634          else if ($side=='T') { $yadj3 = $this->LineWidth/2; $xadj3 = $this->LineWidth/2; }
22635          else if ($side=='L') { $xadj3 = $this->LineWidth/2; $yadj3 = $this->LineWidth/2; }
22636 
22637          else if ($side=='B' && $bSeparate) { $yadj3 = $this->LineWidth/2; $xadj3 = $this->LineWidth/2; }
22638          else if ($side=='R' && $bSeparate) { $xadj3 = $this->LineWidth/2; $yadj3 = $this->LineWidth/2; }
22639 
22640          else if ($side=='B') { $yadj3 = $this->LineWidth/2; $xadj3 = -$this->LineWidth/2; $wadj3 = $this->LineWidth; }
22641          else if ($side=='R') { $xadj3 = $this->LineWidth/2; $yadj3 = -$this->LineWidth/2;  $hadj3 = $this->LineWidth; }
22642 
22643       }
22644 
22645       if ($bSeparate) {
22646          $cellBorderOverlay[] = array(
22647         'x' => $lx1 + $xadj + $xadj3, 
22648         'y' => $ly1 + $yadj + $yadj3, 
22649         'x2' => $lx2 - $xadj2 + $xadj3 + $wadj3, 
22650         'y2' => $ly2 - $yadj2 + $yadj3 + $hadj3,
22651         'col' => array($nc[0],$nc[1],$nc[2]), 
22652         'lw' => $this->LineWidth,
22653          );
22654       }
22655       else { 
22656          $this->SetDrawColor($nc[0],$nc[1],$nc[2]); 
22657          $this->Line($lx1 + $xadj + $xadj3, $ly1 + $yadj + $yadj3, $lx2 - $xadj2 + $xadj3 + $wadj3, $ly2 - $yadj2 + $yadj3 + $hadj3);
22658       }
22659        }
22660      }
22661 
22662 
22663      else {
22664 /*-- END TABLES-ADVANCED-BORDERS --*/
22665        if ($details[$side]['style'] == 'dashed') {
22666       $dashsize = 2;  // final dash will be this + 1*linewidth
22667       $dashsizek = 1.5; // ratio of Dash/Blank
22668       $this->SetDash($dashsize,($dashsize/$dashsizek)+($this->LineWidth*2));
22669        }
22670        else if ($details[$side]['style'] == 'dotted') {
22671         $this->_out("\n".'1 J'."\n".'1 j'."\n");
22672       $this->SetDash(0.001,($this->LineWidth*2));
22673        }
22674        if ($details[$side]['c']) { 
22675       $this->SetDrawColor($details[$side]['c']['R'],$details[$side]['c']['G'],$details[$side]['c']['B']);
22676        }
22677        else { $this->SetDrawColor(0); }
22678        $this->Line($lx1 + $xadj, $ly1 + $yadj, $lx2 - $xadj2, $ly2 - $yadj2);
22679 /*-- TABLES-ADVANCED-BORDERS --*/
22680      }
22681 /*-- END TABLES-ADVANCED-BORDERS --*/
22682 
22683         // Reset Corners
22684         $this->SetDash(); 
22685         //BUTT style line cap
22686         $this->_out('2 J');
22687     }
22688      }
22689 
22690      if ($bSeparate && count($cellBorderOverlay)) {
22691     foreach($cellBorderOverlay AS $cbo) {
22692       $this->SetLineWidth($cbo['lw']);
22693       $this->SetDrawColor($cbo['col'][0],$cbo['col'][1],$cbo['col'][2]); 
22694       $this->Line($cbo['x'], $cbo['y'], $cbo['x2'], $cbo['y2']);
22695     }
22696      }
22697 
22698      $this->SetLineWidth($oldlinewidth);
22699      $this->SetDrawColor(0);
22700   }
22701 }
22702 
22703 
22704 /*-- TABLES --*/
22705 /*-- TABLES-ADVANCED-BORDERS --*/
22706 function _lightenColor($c) {
22707   $r = $c['R']; $g = $c['G']; $b = $c['B'];
22708   $var_r = $r / 255;
22709   $var_g = $g / 255;
22710   $var_b = $b / 255;
22711   list($h,$s,$l) = $this->rgb2hsl($var_r,$var_g,$var_b);
22712 
22713   $l += ((1 - $l)*0.8);
22714 
22715   list($r,$g,$b) = $this->hsl2rgb($h,$s,$l);
22716   return array($r,$g,$b);
22717 }
22718 
22719 
22720 function _darkenColor($c) {
22721   $r = $c['R']; $g = $c['G']; $b = $c['B'];
22722   $var_r = $r / 255;
22723   $var_g = $g / 255;
22724   $var_b = $b / 255;
22725   list($h,$s,$l) = $this->rgb2hsl($var_r,$var_g,$var_b);
22726 
22727   $s *= 0.25;
22728   $l *= 0.75;
22729 
22730   list($r,$g,$b) = $this->hsl2rgb($h,$s,$l);
22731   return array($r,$g,$b);
22732 }
22733 
22734 // mPDF 4.0 Originally in htmltoolkit.php
22735 function rgb2hsl($var_r, $var_g, $var_b) {
22736     $var_min = min($var_r,$var_g,$var_b);
22737     $var_max = max($var_r,$var_g,$var_b);
22738     $del_max = $var_max - $var_min;
22739 
22740     $l = ($var_max + $var_min) / 2;
22741 
22742     if ($del_max == 0) {
22743             $h = 0;
22744             $s = 0;
22745     }
22746     else {
22747             if ($l < 0.5) { $s = $del_max / ($var_max + $var_min); }
22748             else { $s = $del_max / (2 - $var_max - $var_min); }
22749 
22750             $del_r = ((($var_max - $var_r) / 6) + ($del_max / 2)) / $del_max;
22751             $del_g = ((($var_max - $var_g) / 6) + ($del_max / 2)) / $del_max;
22752             $del_b = ((($var_max - $var_b) / 6) + ($del_max / 2)) / $del_max;
22753 
22754             if ($var_r == $var_max) { $h = $del_b - $del_g; }
22755             elseif ($var_g == $var_max)  { $h = (1 / 3) + $del_r - $del_b; }
22756             elseif ($var_b == $var_max)  { $h = (2 / 3) + $del_g - $del_r; };
22757  
22758             if ($h < 0) { $h += 1; }
22759             if ($h > 1) { $h -= 1; }
22760     }
22761     return array($h,$s,$l);
22762 }
22763 
22764 // mPDF 4.0 Originally in htmltoolkit.php
22765 function hsl2rgb($h2,$s2,$l2) {
22766       // Input is HSL value of complementary colour, held in $h2, $s, $l as fractions of 1
22767        // Output is RGB in normal 255 255 255 format, held in $r, $g, $b
22768        // Hue is converted using function hue_2_rgb, shown at the end of this code
22769 
22770         if ($s2 == 0)
22771         {
22772                 $r = $l2 * 255;
22773                 $g = $l2 * 255;
22774                 $b = $l2 * 255;
22775         }
22776         else
22777         {
22778                 if ($l2 < 0.5)
22779                 {
22780                         $var_2 = $l2 * (1 + $s2);
22781                 }
22782                 else
22783                 {
22784                         $var_2 = ($l2 + $s2) - ($s2 * $l2);
22785                 };
22786 
22787                 $var_1 = 2 * $l2 - $var_2;
22788                 $r = round(255 * $this->hue_2_rgb($var_1,$var_2,$h2 + (1 / 3)));
22789                 $g = round(255 * $this->hue_2_rgb($var_1,$var_2,$h2));
22790                 $b = round(255 * $this->hue_2_rgb($var_1,$var_2,$h2 - (1 / 3)));
22791         };
22792     return array($r,$g,$b);
22793 }
22794 
22795 // mPDF 4.0 Originally in htmltoolkit.php
22796 function hue_2_rgb($v1,$v2,$vh) {
22797   // Function to convert hue to RGB, called from above
22798   if ($vh < 0) { $vh += 1; };
22799   if ($vh > 1) { $vh -= 1; };
22800   if ((6 * $vh) < 1) { return ($v1 + ($v2 - $v1) * 6 * $vh); };
22801   if ((2 * $vh) < 1) { return ($v2); };
22802   if ((3 * $vh) < 2) { return ($v1 + ($v2 - $v1) * ((2 / 3 - $vh) * 6)); };
22803   return ($v1);
22804 }
22805 /*-- END TABLES-ADVANCED-BORDERS --*/
22806 /*-- END TABLES --*/
22807 
22808 
22809 
22810 function setBorder(&$var, $flag, $set = true) {
22811   $flag = intval($flag);
22812   if ($set) { $set = true; }
22813   $var = intval($var);
22814   $var = $set ? ($var | $flag) : ($var & ~$flag);
22815 }
22816 function issetBorder($var, $flag) {
22817   $flag = intval($flag);
22818   $var = intval($var);
22819   return (($var & $flag) == $flag);
22820 }
22821 
22822 // mPDF 4.0
22823 function _table2cellBorder(&$tableb, &$cbdb, &$cellb, $bval) {
22824   if ($tableb && $tableb['w'] > $cbdb['w']) {
22825     $cbdb = $tableb;
22826     $this->setBorder($cellb, $bval); 
22827   }
22828   else if ($tableb && $tableb['w'] == $cbdb['w'] 
22829     && array_search($tableb['style'],$this->borderstyles) > array_search($cbdb['style'],$this->borderstyles)) {
22830     $cbdb = $tableb;
22831     $this->setBorder($cellb, $bval); 
22832   }
22833 }
22834 
22835 // FIX BORDERS ********************************************
22836 function _fixTableBorders(&$table){
22837 
22838   if (!$table['borders_separate'] && $table['border_details']['L']['w']) {
22839     $table['max_cell_border_width']['L'] = $table['border_details']['L']['w']; 
22840   } 
22841   if (!$table['borders_separate'] && $table['border_details']['R']['w']) {
22842     $table['max_cell_border_width']['R'] = $table['border_details']['R']['w']; 
22843   } 
22844   if (!$table['borders_separate'] && $table['border_details']['T']['w']) {
22845     $table['max_cell_border_width']['T'] = $table['border_details']['T']['w']; 
22846   } 
22847   if (!$table['borders_separate'] && $table['border_details']['B']['w']) {
22848     $table['max_cell_border_width']['B'] = $table['border_details']['B']['w']; 
22849   } 
22850   if ($this->simpleTables) { return; }  // mPDF 4.2.017
22851   $cells = &$table['cells'];
22852   $numcols = $table['nc'];
22853   $numrows = $table['nr'];
22854 
22855   for( $i = 0 ; $i < $numrows ; $i++ ) { //Rows
22856     for( $j = 0 ; $j < $numcols ; $j++ ) { //Columns
22857     if (isset($cells[$i][$j]) && $cells[$i][$j]) {
22858       $cell = &$cells[$i][$j];
22859       // mPDF 4.3.009 Binary packed data
22860       if ($this->packTableData) {
22861         $cbord = $this->_unpackCellBorder($cell['borderbin']);
22862       }
22863       else {
22864         $cbord = &$cells[$i][$j];
22865       }
22866 
22867       // mPDF 4.3.009 Binary packed data
22868         if (!$cbord['border'] && isset($table['border']) && $table['border'] && $this->table_border_attr_set) {
22869         $cbord['border'] = $table['border'];
22870         $cbord['border_details'] = $table['border_details'];
22871       }
22872 
22873       if (isset($cell['colspan']) && $cell['colspan']>1) { $ccolsp = $cell['colspan']; }
22874       else { $ccolsp = 1; }
22875       if (isset($cell['rowspan']) && $cell['rowspan']>1) { $crowsp = $cell['rowspan']; }
22876       else { $crowsp = 1; }
22877 
22878       // mPDF 3.0
22879       $cbord['border_details']['cellposdom'] = ((($i+1)/$numrows) / 10000 ) + ((($j+1)/$numcols) / 10 );
22880       // Inherit Cell border from Table border
22881       if ($this->table_border_css_set && !$table['borders_separate']) {
22882         if ($i == 0) {
22883           $this->_table2cellBorder($table['border_details']['T'], $cbord['border_details']['T'], $cbord['border'], _BORDER_TOP);  // mPDF 4.3.009
22884         }
22885         if ($i == ($numrows-1) || ($i+$crowsp) == ($numrows) ) {
22886           $this->_table2cellBorder($table['border_details']['B'], $cbord['border_details']['B'], $cbord['border'], _BORDER_BOTTOM); // mPDF 4.3.009
22887         }
22888         if ($j == 0) {
22889           $this->_table2cellBorder($table['border_details']['L'], $cbord['border_details']['L'], $cbord['border'], _BORDER_LEFT); // mPDF 4.3.009
22890         }
22891         if ($j == ($numcols-1) || ($j+$ccolsp) == ($numcols) ) {
22892           $this->_table2cellBorder($table['border_details']['R'], $cbord['border_details']['R'], $cbord['border'], _BORDER_RIGHT);  // mPDF 4.3.009
22893         }
22894       }
22895 
22896 /*-- TABLES-ADVANCED-BORDERS --*/
22897       if (isset($table['topntail']) && $table['topntail']) {
22898         if ($i == 0) {
22899           $cbord['border_details']['T'] = $this->border_details($table['topntail']);
22900           $this->setBorder($cbord['border'], _BORDER_TOP); 
22901           if ($table['borders_separate']) {
22902           $cbord['border_details']['B'] = $this->border_details($table['topntail']);
22903           $this->setBorder($cbord['border'], _BORDER_BOTTOM); 
22904           }
22905         }
22906         else if (($i == $this->tableheadernrows) && $this->usetableheader) {
22907           if (!$table['borders_separate']) {
22908           $cbord['border_details']['T'] = $this->border_details($table['topntail']);
22909           $this->setBorder($cbord['border'], _BORDER_TOP); 
22910           }
22911         }
22912         // Added v1.4 for TFOOT
22913         else if (($i == ($numrows-1) ) && $this->tabletfoot) {
22914           $cbord['border_details']['T'] = $this->border_details($table['topntail']);
22915           $this->setBorder($cbord['border'], _BORDER_TOP); 
22916         }
22917         else if ($this->tabletheadjustfinished) { // $this->tabletheadjustfinished called from tableheader
22918           if (!$table['borders_separate']) {
22919           $cbord['border_details']['T'] = $this->border_details($table['topntail']);
22920           $this->setBorder($cbord['border'], _BORDER_TOP); 
22921           }
22922         }
22923         if ($i == ($numrows-1) || ($i+$crowsp) == ($numrows) ) {
22924           $cbord['border_details']['B'] = $this->border_details($table['topntail']);
22925           $this->setBorder($cbord['border'], _BORDER_BOTTOM); 
22926         }
22927       }
22928 
22929       if (isset($table['thead-underline']) && $table['thead-underline']) {
22930         if ($table['borders_separate']) {
22931           if ($i == 0) {
22932           $cbord['border_details']['B'] = $this->border_details($table['thead-underline']);
22933           $this->setBorder($cbord['border'], _BORDER_BOTTOM); 
22934           }
22935         }
22936         else  {
22937           if (($i == $this->tableheadernrows) && $this->usetableheader) {
22938           $cbord['border_details']['T'] = $this->border_details($table['thead-underline']);
22939           $this->setBorder($cbord['border'], _BORDER_TOP); 
22940           }
22941           else if ($this->tabletheadjustfinished) { // $this->tabletheadjustfinished called from tableheader
22942           $cbord['border_details']['T'] = $this->border_details($table['thead-underline']);
22943           $this->setBorder($cbord['border'], _BORDER_TOP); 
22944           }
22945         }
22946       }
22947 
22948       // Collapse Border - Algorithm for conflicting borders
22949       // Hidden >> Width >> double>solid>dashed>dotted... >> style set on cell>table >> top/left>bottom/right
22950       // mPDF 3.0
22951       // Do not turn off border which is overridden
22952       // Needed for page break for TOP/BOTTOM both to be defined in Collapsed borders
22953       // Means it is painted twice. (Left/Right can still disable overridden border)
22954       if (!$table['borders_separate'] && (!$this->usetableheader || $i>($this->tableheadernrows-1)) ) {
22955         if ($i < ($numrows-1)  || ($i+$crowsp) < $numrows ) { // Bottom
22956          for ($cspi = 0; $cspi<$ccolsp; $cspi++) {
22957         // already defined Top for adjacent cell below
22958         if (isset($cells[($i+$crowsp)][$j+$cspi])) {
22959            if ($this->packTableData) {
22960           $celladj = $this->_unpackCellBorder($cells[($i+$crowsp)][$j+$cspi]['borderbin']); // mPDF 4.3.009 Binary packed data
22961            }
22962            else { $celladj =& $cells[($i+$crowsp)][$j+$cspi]; }
22963         }
22964         else { $celladj = false; }
22965         if ($celladj && $celladj['border_details']['T']['s'] == 1)  {
22966            $csadj = $celladj['border_details']['T']['w'];
22967            $csthis = $cbord['border_details']['B']['w'];
22968            // Hidden
22969            if ($cbord['border_details']['B']['style']=='hidden') {
22970           $celladj['border_details']['T'] = $cbord['border_details']['B'];
22971           $this->setBorder($celladj['border'] , _BORDER_TOP, false); 
22972           $this->setBorder($cbord['border'] , _BORDER_BOTTOM , false); 
22973            }
22974            else if ($celladj['border_details']['T']['style']=='hidden') {
22975           $cbord['border_details']['B'] = $celladj['border_details']['T'];
22976           $this->setBorder($cbord['border'] , _BORDER_BOTTOM , false); 
22977           $this->setBorder($celladj['border'] , _BORDER_TOP, false); 
22978            }
