22979            // Width
22980            else if ($csthis > $csadj) {
22981             if (!isset($cells[($i+$crowsp)][$j+$cspi]['colspan']) || (isset($cells[($i+$crowsp)][$j+$cspi]['colspan']) && $cells[($i+$crowsp)][$j+$cspi]['colspan']<2)) { // don't overwrite bordering cells that span
22982           $celladj['border_details']['T'] = $cbord['border_details']['B'];
22983           $this->setBorder($cbord['border'] , _BORDER_BOTTOM); 
22984             }
22985            }
22986            else if ($csadj > $csthis) {
22987             if ($ccolsp < 2) {  // don't overwrite this cell if it spans
22988           $cbord['border_details']['B'] = $celladj['border_details']['T'];
22989           $this->setBorder($celladj['border'] , _BORDER_TOP); 
22990             }
22991            }
22992 
22993            // double>solid>dashed>dotted... 
22994            else if (array_search($cbord['border_details']['B']['style'],$this->borderstyles) > array_search($celladj['border_details']['T']['style'],$this->borderstyles)) {
22995             if (!isset($cells[($i+$crowsp)][$j+$cspi]['colspan']) || (isset($cells[($i+$crowsp)][$j+$cspi]['colspan']) && $cells[($i+$crowsp)][$j+$cspi]['colspan']<2)) { // don't overwrite bordering cells that span
22996           $celladj['border_details']['T'] = $cbord['border_details']['B'];
22997           $this->setBorder($cbord['border'] , _BORDER_BOTTOM ); 
22998             }
22999            }
23000            else if (array_search($celladj['border_details']['T']['style'],$this->borderstyles) > array_search($cbord['border_details']['B']['style'],$this->borderstyles)) {
23001             if ($ccolsp < 2) {  // don't overwrite this cell if it spans
23002           $cbord['border_details']['B'] = $celladj['border_details']['T'];
23003           $this->setBorder($celladj['border'] , _BORDER_TOP); 
23004             }
23005            }
23006 
23007 
23008 
23009            // Style set on cell vs. table
23010            else if ($celladj['border_details']['T']['dom'] > $cbord['border_details']['B']['dom']) {
23011             if ($ccolsp < 2) {  // don't overwrite this cell if it spans
23012           $cbord['border_details']['B'] = $celladj['border_details']['T'];
23013           $this->setBorder($celladj['border'] , _BORDER_TOP); 
23014             }
23015            }
23016            // Style set on cell vs. table  - OR - LEFT/TOP (cell) in preference to BOTTOM/RIGHT
23017            else {
23018             if (!isset($cells[($i+$crowsp)][$j+$cspi]['colspan']) || (isset($cells[($i+$crowsp)][$j+$cspi]['colspan']) && $cells[($i+$crowsp)][$j+$cspi]['colspan']<2)) { // don't overwrite bordering cells that span
23019           $celladj['border_details']['T'] = $cbord['border_details']['B'];
23020           $this->setBorder($cbord['border'] , _BORDER_BOTTOM ); 
23021             }
23022            }
23023         }
23024         else if ($celladj) {
23025             if (!isset($cells[($i+$crowsp)][$j+$cspi]['colspan']) || (isset($cells[($i+$crowsp)][$j+$cspi]['colspan']) && $cells[($i+$crowsp)][$j+$cspi]['colspan']<2)) { // don't overwrite bordering cells that span
23026           $celladj['border_details']['T'] = $cbord['border_details']['B'];
23027             }
23028         }
23029         // mPDF 4.3.009
23030         if ($celladj && $this->packTableData) { $cells[($i+$crowsp)][$j+$cspi]['borderbin'] = $this->_packCellBorder($celladj); }
23031         unset($celladj);
23032          }
23033         }
23034 
23035         if ($j < ($numcols-1)  || ($j+$ccolsp) < $numcols ) { // Right
23036          for ($cspi = 0; $cspi<$crowsp; $cspi++) {
23037         // already defined Left for adjacent cell to R
23038         if (isset($cells[$i+$cspi][$j+$ccolsp])) {
23039            if ($this->packTableData) {
23040             $celladj = $this->_unpackCellBorder($cells[$i+$cspi][$j+$ccolsp]['borderbin']); // mPDF 4.3.009 Binary packed data
23041            }
23042            else { $celladj =& $cells[$i+$cspi][$j+$ccolsp]; }
23043         }
23044         else { $celladj = false; }
23045         if ($celladj && $celladj['border_details']['L']['s'] == 1) {  
23046            $csadj = $celladj['border_details']['L']['w'];
23047            $csthis = $cbord['border_details']['R']['w'];
23048            // Hidden
23049            if ($cbord['border_details']['R']['style']=='hidden') {
23050           $celladj['border_details']['L'] = $cbord['border_details']['R'];
23051           $this->setBorder($celladj['border'] , _BORDER_LEFT, false); 
23052           $this->setBorder($cbord['border'] , _BORDER_RIGHT , false); 
23053            }
23054            else if ($celladj['border_details']['L']['style']=='hidden') {
23055           $cbord['border_details']['R'] = $celladj['border_details']['L'];
23056           $this->setBorder($cbord['border'] , _BORDER_RIGHT , false); 
23057           $this->setBorder($celladj['border'] , _BORDER_LEFT, false); 
23058            }
23059            // Width
23060            else if ($csthis > $csadj) {
23061             if (!isset($cells[($i+$cspi)][$j+$ccolsp]['rowspan']) || (isset($cells[($i+$cspi)][$j+$ccolsp]['rowspan']) && $cells[($i+$cspi)][$j+$ccolsp]['rowspan']<2)) { // don't overwrite bordering cells that span
23062           $celladj['border_details']['L'] = $cbord['border_details']['R'];
23063           $this->setBorder($cbord['border'] , _BORDER_RIGHT); 
23064           $this->setBorder($celladj['border'] , _BORDER_LEFT, false); 
23065             }
23066            }
23067            else if ($csadj > $csthis) {
23068             if ($crowsp < 2) {  // don't overwrite this cell if it spans
23069           $cbord['border_details']['R'] = $celladj['border_details']['L'];
23070           $this->setBorder($cbord['border'] , _BORDER_RIGHT, false); 
23071           $this->setBorder($celladj['border'] , _BORDER_LEFT); 
23072             }
23073            }
23074 
23075            // double>solid>dashed>dotted... 
23076            else if (array_search($cbord['border_details']['R']['style'],$this->borderstyles) > array_search($celladj['border_details']['L']['style'],$this->borderstyles)) {
23077             if (!isset($cells[($i+$cspi)][$j+$ccolsp]['rowspan']) || (isset($cells[($i+$cspi)][$j+$ccolsp]['rowspan']) && $cells[($i+$cspi)][$j+$ccolsp]['rowspan']<2)) { // don't overwrite bordering cells that span
23078           $celladj['border_details']['L'] = $cbord['border_details']['R'];
23079           $this->setBorder($celladj['border'] , _BORDER_LEFT, false); 
23080           $this->setBorder($cbord['border'] , _BORDER_RIGHT); 
23081             }
23082            }
23083            else if (array_search($celladj['border_details']['L']['style'],$this->borderstyles) > array_search($cbord['border_details']['R']['style'],$this->borderstyles)) {
23084             if ($crowsp < 2) {  // don't overwrite this cell if it spans
23085           $cbord['border_details']['R'] = $celladj['border_details']['L'];
23086           $this->setBorder($cbord['border'] , _BORDER_RIGHT , false); 
23087           $this->setBorder($celladj['border'] , _BORDER_LEFT); 
23088             }
23089            }
23090 
23091 
23092            // Style set on cell vs. table
23093            else if ($celladj['border_details']['L']['dom'] > $cbord['border_details']['R']['dom']) {
23094             if ($crowsp < 2) {  // don't overwrite this cell if it spans
23095           $cbord['border_details']['R'] = $celladj['border_details']['L'];
23096       // mPDF 3.0     $this->setBorder($cbord['border'] , _BORDER_RIGHT , false); 
23097           $this->setBorder($celladj['border'] , _BORDER_LEFT); 
23098             }
23099            }
23100            // Style set on cell vs. table  - OR - LEFT/TOP (cell) in preference to BOTTOM/RIGHT
23101            else {
23102             if (!isset($cells[($i+$cspi)][$j+$ccolsp]['rowspan']) || (isset($cells[($i+$cspi)][$j+$ccolsp]['rowspan']) && $cells[($i+$cspi)][$j+$ccolsp]['rowspan']<2)) { // don't overwrite bordering cells that span
23103           $celladj['border_details']['L'] = $cbord['border_details']['R'];
23104       // mPDF 3.0     $this->setBorder($celladj['border'] , _BORDER_LEFT , false); 
23105           $this->setBorder($cbord['border'] , _BORDER_RIGHT); 
23106             }
23107            }
23108         }
23109         else if ($celladj) {
23110            // if right-cell border is not set
23111             if (!isset($cells[($i+$cspi)][$j+$ccolsp]['rowspan']) || (isset($cells[($i+$cspi)][$j+$ccolsp]['rowspan']) && $cells[($i+$cspi)][$j+$ccolsp]['rowspan']<2)) { // don't overwrite bordering cells that span
23112           $celladj['border_details']['L'] = $cbord['border_details']['R'];
23113       // mPDF 3.0     $this->setBorder($celladj['border'] , _BORDER_LEFT , false); 
23114             }
23115         }
23116         // mPDF 4.3.009
23117         if ($celladj && $this->packTableData) { $cells[$i+$cspi][$j+$ccolsp]['borderbin'] = $this->_packCellBorder($celladj); }
23118         unset($celladj);
23119          }
23120         }
23121       }
23122 
23123 
23124       // Set maximum cell border width meeting at LRTB edges of cell - used for extended cell border
23125       // ['border_details']['mbw']['LT'] = meeting border width - Left border - Top end
23126       if (!$table['borders_separate']) {
23127         $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['BL'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['BL'], $cbord['border_details']['L']['w']);
23128         $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['BR'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['BR'], $cbord['border_details']['R']['w']);
23129         $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['RT'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['RT'], $cbord['border_details']['T']['w']);
23130         $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['RB'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['RB'], $cbord['border_details']['B']['w']);
23131         $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['TL'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['TL'], $cbord['border_details']['L']['w']);
23132         $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['TR'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['TR'], $cbord['border_details']['R']['w']);
23133         $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['LT'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['LT'], $cbord['border_details']['T']['w']);
23134         $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['LB'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['LB'], $cbord['border_details']['B']['w']);
23135 
23136         if (($i+$crowsp) < $numrows && isset($cells[$i+$crowsp][$j])) { // Has Bottom adjoining cell
23137         if ($this->packTableData) {
23138           $celladj = $this->_unpackCellBorder($cells[$i+$crowsp][$j]['borderbin']); // mPDF 4.3.009 Binary packed data
23139         }
23140         else { $celladj =& $cells[$i+$crowsp][$j]; }
23141         $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['BL'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['BL'], $celladj['border_details']['L']['w'], $celladj['border_details']['mbw']['TL']);
23142         $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['BR'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['BR'], $celladj['border_details']['R']['w'], $celladj['border_details']['mbw']['TR']);
23143         $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['LB'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['LB'], $celladj['border_details']['mbw']['LT']);
23144         $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['RB'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['RB'], $celladj['border_details']['mbw']['RT']);
23145         unset($celladj);
23146         } 
23147 
23148         if (($j+$ccolsp) < $numcols && isset($cells[$i][$j+$ccolsp])) { // Has Right adjoining cell
23149         if ($this->packTableData) {
23150           $celladj = $this->_unpackCellBorder($cells[$i][$j+$ccolsp]['borderbin']); // mPDF 4.3.009 Binary packed data
23151         }
23152         else { $celladj =& $cells[$i][$j+$ccolsp]; }
23153         $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['RT'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['RT'], $celladj['border_details']['T']['w'], $celladj['border_details']['mbw']['LT']);
23154         $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['RB'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['RB'], $celladj['border_details']['B']['w'], $celladj['border_details']['mbw']['LB']);
23155         $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['TR'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['TR'], $celladj['border_details']['mbw']['TL']);
23156         $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['BR'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['BR'], $celladj['border_details']['mbw']['BL']);
23157         unset($celladj);
23158         }
23159 
23160         if ($i > 0 && isset($cells[$i-1][$j]) && (($this->packTableData && $cells[$i-1][$j]['borderbin']) || $cells[$i-1][$j]['border'])) { // Has Top adjoining cell
23161         if ($this->packTableData) {
23162           $celladj = $this->_unpackCellBorder($cells[$i-1][$j]['borderbin']); // mPDF 4.3.009 Binary packed data
23163         }
23164         else { $celladj =& $cells[$i-1][$j]; }
23165         $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['TL'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['TL'], $celladj['border_details']['L']['w'], $celladj['border_details']['mbw']['BL']);
23166         $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['TR'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['TR'], $celladj['border_details']['R']['w'], $celladj['border_details']['mbw']['BR']);
23167         $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['LT'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['LT'], $celladj['border_details']['mbw']['LB']);
23168         $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['RT'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['RT'], $celladj['border_details']['mbw']['RB']);
23169 
23170         if ($celladj['border_details']['mbw']['BL']) {
23171           $celladj['border_details']['mbw']['BL'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['TL'], $celladj['border_details']['mbw']['BL']);
23172         }
23173         if ($celladj['border_details']['mbw']['BR'] ) {
23174           $celladj['border_details']['mbw']['BR'] = max($celladj['border_details']['mbw']['BR'], $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['TR']);
23175         }
23176         if ($this->packTableData) { $cells[$i-1][$j]['borderbin'] = $this->_packCellBorder($celladj); }
23177         unset($celladj);
23178         } 
23179 
23180         if ($j > 0 && isset($cells[$i][$j-1]) && (($this->packTableData && $cells[$i][$j-1]['borderbin']) || $cells[$i][$j-1]['border'])) { // Has Left adjoining cell
23181         if ($this->packTableData) {
23182           $celladj = $this->_unpackCellBorder($cells[$i][$j-1]['borderbin']); // mPDF 4.3.009 Binary packed data
23183         }
23184         else { $celladj =& $cells[$i][$j-1]; }
23185         $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['LT'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['LT'], $celladj['border_details']['T']['w'], $celladj['border_details']['mbw']['RT']);
23186         $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['LB'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['LB'], $celladj['border_details']['B']['w'], $celladj['border_details']['mbw']['RB']);
23187         $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['BL'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['BL'], $celladj['border_details']['mbw']['BR']);
23188         $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['TL'] = max($cbord['border_details']['mbw']['TL'], $celladj['border_details']['mbw']['TR']);
23189 
23190         if ($celladj['border_details']['mbw']['RT']) {
23191           $celladj['border_details']['mbw']['RT'] = max($celladj['border_details']['mbw']['RT'], $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['LT']);
23192         }
23193         if ($celladj['border_details']['mbw']['RB']) {
23194           $celladj['border_details']['mbw']['RB'] = max($celladj['border_details']['mbw']['RB'], $cbord['border_details']['mbw']['LB']);
23195         }
23196         if ($this->packTableData) { $cells[$i][$j-1]['borderbin'] = $this->_packCellBorder($celladj); }
23197         unset($celladj);
23198         } 
23199 
23200 
23201         // Update maximum cell border width at LRTB edges of table - used for overall table width
23202         if ($j == 0 && $cbord['border_details']['L']['w']) {
23203         $table['max_cell_border_width']['L'] = max($table['max_cell_border_width']['L'],$cbord['border_details']['L']['w']); 
23204         } 
23205         if (($j == ($numcols-1) || ($j+$ccolsp) == $numcols ) && $cbord['border_details']['R']['w']) {
23206         $table['max_cell_border_width']['R'] = max($table['max_cell_border_width']['R'],$cbord['border_details']['R']['w']); 
23207         } 
23208         if ($i == 0 && $cbord['border_details']['T']['w']) {
23209         $table['max_cell_border_width']['T'] = max($table['max_cell_border_width']['T'],$cbord['border_details']['T']['w']); 
23210         } 
23211         if (($i == ($numrows-1) || ($i+$crowsp) == $numrows ) && $cbord['border_details']['B']['w']) {
23212         $table['max_cell_border_width']['B'] = max($table['max_cell_border_width']['B'],$cbord['border_details']['B']['w']); 
23213         } 
23214       } 
23215 /*-- END TABLES-ADVANCED-BORDERS --*/
23216 
23217       // mPDF 4.3.009 Binary packed data
23218       if ($this->packTableData) { $cell['borderbin'] = $this->_packCellBorder($cbord); }
23219       unset($cbord );
23220       unset($cell );
23221     }
23222     }
23223   }
23224   unset($cell );
23225 }
23226 // END FIX BORDERS ************************************************************************************
23227 
23228 function _tableWrite(&$table){
23229   $level = $table['level'];
23230   $levelid = $table['levelid'];
23231 
23232   $cells = &$table['cells'];
23233   $numcols = $table['nc'];
23234   $numrows = $table['nr'];
23235 
23236   if ($this->ColActive && $level==1) { $this->breakpoints[$this->CurrCol][] = $this->y; } // *COLUMNS*
23237 
23238   // TABLE TOP MARGIN
23239   if ($table['margin']['T']) {
23240      if (!$this->table_rotate && $level==1) {
23241     $this->DivLn($table['margin']['T'],$this->blklvl,true,1);   // collapsible
23242      }
23243      else {
23244     $this->y += ($table['margin']['T']);
23245      }
23246   }
23247 
23248   // Advance down page by half width of top border
23249   if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
23250     $adv = $table['padding']['T'] + $table['border_details']['T']['w'] + $table['border_spacing_V']/2; 
23251   }
23252   else { 
23253     $adv = $table['max_cell_border_width']['T']/2; 
23254   }
23255   if (!$this->table_rotate && $level==1) { $this->DivLn($adv); }
23256   else { $this->y += $adv; }
23257 
23258 
23259   if ($level==1) {
23260     $this->x = $this->lMargin  + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['outer_left_margin'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_left'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_left']['w'];
23261     $x0 = $this->x; 
23262     $y0 = $this->y;
23263     $right = $x0 + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'];
23264     $outerfilled = $this->y;  // Keep track of how far down the outer DIV bgcolor is painted (NB rowspans)
23265     $this->outerfilled = $this->y;
23266   }
23267   else {
23268     $x0 = $this->x; 
23269     $y0 = $this->y;
23270     $right = $x0 + $table['w'];   // ????
23271     // $outerfilled = $this->y; // Keep track of how far down the outer DIV bgcolor is painted (NB rowspans)
23272   }
23273 
23274   if ($this->table_rotate) {
23275     $temppgwidth = $this->tbrot_maxw;
23276     $this->PageBreakTrigger = $pagetrigger = $y0 + ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width']);
23277      if ($level==1) {
23278     $this->tbrot_y0 = $this->y - $adv - $table['margin']['T'] ;
23279     $this->tbrot_x0 = $this->x;
23280     $this->tbrot_w = $table['w'];
23281     if ($table['borders_separate']) { $this->tbrot_h = $table['margin']['T'] + $table['padding']['T'] + $table['border_details']['T']['w'] + $table['border_spacing_V']/2; }
23282     else { $this->tbrot_h = $table['margin']['T'] + $table['padding']['T'] + $table['max_cell_border_width']['T']; }
23283      }
23284   }
23285   else {
23286     $this->PageBreakTrigger = $pagetrigger = ($this->h - $this->bMargin);
23287       if ($level==1) {
23288       $temppgwidth = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'];
23289         if (isset($table['a']) and ($table['w'] < $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'])) {
23290         if ($table['a']=='C') { $x0 += ((($right-$x0) - $table['w'])/2); }
23291         else if ($table['a']=='R') { $x0 = $right - $table['w']; }
23292       }
23293       }
23294     else {
23295       $temppgwidth = $table['w'];
23296     }
23297   }
23298 
23299   // mPDF 4.2 Clipping Output
23300   if ($table['overflow']=='hidden' && $level==1 && !$this->table_rotate && !$this->ColActive) {
23301     //Bounding rectangle to clip
23302     $this->tableClipPath = sprintf('q %.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f re W n',$x0*$this->k,$this->h*$this->k,$this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width']*$this->k,-$this->h*$this->k);
23303     $this->_out($this->tableClipPath);
23304   }
23305   else { $this->tableClipPath = ''; }
23306 
23307 
23308   if ($table['borders_separate']) { $indent = $table['margin']['L'] + $table['border_details']['L']['w'] + $table['padding']['L'] + $table['border_spacing_H']/2; }
23309   else { $indent = $table['margin']['L'] + $table['max_cell_border_width']['L']/2; }
23310   $x0 += $indent;
23311 
23312   $returny = 0;
23313   $tableheader = array();
23314   $tablefooter = array(); // mPDF 4.0
23315   $tablefooterrowheight = 0;
23316   $footery = 0;
23317 
23318   // mPD 3.0 Set the Page & Column where table starts
23319   if (($this->mirrorMargins) && (($this->page)%2==0)) { // EVEN
23320     $tablestartpage = 'EVEN'; 
23321   }
23322   else if (($this->mirrorMargins) && (($this->page)%2==1)) {  // ODD
23323     $tablestartpage = 'ODD'; 
23324   }
23325   else { $tablestartpage = ''; }
23326   if ($this->ColActive) { $tablestartcolumn = $this->CurrCol; }
23327   else { $tablestartcolumn = ''; }
23328 
23329   // mPDF 4.0 Initialise variable
23330   $y = $h = 0;
23331 
23332   // mPDF 4.0 Table Footer
23333   for( $i = 0 ; $i < $numrows ; $i++ ) { //Rows
23334     if ($this->progressBar) { $this->UpdateProgressBar(7,intval(30 + ($i*40/$numrows)),' '); }  // *PROGRESS-BAR*
23335     if (isset($table['is_tfoot'][$i]) && $table['is_tfoot'][$i] && $level==1) { 
23336     $tablefooterrowheight += $table['hr'][$i]; 
23337       for( $j = 0 ; $j < $numcols ; $j++ ) { //Columns
23338       if (isset($cells[$i][$j]) && $cells[$i][$j]) {
23339         $cell = &$cells[$i][$j];
23340         list($x,$w) = $this->_tableGetWidth($table, $i, $j);
23341         list($y,$h) = $this->_tableGetHeight($table, $i, $j);  
23342         $x += $x0;
23343         $y += $y0;
23344 
23345         //Get info of tfoot ==>> table footer
23346         $tablefooter[$i][$j]['x'] = $x;
23347         $tablefooter[$i][$j]['y'] = $y;
23348         $tablefooter[$i][$j]['h'] = $h;
23349         $tablefooter[$i][$j]['w'] = $w;
23350         $tablefooter[$i][$j]['text'] = $cell['text'];
23351         if (isset($cell['textbuffer'])) { $tablefooter[$i][$j]['textbuffer'] = $cell['textbuffer']; }
23352         else { $tablefooter[$i][$j]['textbuffer'] = ''; }
23353         $tablefooter[$i][$j]['a'] = $cell['a'];
23354         $tablefooter[$i][$j]['R'] = $cell['R'];
23355         $tablefooter[$i][$j]['va'] = $cell['va'];
23356         $tablefooter[$i][$j]['mih'] = $cell['mih'];
23357         $tablefooter[$i][$j]['gradient'] = $cell['gradient']; // *GRADIENTS*
23358         $tablefooter[$i][$j]['background-image'] = $cell['background-image']; // *BACKGROUND-IMAGES*
23359         //CELL FILL BGCOLOR
23360         if (!$this->simpleTables){  // mPDF 4.2.017
23361           // mPDF 4.3.009
23362           if ($this->packTableData) {
23363             $c = $this->_unpackCellBorder($cell['borderbin']);
23364             $tablefooter[$i][$j]['border'] = $c['border'];
23365             $tablefooter[$i][$j]['border_details'] = $c['border_details'];
23366           }
23367           else {
23368             $tablefooter[$i][$j]['border'] = $cell['border'];
23369             $tablefooter[$i][$j]['border_details'] = $cell['border_details'];
23370           }
23371         }
23372         else if ($this->simpleTables){
23373           $tablefooter[$i][$j]['border'] = $table['simple']['border'];
23374           $tablefooter[$i][$j]['border_details'] = $table['simple']['border_details'];
23375         }
23376         // mPDF 4.3.006
23377         $fill = isset($cell['bgcolor']) ? $cell['bgcolor'] : 0;
23378         $tablefooter[$i][$j]['bgcolor'] = $fill;
23379         $tablefooter[$i][$j]['padding'] = $cell['padding'];
23380         $tablefooter[$i][$j]['rowspan'] = $cell['rowspan'];
23381         $tablefooter[$i][$j]['colspan'] = $cell['colspan'];
23382       }
23383     }
23384     }
23385   }
23386 
23387   //Draw Table Contents and Borders
23388   for( $i = 0 ; $i < $numrows ; $i++ ) { //Rows
23389 
23390     // Get Maximum row/cell height in row - including rowspan>1 + 1 overlapping
23391     $maxrowheight = 0;
23392     for( $j = 0 ; $j < $numcols ; $j++ ) { //Columns
23393     list($y,$h) = $this->_tableGetHeight($table, $i, $j);
23394     $maxrowheight = max($maxrowheight,$h);
23395     }
23396 
23397     $skippage = false;
23398     $newpagestarted = false;
23399     for( $j = 0 ; $j < $numcols ; $j++ ) { //Columns
23400     if (isset($cells[$i][$j]) && $cells[$i][$j]) {
23401       $cell = &$cells[$i][$j];
23402 
23403       list($x,$w) = $this->_tableGetWidth($table, $i, $j);
23404       list($y,$h) = $this->_tableGetHeight($table, $i, $j);
23405       $x += $x0;
23406       $y += $y0;
23407       $y -= $returny;
23408       if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
23409         // mPDF 3.0
23410         if (!empty($tablefooter) || $i == ($numrows-1) || (isset($cell['rowspan']) && ($i+$cell['rowspan']) == $numrows)  || (!isset($cell['rowspan']) && ($i+1) == $numrows) ) {
23411         $extra = $table['padding']['B'] + $table['border_details']['B']['w'] + $table['border_spacing_V']/2; 
23412         //$extra = $table['margin']['B'] + $table['padding']['B'] + $table['border_details']['B']['w'] + $table['border_spacing_V']/2; 
23413         }
23414         else {
23415         $extra = $table['border_spacing_V']/2; 
23416         }
23417       }
23418         else { $extra = $table['max_cell_border_width']['B']/2; }
23419 
23420       // mPDF 4.2
23421       if ($j==0 && ((($y + $maxrowheight + $extra ) > $pagetrigger) || (!$this->ColActive && !empty($tablefooter) && ($y + $maxrowheight + $tablefooterrowheight + $extra) > $pagetrigger) && ($i < ($numrows - $this->tableheadernrows))) && ($y0 >0 || $x0 > 0) && !$this->InFooter) {
23422         if (!$skippage) {
23423           // mPDF 4.0
23424               if (!$this->ColActive && !empty($tablefooter) && $i > 0 ) { 
23425             $this->y = $y;
23426             $ya = $this->y;
23427             $this->TableHeaderFooter($tablefooter,$tablestartpage,$tablestartcolumn,'F');
23428             if ($this->table_rotate) {
23429               $this->tbrot_h += $this->y - $ya ;
23430             }
23431           }
23432           $y -= $y0;
23433           $returny += $y;
23434 
23435           $oldcolumn = $this->CurrCol;
23436           if ($this->AcceptPageBreak()) {
23437               $newpagestarted = true;
23438             $this->y = $y + $y0;
23439 
23440             // mPDF 3.0 - Move down to account for border-spacing or 
23441             // extra half border width in case page breaks in middle
23442             if($i>0 && !$this->table_rotate && $level==1 && !$this->ColActive) {
23443               if ($table['borders_separate']) { $adv = $table['border_spacing_V']/2; }
23444               else { 
23445                 $maxbwbottom = 0;
23446                 for( $ctj = 0 ; $ctj < $numcols ; $ctj++ ) {
23447                   if (isset($cells[$i][$ctj]) && $cells[$i][$ctj]) {
23448                     if (!$this->simpleTables){  // mPDF 4.2.017
23449                       // mPDF 4.3.009
23450                       if ($this->packTableData) {
23451                           list($bt,$br,$bb,$bl) = $this->_getBorderWidths($cells[$i][$ctj]['borderbin']);
23452                       }
23453                       else {
23454                         $bt = $cells[$i][$ctj]['border_details']['T']['w'];
23455                       }
23456                       $maxbwbottom = max($maxbwbottom , $bt); 
23457                     }
23458                     else if ($this->simpleTables){
23459                       $maxbwbottom = max($maxbwbottom , $table['simple']['border_details']['T']['w']); 
23460                     }
23461                   }
23462                 }
23463                 $adv = $maxbwbottom /2;
23464               }
23465               $this->y += $adv;
23466             }
23467 
23468             // mPDF 3.0 Rotated table split over pages - needs this->y for borders/backgrounds
23469             if($i>0 && $this->table_rotate && $level==1) {
23470               $this->y = $y0 + $this->tbrot_w;
23471             }
23472 
23473             // mPDF 4.2 
23474             if ($this->tableClipPath ) { $this->_out("Q"); }
23475 
23476             $this->AddPage($this->CurOrientation);
23477 
23478             // mPDF 4.2 
23479             if ($this->tableClipPath ) { $this->_out($this->tableClipPath); }
23480 
23481             // Added to correct for OddEven Margins
23482             $x=$x +$this->MarginCorrection;
23483             $x0=$x0 +$this->MarginCorrection;
23484 
23485 
23486             // mPDF 3.0 - Move down to account for half of top border-spacing or 
23487             // extra half border width in case page was broken in middle
23488             if($i>0 && !$this->table_rotate && $level==1 && !$this->usetableheader) {
23489               if ($table['borders_separate']) { $adv = $table['border_spacing_V']/2; }
23490               else { 
23491                 $maxbwtop = 0;
23492                 for( $ctj = 0 ; $ctj < $numcols ; $ctj++ ) {
23493                   if (isset($cells[$i][$ctj]) && $cells[$i][$ctj]) {
23494                     if (!$this->simpleTables){  // mPDF 4.2.017
23495                       // mPDF 4.3.009
23496                       if ($this->packTableData) {
23497                           list($bt,$br,$bb,$bl) = $this->_getBorderWidths($cells[$i][$ctj]['borderbin']);
23498                       }
23499                       else {
23500                         $bt = $cells[$i][$ctj]['border_details']['T']['w'];
23501                       }
23502                       $maxbwtop = max($maxbwtop, $bt); 
23503                     }
23504                     else if ($this->simpleTables){
23505                       $maxbwtop = max($maxbwtop, $table['simple']['border_details']['T']['w']); 
23506                     }
23507                   }
23508                 }
23509                 $adv = $maxbwtop /2;
23510               }
23511               $this->y += $adv;
23512             }
23513 
23514 
23515             if ($this->table_rotate) {
23516               // mPDF 3.0 Rotated table
23517               //$this->tbrot_x0 = $x0;
23518               $this->tbrot_x0 = $this->lMargin  + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['outer_left_margin'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_left'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_left']['w'];
23519               if ($table['borders_separate']) { $this->tbrot_h = $table['margin']['T'] + $table['padding']['T'] + $table['border_details']['T']['w'] + $table['border_spacing_V']/2; }
23520               else { $this->tbrot_h = $table['margin']['T'] + $table['max_cell_border_width']['T'] ; }
23521               $this->tbrot_y0 = $this->y;
23522               $pagetrigger = $y0 + ($this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width']);
23523             }
23524             else {
23525               $pagetrigger = $this->PageBreakTrigger;
23526             }
23527 
23528             if ($this->kwt_saved && $level==1) {
23529               $this->kwt_moved = true;
23530             }
23531 
23532             // Disable Table header repeat if Keep Block together
23533                     if ($this->usetableheader && !$this->keep_block_together && !empty($tableheader)) { 
23534               $ya = $this->y;
23535               $this->TableHeaderFooter($tableheader,$tablestartpage,$tablestartcolumn,'H');  // mPDF 4.0
23536               if ($this->table_rotate) {
23537                 $this->tbrot_h = $this->y - $ya ;
23538               }
23539             }
23540 
23541             // mPDF 3.0
23542             else if ($i==0 && !$this->keep_block_together && !$this->table_rotate && $level==1 && !$this->ColActive) {
23543               // Advance down page
23544               if ($table['borders_separate']) { $adv = $table['border_spacing_V']/2 + $table['border_details']['T']['w'] + $table['padding']['T'];  }
23545               else { $adv = $table['max_cell_border_width']['T'] /2 ; }
23546               if ($adv) { 
23547                  if ($this->table_rotate) {
23548                 $this->y += ($adv);
23549                  }
23550                  else {
23551                 $this->DivLn($adv,$this->blklvl,true); 
23552                  }
23553               }
23554             }
23555 
23556             $outerfilled = 0;
23557             $y0 = $this->y; 
23558             $y = $y0;
23559           }
23560 /*-- COLUMNS --*/
23561           // COLS
23562           // COLUMN CHANGE
23563           if ($this->CurrCol != $oldcolumn) {
23564             // Added to correct for Columns
23565             $x += $this->ChangeColumn * ($this->ColWidth+$this->ColGap);
23566             $x0 += $this->ChangeColumn * ($this->ColWidth+$this->ColGap);
23567             if ($this->CurrCol == 0) {  // just added a page - possibly with tableheader
23568               $y0 = $this->y;   // this->y0 is global used by Columns - $y0 is internal to tablewrite
23569             }
23570             else {
23571               $y0 = $this->y0;  // this->y0 is global used by Columns - $y0 is internal to tablewrite
23572             }
23573             $y = $y0;
23574             $outerfilled = 0;
23575           }
23576 /*-- END COLUMNS --*/
23577         }
23578         $skippage = true;
23579       }
23580 
23581       $this->x = $x; 
23582       $this->y = $y;
23583 
23584       if ($this->kwt_saved && $level==1) {
23585         $this->printkwtbuffer();
23586         $x0 = $x = $this->x; 
23587         $y0 = $y = $this->y;
23588         $this->kwt_moved = false;
23589         $this->kwt_saved = false;
23590       }
23591 
23592 
23593       // Set the Page & Column where table starts
23594       if ($i==0 && $j==0 && $level==1) {
23595         if (($this->mirrorMargins) && (($this->page)%2==0)) {       // EVEN
23596           $tablestartpage = 'EVEN'; 
23597         }
23598         else if (($this->mirrorMargins) && (($this->page)%2==1)) {        // ODD
23599           $tablestartpage = 'ODD'; 
23600         }
23601         else { $tablestartpage = ''; }
23602         if ($this->ColActive) { $tablestartcolumn = $this->CurrCol; } // *COLUMNS*
23603       }
23604 
23605 
23606       //ALIGN
23607       $align = $cell['a'];
23608 
23609 
23610 /*-- COLUMNS --*/
23611       // mPDF 3.0 - If outside columns, this is done in PaintDivBB
23612       if ($this->ColActive) {
23613        //OUTER FILL BGCOLOR of DIVS
23614        if ($this->blklvl > 0 && ($j==0) && !$this->table_rotate && $level==1) {
23615         $firstblockfill = $this->GetFirstBlockFill();
23616         if ($firstblockfill && $this->blklvl >= $firstblockfill) {
23617          $divh = $maxrowheight;
23618          // Last row
23619            if (isset($cell['rowspan']) && (($i == $numrows-1 && $cell['rowspan']<2) || ($cell['rowspan']>1 && ($i + $cell['rowspan']-1) == $numrows-1))) { 
23620         if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
23621           $adv = $table['margin']['B'] + $table['padding']['B'] + $table['border_details']['B']['w'] + $table['border_spacing_V']/2; 
23622         }
23623         else { 
23624           $adv = $table['margin']['B'] + $table['max_cell_border_width']['B']/2; 
23625         }
23626         $divh += $adv;  //last row: fill bottom half of bottom border (y advanced at end)
23627          }
23628 
23629          if (($this->y + $divh) > $outerfilled ) {  // if not already painted by previous rowspan
23630         $bak_x = $this->x;
23631         $bak_y = $this->y;
23632         if ($outerfilled > $this->y) { 
23633           $divh = ($this->y + $divh) - $outerfilled;
23634           $this->y = $outerfilled; 
23635         }
23636 
23637         $this->DivLn($divh,-3,false);
23638         $outerfilled = $this->y + $divh;
23639         // Reset current block fill
23640         $bcor = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['bgcolorarray'];
23641         if ($bcor ) $this->SetFillColor($bcor['R'],$bcor['G'],$bcor['B']);
23642         $this->x = $bak_x;
23643         $this->y = $bak_y;
23644           }
23645         }
23646        }
23647       }
23648 /*-- END COLUMNS --*/
23649 
23650 
23651       //TABLE BACKGROUND FILL BGCOLOR - for cellSpacing
23652       if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
23653          $fill = isset($table['bgcolor'][-1]) ? $table['bgcolor'][-1] : 0;  // mPDF 4.3.005
23654          if ($fill) {
23655           $color = $this->ConvertColor($fill);
23656           if ($color) $this->SetFillColor($color['R'],$color['G'],$color['B']);
23657         $xadj = ($table['border_spacing_H']/2);
23658         $yadj = ($table['border_spacing_V']/2);
23659         $wadj = $table['border_spacing_H'];
23660         $hadj = $table['border_spacing_V'];
23661           if ($i == 0) {    // Top
23662           $yadj += $table['padding']['T'];
23663           $hadj += $table['padding']['T'];
23664           }
23665           if ($j == 0) {    // Left
23666           $xadj += $table['padding']['L'];
23667           $wadj += $table['padding']['L'];
23668           }
23669           if ($i == ($numrows-1) || (isset($cell['rowspan']) && ($i+$cell['rowspan']) == $numrows)  || (!isset($cell['rowspan']) && ($i+1) == $numrows)) {  // Bottom
23670           $hadj += $table['padding']['B'];
23671           }
23672           if ($j == ($numcols-1) || (isset($cell['colspan']) && ($j+$cell['colspan']) == $numcols)  || (!isset($cell['colspan']) && ($j+1) == $numcols)) {  // Right
23673           $wadj += $table['padding']['R'];
23674           }
23675         $this->Rect($x - $xadj, $y - $yadj, $w + $wadj, $h + $hadj, 'F');
23676          }
23677       }
23678 
23679       // TABLE BORDER - if separate
23680       if ($table['borders_separate'] && $table['border']) { 
23681          $halfspaceL = $table['padding']['L'] + ($table['border_spacing_H']/2);
23682          $halfspaceR = $table['padding']['R'] + ($table['border_spacing_H']/2);
23683          $halfspaceT = $table['padding']['T'] + ($table['border_spacing_V']/2);
23684          $halfspaceB = $table['padding']['B'] + ($table['border_spacing_V']/2);
23685          $tbx = $x;
23686          $tby = $y;
23687          $tbw = $w;
23688          $tbh = $h;
23689          $tab_bord = 0;
23690          // mPDF 3.0
23691          $corner = '';
23692          if ($i == 0) {   // Top
23693         $tby -= $halfspaceT + ($table['border_details']['T']['w']/2);
23694         $tbh += $halfspaceT + ($table['border_details']['T']['w']/2);
23695         $this->setBorder($tab_bord , _BORDER_TOP); 
23696         $corner .= 'T';
23697          }
23698          if ($i == ($numrows-1) || (isset($cell['rowspan']) && ($i+$cell['rowspan']) == $numrows)  || (!isset($cell['rowspan']) && ($i+1) == $numrows) ) {  // Bottom
23699         $tbh += $halfspaceB + ($table['border_details']['B']['w']/2);
23700         $this->setBorder($tab_bord , _BORDER_BOTTOM); 
23701         $corner .= 'B';
23702          }
23703          if ($j == 0) {   // Left
23704         $tbx -= $halfspaceL + ($table['border_details']['L']['w']/2);
23705         $tbw += $halfspaceL + ($table['border_details']['L']['w']/2);
23706         $this->setBorder($tab_bord , _BORDER_LEFT); 
23707         $corner .= 'L';
23708          }
23709          if ($j == ($numcols-1) || (isset($cell['colspan']) && ($j+$cell['colspan']) == $numcols)  || (!isset($cell['colspan']) && ($j+1) == $numcols)) { // Right
23710         $tbw += $halfspaceR + ($table['border_details']['R']['w']/2);
23711         $this->setBorder($tab_bord , _BORDER_RIGHT); 
23712         $corner .= 'R';
23713          }
23714          $this->_tableRect($tbx, $tby, $tbw, $tbh, $tab_bord , $table['border_details'], false, $table['borders_separate'], 'table', $corner, $table['border_spacing_V'], $table['border_spacing_H'] );
23715       }
23716 
23717       if ($table['empty_cells']!='hide' || !empty($cell['textbuffer']) || (isset($cell['nestedcontent']) && $cell['nestedcontent']) || !$table['borders_separate']  ) { $paintcell = true; }
23718       else { $paintcell = false; } 
23719 
23720       //Set Borders
23721       $bord = 0; 
23722       $bord_det = array();
23723 
23724       if (!$this->simpleTables){  // mPDF 4.2.017
23725         // mPDF 4.3.009
23726         if ($this->packTableData) {
23727              if ($cell['borderbin']) {
23728           $c = $this->_unpackCellBorder($cell['borderbin']);
23729           $bord = $c['border'];
23730           $bord_det = $c['border_details'];
23731            }
23732         }
23733         else if ($cell['border']) {
23734           $bord = $cell['border'];
23735           $bord_det = $cell['border_details'];
23736         }
23737       }
23738       else if ($this->simpleTables){
23739           if ($table['simple']['border']) {
23740           $bord = $table['simple']['border'];
23741           $bord_det = $table['simple']['border_details'];
23742         }
23743       }
23744 
23745       // mPDF 4.3.006
23746       //CELL FILL BGCOLOR
23747       $fill = isset($cell['bgcolor']) ? $cell['bgcolor'] : 0;
23748 
23749       if ($fill && $paintcell) {
23750           $color = $this->ConvertColor($fill);
23751           if ($color) $this->SetFillColor($color['R'],$color['G'],$color['B']);
23752         if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
23753           $this->Rect($x+ ($table['border_spacing_H']/2), $y+ ($table['border_spacing_V']/2), $w- $table['border_spacing_H'], $h- $table['border_spacing_V'], 'F');
23754         }
23755         else { 
23756           $this->Rect($x, $y, $w, $h, 'F');
23757         }
23758       }
23759 
23760 /*-- GRADIENTS --*/
23761       if (isset($cell['gradient']) && $cell['gradient'] && $paintcell){ // mPDF 4.3.006
23762         $g = $this->parseBackgroundGradient($cell['gradient']);
23763         if ($g) {
23764           if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
23765           $px = $x+ ($table['border_spacing_H']/2);
23766           $py = $y+ ($table['border_spacing_V']/2);
23767           $pw = $w- $table['border_spacing_H'];
23768           $ph = $h- $table['border_spacing_V'];
23769           }
23770           else {
23771           $px = $x;
23772           $py = $y;
23773           $pw = $w;
23774           $ph = $h;
23775           }
23776           $this->Gradient($px, $py, $pw, $ph, $g['type'], $g['col'], $g['col2'], $g['coords'], $g['extend']);
23777         }
23778       }
23779 /*-- END GRADIENTS --*/
23780 
23781 /*-- BACKGROUND-IMAGES --*/
23782       if (isset($cell['background-image']) && $paintcell) { // mPDF 4.3.006
23783         if ($cell['background-image']['image_id']) {  // Background pattern
23784         $n = count($this->patterns)+1;
23785         if ($table['borders_separate']) { 
23786           $px = $x+ ($table['border_spacing_H']/2);
23787           $py = $y+ ($table['border_spacing_V']/2);
23788           $pw = $w- $table['border_spacing_H'];
23789           $ph = $h- $table['border_spacing_V'];
23790         }
23791         else {
23792           $px = $x;
23793           $py = $y;
23794           $pw = $w;
23795           $ph = $h;
23796         }
23797         // mPDF 4.3.015
23798         list($orig_w, $orig_h, $x_repeat, $y_repeat) = $this->_resizeBackgroundImage($cell['background-image']['orig_w'], $cell['background-image']['orig_h'], $pw, $ph, $cell['background-image']['resize'], $cell['background-image']['x_repeat'], $cell['background-image']['y_repeat']);
23799         $this->patterns[$n] = array('x'=>$px, 'y'=>$py, 'w'=>$pw, 'h'=>$ph, 'pgh'=>$this->h, 'image_id'=>$cell['background-image']['image_id'], 'orig_w'=>$orig_w, 'orig_h'=>$orig_h, 'x_pos'=>$cell['background-image']['x_pos'] , 'y_pos'=>$cell['background-image']['y_pos'] , 'x_repeat'=>$x_repeat, 'y_repeat'=>$y_repeat);  // mPDF 4.3.015
23800         // mPDF 4.3.017
23801         if ($cell['background-image']['opacity']>0 && $cell['background-image']['opacity']<1) { $opac = $this->SetAlpha($cell['background-image']['opacity'],'Normal',true); }
23802         else { $opac = ''; }
23803         $this->_out(sprintf('q /Pattern cs /P%d scn %s %.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f re f Q', $n, $opac, $px*$this->k, ($this->h-$py)*$this->k, $pw*$this->k, -$ph*$this->k));
23804         }
23805       }
23806 /*-- END BACKGROUND-IMAGES --*/
23807 
23808        if (isset($cell['colspan']) && $cell['colspan']>1) { $ccolsp = $cell['colspan']; }
23809        else { $ccolsp = 1; }
23810        if (isset($cell['rowspan']) && $cell['rowspan']>1) { $crowsp = $cell['rowspan']; }
23811        else { $crowsp = 1; }
23812 
23813 
23814       // but still need to do this for repeated headers...
23815       if (!$table['borders_separate'] && $this->tabletheadjustfinished && !$this->simpleTables){  // mPDF 4.2.017
23816         if (isset($table['topntail']) && $table['topntail']) {
23817           $bord_det['T'] = $this->border_details($table['topntail']);
23818           $bord_det['T']['w'] /= $this->shrin_k;
23819           $this->setBorder($bord, _BORDER_TOP); 
23820         }
23821         if (isset($table['thead-underline']) && $table['thead-underline']) {
23822           $bord_det['T'] = $this->border_details($table['thead-underline']);
23823           $bord_det['T']['w'] /= $this->shrin_k;
23824           $this->setBorder($bord, _BORDER_TOP); 
23825         }
23826       }
23827 
23828 
23829 
23830       //Get info of first row ==>> table header
23831       //Use > 1 row if THEAD
23832       if ($this->usetableheader && ($i == 0  || (isset($table['is_thead'][$i]) && $table['is_thead'][$i])) && $level==1) {
23833         $tableheader[$i][$j]['x'] = $x;
23834         $tableheader[$i][$j]['y'] = $y;
23835         $tableheader[$i][$j]['h'] = $h;
23836         $tableheader[$i][$j]['w'] = $w;
23837         $tableheader[$i][$j]['text'] = $cell['text'];
23838         if (isset($cell['textbuffer'])) { $tableheader[$i][$j]['textbuffer'] = $cell['textbuffer']; }
23839         else { $tableheader[$i][$j]['textbuffer'] = ''; }
23840         $tableheader[$i][$j]['a'] = $cell['a'];
23841         $tableheader[$i][$j]['R'] = $cell['R'];
23842 
23843         $tableheader[$i][$j]['va'] = $cell['va'];
23844         $tableheader[$i][$j]['mih'] = $cell['mih'];
23845         // mPDF 3.1
23846         $tableheader[$i][$j]['gradient'] = $cell['gradient']; // *GRADIENTS*
23847         $tableheader[$i][$j]['background-image'] = $cell['background-image']; // *BACKGROUND-IMAGES*
23848         // mPDF 4.0
23849         $tableheader[$i][$j]['rowspan'] = $cell['rowspan'];
23850         $tableheader[$i][$j]['colspan'] = $cell['colspan'];
23851         $tableheader[$i][$j]['bgcolor'] = $fill;
23852 
23853         if (!$this->simpleTables){  // mPDF 4.2.017
23854           // mPDF 4.3.009
23855           $tableheader[$i][$j]['border'] = $bord;
23856           $tableheader[$i][$j]['border_details'] = $bord_det;
23857         }
23858         else if ($this->simpleTables){
23859           $tableheader[$i][$j]['border'] = $table['simple']['border'];
23860           $tableheader[$i][$j]['border_details'] = $table['simple']['border_details'];
23861         }
23862         // mPDF 4.3.006
23863         $tableheader[$i][$j]['padding'] = $cell['padding'];
23864         // mPDF 3.0 moved as needed earlier
23865         //$this->tableheadernrows = max($this->tableheadernrows, ($i+1));
23866       }
23867 
23868       // CELL BORDER
23869       if ($bord || $bord_det) { 
23870         if ($table['borders_separate'] && $paintcell) {
23871           $this->_tableRect($x + ($table['border_spacing_H']/2)+($bord_det['L']['w'] /2), $y+ ($table['border_spacing_V']/2)+($bord_det['T']['w'] /2), $w-$table['border_spacing_H']-($bord_det['L']['w'] /2)-($bord_det['R']['w'] /2), $h- $table['border_spacing_V']-($bord_det['T']['w'] /2)-($bord_det['B']['w']/2), $bord, $bord_det, false, $table['borders_separate']);
23872         }
23873         else if (!$table['borders_separate']) { 
23874           $this->_tableRect($x, $y, $w, $h, $bord, $bord_det, true, $table['borders_separate']);  // true causes buffer
23875         }
23876 
23877       }
23878 
23879       //VERTICAL ALIGN
23880       if ($cell['R'] && INTVAL($cell['R']) > 0 && INTVAL($cell['R']) < 90 && isset($cell['va']) && $cell['va']!='B') { $cell['va']='B';}
23881       if (!isset($cell['va']) || $cell['va']=='M') $this->y += ($h-$cell['mih'])/2;
23882       elseif (isset($cell['va']) && $cell['va']=='B') $this->y += $h-$cell['mih'];
23883 
23884       // NESTED CONTENT 
23885 
23886       // TEXT (and nested tables)
23887       $this->divalign=$align;
23888 
23889       $this->divwidth=$w;
23890       if (!empty($cell['textbuffer'])) {
23891         $opy = $this->y;
23892         if ($cell['R']) {
23893           $cellPtSize = $cell['textbuffer'][0][11] / $this->shrin_k;
23894           if (!$cellPtSize) { $cellPtSize = $this->default_font_size; }
23895           $cellFontHeight = ($cellPtSize/$this->k);
23896           $opx = $this->x;
23897           $angle = INTVAL($cell['R']);
23898           // Only allow 45 to 89 degrees (when bottom-aligned) or exactly 90 or -90
23899           if ($angle > 90) { $angle = 90; }
23900           else if ($angle > 0 && $angle <45) { $angle = 45; }
23901           else if ($angle < 0) { $angle = -90; }
23902           $offset = ((sin(deg2rad($angle))) * 0.37 * $cellFontHeight);
23903           if (isset($cell['a']) && $cell['a']=='R') { 
23904             $this->x += ($w) + ($offset) - ($cellFontHeight/3) - ($cell['padding']['R'] + ($table['border_spacing_H']/2)); 
23905           }
23906           else if (!isset($cell['a']) || $cell['a']=='C') { 
23907             $this->x += ($w/2) + ($offset); 
23908           }
23909           else { 
23910             $this->x += ($offset) + ($cellFontHeight/3)+($cell['padding']['L'] +($table['border_spacing_H']/2)); 
23911           }
23912           $str = ltrim(implode(' ',$cell['text']));
23913           $str = $this->mb_rtrim($str,$this->mb_enc);
23914           if (!isset($cell['va']) || $cell['va']=='M') { 
23915             $this->y -= ($h-$cell['mih'])/2; //Undo what was added earlier VERTICAL ALIGN
23916             if ($angle > 0) { $this->y += (($h-$cell['mih'])/2) + $cell['padding']['T'] + ($cell['mih']-($cell['padding']['T'] + $cell['padding']['B'])); }
23917             else if ($angle < 0) { $this->y += (($h-$cell['mih'])/2)+ ($cell['padding']['T'] + ($table['border_spacing_V']/2)); }
23918           }
23919           elseif (isset($cell['va']) && $cell['va']=='B') { 
23920             $this->y -= $h-$cell['mih']; //Undo what was added earlier VERTICAL ALIGN
23921             if ($angle > 0) { $this->y += $h-($cell['padding']['B'] + ($table['border_spacing_V']/2)); }
23922             else if ($angle < 0) { $this->y += $h-$cell['mih'] + ($cell['padding']['T'] + ($table['border_spacing_V']/2)); }
23923           }
23924           elseif (isset($cell['va']) && $cell['va']=='T') { 
23925             if ($angle > 0) { $this->y += $cell['mih']-($cell['padding']['B'] + ($table['border_spacing_V']/2)); }
23926             else if ($angle < 0) { $this->y += ($cell['padding']['T'] + ($table['border_spacing_V']/2)); }
23927           }
23928           $this->Rotate($angle,$this->x,$this->y);
23929           $s_fs = $this->FontSizePt;
23930           $s_f = $this->FontFamily; // mPDF 3.0
23931           $s_st = $this->FontStyle; // mPDF 3.0
23932           $this->SetFont($cell['textbuffer'][0][4],$cell['textbuffer'][0][2],$cellPtSize,true,true);
23933           $this->Text($this->x,$this->y,$str);
23934           $this->Rotate(0);
23935           $this->SetFont($s_f,$s_st,$s_fs,true,true);
23936           $this->x = $opx;
23937         }
23938         else {
23939 
23940           if (!$this->simpleTables){  // mPDF 4.2.017
23941              if ($table['borders_separate']) {  // NB twice border width
23942             // mPDF 4.3.009
23943             $xadj = $bord_det['L']['w'] + $cell['padding']['L'] +($table['border_spacing_H']/2);
23944             $wadj = $bord_det['L']['w'] + $bord_det['R']['w'] + $cell['padding']['L'] +$cell['padding']['R'] + $table['border_spacing_H'];
23945             $yadj = $bord_det['T']['w'] + $cell['padding']['T'] + ($table['border_spacing_H']/2);
23946              }
23947              else {
23948             $xadj = $bord_det['L']['w']/2 + $cell['padding']['L'];
23949             $wadj = ($bord_det['L']['w'] + $bord_det['R']['w'])/2 + $cell['padding']['L'] + $cell['padding']['R'];
23950             $yadj = $bord_det['T']['w']/2 + $cell['padding']['T'];
23951              }
23952           }
23953           else if ($this->simpleTables){
23954           // mPDF 4.3.006
23955              if ($table['borders_separate']) {  // NB twice border width
23956             $xadj = $table['simple']['border_details']['L']['w'] + $cell['padding']['L'] +($table['border_spacing_H']/2);
23957             $wadj = $table['simple']['border_details']['L']['w'] + $table['simple']['border_details']['R']['w'] + $cell['padding']['L'] +$cell['padding']['R'] + $table['border_spacing_H'];
23958             $yadj = $table['simple']['border_details']['T']['w'] + $cell['padding']['T'] + ($table['border_spacing_H']/2);
23959              }
23960              else {
23961             $xadj = $table['simple']['border_details']['L']['w']/2 + $cell['padding']['L'];
23962             $wadj = ($table['simple']['border_details']['L']['w'] + $table['simple']['border_details']['R']['w'])/2 + $cell['padding']['L'] + $cell['padding']['R'];
23963             $yadj = $table['simple']['border_details']['T']['w']/2 + $cell['padding']['T'];
23964              }
23965           }
23966 
23967           $this->divwidth=$w-$wadj;
23968           if ($this->divwidth == 0) { $this->divwidth = 0.0001; }
23969           $this->x += $xadj;
23970           $this->y += $yadj;
23971           $this->printbuffer($cell['textbuffer'],'',true);
23972         }
23973         $this->y = $opy;
23974       }
23975       unset($cell );
23976       //Reset values
23977       $this->Reset();
23978     }//end of (if isset(cells)...)
23979     }// end of columns
23980 
23981     $newpagestarted = false;
23982     $this->tabletheadjustfinished = false;
23983 
23984     if ($this->ColActive && $i < $numrows-1 && $level==1) { $this->breakpoints[$this->CurrCol][] = $y + $h; } // *COLUMNS*
23985 
23986 /*-- COLUMNS --*/
23987     // mPDF 3.0 - If columns, print out cell borders (in buffer) at end of each row)
23988     if ($this->ColActive) {
23989     if (count($this->cellBorderBuffer)) { $this->printcellbuffer(); } 
23990     }
23991 /*-- END COLUMNS --*/
23992 
23993 
23994     if ($i == $numrows-1) { $this->y = $y + $h; } //last row jump (update this->y position)
23995     if ($this->table_rotate && $level==1) {
23996     $this->tbrot_h += $h;
23997     }
23998 
23999   }// end of rows
24000 
24001   if ($this->progressBar) { $this->UpdateProgressBar(7,70,' '); } // *PROGRESS-BAR*
24002 
24003   if (count($this->cellBorderBuffer)) { $this->printcellbuffer(); }
24004 
24005   // mPDF 4.2 
24006   if ($this->tableClipPath ) { $this->_out("Q"); }
24007   $this->tableClipPath = '';
24008 
24009   // Advance down page by half width of bottom border
24010   if ($table['borders_separate']) { $this->y += $table['padding']['B'] + $table['border_details']['B']['w'] + $table['border_spacing_V']/2; }
24011   else { $this->y += $table['max_cell_border_width']['B']/2; }
24012 
24013   if ($table['borders_separate'] && $level==1) { $this->tbrot_h += $table['margin']['B'] + $table['padding']['B'] + $table['border_details']['B']['w'] + $table['border_spacing_V']/2; }
24014   else if ($level==1) { $this->tbrot_h += $table['margin']['B'] + $table['max_cell_border_width']['B']/2; }
24015 
24016 
24017   // TABLE BOTTOM MARGIN
24018   if ($table['margin']['B']) {
24019     if (!$this->table_rotate && $level==1) {
24020     $this->DivLn($table['margin']['B'],$this->blklvl,true);   // collapsible
24021     }
24022     else {
24023     $this->y += ($table['margin']['B']);
24024     }
24025   }
24026 
24027   if ($this->ColActive && $level==1) { $this->breakpoints[$this->CurrCol][] = $this->y; } // *COLUMNS*
24028 
24029 }//END OF FUNCTION _tableWrite()
24030 
24031 
24033 /*-- END TABLES --*/
24034 
24035 
24036 function _putextgstates() {
24037   for ($i = 1; $i <= count($this->extgstates); $i++) {
24038             $this->_newobj();
24039             $this->extgstates[$i]['n'] = $this->n;
24040             $this->_out('<</Type /ExtGState');
24041             foreach ($this->extgstates[$i]['parms'] as $k=>$v)
24042                 $this->_out('/'.$k.' '.$v);
24043             $this->_out('>>');
24044             $this->_out('endobj');
24045   }
24046 }
24047 
24048 
24049 
24050 
24051 
24052 /*-- ENCRYPTION --*/
24053 function SetProtection($permissions=array(),$user_pass='',$owner_pass=null) {
24054     $this->encrypted=false;
24055     // mPDF 4.0
24056     if (is_string($permissions) && strlen($permissions)>0) { $permissions = array($permissions); }
24057     else if (!is_array($permissions)) { return 0; }
24058 
24059 //    if (count($permissions)<1 && !$user_pass && !$owner_pass) { return 0; }
24060 
24061     $this->last_rc4_key='';
24062     $this->padding="\x28\xBF\x4E\x5E\x4E\x75\x8A\x41\x64\x00\x4E\x56\xFF\xFA\x01\x08".
24063             "\x2E\x2E\x00\xB6\xD0\x68\x3E\x80\x2F\x0C\xA9\xFE\x64\x53\x69\x7A";
24064     $options = array('print' => 4, 'modify' => 8, 'copy' => 16, 'annot-forms' => 32 );
24065     $protection = 192;
24066     foreach($permissions as $permission){
24067       if (!isset($options[$permission]))
24068         $this->Error('Incorrect permission: '.$permission);
24069       $protection += $options[$permission];
24070     }
24071     if ($owner_pass === null)
24072       $owner_pass = uniqid(rand());
24073     $this->encrypted = true;
24074     $this->_generateencryptionkey($user_pass, $owner_pass, $protection);
24075   }
24076 
24077 // Compute key depending on object number where the encrypted data is stored
24078 function _objectkey($n) {
24079     return substr($this->_md5_16($this->encryption_key.pack('VXxx',$n)),0,10);
24080 }
24081 /*-- END ENCRYPTION --*/
24082 
24083 
24084 /*-- IMPORTS --*/
24085   // mPDF 4.2.006
24086   // from mPDFI
24087   function _putimportedobjects() {
24088     if (is_array($this->parsers) && count($this->parsers) > 0) {
24089       foreach($this->parsers AS $filename => $p) {
24090         $this->current_parser =& $this->parsers[$filename];
24091         if (is_array($this->_obj_stack[$filename])) {
24092           while($n = key($this->_obj_stack[$filename])) {
24093             $nObj = $this->current_parser->pdf_resolve_object($this->current_parser->c,$this->_obj_stack[$filename][$n][1]);
24094             $this->_newobj($this->_obj_stack[$filename][$n][0]);
24095             if ($nObj[0] == PDF_TYPE_STREAM) {
24096               $this->pdf_write_value($nObj);
24097             } 
24098             else {
24099               $this->pdf_write_value($nObj[1]);
24100             }
24101             $this->_out('endobj');
24102             $this->_obj_stack[$filename][$n] = null; // free memory
24103             unset($this->_obj_stack[$filename][$n]);
24104             reset($this->_obj_stack[$filename]);
24105           }
24106         }
24107       }
24108     }
24109   }
24110   
24111 
24112 
24113   function _putformxobjects() {
24114     $filter=($this->compress) ? '/Filter /FlateDecode ' : '';
24115     reset($this->tpls);
24116     foreach($this->tpls AS $tplidx => $tpl) {
24117       $p=($this->compress) ? gzcompress($tpl['buffer']) : $tpl['buffer'];
24118       $this->_newobj();
24119       $this->tpls[$tplidx]['n'] = $this->n;
24120       $this->_out('<<'.$filter.'/Type /XObject');
24121       $this->_out('/Subtype /Form');
24122       $this->_out('/FormType 1');
24123       
24124       // Left/Bottom/Right/Top
24125       $this->_out(sprintf('/BBox [%.2f %.2f %.2f %.2f]',
24126         $tpl['box']['x']*$this->k,
24127         $tpl['box']['y']*$this->k,
24128         ($tpl['box']['x'] + $tpl['box']['w'])*$this->k,
24129         ($tpl['box']['y'] + $tpl['box']['h'])*$this->k  )
24130       );
24131 
24132 
24133       if (isset($tpl['box']))
24134         $this->_out(sprintf('/Matrix [1 0 0 1 %.5f %.5f]',-$tpl['box']['x']*$this->k, -$tpl['box']['y']*$this->k));
24135       
24136       $this->_out('/Resources ');
24137 
24138       if (isset($tpl['resources'])) {
24139         $this->current_parser =& $tpl['parser'];
24140         $this->pdf_write_value($tpl['resources']);
24141       } else {
24142         $this->_out('<</ProcSet [/PDF /Text /ImageB /ImageC /ImageI]');
24143           if (isset($this->_res['tpl'][$tplidx]['fonts']) && count($this->_res['tpl'][$tplidx]['fonts'])) {
24144             $this->_out('/Font <<');
24145             foreach($this->_res['tpl'][$tplidx]['fonts'] as $font)
24146               $this->_out('/F'.$font['i'].' '.$font['n'].' 0 R');
24147             $this->_out('>>');
24148         }
24149           if(isset($this->_res['tpl'][$tplidx]['images']) && count($this->_res['tpl'][$tplidx]['images']) || 
24150              isset($this->_res['tpl'][$tplidx]['tpls']) && count($this->_res['tpl'][$tplidx]['tpls']))
24151           {
24152             $this->_out('/XObject <<');
24153             if (isset($this->_res['tpl'][$tplidx]['images']) && count($this->_res['tpl'][$tplidx]['images'])) {
24154               foreach($this->_res['tpl'][$tplidx]['images'] as $image)
24155                 $this->_out('/I'.$image['i'].' '.$image['n'].' 0 R');
24156             }
24157             if (isset($this->_res['tpl'][$tplidx]['tpls']) && count($this->_res['tpl'][$tplidx]['tpls'])) {
24158               foreach($this->_res['tpl'][$tplidx]['tpls'] as $i => $tpl)
24159                 $this->_out($this->tplprefix.$i.' '.$tpl['n'].' 0 R');
24160             }
24161             $this->_out('>>');
24162           }
24163           $this->_out('>>');
24164       }
24165 
24166       $this->_out('/Length '.strlen($p).' >>');
24167       $this->_putstream($p);
24168       $this->_out('endobj');
24169     }
24170   }
24171 
24172 /*-- END IMPORTS --*/
24173 
24174 
24175 /*-- BACKGROUND-IMAGES --*/
24176 function _putpatterns() {
24177   for ($i = 1; $i <= count($this->patterns); $i++) {
24178     $x = $this->patterns[$i]['x'];
24179     $y = $this->patterns[$i]['y']; 
24180     $w = $this->patterns[$i]['w'];
24181     $h = $this->patterns[$i]['h']; 
24182     // mPDF 4.0 Uses saved page height
24183     $pgh = $this->patterns[$i]['pgh']; 
24184     $orig_w = $this->patterns[$i]['orig_w'];
24185     $orig_h = $this->patterns[$i]['orig_h']; 
24186     $image_id = $this->patterns[$i]['image_id'];
24187     if ($this->patterns[$i]['x_repeat']) { $x_repeat = true; } 
24188     else { $x_repeat = false; }
24189     if ($this->patterns[$i]['y_repeat']) { $y_repeat = true; }
24190     else { $y_repeat = false; }
24191     $x_pos = $this->patterns[$i]['x_pos'];
24192     if (stristr($x_pos ,'%') ) { 
24193       $x_pos += 0; 
24194       $x_pos /= 100; 
24195       $x_pos = ($w * $x_pos) - ($orig_w/$this->k * $x_pos);
24196     }
24197     $y_pos = $this->patterns[$i]['y_pos'];
24198     if (stristr($y_pos ,'%') ) { 
24199       $y_pos += 0; 
24200       $y_pos /= 100; 
24201       $y_pos = ($h * $y_pos) - ($orig_h/$this->k * $y_pos);
24202     }
24203     $adj_x = ($x_pos + $x) *$this->k;
24204     // mPDF 4.0 Uses saved page height
24205     $adj_y = (($pgh - $y_pos - $y)*$this->k) - $orig_h ;
24206     $img_obj = false;
24207     foreach($this->images AS $img) {
24208       if ($img['i'] == $image_id) { $img_obj = $img['n']; break; }
24209     }
24210     if (!$img_obj ) { echo "Problem: Image object not found for background pattern ".$img['i']; exit; }
24211 
24212             $this->_newobj();
24213             $this->_out('<</ProcSet [/PDF /Text /ImageB /ImageC /ImageI]');
24214             $this->_out('/XObject <</I'.$image_id.' '.$img_obj.' 0 R >>');
24215             $this->_out('>>');
24216             $this->_out('endobj');
24217 
24218     $this->_newobj();
24219     $this->patterns[$i]['n'] = $this->n;
24220     $this->_out('<< /Type /Pattern /PatternType 1 /PaintType 1 /TilingType 2');
24221     $this->_out('/Resources '. ($this->n-1) .' 0 R');
24222 
24223     // mPDF 4.3.015 %.2f to %.3F precision, and increase step 99999 to disable
24224     $this->_out(sprintf('/BBox [0 0 %.3f %.3f]',$orig_w,$orig_h));
24225     if ($x_repeat) { $this->_out(sprintf('/XStep %.3f',$orig_w)); }
24226     else { $this->_out(sprintf('/XStep %d',99999)); }
24227     if ($y_repeat) { $this->_out(sprintf('/YStep %.3f',$orig_h)); }
24228     else { $this->_out(sprintf('/YStep %d',99999)); }
24229 
24230     $this->_out(sprintf('/Matrix [1 0 0 1 %.3f %.3f]',$adj_x,$adj_y));
24231 
24232     $s = sprintf("q %.3f 0 0 %.3f 0 0 cm /I%d Do Q",$orig_w,$orig_h,$image_id);
24233 
24234             if ($this->compress) {
24235       $this->_out('/Filter /FlateDecode');
24236       $s = gzcompress($s);
24237     }
24238     $this->_out('/Length '.strlen($s).'>>');
24239     $this->_putstream($s);
24240     $this->_out('endobj');
24241   }
24242 }
24243 /*-- END BACKGROUND-IMAGES --*/
24244   // *BACKGROUND-IMAGES*
24245 
24246 /*-- GRADIENTS --*/
24247 function _putshaders() {
24248       foreach ($this->gradients as $id => $grad) {  
24249         if (($grad['type'] == 2) OR ($grad['type'] == 3)) {
24250           $this->_newobj();
24251           $this->_out('<<');
24252           $this->_out('/FunctionType 2');
24253           $this->_out('/Domain [0.0 1.0]');
24254           $this->_out('/C0 ['.$grad['col1'].']');
24255           $this->_out('/C1 ['.$grad['col2'].']');
24256           $this->_out('/N 1');
24257           $this->_out('>>');
24258           $this->_out('endobj');
24259           $f1 = $this->n;
24260         }
24261         $this->_newobj();
24262         $this->_out('<<');
24263         $this->_out('/ShadingType '.$grad['type']);
24264         $this->_out('/ColorSpace /DeviceRGB');
24265         if ($grad['type'] == 2) {
24266           $this->_out(sprintf('/Coords [%.3F %.3F %.3F %.3F]', $grad['coords'][0], $grad['coords'][1], $grad['coords'][2], $grad['coords'][3]));
24267           $this->_out('/Function '.$f1.' 0 R');
24268           $this->_out('/Extend ['.$grad['extend'][0].' '.$grad['extend'][1].'] ');
24269           $this->_out('>>');
24270         }
24271         else if ($grad['type'] == 3) {
24272           //x0, y0, r0, x1, y1, r1
24273           //at this this time radius of inner circle is 0
24274           $this->_out(sprintf('/Coords [%.3F %.3F 0 %.3F %.3F %.3F]', $grad['coords'][0], $grad['coords'][1], $grad['coords'][2], $grad['coords'][3], $grad['coords'][4]));
24275           $this->_out('/Function '.$f1.' 0 R');
24276           $this->_out('/Extend ['.$grad['extend'][0].' '.$grad['extend'][1].'] ');
24277           $this->_out('>>');
24278         }
24279         $this->_out('endobj');
24280         $this->gradients[$id]['id'] = $this->n;
24281       }
24282 }
24283 /*-- END GRADIENTS --*/
24284 
24285 
24286 function _putresources() {
24287   $this->_putextgstates();
24288   if ($this->progressBar) { $this->UpdateProgressBar(2,'+10','Compiling Fonts'); }  // *PROGRESS-BAR*
24289   $this->_putfonts();
24290   if ($this->progressBar) { $this->UpdateProgressBar(2,'+10','Compiling Images'); } // *PROGRESS-BAR*
24291   $this->_putimages();
24292   $this->_putformobjects(); // *IMAGES-CORE*
24293 
24294 /*-- IMPORTS --*/
24295   // mPDF 4.2.006
24296   if ($this->enableImports) {
24297     $this->_putformxobjects();
24298     $this->_putimportedobjects();
24299   }
24300 /*-- END IMPORTS --*/
24301 
24302   $this->_putpatterns();  // *BACKGROUND-IMAGES*
24303   $this->_putshaders(); // *GRADIENTS*
24304   //Resource dictionary
24305   $this->offsets[2]=strlen($this->buffer);
24306   $this->_out('2 0 obj');
24307   $this->_out('<</ProcSet [/PDF /Text /ImageB /ImageC /ImageI]');
24308   $this->_out('/Font <<');
24309   // mPDF 4.0
24310   foreach($this->fonts as $font) {
24311     // mPDF 4.0
24312     if (!$font['used'] && $font['type']=='TrueTypeUnicode') { continue; }
24313     if ($font['type']=='Type1subset') {
24314       foreach($font['n'] AS $k => $fid) {
24315         $this->_out('/F'.$font['subsetfontids'][$k].' '.$font['n'][$k].' 0 R');
24316       }
24317     }
24318     else { 
24319       $this->_out('/F'.$font['i'].' '.$font['n'].' 0 R');
24320     }
24321   }
24322   $this->_out('>>');
24323   if (count($this->extgstates)) {
24324     $this->_out('/ExtGState <<');
24325     foreach($this->extgstates as $k=>$extgstate)
24326       $this->_out('/GS'.$k.' '.$extgstate['n'].' 0 R');
24327     $this->_out('>>');
24328   }
24329 
24330 /*-- GRADIENTS --*/
24331   if (isset($this->gradients) AND (count($this->gradients) > 0)) {
24332     $this->_out('/Shading <<');
24333     foreach ($this->gradients as $id => $grad) {
24334       $this->_out('/Sh'.$id.' '.$grad['id'].' 0 R');
24335     }
24336     $this->_out('>>');
24337   }
24338 /*-- END GRADIENTS --*/
24339 
24340   if(count($this->images) || count($this->formobjects) || ($this->enableImports && count($this->tpls))) { // mPDF 4.2.006
24341     $this->_out('/XObject <<');
24342     foreach($this->images as $image)
24343       $this->_out('/I'.$image['i'].' '.$image['n'].' 0 R');
24344             foreach($this->formobjects as $formobject)
24345                 $this->_out('/FO'.$formobject['i'].' '.$formobject['n'].' 0 R');
24346 /*-- IMPORTS --*/
24347     // mPDF 4.2.006
24348     if ($this->enableImports && count($this->tpls)) {
24349       foreach($this->tpls as $tplidx => $tpl) {
24350         $this->_out($this->tplprefix.$tplidx.' '.$tpl['n'].' 0 R');
24351       }
24352     }
24353 /*-- END IMPORTS --*/
24354     $this->_out('>>');
24355   }
24356 
24357 /*-- BACKGROUND-IMAGES --*/
24358   // mPDF 3.0 - Tiling Patterns
24359   if (count($this->patterns)) {
24360     $this->_out('/Pattern <<');
24361     foreach($this->patterns as $k=>$patterns)
24362       $this->_out('/P'.$k.' '.$patterns['n'].' 0 R');
24363     $this->_out('>>');
24364   }
24365 /*-- END BACKGROUND-IMAGES --*/
24366 
24367   $this->_out('>>');
24368   $this->_out('endobj');  // end resource dictionary
24369 
24370   $this->_putbookmarks();   // *BOOKMARKS*
24371 
24372 /*-- ENCRYPTION --*/
24373   if ($this->encrypted) {
24374     $this->_newobj();
24375     $this->enc_obj_id = $this->n;
24376     $this->_out('<<');
24377     $this->_putencryption();
24378     $this->_out('>>');
24379     $this->_out('endobj');
24380   }
24381 /*-- END ENCRYPTION --*/
24382 }
24383 
24384 /*-- ENCRYPTION --*/
24385   function _putencryption()
24386   {
24387     $this->_out('/Filter /Standard');
24388     $this->_out('/V 1');
24389     $this->_out('/R 2');
24390     $this->_out('/O ('.$this->_escape($this->Ovalue).')');
24391     $this->_out('/U ('.$this->_escape($this->Uvalue).')');
24392     $this->_out('/P '.$this->Pvalue);
24393   }
24394 /*-- END ENCRYPTION --*/
24395 
24396   function _puttrailer()
24397   {
24398     $this->_out('/Size '.($this->n+1));
24399     $this->_out('/Root '.$this->n.' 0 R');
24400     $this->_out('/Info '.$this->InfoRoot.' 0 R'); // mPDF 4.2.018
24401 /*-- ENCRYPTION --*/
24402     if ($this->encrypted) {
24403       $this->_out('/Encrypt '.$this->enc_obj_id.' 0 R');
24404       $this->_out('/ID [()()]');
24405     }
24406     // mPDF 4.2.010
24407     else {
24408 /*-- END ENCRYPTION --*/
24409       $uniqid = md5(time() .  $this->buffer);
24410       $this->_out('/ID [<'.$uniqid.'> <'.$uniqid.'>]');
24411 /*-- ENCRYPTION --*/
24412     }
24413 /*-- END ENCRYPTION --*/
24414   }
24415 
24416 /*-- ENCRYPTION --*/
24417   // RC4 is the standard encryption algorithm used in PDF format
24418   function _RC4($key, $text)
24419   {
24420     if ($this->last_rc4_key != $key) {
24421       $k = str_repeat($key, 256/strlen($key)+1);
24422       $rc4 = range(0,255);
24423       $j = 0;
24424       for ($i=0; $i<256; $i++){
24425         $t = $rc4[$i];
24426         $j = ($j + $t + $this->ords[substr($k,$i,1)]) % 256;
24427         $rc4[$i] = $rc4[$j];
24428         $rc4[$j] = $t;
24429       }
24430       $this->last_rc4_key = $key;
24431       $this->last_rc4_key_c = $rc4;
24432     } else {
24433       $rc4 = $this->last_rc4_key_c;
24434     }
24435 
24436     $len = strlen($text);
24437     $a = 0;
24438     $b = 0;
24439     $out = '';
24440     for ($i=0; $i<$len; $i++){
24441       $a = ($a+1)%256;
24442       $t= $rc4[$a];
24443       $b = ($b+$t)%256;
24444       $rc4[$a] = $rc4[$b];
24445       $rc4[$b] = $t;
24446       $k = $rc4[($rc4[$a]+$rc4[$b])%256];
24447       $out.=$this->chrs[$this->ords[substr($text,$i,1)] ^ $k];
24448     }
24449 
24450     return $out;
24451   }
24452 
24453   // Get MD5 as binary string
24454   function _md5_16($string)
24455   {
24456     return pack('H*',md5($string));
24457   }
24458 
24459   // Compute O value
24460   function _Ovalue($user_pass, $owner_pass)
24461   {
24462     $tmp = $this->_md5_16($owner_pass);
24463     $owner_RC4_key = substr($tmp,0,5);
24464     return $this->_RC4($owner_RC4_key, $user_pass);
24465   }
24466 
24467   // Compute U value
24468   function _Uvalue()
24469   {
24470     return $this->_RC4($this->encryption_key, $this->padding);
24471   }
24472 
24473   // Compute encryption key
24474   function _generateencryptionkey($user_pass, $owner_pass, $protection)
24475   {
24476     // Pad passwords
24477     $user_pass = substr($user_pass.$this->padding,0,32);
24478     $owner_pass = substr($owner_pass.$this->padding,0,32);
24479     // Compute O value
24480     $this->Ovalue = $this->_Ovalue($user_pass,$owner_pass);
24481     // Compute encyption key
24482     $tmp = $this->_md5_16($user_pass.$this->Ovalue.$this->chrs[$protection]."\xFF\xFF\xFF");
24483     $this->encryption_key = substr($tmp,0,5);
24484     // Compute U value
24485     $this->Uvalue = $this->_Uvalue();
24486     // Compute P value
24487     $this->Pvalue = -(($protection^255)+1);
24488   }
24489 /*-- END ENCRYPTION --*/
24490 
24491 //=========================================
24492 /*-- BOOKMARKS --*/
24493 // FROM class PDF_Bookmark
24494 
24495 function Bookmark($txt,$level=0,$y=0)
24496 {
24497   $txt = $this->purify_utf8_text($txt);
24498   if ($this->text_input_as_HTML) {
24499     $txt = $this->all_entities_to_utf8($txt);
24500   }
24501   if($y==-1) {
24502     if (!$this->ColActive){ $y=$this->y; }
24503     else { $y = $this->y0; }  // If columns are on - mark top of columns
24504   }
24505   // else y is used as set, or =0 i.e. top of page
24506   // DIRECTIONALITY RTL
24507   // mPDF 3.0
24508 //  $this->magic_reverse_dir($txt); // *RTL*
24509   if ($this->keep_block_together) {
24510     $this->ktBMoutlines[]=array('t'=>$txt,'l'=>$level,'y'=>$y,'p'=>$this->page);
24511   }
24512 /*-- TABLES --*/
24513   else if ($this->table_rotate) {
24514     $this->tbrot_BMoutlines[]=array('t'=>$txt,'l'=>$level,'y'=>$y,'p'=>$this->page);
24515   }
24516   else if ($this->kwt) {
24517     $this->kwt_BMoutlines[]=array('t'=>$txt,'l'=>$level,'y'=>$y,'p'=>$this->page);
24518   }
24519 /*-- END TABLES --*/
24520   else if ($this->ColActive) {  // *COLUMNS*
24521     $this->col_BMoutlines[]=array('t'=>$txt,'l'=>$level,'y'=>$y,'p'=>$this->page);  // *COLUMNS*
24522   } // *COLUMNS*
24523   else {
24524     $this->BMoutlines[]=array('t'=>$txt,'l'=>$level,'y'=>$y,'p'=>$this->page);
24525   }
24526 }
24527 
24528 
24529 function _putbookmarks()
24530 {
24531   $nb=count($this->BMoutlines);
24532   if($nb==0)
24533     return;
24534   $lru=array();
24535   $level=0;
24536   foreach($this->BMoutlines as $i=>$o)
24537   {
24538     if($o['l']>0)
24539     {
24540       $parent=$lru[$o['l']-1];
24541       //Set parent and last pointers
24542       $this->BMoutlines[$i]['parent']=$parent;
24543       $this->BMoutlines[$parent]['last']=$i;
24544       if($o['l']>$level)
24545       {
24546         //Level increasing: set first pointer
24547         $this->BMoutlines[$parent]['first']=$i;
24548       }
24549     }
24550     else
24551       $this->BMoutlines[$i]['parent']=$nb;
24552     if($o['l']<=$level and $i>0)
24553     {
24554       //Set prev and next pointers
24555       $prev=$lru[$o['l']];
24556       $this->BMoutlines[$prev]['next']=$i;
24557       $this->BMoutlines[$i]['prev']=$prev;
24558     }
24559     $lru[$o['l']]=$i;
24560     $level=$o['l'];
24561   }
24562   //Outline items
24563   $n=$this->n+1;
24564   foreach($this->BMoutlines as $i=>$o)
24565   {
24566     $this->_newobj();
24567     $this->_out('<</Title '.$this->_UTF16BEtextstring($o['t']));
24568     $this->_out('/Parent '.($n+$o['parent']).' 0 R');
24569     if(isset($o['prev']))
24570       $this->_out('/Prev '.($n+$o['prev']).' 0 R');
24571     if(isset($o['next']))
24572       $this->_out('/Next '.($n+$o['next']).' 0 R');
24573     if(isset($o['first']))
24574       $this->_out('/First '.($n+$o['first']).' 0 R');
24575     if(isset($o['last']))
24576       $this->_out('/Last '.($n+$o['last']).' 0 R');
24577 
24578 
24579     // mPDF 3.0 Page orientation
24580     if (isset($this->pageDim[$o['p']]['h'])) { $h=$this->pageDim[$o['p']]['h']; }
24581     else { $h = 0; }
24582 
24583     $this->_out(sprintf('/Dest [%d 0 R /XYZ 0 %.3f null]',1+2*($o['p']),($h-$o['y'])*$this->k));
24584 
24585     $this->_out('/Count 0>>');
24586     $this->_out('endobj');
24587   }
24588   //Outline root
24589   $this->_newobj();
24590   $this->OutlineRoot=$this->n;
24591   $this->_out('<</Type /BMoutlines /First '.$n.' 0 R');
24592   $this->_out('/Last '.($n+$lru[0]).' 0 R>>');
24593   $this->_out('endobj');
24594 }
24595 /*-- END BOOKMARKS --*/
24596   // *BOOKMARKS*
24597 
24598 
24599 
24600 //======================================================
24601 
24602 
24603 // DEPRACATED but included for backwards compatability
24604 function startPageNums() {
24605 }
24606 
24607 //======================================================
24608 /*-- TOC --*/
24609 // ToC TABLE OF CONTENTS
24610 
24611 // Initiate, and Mark a place for the Table of Contents to be inserted
24612 function TOC($tocfont='', $tocfontsize=8, $tocindent=5, $resetpagenum='', $pagenumstyle='', $suppress='', $toc_orientation='', $TOCusePaging=true, $TOCuseLinking=false, $toc_id=0) {
24613     if (strtoupper($toc_id)=='ALL') { $toc_id = '_mpdf_all'; }
24614     else if (!$toc_id) { $toc_id = 0; }
24615     else { $toc_id = strtolower($toc_id); }
24616     // To use odd and even pages
24617     // Cannot start table of contents on an even page
24618     if (($this->mirrorMargins) && (($this->page)%2==0)) { // EVEN
24619 /*-- COLUMNS --*/
24620       if ($this->ColActive) {
24621         if (count($this->columnbuffer)) { $this->printcolumnbuffer(); }
24622       }
24623 /*-- END COLUMNS --*/
24624       $this->AddPage($this->CurOrientation,'',$resetpagenum, $pagenumstyle, $suppress);
24625     }
24626     else { 
24627       $this->PageNumSubstitutions[] = array('from'=>$this->page, 'reset'=> $resetpagenum, 'type'=>$pagenumstyle, 'suppress'=>$suppress);
