24628     }
24629     if (!$tocfont) { $tocfont = $this->default_font; }
24630     if (!$tocfontsize) { $tocfontsize = $this->default_font_size; }
24631     if ($toc_id) {
24632       $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCmark'] = $this->page; 
24633       $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCfont'] = $tocfont;
24634       $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCfontsize'] = $tocfontsize;
24635       $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCindent'] = $tocindent;
24636       $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCorientation'] = $toc_orientation;
24637       $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCuseLinking'] = $TOCuseLinking;
24638       $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCusePaging'] = $TOCusePaging;
24639     }
24640     else {
24641       $this->TOCmark = $this->page; 
24642       $this->TOCfont = $tocfont;
24643       $this->TOCfontsize = $tocfontsize;
24644       $this->TOCindent = $tocindent;
24645       $this->TOCorientation = $toc_orientation;
24646       $this->TOCuseLinking = $TOCuseLinking;
24647       $this->TOCusePaging = $TOCusePaging;
24648     }
24649 }
24650 
24651 // mPDF 4.2 Added $pagesel
24652 // mPDF 4.2.024
24653 function TOCpagebreak($tocfont='', $tocfontsize='', $tocindent='', $TOCusePaging=true, $TOCuseLinking='', $toc_orientation='', $toc_mgl='',$toc_mgr='',$toc_mgt='',$toc_mgb='',$toc_mgh='',$toc_mgf='',$toc_ohname='',$toc_ehname='',$toc_ofname='',$toc_efname='',$toc_ohvalue=0,$toc_ehvalue=0,$toc_ofvalue=0,$toc_efvalue=0, $toc_preHTML='', $toc_postHTML='', $toc_bookmarkText='', $resetpagenum='', $pagenumstyle='', $suppress='', $orientation='', $mgl='',$mgr='',$mgt='',$mgb='',$mgh='',$mgf='',$ohname='',$ehname='',$ofname='',$efname='',$ohvalue=0,$ehvalue=0,$ofvalue=0,$efvalue=0, $toc_id=0, $pagesel='', $toc_pagesel='', $sheetsize='', $toc_sheetsize='') {
24654     if (strtoupper($toc_id)=='ALL') { $toc_id = '_mpdf_all'; }
24655     else if (!$toc_id) { $toc_id = 0; }
24656     else { $toc_id = strtolower($toc_id); }
24657 
24658     // mPDF 3.0
24659     //Start a new page
24660     if($this->state==0) $this->AddPage();
24661     if ($this->y == $this->tMargin && (!$this->mirrorMargins ||($this->mirrorMargins && $this->page % 2==1))) {
24662       // Don't add a page
24663       if ($this->page==1 && count($this->PageNumSubstitutions)==0) { 
24664         if (!$suppress) { $suppress = 'off'; }
24665         if (!$resetpagenum) { $resetpagenum= 1; }
24666         $this->PageNumSubstitutions[] = array('from'=>1, 'reset'=> $resetpagenum, 'type'=>$pagenumstyle, 'suppress'=> $suppress);
24667       }
24668     }
24669     else {
24670       $this->AddPage($orientation,'NEXT-ODD', $resetpagenum, $pagenumstyle, $suppress,$mgl,$mgr,$mgt,$mgb,$mgh,$mgf,$ohname,$ehname,$ofname,$efname,$ohvalue,$ehvalue,$ofvalue,$efvalue,$pagesel,$sheetsize);   // mPDF 4.2.024
24671     }
24672 
24673     if (!$tocfont) { $tocfont = $this->default_font; }
24674     if (!$tocfontsize) { $tocfontsize = $this->default_font_size; }
24675     if (!$tocindent && $tocindent !== 0) { $tocindent = 5; }
24676     // mPDF 3.0
24677     if ($TOCusePaging === false || strtolower($TOCusePaging) == "off" || $TOCusePaging === 0 || $TOCusePaging === "0" || $TOCusePaging === "") { $TOCusePaging = false; }
24678     else { $TOCusePaging = true; }
24679     if (!$TOCuseLinking) { $TOCuseLinking = false; }
24680     if ($toc_id) {
24681       $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCmark'] = $this->page; 
24682       $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCfont'] = $tocfont;
24683       $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCfontsize'] = $tocfontsize;
24684       $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCindent'] = $tocindent;
24685       $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCorientation'] = $toc_orientation;
24686       $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCuseLinking'] = $TOCuseLinking;
24687       $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCusePaging'] = $TOCusePaging;
24688 
24689       if ($toc_preHTML) { $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCpreHTML'] = $toc_preHTML; }
24690       if ($toc_postHTML) { $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCpostHTML'] = $toc_postHTML; }
24691       if ($toc_bookmarkText) { $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCbookmarkText'] = $toc_bookmarkText; }  // *BOOKMARKS*
24692 
24693       $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_margin_left'] = $toc_mgl;
24694       $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_margin_right'] = $toc_mgr;
24695       $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_margin_top'] = $toc_mgt;
24696       $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_margin_bottom'] = $toc_mgb;
24697       $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_margin_header'] = $toc_mgh;
24698       $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_margin_footer'] = $toc_mgf;
24699       $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_odd_header_name'] = $toc_ohname;
24700       $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_even_header_name'] = $toc_ehname;
24701       $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_odd_footer_name'] = $toc_ofname;
24702       $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_even_footer_name'] = $toc_efname;
24703       $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_odd_header_value'] = $toc_ohvalue;
24704       $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_even_header_value'] = $toc_ehvalue;
24705       $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_odd_footer_value'] = $toc_ofvalue;
24706       $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_even_footer_value'] = $toc_efvalue;
24707       // mPDF 4.2.024
24708       $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_page_selector'] = $toc_pagesel;
24709       $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCsheetsize'] = $toc_sheetsize;
24710     }
24711     else {
24712       $this->TOCmark = $this->page; 
24713       $this->TOCfont = $tocfont;
24714       $this->TOCfontsize = $tocfontsize;
24715       $this->TOCindent = $tocindent;
24716       $this->TOCorientation = $toc_orientation;
24717       $this->TOCuseLinking = $TOCuseLinking;
24718       $this->TOCusePaging = $TOCusePaging;
24719 
24720       if ($toc_preHTML) { $this->TOCpreHTML = $toc_preHTML; }
24721       if ($toc_postHTML) { $this->TOCpostHTML = $toc_postHTML; }
24722       if ($toc_bookmarkText) { $this->TOCbookmarkText = $toc_bookmarkText; }  // *BOOKMARKS*
24723 
24724       $this->TOC_margin_left = $toc_mgl;
24725       $this->TOC_margin_right = $toc_mgr;
24726       $this->TOC_margin_top = $toc_mgt;
24727       $this->TOC_margin_bottom = $toc_mgb;
24728       $this->TOC_margin_header = $toc_mgh;
24729       $this->TOC_margin_footer = $toc_mgf;
24730       $this->TOC_odd_header_name = $toc_ohname;
24731       $this->TOC_even_header_name = $toc_ehname;
24732       $this->TOC_odd_footer_name = $toc_ofname;
24733       $this->TOC_even_footer_name = $toc_efname;
24734       $this->TOC_odd_header_value = $toc_ohvalue;
24735       $this->TOC_even_header_value = $toc_ehvalue;
24736       $this->TOC_odd_footer_value = $toc_ofvalue;
24737       $this->TOC_even_footer_value = $toc_efvalue;
24738       // mPDF 4.2.024
24739       $this->TOC_page_selector = $toc_pagesel;
24740       $this->TOCsheetsize = $toc_sheetsize;
24741     }
24742 }
24743 
24744 function TOC_Entry($txt, $level=0, $toc_id=0) {
24745     $txt = $this->purify_utf8_text($txt);
24746     if ($this->text_input_as_HTML) {
24747       $txt = $this->all_entities_to_utf8($txt);
24748     }
24749     if (!$this->is_MB) { $txt = mb_convert_encoding($txt,$this->mb_enc,'UTF-8'); }
24750       if ($this->ColActive) { $ily = $this->y0; } else { $ily = $this->y; } // use top of columns
24751     $linkn = $this->AddLink(); 
24752     $this->SetLink($linkn,$ily,$this->page);
24753 /*-- RTL --*/
24754       if (($this->directionality == 'rtl') || (($this->directionality == 'ltr') && ($this->biDirectional)))  { 
24755       // mPDF 4.0 Remove rtlAsArabicFarsi
24756       $txt = preg_replace("/([".$this->pregRTLchars."]+)/ue", '$this->ArabJoin(stripslashes(\'\\1\'))', $txt );
24757     }
24758 /*-- END RTL --*/
24759     if (strtoupper($toc_id)=='ALL') { $toc_id = '_mpdf_all'; }
24760     else if (!$toc_id) { $toc_id = 0; }
24761     else { $toc_id = strtolower($toc_id); }
24762     if ($this->keep_block_together) {
24763       $this->_kttoc[]=array('t'=>$txt,'l'=>$level,'p'=>$this->page, 'link'=>$linkn, 'toc_id'=>$toc_id);
24764     }
24765 /*-- TABLES --*/
24766     else if ($this->table_rotate) {
24767       $this->tbrot_toc[]=array('t'=>$txt,'l'=>$level,'p'=>$this->page, 'link'=>$linkn, 'toc_id'=>$toc_id);
24768     }
24769     else if ($this->kwt) {
24770       $this->kwt_toc[]=array('t'=>$txt,'l'=>$level,'p'=>$this->page, 'link'=>$linkn, 'toc_id'=>$toc_id);
24771     }
24772 /*-- END TABLES --*/
24773     else if ($this->ColActive) {  // *COLUMNS*
24774       $this->col_toc[]=array('t'=>$txt,'l'=>$level,'p'=>$this->page, 'link'=>$linkn, 'toc_id'=>$toc_id);  // *COLUMNS*
24775     } // *COLUMNS*
24776     else {
24777       $this->_toc[]=array('t'=>$txt,'l'=>$level,'p'=>$this->page, 'link'=>$linkn, 'toc_id'=>$toc_id);
24778     }
24779 }
24780 
24781 function insertTOC() {
24782   $notocs = 0;
24783   if ($this->TOCmark) { $notocs = 1; }
24784   $notocs += count($this->m_TOC);
24785 
24786   if ($notocs==0) { return; }
24787 
24788   if (count($this->m_TOC)) { reset($this->m_TOC); }
24789   $added_toc_pages = 0;
24790 
24791   if ($this->ColActive) { $this->SetColumns(0); } // *COLUMNS*
24792   if (($this->mirrorMargins) && (($this->page)%2==1)) { // ODD
24793     $this->AddPage($this->CurOrientation);
24794     $extrapage = true;
24795   }
24796   else { $extrapage = false; }
24797 
24798   for ($toci = 0; $toci<$notocs; $toci++) {
24799     if ($toci==0 && $this->TOCmark) {
24800       $toc_id = 0;
24801       $toc_page = $this->TOCmark; 
24802       $tocfont = $this->TOCfont;
24803       $tocfontsize = $this->TOCfontsize;
24804       $tocindent = $this->TOCindent;
24805       $toc_orientation = $this->TOCorientation;
24806       $TOCuseLinking = $this->TOCuseLinking;
24807       $TOCusePaging = $this->TOCusePaging;
24808       $toc_preHTML = $this->TOCpreHTML;
24809       $toc_postHTML = $this->TOCpostHTML;
24810       $toc_bookmarkText = $this->TOCbookmarkText; // *BOOKMARKS*
24811       $toc_mgl = $this->TOC_margin_left;
24812       $toc_mgr = $this->TOC_margin_right;
24813       $toc_mgt = $this->TOC_margin_top;
24814       $toc_mgb = $this->TOC_margin_bottom;
24815       $toc_mgh = $this->TOC_margin_header;
24816       $toc_mgf = $this->TOC_margin_footer;
24817       $toc_ohname = $this->TOC_odd_header_name;
24818       $toc_ehname = $this->TOC_even_header_name;
24819       $toc_ofname = $this->TOC_odd_footer_name;
24820       $toc_efname = $this->TOC_even_footer_name;
24821       $toc_ohvalue = $this->TOC_odd_header_value;
24822       $toc_ehvalue = $this->TOC_even_header_value;
24823       $toc_ofvalue = $this->TOC_odd_footer_value;
24824       $toc_efvalue = $this->TOC_even_footer_value;
24825       // mPDF 4.2
24826       $toc_page_selector = $this->TOC_page_selector;
24827       $toc_sheet_size = $this->TOCsheetsize;  // mPDF 4.2.024
24828     }
24829     else {
24830       $arr = current($this->m_TOC);
24831 
24832       $toc_id = key($this->m_TOC);
24833       $toc_page = $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCmark'];
24834       $tocfont = $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCfont'];
24835       $tocfontsize = $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCfontsize'];
24836       $tocindent = $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCindent'];
24837       $toc_orientation = $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCorientation'];
24838       $TOCuseLinking = $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCuseLinking'];
24839       $TOCusePaging = $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCusePaging'];
24840       if (isset($this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCpreHTML'])) { $toc_preHTML = $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCpreHTML']; }
24841       else { $toc_preHTML = ''; }
24842       if (isset($this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCpostHTML'])) { $toc_postHTML = $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCpostHTML']; }
24843       else { $toc_postHTML = ''; }
24844       if (isset($this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCbookmarkText'])) { $toc_bookmarkText = $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCbookmarkText']; }  // *BOOKMARKS*
24845       else { $toc_bookmarkText = ''; }  // *BOOKMARKS*
24846       $toc_mgl = $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_margin_left'];
24847       $toc_mgr = $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_margin_right'];
24848       $toc_mgt = $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_margin_top'];
24849       $toc_mgb = $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_margin_bottom'];
24850       $toc_mgh = $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_margin_header'];
24851       $toc_mgf = $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_margin_footer'];
24852       $toc_ohname = $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_odd_header_name'];
24853       $toc_ehname = $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_even_header_name'];
24854       $toc_ofname = $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_odd_footer_name'];
24855       $toc_efname = $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_even_footer_name'];
24856       $toc_ohvalue = $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_odd_header_value'];
24857       $toc_ehvalue = $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_even_header_value'];
24858       $toc_ofvalue = $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_odd_footer_value'];
24859       $toc_efvalue = $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_even_footer_value'];
24860       // mPDF 4.2
24861       $toc_page_selector = $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOC_page_selector'];
24862       $toc_sheet_size = $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCsheetsize'];  // mPDF 4.2.024
24863       next($this->m_TOC);
24864     }
24865     if ($this->TOCheader) { $this->SetHeader($this->TOCheader); }
24866     else if ($this->TOCheader !== false) { $this->SetHeader(); }
24867 
24868     // mPDF 3.0
24869     if (!$tocindent && $tocindent !== 0) { $tocindent = 5; }
24870     if (!$toc_orientation) { $toc_orientation= $this->DefOrientation; }
24871     // mPDF 3.0
24872     // mPDF 4.2
24873     $this->AddPage($toc_orientation, '', '', '', "on", $toc_mgl, $toc_mgr, $toc_mgt, $toc_mgb, $toc_mgh, $toc_mgf, $toc_ohname, $toc_ehname, $toc_ofname, $toc_efname, $toc_ohvalue, $toc_ehvalue, $toc_ofvalue, $toc_efvalue, $toc_page_selector, $toc_sheet_size ); // mPDF 4.2.024
24874 
24875     if ($this->TOCfooter) { $this->SetFooter($this->TOCfooter); }
24876     else if ($this->TOCfooter !== false) { $this->SetFooter(); }
24877 
24878     $tocstart=count($this->pages);
24879     if ($toc_preHTML) { $this->WriteHTML($toc_preHTML); }
24880 
24881     foreach($this->_toc as $t) {
24882      if ($t['toc_id']==='_mpdf_all' || $t['toc_id']===$toc_id ) {
24883        // mPDF 3.0
24884        $tpgno = $this->docPageNum($t['p']);
24885        $lineheightcorr = 2-$t['l'];
24886        //Offset
24887        $level=$t['l'];
24888 
24889        if ($TOCuseLinking) { $tlink = $t['link']; }
24890        else  { $tlink = ''; }
24891 
24892 /*-- RTL --*/
24893        if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') {
24894       $weight='';
24895       if($level==0)
24896         $weight='B';
24897       $str=$t['t'];
24898       // mPDF 4.0
24899       $fullstr = $str;
24900       $this->SetFont($tocfont,$weight,$tocfontsize,true,true);
24901       $PageCellSize=$this->GetStringWidth($tpgno )+2;
24902       $strsize=$this->GetStringWidth($str);
24903 
24904       // mPDF 3.0 Cut to only one line
24905       $cw = count(explode(' ',$str));
24906       while (($strsize + $this->GetStringWidth(str_repeat('.',5))+4 + $PageCellSize) > $this->pgwidth && $cw>1) {
24907         $str = implode(' ',explode(' ',$str,-1));
24908         $strsize=$this->GetStringWidth($str);
24909         $cw = count(explode(' ',$str));
24910       }
24911       $sl = strlen($str);
24912       // mPDF 4.0
24913       $rem = substr($fullstr, ($sl+1));
24914 
24915       // mPDF 3.0
24916       $this->magic_reverse_dir($str); // *RTL*
24917 
24918       if ($TOCusePaging) {
24919         //Page number
24920         $this->SetFont($tocfont,'',$tocfontsize);
24921         $this->Cell($PageCellSize,$this->FontSize+$lineheightcorr,$tpgno ,0,0,'L',0,$tlink);
24922 
24923         //Filling dots
24924         $w=$this->w-$this->lMargin-$this->rMargin-$PageCellSize-($level*$tocindent)-($strsize+2);
24925         $nb=intval($w/$this->GetStringWidth('.'));
24926         if ($nb>0) { 
24927           $dots=str_repeat('.',$nb); 
24928           $this->Cell($w+2,$this->FontSize+$lineheightcorr,$dots,0,0,'L');
24929         }
24930         // Text
24931         $this->SetFont($tocfont,$weight,$tocfontsize);
24932         $this->Cell($strsize-($level*$tocindent),$this->FontSize+$lineheightcorr,$str,0,1,'R',0,$tlink);
24933       }
24934       else {
24935         // Text
24936         $this->SetFont($tocfont,$weight,$tocfontsize);
24937         $this->Cell($this->pgwidth -($level*$tocindent),$this->FontSize+$lineheightcorr,$str,0,1,'R',0,$tlink);
24938       }
24939 
24940       if ($rem) {
24941         $this->x += 10;
24942         // mPDF 4.0 Added true last parameter
24943         $this->MultiCell($this->pgwidth -($level*$tocindent)-15,$this->FontSize+$lineheightcorr,$rem,0,R,0,$tlink,'rtl',true); 
24944       }
24945        }
24946        // LTR
24947        else {
24948 /*-- END RTL --*/
24949 
24950       // Text
24951       $weight='';
24952       if($level==0)
24953         $weight='B';
24954       $str=$t['t'];
24955       // mPDF 4.0
24956       $fullstr = $str;
24957       $this->SetFont($tocfont,$weight,$tocfontsize,true,true);
24958       if($level>0 && $tocindent) { $this->Cell($level*$tocindent,$this->FontSize+$lineheightcorr); }
24959 
24960       // mPDF 4.0 Font-specific ligature substitution for Indic fonts
24961       $this->ConvertIndic($str);  // *INDIC*
24962 
24963       $PageCellSize=$this->GetStringWidth($tpgno )+2;
24964       $strsize=$this->GetStringWidth($str);
24965 
24966       // mPDF 3.0 Cut to only one line
24967       $cw = count(explode(' ',$str));
24968       while (($strsize + $this->GetStringWidth(str_repeat('.',5))+4+ $PageCellSize + ($level*$tocindent)) > $this->pgwidth && $cw>1) {
24969         $str = implode(' ',explode(' ',$str,-1));
24970         $strsize=$this->GetStringWidth($str);
24971         $cw = count(explode(' ',$str));
24972       }
24973       $sl = strlen($str);
24974       // mPDF 4.0
24975       $rem = substr($fullstr, ($sl+1));
24976 
24977       if ($TOCusePaging) {
24978         // Text
24979         $this->Cell($strsize+2,$this->FontSize+$lineheightcorr,$str,0,0,'',0,$tlink);
24980 
24981         //Filling dots
24982         $this->SetFont($tocfont,'',$tocfontsize);
24983         $w=$this->w-$this->lMargin-$this->rMargin-$PageCellSize-($level*$tocindent)-($strsize+2);
24984         $nb=intval($w/$this->GetStringWidth('.'));
24985         if ($nb>0) { $dots=str_repeat('.',$nb); }
24986         else { $this->y += $this->lineheight; $dots=str_repeat('.',5); }  // ..... 5 dots?
24987         $this->Cell($w,$this->FontSize+$lineheightcorr,$dots,0,0,'R');
24988 
24989         //Page number
24990         $this->Cell($PageCellSize,$this->FontSize+$lineheightcorr,$tpgno ,0,1,'R',0,$tlink);
24991       }
24992       else {
24993         // Text only
24994         $this->Cell($strsize+2,$this->FontSize+$lineheightcorr,$str,0,1,'',0,$tlink); // forces new line
24995       }
24996       // mPDF 3.0
24997       if ($rem) {
24998         $this->x +=  5 + $PageCellSize + ($level*$tocindent);
24999         // mPDF 4.0 Added true last parameter
25000         $this->MultiCell($strsize+2,$this->FontSize+$lineheightcorr,$rem,0,L,0,$tlink,'ltr',true); 
25001       }
25002        }  // *RTL*
25003      } 
25004     }
25005 
25006     if ($toc_postHTML) { $this->WriteHTML($toc_postHTML); }
25007     $this->AddPage($toc_orientation,'E');
25008 
25009     $n_toc = $this->page - $tocstart + 1;
25010 
25011     if ($toci==0 && $this->TOCmark) {
25012       $this->TOC_start = $tocstart ;
25013       $this->TOC_end = $this->page;
25014       $this->TOC_npages = $n_toc;
25015     }
25016     else {
25017       $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['start'] = $tocstart ;
25018       $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['end'] = $this->page;
25019       $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['npages'] = $n_toc;
25020     }
25021   }
25022 
25023   // mPDF 4.2.023
25024   $s = '';
25025   $bby = $this->h;
25026   $bbw = $this->w;
25027   $bbh = $this->h;
25028   if ($this->bodyBackgroundColor) {
25029     $s .= sprintf('%.3f %.3f %.3f rg',$this->bodyBackgroundColor['R']/255,$this->bodyBackgroundColor['G']/255,$this->bodyBackgroundColor['B']/255)."\n";
25030     $s .= sprintf('%.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f re f',0,$bby*$this->k,$bbw*$this->k,-$bbh*$this->k)."\n";
25031   }
25032 /*-- GRADIENTS --*/
25033   if ($this->bodyBackgroundGradient) { 
25034     $g = $this->parseBackgroundGradient($this->bodyBackgroundGradient);
25035     if ($g) {
25036       $s .= $this->Gradient(0, 0, $this->w, $this->h, $g['gradtype'], $g['col'], $g['col2'], $g['coords'], $g['extend'], true);
25037     }
25038   }
25039 /*-- END GRADIENTS --*/
25040 /*-- BACKGROUND-IMAGES --*/
25041   if ($this->bodyBackgroundImage) {
25042       if ($this->bodyBackgroundImage['image_id']) { // Background pattern
25043       $n = count($this->patterns)+1;
25044       // mPDF 4.3.015
25045       list($orig_w, $orig_h, $x_repeat, $y_repeat) = $this->_resizeBackgroundImage($this->bodyBackgroundImage['orig_w'], $this->bodyBackgroundImage['orig_h'], $bbw, $bbh, $this->bodyBackgroundImage['resize'],$this->bodyBackgroundImage['x_repeat'],$this->bodyBackgroundImage['y_repeat']);
25046       // mPDF 3.1 $bbx = 0, 'y'=>0
25047       $this->patterns[$n] = array('x'=>0, 'y'=>0, 'w'=>$bbw, 'h'=>$bbh, 'pgh'=>$this->h, 'image_id'=>$this->bodyBackgroundImage['image_id'], 'orig_w'=>$orig_w, 'orig_h'=>$orig_h, 'x_pos'=>$this->bodyBackgroundImage['x_pos'], 'y_pos'=>$this->bodyBackgroundImage['y_pos'], 'x_repeat'=>$x_repeat, 'y_repeat'=>$y_repeat); // mPDF 4.3.015
25048       // mPDF 4.3.017
25049       if ($this->bodyBackgroundImage['opacity']>0 && $this->bodyBackgroundImage['opacity']<1) { $opac = $this->SetAlpha($this->bodyBackgroundImage['opacity'],'Normal',true); }
25050       else { $opac = ''; }
25051       $s .= sprintf('q /Pattern cs /P%d scn %s %.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f re f Q', $n, $opac, 0,$bby*$this->k,$bbw*$this->k,-$bbh*$this->k) ."\n";
25052       }
25053   }
25054 /*-- END BACKGROUND-IMAGES --*/
25055 
25056   $s .= $this->PrintPageBackgrounds();
25057   $this->pages[$this->page] = preg_replace('/(___BACKGROUND___PATTERNS'.date('jY').')/', "\n".$s."\n".'\\1', $this->pages[$this->page]);
25058   $this->pageBackgrounds = array();
25059 
25060   //Page footer
25061   $this->InFooter=true;
25062   $this->Footer();
25063   $this->InFooter=false;
25064 
25065   // 2nd time through to move pages etc.
25066   $added_toc_pages = 0;
25067   if (count($this->m_TOC)) { reset($this->m_TOC); }
25068 
25069   for ($toci = 0; $toci<$notocs; $toci++) {
25070     if ($toci==0 && $this->TOCmark) {
25071       $toc_id = 0;
25072       $toc_page = $this->TOCmark + $added_toc_pages; 
25073       $toc_orientation = $this->TOCorientation;
25074       $TOCuseLinking = $this->TOCuseLinking;
25075       $TOCusePaging = $this->TOCusePaging;
25076       $toc_bookmarkText = $this->TOCbookmarkText; // *BOOKMARKS*
25077 
25078       $tocstart = $this->TOC_start ;
25079       $tocend = $n = $this->TOC_end;
25080       $n_toc = $this->TOC_npages;
25081     }
25082     else {
25083       $arr = current($this->m_TOC);
25084 
25085       $toc_id = key($this->m_TOC);
25086       $toc_page = $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCmark'] + $added_toc_pages;
25087       $toc_orientation = $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCorientation'];
25088       $TOCuseLinking = $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCuseLinking'];
25089       $TOCusePaging = $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCusePaging'];
25090       $toc_bookmarkText = $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['TOCbookmarkText']; // *BOOKMARKS*
25091 
25092       $tocstart = $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['start'] ;
25093       $tocend = $n = $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['end'] ;
25094       $n_toc = $this->m_TOC[$toc_id]['npages'] ;
25095 
25096       next($this->m_TOC);
25097     }
25098 
25099     // Now pages moved
25100     $added_toc_pages += $n_toc;
25101 
25102     $this->MovePages($toc_page, $tocstart, $tocend) ;
25103     // mPDF 4.2.020
25104     $this->pgsIns[$toc_page] = $tocend - $tocstart + 1;
25105 
25106 /*-- BOOKMARKS --*/
25107     // Insert new Bookmark for Bookmark
25108     if ($toc_bookmarkText) {
25109       $insert = -1;
25110       foreach($this->BMoutlines as $i=>$o) {
25111         if($o['p']<$toc_page) { // i.e. before point of insertion
25112           $insert = $i;
25113         }
25114       }
25115       $txt = $this->purify_utf8_text($toc_bookmarkText);
25116       if ($this->text_input_as_HTML) {
25117         $txt = $this->all_entities_to_utf8($txt);
25118       }
25119       $newBookmark[0] = array('t'=>$txt,'l'=>0,'y'=>0,'p'=>$toc_page ); 
25120       array_splice($this->BMoutlines,($insert+1),0,$newBookmark);
25121     }
25122 /*-- END BOOKMARKS --*/
25123 
25124   }
25125 
25126   // Delete empty page that was inserted earlier
25127   if ($extrapage) {
25128     unset($this->pages[count($this->pages)]);
25129     $this->page--;  // Reset page pointer
25130   }
25131 
25132 }
25133 
25134 //======================================================
25135 function MovePages($target_page, $start_page, $end_page=-1) {
25136   // move a page/pages EARLIER in the document
25137     if ($end_page<1) { $end_page = $start_page; }
25138     $n_toc = $end_page - $start_page + 1;
25139 
25140     // Set/Update PageNumSubstitutions changes before moving anything
25141     if (count($this->PageNumSubstitutions)) {
25142       $tp_present = false;
25143       $sp_present = false;
25144       $ep_present = false;
25145       foreach($this->PageNumSubstitutions AS $k=>$v) {
25146         if ($this->PageNumSubstitutions[$k]['from']==$target_page) {
25147         $tp_present = true;
25148         if ($this->PageNumSubstitutions[$k]['suppress']!='on' && $this->PageNumSubstitutions[$k]['suppress']!=1) { 
25149           $this->PageNumSubstitutions[$k]['suppress']='off';
25150         }
25151         }
25152         if ($this->PageNumSubstitutions[$k]['from']==$start_page) {
25153         $sp_present = true;
25154         if ($this->PageNumSubstitutions[$k]['suppress']!='on' && $this->PageNumSubstitutions[$k]['suppress']!=1) { 
25155           $this->PageNumSubstitutions[$k]['suppress']='off';
25156         }
25157         }
25158         if ($this->PageNumSubstitutions[$k]['from']==($end_page+1)) {
25159         $ep_present = true;
25160         if ($this->PageNumSubstitutions[$k]['suppress']!='on' && $this->PageNumSubstitutions[$k]['suppress']!=1) { 
25161           $this->PageNumSubstitutions[$k]['suppress']='off';
25162         }
25163         }
25164       }
25165 
25166       if (!$tp_present) { 
25167         list($tp_type, $tp_suppress, $tp_reset) = $this->docPageSettings($target_page);
25168       }
25169       if (!$sp_present) { 
25170         list($sp_type, $sp_suppress, $sp_reset) = $this->docPageSettings($start_page);
25171       }
25172       if (!$ep_present) { 
25173         list($ep_type, $ep_suppress, $ep_reset) = $this->docPageSettings($start_page-1);
25174       }
25175 
25176     }
25177 
25178     $last = array();
25179     //store pages
25180     for($i = $start_page;$i <= $end_page ;$i++)
25181       $last[]=$this->pages[$i];
25182     //move pages
25183     for($i=$start_page - 1;$i>=($target_page);$i--) { // mPDF 3.0
25184       $this->pages[$i+$n_toc]=$this->pages[$i];
25185     }
25186     //Put toc pages at insert point
25187     for($i = 0;$i < $n_toc;$i++) {
25188       $this->pages[$target_page + $i]=$last[$i];
25189     }
25190 
25191 /*-- BOOKMARKS --*/
25192     // Update Bookmarks
25193     foreach($this->BMoutlines as $i=>$o) {
25194       if($o['p']>=$target_page) {
25195         $this->BMoutlines[$i]['p'] += $n_toc;
25196       }
25197     }
25198 /*-- END BOOKMARKS --*/
25199 
25200     // Update Page Links
25201     if (count($this->PageLinks)) {
25202        $newarr = array();
25203        foreach($this->PageLinks as $i=>$o) {
25204       // mPDF 3.0 - Change links to page numbers (@) used by Index
25205       foreach($this->PageLinks[$i] as $key => $pl) {
25206         if (strpos($pl[4],'@')===0) {
25207           $p=substr($pl[4],1);
25208           if($p>=$start_page && $p<=$end_page) {
25209             $this->PageLinks[$i][$key][4] = '@'.($p + ($target_page - $start_page));
25210           }
25211           else if($p>=$target_page && $p<$start_page) {
25212             $this->PageLinks[$i][$key][4] = '@'.($p+$n_toc);
25213           }
25214         }
25215       }
25216       if($i>=$start_page && $i<=$end_page) {
25217         $newarr[($i + ($target_page - $start_page))] = $this->PageLinks[$i];
25218       }
25219       else if($i>=$target_page && $i<$start_page) {
25220         $newarr[($i + $n_toc)] = $this->PageLinks[$i];
25221       }
25222       else {
25223         $newarr[$i] = $this->PageLinks[$i];
25224       }
25225        }
25226        $this->PageLinks = $newarr;
25227     }
25228 
25229     // OrientationChanges
25230     if (count($this->OrientationChanges)) {
25231       $newarr = array();
25232       foreach($this->OrientationChanges AS $p=>$v) {
25233         if($p>=$start_page && $p<=$end_page) { $newarr[($p + ($target_page - $start_page))] = $this->OrientationChanges[$p]; }
25234         else if($p>=$target_page && $p<$start_page) { $newarr[$p+$n_toc] = $this->OrientationChanges[$p]; }
25235         else { $newarr[$p] = $this->OrientationChanges[$p]; }
25236       }
25237       ksort($newarr);
25238       $this->OrientationChanges = $newarr;
25239     }
25240 
25241     // Page Dimensions
25242     if (count($this->pageDim)) {
25243       $newarr = array();
25244       foreach($this->pageDim AS $p=>$v) {
25245         if($p>=$start_page && $p<=$end_page) { $newarr[($p + ($target_page - $start_page))] = $this->pageDim[$p]; }
25246         else if($p>=$target_page && $p<$start_page) { $newarr[$p+$n_toc] = $this->pageDim[$p]; }
25247         else { $newarr[$p] = $this->pageDim[$p]; }
25248       }
25249       ksort($newarr);
25250       $this->pageDim = $newarr;
25251     }
25252 
25253     // mPDF 4.0
25254     // HTML Headers & Footers
25255     if (count($this->saveHTMLHeader)) {
25256       $newarr = array();
25257       foreach($this->saveHTMLHeader AS $p=>$v) {
25258         if($p>=$start_page && $p<=$end_page) { $newarr[($p + ($target_page - $start_page))] = $this->saveHTMLHeader[$p]; }
25259         else if($p>=$target_page && $p<$start_page) { $newarr[$p+$n_toc] = $this->saveHTMLHeader[$p]; }
25260         else { $newarr[$p] = $this->saveHTMLHeader[$p]; }
25261       }
25262       ksort($newarr);
25263       $this->saveHTMLHeader = $newarr;
25264     }
25265     if (count($this->saveHTMLFooter)) {
25266       $newarr = array();
25267       foreach($this->saveHTMLFooter AS $p=>$v) {
25268         if($p>=$start_page && $p<=$end_page) { $newarr[($p + ($target_page - $start_page))] = $this->saveHTMLFooter[$p]; }
25269         else if($p>=$target_page && $p<$start_page) { $newarr[$p+$n_toc] = $this->saveHTMLFooter[$p]; }
25270         else { $newarr[$p] = $this->saveHTMLFooter[$p]; }
25271       }
25272       ksort($newarr);
25273       $this->saveHTMLFooter = $newarr;
25274     }
25275 
25276     // Update Internal Links
25277     if (count($this->internallink)) {
25278        foreach($this->internallink as $key=>$o) {
25279       if($o['PAGE']>=$start_page && $o['PAGE']<=$end_page) {
25280         $this->internallink[$key]['PAGE'] += ($target_page - $start_page);
25281       }
25282       else if($o['PAGE']>=$target_page && $o['PAGE']<$start_page) {
25283         $this->internallink[$key]['PAGE'] += $n_toc;
25284       }
25285        }
25286     }
25287 
25288     // Update Links
25289     if (count($this->links)) {
25290        foreach($this->links as $key=>$o) {
25291       if($o[0]>=$start_page && $o[0]<=$end_page) {
25292         $this->links[$key][0] += ($target_page - $start_page);
25293       }
25294       if($o[0]>=$target_page && $o[0]<$start_page) {
25295         $this->links[$key][0] += $n_toc;
25296       }
25297        }
25298     }
25299 
25300 /*-- ANNOTATIONS --*/
25301     // Update Annotations
25302     if (count($this->PageAnnots)) {
25303        $newarr = array();
25304        foreach($this->PageAnnots as $p=>$anno) {
25305       if($p>=$start_page && $p<=$end_page) {
25306         $np = $p + ($target_page - $start_page);
25307         foreach($anno as $o) {
25308           $newarr[$np][] = $o;
25309         }
25310       }
25311       else if($p>=$target_page && $p<$start_page) {
25312         $np = $p + $n_toc;
25313         foreach($anno as $o) {
25314           $newarr[$np][] = $o;
25315         }
25316           }
25317       else {
25318         $newarr[$p] = $this->PageAnnots[$p];
25319       }
25320        }
25321        $this->PageAnnots = $newarr;
25322        unset($newarr);
25323     }
25324 /*-- END ANNOTATIONS --*/
25325 
25326     // Update PageNumSubstitutions
25327     if (count($this->PageNumSubstitutions)) {
25328       $newarr = array();
25329       foreach($this->PageNumSubstitutions AS $k=>$v) {
25330         if($this->PageNumSubstitutions[$k]['from']>=$start_page && $this->PageNumSubstitutions[$k]['from']<=$end_page) { 
25331           $this->PageNumSubstitutions[$k]['from'] += ($target_page - $start_page); 
25332           $newarr[$this->PageNumSubstitutions[$k]['from']] = $this->PageNumSubstitutions[$k]; 
25333         }
25334         else if($this->PageNumSubstitutions[$k]['from']>=$target_page && $this->PageNumSubstitutions[$k]['from']<$start_page) {
25335           $this->PageNumSubstitutions[$k]['from'] += $n_toc;
25336           $newarr[$this->PageNumSubstitutions[$k]['from']] = $this->PageNumSubstitutions[$k]; 
25337         }
25338         else {
25339           $newarr[$this->PageNumSubstitutions[$k]['from']] = $this->PageNumSubstitutions[$k]; 
25340         }
25341       }
25342 
25343       if (!$sp_present) {
25344           $newarr[$target_page] = array('from'=>$target_page, 'suppress'=>$sp_suppress, 'reset'=>$sp_reset, 'type'=>$sp_type); 
25345       }
25346       if (!$tp_present) {
25347           $newarr[($target_page + $n_toc)] = array('from'=>($target_page+$n_toc), 'suppress'=>$tp_suppress, 'reset'=>$tp_reset, 'type'=>$tp_type); 
25348       }
25349       if (!$ep_present && $end_page>count($this->pages)) {
25350           $newarr[($end_page+1)] = array('from'=>($end_page+1), 'suppress'=>$ep_suppress, 'reset'=>$ep_reset, 'type'=>$ep_type); 
25351       }
25352       ksort($newarr);
25353       $this->PageNumSubstitutions = array();
25354       foreach($newarr as $v) {
25355         $this->PageNumSubstitutions[] = $v;
25356       }
25357     }
25358 }
25359 
25360 /*-- END TOC --*/
25361 
25362 
25363 
25364 //======================================================
25365 /*-- INDEX --*/
25366 // FROM class PDF_Ref == INDEX
25367 
25368 function Reference($txt) {
25369   $this->IndexEntry($txt);
25370 }
25371 
25372 // mPDF 3.0
25373 function IndexEntry($txt, $xref='') {
25374   if ($xref) { 
25375     $this->IndexEntrySee($txt,$xref);
25376     return;
25377   }
25378   $txt = strip_tags($txt);
25379   $txt = $this->purify_utf8_text($txt);
25380   if ($this->text_input_as_HTML) {
25381     $txt = $this->all_entities_to_utf8($txt);
25382   }
25383   if (!$this->is_MB) { $txt = mb_convert_encoding($txt,$this->mb_enc,'UTF-8'); }
25384 
25385   $Present=0;
25386   $size=sizeof($this->Reference);
25387 
25388   if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { // *RTL*
25389     $txt = str_replace(':',' - ',$txt); // *RTL*
25390   } // *RTL*
25391   else {  // *RTL*
25392     $txt = str_replace(':',', ',$txt);
25393   } // *RTL*
25394 
25395 
25396   //Search the reference (AND Ref/PageNo) in the array
25397   for ($i=0;$i<$size;$i++){
25398     if ($this->keep_block_together) {
25399       if (isset($this->ktReference[$i]['t']) && $this->ktReference[$i]['t']==$txt){
25400         $Present=1;
25401         if (!in_array($this->page,$this->ktReference[$i]['p'])) {
25402           $this->ktReference[$i]['op'] = $this->page;
25403         }
25404       }
25405     }
25406 /*-- TABLES --*/
25407     else if ($this->table_rotate) {
25408       if (isset($this->tbrot_Reference[$i]['t']) && $this->tbrot_Reference[$i]['t']==$txt){
25409         $Present=1;
25410         if (!in_array($this->page,$this->tbrot_Reference[$i]['p'])) {
25411           $this->tbrot_Reference[$i]['op'] = $this->page;
25412         }
25413       }
25414     }
25415     // mPDF 3.0
25416     else if ($this->kwt) {
25417       if (isset($this->kwt_Reference[$i]['t']) && $this->kwt_Reference[$i]['t']==$txt){
25418         $Present=1;
25419         if (!in_array($this->page,$this->kwt_Reference[$i]['p'])) {
25420           $this->kwt_Reference[$i]['op'] = $this->page;
25421         }
25422       }
25423     }
25424 /*-- END TABLES --*/
25425 /*-- COLUMNS --*/
25426     // mPDF 3.0
25427     else if ($this->ColActive) {
25428       if (isset($this->col_Reference[$i]['t']) && $this->col_Reference[$i]['t']==$txt){
25429         $Present=1;
25430         if (!in_array($this->page,$this->col_Reference[$i]['p'])) {
25431           $this->col_Reference[$i]['op'] = $this->page;
25432         }
25433       }
25434     }
25435 /*-- END COLUMNS --*/
25436     else {
25437       if (isset($this->Reference[$i]['t']) && $this->Reference[$i]['t']==$txt){
25438         $Present=1;
25439         if (!in_array($this->page,$this->Reference[$i]['p'])) {
25440           $this->Reference[$i]['p'][] = $this->page;
25441         }
25442       }
25443     }
25444   }
25445   //If not found, add it
25446   if ($Present==0) {
25447     if ($this->keep_block_together) {
25448       $this->ktReference[]=array('t'=>$txt, 'op'=>$this->page);
25449     }
25450 /*-- TABLES --*/
25451     else if ($this->table_rotate) {
25452       $this->tbrot_Reference[]=array('t'=>$txt, 'op'=>$this->page);
25453     }
25454     else if ($this->kwt) {
25455       $this->kwt_Reference[]=array('t'=>$txt, 'op'=>$this->page);
25456     }
25457 /*-- END TABLES --*/
25458 /*-- COLUMNS --*/
25459     else if ($this->ColActive) {
25460       $this->col_Reference[]=array('t'=>$txt, 'op'=>$this->page);
25461     }
25462 /*-- END COLUMNS --*/
25463     else {
25464       $this->Reference[]=array('t'=>$txt,'p'=>array($this->page));
25465     }
25466   }
25467 }
25468 
25469 // Added function to add a reference "Elephants. See Chickens"
25470 function ReferenceSee($txta,$txtb) {
25471   $this->IndexEntrySee($txta,$txtb);
25472 }
25473 
25474 function IndexEntrySee($txta,$txtb) {
25475   $txta = strip_tags($txta);
25476   $txtb = strip_tags($txtb);
25477   $txta = $this->purify_utf8_text($txta);
25478   $txtb = $this->purify_utf8_text($txtb);
25479   if ($this->text_input_as_HTML) {
25480     $txta = $this->all_entities_to_utf8($txta);
25481     $txtb = $this->all_entities_to_utf8($txtb);
25482   }
25483   if (!$this->is_MB) { 
25484     $txta = mb_convert_encoding($txta,$this->mb_enc,'UTF-8'); 
25485     $txtb = mb_convert_encoding($txtb,$this->mb_enc,'UTF-8'); 
25486   }
25487   if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { // *RTL*
25488     $txta = str_replace(':',' - ',$txta); // *RTL*
25489     $txtb = str_replace(':',' - ',$txtb); // *RTL*
25490   } // *RTL*
25491   else {  // *RTL*
25492     $txta = str_replace(':',', ',$txta);
25493     $txtb = str_replace(':',', ',$txtb);
25494   } // *RTL*
25495   $this->Reference[]=array('t'=>$txta.' - see '.$txtb,'p'=>array());  // mPDF 3.0
25496 }
25497 
25498 function CreateReference($NbCol=1, $reffontsize='', $linespacing='', $offset=3, $usedivletters=1, $divlettfontsize='', $gap=5, $reffont='',$divlettfont='', $useLinking=false) {
25499   $this->CreateIndex($NbCol, $reffontsize, $linespacing, $offset, $usedivletters, $divlettfontsize, $gap, $reffont, $divlettfont, $useLinking);
25500 }
25501 
25502 function CreateIndex($NbCol=1, $reffontsize='', $linespacing='', $offset=3, $usedivletters=1, $divlettfontsize='', $gap=5, $reffont='',$divlettfont='', $useLinking=false) {
25503   if (!$reffontsize) { $reffontsize = $this->default_font_size; }
25504   if (!$divlettfontsize) { $divlettfontsize = ($this->default_font_size * 1.8); }
25505   if (!$reffont) { $reffont = $this->default_font; }
25506   if (!$divlettfont) { $divlettfont = $reffont; }
25507   if (!$linespacing) { $linespacing= $this->default_lineheight_correction; }  // mPDF 3.0
25508   if ($this->ColActive) { $this->SetColumns(0); } // *COLUMNS*
25509   $size=sizeof($this->Reference);
25510   if ($size == 0) { return false; }
25511 
25512 
25513   if ($NbCol<2) { 
25514     $NbCol = 1; 
25515     $colWidth = $this->pgwidth;
25516   }
25517   else { 
25518     $this->SetColumns($NbCol,'',$gap); 
25519     $colWidth = $this->ColWidth;
25520   }
25521   if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { $align = 'R'; }
25522   else { $align = 'L'; }
25523   $lett = '';
25524   function cmp ($a, $b) {
25525       return strnatcmp(strtolower($a['t']), strtolower($b['t']));
25526   }
25527   //Alphabetic sort of the references
25528   usort($this->Reference, 'cmp');
25529   $size=sizeof($this->Reference);
25530   $this->breakpoints[$this->CurrCol][] = $this->y;  // *COLUMNS*
25531 
25532   // mPDF 3.0 - Prevent break after Dividing letter
25533   $divlettjuststarted = false;
25534 
25535   // mPDF 3.0
25536   $this->OpenTag('DIV',array('STYLE'=>'line-height: '.$linespacing.'; font-family: '.$reffont.'; font-size: '.$reffontsize.'pt; '));
25537 
25538   // mPDF 3.0
25539   $last_lett = '';
25540   for ($i=0;$i<$size;$i++){
25541       if ($this->Reference[$i]['t']) { 
25542       if ($usedivletters) {
25543          // mPDF 4.0
25544          $lett = mb_strtoupper(mb_substr($this->Reference[$i]['t'],0,1,$this->mb_enc ),$this->mb_enc );
25545          if ($lett != $last_lett) {
25546 
25547         // mPDF 3.0 - Prevent break after Dividing letter
25548         $save_bp = $this->breakpoints[$this->CurrCol];  // *COLUMNS*
25549         $divlettjuststarted = true;
25550 
25551         if ($i>0) { 
25552           $this->OpenTag('DIV',array('STYLE'=>'line-height: '.$linespacing.'; font-family: '.$divlettfont.'; font-size: '.$divlettfontsize.'pt; font-weight: bold; page-break-after: avoid; margin-top: 0.5em; margin-collapse: collapse; '));
25553         }
25554         else { 
25555           $this->OpenTag('DIV',array('STYLE'=>'line-height: '.$linespacing.'; font-family: '.$divlettfont.'; font-size: '.$divlettfontsize.'pt; font-weight: bold; page-break-after: avoid; '));
25556         }
25557         $this->textbuffer[] = array($lett,'',$this->currentfontstyle,$this->colorarray,$this->currentfontfamily,$this->SUP,$this->SUB,'',$this->strike,$this->outlineparam,$this->spanbgcolorarray,$this->currentfontsize,$this->ReqFontStyle);
25558         $this->CloseTag('DIV');
25559          }
25560       }
25561 
25562       $this->OpenTag('DIV',array('STYLE'=>'text-indent: -'.$offset.'mm; line-height: '.$linespacing.'; font-family: '.$reffont.'; font-size: '.$reffontsize.'pt; '));
25563 
25564 /*-- RTL --*/
25565       // mPDF 3.0 // Change Arabic + Persian. to Presentation Forms
25566         if (($this->directionality == 'rtl') || (($this->directionality == 'ltr') && ($this->biDirectional)))  { 
25567         // mPDF 4.0 Remove rtlAsArabicFarsi
25568         $this->Reference[$i]['t'] = preg_replace("/([".$this->pregRTLchars."]+)/ue", '$this->ArabJoin(stripslashes(\'\\1\'))', $this->Reference[$i]['t'] );
25569       }
25570 /*-- END RTL --*/
25571 
25572       // mPDF 4.0 Font-specific ligature substitution for Indic fonts
25573       $this->ConvertIndic($this->Reference[$i]['t']); // *INDIC*
25574 
25575       $this->textbuffer[] = array($this->Reference[$i]['t'], '',$this->currentfontstyle,$this->colorarray,$this->currentfontfamily,$this->SUP,$this->SUB,'',$this->strike,$this->outlineparam,$this->spanbgcolorarray,$this->currentfontsize,$this->ReqFontStyle);
25576       $ppp = $this->Reference[$i]['p']; // = array of page numbers to point to
25577       if (count($ppp)) { 
25578        sort($ppp);
25579        $newarr = array();
25580        $range_start = $ppp[0];
25581        $range_end = 0;
25582 
25583        if ($this->is_MB) { $spacer = "\xc2\xa0 "; }
25584        else { $spacer = chr(160).' '; }
25585        $this->textbuffer[] = array($spacer, '',$this->currentfontstyle,$this->colorarray,$this->currentfontfamily,$this->SUP,$this->SUB,'',$this->strike,$this->outlineparam,$this->spanbgcolorarray,$this->currentfontsize,$this->ReqFontStyle);
25586        if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { $sep = '.'; $joiner = '-'; }
25587        else { $sep = ', '; $joiner = '-'; }
25588        for ($zi=1;$zi<count($ppp);$zi++) {
25589         // RTL - Each number separately 
25590           if (($this->directionality == 'rtl') || (($this->directionality == 'ltr') && ($this->biDirectional)))  { 
25591 /*-- RTL --*/
25592         if ($zi<count($ppp)-1) {
25593           $txt =  $sep . $this->docPageNum($ppp[$zi]);
25594           if ($useLinking) { $href = '@'.$ppp[$zi]; } 
25595           else { $href = ''; }
25596           $this->textbuffer[] = array($txt, $href,$this->currentfontstyle,$this->colorarray,$this->currentfontfamily,$this->SUP,$this->SUB,'',$this->strike,$this->outlineparam,$this->spanbgcolorarray,$this->currentfontsize,$this->ReqFontStyle); 
25597         }
25598 /*-- END RTL --*/
25599         }
25600 
25601         else if ($ppp[$zi] == ($ppp[($zi-1)]+1)) {
25602         $range_end = $ppp[$zi];
25603         }
25604         else {
25605         if ($range_end) {
25606           if ($range_end == $range_start+1) { 
25607             if ($useLinking) { $href = '@'.$range_start; } 
25608             else { $href = ''; }
25609             $txt = $this->docPageNum($range_start) . $sep;
25610             $this->textbuffer[] = array($txt, $href,$this->currentfontstyle,$this->colorarray,$this->currentfontfamily,$this->SUP,$this->SUB,'',$this->strike,$this->outlineparam,$this->spanbgcolorarray,$this->currentfontsize,$this->ReqFontStyle); 
25611             if ($useLinking) { $href = '@'.$ppp[$zi-1]; } 
25612             else { $href = ''; }
25613             $txt = $this->docPageNum($ppp[$zi-1]) . $sep;
25614             $this->textbuffer[] = array($txt, $href,$this->currentfontstyle,$this->colorarray,$this->currentfontfamily,$this->SUP,$this->SUB,'',$this->strike,$this->outlineparam,$this->spanbgcolorarray,$this->currentfontsize,$this->ReqFontStyle); 
25615           }
25616           else { 
25617             if ($useLinking) { $href = '@'.$range_start; } 
25618             else { $href = ''; }
25619           }
25620         }
25621         else {
25622           if ($useLinking) { $href = '@'.$ppp[$zi-1]; } 
25623           else { $href = ''; }
25624           $txt = $this->docPageNum($ppp[$zi-1]) . $sep;
25625           $this->textbuffer[] = array($txt, $href,$this->currentfontstyle,$this->colorarray,$this->currentfontfamily,$this->SUP,$this->SUB,'',$this->strike,$this->outlineparam,$this->spanbgcolorarray,$this->currentfontsize,$this->ReqFontStyle);
25626         }
25627         $range_start = $ppp[$zi];
25628         $range_end = 0;
25629         }
25630        }
25631 
25632        if ($range_end) {
25633         if ($range_end == $range_start+1) { 
25634           if ($useLinking) { $href = '@'.$range_start; } 
25635           else { $href = ''; }
25636           $txt = $this->docPageNum($range_start) . $sep;
25637           $this->textbuffer[] = array($txt, $href,$this->currentfontstyle,$this->colorarray,$this->currentfontfamily,$this->SUP,$this->SUB,'',$this->strike,$this->outlineparam,$this->spanbgcolorarray,$this->currentfontsize,$this->ReqFontStyle); 
25638           if ($useLinking) { $href = '@'.$range_end; } 
25639           else { $href = ''; }
25640           $txt = $this->docPageNum($range_end);
25641           $this->textbuffer[] = array($txt, $href,$this->currentfontstyle,$this->colorarray,$this->currentfontfamily,$this->SUP,$this->SUB,'',$this->strike,$this->outlineparam,$this->spanbgcolorarray,$this->currentfontsize,$this->ReqFontStyle); 
25642         }
25643         else {
25644           if ($useLinking) { $href = '@'.$range_start; } 
25645           else { $href = ''; }
25646           $txt = $this->docPageNum($range_start) . $joiner;
25647           $this->textbuffer[] = array($txt, $href,$this->currentfontstyle,$this->colorarray,$this->currentfontfamily,$this->SUP,$this->SUB,'',$this->strike,$this->outlineparam,$this->spanbgcolorarray,$this->currentfontsize,$this->ReqFontStyle); 
25648           if ($useLinking) { $href = '@'.$range_end; } 
25649           else { $href = ''; }
25650           $txt = $this->docPageNum($range_end);
25651           $this->textbuffer[] = array($txt, $href,$this->currentfontstyle,$this->colorarray,$this->currentfontfamily,$this->SUP,$this->SUB,'',$this->strike,$this->outlineparam,$this->spanbgcolorarray,$this->currentfontsize,$this->ReqFontStyle); 
25652         }
25653        }
25654        else {
25655         if ($useLinking) { $href = '@'.$ppp[(count($ppp)-1)]; } 
25656         else { $href = ''; }
25657         $txt = $this->docPageNum($ppp[(count($ppp)-1)]);
25658         $this->textbuffer[] = array($txt, $href,$this->currentfontstyle,$this->colorarray,$this->currentfontfamily,$this->SUP,$this->SUB,'',$this->strike,$this->outlineparam,$this->spanbgcolorarray,$this->currentfontsize,$this->ReqFontStyle);
25659        }
25660       }
25661     }
25662     $this->CloseTag('DIV');
25663 
25664     if ($divlettjuststarted) { $this->breakpoints[$this->CurrCol] = $save_bp; }   // *COLUMNS*
25665     $divlettjuststarted = false;
25666 
25667     $this->breakpoints[$this->CurrCol][] = $this->y;  // *COLUMNS*
25668     $last_lett = $lett;
25669   }
25670   $this->CloseTag('DIV');
25671   $this->breakpoints[$this->CurrCol][] = $this->y;  // *COLUMNS*
25672   if ($this->ColActive) { $this->SetColumns(0);  }  // *COLUMNS*
25673 }
25674 /*-- END INDEX --*/
25675 
25676 
25677 function AcceptPageBreak() {
25678   if (count($this->cellBorderBuffer)) { $this->printcellbuffer(); } // *TABLES*
25679 /*-- COLUMNS --*/
25680   if ($this->ColActive==1) {
25681       if($this->CurrCol<$this->NbCol-1) {
25682           //Go to the next column
25683     $this->CurrCol++;
25684         $this->SetCol($this->CurrCol);
25685     $this->y=$this->y0;
25686         $this->ChangeColumn=1;  // Number (and direction) of columns changed +1, +2, -2 etc.
25687     // DIRECTIONALITY RTL
25688     if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { $this->ChangeColumn = -($this->ChangeColumn); } // *RTL*
25689  
25690         //Stay on the page
25691           return false;
25692      }
25693      else {
25694         //Go back to the first column - NEW PAGE
25695     if (count($this->columnbuffer)) { $this->printcolumnbuffer(); }
25696     $this->SetCol(0);
25697           $this->ChangePage=1;
25698     $this->y0 = $this->tMargin;
25699           $this->ChangeColumn= -($this->NbCol-1);
25700     // DIRECTIONALITY RTL
25701     if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { $this->ChangeColumn = -($this->ChangeColumn); } // *RTL*
25702           //Page break
25703         return true;
25704      }
25705   }
25706 /*-- END COLUMNS --*/
25707 /*-- TABLES --*/
25708   else if ($this->table_rotate) {
25709     if (count($this->tablebuffer)) { $this->printtablebuffer(); }
25710     return true;
25711   }
25712 /*-- END TABLES --*/
25713   else {  // *COLUMNS*
25714           $this->ChangeColumn=0;
25715     return $this->autoPageBreak;  // mPDF 3.0
25716   } // *COLUMNS*
25717   return $this->autoPageBreak;  // mPDF 3.0
25718 }
25719 
25720 
25721 //----------- COLUMNS ---------------------
25722 /*-- COLUMNS --*/
25723 
25724 function SetColumns($NbCol,$vAlign='',$gap=5) {
25725 // NbCol = number of columns
25726 // CurrCol = Number of the current column starting at 0
25727 // Called externally to set columns on/off and number
25728 // Integer 2 upwards sets columns on to that number
25729 // Anything less than 2 turns columns off
25730   if ($NbCol<2) { // SET COLUMNS OFF
25731     if ($this->ColActive) { 
25732       $this->ColActive=0;
25733       if (count($this->columnbuffer)) { $this->printcolumnbuffer(); }
25734       $this->NbCol=1;
25735       $this->ResetMargins(); 
25736       $this->pgwidth = $this->w - $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin;
25737       $this->divwidth = 0;
25738       $this->Ln(); 
25739     }
25740     $this->ColActive=0;
25741     $this->columnbuffer = array();
25742     $this->ColDetails = array();
25743     $this->columnLinks = array();
25744     $this->columnAnnots = array();
25745     // mPDF 3.0
25746     $this->col_Reference = array();
25747     $this->col_BMoutlines = array();
25748     $this->col_toc = array();
25749     $this->breakpoints = array();
25750   }
25751   else {  // SET COLUMNS ON
25752     if ($this->ColActive) { 
25753       $this->ColActive=0;
25754       if (count($this->columnbuffer)) { $this->printcolumnbuffer(); }
25755       $this->ResetMargins(); 
25756     }
25757     // mPDF 4.0
25758     if (isset($this->y) && $this->y>$this->tMargin) $this->Ln();
25759     $this->NbCol=$NbCol;
25760     $this->ColGap = $gap;
25761     $this->divwidth = 0;
25762     $this->ColActive=1;
25763     $this->ColumnAdjust = true; // enables column height adjustment for the page
25764     $this->columnbuffer = array();
25765     $this->ColDetails = array();
25766     $this->columnLinks = array();
25767     $this->columnAnnots = array();
25768     // mPDF 3.0
25769     $this->col_Reference = array();
25770     $this->col_BMoutlines = array();
25771     $this->col_toc = array();
25772     $this->breakpoints = array();
25773     if ((strtoupper($vAlign) == 'J') || (strtoupper($vAlign) == 'JUSTIFY')) { $vAlign = 'J'; } 
25774     else { $vAlign = ''; }
25775     $this->colvAlign = $vAlign;
25776     //Save the ordinate
25777     $absL = $this->DeflMargin-($gap/2);
25778     $absR = $this->DefrMargin-($gap/2);
25779     $PageWidth = $this->w-$absL-$absR;  // virtual pagewidth for calculation only
25780     $ColWidth = (($PageWidth - ($gap * ($NbCol)))/$NbCol);
25781     $this->ColWidth = $ColWidth;
25782 /*-- RTL --*/
25783 
25784     if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { 
25785       for ($i=0;$i<$this->NbCol;$i++) {
25786         $this->ColL[$i] = $absL + ($gap/2) + (($NbCol - ($i+1))*($PageWidth/$NbCol)) ;
25787         $this->ColR[$i] = $this->ColL[$i] + $ColWidth;  // NB This is not R margin -> R pos
25788       }
25789     } 
25790     else { 
25791 /*-- END RTL --*/
25792       for ($i=0;$i<$this->NbCol;$i++) {
25793         $this->ColL[$i] = $absL + ($gap/2) + ($i* ($PageWidth/$NbCol)   );
25794         $this->ColR[$i] = $this->ColL[$i] + $ColWidth;  // NB This is not R margin -> R pos
25795       }
25796     } // *RTL*
25797     $this->pgwidth = $ColWidth;
25798     $this->SetCol(0);
25799     $this->y0=$this->GetY();
25800   }
25801   $this->x = $this->lMargin;
25802 }
25803 
25804 function SetCol($CurrCol) {
25805 // Used internally to set column by number 0 is 1st column
25806   //Set position on a column
25807   $this->CurrCol=$CurrCol;
25808   $x = $this->ColL[$CurrCol];
25809   $xR = $this->ColR[$CurrCol];  // NB This is not R margin -> R pos
25810   if (($this->mirrorMargins) && (($this->page)%2==0)) { // EVEN
25811     $x += $this->MarginCorrection ;
25812     $xR += $this->MarginCorrection ;
25813   }
25814   $this->SetMargins($x,($this->w - $xR),$this->tMargin);
25815 }
25816 
25817 function AddColumn() {
25818   $this->NewColumn();
25819   $this->ColumnAdjust = false;  // disables all column height adjustment for the page.
25820 }
25821 function NewColumn() {
25822   if ($this->ColActive==1) {
25823       if($this->CurrCol<$this->NbCol-1) {
25824           //Go to the next column
25825     $this->CurrCol++;
25826           $this->SetCol($this->CurrCol);
25827           $this->y = $this->y0;
25828           $this->ChangeColumn=1;
25829     // DIRECTIONALITY RTL
25830     if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { $this->ChangeColumn = -($this->ChangeColumn); } // *RTL*
25831           //Stay on the page
25832         }
25833         else {
25834         //Go back to the first column
25835           //Page break
25836     if (count($this->columnbuffer)) { $this->printcolumnbuffer(); }
25837     $this->AddPage($this->CurOrientation);
25838     $this->SetCol(0);
25839           $this->ChangePage=1;
25840     $this->y0 = $this->tMargin;
25841           $this->ChangeColumn= -($this->NbCol-1);
25842     // DIRECTIONALITY RTL
25843     if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { $this->ChangeColumn = -($this->ChangeColumn); } // *RTL*
25844         }
25845     $this->x = $this->lMargin;
25846   }
25847   else {
25848     $this->AddPage($this->CurOrientation);
25849   }
25850 }
25851 
25852 // mPDF 3.0 - Rewritten
25853 function printcolumnbuffer() {
25854    $k = $this->k;
25855    // Columns ended (but page not ended) -> try to match all columns - unless disabled by using a custom column-break
25856    if (!$this->ColActive && $this->ColumnAdjust && !$this->keepColumns) {
25857   // Calculate adjustment to add to each column to calculate rel_y value
25858   $this->ColDetails[0]['add_y'] = 0;
25859   $last_col = 0;
25860   // Recursively add previous column's height
25861   for($i=1;$i<$this->NbCol;$i++) { 
25862     if (isset($this->ColDetails[$i]['bottom_margin']) && $this->ColDetails[$i]['bottom_margin']) { // If any entries in the column
25863       $this->ColDetails[$i]['add_y'] = ($this->ColDetails[$i-1]['bottom_margin'] - $this->y0) + $this->ColDetails[$i-1]['add_y'];
25864       $last_col = $i;   // Last column actually printed
25865     }
25866   }
25867 
25868   // Calculate value for each position sensitive entry as though for one column
25869   foreach($this->columnbuffer AS $key=>$s) { 
25870     $t = $s['s'];
25871     if (preg_match('/BT \d+\.\d\d+ (\d+\.\d\d+) Td/',$t)) {
25872       $this->columnbuffer[$key]['rel_y'] = $s['y'] + $this->ColDetails[$s['col']]['add_y'] - $this->y0;
25873     }
25874     else if (preg_match('/\d+\.\d\d+ (\d+\.\d\d+) \d+\.\d\d+ [\-]{0,1}\d+\.\d\d+ re/',$t)) {
25875       $this->columnbuffer[$key]['rel_y'] = $s['y'] + $this->ColDetails[$s['col']]['add_y'] - $this->y0;
25876     }
25877     else if (preg_match('/\d+\.\d\d+ (\d+\.\d\d+) m/',$t)) {
25878       $this->columnbuffer[$key]['rel_y'] = $s['y'] + $this->ColDetails[$s['col']]['add_y'] - $this->y0;
25879     }
25880     else if (preg_match('/\d+\.\d\d+ (\d+\.\d\d+) l/',$t)) {
25881       $this->columnbuffer[$key]['rel_y'] = $s['y'] + $this->ColDetails[$s['col']]['add_y'] - $this->y0;
25882     }
25883     else if (preg_match('/q \d+\.\d\d+ 0 0 \d+\.\d\d+ \d+\.\d\d+ (\d+\.\d\d+) cm \/I\d+ Do Q/',$t)) {
25884       $this->columnbuffer[$key]['rel_y'] = $s['y'] + $this->ColDetails[$s['col']]['add_y'] - $this->y0;
25885     }
25886     else if (preg_match('/\d+\.\d\d+ (\d+\.\d\d+) \d+\.\d\d+ \d+\.\d\d+ \d+\.\d\d+ \d+\.\d\d+ c/',$t)) {
25887       $this->columnbuffer[$key]['rel_y'] = $s['y'] + $this->ColDetails[$s['col']]['add_y'] - $this->y0;
25888     }
25889   }
25890 
25891   $breaks = array();
25892   foreach($this->breakpoints AS $c => $bpa) { 
25893     foreach($bpa AS $rely) {
25894       $breaks[] = $rely + $this->ColDetails[$c]['add_y'] - $this->y0;
25895     }
25896   }
25897 
25898   if (isset($this->ColDetails[$last_col]['bottom_margin'])) { $lcbm = $this->ColDetails[$last_col]['bottom_margin']; }
25899   else { $lcbm = 0; }
25900   $sum_h = $this->ColDetails[$last_col]['add_y'] + $lcbm - $this->y0;
25901   //$sum_h = max($this->ColDetails[$last_col]['add_y'] + $this->ColDetails[$last_col]['bottom_margin'] - $this->y0, end($breaks));
25902   $target_h = ($sum_h / $this->NbCol);
25903 
25904   $cbr = array();
25905   for($i=1;$i<$this->NbCol;$i++) { 
25906     $th = ($sum_h * $i / $this->NbCol);
25907     foreach($breaks AS $bk=>$val) {
25908       if ($val > $th) {
25909         if (($val-$th) < ($th-$breaks[$bk-1])) { $cbr[$i-1] = $val; }
25910         else  { $cbr[$i-1] = $breaks[$bk-1]; }
25911         break;
25912       }
25913     }
25914   }
25915   $cbr[($this->NbCol-1)] = $sum_h;
25916 
25917   // Now update the columns - divide into columns of approximately equal value
25918   $last_new_col = 0; 
25919   $yadj = 0;  // mm
25920   $xadj = 0;
25921   $last_col_bottom = 0;
25922   $lowest_bottom_y = 0;
25923   $block_bottom = 0;
25924   $newcolumn = 0;
25925   foreach($this->columnbuffer AS $key=>$s) { 
25926     if (isset($s['rel_y'])) { // only process position sensitive data
25927     if ($s['rel_y'] >= $cbr[$newcolumn]) {
25928       $newcolumn++;
25929     }
25930     else {
25931       $newcolumn = $last_new_col ;
25932     }
25933 
25934 
25935     $block_bottom = max($block_bottom,($s['rel_y']+$s['h']));
25936 
25937     if ($this->directionality == 'rtl') { // *RTL*
25938       $xadj = -(($newcolumn - $s['col']) * ($this->ColWidth + $this->ColGap));  // *RTL*
25939     } // *RTL*
25940     else {  // *RTL*
25941       $xadj = ($newcolumn - $s['col']) * ($this->ColWidth + $this->ColGap);
25942     } // *RTL*
25943 
25944     if ($last_new_col != $newcolumn) {  // Added new column
25945       $last_col_bottom = $this->columnbuffer[$key]['rel_y'];
25946       $block_bottom = 0;
25947     }
25948     $yadj = ($s['rel_y'] - $s['y']) - ($last_col_bottom)+$this->y0;
25949     // callback function in htmltoolkit
25950     $t = $s['s'];
25951     $t = preg_replace('/BT (\d+\.\d\d+) (\d+\.\d\d+) Td/e',"\$this->columnAdjustAdd('Td',$k,$xadj,$yadj,'\\1','\\2')",$t);
25952     $t = preg_replace('/(\d+\.\d\d+) (\d+\.\d\d+) (\d+\.\d\d+) ([\-]{0,1}\d+\.\d\d+) re/e',"\$this->columnAdjustAdd('re',$k,$xadj,$yadj,'\\1','\\2','\\3','\\4')",$t);
25953     $t = preg_replace('/(\d+\.\d\d+) (\d+\.\d\d+) l/e',"\$this->columnAdjustAdd('l',$k,$xadj,$yadj,'\\1','\\2')",$t);
25954     $t = preg_replace('/q (\d+\.\d\d+) 0 0 (\d+\.\d\d+) (\d+\.\d\d+) (\d+\.\d\d+) cm \/I/e',"\$this->columnAdjustAdd('img',$k,$xadj,$yadj,'\\1','\\2','\\3','\\4')",$t);
25955     $t = preg_replace('/(\d+\.\d\d+) (\d+\.\d\d+) m/e',"\$this->columnAdjustAdd('draw',$k,$xadj,$yadj,'\\1','\\2')",$t);
25956     $t = preg_replace('/(\d+\.\d\d+) (\d+\.\d\d+) (\d+\.\d\d+) (\d+\.\d\d+) (\d+\.\d\d+) (\d+\.\d\d+) c/e',"\$this->columnAdjustAdd('bezier',$k,$xadj,$yadj,'\\1','\\2','\\3','\\4','\\5','\\6')",$t);
25957 
25958     $this->columnbuffer[$key]['s'] = $t;
25959     $this->columnbuffer[$key]['newcol'] = $newcolumn;
25960     $this->columnbuffer[$key]['newy'] = $s['y'] + $yadj;
25961     $last_new_col = $newcolumn;
25962     $clb = $s['y'] + $yadj + $s['h'] ;  // bottom_margin of current
25963     if ((isset($this->ColDetails[$newcolumn]['max_bottom']) && $clb > $this->ColDetails[$newcolumn]['max_bottom']) || (!isset($this->ColDetails[$newcolumn]['max_bottom']) && $clb)) { $this->ColDetails[$newcolumn]['max_bottom'] = $clb; }
25964     if ($clb > $lowest_bottom_y) { $lowest_bottom_y = $clb; }
25965     // Adjust LINKS
25966     if (isset($this->columnLinks[$s['col']][INTVAL($s['x'])][INTVAL($s['y'])])) {
25967       $ref = $this->columnLinks[$s['col']][INTVAL($s['x'])][INTVAL($s['y'])];
25968       $this->PageLinks[$this->page][$ref][0] += ($xadj*$k);
25969       $this->PageLinks[$this->page][$ref][1] -= ($yadj*$k);
25970     }
25971 /*-- ANNOTATIONS --*/
25972     if (isset($this->columnAnnots[$s['col']][INTVAL($s['x'])][INTVAL($s['y'])])) {
25973       $ref = $this->columnAnnots[$s['col']][INTVAL($s['x'])][INTVAL($s['y'])];
25974       if ($this->PageAnnots[$this->page][$ref]['x'] < 0) {
25975          $this->PageAnnots[$this->page][$ref]['x'] -= ($xadj);
25976       }
25977       else {
25978          $this->PageAnnots[$this->page][$ref]['x'] += ($xadj);
25979       }
25980       $this->PageAnnots[$this->page][$ref]['y'] += ($yadj); // unlike PageLinks, Page annots has y values from top in mm
25981     }
25982 /*-- END ANNOTATIONS --*/
25983     }
25984   }
25985 
25986 /*-- BOOKMARKS --*/
25987   // mPDF 3.0
25988   // Adjust Bookmarks
25989   foreach($this->col_BMoutlines AS $v) {
25990     $this->BMoutlines[]=array('t'=>$v['t'],'l'=>$v['l'],'y'=>$this->y0,'p'=>$v['p']);
25991   }
25992 /*-- END BOOKMARKS --*/
25993 
25994 /*-- INDEX --*/
25995   // mPDF 3.0
25996   // Adjust Reference (index)
25997   foreach($this->col_Reference AS $v) {
25998     $Present=0;
25999     //Search the reference (AND Ref/PageNo) in the array
26000     for ($i=0;$i<count($this->Reference);$i++){
26001       if ($this->Reference[$i]['t']==$v['t']){
26002         $Present=1;
26003         if (!in_array($v['op'],$this->Reference[$i]['p'])) {
26004           $this->Reference[$i]['p'][] = $v['op'];
26005         }
26006       }
26007     }
26008     if ($Present==0) {
26009       $this->Reference[]=array('t'=>$v['t'],'p'=>array($v['op']));
26010     }
26011   }
26012 /*-- END INDEX --*/
26013 
26014 /*-- TOC --*/
26015    // mPDF 3.0
26016    // Adjust ToC
26017    foreach($this->col_toc AS $v) {
26018     $this->_toc[]=array('t'=>$v['t'],'l'=>$v['l'],'p'=>$v['p'],'link'=>$v['link'],'toc_id'=>$v['toc_id']);
26019     $this->links[$v['link']][1] = $this->y0; 
26020    }
26021 /*-- END TOC --*/
26022 
26023   // Adjust column length to be equal
26024   if ($this->colvAlign == 'J') {
26025    foreach($this->columnbuffer AS $key=>$s) { 
26026      if (isset($s['rel_y'])) {  // only process position sensitive data
26027       // Set ratio to expand y values or heights
26028       if ($this->ColDetails[$s['newcol']]['max_bottom']) { 
26029     $ratio = ($lowest_bottom_y - ($this->y0)) / ($this->ColDetails[$s['newcol']]['max_bottom'] - ($this->y0));
26030       }
26031       else { $ratio = 1; }
26032       if (($ratio > 1) && ($ratio <= $this->max_colH_correction)) {
26033     $yadj = ($s['newy'] - $this->y0) * ($ratio - 1);
26034 
26035     // Adjust LINKS
26036     if (isset($this->columnLinks[$s['col']][INTVAL($s['x'])][INTVAL($s['y'])])) {
26037       $ref = $this->columnLinks[$s['col']][INTVAL($s['x'])][INTVAL($s['y'])];
26038       $this->PageLinks[$this->page][$ref][1] -= ($yadj*$k); // y value
26039       $this->PageLinks[$this->page][$ref][3] *= $ratio; // height
26040     }
26041 /*-- ANNOTATIONS --*/
26042     if (isset($this->columnAnnots[$s['col']][INTVAL($s['x'])][INTVAL($s['y'])])) {
26043       $ref = $this->columnAnnots[$s['col']][INTVAL($s['x'])][INTVAL($s['y'])];
26044       $this->PageAnnots[$this->page][$ref]['y'] += ($yadj);
26045     }
26046 /*-- END ANNOTATIONS --*/
26047       }
26048     }
26049    }
26050 
26051    $last_col = -1;
26052    $trans_on = false;
26053    foreach($this->columnbuffer AS $key=>$s) { 
26054     if (isset($s['rel_y'])) { // only process position sensitive data
26055       // Set ratio to expand y values or heights
26056       if (isset($this->ColDetails[$s['newcol']]['max_bottom']) && $this->ColDetails[$s['newcol']]['max_bottom']) { 
26057         $ratio = ($lowest_bottom_y - ($this->y0)) / ($this->ColDetails[$s['newcol']]['max_bottom'] - ($this->y0));
26058       }
26059       else { $ratio = 1; }
26060       if (($ratio > 1) && ($ratio <= $this->max_colH_correction)) {
26061         //Start Transformation
26062         $this->pages[$this->page] .= $this->StartTransform(true)."\n";
26063         $this->pages[$this->page] .= $this->transformScale(100, $ratio*100, $x='', $this->y0, true)."\n";
26064         $trans_on = true;
26065       }
26066     }
26067     // Now output the adjusted values
26068     $this->pages[$this->page] .= $s['s']."\n"; 
26069     if (isset($s['rel_y']) && ($ratio > 1) && ($ratio <= $this->max_colH_correction)) { // only process position sensitive data
26070       //Stop Transformation
26071       $this->pages[$this->page] .= $this->StopTransform(true)."\n";
26072     }
26073    }
26074   }
26075   else {  // if NOT $this->colvAlign == 'J' 
26076     // Now output the adjusted values
26077     foreach($this->columnbuffer AS $s) { $this->pages[$this->page] .= $s['s']."\n"; }
26078   }
26079   if ($lowest_bottom_y > 0) { $this->y = $lowest_bottom_y ; }
26080    }
26081 
26082    // Columns not ended but new page -> align columns (can leave the columns alone - just tidy up the height)
26083    else if ($this->colvAlign == 'J' && $this->ColumnAdjust && !$this->keepColumns)  {
26084 
26085   $k = $this->k;
26086   // calculate the lowest bottom margin
26087   $lowest_bottom_y = 0;
26088   foreach($this->columnbuffer AS $key=>$s) { 
26089      // Only process output data
26090      $t = $s['s'];
26091      if ((preg_match('/BT \d+\.\d\d+ (\d+\.\d\d+) Td/',$t)) || (preg_match('/\d+\.\d\d+ (\d+\.\d\d+) \d+\.\d\d+ [\-]{0,1}\d+\.\d\d+ re/',$t)) ||
26092     (preg_match('/\d+\.\d\d+ (\d+\.\d\d+) l/',$t)) || 
26093     (preg_match('/q \d+\.\d\d+ 0 0 \d+\.\d\d+ \d+\.\d\d+ (\d+\.\d\d+) cm \/I\d+ Do Q/',$t)) || 
26094     (preg_match('/\d+\.\d\d+ (\d+\.\d\d+) m/',$t)) || 
26095     (preg_match('/\d+\.\d\d+ (\d+\.\d\d+) \d+\.\d\d+ \d+\.\d\d+ \d+\.\d\d+ \d+\.\d\d+ c/',$t)) ) {
26096 
26097     $clb = $s['y'] + $s['h'];
26098     if ((isset($this->ColDetails[$s['col']]['max_bottom']) && $clb > $this->ColDetails[$s['col']]['max_bottom']) || !isset($this->ColDetails[$s['col']]['max_bottom'])) { $this->ColDetails[$s['col']]['max_bottom'] = $clb; }
26099     if ($clb > $lowest_bottom_y) { $lowest_bottom_y = $clb; }
26100     $this->columnbuffer[$key]['rel_y'] = $s['y']; // Marks position sensitive data to process later
26101      }
26102   }
26103   // Adjust column length equal
26104    foreach($this->columnbuffer AS $key=>$s) { 
26105       // Set ratio to expand y values or heights
26106       if (isset($this->ColDetails[$s['col']]['max_bottom']) && $this->ColDetails[$s['col']]['max_bottom']) { 
26107     $ratio = ($lowest_bottom_y - ($this->y0)) / ($this->ColDetails[$s['col']]['max_bottom'] - ($this->y0));
26108       }
26109       else { $ratio = 1; }
26110       if (($ratio > 1) && ($ratio <= $this->max_colH_correction)) {
26111     $yadj = ($s['y'] - $this->y0) * ($ratio - 1);
26112 
26113     // Adjust LINKS
26114     if (isset($s['rel_y'])) { // only process position sensitive data
26115        // otherwise triggers for all entries in column buffer (.e.g. formatting) and makes below adjustments more than once
26116        if (isset($this->columnLinks[$s['col']][INTVAL($s['x'])][INTVAL($s['y'])])) {
26117       $ref = $this->columnLinks[$s['col']][INTVAL($s['x'])][INTVAL($s['y'])];
26118       $this->PageLinks[$this->page][$ref][1] -= ($yadj*$k); // y value
26119       $this->PageLinks[$this->page][$ref][3] *= $ratio; // height
26120        }
26121 /*-- ANNOTATIONS --*/
26122        if (isset($this->columnAnnots[$s['col']][INTVAL($s['x'])][INTVAL($s['y'])])) {
26123       $ref = $this->columnAnnots[$s['col']][INTVAL($s['x'])][INTVAL($s['y'])];
26124       $this->PageAnnots[$this->page][$ref]['y'] += ($yadj);
26125        }
26126 /*-- END ANNOTATIONS --*/
26127     }
26128       }
26129    }
26130 
26131 /*-- BOOKMARKS --*/
26132   // mPDF 3.0
26133   // Adjust Bookmarks
26134   foreach($this->col_BMoutlines AS $v) {
26135     $this->BMoutlines[]=array('t'=>$v['t'],'l'=>$v['l'],'y'=>$this->y0,'p'=>$v['p']);
26136   }
26137 /*-- END BOOKMARKS --*/
26138 
26139 /*-- INDEX --*/
26140   // mPDF 3.0
26141   // Adjust Reference (index)
26142   foreach($this->col_Reference AS $v) {
26143     $Present=0;
26144     //Search the reference (AND Ref/PageNo) in the array
26145     for ($i=0;$i<count($this->Reference);$i++){
26146       if ($this->Reference[$i]['t']==$v['t']){
26147         $Present=1;
26148         if (!in_array($v['op'],$this->Reference[$i]['p'])) {
26149           $this->Reference[$i]['p'][] = $v['op'];
26150         }
26151       }
26152     }
26153     if ($Present==0) {
26154       $this->Reference[]=array('t'=>$v['t'],'p'=>array($v['op']));
26155     }
26156   }
26157 /*-- END INDEX --*/
26158 
26159 /*-- TOC --*/
26160    // mPDF 3.0
26161    // Adjust ToC
26162    foreach($this->col_toc AS $v) {
26163     $this->_toc[]=array('t'=>$v['t'],'l'=>$v['l'],'p'=>$v['p'],'link'=>$v['link'],'toc_id'=>$v['toc_id']);
26164     $this->links[$v['link']][1] = $this->y0; 
26165    }
26166 /*-- END TOC --*/
26167    foreach($this->columnbuffer AS $key=>$s) { 
26168     if (isset($s['rel_y'])) { // only process position sensitive data
26169       // Set ratio to expand y values or heights
26170       if ($this->ColDetails[$s['col']]['max_bottom']) { 
26171         $ratio = ($lowest_bottom_y - ($this->y0)) / ($this->ColDetails[$s['col']]['max_bottom'] - ($this->y0));
26172       }
26173       else { $ratio = 1; }
26174       if (($ratio > 1) && ($ratio <= $this->max_colH_correction)) {
26175         //Start Transformation
26176         $this->pages[$this->page] .= $this->StartTransform(true)."\n";
26177         $this->pages[$this->page] .= $this->transformScale(100, $ratio*100, $x='', $this->y0, true)."\n";
26178       }
26179     }
26180     // Now output the adjusted values
26181     $this->pages[$this->page] .= $s['s']."\n"; 
26182     if (isset($s['rel_y']) && ($ratio > 1) && ($ratio <= $this->max_colH_correction)) {
26183       //Stop Transformation
26184       $this->pages[$this->page] .= $this->StopTransform(true)."\n";
26185     }
26186    }
26187 
26188   if ($lowest_bottom_y > 0) { $this->y = $lowest_bottom_y ; } 
26189    }
26190 
26191 
26192    // Just reproduce the page as it was
26193    else {
26194   // If page has not ended but height adjustment was disabled by custom column-break - adjust y
26195   $k = $this->k;
26196   $lowest_bottom_y = 0;
26197 //  if ((!$this->ColumnAdjust && !$this->ColActive) || $this->keepColumns) {
26198   if (!$this->ColActive && (!$this->ColumnAdjust || $this->keepColumns)) {
26199     // calculate the lowest bottom margin
26200     foreach($this->columnbuffer AS $key=>$s) { 
26201        // Only process output data
26202        $t = $s['s'];
26203        if ((preg_match('/BT \d+\.\d\d+ (\d+\.\d\d+) Td/',$t)) || (preg_match('/\d+\.\d\d+ (\d+\.\d\d+) \d+\.\d\d+ [\-]{0,1}\d+\.\d\d+ re/',$t)) ||
26204       (preg_match('/\d+\.\d\d+ (\d+\.\d\d+) l/',$t)) || 
26205       (preg_match('/q \d+\.\d\d+ 0 0 \d+\.\d\d+ \d+\.\d\d+ (\d+\.\d\d+) cm \/I\d+ Do Q/',$t)) || 
26206       (preg_match('/\d+\.\d\d+ (\d+\.\d\d+) m/',$t)) || 
26207       (preg_match('/\d+\.\d\d+ (\d+\.\d\d+) \d+\.\d\d+ \d+\.\d\d+ \d+\.\d\d+ \d+\.\d\d+ c/',$t)) ) {
26208 
26209       $clb = $s['y'] + $s['h'];
26210       if ($clb > $this->ColDetails[$s['col']]['max_bottom']) { $this->ColDetails[$s['col']]['max_bottom'] = $clb; }
26211       if ($clb > $lowest_bottom_y) { $lowest_bottom_y = $clb; }
26212        }
26213     }
26214   }
26215   foreach($this->columnbuffer AS $s) { $this->pages[$this->page] .= $s['s']."\n"; }
26216   if ($lowest_bottom_y > 0) { $this->y = $lowest_bottom_y ; } 
26217 
26218 /*-- INDEX --*/
26219   // mPDF 3.0
26220   // Output Reference (index)
26221   foreach($this->col_Reference AS $v) {
26222     $Present=0;
26223     for ($i=0;$i<count($this->Reference);$i++){
26224       if ($this->Reference[$i]['t']==$v['t']){
26225         $Present=1;
26226         if (!in_array($v['op'],$this->Reference[$i]['p'])) {
26227           $this->Reference[$i]['p'][] = $v['op'];
26228         }
26229       }
26230     }
26231     if ($Present==0) {
26232       $this->Reference[]=array('t'=>$v['t'],'p'=>array($v['op']));
26233     }
26234      }
26235 /*-- END INDEX --*/
26236 /*-- BOOKMARKS --*/
26237       // Output Bookmarks
26238       foreach($this->col_BMoutlines AS $v) {
26239     $this->BMoutlines[]=array('t'=>$v['t'],'l'=>$v['l'],'y'=>$v['y'],'p'=>$v['p']);
26240       }
26241 /*-- END BOOKMARKS --*/
26242 /*-- TOC --*/
26243       // Output ToC
26244       foreach($this->col_toc AS $v) {
26245     $this->_toc[]=array('t'=>$v['t'],'l'=>$v['l'],'p'=>$v['p'],'link'=>$v['link'],'toc_id'=>$v['toc_id']);
26246       }
26247 /*-- END TOC --*/
26248    }
26249    $this->columnbuffer = array();
26250    $this->ColDetails = array();
26251    $this->columnLinks = array();
26252    $this->columnAnnots = array();
26253    // mPDF 3.0
26254    $this->col_Reference = array();
26255    $this->col_BMoutlines = array();
26256    $this->col_toc = array();
26257    $this->breakpoints = array();
26258 }
26259 
26260 /*-- END COLUMNS --*/
26261 
26262 
26263 //==================================================================
26264 /*-- TABLES --*/
26265 function printcellbuffer() {
26266   if (count($this->cellBorderBuffer )) {
26267     // usort( $this->cellBorderBuffer , array($this, "_cmpdom")); 
26268     // mPDF 4.3.008  4.3.014
26269     sort($this->cellBorderBuffer);
26270     foreach($this->cellBorderBuffer AS $cbb) {
26271       $cba = unpack("A16dom/nbord/A1side/ns/dbw/ncr/ncg/ncb/A10style/dx/dy/dw/dh/dmbl/dmbr/dmrt/dmrb/dmtl/dmtr/dmlt/dmlb/dcpd/dover/", $cbb);
26272       $side = $cba['side'];
26273       $details = array();
26274       $details[$side]['dom'] = (float) $cba['dom'];
26275       $details[$side]['s'] = $cba['s'];
26276       $details[$side]['w'] = $cba['bw'];
26277       $details[$side]['c']['R'] = $cba['cr'];
26278       $details[$side]['c']['G'] = $cba['cg'];
26279       $details[$side]['c']['B'] = $cba['cb'];
26280       $details[$side]['style'] = trim($cba['style']);
26281       $details['mbw']['BL'] = $cba['mbl'];
26282       $details['mbw']['BR'] = $cba['mbr'];
26283       $details['mbw']['RT'] = $cba['mrt'];
26284       $details['mbw']['RB'] = $cba['mrb'];
26285       $details['mbw']['TL'] = $cba['mtl'];
26286       $details['mbw']['TR'] = $cba['mtr'];
26287       $details['mbw']['LT'] = $cba['mlt'];
26288       $details['mbw']['LB'] = $cba['mlb'];
26289       $details['cellposdom'] = $cba['cpd'];
26290       $details['p'] = $side;
26291       if ($cba['over']==1) { $details[$side]['overlay'] = true;  }
26292       else { $details[$side]['overlay'] = false; }
26293       $this->_tableRect($cba['x'],$cba['y'],$cba['w'],$cba['h'],$cba['bord'],$details, false, false);
26294 
26295     }
26296     $this->cellBorderBuffer = array();
26297   }
26298 }
26299 //==================================================================
26300 function printtablebuffer() {
26301 
26302   if (!$this->table_rotate) { 
26303     foreach($this->tablebuffer AS $s) { $this->pages[$this->page] .= $s['s']."\n"; }
26304     foreach($this->tbrot_Links AS $p => $l) {
26305        foreach($l AS $v) {
26306       $this->PageLinks[$p][] = $v;
26307        }
26308     }
26309     $this->tbrot_Links = array();
26310 /*-- ANNOTATIONS --*/
26311     foreach($this->tbrot_Annots AS $p => $l) {
26312        foreach($l AS $v) {
26313       $this->PageAnnots[$p][] = $v;
26314        }
26315     }
26316     $this->tbrot_Annots = array();
26317 /*-- END ANNOTATIONS --*/
26318 
26319 /*-- INDEX --*/
26320     // mPDF 3.0
26321         // Output Reference (index)
26322         foreach($this->tbrot_Reference AS $v) {
26323       $Present=0;
26324       for ($i=0;$i<count($this->Reference);$i++){
26325         if ($this->Reference[$i]['t']==$v['t']){
26326           $Present=1;
26327           if (!in_array($v['op'],$this->Reference[$i]['p'])) {
26328             $this->Reference[$i]['p'][] = $v['op'];
26329           }
26330         }
26331       }
26332       if ($Present==0) {
26333         $this->Reference[]=array('t'=>$v['t'],'p'=>array($v['op']));
26334       }
26335         }
26336     $this->tbrot_Reference = array();
26337 /*-- END INDEX --*/
26338 
26339 /*-- BOOKMARKS --*/
26340         // Output Bookmarks
26341         foreach($this->tbrot_BMoutlines AS $v) {
26342       $this->BMoutlines[]=array('t'=>$v['t'],'l'=>$v['l'],'y'=>$v['y'],'p'=>$v['p']);
26343         }
26344     $this->tbrot_BMoutlines = array();
26345 /*-- END BOOKMARKS --*/
26346 
26347 /*-- TOC --*/
26348         // Output ToC
26349         foreach($this->tbrot_toc AS $v) {
26350       $this->_toc[]=array('t'=>$v['t'],'l'=>$v['l'],'p'=>$v['p'],'link'=>$v['link'],'toc_id'=>$v['toc_id']);
26351         }
26352     $this->tbrot_toc = array();
26353 /*-- END TOC --*/
26354 
26355     return; 
26356   }
26357 
26358   // else if rotated
26359   $lm = $this->lMargin + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['outer_left_margin'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['border_left']['w'] + $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['padding_left'];
