26360   $pw = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['inner_width'];
26361   //Start Transformation
26362   $this->pages[$this->page] .= $this->StartTransform(true)."\n";
26363 
26364   if ($this->table_rotate > 1) {  // clockwise
26365      if ($this->tbrot_align == 'L') {
26366     $xadj = $this->tbrot_h ;  // align L (as is)
26367      }
26368      else if ($this->tbrot_align == 'R') {
26369     $xadj = $lm-$this->tbrot_x0+($pw) ; // align R
26370      }
26371      else {
26372     $xadj = $lm-$this->tbrot_x0+(($pw + $this->tbrot_h)/2) ;  // align C
26373      }
26374      $yadj = 0;
26375   }
26376   else {  // anti-clockwise
26377      if ($this->tbrot_align == 'L') {
26378     $xadj = 0 ; // align L (as is)
26379      }
26380      else if ($this->tbrot_align == 'R') {
26381     $xadj = $lm-$this->tbrot_x0+($pw - $this->tbrot_h) ;  // align R
26382      }
26383      else {
26384     $xadj = $lm-$this->tbrot_x0+(($pw - $this->tbrot_h)/2) ;  // align C
26385      }
26386      $yadj = $this->tbrot_w;
26387   }
26388 
26389 
26390   $this->pages[$this->page] .= $this->transformTranslate($xadj, $yadj , true)."\n";
26391   $this->pages[$this->page] .= $this->transformRotate($this->table_rotate, $this->tbrot_x0 , $this->tbrot_y0 , true)."\n";
26392 
26393   // Now output the adjusted values
26394   foreach($this->tablebuffer AS $s) { $this->pages[$this->page] .= $s['s']."\n"; }
26395 
26396 
26397   foreach($this->tbrot_Links AS $p => $l) {
26398       foreach($l AS $v) {
26399     $w = $v[2]/$this->k;
26400     $h = $v[3]/$this->k;
26401     $ax = ($v[0]/$this->k) - $this->tbrot_x0;
26402     $ay = (($this->hPt-$v[1])/$this->k) - $this->tbrot_y0;
26403     if ($this->table_rotate > 1) {  // clockwise
26404       $bx = $this->tbrot_x0+$xadj-$ay-$h;
26405       $by = $this->tbrot_y0+$yadj+$ax;
26406     }
26407     else {
26408       $bx = $this->tbrot_x0+$xadj+$ay;
26409       $by = $this->tbrot_y0+$yadj-$ax-$w;
26410     }
26411     $v[0] = $bx*$this->k;
26412     $v[1] = ($this->h-$by)*$this->k;
26413     $v[2] = $h*$this->k;  // swap width and height
26414     $v[3] = $w*$this->k;
26415     $this->PageLinks[$p][] = $v;
26416       }
26417   }
26418   $this->tbrot_Links = array();
26419 /*-- ANNOTATIONS --*/
26420   foreach($this->tbrot_Annots AS $p => $l) {
26421       foreach($l AS $v) {
26422     $w = $this->annotSize;
26423     $h = $this->annotSize;
26424     $ax = abs($v['x']) - $this->tbrot_x0; // abs because -ve values are internally set and held for reference if annotMargin set
26425     $ay = $v['y'] - $this->tbrot_y0;
26426     if ($this->table_rotate > 1) {  // clockwise
26427       $bx = $this->tbrot_x0+$xadj-$ay-$h;
26428       $by = $this->tbrot_y0+$yadj+$ax;
26429     }
26430     else {
26431       $bx = $this->tbrot_x0+$xadj+$ay;
26432       $by = $this->tbrot_y0+$yadj-$ax-$w;
26433     }
26434     if ($v['x'] < 0) {
26435       $v['x'] = -$bx;
26436     }
26437     else {
26438       $v['x'] = $bx;
26439     }
26440     $v['y'] = ($by);
26441     $this->PageAnnots[$p][] = $v;
26442       }
26443   }
26444   $this->tbrot_Annots = array();
26445 /*-- END ANNOTATIONS --*/
26446 
26447 
26448 /*-- BOOKMARKS --*/
26449   // mPDF 3.0
26450   // Adjust Bookmarks
26451   foreach($this->tbrot_BMoutlines AS $v) {
26452     $v['y'] = $this->tbrot_y0;
26453     $this->BMoutlines[]=array('t'=>$v['t'],'l'=>$v['l'],'y'=>$v['y'],'p'=>$this->page);
26454   }
26455 /*-- END BOOKMARKS --*/
26456 
26457 /*-- INDEX --*/
26458   // mPDF 3.0
26459   // Adjust Reference (index)
26460   foreach($this->tbrot_Reference AS $v) {
26461     $Present=0;
26462     //Search the reference (AND Ref/PageNo) in the array
26463     for ($i=0;$i<count($this->Reference);$i++){
26464       if ($this->Reference[$i]['t']==$v['t']){
26465         $Present=1;
26466         if (!in_array($this->page,$this->Reference[$i]['p'])) {
26467           $this->Reference[$i]['p'][] = $this->page;
26468         }
26469       }
26470     }
26471     if ($Present==0) {
26472       $this->Reference[]=array('t'=>$v['t'],'p'=>array($this->page));
26473     }
26474   }
26475 /*-- END INDEX --*/
26476 
26477 /*-- TOC --*/
26478   // mPDF 3.0
26479   // Adjust ToC - uses document page number
26480   foreach($this->tbrot_toc AS $v) {
26481     $this->_toc[]=array('t'=>$v['t'],'l'=>$v['l'],'p'=>$this->page,'link'=>$v['link'],'toc_id'=>$v['toc_id']);
26482     $this->links[$v['link']][1] = $this->tbrot_y0; 
26483   }
26484 /*-- END TOC --*/
26485 
26486 
26487   // mPDF 3.0
26488   $this->tbrot_Reference = array();
26489   $this->tbrot_BMoutlines = array();
26490   $this->tbrot_toc = array();
26491 
26492   //Stop Transformation
26493   $this->pages[$this->page] .= $this->StopTransform(true)."\n";
26494 
26495 
26496   $this->y = $this->tbrot_y0 + $this->tbrot_w;
26497   $this->x = $this->lMargin;
26498 
26499   $this->tablebuffer = array();
26500 }
26501 
26502 //==================================================================
26503 // Keep-with-table This buffers contents of h1-6 to keep on page with table
26504 function printkwtbuffer() {
26505   if (!$this->kwt_moved) { 
26506     foreach($this->kwt_buffer AS $s) { $this->pages[$this->page] .= $s['s']."\n"; }
26507     foreach($this->kwt_Links AS $p => $l) {
26508        foreach($l AS $v) {
26509       $this->PageLinks[$p][] = $v;
26510        }
26511     }
26512     $this->kwt_Links = array();
26513 /*-- ANNOTATIONS --*/
26514     foreach($this->kwt_Annots AS $p => $l) {
26515        foreach($l AS $v) {
26516       $this->PageAnnots[$p][] = $v;
26517        }
26518     }
26519     $this->kwt_Annots = array();
26520 /*-- END ANNOTATIONS --*/
26521 
26522 /*-- INDEX --*/
26523     // mPDF 3.0
26524         // Output Reference (index)
26525         foreach($this->kwt_Reference AS $v) {
26526       $Present=0;
26527       for ($i=0;$i<count($this->Reference);$i++){
26528         if ($this->Reference[$i]['t']==$v['t']){
26529           $Present=1;
26530           if (!in_array($v['op'],$this->Reference[$i]['p'])) {
26531             $this->Reference[$i]['p'][] = $v['op'];
26532           }
26533         }
26534       }
26535       if ($Present==0) {
26536         $this->Reference[]=array('t'=>$v['t'],'p'=>array($v['op']));
26537       }
26538         }
26539     $this->kwt_Reference = array();
26540 /*-- END INDEX --*/
26541 
26542 /*-- BOOKMARKS --*/
26543         // Output Bookmarks
26544         foreach($this->kwt_BMoutlines AS $v) {
26545       $this->BMoutlines[]=array('t'=>$v['t'],'l'=>$v['l'],'y'=>$v['y'],'p'=>$v['p']);
26546         }
26547     $this->kwt_BMoutlines = array();
26548 /*-- END BOOKMARKS --*/
26549 
26550 /*-- TOC --*/
26551         // Output ToC
26552         foreach($this->kwt_toc AS $v) {
26553       $this->_toc[]=array('t'=>$v['t'],'l'=>$v['l'],'p'=>$v['p'],'link'=>$v['link'],'toc_id'=>$v['toc_id']);
26554         }
26555     $this->kwt_toc = array();
26556 /*-- END TOC --*/
26557 
26558     return; 
26559   }
26560 
26561   //Start Transformation
26562   $this->pages[$this->page] .= $this->StartTransform(true)."\n";
26563   $xadj = $this->lMargin - $this->kwt_x0 ;
26564   //$yadj = $this->y - $this->kwt_y0 ;
26565   $yadj = $this->tMargin - $this->kwt_y0 ;
26566 
26567   $this->pages[$this->page] .= $this->transformTranslate($xadj, $yadj , true)."\n";
26568 
26569   // Now output the adjusted values
26570   foreach($this->kwt_buffer AS $s) { $this->pages[$this->page] .= $s['s']."\n"; }
26571 
26572   // Adjust hyperLinks
26573   foreach($this->kwt_Links AS $p => $l) {
26574       foreach($l AS $v) {
26575     $bx = $this->kwt_x0+$xadj;
26576     $by = $this->kwt_y0+$yadj;
26577     $v[0] = $bx*$this->k;
26578     $v[1] = ($this->h-$by)*$this->k;
26579     $this->PageLinks[$p][] = $v;
26580       }
26581   }
26582 /*-- ANNOTATIONS --*/
26583   foreach($this->kwt_Annots AS $p => $l) {
26584       foreach($l AS $v) {
26585     $w = $this->annotSize;
26586     $h = $this->annotSize;
26587     $bx = $this->kwt_x0+$xadj;
26588     $by = $this->kwt_y0+$yadj;
26589     if ($v['x'] < 0) {
26590       $v['x'] = -$bx;
26591     }
26592     else {
26593       $v['x'] = $bx;
26594     }
26595     $v['y'] = $by;
26596     $this->PageAnnots[$p][] = $v;
26597       }
26598   }
26599 /*-- END ANNOTATIONS --*/
26600 
26601 /*-- BOOKMARKS --*/
26602   // mPDF 3.0
26603   // Adjust Bookmarks
26604   foreach($this->kwt_BMoutlines AS $v) {
26605     if ($v['y'] != 0) { $v['y'] += $yadj; }
26606     $this->BMoutlines[]=array('t'=>$v['t'],'l'=>$v['l'],'y'=>$v['y'],'p'=>$this->page);
26607   }
26608 /*-- END BOOKMARKS --*/
26609 
26610 /*-- INDEX --*/
26611   // mPDF 3.0
26612   // Adjust Reference (index)
26613   foreach($this->kwt_Reference AS $v) {
26614     $Present=0;
26615     //Search the reference (AND Ref/PageNo) in the array
26616     for ($i=0;$i<count($this->Reference);$i++){
26617       if ($this->Reference[$i]['t']==$v['t']){
26618         $Present=1;
26619         if (!in_array($this->page,$this->Reference[$i]['p'])) {
26620           $this->Reference[$i]['p'][] = $this->page;
26621         }
26622       }
26623     }
26624     if ($Present==0) {
26625       $this->Reference[]=array('t'=>$v['t'],'p'=>array($this->page));
26626     }
26627   }
26628 /*-- END INDEX --*/
26629 
26630 /*-- TOC --*/
26631   // mPDF 3.0
26632   // Adjust ToC
26633   foreach($this->kwt_toc AS $v) {
26634     $this->_toc[]=array('t'=>$v['t'],'l'=>$v['l'],'p'=>$this->page,'link'=>$v['link'],'toc_id'=>$v['toc_id']);
26635     $this->links[$v['link']][0] = $this->page;
26636     $this->links[$v['link']][1] += $yadj;
26637   }
26638 /*-- END TOC --*/
26639 
26640 
26641   $this->kwt_Links = array();
26642   $this->kwt_Annots = array();
26643   // mPDF 3.0
26644   $this->kwt_Reference = array();
26645   $this->kwt_BMoutlines = array();
26646   $this->kwt_toc = array();
26647   //Stop Transformation
26648   $this->pages[$this->page] .= $this->StopTransform(true)."\n";
26649 
26650   $this->kwt_buffer = array();
26651 
26652   $this->y += $this->kwt_height;
26653 }
26654 
26655 /*-- END TABLES --*/
26656 
26657 
26658 //==================================================================
26659 // mPDF 4.0
26660 function printfloatbuffer() {
26661   if (count($this->floatbuffer)) {
26662     $this->objectbuffer = $this->floatbuffer;
26663     $this->printobjectbuffer(false);
26664     $this->objectbuffer = array();
26665     $this->floatbuffer = array();
26666     $this->floatmargins = array();
26667   }
26668 }
26669 //==================================================================
26670 
26671 function printdivbuffer() {
26672   $k = $this->k;
26673   $p1 = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['startpage'];
26674   $p2 = $this->page;
26675   $bottom[$p1] = $this->ktBlock[$p1]['bottom_margin'];
26676   $bottom[$p2] = $this->y;  // $this->ktBlock[$p2]['bottom_margin'];
26677   $top[$p1] = $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['y00'];
26678   $top2 = $this->h;
26679   foreach($this->divbuffer AS $key=>$s) { 
26680     if ($s['page'] == $p2) {
26681       $top2 = MIN($s['y'], $top2);
26682     }
26683   }
26684   $top[$p2] = $top2;
26685   $height[$p1] = ($bottom[$p1] - $top[$p1]);
26686   $height[$p2] = ($bottom[$p2] - $top[$p2]);
26687   $xadj[$p1] = $this->MarginCorrection;
26688   $yadj[$p1] = -($top[$p1] - $top[$p2]);
26689   $xadj[$p2] = 0;
26690   $yadj[$p2] = $height[$p1];
26691 
26692   if ($this->ColActive || !$this->keep_block_together || $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['startpage'] == $this->page || ($this->page - $this->blk[$this->blklvl]['startpage']) > 1 || ($height[$p1]+$height[$p2]) > $this->h) { 
26693     foreach($this->divbuffer AS $s) { $this->pages[$s['page']] .= $s['s']."\n"; }
26694     foreach($this->ktLinks AS $p => $l) {
26695        foreach($l AS $v) {
26696       $this->PageLinks[$p][] = $v;
26697        }
26698     }
26699 /*-- ANNOTATIONS --*/
26700     foreach($this->ktAnnots AS $p => $l) {
26701        foreach($l AS $v) {
26702       $this->PageAnnots[$p][] = $v;
26703        }
26704     }
26705 /*-- END ANNOTATIONS --*/
26706 /*-- INDEX --*/
26707         // Adjust Reference (index)
26708         foreach($this->ktReference AS $v) {
26709       // mPDF 3.0
26710       $Present=0;
26711       //Search the reference (AND Ref/PageNo) in the array
26712       for ($i=0;$i<count($this->Reference);$i++){
26713         if ($this->Reference[$i]['t']==$v['t']){
26714           $Present=1;
26715           if (!in_array($p2,$this->Reference[$i]['p'])) {
26716             $this->Reference[$i]['p'][] = $p2;
26717           }
26718         }
26719       }
26720       //If not found, add it
26721       if ($Present==0) {
26722         $this->Reference[]=array('t'=>$v['t'],'p'=>array($p2));
26723       }
26724         }
26725 /*-- END INDEX --*/
26726 
26727 /*-- BOOKMARKS --*/
26728         // Adjust Bookmarks
26729         foreach($this->ktBMoutlines AS $v) {
26730       $this->BMoutlines[]=array('t'=>$v['t'],'l'=>$v['l'],'y'=>$v['y'],'p'=>$v['p']);
26731         }
26732 /*-- END BOOKMARKS --*/
26733 
26734 /*-- TOC --*/
26735         // Adjust ToC
26736         foreach($this->_kttoc AS $v) {
26737       $this->_toc[]=array('t'=>$v['t'],'l'=>$v['l'],'p'=>$v['p'],'link'=>$v['link'],'toc_id'=>$v['toc_id']);
26738         }
26739 /*-- END TOC --*/
26740 
26741     $this->divbuffer = array();
26742     $this->ktLinks = array();
26743     $this->ktAnnots = array();
26744     $this->ktBlock = array();
26745     $this->ktReference = array();
26746     $this->ktBMoutlines = array();
26747     $this->_kttoc = array();
26748     $this->keep_block_together = 0;
26749     return; 
26750   }
26751   else {
26752      foreach($this->divbuffer AS $key=>$s) { 
26753     // callback function in htmltoolkit
26754     $t = $s['s'];
26755     $p = $s['page'];
26756     $t = preg_replace('/BT (\d+\.\d\d+) (\d+\.\d\d+) Td/e',"\$this->blockAdjust('Td',$k,$xadj[$p],$yadj[$p],'\\1','\\2')",$t);
26757     $t = preg_replace('/(\d+\.\d\d+) (\d+\.\d\d+) (\d+\.\d\d+) ([\-]{0,1}\d+\.\d\d+) re/e',"\$this->blockAdjust('re',$k,$xadj[$p],$yadj[$p],'\\1','\\2','\\3','\\4')",$t);
26758     $t = preg_replace('/(\d+\.\d\d+) (\d+\.\d\d+) l/e',"\$this->blockAdjust('l',$k,$xadj[$p],$yadj[$p],'\\1','\\2')",$t);
26759     $t = preg_replace('/q (\d+\.\d\d+) 0 0 (\d+\.\d\d+) (\d+\.\d\d+) (\d+\.\d\d+) cm \/I/e',"\$this->blockAdjust('img',$k,$xadj[$p],$yadj[$p],'\\1','\\2','\\3','\\4')",$t);
26760     $t = preg_replace('/(\d+\.\d\d+) (\d+\.\d\d+) m/e',"\$this->blockAdjust('draw',$k,$xadj[$p],$yadj[$p],'\\1','\\2')",$t);
26761     $t = preg_replace('/(\d+\.\d\d+) (\d+\.\d\d+) (\d+\.\d\d+) (\d+\.\d\d+) (\d+\.\d\d+) (\d+\.\d\d+) c/e',"\$this->blockAdjust('bezier',$k,$xadj[$p],$yadj[$p],'\\1','\\2','\\3','\\4','\\5','\\6')",$t);
26762 
26763     $this->pages[$this->page] .= $t."\n"; 
26764      }
26765      // Adjust hyperLinks
26766      foreach($this->ktLinks AS $p => $l) {
26767       foreach($l AS $v) {
26768     $v[0] += ($xadj[$p]*$k);
26769     $v[1] -= ($yadj[$p]*$k);
26770     $this->PageLinks[$p2][] = $v;
26771       }
26772      }
26773 /*-- ANNOTATIONS --*/
26774      foreach($this->ktAnnots AS $p => $l) {
26775       foreach($l AS $v) {
26776     if ($v['x']>0) { $v['x'] += $xadj[$p]; }
26777     else if ($v['x']<0) { $v['x'] -= $xadj[$p]; }
26778     // mPDF 3.0 -= -> +=
26779     $v['y'] += $yadj[$p];
26780     $this->PageAnnots[$p2][] = $v;
26781       }
26782      }
26783 /*-- END ANNOTATIONS --*/
26784 
26785 /*-- BOOKMARKS --*/
26786      // Adjust Bookmarks
26787      foreach($this->ktBMoutlines AS $v) {
26788     if ($v['y'] != 0) { $v['y'] += ($yadj[$v['p']]); }
26789     $this->BMoutlines[]=array('t'=>$v['t'],'l'=>$v['l'],'y'=>$v['y'],'p'=>$p2);
26790      }
26791 /*-- END BOOKMARKS --*/
26792 
26793 /*-- INDEX --*/
26794      // Adjust Reference (index)
26795      foreach($this->ktReference AS $v) {
26796     // mPDF 3.0
26797     $Present=0;
26798     //Search the reference (AND Ref/PageNo) in the array
26799     for ($i=0;$i<count($this->Reference);$i++){
26800       if ($this->Reference[$i]['t']==$v['t']){
26801         $Present=1;
26802         if (!in_array($p2,$this->Reference[$i]['p'])) {
26803           $this->Reference[$i]['p'][] = $p2;
26804         }
26805       }
26806     }
26807     //If not found, add it
26808     if ($Present==0) {
26809       $this->Reference[]=array('t'=>$v['t'],'p'=>array($p2));
26810     }
26811      }
26812 /*-- END INDEX --*/
26813 
26814 /*-- TOC --*/
26815      // Adjust ToC
26816      foreach($this->_kttoc AS $v) {
26817     $this->_toc[]=array('t'=>$v['t'],'l'=>$v['l'],'p'=>$p2,'link'=>$v['link'],'toc_id'=>$v['toc_id']);
26818     // mPDF 3.0
26819     $this->links[$v['link']][0] = $p2;
26820     $this->links[$v['link']][1] += $yadj[$p];
26821      }
26822 /*-- END TOC --*/
26823 
26824      $this->y = $top[$p2] + $height[$p1] + $height[$p2];
26825      $this->x = $this->lMargin;
26826 
26827      $this->divbuffer = array();
26828      $this->ktLinks = array();
26829      $this->ktAnnots = array();
26830      $this->ktBlock = array();
26831      $this->ktReference = array();
26832      $this->ktBMoutlines = array();
26833      $this->_kttoc = array();
26834      $this->keep_block_together = 0;
26835   }
26836 }
26837 
26838 
26839 //==================================================================
26840 // Added ELLIPSES and CIRCLES
26841 function Circle($x,$y,$r,$style='S') {
26842   $this->Ellipse($x,$y,$r,$r,$style);
26843 }
26844 
26845 function Ellipse($x,$y,$rx,$ry,$style='S') {
26846   if($style=='F') { $op='f'; }
26847   elseif($style=='FD' or $style=='DF') { $op='B'; }
26848   else { $op='S'; }
26849   $lx=4/3*(M_SQRT2-1)*$rx;
26850   $ly=4/3*(M_SQRT2-1)*$ry;
26851   $k=$this->k;
26852   $h=$this->h;
26853   $this->_out(sprintf('%.3f %.3f m %.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f c', ($x+$rx)*$k,($h-$y)*$k, ($x+$rx)*$k,($h-($y-$ly))*$k, ($x+$lx)*$k,($h-($y-$ry))*$k, $x*$k,($h-($y-$ry))*$k));
26854   $this->_out(sprintf('%.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f c', ($x-$lx)*$k,($h-($y-$ry))*$k,  ($x-$rx)*$k,($h-($y-$ly))*$k,   ($x-$rx)*$k,($h-$y)*$k)); 
26855   $this->_out(sprintf('%.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f c', ($x-$rx)*$k,($h-($y+$ly))*$k, ($x-$lx)*$k,($h-($y+$ry))*$k, $x*$k,($h-($y+$ry))*$k)); 
26856   $this->_out(sprintf('%.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f c %s', ($x+$lx)*$k,($h-($y+$ry))*$k, ($x+$rx)*$k,($h-($y+$ly))*$k, ($x+$rx)*$k,($h-$y)*$k, $op));
26857 }
26858 
26859 /*-- DIRECTW --*/
26860 // Added adaptation of shaded_box = AUTOSIZE-TEXT
26861 // Label and number of invoice/estimate
26862 function AutosizeText($text,$w,$font,$style,$szfont=72) {
26863   $text = $this->purify_utf8_text($text);
26864   if ($this->text_input_as_HTML) {
26865     $text = $this->all_entities_to_utf8($text);
26866   }
26867   if (!$this->is_MB) { $text = mb_convert_encoding($text,$this->mb_enc,'UTF-8'); }
26868   $text = ' '.$text.' ';
26869   $width = $this->ConvertSize($w);
26870   $loop   = 0;
26871   while ( $loop == 0 ) {
26872     $this->SetFont($font,$style,$szfont);
26873     $sz = $this->GetStringWidth( $text );
26874     if ( $sz > $w ) { $szfont --; }
26875     else { $loop ++; }
26876   }
26877   $this->SetFont($font,$style,$szfont);
26878   $this->Cell($w, 0, $text, 0, 0, "C");
26879 }
26880 /*-- END DIRECTW --*/
26881 
26882 
26883 
26884 
26885 
26886 // ====================================================
26887 // ====================================================
26888 /*-- RTL --*/
26889 function reverse_letters($str) {
26890   // mPDF 4.0
26891   $str = strtr($str, '{}[]()', '}{][)(');
26892 
26893   return $this->mb_strrev($str, $this->mb_enc); 
26894 }
26895 
26896 function magic_reverse_dir(&$chunk, $join=true) {
26897    if (!$this->is_MB || $this->isCJK) { return 0; }
26898    if (($this->directionality == 'rtl') || (($this->directionality == 'ltr') && ($this->biDirectional)))  { 
26899   // Change Arabic + Persian. to Presentation Forms
26900   if ($join) {
26901     // mPDF 4.0 Remove rtlAsArabicFarsi
26902     $chunk = preg_replace("/([".$this->pregRTLchars."]+)/ue", '$this->ArabJoin(stripslashes(\'\\1\'))', $chunk );
26903   }
26904   $contains_rtl = false;
26905   $all_rtl = true;
26906   if (preg_match("/[".$this->pregRTLchars."]/u",$chunk)) {  // Chunk contains RTL characters
26907     if (preg_match("/[^".$this->pregRTLchars."\x{A0}\"\'\(\)., :\-]/u",$chunk)) { // Chunk also contains LTR characters (added , mPDF 4.0)
26908       $all_rtl = false;
26909       $bits = preg_split('/[ ]/u',$chunk);
26910       foreach($bits AS $bitkey=>$bit) {
26911         if (preg_match("/[".$this->pregRTLchars."]/u",$bit)) {  // Chunk also contains LTR characters
26912           $bits[$bitkey] = $this->reverse_letters($bit); 
26913         }
26914         else { 
26915           $bits[$bitkey] = $bit; 
26916         }
26917       }
26918       $bits = array_reverse($bits,false);
26919       $chunk = implode(' ',$bits);
26920     }
26921     else {
26922       $chunk = $this->reverse_letters($chunk); 
26923     }
26924     $contains_rtl = true;
26925   }
26926   else { $all_rtl = false; }
26927   if ($all_rtl) { return 2; }
26928   else if ($contains_rtl) { return 1; }
26929   else { return 0; }
26930    }
26931    return 0;
26932 }
26933 /*-- END RTL --*/
26934 
26935 // 
26936 // ****************************
26937 // ****************************
26938 
26939 
26940 // mPDF 4.0
26941 function SetSubstitutions($dummy=array()) { // parameter only for backward compatability
26942   $subsarray = array();
26943   @include(_MPDF_PATH.'includes/subs_'.strtolower($this->codepage).'.php');
26944   $this->substitute = array();
26945   foreach($subsarray AS $key => $val) {
26946     $this->substitute[code2utf($key)] = $val;
26947   }
26948 }
26949 
26950 
26951 function SubstituteChars($html) {
26952   // mPDF 4.2.018
26953   if ($this->PDFA && $this->useSubstitutions) { 
26954     if (!$this->PDFAauto) { $this->PDFAwarnings[] = "Core Adobe fonts [Helvetica, Times, Symbol etc] cannot be embedded with mPDF, which is required for PDFA1-b (Character substitution [useSubstitutions] disabled)"; }
26955     $this->useSubstitutions = false;
26956   }
26957   // only substitute characters between tags
26958   if ($this->useSubstitutions && count($this->substitute)) {  
26959     $a=preg_split('/(<.*?>)/ms',$html,-1,PREG_SPLIT_DELIM_CAPTURE);
26960     $html = '';
26961     foreach($a as $i => $e) {
26962       if($i%2==0) {
26963          $e = strtr($e, $this->substitute);
26964       }
26965       $html .= $e;
26966     }
26967   }
26968   return $html;
26969 }
26970 
26971 /*-- UNICODE-FONTS --*/
26972 // mPDF 4.2
26973 function SubstituteCharsMB(&$writehtml_a, &$writehtml_i, &$writehtml_e) {
26974   // mPDF 4.2.018
26975   if ($this->PDFA) { 
26976     if (!$this->PDFAauto) { $this->PDFAwarnings[] = "Core Adobe fonts [Helvetica, Times, Symbol etc] cannot be embedded with mPDF, which is required for PDFA1-b (Character substitution [useSubstitutionsMB] disabled)"; }
26977     $this->useSubstitutionsMB = false;
26978     return 0;
26979   }
26980   $cw = &$this->CurrentFont['cw'];
26981   $unicode = $this->UTF8StringToArray($writehtml_e);
26982   $start = -1;
26983   $end = 0;
26984   $flag = 0;
26985   $ftype = '';
26986   $u = array();
26987   foreach($unicode AS $c => $char) {
26988     if ($char != 173 && !isset($cw[$char]) && (!isset($this->chrs[$char]) || !isset($cw[$this->chrs[$char]])) &&
26989       ($char<1423 || ($char>3583 && $char < 11263))) { 
26990       if ($flag==0) { $start=$c; }
26991       $flag=1; 
26992       $u[] = $char;
26993     }
26994     else if ($flag==1) { $end=$c-1; break; }
26995   }
26996   if ($flag==1 && !$end) { $end=count($unicode)-1; }
26997   if ($start==-1) { return 0; }
26998 
26999   if (!$this->subArrMB) { 
27000     include(_MPDF_PATH.'includes/subs_core.php'); 
27001     $this->subArrMB['a'] = $aarr;
27002     $this->subArrMB['s'] = $sarr;
27003     $this->subArrMB['z'] = $zarr;
27004   }
27005   // TRY CORE FONTS FIRST
27006   if (isset($this->subArrMB['a'][$u[0]])) { 
27007     $font = 'tta'; $ftype = 'C'; 
27008     foreach($u AS $char) {
27009       if ($this->subArrMB['a'][$char]) { $repl[] = $this->subArrMB['a'][$char]; }
27010       else { break; }
27011     }
27012   }
27013   else if (isset($this->subArrMB['z'][$u[0]])) { 
27014     $font = 'ttz'; $ftype = 'C'; 
27015     foreach($u AS $char) {
27016       if ($this->subArrMB['z'][$char]) { $repl[] = $this->subArrMB['z'][$char]; }
27017       else { break; }
27018     }
27019   }
27020   else if (isset($this->subArrMB['s'][$u[0]])) { 
27021     $font = 'tts'; $ftype = 'C'; 
27022     foreach($u AS $char) {
27023       if ($this->subArrMB['s'][$char]) { $repl[] = $this->subArrMB['s'][$char]; }
27024       else { break; }
27025     }
27026   }
27027   if ($ftype=='C') {
27028     $patt = mb_substr($writehtml_e, $start, count($repl));
27029     if (preg_match("/(.*?)(".preg_quote($patt,'/').")(.*)/u", $writehtml_e, $m)) {
27030       $writehtml_e = $m[1];
27031       array_splice($writehtml_a, $writehtml_i+1, 0, array($font, implode('|', $repl), '/'.$font, $m[3])); // e.g. <tts>
27032       $this->subPos = $writehtml_i+3;
27033       return 4;
27034     }
27035     return 0;
27036   }
27037   // ELSE FIND IN DEFAULT FONT
27038   if (strtolower($this->CurrentFont['name']) != $this->default_font) { $font = $this->default_font; }
27039 
27040   else { unset($cw); return 0; }  
27041 
27042   if (isset($this->fonts[$font])) { $cw = &$this->fonts[$font]['cw']; }
27043   else { @include(_MPDF_PATH.'unifont/'.$font.'.php'); }
27044   if (!$cw) { return 0; }
27045   $l = 0;
27046   foreach($u AS $char) {
27047     if ($char == 173 || isset($cw[$char]) || (isset($this->chrs[$char]) && isset($cw[$this->chrs[$char]])) ||
27048     ($char>1422 && $char<3584) || $char > 11262) { 
27049       $l++;
27050     }
27051     else { break; }
27052   }
27053   $patt = mb_substr($writehtml_e, $start, $l);
27054   if (preg_match("/(.*?)(".preg_quote($patt,'/').")(.*)/u", $writehtml_e, $m)) {
27055     $writehtml_e = $m[1];
27056     array_splice($writehtml_a, $writehtml_i+1, 0, array('span style="font-family: '.$font.'"', $m[2], '/span', $m[3]));
27057     $this->subPos = $writehtml_i+3;
27058     return 4;
27059   }
27060   return 0;
27061 }
27062 /*-- END UNICODE-FONTS --*/
27063 
27064 function setHiEntitySubstitutions() {
27065   $entarr = array (
27066   'nbsp' => '160',  'iexcl' => '161',  'cent' => '162',  'pound' => '163',  'curren' => '164',  'yen' => '165',  'brvbar' => '166',  'sect' => '167',
27067   'uml' => '168',  'copy' => '169',  'ordf' => '170',  'laquo' => '171',  'not' => '172',  'shy' => '173',  'reg' => '174',  'macr' => '175',
27068   'deg' => '176',  'plusmn' => '177',  'sup2' => '178',  'sup3' => '179',  'acute' => '180',  'micro' => '181',  'para' => '182',  'middot' => '183',
27069   'cedil' => '184',  'sup1' => '185',  'ordm' => '186',  'raquo' => '187',  'frac14' => '188',  'frac12' => '189',  'frac34' => '190',
27070   'iquest' => '191',  'Agrave' => '192',  'Aacute' => '193',  'Acirc' => '194',  'Atilde' => '195',  'Auml' => '196',  'Aring' => '197',
27071   'AElig' => '198',  'Ccedil' => '199',  'Egrave' => '200',  'Eacute' => '201',  'Ecirc' => '202',  'Euml' => '203',  'Igrave' => '204',
27072   'Iacute' => '205',  'Icirc' => '206',  'Iuml' => '207',  'ETH' => '208',  'Ntilde' => '209',  'Ograve' => '210',  'Oacute' => '211',
27073   'Ocirc' => '212',  'Otilde' => '213',  'Ouml' => '214',  'times' => '215',  'Oslash' => '216',  'Ugrave' => '217',  'Uacute' => '218',
27074   'Ucirc' => '219',  'Uuml' => '220',  'Yacute' => '221',  'THORN' => '222',  'szlig' => '223',  'agrave' => '224',  'aacute' => '225',
27075   'acirc' => '226',  'atilde' => '227',  'auml' => '228',  'aring' => '229',  'aelig' => '230',  'ccedil' => '231',  'egrave' => '232',
27076   'eacute' => '233',  'ecirc' => '234',  'euml' => '235',  'igrave' => '236',  'iacute' => '237',  'icirc' => '238',  'iuml' => '239',
27077   'eth' => '240',  'ntilde' => '241',  'ograve' => '242',  'oacute' => '243',  'ocirc' => '244',  'otilde' => '245',  'ouml' => '246',
27078   'divide' => '247',  'oslash' => '248',  'ugrave' => '249',  'uacute' => '250',  'ucirc' => '251',  'uuml' => '252',  'yacute' => '253',
27079   'thorn' => '254',  'yuml' => '255',  'OElig' => '338',  'oelig' => '339',  'Scaron' => '352',  'scaron' => '353',  'Yuml' => '376',
27080   'fnof' => '402',  'circ' => '710',  'tilde' => '732',  'Alpha' => '913',  'Beta' => '914',  'Gamma' => '915',  'Delta' => '916',
27081   'Epsilon' => '917',  'Zeta' => '918',  'Eta' => '919',  'Theta' => '920',  'Iota' => '921',  'Kappa' => '922',  'Lambda' => '923',
27082   'Mu' => '924',  'Nu' => '925',  'Xi' => '926',  'Omicron' => '927',  'Pi' => '928',  'Rho' => '929',  'Sigma' => '931',  'Tau' => '932',
27083   'Upsilon' => '933',  'Phi' => '934',  'Chi' => '935',  'Psi' => '936',  'Omega' => '937',  'alpha' => '945',  'beta' => '946',  'gamma' => '947',
27084   'delta' => '948',  'epsilon' => '949',  'zeta' => '950',  'eta' => '951',  'theta' => '952',  'iota' => '953',  'kappa' => '954',
27085   'lambda' => '955',  'mu' => '956',  'nu' => '957',  'xi' => '958',  'omicron' => '959',  'pi' => '960',  'rho' => '961',  'sigmaf' => '962',
27086   'sigma' => '963',  'tau' => '964',  'upsilon' => '965',  'phi' => '966',  'chi' => '967',  'psi' => '968',  'omega' => '969',
27087   'thetasym' => '977',  'upsih' => '978',  'piv' => '982',  'ensp' => '8194',  'emsp' => '8195',  'thinsp' => '8201',  'zwnj' => '8204',
27088   'zwj' => '8205',  'lrm' => '8206',  'rlm' => '8207',  'ndash' => '8211',  'mdash' => '8212',  'lsquo' => '8216',  'rsquo' => '8217',
27089   'sbquo' => '8218',  'ldquo' => '8220',  'rdquo' => '8221',  'bdquo' => '8222',  'dagger' => '8224',  'Dagger' => '8225',  'bull' => '8226',
27090   'hellip' => '8230',  'permil' => '8240',  'prime' => '8242',  'Prime' => '8243',  'lsaquo' => '8249',  'rsaquo' => '8250',  'oline' => '8254',
27091   'frasl' => '8260',  'euro' => '8364',  'image' => '8465',  'weierp' => '8472',  'real' => '8476',  'trade' => '8482',  'alefsym' => '8501',
27092   'larr' => '8592',  'uarr' => '8593',  'rarr' => '8594',  'darr' => '8595',  'harr' => '8596',  'crarr' => '8629',  'lArr' => '8656',
27093   'uArr' => '8657',  'rArr' => '8658',  'dArr' => '8659',  'hArr' => '8660',  'forall' => '8704',  'part' => '8706',  'exist' => '8707',
27094   'empty' => '8709',  'nabla' => '8711',  'isin' => '8712',  'notin' => '8713',  'ni' => '8715',  'prod' => '8719',  'sum' => '8721',
27095   'minus' => '8722',  'lowast' => '8727',  'radic' => '8730',  'prop' => '8733',  'infin' => '8734',  'ang' => '8736',  'and' => '8743',
27096   'or' => '8744',  'cap' => '8745',  'cup' => '8746',  'int' => '8747',  'there4' => '8756',  'sim' => '8764',  'cong' => '8773',
27097   'asymp' => '8776',  'ne' => '8800',  'equiv' => '8801',  'le' => '8804',  'ge' => '8805',  'sub' => '8834',  'sup' => '8835',  'nsub' => '8836',
27098   'sube' => '8838',  'supe' => '8839',  'oplus' => '8853',  'otimes' => '8855',  'perp' => '8869',  'sdot' => '8901',  'lceil' => '8968',
27099   'rceil' => '8969',  'lfloor' => '8970',  'rfloor' => '8971',  'lang' => '9001',  'rang' => '9002',  'loz' => '9674',  'spades' => '9824',
27100   'clubs' => '9827',  'hearts' => '9829',  'diams' => '9830',
27101  );
27102   foreach($entarr AS $key => $val) {
27103     $this->entsearch[] = '&'.$key.';';
27104     $this->entsubstitute[] = code2utf($val);
27105   }
27106 }
27107 
27108 function SubstituteHiEntities($html) {
27109   // converts html_entities > ASCII 127 to unicode (defined in includes/pdf/config.php
27110   // Leaves in particular &lt; to distinguish from tag marker
27111   if (count($this->entsearch)) {
27112     $html = str_replace($this->entsearch,$this->entsubstitute,$html);
27113   }
27114   return $html;
27115 }
27116 
27117 
27118 // Edited v1.2 Pass by reference; option to continue if invalid UTF-8 chars
27119 function is_utf8(&$string) {
27120   if ($string === mb_convert_encoding(mb_convert_encoding($string, "UTF-32", "UTF-8"), "UTF-8", "UTF-32")) {
27121     return true;
27122   } 
27123   else {
27124     if ($this->ignore_invalid_utf8) {
27125     $string = mb_convert_encoding(mb_convert_encoding($string, "UTF-32", "UTF-8"), "UTF-8", "UTF-32") ;
27126     return true;
27127     }
27128     else {
27129     return false;
27130     }
27131   }
27132 } 
27133 
27134 
27135 function purify_utf8($html,$lo=true) {
27136   // For HTML
27137   // Checks string is valid UTF-8 encoded
27138   // converts html_entities > ASCII 127 to UTF-8
27139   // Only exception - leaves low ASCII entities e.g. &lt; &amp; etc.
27140   // Leaves in particular &lt; to distinguish from tag marker
27141   if (!$this->is_utf8($html)) { $this->Error("HTML contains invalid UTF-8 character(s)"); }
27142   $html = preg_replace("/\r/", "", $html );
27143 
27144   // converts html_entities > ASCII 127 to UTF-8 
27145   // Leaves in particular &lt; to distinguish from tag marker
27146   $html = $this->SubstituteHiEntities($html);
27147 
27148   // converts all &#nnn; or &#xHHH; to UTF-8 multibyte
27149   // If $lo==true then includes ASCII < 128
27150   $html = strcode2utf($html,$lo); 
27151 
27152 /*-- CJK --*/
27153   // NON-BREAKING SPACE - convert to space as doesn't exist in CJK codepages (except japanese SJIS)
27154   if ($this->isCJK) {
27155     $html = preg_replace("/\xc2\xa0/"," ",$html); // non-breaking space
27156   }
27157 /*-- END CJK --*/
27158 
27159   return ($html);
27160 }
27161 
27162 function purify_utf8_text($txt) {
27163   // For TEXT
27164   // Make sure UTF-8 string of characters
27165   if (!$this->is_utf8($txt)) { $this->Error("Text contains invalid UTF-8 character(s)"); }
27166 
27167   $txt = preg_replace("/\r/", "", $txt );
27168 
27169 /*-- CJK --*/
27170   // NON-BREAKING SPACE - convert to space as doesn't exist in CJK codepages
27171   if ($this->isCJK) {
27172     $txt = preg_replace("/\xc2\xa0/"," ",$txt); // non-breaking space
27173   }
27174 /*-- END CJK --*/
27175 
27176   return ($txt);
27177 }
27178 function all_entities_to_utf8($txt) {
27179   // converts txt_entities > ASCII 127 to UTF-8 
27180   // Leaves in particular &lt; to distinguish from tag marker
27181   $txt = $this->SubstituteHiEntities($txt);
27182 
27183   // converts all &#nnn; or &#xHHH; to UTF-8 multibyte
27184   $txt = strcode2utf($txt); 
27185 
27186 
27187   $txt = $this->lesser_entity_decode($txt);
27188   return ($txt);
27189 }
27190 
27191     
27192 
27193 // ====================================================
27194 /*-- BARCODES --*/
27195 // UPC/EAN barcode
27196 // EAN13, EAN8, UPCA, UPCE, ISBN, ISSN
27197 // Accepts 12 or 13 digits with or without - hyphens
27198 function WriteBarcode($code, $showtext=1, $x='', $y='', $size=1, $border=0, $paddingL=1, $paddingR=1, $paddingT=2, $paddingB=2, $height=1, $bgcol=false, $col=false, $btype='ISBN', $supplement='0', $supplement_code='', $k=1) {
27199       if (empty($code)) {
27200         return;
27201       }
27202       $codestr = $code;
27203       $code = preg_replace('/\-/','',$code);
27204 
27205       if (!class_exists('PDFBarcode')) { 
27206         include(_MPDF_PATH.'classes/barcode.php'); 
27207         $this->barcode = new PDFBarcode();
27208       }
27209       if ($btype == 'ISSN' || $btype == 'ISBN') {
27210         $arrcode = $this->barcode->getBarcodeArray($code, 'EAN13');
27211       }
27212       else { $arrcode = $this->barcode->getBarcodeArray($code, $btype); }
27213 
27214       if ($arrcode === false) { $this->Error('Error in barcode string: '.$codestr); }
27215       if((($btype=='EAN13' || $btype=='ISBN' || $btype=='ISSN') && strlen($code) == 12) || ($btype=='UPCA' && strlen($code) == 11)
27216         || ($btype=='UPCE' && strlen($code) == 11) || ($btype=='EAN8' && strlen($code) == 7)) {
27217         $code .= $arrcode['checkdigit'];
27218         if (stristr($codestr,'-')) { $codestr .= '-' . $arrcode['checkdigit']; }
27219         else { $codestr .= $arrcode['checkdigit']; }
27220       }
27221       if ($btype == 'ISBN') { $codestr = 'ISBN '.$codestr; }
27222       if ($btype == 'ISSN') { $codestr = 'ISSN '.$codestr; }
27223 
27224       if (empty($x)) {
27225         $x = $this->GetX();
27226       }
27227       if (empty($y)) {
27228         $y = $this->GetY();
27229       }
27230       // set foreground color
27231       $prevDrawColor = $this->DrawColor;
27232       $prevTextColor = $this->TextColor;
27233       $prevFillColor = $this->FillColor;
27234       $lw = $this->LineWidth;
27235       $this->SetLineWidth(0.01);
27236 
27237       $size /= $k;  // in case resized in a table
27238 
27239       $xres = $arrcode['nom-X'] * $size;
27240       $llm = $arrcode['lightmL'] * $arrcode['nom-X'] * $size; // Left Light margin
27241       $rlm = $arrcode['lightmR'] * $arrcode['nom-X'] * $size; // Right Light margin
27242 
27243       $bcw = ($arrcode["maxw"] * $xres);  // Barcode width = Should always be 31.35mm * $size
27244 
27245       $fbw = $bcw + $llm + $rlm;  // Full barcode width incl. light margins
27246       $ow = $fbw + $paddingL + $paddingR; // Full overall width incl. user-defined padding
27247 
27248       $fbwi = $fbw - 2; // Full barcode width incl. light margins - 2mm - for isbn string
27249 
27250       // cf. http://www.gs1uk.org/downloads/bar_code/Bar coding getting it right.pdf
27251       $num_height = 3 * $size;          // Height of numerals
27252       $fbh = $arrcode['nom-H'] * $size * $height;   // Full barcode height incl. numerals
27253       $bch = $fbh - (1.5 * $size);          // Barcode height of bars  (3mm for numerals)
27254 
27255       if (($btype=='EAN13' && $showtext) || $btype == 'ISSN' || $btype == 'ISBN') { // Add height for ISBN string + margin from top of bars
27256         $tisbnm = 1.5 * $size;  // Top margin between isbn (if shown) & bars
27257         $codestr_fontsize = 2.1 * $size;
27258         $paddingT += $codestr_fontsize + $tisbnm  ; 
27259       }
27260       $oh = $fbh + $paddingT + $paddingB;   // Full overall height incl. user-defined padding
27261 
27262       // PRINT border background color
27263       $xpos = $x;
27264       $ypos = $y;
27265       if (is_array($col)) { //  from <barcode />
27266         $this->SetDrawColor($col['R'],$col['G'],$col['B']);
27267         $this->SetTextColor($col['R'],$col['G'],$col['B']);
27268       }
27269       else {
27270         $this->SetDrawColor(0);
27271         $this->SetTextColor(0);
27272       }
27273       if (is_array($bgcol)) { //  from <barcode />
27274         $this->SetFillColor($bgcol['R'],$bgcol['G'],$bgcol['B']);
27275       }
27276       else { $this->SetFillColor(255); }
27277       if (!$bgcol && !$col) { // fn. called directly - not via HTML
27278         if ($border) { $fillb = 'DF'; } else { $fillb = 'F'; }
27279         $this->Rect($xpos, $ypos, $ow, $oh, $fillb);
27280       }
27281 
27282 
27283       // PRINT BARS
27284       $xpos = $x + $paddingL + $llm ;
27285       $ypos = $y + $paddingT;
27286       if (is_array($col)) { $this->SetFillColor($col['R'],$col['G'],$col['B']); }
27287       else { $this->SetFillColor(0); }
27288       if ($arrcode !== false) {
27289         foreach ($arrcode["bcode"] AS $v) {
27290           $bw = ($v["w"] * $xres);
27291           if ($v["t"]) {
27292             // draw a vertical bar
27293             $this->Rect($xpos, $ypos, $bw, $bch, 'F');
27294           }
27295           $xpos += $bw;
27296         }
27297       }
27298 
27299 
27300       // print text
27301       $prevFontFamily = $this->FontFamily;
27302       $prevFontStyle = $this->FontStyle;
27303       $prevFontSizePt = $this->FontSizePt;
27304 
27305       // ISBN string
27306       if (($btype=='EAN13' && $showtext) || $btype=='ISBN' || $btype=='ISSN') {
27307          // mPDF 4.2.018
27308          if ($this->PDFA) {
27309         if (!$this->PDFAauto) { $this->PDFAwarnings[] = "Core Adobe font Helvetica cannot be embedded in mPDF - used in barcode - which is required for PDFA1-b. (Embedded font will be substituted.)"; }
27310           $this->SetFont('sans');
27311          }
27312          else {
27313         $this->SetFont('helvetica');
27314          }
27315          // mPDF 4.0
27316          if (is_array($bgcol)) { $this->SetFillColor($bgcol['R'],$bgcol['G'],$bgcol['B']); }
27317          else { $this->SetFillColor(255); }
27318          $this->x = $x + $paddingL + 1; // 1mm left margin (cf. $fbwi above)
27319          // max width is $fbwi 
27320          $loop = 0;
27321          while ( $loop == 0 ) {
27322         $this->SetFontSize($codestr_fontsize*1.4*$this->k, false);  // don't write
27323         $sz = $this->GetStringWidth( $codestr );
27324         if ($sz > $fbwi)
27325           $codestr_fontsize -= 0.1;
27326         else
27327           $loop ++;
27328          }
27329          $this->SetFont('','',$codestr_fontsize*1.4*$this->k, true, true);  // * 1.4 because font height is only 7/10 of given mm
27330          // WORD SPACING
27331          if ($fbwi > $sz) {
27332         $xtra =  $fbwi - $sz;
27333         $charspacing = $xtra / (strlen($codestr)-1);
27334         if ($charspacing) { $this->_out(sprintf('BT %.3f Tc ET',$charspacing*$this->k)); }
27335          }
27336          $this->y = $y + $paddingT - ($codestr_fontsize ) - $tisbnm ; 
27337          $this->Cell($fbw , $codestr_fontsize, $codestr);
27338          if ($charspacing) { $this->_out('BT 0 Tc ET'); }
27339       }
27340 
27341 
27342       // Bottom NUMERALS
27343 /*-- UNICODE-FONTS --*/
27344       if ($this->is_MB) {
27345         if (in_array('ocrb',$this->available_unifonts)) { $this->SetFont('ocrb'); }
27346         else { $this->SetFont('mono'); }
27347       }
27348       else {
27349 /*-- END UNICODE-FONTS --*/
27350         if (in_array('ocrb',$this->available_fonts)) { $this->SetFont('ocrb'); }
27351         else { $this->SetFont('mono'); }
27352       } // *UNICODE-FONTS*
27353       if (isset($this->CurrentFont['desc']['Ascent']) && $this->CurrentFont['desc']['Ascent']) { $fh = 1000/$this->CurrentFont['desc']['Ascent']; }
27354       else { $fh = 1.4; }
27355 
27356       $charRO = '';
27357       if ($btype=='EAN13' || $btype=='ISBN' || $btype=='ISSN') {
27358         $outerfontsize = 3; // Inner fontsize = 3
27359         $outerp = $xres * 4;
27360         $innerp = $xres * 2.5;
27361         $textw = ($bcw*0.5) - $outerp - $innerp;
27362         $chars = 6; // number of numerals in each half
27363         $charLO = substr($code,0,1); // Left Outer
27364         $charLI = substr($code,1,6); // Left Inner
27365         $charRI = substr($code,7,6); // Right Inner
27366         if (!$supplement) $charRO = '>'; // Right Outer
27367       }
27368       else if ($btype=='UPCA') {
27369         $outerfontsize = 2.3; // Inner fontsize = 3
27370         $outerp = $xres * 10;
27371         $innerp = $xres * 2.5;
27372         $textw = ($bcw*0.5) - $outerp - $innerp;
27373         $chars = 5; 
27374         $charLO = substr($code,0,1); // Left Outer
27375         $charLI = substr($code,1,5); // Left Inner
27376         $charRI = substr($code,6,5); // Right Inner
27377         $charRO = substr($code,11,1); // Right Outer
27378       }
27379       else if ($btype=='UPCE') {
27380         $outerfontsize = 2.3; // Inner fontsize = 3
27381         $outerp = $xres * 4;
27382         $innerp = 0;
27383         $textw = ($bcw*0.5) - $outerp - $innerp;
27384         $chars = 3; 
27385         $upce_code = $arrcode['code'];
27386         $charLO = substr($code,0,1); // Left Outer
27387         $charLI = substr($upce_code,0,3); // Left Inner
27388         $charRI = substr($upce_code,3,3); // Right Inner
27389         $charRO = substr($code,11,1); // Right Outer
27390       }
27391       else if ($btype=='EAN8') {
27392         $outerfontsize = 3; // Inner fontsize = 3
27393         $outerp = $xres * 4;
27394         $innerp = $xres * 2.5;
27395         $textw = ($bcw*0.5) - $outerp - $innerp;
27396         $chars = 4; 
27397         $charLO = '<'; // Left Outer
27398         $charLI = substr($code,0,4); // Left Inner
27399         $charRI = substr($code,4,4); // Right Inner
27400         if (!$supplement) $charRO = '>'; // Right Outer
27401       }
27402 
27403       $this->SetFontSize(($outerfontsize/3)*3*$fh*$size*$this->k);  // 3mm numerals (FontSize is larger to account for space above/below characters)
27404 
27405       if ($this->is_MB) { $cw = $this->CurrentFont['cw'][32]*3*$fh*$size/1000; }  // character width at 3mm
27406       else { $cw = $this->CurrentFont['cw']['0']*$this->FontSize/1000; }    // 
27407 
27408       // Outer left character
27409       $y_text = $y + $paddingT + $bch - ($num_height/2); 
27410       $y_text_outer = $y + $paddingT + $bch - ($num_height*($outerfontsize/3)/2); 
27411 
27412       $this->x = $x + $paddingL - ($cw*($outerfontsize/3)*0.1); // 0.1 is correction as char does not fill full width;
27413       $this->y = $y_text_outer; 
27414       $this->Cell($cw, $num_height, $charLO );
27415 
27416       // WORD SPACING for inner chars
27417       $xtra =  $textw - ($cw*$chars);
27418       $charspacing = $xtra / ($chars-1);
27419       if ($charspacing) { $this->_out(sprintf('BT %.3f Tc ET',$charspacing*$this->k)); }
27420 
27421       if (is_array($bgcol)) { $this->SetFillColor($bgcol['R'],$bgcol['G'],$bgcol['B']); }
27422       else { $this->SetFillColor(255); }
27423 
27424       $this->SetFontSize(3*$fh*$size*$this->k); // 3mm numerals (FontSize is larger to account for space above/below characters)
27425 
27426       // Inner left half characters
27427       $this->x = $x + $paddingL + $llm + $outerp;
27428       $this->y = $y_text; 
27429       $this->Cell($textw, $num_height, $charLI , 0, 0, '', 1);
27430 
27431       // Inner right half characters
27432       $this->x = $x + $paddingL + $llm + ($bcw*0.5) + $innerp;
27433       $this->y = $y_text; 
27434       $this->Cell($textw, $num_height, $charRI , 0, 0, '', 1);
27435 
27436       if ($charspacing) { $this->_out('BT 0 Tc ET'); }
27437 
27438       // Outer Right character
27439       $this->SetFontSize(($outerfontsize/3)*3*$fh*$size*$this->k);  // 3mm numerals (FontSize is larger to account for space above/below characters)
27440 
27441       $this->x = $x + $paddingL + $llm + $bcw + $rlm - ($cw*($outerfontsize/3)*0.9); // 0.9 is correction as char does not fill full width
27442       $this->y = $y_text_outer; 
27443       $this->Cell($cw*($outerfontsize/3), $num_height, $charRO , 0, 0, 'R');
27444 
27445       if ($supplement) { // EAN-2 or -5 Supplement
27446         // PRINT BARS
27447         $supparrcode = $this->barcode->getBarcodeArray($supplement_code, 'EAN'.$supplement);
27448         if ($supparrcode === false) { $this->Error('Error in barcode string (supplement): '.$codestr.' '.$supplement_code); }
27449         if(strlen($supplement_code) != $supplement) {
27450           $this->Error('Barcode supplement incorrect: '.$supplement_code);
27451         }
27452         $llm = $fbw - (($arrcode['lightmR'] - $supparrcode['sepM'])  * $arrcode['nom-X'] * $size);  // Left Light margin
27453         $rlm = $arrcode['lightmR'] * $arrcode['nom-X'] * $size; // Right Light margin
27454 
27455         $bcw = ($supparrcode["maxw"] * $xres);  // Barcode width = Should always be 31.35mm * $size
27456 
27457         $fbw = $bcw + $llm + $rlm;  // Full barcode width incl. light margins
27458         $ow = $fbw + $paddingL + $paddingR; // Full overall width incl. user-defined padding
27459         $bch = $fbh - (1.5 * $size) - ($num_height + 0.5);    // Barcode height of bars  (3mm for numerals)
27460 
27461         $xpos = $x + $paddingL + $llm ;
27462         $ypos = $y + $paddingT + $num_height + 0.5;
27463         if (is_array($col)) { $this->SetFillColor($col['R'],$col['G'],$col['B']); }
27464         else { $this->SetFillColor(0); }
27465         if ($supparrcode !== false) {
27466           foreach ($supparrcode["bcode"] AS $v) {
27467             $bw = ($v["w"] * $xres);
27468             if ($v["t"]) {
27469               // draw a vertical bar
27470               $this->Rect($xpos, $ypos, $bw, $bch, 'F');
27471             }
27472             $xpos += $bw;
27473           }
27474         }
27475 
27476         // Characters
27477         if (is_array($bgcol)) { $this->SetFillColor($bgcol['R'],$bgcol['G'],$bgcol['B']); }
27478         else { $this->SetFillColor(255); }
27479         $this->SetFontSize(3*$fh*$size*$this->k); // 3mm numerals (FontSize is larger to account for space above/below characters)
27480         $this->x = $x + $paddingL + $llm;
27481         $this->y = $y + $paddingT; 
27482         $this->Cell($bcw, $num_height, $supplement_code, 0, 0, 'C');
27483 
27484         // Outer Right character (light margin)
27485         $this->SetFontSize(($outerfontsize/3)*3*$fh*$size*$this->k);  // 3mm numerals (FontSize is larger to account for space above/below characters)
27486         $this->x = $x + $paddingL + $llm + $bcw + $rlm - ($cw*0.9); // 0.9 is correction as char does not fill full width
27487         $this->y = $y + $paddingT; 
27488         $this->Cell($cw*($outerfontsize/3), $num_height, '>', 0, 0, 'R');
27489       }
27490 
27491 
27492 
27493       // Restore **************
27494       $this->SetFont($prevFontFamily, $prevFontStyle, $prevFontSizePt);
27495       $this->DrawColor = $prevDrawColor;
27496       $this->TextColor = $prevTextColor;
27497       $this->FillColor = $prevFillColor;
27498       $this->SetLineWidth($lw);
27499       $this->SetY($y);
27500 }
27501 
27502 
27503 
27504 // ====================================================
27505 // POSTAL and OTHER barcodes
27506 function WriteBarcode2($code, $x='', $y='', $size=1, $height=1, $bgcol=false, $col=false, $btype='IMB', $print_ratio='', $k=1) {
27507       if (empty($code)) { return; }
27508       if (!class_exists('PDFBarcode')) { 
27509         include(_MPDF_PATH.'classes/barcode.php'); 
27510         $this->barcode = new PDFBarcode();
27511       }
27512       $arrcode = $this->barcode->getBarcodeArray($code, $btype, $print_ratio); 
27513 
27514       if ($arrcode === false) { $this->Error('Error in barcode string: '.$code); }
27515       if (empty($x)) { $x = $this->GetX(); }
27516       if (empty($y)) { $y = $this->GetY(); }
27517       $prevDrawColor = $this->DrawColor;
27518       $prevTextColor = $this->TextColor;
27519       $prevFillColor = $this->FillColor;
27520       $lw = $this->LineWidth;
27521       $this->SetLineWidth(0.01);
27522       $size /= $k;  // in case resized in a table
27523       $xres = $arrcode['nom-X'] * $size;
27524 
27525       if ($btype == 'IMB' || $btype == 'RM4SCC' || $btype == 'KIX' || $btype == 'POSTNET' || $btype == 'PLANET') {
27526         $llm = $arrcode['quietL'] / $k; // Left Quiet margin
27527         $rlm = $arrcode['quietR'] / $k; // Right Quiet margin
27528         $tlm = $blm = $arrcode['quietTB'] / $k;
27529         $height=1;    // Overrides
27530       }
27531       else if (in_array($btype, array('C128A','C128B','C128C','EAN128A','EAN128B','EAN128C','C39','C39+','C39E','C39E+','S25','S25+','I25','I25+','I25B','I25B+','C93','MSI','MSI+','CODABAR','CODE11'))) {
27532         $llm = $arrcode['lightmL'] * $xres; // Left Quiet margin
27533         $rlm = $arrcode['lightmR'] * $xres; // Right Quiet margin
27534         $tlm = $blm = $arrcode['lightTB'] * $xres * $height;
27535       }
27536 
27537 
27538       $bcw = ($arrcode["maxw"] * $xres);
27539       $fbw = $bcw + $llm + $rlm;    // Full barcode width incl. light margins
27540 
27541       $bch = ($arrcode["nom-H"] * $size * $height);
27542       $fbh = $bch + $tlm + $blm;    // Full barcode height
27543 
27544       // PRINT border background color
27545       $xpos = $x;
27546       $ypos = $y;
27547       if (is_array($col)) { //  from <barcode />
27548         $this->SetDrawColor($col['R'],$col['G'],$col['B']);
27549         $this->SetTextColor($col['R'],$col['G'],$col['B']);
27550       }
27551       else {
27552         $this->SetDrawColor(0);
27553         $this->SetTextColor(0);
27554       }
27555       if (is_array($bgcol)) { //  from <barcode />
27556         $this->SetFillColor($bgcol['R'],$bgcol['G'],$bgcol['B']);
27557       }
27558       else { $this->SetFillColor(255); }
27559 
27560       // PRINT BARS
27561       if (is_array($col)) { $this->SetFillColor($col['R'],$col['G'],$col['B']); }
27562       else { $this->SetFillColor(0); }
27563       $xpos = $x + $llm ;
27564 
27565       if ($arrcode !== false) {
27566         foreach ($arrcode["bcode"] AS $v) {
27567           $bw = ($v["w"] * $xres);
27568           if ($v["t"]) {
27569             $ypos = $y + $tlm + ($bch * $v['p'] / $arrcode['maxh']);
27570             $this->Rect($xpos, $ypos, $bw, ($v['h'] * $bch / $arrcode['maxh']), 'F');
27571           }
27572           $xpos += $bw;
27573         }
27574       }
27575 
27576       // PRINT BEARER BARS
27577       if ($btype == 'I25B' || $btype == 'I25B+') {
27578         $this->Rect($x, $y, $fbw, ($arrcode['lightTB'] * $xres * $height), 'F');
27579         $this->Rect($x, $y+$tlm+$bch, $fbw, ($arrcode['lightTB'] * $xres * $height), 'F');
27580       } 
27581 
27582       // Restore **************
27583       $this->SetFont($prevFontFamily, $prevFontStyle, $prevFontSizePt);
27584       $this->DrawColor = $prevDrawColor;
27585       $this->TextColor = $prevTextColor;
27586       $this->FillColor = $prevFillColor;
27587       $this->SetLineWidth($lw);
27588       $this->SetY($y);
27589 }
27590 
27591 /*-- END BARCODES --*/
27592 
27593 // ====================================================
27594 // ====================================================
27595 
27596     // START TRANSFORMATIONS SECTION -----------------------
27597     // authors: Moritz Wagner, Andreas Wurmser, Nicola Asuni
27598     // From TCPDF
27599     // Starts a 2D tranformation saving current graphic state.
27600     function StartTransform($returnstring=false) {
27601       if ($returnstring) { return('q'); }
27602       else { $this->_out('q'); }
27603     }
27604     
27605     function StopTransform($returnstring=false) {
27606       if ($returnstring) { return('Q'); }
27607       else { $this->_out('Q'); }
27608     }
27609     
27610     // Vertical and horizontal non-proportional Scaling.
27611     function transformScale($s_x, $s_y, $x='', $y='', $returnstring=false) {
27612       if ($x === '') {
27613         $x=$this->x;
27614       }
27615       if ($y === '') {
27616         $y=$this->y;
27617       }
27618       if (($s_x == 0) OR ($s_y == 0)) {
27619         $this->Error('Please do not use values equal to zero for scaling');
27620       }
27621       $y = ($this->h - $y) * $this->k;
27622       $x *= $this->k;
27623       //calculate elements of transformation matrix
27624       $s_x /= 100;
27625       $s_y /= 100;
27626       $tm[0] = $s_x;
27627       $tm[1] = 0;
27628       $tm[2] = 0;
27629       $tm[3] = $s_y;
27630       $tm[4] = $x * (1 - $s_x);
27631       $tm[5] = $y * (1 - $s_y);
27632       //scale the coordinate system
27633       if ($returnstring) { return($this->_transform($tm, true)); }
27634       else { $this->_transform($tm); }
27635     }
27636     
27637     
27638     // Translate graphic object horizontally and vertically.
27639     function transformTranslate($t_x, $t_y, $returnstring=false) {
27640       //calculate elements of transformation matrix
27641       $tm[0] = 1;
27642       $tm[1] = 0;
27643       $tm[2] = 0;
27644       $tm[3] = 1;
27645       $tm[4] = $t_x * $this->k;
27646       $tm[5] = -$t_y * $this->k;
27647       //translate the coordinate system
27648       if ($returnstring) { return($this->_transform($tm, true)); }
27649       else { $this->_transform($tm); }
27650     }
27651     
27652     // Rotate object.
27653     function transformRotate($angle, $x='', $y='', $returnstring=false) {
27654       if ($x === '') {
27655         $x=$this->x;
27656       }
27657       if ($y === '') {
27658         $y=$this->y;
27659       }
27660       $angle = -$angle;
27661       $y = ($this->h - $y) * $this->k;
27662       $x *= $this->k;
27663       //calculate elements of transformation matrix
27664       $tm[0] = cos(deg2rad($angle));
27665       $tm[1] = sin(deg2rad($angle));
27666       $tm[2] = -$tm[1];
27667       $tm[3] = $tm[0];
27668       $tm[4] = $x + $tm[1] * $y - $tm[0] * $x;
27669       $tm[5] = $y - $tm[0] * $y - $tm[1] * $x;
27670       //rotate the coordinate system around ($x,$y)
27671       if ($returnstring) { return($this->_transform($tm, true)); }
27672       else { $this->_transform($tm); }
27673     }
27674     
27675     
27676     function _transform($tm, $returnstring=false) {
27677       if ($returnstring) { return(sprintf('%.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f cm', $tm[0], $tm[1], $tm[2], $tm[3], $tm[4], $tm[5])); }
27678       else { $this->_out(sprintf('%.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f cm', $tm[0], $tm[1], $tm[2], $tm[3], $tm[4], $tm[5])); }
27679     }
27680     
27681     // END TRANSFORMATIONS SECTION -------------------------
27682 
27683 
27684 
27685 /*-- INDIC --*/
27686 // INDIC ============================
27687 // mPDF 4.0 Font-specific ligature substitution for Indic fonts
27688 // This conversion can only be done when font is set
27689 function ConvertIndic(&$str) {
27690   if (preg_match('/^ind_([a-z]{2})_/',strtolower($this->CurrentFont['name']), $m)) {
27691     if (!class_exists('indic')) { include(_MPDF_PATH.'classes/indic.php'); }
27692     if (empty($this->indic)) { $this->indic = new indic($this); }
27693     $earr = $this->UTF8StringToArray($str);
27694     $str = $this->indic->substituteIndic($earr, $m[1], strtolower($this->CurrentFont['name']), $this->useSubsets);
27695   }
27696 }
27697 /*-- END INDIC --*/
27698 
27699 // AUTOFONT =========================
27700 function AutoFont($html) {
27701   if ( !$this->is_MB ) { return $html; }
27702   $this->useLang = true;
27703   if ($this->autoFontGroupSize == 1) { $extra = $this->pregASCIIchars1; }
27704   else if ($this->autoFontGroupSize == 3) { $extra = $this->pregASCIIchars3; }
27705   else {  $extra = $this->pregASCIIchars2; }
27706   $n = '';
27707   $a=preg_split('/<(.*?)>/ms',$html,-1,PREG_SPLIT_DELIM_CAPTURE);
27708   foreach($a as $i => $e) {
27709      if($i%2==0) {
27710     // mPDF 3.0 
27711     $e = strcode2utf($e); 
27712     $e = $this->lesser_entity_decode($e);
27713 
27714     // mPDF 4.0 Use U=FFF0 and U+FFF1 to mark start and end of span tags to prevent nesting occurring
27715     // "\xef\xbf\xb0" ##lthtmltag## "\xef\xbf\xb1" ##gthtmltag##
27716 
27717 /*-- CJK --*/
27718     // CJK
27719     if ($this->autoFontGroups & AUTOFONT_CJK) {
27720       $e = preg_replace("/([".$this->pregCJKchars.$extra."]*[".$this->pregCJKchars."][".$this->pregCJKchars.$extra."]*)/ue", '$this->replaceCJK(stripslashes(\'\\1\'))', $e);
27721     }
27722 /*-- END CJK --*/
27723 
27724 /*-- RTL --*/
27725     if ($this->autoFontGroups & AUTOFONT_RTL) {
27726       // HEBREW
27727       $e = preg_replace("/([".$this->pregHEBchars .$extra."]*[".$this->pregHEBchars ."][".$this->pregHEBchars .$extra."]*)/u", "\xef\xbf\xb0span lang=\"he\"\xef\xbf\xb1\\1\xef\xbf\xb0/span\xef\xbf\xb1", $e); 
27728       // All Arabic
27729       $e = preg_replace("/([".$this->pregARABICchars .$extra."]*[".$this->pregARABICchars ."][".$this->pregARABICchars .$extra."]*)/ue", '$this->replaceArabic(stripslashes(\'\\1\'))', $e);
27730     }
27731 /*-- END RTL --*/
27732 
27733 /*-- INDIC --*/
27734     // INDIC
27735     if ($this->autoFontGroups & AUTOFONT_INDIC) {
27736     // mPDF 4.0
27737       // Bengali
27738       $e = preg_replace("/([".$this->pregBNchars .$this->pregINDextra."]*[".$this->pregBNchars ."][".$this->pregBNchars .$this->pregINDextra."]*)/u", "\xef\xbf\xb0span lang=\"bn\"\xef\xbf\xb1\\1\xef\xbf\xb0/span\xef\xbf\xb1", $e);  
27739       // Devanagari (= script for Hindi, Nepali + Sindhi)
27740       $e = preg_replace("/([".$this->pregHIchars .$this->pregINDextra."]*[".$this->pregHIchars ."][".$this->pregHIchars .$this->pregINDextra."]*)/u", "\xef\xbf\xb0span lang=\"hi\"\xef\xbf\xb1\\1\xef\xbf\xb0/span\xef\xbf\xb1", $e);  
27741       // Gujarati
27742       $e = preg_replace("/([".$this->pregGUchars .$this->pregINDextra."]*[".$this->pregGUchars ."][".$this->pregGUchars .$this->pregINDextra."]*)/u", "\xef\xbf\xb0span lang=\"gu\"\xef\xbf\xb1\\1\xef\xbf\xb0/span\xef\xbf\xb1", $e);  
27743       // Malayalam
27744       $e = preg_replace("/([".$this->pregMLchars .$this->pregINDextra."]*[".$this->pregMLchars ."][".$this->pregMLchars .$this->pregINDextra."]*)/u", "\xef\xbf\xb0span lang=\"ml\"\xef\xbf\xb1\\1\xef\xbf\xb0/span\xef\xbf\xb1", $e);  
27745       // Kannada
27746       $e = preg_replace("/([".$this->pregKNchars .$this->pregINDextra."]*[".$this->pregKNchars ."][".$this->pregKNchars .$this->pregINDextra."]*)/u", "\xef\xbf\xb0span lang=\"kn\"\xef\xbf\xb1\\1\xef\xbf\xb0/span\xef\xbf\xb1", $e);  
27747       // Oriya
27748       $e = preg_replace("/([".$this->pregORchars .$this->pregINDextra."]*[".$this->pregORchars ."][".$this->pregORchars .$this->pregINDextra."]*)/u", "\xef\xbf\xb0span lang=\"or\"\xef\xbf\xb1\\1\xef\xbf\xb0/span\xef\xbf\xb1", $e);  
27749       // Punjabi ?= Gurmuhki 
27750       $e = preg_replace("/([".$this->pregPAchars .$this->pregINDextra."]*[".$this->pregPAchars ."][".$this->pregPAchars .$this->pregINDextra."]*)/u", "\xef\xbf\xb0span lang=\"pa\"\xef\xbf\xb1\\1\xef\xbf\xb0/span\xef\xbf\xb1", $e);  
27751       // Tamil
27752       $e = preg_replace("/([".$this->pregTAchars .$this->pregINDextra."]*[".$this->pregTAchars ."][".$this->pregTAchars .$this->pregINDextra."]*)/u", "\xef\xbf\xb0span lang=\"ta\"\xef\xbf\xb1\\1\xef\xbf\xb0/span\xef\xbf\xb1", $e);  
27753       // Telugu
27754       $e = preg_replace("/([".$this->pregTEchars .$this->pregINDextra."]*[".$this->pregTEchars ."][".$this->pregTEchars .$this->pregINDextra."]*)/u", "\xef\xbf\xb0span lang=\"te\"\xef\xbf\xb1\\1\xef\xbf\xb0/span\xef\xbf\xb1", $e);  
27755     }
27756 /*-- END INDIC --*/
27757 
27758 
27759     // mPDF 4.0 Moved so Vietnamese detection better
27760     if ($this->autoFontGroups & AUTOFONT_THAIVIET) {
27761       // THAI
27762       $e = preg_replace("/([\x{0E00}-\x{0E7F}".$extra."]*[\x{0E00}-\x{0E7F}][\x{0E00}-\x{0E7F}".$extra."]*)/u", "\xef\xbf\xb0span lang=\"th\"\xef\xbf\xb1\\1\xef\xbf\xb0/span\xef\xbf\xb1", $e);
27763       // Vietnamese
27764       $e = preg_replace("/([".$this->pregVIETchars .$this->pregVIETPluschars ."]*[".$this->pregVIETchars ."][".$this->pregVIETchars .$this->pregVIETPluschars ."]*)/u", "\xef\xbf\xb0span lang=\"vi\"\xef\xbf\xb1\\1\xef\xbf\xb0/span\xef\xbf\xb1", $e);  
27765     }
27766 
27767     // mPDF 3.0 
27768     $e = preg_replace('/[&]/u','&amp;',$e);
27769     $e = preg_replace('/[<]/u','&lt;',$e);
27770     $e = preg_replace('/[>]/u','&gt;',$e);
27771     // mPDF 4.0
27772     $e = preg_replace("/(\xef\xbf\xb0span lang=\"([a-z\-A-Z]{2,5})\"\xef\xbf\xb1)\s+/",' \\1',$e);
27773     $e = preg_replace("/[ ]+(\xef\xbf\xb0\/span\xef\xbf\xb1)/",'\\1 ',$e);  // mPDF 4.3.012C
27774 
27775     $e = preg_replace("/\xef\xbf\xb0span lang=\"([a-z\-A-Z]{2,5})\"\xef\xbf\xb1/","\xef\xbf\xb0span lang=\"\\1\" class=\"lang_\\1\"\xef\xbf\xb1",$e);
27776 
27777     $e = preg_replace("/\xef\xbf\xb0/",'<',$e);
27778     $e = preg_replace("/\xef\xbf\xb1/",'>',$e);
27779 
27780     $a[$i] = $e;
27781      }
27782      else {
27783     $a[$i] = '<'.$e.'>'; 
27784      }
27785   }
27786   $n = implode('',$a);
27787   return $n;
27788 }
27789 
27790 
27791 /*-- CJK --*/
27792 function replaceCJK($str) {
27793   // mPDF 4.0 Use U=FFF0 and U+FFF1 to mark start and end of span tags to prevent nesting occurring
27794   // "\xef\xbf\xb0" ##lthtmltag## "\xef\xbf\xb1" ##gthtmltag##
27795   if (preg_match("/[".$this->pregUHCchars."]/u", $str)) { 
27796     return "\xef\xbf\xb0span lang=\"ko\"\xef\xbf\xb1" . $str ."\xef\xbf\xb0/span\xef\xbf\xb1";
27797   }
27798   else if (preg_match("/[".$this->pregSJISchars."]/u", $str)) { 
27799     return "\xef\xbf\xb0span lang=\"ja\"\xef\xbf\xb1" . $str ."\xef\xbf\xb0/span\xef\xbf\xb1";
27800   }
27801   // mPDF 3.0  if in Unicode Plane 2, probably HKCS (incl in BIG5) if not Japanese
27802   else if (preg_match("/[\x{20000}-\x{2AFFF}]/u", $str)) { 
27803     return "\xef\xbf\xb0span lang=\"zh-HK\"\xef\xbf\xb1" . $str ."\xef\xbf\xb0/span\xef\xbf\xb1";
27804   }
27805   else{ 
27806     return "\xef\xbf\xb0span lang=\"zh-CN\"\xef\xbf\xb1" . $str ."\xef\xbf\xb0/span\xef\xbf\xb1";
27807   }
27808   return $str;
27809 }
27810 /*-- END CJK --*/
27811 
27812 /*-- RTL --*/
27813 function replaceArabic($str) {
27814   // mPDF 4.0 remove rtlAsArabicFarsi
27815   // PASHTO, SINDHI, URDU, ARABIC, PERSIAN
27816   $persian = "\x{067E}\x{0686}\x{0698}\x{06AF}";
27817 
27818   $urdu = "\x{0679}\x{0688}\x{0691}\x{06BA}\x{06BE}\x{06C1}\x{06D2}";
27819   $pashto = "\x{067C}\x{0681}\x{0685}\x{0689}\x{0693}\x{0696}\x{069A}\x{06BC}\x{06D0}";
27820   $sindhi = "\x{067A}\x{067B}\x{067D}\x{067F}\x{0680}\x{0684}\x{068D}\x{068A}\x{068F}\x{068C}\x{0687}\x{0683}\x{0699}\x{06AA}\x{06A6}\x{06BB}\x{06B1}\x{06B3}";
27821   // mPDF 4.0 Use U=FFF0 and U+FFF1 to mark start and end of span tags to prevent nesting occurring
27822   // "\xef\xbf\xb0" ##lthtmltag## "\xef\xbf\xb1" ##gthtmltag##
27823 
27824   if (preg_match("/[".$this->pregNonARABICchars ."]/u", $str) ) {
27825     if (preg_match("/[".$sindhi ."]/u", $str) ) {
27826       return "\xef\xbf\xb0span lang=\"sd\"\xef\xbf\xb1".$str."\xef\xbf\xb0/span\xef\xbf\xb1"; 
27827     }
27828     else if (preg_match("/[".$urdu ."]/u", $str) ) {
27829       return "\xef\xbf\xb0span lang=\"ur\"\xef\xbf\xb1".$str."\xef\xbf\xb0/span\xef\xbf\xb1"; 
27830     }
27831     else if (preg_match("/[".$pashto ."]/u", $str) ) {
27832       return "\xef\xbf\xb0span lang=\"ps\"\xef\xbf\xb1".$str."\xef\xbf\xb0/span\xef\xbf\xb1"; 
27833     }
27834     else if (preg_match("/[".$persian ."]/u", $str) ) {
27835       return "\xef\xbf\xb0span lang=\"fa\"\xef\xbf\xb1".$str."\xef\xbf\xb0/span\xef\xbf\xb1"; 
27836     }
27837     else {
27838       return "\xef\xbf\xb0span lang=\"ar\"\xef\xbf\xb1".$str."\xef\xbf\xb0/span\xef\xbf\xb1"; 
27839     }
27840   }
27841   if (preg_match("/[".$persian ."]/u", $str) ) {
27842     return "\xef\xbf\xb0span lang=\"fa\"\xef\xbf\xb1".$str."\xef\xbf\xb0/span\xef\xbf\xb1"; 
27843   }
27844   else {
27845     return "\xef\xbf\xb0span lang=\"ar\"\xef\xbf\xb1".$str."\xef\xbf\xb0/span\xef\xbf\xb1"; 
27846   }
27847   return $str;
27848 }
27849 
27850 // ARABIC ===========================
27851 function InitArabic() {
27852 
27853   // JOIN TO FOLLOWING LETTER IN LOGICAL ORDER
27854   // U+060c U+061f; U+061b; U+0640; U+0626; U+0628; U+062a; U+062b; U+062c; U+062d; U+062e; U+0633; U+0634; U+0635; U+0636; U+0637; 
27855   // U+0638; U+0639; U+063a; U+0641; U+0642; U+0643; U+0644; U+0645; U+0646; U+0647; U+064a; U+06a9; U+06cc; U+0686; U+06af; U+067e;
27856   // U+06D0; U+0681; U+06C1;
27857   $this->arabPrevLink = "\xd8\x8c\xd8\x9f\xd8\x9b\xd9\x80\xd8\xa6\xd8\xa8\xd8\xaa\xd8\xab\xd8\xac\xd8\xad\xd8\xae\xd8\xb3\xd8\xb4\xd8\xb5\xd8\xb6\xd8\xb7\xd8\xb8\xd8\xb9\xd8\xba\xd9\x81\xd9\x82\xd9\x83\xd9\x84\xd9\x85\xd9\x86\xd9\x87\xd9\x8a\xda\xa9\xdb\x8c\xda\x86\xda\xaf\xd9\xbe\xdb\x90\xda\x81\xdb\x81";
27858 
27859   // mPDF 4.0 
27860   // \xda\x98 (U+0698) removed from arabPrevLink
27861   // \xd9\xb1 (U+0671) added to arabNextLink & final form added to Persian Glyphs (FB51)
27862 
27863 
27864   // JOIN TO PREVIOUS LETTER IN LOGICAL ORDER
27865   // U+0640 U+0622; U+0623; U+0624; U+0625; U+0627; U+0626; U+0628; U+0629; U+062a; U+062b; U+062c; U+062d; U+062e; U+062f; U+0630;
27866   // U+0631; U+0632; U+0633; U+0634; U+0635; U+0636; U+0637; U+0638; U+0639; U+063a; U+0641; U+0642; U+0643; U+0644; U+0645; U+0646;
27867   // U+0647; U+0648; U+0649; U+064a; U+06a9; U+06cc; U+0686; U+06af; U+0698; U+067e;  
27868   // U+0671; U+06D0; U+0696; U+0693; U+06D2; U+06C1;
27869   $this->arabNextLink = "\xd9\x80\xd8\xa2\xd8\xa3\xd8\xa4\xd8\xa5\xd8\xa7\xd8\xa6\xd8\xa8\xd8\xa9\xd8\xaa\xd8\xab\xd8\xac\xd8\xad\xd8\xae\xd8\xaf\xd8\xb0\xd8\xb1\xd8\xb2\xd8\xb3\xd8\xb4\xd8\xb5\xd8\xb6\xd8\xb7\xd8\xb8\xd8\xb9\xd8\xba\xd9\x81\xd9\x82\xd9\x83\xd9\x84\xd9\x85\xd9\x86\xd9\x87\xd9\x88\xd9\x89\xd9\x8a\xda\xa9\xdb\x8c\xda\x86\xda\xaf\xda\x98\xd9\xbe\xd9\xb1\xdb\x90\xda\x96\xda\x93\xdb\x92\xdb\x81";
27870 
27871 
27872   // U+064b U+064c; U+064d; U+064e; U+064f; U+0650; U+0651; U+0652;
27873   $this->arabVowels = "\xd9\x8b\xd9\x8c\xd9\x8d\xd9\x8e\xd9\x8f\xd9\x90\xd9\x91\xd9\x92";
27874 
27875   // mPDF 4.0 Added chars that may not be vowels but should not interrupt joining
27876   // U+0670; U+0653; 
27877   $this->arabVowels .= "\xd9\xb0\xd9\x93";
27878   // ? should also add - U+615, 616, 617-61A, 653-65E, 6D6-6DC, 6DF-6E4, 6E7, 6E8, 6EA-6ED
27879 
27880   // DON'T ADD ANY MORE TO ARABGLYPHS - cf. ArabJoin() counts 48 then does ligatures - use PersianGlyphs below
27881   // ISOLATED FORM :: FINAL :: INITIAL :: MEDIAL
27882 
27883   // U+064B; U+064C; U+064D; U+064E; U+064F; U+0650; U+0651; U+0652; 
27884   $this->arabGlyphs = "\xd9\x8b\xd9\x8c\xd9\x8d\xd9\x8e\xd9\x8f\xd9\x90\xd9\x91\xd9\x92";
27885   $this->arabHex = '064B064B064B064B064C064C064C064C064D064D064D064D064E064E064E064E064F064F064F064F065006500650065006510651065106510652065206520652';
27886 
27887   // U+0621; U+0622; U+0623; U+0624; U+0625; U+0626; U+0627; U+0628; 
27888   $this->arabGlyphs .= "\xd8\xa1\xd8\xa2\xd8\xa3\xd8\xa4\xd8\xa5\xd8\xa6\xd8\xa7\xd8\xa8";
27889   $this->arabHex .= '06210621062106210622FE820622FE820623FE840623FE840624FE860624FE860625FE880625FE880626FE8AFE8BFE8C0627FE8E0627FE8E0628FE90FE91FE92';
27890 
27891 
27892   // U+0629; U+062A; U+062B; U+062C; U+062D; U+062E; U+062F; U+0630; 
27893   $this->arabGlyphs .= "\xd8\xa9\xd8\xaa\xd8\xab\xd8\xac\xd8\xad\xd8\xae\xd8\xaf\xd8\xb0";
27894   $this->arabHex .= '0629FE940629FE94062AFE96FE97FE98062BFE9AFE9BFE9C062CFE9EFE9FFEA0062DFEA2FEA3FEA4062EFEA6FEA7FEA8062FFEAA062FFEAA0630FEAC0630FEAC';
27895 
27896 
27897   // U+0631; U+0632; U+0633; U+0634; U+0635; U+0636; U+0637; U+0638; 
27898   $this->arabGlyphs .= "\xd8\xb1\xd8\xb2\xd8\xb3\xd8\xb4\xd8\xb5\xd8\xb6\xd8\xb7\xd8\xb8";
27899   $this->arabHex .= '0631FEAE0631FEAE0632FEB00632FEB00633FEB2FEB3FEB40634FEB6FEB7FEB80635FEBAFEBBFEBC0636FEBEFEBFFEC00637FEC2FEC3FEC40638FEC6FEC7FEC8';
27900 
27901 
27902   // U+0639; U+063A; U+0641; U+0642; U+0643; U+0644; U+0645; U+0646; 
27903   $this->arabGlyphs .= "\xd8\xb9\xd8\xba\xd9\x81\xd9\x82\xd9\x83\xd9\x84\xd9\x85\xd9\x86";
27904   $this->arabHex .= '0639FECAFECBFECC063AFECEFECFFED00641FED2FED3FED40642FED6FED7FED80643FEDAFEDBFEDC0644FEDEFEDFFEE00645FEE2FEE3FEE40646FEE6FEE7FEE8';
27905 
27906 
27907   // U+0647; U+0648; U+0649; U+064A; U+0640; U+060C; U+061F; U+061B; 
27908   $this->arabGlyphs .= "\xd9\x87\xd9\x88\xd9\x89\xd9\x8a\xd9\x80\xd8\x8c\xd8\x9f\xd8\x9b";
27909   // 0649 Initial or medial probably meant to be YEH (064A) so Initial and Medial forms of YEH given
27910   $this->arabHex .= '0647FEEAFEEBFEEC0648FEEE0648FEEE0649FEF0FEF3FEF4064AFEF2FEF3FEF40640064006400640060C060C060C060C061F061F061F061F061B061B061B061B';
27911   // 0649 Alef Maksura should only appear at end of word (in Arabic) So final form given as FEF0. Initial and medial are shown as isolated/final
27912 //  $this->arabHex .= '0647FEEAFEEBFEEC0648FEEE0648FEEE0649FEF00649FEF0064AFEF2FEF3FEF40640064006400640060C060C060C060C061F061F061F061F061B061B061B061B';
27913   // 0649 Alef Maksura Initial and Medial forms as given in Unicode FBE8 and FBE9 (not in most fonts) - dotless vesions of above
27914 //  $this->arabHex .= '0647FEEAFEEBFEEC0648FEEE0648FEEE0649FEF0FBE8FBE9064AFEF2FEF3FEF40640064006400640060C060C060C060C061F061F061F061F061B061B061B061B';
27915 
27916   // LAM with ALEF ligatures
27917   // U+0644; U+0622;   U+0644; U+0623;   U+0644; U+0625;   U+0644; U+0627;
27918   $this->arabGlyphs .= "\xd9\x84\xd8\xa2\xd9\x84\xd8\xa3\xd9\x84\xd8\xa5\xd9\x84\xd8\xa7";
27919   $this->arabHex .= 'FEF5FEF6FEF5FEF6FEF7FEF8FEF7FEF8FEF9FEFAFEF9FEFAFEFBFEFCFEFBFEFC';
27920 
27921 
27922 
27923   // Added Arabic Presentation Forms - A - for Persian and other langauges
27924   // U+067B; U+067E; U+0680; U+067A; U+067F; U+0679; U+06A4; U+06A6; 
27925   $this->persianGlyphs = "\xd9\xbb\xd9\xbe\xda\x80\xd9\xba\xd9\xbf\xd9\xb9\xda\xa4\xda\xa6";
27926   $this->persianHex = '067BFB53FB54FB55067EFB57FB58FB590680FB5BFB5CFB5D067AFB5FFB60FB61067FFB63FB64FB650679FB67FB68FB6906A4FB6BFB6CFB6D06A6FB6FFB70FB71';
27927 
27928   // U+0684; U+0683; U+0686; U+0687; U+0698; U+0691; U+06A9; U+06Af;  
27929   $this->persianGlyphs .= "\xda\x84\xda\x83\xda\x86\xda\x87\xda\x98\xda\x91\xda\xa9\xda\xaf";
27930   $this->persianHex .= '0684FB73FB74FB750683FB77FB78FB790686FB7BFB7CFB7D0687FB7FFB80FB810698FB8B0698FB8B0691FB8D0691FB8D06A9FB8FFB90FB9106AfFB93FB94FB95';
27931 
27932   // U+06BA; U+06CC; U+06C1; U+0671; U+06D0; U+06D2;
27933   // 06C1 final form is same as isolated so use 06C1
27934   $this->persianGlyphs .= "\xda\xba\xdb\x8c\xdb\x81\xd9\xb1\xdb\x90\xdb\x92";
27935   $this->persianHex .= '06BAFB9F06BAFB9F06CCFBFDFBFEFBFF06C106C1FBA8FBA90671FB510671FB5106D0FBE5FBE6FBE706D2FBAF06D2FBAF';
27936 
27937 }
27938     
27939   // ----------------------------------------------------------------------
27940   // Derived from ArPHP
27941   // by Khaled Al-Shamaa
27942   // http://www.ar-php.org
27943   // ----------------------------------------------------------------------
27944 function ArabJoin($str) {
27945   if (!$this->arabGlyphs) { $this->InitArabic(); }
27946   $crntChar = null;
27947   $prevChar = null;
27948   $nextChar = null;
27949   $output = array();
27950   $chars = preg_split('//u', $str);
27951   $max = count($chars);
27952   for ($i = $max - 1; $i >= 0; $i--) {
27953     $crntChar = $chars[$i];
27954     if ($i > 0){ $prevChar = $chars[$i - 1]; }
27955     else{ $prevChar = NULL; }
27956     if ($prevChar && mb_strpos($this->arabVowels, $prevChar, 0, 'utf-8') !== false) {
27957       $prevChar = $chars[$i - 2];
27958       if ($prevChar && mb_strpos($this->arabVowels, $prevChar, 0, 'utf-8') !== false) {
27959         $prevChar = $chars[$i - 3];
27960       }
27961     }
27962     if ($crntChar && mb_strpos($this->arabVowels, $crntChar, 0, 'utf-8') !== false) {
27963       // If next_char = nextLink && prev_char = prevLink:
27964       // mPDF 4.0 Added && $prevchar (defined) else error on mb_strpos()
27965       if ($chars[$i + 1] && (mb_strpos($this->arabNextLink, $chars[$i + 1], 0, 'utf-8') !== false)  && $prevChar && (mb_strpos($this->arabPrevLink, $prevChar, 0, 'utf-8') !== false)) {
27966         $output[] = '&#x' . $this->get_arab_glyphs($crntChar, 1) . ';'; // <final> form
27967       } 
27968       else {
27969         $output[] = '&#x' . $this->get_arab_glyphs($crntChar, 0) . ';';  // <isolated> form
27970       }
27971       continue;
27972     }
27973     // NB = &#x622 &#x623; &#x625; &#x627;     &#x644;
27974     if (isset($chars[$i + 1]) && in_array($chars[$i + 1], array("\xd8\xa2","\xd8\xa3","\xd8\xa5","\xd8\xa7")) && $crntChar == "\xd9\x84"){
27975       continue;
27976     }
27977     if (ord($crntChar) < 128) {
27978       $output[] = $crntChar;
27979       $nextChar = $crntChar;
27980       continue;
27981     }
27982     $form = 0;
27983     if (in_array($crntChar, array("\xd8\xa2", "\xd8\xa3", "\xd8\xa5", "\xd8\xa7")) && $prevChar == "\xd9\x84") {
27984       if ($chars[$i - 2] && mb_strpos($this->arabPrevLink, $chars[$i - 2], 0, 'utf-8') !== false) {
27985         $form++;  // <final> form
27986       }
27987       $output[] = '&#x' . $this->get_arab_glyphs($prevChar . $crntChar, $form) . ';';
27988       $nextChar = $prevChar;
27989       continue;
27990     }
27991     if ($prevChar && mb_strpos($this->arabPrevLink, $prevChar, 0, 'utf-8') !== false) {
27992       $form++;
27993     }
27994     if ($nextChar && mb_strpos($this->arabNextLink, $nextChar, 0, 'utf-8') !== false) {
27995       $form += 2;
27996     }
27997     $output[] = '&#x' . $this->get_arab_glyphs($crntChar, $form) . ';';
27998     $nextChar = $crntChar;
27999   }
28000   $ra = array_reverse($output);
28001   $s = implode($ra);  
28002   $s = strcode2utf($s);
28003   return $s;
28004 }
28005 
28006 function get_arab_glyphs($char, $type) {
28007   $pos = mb_strpos($this->arabGlyphs, $char, 0, 'utf-8');
28008   if ($pos === false) {   // If character not covered here
28009     $pos = mb_strpos($this->persianGlyphs, $char, 0, 'utf-8');  // Try Persian additions
28010     if ($pos === false) {   // return original character
28011     $x = mb_encode_numericentity ($char, array (0x0, 0xffff, 0, 0xffff), 'UTF-8');
28012     preg_match('/&#(\d+);/', $x, $m);
28013     return dechex($m[1]);
28014     }
28015     else {  // if covered by Added Persian chars
28016     $pos = $pos*16 + $type*4;
28017     return mb_substr($this->persianHex, $pos, 4, 'utf-8');
28018     }
28019   }
28020   if ($pos > 48){
28021     $pos = ($pos-48)/2 + 48;
28022   }
28023   $pos = $pos*16 + $type*4;
28024   return mb_substr($this->arabHex, $pos, 4, 'utf-8');
28025 }
28026 /*-- END RTL --*/
28027 
28028 
28029 
28030 //===========================
28031 // Functions originally in htmltoolkit - moved mPDF 4.0
28032 
28033 // Call-back function Used for usort in fn _tableWrite
28034 
28035 function _cmpdom($a, $b) {
28036     return ($a["dom"] < $b["dom"]) ? -1 : 1;
28037 }
28038 
28039 function mb_rtrim($str, $enc = 'utf-8'){
28040   if ($str == ' ' || $str == "\n" || $str == "\t") { return ''; }
28041   $end = mb_strlen($str,$enc);
28042   for($i=$end;$i>0;$i--) {
28043     $last = mb_substr($str,$i-1,1,$enc);
28044     if (($last != ' ') && ($last != "\n") && ($last != "\r") && ($last != "\t")) { return mb_substr($str,0,$i,$enc); }
28045   }
28046   return $str;
28047 }
28048 
28049 function mb_strrev($str, $enc = 'utf-8'){
28050   $ch = array();
28051   for($i=0;$i<mb_strlen($str,$enc);$i++) {
28052     $ch[] = mb_substr($str,$i,1,$enc);
28053   }
28054   $revch = array_reverse($ch);
28055   return implode('',$revch);
28056 }
28057 
28058 /*-- COLUMNS --*/
28059 // Callback function from function printcolumnbuffer in mpdf
28060 function columnAdjustAdd($type,$k,$xadj,$yadj,$a,$b,$c=0,$d=0,$e=0,$f=0) {
28061    if ($type == 'Td') {   // xpos,ypos
28062   $a += ($xadj * $k);
28063   $b -= ($yadj * $k);
28064   return 'BT '.sprintf('%.3f %.3f',$a,$b).' Td'; 
28065    }
28066    else if ($type == 're') {  // xpos,ypos,width,height
28067   $a += ($xadj * $k);
28068   $b -= ($yadj * $k);
28069   return sprintf('%.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f',$a,$b,$c,$d).' re'; 
28070    }
28071    else if ($type == 'l') {   // xpos,ypos,x2pos,y2pos
28072   $a += ($xadj * $k);
28073   $b -= ($yadj * $k);
28074   return sprintf('%.3f %.3f l',$a,$b); 
28075    }
28076    else if ($type == 'img') {   // width,height,xpos,ypos
28077   $c += ($xadj * $k);
28078   $d -= ($yadj * $k);
28079   return sprintf('q %.3f 0 0 %.3f %.3f %.3f',$a,$b,$c,$d).' cm /I'; 
28080    }
28081    else if ($type == 'draw') {  // xpos,ypos
28082   $a += ($xadj * $k);
28083   $b -= ($yadj * $k);
28084   return sprintf('%.3f %.3f m',$a,$b); 
28085    }
28086    else if ($type == 'bezier') {  // xpos,ypos,x2pos,y2pos,x3pos,y3pos
28087   $a += ($xadj * $k);
28088   $b -= ($yadj * $k);
28089   $c += ($xadj * $k);
28090   $d -= ($yadj * $k);
28091   $e += ($xadj * $k);
28092   $f -= ($yadj * $k);
28093   return sprintf('%.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f',$a,$b,$c,$d,$e,$f).' c'; 
28094    }
28095 }
28096 /*-- END COLUMNS --*/
28097 
28098 // Callback function from function printdivbuffer in mpdf - keeping block together on one page
28099 function blockAdjust($type,$k,$xadj,$yadj,$a,$b,$c=0,$d=0,$e=0,$f=0) {
