28100    if ($type == 'Td') {   // xpos,ypos
28101   $a += ($xadj * $k);
28102   $b -= ($yadj * $k);
28103   return 'BT '.sprintf('%.3f %.3f',$a,$b).' Td'; 
28104    }
28105    else if ($type == 're') {  // xpos,ypos,width,height
28106   $a += ($xadj * $k);
28107   $b -= ($yadj * $k);
28108   return sprintf('%.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f',$a,$b,$c,$d).' re'; 
28109    }
28110    else if ($type == 'l') {   // xpos,ypos,x2pos,y2pos
28111   $a += ($xadj * $k);
28112   $b -= ($yadj * $k);
28113   return sprintf('%.3f %.3f l',$a,$b); 
28114    }
28115    else if ($type == 'img') {   // width,height,xpos,ypos
28116   $c += ($xadj * $k);
28117   $d -= ($yadj * $k);
28118   return sprintf('q %.3f 0 0 %.3f %.3f %.3f',$a,$b,$c,$d).' cm /I'; 
28119    }
28120    else if ($type == 'draw') {  // xpos,ypos
28121   $a += ($xadj * $k);
28122   $b -= ($yadj * $k);
28123   return sprintf('%.3f %.3f m',$a,$b); 
28124    }
28125    else if ($type == 'bezier') {  // xpos,ypos,x2pos,y2pos,x3pos,y3pos
28126   $a += ($xadj * $k);
28127   $b -= ($yadj * $k);
28128   $c += ($xadj * $k);
28129   $d -= ($yadj * $k);
28130   $e += ($xadj * $k);
28131   $f -= ($yadj * $k);
28132   return sprintf('%.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f %.3f',$a,$b,$c,$d,$e,$f).' c'; 
28133    }
28134 }
28135 
28136 function ConvertColor($color="#000000"){
28137   //returns an associative array (keys: R,G,B) from html code (e.g. #3FE5AA)
28138   //All color names array
28139   static $common_colors = array('antiquewhite'=>'#FAEBD7','aqua'=>'#00FFFF','aquamarine'=>'#7FFFD4','beige'=>'#F5F5DC','black'=>'#000000',
28140 'blue'=>'#0000FF','brown'=>'#A52A2A','cadetblue'=>'#5F9EA0','chocolate'=>'#D2691E','cornflowerblue'=>'#6495ED','crimson'=>'#DC143C',
28141 'darkblue'=>'#00008B','darkgoldenrod'=>'#B8860B','darkgreen'=>'#006400','darkmagenta'=>'#8B008B','darkorange'=>'#FF8C00',
28142 'darkred'=>'#8B0000','darkseagreen'=>'#8FBC8F','darkslategray'=>'#2F4F4F','darkviolet'=>'#9400D3','deepskyblue'=>'#00BFFF',
28143 'dodgerblue'=>'#1E90FF','firebrick'=>'#B22222','forestgreen'=>'#228B22','fuchsia'=>'#FF00FF','gainsboro'=>'#DCDCDC','gold'=>'#FFD700',
28144 'gray'=>'#808080','green'=>'#008000','greenyellow'=>'#ADFF2F','hotpink'=>'#FF69B4','indigo'=>'#4B0082','khaki'=>'#F0E68C',
28145 'lavenderblush'=>'#FFF0F5','lemonchiffon'=>'#FFFACD','lightcoral'=>'#F08080','lightgoldenrodyellow'=>'#FAFAD2','lightgreen'=>'#90EE90',
28146 'lightsalmon'=>'#FFA07A','lightskyblue'=>'#87CEFA','lightslategray'=>'#778899','lightyellow'=>'#FFFFE0','lime'=>'#00FF00','limegreen'=>'#32CD32',
28147 'magenta'=>'#FF00FF','maroon'=>'#800000','mediumaquamarine'=>'#66CDAA','mediumorchid'=>'#BA55D3','mediumseagreen'=>'#3CB371',
28148 'mediumspringgreen'=>'#00FA9A','mediumvioletred'=>'#C71585','midnightblue'=>'#191970','mintcream'=>'#F5FFFA','moccasin'=>'#FFE4B5','navy'=>'#000080',
28149 'olive'=>'#808000','orange'=>'#FFA500','orchid'=>'#DA70D6','palegreen'=>'#98FB98',
28150 'palevioletred'=>'#D87093','peachpuff'=>'#FFDAB9','pink'=>'#FFC0CB','powderblue'=>'#B0E0E6','purple'=>'#800080',
28151 'red'=>'#FF0000','royalblue'=>'#4169E1','salmon'=>'#FA8072','seagreen'=>'#2E8B57','sienna'=>'#A0522D','silver'=>'#C0C0C0','skyblue'=>'#87CEEB',
28152 'slategray'=>'#708090','springgreen'=>'#00FF7F','steelblue'=>'#4682B4','tan'=>'#D2B48C','teal'=>'#008080','thistle'=>'#D8BFD8','turquoise'=>'#40E0D0',
28153 'violetred'=>'#D02090','white'=>'#FFFFFF','yellow'=>'#FFFF00', 
28154 'aliceblue'=>'#f0f8ff', 'azure'=>'#f0ffff', 'bisque'=>'#ffe4c4', 'blanchedalmond'=>'#ffebcd', 'blueviolet'=>'#8a2be2', 'burlywood'=>'#deb887', 
28155 'chartreuse'=>'#7fff00', 'coral'=>'#ff7f50', 'cornsilk'=>'#fff8dc', 'cyan'=>'#00ffff', 'darkcyan'=>'#008b8b', 'darkgray'=>'#a9a9a9', 
28156 'darkgrey'=>'#a9a9a9', 'darkkhaki'=>'#bdb76b', 'darkolivegreen'=>'#556b2f', 'darkorchid'=>'#9932cc', 'darksalmon'=>'#e9967a', 
28157 'darkslateblue'=>'#483d8b', 'darkslategrey'=>'#2f4f4f', 'darkturquoise'=>'#00ced1', 'deeppink'=>'#ff1493', 'dimgray'=>'#696969', 
28158 'dimgrey'=>'#696969', 'floralwhite'=>'#fffaf0', 'ghostwhite'=>'#f8f8ff', 'goldenrod'=>'#daa520', 'grey'=>'#808080', 'honeydew'=>'#f0fff0', 
28159 'indianred'=>'#cd5c5c', 'ivory'=>'#fffff0', 'lavender'=>'#e6e6fa', 'lawngreen'=>'#7cfc00', 'lightblue'=>'#add8e6', 'lightcyan'=>'#e0ffff', 
28160 'lightgray'=>'#d3d3d3', 'lightgrey'=>'#d3d3d3', 'lightpink'=>'#ffb6c1', 'lightseagreen'=>'#20b2aa', 'lightslategrey'=>'#778899', 
28161 'lightsteelblue'=>'#b0c4de', 'linen'=>'#faf0e6', 'mediumblue'=>'#0000cd', 'mediumpurple'=>'#9370db', 'mediumslateblue'=>'#7b68ee', 
28162 'mediumturquoise'=>'#48d1cc', 'mistyrose'=>'#ffe4e1', 'navajowhite'=>'#ffdead', 'oldlace'=>'#fdf5e6', 'olivedrab'=>'#6b8e23', 'orangered'=>'#ff4500', 
28163 'palegoldenrod'=>'#eee8aa', 'paleturquoise'=>'#afeeee', 'papayawhip'=>'#ffefd5', 'peru'=>'#cd853f', 'plum'=>'#dda0dd', 'rosybrown'=>'#bc8f8f', 
28164 'saddlebrown'=>'#8b4513', 'sandybrown'=>'#f4a460', 'seashell'=>'#fff5ee', 'slateblue'=>'#6a5acd', 'slategrey'=>'#708090', 'snow'=>'#fffafa', 
28165 'tomato'=>'#ff6347', 'violet'=>'#ee82ee', 'wheat'=>'#f5deb3', 'whitesmoke'=>'#f5f5f5', 'yellowgreen'=>'#9acd32');
28166   //http://www.w3schools.com/css/css_colornames.asp
28167   if (strtoupper($color)=='TRANSPARENT') { return false; }
28168   if (strtoupper($color)=='INHERIT') { return false; }
28169 
28170   if (isset($common_colors[strtolower($color)])) $color = $common_colors[strtolower($color)];
28171 
28172   if ($color{0} == '#') //case of #nnnnnn or #nnn
28173   {
28174     $cor = strtoupper($color);
28175   $cor = preg_replace('/\s+.*/','',$cor); // in case of Background: #CCC url() x-repeat etc.
28176     if (strlen($cor) == 4) { // Turn #RGB into #RRGGBB
28177       $cor = "#" . $cor{1} . $cor{1} . $cor{2} . $cor{2} . $cor{3} . $cor{3};
28178   }  
28179   $R = substr($cor, 1, 2);
28180   $vermelho = hexdec($R);
28181   $V = substr($cor, 3, 2);
28182   $verde = hexdec($V);
28183   $B = substr($cor, 5, 2);
28184   $azul = hexdec($B);
28185   $color = array();
28186   $color['R']=$vermelho;
28187   $color['G']=$verde;
28188   $color['B']=$azul;
28189   }
28190   else if (stristr($color,'cmyk(')) { //case of CMYK(c,m,y,k)
28191   $color = str_replace("cmyk(",'',$color); //remove rgb(
28192   $color = str_replace("CMYK(",'',$color); //remove RGB( 
28193   $color = str_replace(")",'',$color); //remove )
28194   $cores = explode(",", $color);
28195   $color = array();
28196   $color['R']=$cores[0];
28197   $color['G']=$cores[1];
28198   $color['B']=$cores[2];
28199   $color['K']=$cores[3];
28200   }
28201   else if (stristr($color,'rgb(')) //case of RGB(r,g,b)
28202   {
28203   $color = str_replace("rgb(",'',$color); //remove rgb(
28204   $color = str_replace("RGB(",'',$color); //remove RGB( -- PHP < 5 does not have str_ireplace
28205   $color = str_replace(")",'',$color); //remove )
28206   $cores = explode(",", $color);
28207   $color = array();
28208   $color['R']=$cores[0];
28209   $color['G']=$cores[1];
28210   $color['B']=$cores[2];
28211   }
28212   else { return false; }
28213   if (empty($color)) return false;
28214   else return $color; // array['R']['G']['B']
28215 }
28216 
28217 function ConvertSize($size=5,$maxsize=0,$fontsize=false,$usefontsize=true){
28218 // usefontsize - setfalse for e.g. margins - will ignore fontsize for % values
28219 // Depends of maxsize value to make % work properly. Usually maxsize == pagewidth
28220 // For text $maxsize = Fontsize
28221 // Setting e.g. margin % will use maxsize (pagewidth) and em will use fontsize
28222   //Identify size (remember: we are using 'mm' units here)
28223   if ( strtolower($size) == 'thin' ) $size = 1*0.2645; //1 pixel width for table borders
28224   elseif ( strtolower($size) == 'medium' ) $size = 3*0.2645; //3 pixel width for table borders
28225   elseif ( strtolower($size) == 'thick' ) $size = 5*0.2645; //5 pixel width for table borders
28226   elseif ( stristr($size,'px') ) $size *= 0.2645; //pixels
28227   elseif ( stristr($size,'cm') ) $size *= 10; //centimeters
28228   elseif ( stristr($size,'mm') ) $size += 0; //millimeters
28229   elseif ( stristr($size,'in') ) $size *= 25.4; //inches 
28230   elseif ( stristr($size,'pc') ) $size *= 38.1/9; //PostScript picas 
28231   elseif ( stristr($size,'pt') ) $size *= 25.4/72; //72dpi
28232   elseif ( stristr($size,'em') ) {
28233     $size += 0; //make "0.83em" become simply "0.83" 
28234   if ($fontsize) { $size *= $fontsize; }
28235   else { $size *= $maxsize; }
28236   }
28237   elseif ( stristr($size,'%') ) {
28238     $size += 0; //make "90%" become simply "90" 
28239   if ($fontsize && $usefontsize) { $size *= $fontsize/100; }
28240   else { $size *= $maxsize/100; }
28241   }
28242   // mPDF 2.3
28243   elseif (strtoupper($size) == 'XX-SMALL') {
28244   if ($fontsize) { $size *= $fontsize*0.7; }
28245   else { $size *= $maxsize*0.7; }
28246   }
28247   elseif (strtoupper($size) == 'X-SMALL') {
28248   if ($fontsize) { $size *= $fontsize*0.77; }
28249   else { $size *= $maxsize*0.77; }
28250   }
28251   elseif (strtoupper($size) == 'SMALL') {
28252   if ($fontsize) { $size *= $fontsize*0.86; }
28253   else { $size *= $maxsize*0.86; }
28254   }
28255   elseif (strtoupper($size) == 'MEDIUM') {
28256   if ($fontsize) { $size *= $fontsize; }
28257   else { $size *= $maxsize; }
28258   }
28259   elseif (strtoupper($size) == 'LARGE') {
28260   if ($fontsize) { $size *= $fontsize*1.2; }
28261   else { $size *= $maxsize*1.2; }
28262   }
28263   elseif (strtoupper($size) == 'X-LARGE') {
28264   if ($fontsize) { $size *= $fontsize*1.5; }
28265   else { $size *= $maxsize*1.5; }
28266   }
28267   elseif (strtoupper($size) == 'XX-LARGE') {
28268   if ($fontsize) { $size *= $fontsize*2; }
28269   else { $size *= $maxsize*2; }
28270   }
28271   else $size *= 0.2645; //nothing == px
28272   
28273   return $size;
28274 }
28275 
28276 
28277 function lesser_entity_decode($html) {
28278   //supports the most used entity codes (only does ascii safe characters)
28279   $html = str_replace("&nbsp;"," ",$html);
28280   $html = str_replace("&lt;","<",$html);
28281   $html = str_replace("&gt;",">",$html);
28282 
28283   $html = str_replace("&apos;","'",$html);
28284   $html = str_replace("&quot;",'"',$html);
28285   $html = str_replace("&amp;","&",$html);
28286   return $html;
28287 }
28288 
28289 function AdjustHTML($html,$directionality='ltr',$usepre=true, $tabSpaces=8) {
28290   //Try to make the html text more manageable (turning it into XHTML)
28291 /*-- ANNOTATIONS --*/
28292   preg_match_all("/(<annotation.*?>)/si", $html, $m);
28293   if (count($m[1])) { 
28294     for($i=0;$i<count($m[1]);$i++) {
28295       $sub = preg_replace("/\n/si", "\xbb\xa4\xac", $m[1][$i]);
28296       $html = preg_replace('/'.preg_quote($m[1][$i], '/').'/si', $sub, $html); 
28297     }
28298   }
28299 /*-- END ANNOTATIONS --*/
28300 
28301   //Remove javascript code from HTML (should not appear in the PDF file)
28302   $html = preg_replace('/<script.*?<\/script>/is','',$html); // mPDF 3.0 changed from ereg_
28303 
28304   //Remove special comments
28305   $html = preg_replace('/<!--mpdf/i','',$html); // mPDF 3.0 changed from ereg_
28306   $html = preg_replace('/mpdf-->/i','',$html); // mPDF 3.0 changed from ereg_
28307 
28308   //Remove comments from HTML (should not appear in the PDF file)
28309   $html = preg_replace('/<!--.*?-->/s','',$html); // mPDF 3.0 changed from ereg_
28310 
28311   $html = preg_replace('/\f/','',$html); //replace formfeed by nothing // mPDF 3.0 changed from ereg_
28312   $html = preg_replace('/\r/','',$html); //replace carriage return by nothing // mPDF 3.0 changed from ereg_
28313 
28314   // Well formed XHTML end tags
28315   $html = preg_replace('/<(br|hr)\/>/i',"<\\1 />",$html); 
28316 
28317 /*-- TABLES --*/
28318   // Get rid of empty <thead></thead>
28319   $html = preg_replace('/<thead>\s*<\/thead>/i','',$html); // mPDF 3.0 changed from ereg_
28320   $html = preg_replace('/<tfoot>\s*<\/tfoot>/i','',$html); // mPDF 3.2
28321   $html = preg_replace('/<table[^>]*>\s*<\/table>/i','',$html); // mPDF 3.2
28322 
28323   // Remove spaces at end of table cells
28324   $html = preg_replace("/[ ]+<\/t(d|h)/",'</t\\1',$html);
28325 
28326   // Transposes Table Cells When RTL direction
28327   if ($directionality == 'rtl') { 
28328     preg_match_all('/<table(.*?)>(.*?)<\/table>/is',$html,$matches);
28329     for($i=0;$i<count($matches[0]);$i++) {
28330       $pre = '<table' . $matches[1][$i] . '>';
28331       $post = '</table>';
28332       // mPDF 3.2 Don't change if nested tables
28333       if (!preg_match('/<table/is',$matches[2][$i]) && !preg_match('/<\/table/is',$matches[2][$i]) ) {
28334         $table = $matches[0][$i];
28335         if (preg_match('/(<thead[^>]*>)/is',$table,$m)) { $thead = $m[0]; } else { $thead = ''; }
28336         preg_match_all('/<tr(.*?)>(.*?)<\/tr>/is',$table,$tmatches);
28337         $newrows = array();
28338         for($j=0;$j<count($tmatches[0]);$j++) {
28339       $rpre = '<tr' . $tmatches[1][$j] . '>';
28340       $rpost = '</tr>';
28341       $row = $tmatches[0][$j];
28342       preg_match_all('/<t[hd].*?>.*?<\/t[hd]>/is',$row,$rmatches);
28343       $cells = array();
28344       for($k=0;$k<count($rmatches[0]);$k++) { $cells[] = $rmatches[0][$k]; }
28345       $cells = array_reverse($cells);
28346       if (($thead) && ($j == 0)) {  // First row
28347         $newrows[] = $thead . $rpre . implode('',$cells) . $rpost . '</thead><tbody>';
28348       }
28349       else if (($thead) && ($j == (count($tmatches[0]) - 1))) { // last row adds </tbody>
28350         $newrows[] = $rpre . implode('',$cells) . $rpost . '</tbody>';
28351       }
28352       else {
28353         $newrows[] = $rpre . implode('',$cells) . $rpost;
28354       }
28355         }
28356         $newtable = $pre . implode('',$newrows) . $post;
28357         $html = str_replace($table,$newtable,$html);
28358       }
28359     }
28360   }
28361 /*-- END TABLES --*/
28362 
28363   // mPDF 4.2.031 <dottab>
28364   $html = preg_replace("/[ ]*<dottab\s*[\/]*>[ ]*/",'<dottab />',$html);
28365 
28366   // Concatenates any Substitute characters from symbols/dingbats
28367   $html = str_replace('</tts><tts>','|',$html);
28368   $html = str_replace('</ttz><ttz>','|',$html);
28369   $html = str_replace('</tta><tta>','|',$html);
28370 
28371   $html = mb_eregi_replace('/<br \/>\s*/is',"<br />",$html); // mPDF 3.0 changed from ereg_
28372   if ($usepre) //used to keep \n on content inside <pre> and inside <textarea>
28373   {
28374     // Preserve '\n's in content between the tags <pre> and </pre>
28375     $thereispre = preg_match_all('#<pre(.*?)>(.*?)</pre>#si',$html,$temp);
28376     // Preserve '\n's in content between the tags <textarea> and </textarea>
28377     $thereistextarea = preg_match_all('#<textarea(.*?)>(.*?)</textarea>#si',$html,$temp2);
28378     $html = preg_replace('/[\n]/',' ',$html); //replace linefeed by spaces // mPDF 3.0 changed from ereg_
28379     $html = preg_replace('/[\t]/',' ',$html); //replace tabs by spaces // mPDF 3.0 changed from ereg_
28380 
28381     // mPDF 2.3 - moved
28382     // Converts < to &lt; when not a tag
28383     $html = preg_replace('/<([^!\/a-zA-Z])/i','&lt;\\1',$html); 
28384 
28385     // mPDF changed to prevent &nbsp; chars replaced
28386     $html = preg_replace("/[ ]+/",' ',$html);
28387 
28388     $html = preg_replace('/\/li>\s+<\/(u|o)l/i','/li></\\1l',$html); // mPDF 3.0 changed from ereg_
28389     $html = preg_replace('/\/(u|o)l>\s+<\/li/i','/\\1l></li',$html); // mPDF 3.0 changed from ereg_
28390     $html = preg_replace('/\/li>\s+<\/(u|o)l/i','/li></\\1l',$html); // mPDF 3.0 changed from ereg_
28391     $html = preg_replace('/\/li>\s+<li/i','/li><li',$html); // mPDF 3.0 changed from ereg_
28392     $html = preg_replace('/<(u|o)l([^>]*)>[ ]+/i','<\\1l\\2>',$html);
28393     $html = preg_replace('/[ ]+<(u|o)l/i','<\\1l',$html); // mPDF 3.0 changed from ereg_
28394 
28395     $iterator = 0;
28396     while($thereispre) //Recover <pre attributes>content</pre>
28397     {
28398       // mPDF 2.4 
28399       $temp[2][$iterator] = str_replace("<||@mpdf@||pre", "<pre", $temp[2][$iterator] );
28400       $temp[2][$iterator] = str_replace("<||@mpdf@||/pre", "</pre", $temp[2][$iterator] );
28401       // mPDF 2.4 (moved) / mPDF 2.3
28402       $temp[2][$iterator] = preg_replace("/^([^\n\t]*?)\t/me", "stripslashes('\\1') . str_repeat(' ',  ( $tabSpaces - (mb_strlen(stripslashes('\\1')) % $tabSpaces))  )",$temp[2][$iterator]);
28403 
28404       $temp[2][$iterator] = preg_replace('/&/',"&amp;",$temp[2][$iterator]); // mPDF 3.0 changed from ereg_
28405       $temp[2][$iterator] = preg_replace('/</',"&lt;",$temp[2][$iterator]); // mPDF 3.0 changed from ereg_
28406 
28407       $temp[2][$iterator] = preg_replace('/\t/',str_repeat(" ",$tabSpaces),$temp[2][$iterator]); // mPDF 3.0 changed from ereg_
28408 
28409       $temp[2][$iterator] = preg_replace('/\n/',"<br />",$temp[2][$iterator]); // mPDF 3.0 changed from ereg_
28410       // mPDF 1.3 Edited to fix bug with empty pre
28411       // mPDF 2.4 Removed /u as not needed to be Unicode and causing bugs with annotations
28412       $html = preg_replace('#<pre(.*?)>(.*?)</pre>#si','<erp'.$temp[1][$iterator].'>'.$temp[2][$iterator].'</erp>',$html,1);
28413       $thereispre--;
28414       $iterator++;
28415     }
28416     $iterator = 0;
28417     while($thereistextarea) //Recover <textarea attributes>content</textarea>
28418     {
28419       $temp2[2][$iterator] = preg_replace('/&/',"&amp;",$temp2[2][$iterator]); // mPDF 3.0 changed from ereg_
28420       $temp2[2][$iterator] = preg_replace('/</',"&lt;",$temp2[2][$iterator]); // mPDF 3.0 changed from ereg_
28421 
28422       $temp2[2][$iterator] = preg_replace('/\t/',str_repeat(" ",$tabSpaces),$temp2[2][$iterator]); // mPDF 3.0 changed from ereg_
28423       $temp2[2][$iterator] = preg_replace('/[ ]/',"&nbsp;",$temp2[2][$iterator]); // mPDF 3.0 changed from ereg_
28424       // mPDF 4.1 /u modifier removed - not required and causing problems if annotation special chars
28425       $html = preg_replace('#<textarea(.*?)>(.*?)</textarea>#si','<aeratxet'.$temp2[1][$iterator].'>'.trim($temp2[2][$iterator]) .'</aeratxet>',$html,1);
28426       $thereistextarea--;
28427       $iterator++;
28428     }
28429     //Restore original tag names
28430     $html = str_replace("<erp","<pre",$html);
28431     $html = str_replace("</erp>","</pre>",$html);
28432     $html = str_replace("<aeratxet","<textarea",$html);
28433     $html = str_replace("</aeratxet>","</textarea>",$html);
28434     // (the code above might slowdown overall performance?)
28435   } //end of if($usepre)
28436   else
28437   {
28438     $html = preg_replace('/\n/',' ',$html); //replace linefeed by spaces // mPDF 3.0 changed from ereg_
28439     $html = preg_replace('/\t/',' ',$html); //replace tabs by spaces // mPDF 3.0 changed from ereg_
28440 
28441     // Converts < to &lt; when not a tag
28442     $html = preg_replace('/<([^!\/a-zA-Z])/i','&lt;\\1',$html); 
28443 
28444     // mPDF changed to prevent &nbsp; chars replaced
28445     $html = preg_replace("/[ ]+/u",' ',$html);
28446 
28447     $html = preg_replace('/\/li>\s+<\/(u|o)l/i','/li></\\1l',$html); // mPDF 3.0 changed from ereg_
28448     $html = preg_replace('/\/(u|o)l>\s+<\/li/i','/\\1l></li',$html); // mPDF 3.0 changed from ereg_
28449     $html = preg_replace('/\/li>\s+<\/(u|o)l/i','/li></\\1l',$html); // mPDF 3.0 changed from ereg_
28450     $html = preg_replace('/\/li>\s+<li/i','/li><li',$html); // mPDF 3.0 changed from ereg_
28451     $html = preg_replace('/<(u|o)l([^>]*)>[ ]+/i','<\\1l\\2>',$html);
28452     $html = preg_replace('/[ ]+<(u|o)l/i','<\\1l',$html); // mPDF 3.0 changed from ereg_
28453 
28454   }
28455   $html = preg_replace('/<textarea([^>]*)><\/textarea>/si','<textarea\\1> </textarea>',$html);
28456   $html = preg_replace('/<(h[1-6])([^>]*)(>(?:(?!h[1-6]).)*<\/\\1>\s*<table)/si','<\\1\\2 keep-with-table="1"\\3',$html); // *TABLES*
28457   $html = preg_replace("/\xbb\xa4\xac/", "\n", $html);
28458   return $html;
28459 }
28460 
28461 /*-- LISTS --*/
28462 function dec2alpha($valor,$toupper="true"){
28463 // returns a string from A-Z to AA-ZZ to AAA-ZZZ
28464 // OBS: A = 65 ASCII TABLE VALUE
28465   if (($valor < 1)  || ($valor > 18278)) return "?"; //supports 'only' up to 18278
28466   $c1 = $c2 = $c3 = '';
28467   if ($valor > 702) // 3 letters (up to 18278)
28468     {
28469       $c1 = 65 + floor(($valor-703)/676);
28470       $c2 = 65 + floor((($valor-703)%676)/26);
28471       $c3 = 65 + floor((($valor-703)%676)%26);
28472     }
28473   elseif ($valor > 26) // 2 letters (up to 702)
28474   {
28475       $c1 = (64 + (int)(($valor-1) / 26));
28476       $c2 = (64 + (int)($valor % 26));
28477       if ($c2 == 64) $c2 += 26;
28478   }
28479   else // 1 letter (up to 26)
28480   {
28481       $c1 = (64 + $valor);
28482   }
28483   $alpha = chr($c1);
28484   if ($c2 != '') $alpha .= chr($c2);
28485   if ($c3 != '') $alpha .= chr($c3);
28486   if (!$toupper) $alpha = strtolower($alpha);
28487   return $alpha;
28488 }
28489 
28490 
28491 function dec2roman($valor,$toupper=true){
28492  //returns a string as a roman numeral
28493   $r1=$r2=$r3=$r4='';
28494   if (($valor >= 5000) || ($valor < 1)) return "?"; //supports 'only' up to 4999
28495   $aux = (int)($valor/1000);
28496   if ($aux!==0)
28497   {
28498     $valor %= 1000;
28499     while($aux!==0)
28500     {
28501       $r1 .= "M";
28502       $aux--;
28503     }
28504   }
28505   $aux = (int)($valor/100);
28506   if ($aux!==0)
28507   {
28508     $valor %= 100;
28509     switch($aux){
28510       case 3: $r2="C";
28511       case 2: $r2.="C";
28512       case 1: $r2.="C"; break;
28513       case 9: $r2="CM"; break;
28514       case 8: $r2="C";
28515       case 7: $r2.="C";
28516       case 6: $r2.="C";
28517       case 5: $r2="D".$r2; break;
28518       case 4: $r2="CD"; break;
28519       default: break;
28520     }
28521   }
28522   $aux = (int)($valor/10);
28523   if ($aux!==0)
28524   {
28525     $valor %= 10;
28526     switch($aux){
28527       case 3: $r3="X";
28528       case 2: $r3.="X";
28529       case 1: $r3.="X"; break;
28530       case 9: $r3="XC"; break;
28531       case 8: $r3="X";
28532       case 7: $r3.="X";
28533       case 6: $r3.="X";
28534       case 5: $r3="L".$r3; break;
28535       case 4: $r3="XL"; break;
28536       default: break;
28537     }
28538   }
28539   switch($valor){
28540     case 3: $r4="I";
28541     case 2: $r4.="I";
28542     case 1: $r4.="I"; break;
28543     case 9: $r4="IX"; break;
28544     case 8: $r4="I";
28545     case 7: $r4.="I";
28546     case 6: $r4.="I";
28547     case 5: $r4="V".$r4; break;
28548     case 4: $r4="IV"; break;
28549     default: break;
28550   }
28551   $roman = $r1.$r2.$r3.$r4;
28552   if (!$toupper) $roman = strtolower($roman);
28553   return $roman;
28554 }
28555 /*-- END LISTS --*/
28556 
28557 
28558 //===========================
28559 /*-- IMPORTS --*/
28560 // mPDF 4.2.006
28561 function SetImportUse() {
28562   $this->enableImports = true;
28563   ini_set('auto_detect_line_endings',1);
28564   require_once(_MPDF_PATH."mpdfi/pdf_context.php");
28565   require_once(_MPDF_PATH."mpdfi/pdf_parser.php");
28566   require_once(_MPDF_PATH."mpdfi/fpdi_pdf_parser.php");
28567 }
28568 
28569 // from mPDFI
28570 function hex2str($hex) {
28571   return pack("H*", str_replace(array("\r","\n"," "),"", $hex));
28572 }
28573     
28574 function str2hex($str) {
28575   return current(unpack("H*",$str));
28576 }
28577 
28578     
28579 function pdf_write_value(&$value) {
28580   switch ($value[0]) {
28581     case PDF_TYPE_NUMERIC :
28582     case PDF_TYPE_TOKEN :
28583       // A numeric value or a token.
28584       // Simply output them
28585       $this->_out($value[1]." ", false);
28586       break;
28587 
28588     case PDF_TYPE_ARRAY :
28589       // An array. Output the proper
28590       // structure and move on.
28591       $this->_out("[",false);
28592       for ($i = 0; $i < count($value[1]); $i++) {
28593         $this->pdf_write_value($value[1][$i]);
28594       }
28595       $this->_out("]");
28596       break;
28597 
28598     case PDF_TYPE_DICTIONARY :
28599       // A dictionary.
28600       $this->_out("<<",false);
28601       reset ($value[1]);
28602       while (list($k, $v) = each($value[1])) {
28603         $this->_out($k . " ",false);
28604         $this->pdf_write_value($v);
28605       }
28606       $this->_out(">>");
28607       break;
28608 
28609     case PDF_TYPE_OBJREF :
28610       // An indirect object reference
28611       // Fill the object stack if needed
28612       $cpfn =& $this->current_parser->filename;
28613       if (!isset($this->_don_obj_stack[$cpfn][$value[1]])) {
28614           $this->_newobj(false,true);
28615           $this->_obj_stack[$cpfn][$value[1]] = array($this->n, $value);
28616           $this->_don_obj_stack[$cpfn][$value[1]] = array($this->n, $value);
28617       }
28618       $objid = $this->_don_obj_stack[$cpfn][$value[1]][0];
28619       $this->_out("{$objid} 0 R"); //{$value[2]}
28620       break;
28621 
28622     case PDF_TYPE_STRING :
28623       if ($this->encrypted) {
28624         $value[1] = $this->_RC4($this->_objectkey($this->_current_obj_id), $value[1]);
28625         $value[1] = $this->_escape($value[1]);
28626       } 
28627       // A string.
28628       $this->_out('('.$value[1].')');
28629       break;
28630 
28631     case PDF_TYPE_STREAM :
28632       // A stream. First, output the
28633       // stream dictionary, then the
28634       // stream data itself.
28635       $this->pdf_write_value($value[1]);
28636       if ($this->encrypted) {
28637         $value[2][1] = $this->_RC4($this->_objectkey($this->_current_obj_id), $value[2][1]);
28638       }
28639       $this->_out("stream");
28640       $this->_out($value[2][1]);
28641       $this->_out("endstream");
28642       break;
28643 
28644     case PDF_TYPE_HEX :
28645       if ($this->encrypted) {
28646         $value[1] = $this->hex2str($value[1]);
28647         $value[1] = $this->_RC4($this->_objectkey($this->_current_obj_id), $value[1]);
28648         // remake hexstring of encrypted string
28649         $value[1] = $this->str2hex($value[1]);
28650       }
28651       $this->_out("<".$value[1].">");
28652       break;
28653 
28654     case PDF_TYPE_NULL :
28655       // The null object.
28656       $this->_out("null");
28657       break;
28658   }
28659 }
28660 
28661 // ========== OVERWRITE SEARCH STRING IN A PDF FILE ================
28662 function OverWrite($file_in, $search, $replacement, $dest="D", $file_out="mpdf" ) {
28663   $pdf = file_get_contents($file_in);
28664 
28665   if (!is_array($search)) {
28666     $x = $search;
28667     $search = array($x);
28668   }
28669   if (!is_array($replacement)) {
28670     $x = $replacement;
28671     $search = array($x);
28672   }
28673 
28674   if ($this->isunicode && !$this->isCJK) {
28675     foreach($search AS $k=>$val) {
28676     $search[$k] = $this->UTF8ToUTF16BE($search[$k] , false);
28677     $search[$k] = $this->_escape($search[$k]); 
28678     $replacement[$k] = $this->UTF8ToUTF16BE($replacement[$k], false);
28679     $replacement[$k] = $this->_escape($replacement[$k]); 
28680     }
28681   }
28682   else {
28683     foreach($replacement AS $k=>$val) {
28684     $replacement[$k] = mb_convert_encoding($replacement[$k],$this->mb_encoding,'utf-8'); 
28685     $replacement[$k] = $this->_escape($replacement[$k]); 
28686     }
28687   }
28688 
28689   // Get xref into array
28690   $xref = array();
28691   preg_match("/xref\n0 (\d+)\n(.*?)\ntrailer/s",$pdf,$m);
28692   $xref_objid = $m[1];
28693   preg_match_all('/(\d{10}) (\d{5}) (f|n)/',$m[2],$x);
28694   for($i=0; $i<count($x[0]); $i++) {
28695     $xref[] = array(intval($x[1][$i]), $x[2][$i], $x[3][$i]);
28696   }
28697 
28698   $changes = array();
28699   preg_match("/<<\s*\/Type\s*\/Pages\s*\/Kids\s*\[(.*?)\]\s*\/Count/s",$pdf,$m);  // mPDF 4.2.030
28700   preg_match_all("/(\d+) 0 R /s",$m[1],$o);
28701   $objlist = $o[1];
28702   foreach($objlist AS $obj) {
28703     if ($this->compress) {
28704       preg_match("/".($obj+1)." 0 obj\n<<\s*\/Filter\s*\/FlateDecode\s*\/Length (\d+)>>\nstream\n(.*?)\nendstream\n/s",$pdf,$m);  // mPDF 4.2.030
28705     }
28706     else {
28707       preg_match("/".($obj+1)." 0 obj\n<<\s*\/Length (\d+)>>\nstream\n(.*?)\nendstream\n/s",$pdf,$m); // mPDF 4.2.030
28708     }
28709     $s = $m[2];
28710     if (!$s) { continue; }  // mPDF 4.2.030
28711     $oldlen = $m[1];
28712     if ($this->encrypted) {
28713     $s = $this->_RC4($this->_objectkey($obj+1), $s);
28714     }
28715     if ($this->compress) {
28716       $s = gzuncompress($s);
28717     }
28718       foreach($search AS $k=>$val) {
28719     $s = str_replace($search[$k],$replacement[$k],$s);
28720     }
28721     if ($this->compress) {
28722     $s = gzcompress($s);
28723     }
28724     if ($this->encrypted) {
28725     $s = $this->_RC4($this->_objectkey($obj+1), $s);
28726     }
28727     $newlen = strlen($s);
28728     $changes[($xref[$obj+1][0])] = ($newlen - $oldlen) + (strlen($newlen) - strlen($oldlen ));
28729     if ($this->compress) {
28730       $newstr = ($obj+1) . " 0 obj\n<</Filter /FlateDecode /Length ".$newlen.">>\nstream\n".$s."\nendstream\n";
28731     }
28732     else {
28733       $newstr = ($obj+1) . " 0 obj\n<</Length ".$newlen.">>\nstream\n".$s."\nendstream\n";
28734     }
28735     $pdf = str_replace($m[0],$newstr,$pdf);
28736   }
28737 
28738   // Update xref in PDF
28739   krsort($changes);
28740   $newxref = "xref\n0 ".$xref_objid."\n";
28741   foreach($xref AS $v) { 
28742     foreach($changes AS $ck => $cv) {
28743       if ($v[0] > $ck) { $v[0] += $cv; }
28744     }
28745     $newxref .= sprintf('%010d',$v[0]) . ' ' . $v[1] . ' ' .$v[2] . " \n";
28746   }
28747   $newxref .= "trailer";
28748   $pdf = preg_replace("/xref\n0 \d+\n.*?\ntrailer/s",$newxref,$pdf);
28749 
28750   // Update startxref in PDF
28751   preg_match("/startxref\n(\d+)\n%%EOF/s", $pdf, $m);
28752   $startxref = $m[1];
28753   $startxref += array_sum($changes);
28754   $pdf = preg_replace("/startxref\n(\d+)\n%%EOF/s","startxref\n".$startxref."\n%%EOF",$pdf);
28755 
28756   // OUTPUT
28757   switch($dest) {
28758     case 'I':
28759       //Send to standard output
28760       if(isset($_SERVER['SERVER_NAME']))
28761       {
28762         //We send to a browser
28763         Header('Content-Type: application/pdf');
28764         Header('Content-Length: '.strlen($pdf));
28765         Header('Content-disposition: inline; filename='.$file_out);
28766       }
28767       echo $pdf;
28768       break;
28769     case 'F':
28770       //Save to local file
28771       if (!$file_out) { $file_out = 'mpdf.pdf'; }
28772       $f=fopen($file_out,'wb');
28773       if(!$f) die('Unable to create output file: '.$file_out);
28774       fwrite($f,$pdf,strlen($pdf));
28775       fclose($f);
28776       break;
28777     case 'S':
28778       //Return as a string
28779       return $pdf;
28780     case 'D':
28781     default:
28782       //Download file
28783       if(isset($_SERVER['HTTP_USER_AGENT']) and strpos($_SERVER['HTTP_USER_AGENT'],'MSIE'))
28784         Header('Content-Type: application/force-download');
28785       else
28786         Header('Content-Type: application/octet-stream');
28787       Header('Content-Length: '.strlen($pdf));
28788       Header('Content-disposition: attachment; filename='.$file_out);
28789       echo $pdf;
28790       break;
28791   }
28792 }
28793 
28794 
28795 function GetTemplateSize($tplidx, $_w=0, $_h=0) {
28796   if (!$this->tpls[$tplidx])
28797     return false;
28798   $w = $this->tpls[$tplidx]['box']['w'];
28799   $h = $this->tpls[$tplidx]['box']['h'];
28800   if ($_w == 0 and $_h == 0) {
28801     $_w = $w;
28802     $_h = $h;
28803   }
28804   if($_w==0)
28805     $_w=$_h*$w/$h;
28806   if($_h==0)
28807     $_h=$_w*$h/$w;
28808   return array("w" => $_w, "h" => $_h);
28809 }
28810 
28811 // Thumbnails
28812 // mPDF 2.3 Templates
28813 function Thumbnail($file, $npr=3, $spacing=10) {  //$npr = number per row 
28814   $w = (($this->pgwidth + $spacing)/$npr) - $spacing;
28815   $oldlinewidth = $this->LineWidth;
28816   $this->SetLineWidth(0.02); $this->SetDrawColor(0);
28817   $h = 0;
28818   $maxh = 0;
28819   $x = $_x = $this->lMargin;
28820   $_y = $this->tMargin;
28821   if ($this->y==0) { $y = $_y; } else { $y = $this->y; }
28822   $pagecount = $this->SetSourceFile($file);
28823   for ($n = 1; $n <= $pagecount; $n++) {
28824     $tplidx = $this->ImportPage($n);
28825     $size = $this->useTemplate($tplidx, $x, $y, $w);
28826     $this->Rect($x, $y, $size['w'], $size['h']);
28827     $h = max($h, $size['h']);
28828     $maxh = max($h, $maxh);
28829     if ($n % $npr == 0) {
28830        if (($y + $h + $spacing + $maxh)>$this->PageBreakTrigger && $n != $pagecount) {
28831       $this->AddPage();  
28832       $x = $_x;
28833       $y = $_y;        
28834        }
28835        else {
28836       $y += $h+$spacing ;
28837       $x = $_x;
28838       $h = 0;
28839        }
28840     }
28841     else {
28842       $x += $w+$spacing ;
28843     }
28844   }
28845   $this->SetLineWidth($oldlinewidth);
28846 }
28847 
28848 function SetSourceFile($filename) {
28849   $this->current_filename = $filename;
28850   $fn =& $this->current_filename;
28851   if (!isset($this->parsers[$fn]))
28852     // mPDF 4.3.007D
28853     // $this->parsers[$fn] =& new fpdi_pdf_parser($fn,$this);
28854     $this->parsers[$fn] = new fpdi_pdf_parser($fn,$this);
28855   if (!$this->parsers[$fn]->success) {
28856     $this->Error($this->parsers[$fn]->errormsg);  // Delete this line to return false on fail
28857     return false;
28858   }
28859   $this->current_parser =& $this->parsers[$fn];
28860   return $this->parsers[$fn]->getPageCount();
28861 }
28862   
28863 function ImportPage($pageno=1, $crop_x=null, $crop_y=null, $crop_w=0, $crop_h=0, $boxName='/CropBox') {
28864   $fn =& $this->current_filename;
28865   
28866   $parser =& $this->parsers[$fn];
28867   $parser->setPageno($pageno);
28868 
28869   $this->tpl++;
28870   $this->tpls[$this->tpl] = array();
28871   $tpl =& $this->tpls[$this->tpl];
28872   $tpl['parser'] =& $parser;
28873   $tpl['resources'] = $parser->getPageResources();
28874   $tpl['buffer'] = $parser->getContent();
28875     
28876   if (!in_array($boxName, $parser->availableBoxes))
28877     return $this->Error(sprintf("Unknown box: %s", $boxName));
28878   $pageboxes = $parser->getPageBoxes($pageno);
28879     
28887   if (!isset($pageboxes[$boxName]) && ($boxName == "/BleedBox" || $boxName == "/TrimBox" || $boxName == "/ArtBox"))
28888     $boxName = "/CropBox";
28889   if (!isset($pageboxes[$boxName]) && $boxName == "/CropBox")
28890     $boxName = "/MediaBox";
28891     
28892   if (!isset($pageboxes[$boxName]))
28893     return false;
28894     
28895   $box = $pageboxes[$boxName];
28896 
28897   $tpl['box'] = $box;
28898   // To build an array that can be used by useTemplate()
28899   $this->tpls[$this->tpl] = array_merge($this->tpls[$this->tpl],$box);
28900   // An imported page will start at 0,0 everytime. Translation will be set in _putformxobjects()
28901   $tpl['x'] = 0;
28902   $tpl['y'] = 0;
28903     
28904   $tpl['w'] = $tpl['box']['w'] ;
28905   $tpl['h'] = $tpl['box']['h'] ;
28906   if ($crop_w) { $tpl['box']['w'] = $crop_w; }
28907   if ($crop_h) { $tpl['box']['h'] = $crop_h; }
28908   if (isset($crop_x)) { $tpl['box']['x'] = $crop_x; }
28909   if (isset($crop_y)) {$tpl['box']['y'] = $tpl['h'] - $crop_y  - $crop_h ; }
28910 
28911   $page =& $parser->pages[$parser->pageno];
28912     
28913   // fix for rotated pages
28914   $rotation = $parser->getPageRotation($pageno);
28915 
28916   if (isset($rotation[1]) && ($angle = $rotation[1] % 360) != 0 && $tpl['box']['w'] == $tpl['w']) {
28917     $steps = $angle / 90;
28918 
28919     $_w = $tpl['w'];
28920     $_h = $tpl['h'];
28921     $tpl['w'] = $steps % 2 == 0 ? $_w : $_h;
28922     $tpl['h'] = $steps % 2 == 0 ? $_h : $_w;
28923     
28924     if ($steps % 2 != 0) {
28925       $x = $y = ($steps == 1 || $steps == -3) ? $tpl['h'] : $tpl['w'];
28926     } else {
28927       $x = $tpl['w'];
28928       $y = $tpl['h'];
28929     }
28930       
28931     $cx=($x/2+$tpl['box']['x'])*$this->k;
28932     $cy=($y/2+$tpl['box']['y'])*$this->k;
28933       
28934     $angle*=-1; 
28935       
28936     $angle*=M_PI/180;
28937     $c=cos($angle);
28938     $s=sin($angle);
28939     $tpl['box']['w'] = $tpl['w'] ;
28940     $tpl['box']['h'] = $tpl['h'] ;
28941       
28942     $tpl['buffer'] = sprintf('q %.5f %.5f %.5f %.5f %.2f %.2f cm 1 0 0 1 %.2f %.2f cm %s Q',$c,$s,-$s,$c,$cx,$cy,-$cx,-$cy, $tpl['buffer']);
28943   }
28944   
28945   return $this->tpl;
28946 }
28947   
28948 function UseTemplate($tplidx, $_x=null, $_y=null, $_w=0, $_h=0) {
28949   if (!isset($this->tpls[$tplidx]))
28950     $this->Error("Template does not exist!");
28951   if($this->state==0) { $this->AddPage(); }
28952   $out = 'q 0 J 1 w 0 j 0 G'."\n"; // reset standard values
28953     
28954   $x = $this->tpls[$tplidx]['x'];
28955   $y = $this->tpls[$tplidx]['y'];
28956   $w = $this->tpls[$tplidx]['w'];
28957   $h = $this->tpls[$tplidx]['h'];
28958   if ($_x == null) { $_x = $x; }
28959   if ($_y == null) { $_y = $y; }
28960   if ($_x === -1) { $_x = $this->x; }
28961   if ($_y === -1) { $_y = $this->y; }
28962 
28963   $wh = $this->getTemplateSize($tplidx,$_w,$_h);
28964   $_w = $wh['w'];
28965   $_h = $wh['h'];
28966   
28967   $out .= sprintf("q %.4f 0 0 %.4f %.2f %.2f cm", ($_w/$this->tpls[$tplidx]['box']['w']), ($_h/$this->tpls[$tplidx]['box']['h']), $_x*$this->k, ($this->h-($_y+$_h))*$this->k)."\n"; 
28968   $out .= $this->tplprefix.$tplidx." Do Q\n";
28969 
28970   $s = array("w" => $_w, "h" => $_h);
28971   $out .= "Q\n";
28972   $this->pages[$this->page] = $out . $this->pages[$this->page]; // mPDF 4.2.004
28973   return $s;
28974 }
28975   
28976 function SetPageTemplate($tplidx='') {
28977   if (!isset($this->tpls[$tplidx])) {
28978     $this->pageTemplate = '';
28979     return false;
28980   }
28981   $this->pageTemplate = $tplidx;
28982 }
28983   
28984 function SetDocTemplate($file='', $continue=0) {
28985   $this->docTemplate = $file;
28986   $this->docTemplateContinue = $continue;
28987 }
28988 /*-- END IMPORTS --*/

28991 
28992 }//end of Class
